src_text: reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.The drawbacks were the prices of drinks. 2.They have lots of good quality food to choose from, and a range of cheap drinks. 3.We thought the drinks prices were high. 4.The drinks, though, are WAY too expensive compared to everything else. S: There are quite a few moderately priced restaurants in the centre of town. Do you have a food type preference? U: No, maybe you could book me at your favorite for Saturday?    There will be 8 of us, at 17:30. S: Well, my personal favorite is Copper Kettle. I've booked you a table for 8 on Saturday at 17:30. Your reference number is LSQYZI7O. U: Do they have a reasonably priced wine menu? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Copper Kettle does serve and sell alcohol. One guest said the drinks were cheap, but 3 guests said they felt it was too high priced. I have no information about wine prices specifically.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The room was also quiet. 2.The only downside to the hotel was the noise that was all over the place, asides this...I would recommend the hotel to anyone and I also plan to stay there when I am in the city. 3.The other guests were just so noisy, I could not enjoy my stay. 4.I highly recommend Gonville Hotel for how quiet my room was and the absolutely stellar concierge service. 5.The major negative, however, is how noisy the hotel was. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.It was pretty annoying. 2.The only downside to the hotel was the noise. [SEP] U: I am looking got a hotel near the centre and I need to it have free wifi. S: I have 5 hotels that fit that criteria. Are you looking for a particular price range? U: Expensive. A guest house, please. S: I have no matches that fit that criteria, would you like me to look up something else? U: How about one that is a hotel? S: Yes, I have two results. Gonville hotel has 3 stars and University Arms has 4 stars, would one of those work for you? U: Which one has the least noisy, disruptive environment? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All the reviews regarding noise at University Arms Hotel were negative. The reviews at Gonville Hotel were mixed with the room being described as both noisy and quiet. Would you prefer to book the Gonville Hotel?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. They are located in the north, east, and south. Do you have a preference? U: Can you recommend one? S: acorn guest house seems like a nice place because it is the first one on my list how about that one its probably not too shabby U: Does the Acorn Guest House have showers with strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviewers thought that the water pressure at the guest house was weak unfortunately. Is there anything else you need to know?

src_text: reviews of LA RAZA: 1.If you're looking for a cool, hip Spanish restaurant to visit for tapas and drinks, I wouldn't recommend La Raza because their drinks were frankly not well-prepared and tasted pretty mediocre. 2.La Raza has good food and drinks. 3.Though I'm more of a beer drinker and stuck with one of their top quality, full bodied Spanish craft beers, my boyfriend tried a glass of one of their expensive, top quality Sangrias and loved it. 4.I also ordered a beer, which seemed to be of great quality along with their other drink choices. 5.I liked the sangria and the portion was large for my tortilla espanola. FAQs of LA RAZA: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at La Raza. [SEP] U: I would like to find a cheap African restaurant in the area. S: I was unable to find any cheap african places. U: What cheap restaurants are in the centre? S: We have fifteen cheap restaurants in the center, with cuisines ranging from asian oriental to mediterranean and modern european. U: How about Spanish food. Do you have a restaurant serving that? S: La Raza is a spanish restaurant in that price range, shall I book a table for you? U: What do people say about the quality of beer served at La Raza? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that have dined previously at the La Raza restaurant regard its beer quality as being great and a highlight.

src_text: reviews of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.The only negative is that the location is just a 10 minute walk from my house; it's so yummy, I wish I lived right next door! 2.It was located in a mall so it was quite convenient but the view was of the parking lot so it was pretty bad. 3.The location wasn‚Äôt in the best part of town and it took a while to get there. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for an expensive restaurant on the south side of town. S: Frankie and Bennys serves Italian food, it is in the South Part of town, and the price range is expensive. Can I help you with anything else? U: Is it in a good location to the sights? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Frankie and Bennys is not in the best part of town, and the view from the restaurant is of a parking lot, but it is a 10 minute walk from other city sights.

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.The hotel was within walking distance to many spots so it was a very good location. 2.I would expect to pay a lot more considering where the hotel is located. 3.This location offered the best possible location on my budget. 4.With a strategic location, we were able to walk to many places. 5.Given the location of the hotel, the value of money was good, too. 6.I liked where they're situated, in a cozy suburb at the east end of town. reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I really would like to try a japanese restaurant while in Cambridge. S: Wagamama is a Japanese restaurant on 36 Saint Andres Street. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: I'd like to treat myself.  Is this in the expensive range? S: It is expensive. Shall I book it for you? U: Yes, if this restaurant is in the Centre. I also need the postcode and phone number please. S: Of course. The phone is 01223462354 and the post code is cb23ar. Can I do anything else for you? U: I also need a hotel in the cheap price range. S: I have located 2 hotel options, Alexander Bed and Breakfast and El Shaddai, both have internet and parking available. Would you like me to book one of these for you? U: Are these located in a good part of town? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Alexander Bed and Brrakfast is located outside of town, whereas El Shaddai is in a centeral location and within walking distance of a lot of things.

src_text:
reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.However, I was frustrated about the low water pressure which made my shower not enjoyable. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train leaving thursday departing from london liverpool street? S: I have 10 trains leaving at this day and time with Cambridge as the destination. What will your approximate departure time be? U: I don't have a preference but I do need to be in Cambridge by 15:00. S: the TR1268 will get you there by 13:07, how many tickets? U: What is the price of the ticket and departure time? S: The departure time is 11:39 and the cost will be 16.60 pounds. U: Thanks. I also need to find a guesthouse with free wifi. S: I can also assist you with finding a guest house. Does the train fit your needs and would you like to book tickets for that? U: No tickets for the train. I would like a guesthouse in the east that is expensive, please. S: I do not have any expensive guesthouses in the east offering free wifi. U: How about in the cheap price range instead? S: I have the allenbell located at 517a coldham lane. Would you like reservations? U: Yes, could you book it for 5 people for 3 nights starting thursday? S: Booking was successful.
Reference number is : Q10RYGHF. U: Is the water pressure good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure at the Allenbell is unfortunately one of the negatives as guests have mentioned not having enjoyable shower experiences.

src_text:
reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The drinks are also super high quality and super affordable, I was so pleased. 2.Unfortunately, the drinks were not up to the same level of quality as the food. 3.After that, I wanted to sample some authentic English beer so I bought a stout, which was actually not bad. 4.I liked the ale which was so tasty and refreshing, as well as being reasonably priced. 5.There was a large variety of drinks and they were very high-quality. 6.The drinks were well-made and quite affordable. 7.The ale I was provided could only be described as "underwhelming." FAQs of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.Yes, this restaurant offers a full bar with alcoholic drinks. [SEP] U: I am looking a train arriving by 17:45 that leaves on Friday. S: sure, what is your destination? U: Leaving cambridge and going to norwich. S: TR7747 leaves cambridge on friday and arrives in norwich at 16:55. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Yes, book for three people, please. S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 52.8 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : 8MRK0X44. U: Thank you so much. I appreciate it. Can you also help me find a British restaurant in the centre of town? S: i have 7 british restaurants in the centre of town. which price range would you prefer? U: expensive price range will be good S: How about midsummer house restaurant? U: Do you know if Midsummer House Restaurant offers a nice, high-quality stout selection? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some customers said that the drinks were very high quality, including the stout, the others said they were a bit underwhelming. Do you want to know anything else?

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was no more than a few noises I heard during my entire stay, I was able to keep my head clear. 2.I stayed here with my family, and we were able to get a good night's rest, as it was very quiet. 3.I mean they are like home comfortable, and also it's very quiet so we didn't have to worry about any loud noises. 4.This place definitely delivered in that regard. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 2.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. [SEP] U: I would like to book a room in a hotel, please. S: Do you prefer a particular area of town or price range? U: Yes, I would like a hotel in the north please. S: There are two hotels in the north, Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge which would you like? U: Is either of them in a quiet area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Ashley Hotel has been complimented for its quiet environment, while Lovell Lodge has a few complaints about the noise but others have said the ambiance is nice.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay with free wifi. S: Certainly.  What part of town are you wanting to stay in? U: The north part of town please.  Are there any guesthouses? S: We have ten such places. U: Great! Could you book one of those for Sunday for me? S: I'm sorry, there isn't anything available for Sunday. Would a different day work? U: How about just 1 night? S: I'm sorry there are no rooms available for that day at all. Would it be possible for your to book another day? U: I really need a room for 4 people on Sunday. S: I'm not sure we're going to be able to help you get a room on Sunday. Can you restate your requirements? U: I need a hotel on sunday for 4 people for 3 nights.  I need the hotel to be a guesthouse with free wifi. S: I actually attempted all ten guesthouses with the booking instructions, all of them are unsuccesful.  May need to try hotels or different area to move forward. U: Try hotels in the north, then. S: The rooms are booked then , shall I try a shorter stay? U: Ok, can you try for just 1 night please? S: I was able to get you in for one night at the Acorn Guest House, reference number 2T2WBNRP. Sorry it took so long. Is there anything else I can help with? U: Are the shower streams strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, the reviewers said that the showers water pressure this week at the guest house. Is there anything else you need to know?

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: I would like a guesthouse, four star. S: The allenbell is a 4-star guesthouse in the east. Would you like to make a booking? U: does it include free parking? S: It includes free parking.   Would you like to book a room at this hotel? U: Does this place have rooms with a good view available? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Allenbell does have rooms with a good view. People have said that the views are good and scenic.

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.The location at Graffiti is incredible! 2.It offers great views at an incredible location. 3.The location is right downtown, which I like, and the portions are generous. [SEP] U: I am looking for information in Cambridge. S: Sure, what can I help you with? U: Are there trains leaving from Peterborough on Tuesday? S: Yes, there are many trains leaving Peterborough on Tuesday, what are your arrival and departure times? U: I'd like to arrive by 13:00. I'd also like to book seats for 6 people. Can you provide a reference number please? S: Your booking has been successful. You will take the TR5060 at 11:48 and arrive at 12:38. Your fees are 99 GBP which you can pay at the station. FDPK5M0M U: Yes I am also looking for an expensive restaurant on the west side. S: what about graffiti? it looks lovely U: Is it in a decent location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the location of Graffiti is almost unanimously considered to be incredible, right in the center of the downtown.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: I would like to find a pool that I can visit. S: Of course, there are 4 public pools in Cambridge. Are you looking to visit any particular part of town? U: I am not. Can you please give the phone number and entrance fee for one of them? S: I can provide you four names but not an entrance fee. I am sorry. U: Just give me the phone number for the first one on your list, and can you confirm if that one has an entrance fee please. S: The phone number for the abbey pool and astroturf pitch phone number is 01223902088.  I am sorry, but they do not note if an entrance fee is required. U: Ok, I also need a place to stay and I don't care about free parking, but can it be moderately priced? S: I have many options available. Is there a particular area of town you would like to stay or a number of stars you want? U: I want to stay on the east side of town and I'm looking for a guesthouse type hotel. S: The Carolina Bed and Breakfast is a moderately priced 4 star guesthouse with free parking. Would you like to try that one? U: What exactly are their breakfast options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Breakfast at the Carolina Bed and Breakfast gets mixed reviews by past guests from plentiful to meager.  They do offer a full English/Irish breakfast.  Would you still like to try that one?

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ONE SEVEN: 1.The food was of good quality, affordable for drinks price, Various gluten-free options and a nice indoor d√©cor but i didn't like the Mediocre service and  view 2.The view here is nice and you can see lots of attractions outside, but I hated that I had to wait a while for my food and the service seemed, how to put it... lacking.... [SEP] U: Hi. Can you help me find a train? S: Were you interested in arriving or departing from Cambridge, and on what day? U: I need to arrive in broxbourne. I need to leave cambridge after 16:15 on monday. S: Is there a time you would like to leave by? U: that should be after 16:15. book for 6 people and give me the  reference number please S: You are booked to leave at 17:01 and your reference number is  73AGGF1W. Can I help you with anything else today? U: Im also looking for a restaurant in the centre that is moderately priced. S: I would bet you'd like restaurant one seven. Want more information? U: Is the service very good at Restaurant One Seven? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Service is slow, says past customers in their reviews. They enjoyed the ambience, however they did not like that they had to wait so long for their food.

src_text: reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.This quaint cafe serves Italian cuisine. 2.The Italian joint, Stazione Restaurand and Coffee Bar, had a good atmosphere when my family and I visited last weekend. 3.The cafe is a bit small and cramped. reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.My family and I also had a great night just talking since the view was nice and the atmosphere was pleasant. 2.The restaurant does have a great view, so that helped provide some romantic ambiance, and the outdoor dining option was great because it gave us some privacy away from the crowd. [SEP] U: Hi I am looking for a college to go to in town. S: There are 18 different colleges, did you have an area in mind? U: Yes, the centre area. S: Christ's college is in town centre located at saint andrew's street and has free entrance. Would you like their phone number as well? U: Yes, and can you find me an Italian restaurant in the same area? S: The address for Christ's College is Saint Andrew's Street and the phone number is 01223334900. There are 9 Italian restaurants in the center.  Is there are price range you need? U: Yes, I'm looking for something expensive. S: There are four in the area. src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. src_text: reviews of PEKING RESTAURANT: 1.I would definitely recommend this place to satisfy your Chinese craving and high quality foods to boot. 2.I was only vaguely familiar with the dish hot pot but Peking Restaurant delivered a truly amazing first time experience with this dish. 3.Scrumptious and cooked to perfect, it is a must to try when coming here. 4.All the food tasted great. 5.The other dish I tried was dumplings which paired great with my main dish, the hot pot. 6.The food was great and tasted fresh. 7.They threw in a bunch of meats, veggies in a hot broth and I just loved that they made the soup fright in front of me! 8.Fresh and flavorful. reviews of THE GOOD LUCK CHINESE FOOD TAKEAWAY: 1.We enjoyed everything we tried and we had spring rolls, hot pot with dumplings, and the sweet and sour pork. 2.So, I'd go again to get food but not drinks. 3.I ordered the Hot Pot, which I found to be mediocre. 4.The drinks were well made and so was the food. 5.I thought they were super tasty. 6.The foods were all delicious. S: there is none that serves Turkish food, can we look elsewhere? U: How about Chinese food? Are there any available for that? S: Yes, there are two restaurants available. The Good Luck Chinese food takeaway and the Peking Restaurant. Are these suitable? U: Which one is known for their hot pot? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They are both know for their Hot Pot which is highly rated at both places. Which one would you like to know more about?

src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.The decor in there is really lovely. 2.It was a really nice place to dine because the decor was so nice. [SEP] U: I need some information. on a train to london liverpool street arriving by 13:00. S: Yes I have 28 entries  with that destination arriving at various times Monday thru Sunday U: I'm leaving on Sunday from Cambridge, is there anything available? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviewers say that the decor inside is excellent. The decor is a huge part of why they went to the restaurant.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.However, hotel was very noisy, which was a huge distraction to an otherwise good room. 2.Sometimes my kids make noise but we could hear noise from other room and TVs so I did not really worry about it. 3.If you want a quiet hotel, this one would be a pass because the outside was pretty noisy. src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.To top it off, they weren't even that good! 2.I disliked the Mediocre view and the food variety was a huge letdown. 3.But the food was rather average. reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.The food could have been better spiced and our drinks could have been stronger. 2.The food itself was very high quality and very tasty, but the portions were small, which was kind of disappointing. 3.On top of that, the service was average and the food was rather basic. 4.Overall, we rather liked the various drink and gluten-free options, but the food left a lot to be desired. reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.The food was great. 2.I was surprised at how high quality the food was for such a good price. 3.All of them were quite excellent. 4.The view of the skyline was spectacular, as were the high quality food options. reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.I recommend the chow mein or Yangzhou fried rice. 2.Their fried rice was good, and service was also surprisingly good. 3.The food and drink are top notch but the portions are underwhelming. src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.The bed was comfy so I slept well. 3.The only issue that I had is that the bed was not as soft as would have liked. src_text: reviews of ROYAL SPICE: 1.The food is always locally sourced and there's plenty of drink choices available. 2.I ordered a specialty Indian cocktail, which surprisingly only cost $6 and was delicious. 3.My only complaints are that the service could have been a little better and all the drinks were expensive. 4.I was impressed with the menu, especially the extensive drink menu. 5.On the menu I thought all of the non-alcoholic drink options were great, but I did not like how the drinks were average in terms of taste. 6.Only minor complaint is the high priced beverages. FAQs of ROYAL SPICE: 1.Yes, Royal Spice does serve alcohol. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm trying to find a train leaving on Friday after 09:30. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Royal Spice restaurant does serve alcohol and has quite an extensive drinks menu available for customers.

src_text:
reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.The one downside is that I tried to order Dr Pepper and they didn't have it, nor did they have Diet Coke. 2.The drinks were meh though and there were no options that didn't contain alochol. 3.They only carried Pepsi products which is a bit of a bummer. [SEP] U: I'm coming to town from Ely and want to book a train. S: There are plenty of options, what date and time will you need this service? U: I need arrive at cambridge by 10:45. S: There are 21 possible trains with the  TR2704 arriving closest to your desired time at 09:52.  Would you like to book a seat? U: Yes, please book a seat. S: Ok, it'll be 4.40 pounds per ticket. How many tickets do you want? U: I need to make a booking for 8 people. S: Here is the information-Booking was successful, the total fee is 35.2 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : LWIXNE3T. U: I also need a restaurant. S: Well do you have a preference for food type, price range or location? U: A cheap one in the south part of town. S: There is a chinese place and a portuguese place.  Do you have a preference between the two? U: The Chinese restaurant will be find. I'd like to book a table for 8 people at 16:30 on Friday. S: Booking at The Lucky Star Chinese Restaurant has been confirmed your table will be reserved for 15 minutes, Reference number 3NXT0DHF. May I assist you with anything else? U: Can you tell me what kinds of soft drinks or mocktails they have? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There have been some complaints that there were not enough options for non-alcoholic drinks. They carry only Pepsi products so Dr. Pepper is not available. Would you like me to find a place with more options?

src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.We wished the portions were bigger. 2.The portions could be bigger for the price. 3.The only dislikes I would have is that the portion sizes of the foods were quite small, and there were no vegetarian options, sadly. 4.While the portion sizes for food are generous the food is nothing special and the service not very enthusiastic. 5.You gotta try the Butter Chicken, it was good, lots of it on the place and affordable. reviews of PIZZA HUT FEN DITTON: 1.It was a blast, all of the dishes were very authentic and had very, very, healthy servings. 2.I think the food is priced well and you get good portions. 3.The portions were big that I was able to eat the leftover for dinner. 4.We thought that the portion sizes of the food were generous, and the quality was quite high and tasty, but every dish was overpriced, which made the meal too expensive in the end. 5.My Calzone was the size of my head and my coworker's Bolognese could feed two people. 6.I got an excellent portion on my plate. reviews of RAJMAHAL: 1.Also the portion sizes are a bit small so order more. 2.The portions were generous and the foods were high quality to boot. [SEP] U: Please be a darling and find me a moderately priced place to dine in the East S: sure, i have 3 options for you U: Could you give me all three options please? S: curry prince, indian, rajmahal indian or pizza hut in the east U: Which of these is known for large portion sizes? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of RIVERSIDE BRASSERIE: 1.The drinks we weren't crazy about. 2.Last night I went to the Riverside Brasserie with some colleagues of mine and I tried the souvlaki and what I thought would be a good mixed drink except it wasn't. 3.Now, the food itself was delicious, as were the drinks (happy hour prices all night long, too!). 4.My margarita just tasted like sour mix and my wife couldn't finish her drink because they made it too strong. 5.My colleagues didn't like theirs either and they had different type drinks. 6.I like their drink menu but my drink was just alight, I tried the tapas and the portions were large. 7.The drinks themselves were not the best tasting even though they offered many options. src_text: reviews of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.The location was perfect! 2.It is central to everything and very convenient. 3.Overall, it was a pretty average experience, but the kitchen sort of made up for the mediocre location. 4.The location is ideal. 5.It could have been better, but it also could have been worse. 6.The location was just okay though. 7.We were able to walk to pretty much anything we wanted to do, and when we had to take an uber it was a cheap ride. 8.I liked the central view of the city and its geographical location but I did not like the meals served especially breakfast reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.I would expect to pay a lot more considering where the hotel is located. 2.The hotel was within walking distance to many spots so it was a very good location. 3.This location offered the best possible location on my budget. 4.With a strategic location, we were able to walk to many places. 5.Given the location of the hotel, the value of money was good, too. 6.I liked where they're situated, in a cozy suburb at the east end of town. src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 2.The location ended up being not good though, because it was far from the bar I was going to. 3.My only dislikes were the poor location within the city, as well as the poor and outdated deocr on the inside of the restaurant. 4.If you're in the mood for Italian food, I would pass on Prezzo, which although in a great section of town with breathtaking views, is quite pricey and has very average foods. src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.But the value for the money just wasn't there. 2.I do have to say though, I thought that the room was overpriced for what it was, and I was disappointed that there was no elevator service. 3.I was happy with the clean bathroom, and overall I think I got a good value for my money. 4.I kept telling my family that I felt like we didn't pay enough for the services we were getting. 5.However, I found that the price per night for this room was too much and I wouldn't stay here of my own volition if I had to pay for it. 6.Honestly, Avalon is pretty overpriced for what you get. src_text: FAQs of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.The YIPPE NOODLE BAR serves all forms of alcohol. reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.We enjoyed that the menu offered multiple different non-alcoholic drink options, but we did not like how the drinks were poor in taste. 2.The restaurant offered high-quality food and various drink options. 3.While the service was quite slow, the drinks and foods were very high quality, and the restaurant was in a wonderful location. 4.It was a bit loud and the drinks could be bigger. 5.Oh man, their drinks were affordable and their food was really good quality. 6.The location is good and the drinks are a good price. 7.Washed it all down with a nice cold beer. 8.The beer was decent. 9.After, I hung around for drinks and they have a lot to choose from. src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. src_text: reviews of NANDOS: 1.I got a very affordable beer which was of high quality. 2.First of all, the food and drinks weren't that good at all, and the drinks were expensive. 3.If I had to list any cons, it would be that the drinks aren't great and the decor inside is dated. 4.It was yummy and overall the food and drinks were good. 5.Nandos was an authentic Portuguese dining experience with delicious high quality food and drinks. 6.Each of us also ordered a drink, because their non-alcoholic drink options are very limited, and while they were well-prepared and tasty, we thought that they were overpriced and we wouldn't bother getting drinks there again. FAQs of NANDOS: 1.Nando's has alcohol drinks. [SEP] U: I am traveling to Cambridge and looking forward to try local restaurants. S: I would be happy to help. src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.The location itself was in the heart of the town so I was able to go walk around after eating here. 2.Parking was a nightmare, I did not like coming in. 3.The location is good - it's out near a mall with a lot of parking spaces, so parking was a breeze, and it's conveniently right off the highway. 4.However, the location isn't great (not a lot of parking) and the food left a little something to be desired. 5.The location is really great. 6.With a location by the riverside, you can almost close your eyes and imagine you're taking afternoon tea in the idyllic English countryside when you're at Cotto's! src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.It was within our price range and a good value for our money. 2.For the price though it was totally worth it and I we plan on coming back soon. 3.It was good value for money, overall. reviews of LIMEHOUSE: 1.Limehouse is a VERY overpriced hotel, I'm sad to say. 2.Free parking was an amazing perk, and I think overall I got a great value for the money. 3.That said, I have to give it points for being a quiet hotel with comfy beds, but if you favor saving money, I would look elsewhere! 4.For one solo person, the price was simply too high. U: Which is value more for money between acorn and limehouse? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If the Acorn House is within your price range, it provides good value for money, whereas the Limehouse is considered to be overpriced by the majority of its guests.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.I think we'll be trying British food more often and we will be returning here again despite it being expensive. 2.Everything on the menu appeared to be overpriced. 3.The pricing was very affordable and the food was top notch. reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.I don't understand how 8 dollars for a side of potatoes can be a thing. 2.One of the reasons I chose the place, in addition to the British cuisine, was that they offered a number of gluten-free options on their menu, and the prices seemed really reasonable. 3.The menu had lots of options, even many vegetarian ones, but the prices seemed really high for what they were offering. 4.It was so expensive! 5.The food was tasty and even the view was amazing; I just felt it was a little overpriced. 6.What I didn't like was my bill. 7.Both the drinks and food were reasonably priced, and the kids loved their fish and chips. 8.However I disliked the limited drink choices on the menu and the overpriced foods, as out check was a bit appalling. reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The quality of the food was exceptionally high, and we were amazed at the affordable price and excellent value when we received our bill. 2.It was a really nice location, but it's a shame that the food was overpriced. U: I'd like it to be somewhere that's really cheap, and I'd really prefer a guesthouse if one is available. S: How about the Autumn House, it is a guesthouse that is cheap in the east? U: Does this place have a good view from the rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Autumn House has beautiful sunset views from some of their balconies. The view also overlooks an ocean.

src_text: reviews of BEDOUIN: 1.Lots of drinks to choose from as well. FAQs of BEDOUIN: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at Bedouin. [SEP] U: Hello. I would like to know if you serve African food. If you do, can I please get the address, phone number and postcode of the venue? S: Bedouin is located at 100 Mill Road City Centre. It's phone number is 01223367660 and it's postcode is C.B 1, 2 B.D U: Do you know if Bedouin has positive reviews for a variety of beer options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Though beer is not specifically mentioned, alcohol is served there and there are lots of drinks to choose from, based on the opinion of a couple of customers.

src_text: reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.I was glad that they have a pretty extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options, because I did try one cocktail and found it to be pretty mediocre. 2.Speaking of drinks, this isn't a place I would recommend if you have kids who want a lot of soda options, because their non-alcoholic menu is pretty limited. 3.Their non-alcoholic drink menu is actually pretty impressive, too, which is something that rarely stands out at restaurants. [SEP] U: Hi I am looking for a restaurant in the centre of town serving north indian food. S: We don't have any specific restaurants in that category. Let's try something else? U: That's too bad.  How about Chinese? S: Okay sure what do you have? U: Okay when you find something I would like to make a reservation for 2 people on a Sunday at 13:30. S: Do you have a price range in mind? U: I don't mind about the price range. S: Okay, how about lan hong house? It is a chinese restsurant in the centre area and is in the moderate price range. Will that work for you? U: Do they have various non-alcoholic drink options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some reviewers said that the alcoholic drink options were extensive. Others say that the list of drinks was limited.

src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.He had the Aryan which he said was top shelf quality and I found plenty of vegetarian options to suit my tastes as well. 2.We ordered the Baklava and Gozleme which were very well prepared and the service was out standing. 3.My coworkers and I went to Anatolia and I enjoyed trying the Turkish cuisine. 4.The food quality was terrific, and we sent our compliments to the chef. 5.I got sutlac and doner keban and really liked it. 6.I was overall very impressed with both the quality and the portions, as I had enough for a full meal and was still able to take enough home for leftovers the next day. 7.The Anatolia tasted really good, and the drinks were surprisingly affordable. 8.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 9.Nothing tasted fresh or authentic from our perspective. 10.Between us we ordered Gozleme, Baklava, Borek, and Ayran, all of which were of great quality and were in large portions. 11.They have good food and drinks here but the drink menu is small. 12.But the portions were so stupidly small, and the quality was seriously mediocre. reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.However, I can't say the same about the food. 2.Prices were reasonable, and the food was so delicious and fresh. 3.This place, Efes Restaurant, had really good food and the Kebab was so yummy. 4.The spinach was fresh and the lamb was delightful, it was honestly some of the best Gozleme I have ever had. 5.The decor left a lot to be desired as the plants were made of plastic and the paintings were straight out of a beachside hotel lobby, but the food was great! 6.The food was great and the drink options go on for days. 7.We thought the breakfast buffet (Kahvalti) was spectacular: fresh hot bread, hearty cheese, eggs several ways, briny black and green olives, and dark honey for the bread. 8.All-in-all, a great dining experience: the portion sizes were very good, and the prices were reasonable (under $20 for each of us) for top-notch quality foods and drinks. 9.It's a shame the food is so terrible! 10.Even though the decor is a bit lacking do not let that stop you from enjoying this great spot for some Turkish delights! 11.If you are looking for a Turkish restaurant offering high-quality food and drinks, then look no further than Efes Restaurant. 12.The food was fresh and tasty.. 13.The foods were all really good and I enjoyed them immensely. 14.I shouldn't have ordered so much because the food was really bad. 15.I don't really know what the Kahvalti and Meze had, but for sure they were the best things I have ever eating in a long while. 16.The food wasn't good. 17.Almost as good as my grandmother's (Don't tell her I said that!!!) 18.The drink were amazing, and so was the food. [SEP] U: I am looking for a caribbean restaurant in the centre of the city. S: Regretfully, there are no caribbean restaurants in the centre. Would you like to try something else? U: Are there any caribbean restaurants in any other part of town? S: I am sorry there are none in any area of town,is there another type of food you would be interested in? U: Sure, a turkish restaurant in the moderate price range would be great. S: I have 2 turkish restaurants in the centre. The anatolia or efes restaurant are both moderate. Would you like me to book one for you? U: Is the restaurant with high quality food is apt for you? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Anatolia food quality is very good but smaller portion sizes. The ratings for Efes Restaurant is not very good but some reviewers enjoyed certain meals.

src_text: reviews of PIZZA HUT FEN DITTON: 1.While the outdoor dining was wonderful, the location of the restaurant itself is pretty mediocre and nothing to write home about. FAQs of PIZZA HUT FEN DITTON: 1.Outdoor seating is available at Pizza Hut Fen Ditton. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant. The restaurant should be in the moderate price range and should be in the east S: Try curry prince or pizza hut fen ditton U: The restaurant should serve italian food. S: Pizza hut fen ditton serves italian food in the east, would you like a reservation? U: What other restaurants in that area serve Italian food? S: Pizza hut fen ditton is the only Italian restaurant, in the east, in the moderate price range. Do you want me to try other areas? U: No, that will do.  Can I book a table for monday? S: Absolutely, how many people will you have and what time are you wanting the reservation? U: I will have 5 people and we would like 12:15 if possible. Thanks. S: You are booked, the reference number is AF2GJ7G6, may I assist with anything else? U: i need a nice area while eating outside. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There is wonderful outdoor dining at the Pizza Hut Fen Ditton.  Is there anything else I can help you with today?

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: i want to go to a museum in the west area of the town. S: I have found 7 museums in the West area of town. What type of museum would you like to visit? U: Can you list 2 of them for me to choose from? Thanks S: Cafe jello gallery and people's portraits exhibition at girton college are the two places I would recommend. Do you need anything else? U: May I get the phone number and Postcode for the Cafe Jello Gallery? S: Of course. The phone number for Cafe Jello Gallery is 01223312112.  The post code is cb30af. May I be of further assistance? U: I am also looking for the Warkworth House. What area is that in? S: It is in east.  Need a reservation? U: is it quiet there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Warkworth House has some mixed reviews about the noise. Some say they could hear traffic and neighbors while others say their rooms were extremely quiet. Would you like me to find a place with better reviews?

src_text: reviews of ALPHA-MILTON GUEST HOUSE: 1.The views were amazing. 2.While I was there I really admired the view. 3.Just a bit disappointed at the rooms not being clean when we arrived, but the views are worth it. 4.The view is also very nice. 5.We were not disappointed. 6.My partner and I did like the size of the room and we enjoyed the view. 7.What stood out to me the most is just how quiet it was, but on top of that, the views were great. [SEP] U: Please tell me about a place I heard about called clare hall. S: Clare hall is a college in the west part of town. U: What is the entrance fee and the postcode? S: cb39al is the postal code and there isn't an entrance fee.  Can I help you with something else? U: i Am also looking for a particular hotel. Its name is called alpha-milton guest house S: The Alpha-Milton Guest House is in the North.  It is a 3 star hotel and is moderately priced?  Would you like me to book for you? U: Do they have nice rooms with good views available? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alpha-Milton Guest House has good views. Even guests who didn't enjoy their stay otherwise have commented that the views are "worth it".

src_text: reviews of HOME FROM HOME: 1.I stayed here on my business trip, and after a hard day of business meetings, it was nice to retire to a large comfortable room. 2.I wished it was a bit bigger. 3.The only negative was the size of the room. [SEP] U: Yes, hopefully you can help with some information on a particular hotel? S: What hotel are you interested in? U: It is called home from home. I was wondering what type of hotel it is and the star of the hotel. S: Home from Home is a 4 star, guesthouse type hotel. U: Does the guesthouse have a room with a lot of space? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One aspect that's lacking at the Home From Home is the space provided within their rooms, as guests tend to regard theirs as on the smaller size.

src_text: reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.I think they are charging a bit too much, but I will say they did have many drink options to choose from as well as a decent sized menu. reviews of SALA THONG: 1.The dish did not disappoint, although I found the beer to be overpriced although it was likely imported. [SEP] U: I am looking for an expensive restaurant that serves Thai food. S: I have to options for Thai food in the expensive price range, Bangkok City and Sala Thong. U: Which of these have extensive beer menus? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both places provide good drink options. Bangkok City has many drink options and Sala Thong has beer that is imported but pricey.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The bed really needed a new mattress, too. 2.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. 3.We both slept extremely well every night we were there. [SEP] U: I am looking for a guesthouse to stay at that has free wifi. S: Ok.  Were you hoping for a particular price range or part of town? U: I don't care about the part of town or the price range, but it needs to be a three star hotel. S: The Hamilton Lodge would be perfect! It is a moderately priced 3 star guesthouse on the north side of town. Does that sound okay to you? U: Does it have comfortable beds? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most customers said that the beds they were really comfortable, but one did find them to be uncomfortable and in need of replacement.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. src_text: reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.I was glad that they have a pretty extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options, because I did try one cocktail and found it to be pretty mediocre. 2.Speaking of drinks, this isn't a place I would recommend if you have kids who want a lot of soda options, because their non-alcoholic menu is pretty limited. 3.Their non-alcoholic drink menu is actually pretty impressive, too, which is something that rarely stands out at restaurants. src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. [SEP] U: Looking for a place to eat in the city center. S: There are many options to choose from. Do you have a type of food in mind? U: I'd like to have some Chinese food. S: That narrows down the restaurant choices to 10. Is there a price range you would like to stay in? U: I am looking for a moderately priced place to eat, I am also looking to book a room in the bridge guest house hotel. S: Which dates will you be staying at the Bridge Guest Room house? U: Do they have really large rooms there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Bridge Guest Room House has small rooms according to one guest, and large rooms according to another, so I can't be sure exactly how big the rooms are.

src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.The restaurant had a beautiful view from the window of a nice part of town. 2.The view from our table was pretty disappointing, we couldn't see anything except all the other diners. 3.The food was of good quality , you had a nice view but i didn't like the food portion 4.We got seated extremely quickly and were given an amazing view of the cities skyline while we ordered and ate. [SEP] U: I would like a restaurant in the north part of town that serves canapes food. S: There are no records matching your criteria. Would you like a different type of food or area? U: Is there an interesting window view here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The hotel has a lovely view though not all share the same view, they also offered good food and the beautiful view.

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.The bed was comfy so I slept well. 3.The only issue that I had is that the bed was not as soft as would have liked. [SEP] U: I need some information on a train going to cambridge. S: I'd love to help you with that! What day are you headed out? U: Sunday. Sometime after 21:00, if possible. S: There are multiple trains headed to cambridge sunday after 21:00. Where are you leaving from? U: I am leaving from ely. S: I have train TR4205 that leaves at 21:35 and will arrive in Cambridge at 21:52. The price per ticket is 3.52 pounds. Would you like a ticket for this train? U: yeah, i need eight tickets. S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 28.16 GBP payable at the station, your reference number is  0V72HM78. Will that be all? U: I also need a guesthouse located in the north. S: I have 7 entries that fit your criteria. 6 are moderately priced, and one is cheap. Would you like information about any of these? U: Yes info on the cheap price range S: Worth house is in the cheap price range and located at 152 chesterton road U: Is the bed comfortable? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: At the Worth house 2 of 3 people thought bed was comfortable. One wished that the bed was a bit softer for their liking.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. src_text: reviews of KYMMOY: 1.They offered many drink options on the menu, and I ordered a fresh beer which was superb. 2.Drinks were several rounds of regional beer. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure about Saigon City but kymmoy does have a lot of beer choices according to their reviews.

src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: I want to know about 4 star hotels that include free parking for guests. S: What area of town would you like to stay in? U: It doesn't matter but it should be a guesthouse. S: There are about 16 choices. Maybe we can narrow it down if you tell me what price range you were looking at? U: guesthouses not hotel, sorry can you suggest one and give me their phone number please S: I have 33 guesthouses all over town ranging from cheap to moderate. What area do you prefer and which price range will work for you. U: As long as it's a guesthouse with 4 stars and free parking I will be happy. Which one do you recommend? S: There are 16 all over town, that meet your criteria. If you could tell me which part of town you would prefer, that would help narrow the choices down. U: Please give me the phone number of a guesthouse, it doesn't matter where it is, as long as it has parking and 4 stars. S: The acorn guest house has parking and 4 stars. Their telephone number is 01223353888. May I help you with something else? U: Can you recommend a chinese restaurant in the centre area? S: There are 10 Chinese restaurants in the centre in various price ranges. Which price do you prefer? U: I don't care about the price. Can you recommend anything? S: How about Charlie Chan? I go there alot, they are cheap and in the city centre. U: Is the service here considered above average? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the service at Charlie Chan does seem to be above average. Past guests have talked about the service being accommodating and friendly.

src_text: reviews of ARBURY LODGE GUESTHOUSE: 1.I was thoroughly surprised because this guest house is in a very seedy part of town and I was a little nervous navigating over here. 2.The room had a great view and was in a good location. 3.While the location is a little far away from the city/attractions, the rooms are great for the price. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a moderately priced hotel in the north. S: Yes, there are 33 hotels that meet your requests. Some of them offer parking or free internet as well. U: Any listings for a guesthouse? S: I have 5, all located in the north and all are gueshouses. How many will I booking for and when? U: I would like it for 5 people and 2 nights starting from Friday. S: I was able to get a guesthouse for you at arbury lodge for friday. Your reference number is HV8FJQJU. U: I hope the place is convenient to many things? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Previous customers have felt the guest house is far away from the city and is in a less than ideal part of town.

src_text: FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wifi is free at Acorn Guest House. reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.They did offer free wi-fi which worked as I needed it to. 2.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 3.The free wi-fi sure was nice, too, since the kids like to play games on their phones. 4.Acorn Guest House offers free wi-fi, which was a huge selling point for it. [SEP] U: Can you find me a guesthouse with free parking? S: I certainly can look for that for you. It looks like I have several. Do you prefer a certain price range? U: No, but I'm looking for something with at least two stars. S: Sorry, we don't have anything that matches the options that you've selected. Would you like to search for a different option? src_text: reviews of ALI BABA: 1.It was unfortunate that the service was mediocre. 2.My waiter was nice and I enjoyed dining alone as it was very relaxing. 3.We enjoyed high quality food and great service. 4.However, the service was very mediocre and it took us forever to get our food. 5.The service was great and they made me comfortable while I was eating alone. src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The free Internet provided at this location was extremely fast and the connection quality was superb. 2.I also really appreciated the free parking and fast, reliable, free Wi-Fi. reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.Their Wi-Fi was super speedy, even faster than the one I have at home! 2.The Wi-fi is slow but I made do. FAQs of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.Autumn house has free WiFi. 2.There is free wifi available. reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.The provided Internet was extremely fast and more than enough for our needs. 2.The wifi was any slower though, it won't work at all. FAQs of ALLENBELL: 1.Free WiFi is available at Allenbell. 2.There is free Wifi at Allenbell. FAQs of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.WiFi is free at the Leverton House. 2.There is free wifi at Leverton House. [SEP] U: i am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should be in the type of guesthouse and should be in the east. S: There are several to choose from.  Is there a price range you are looking for? U: Yes, I'm on food stamps and I can only afford the cheapest place. S: There are 3 guesthouses available. All are 4 star rated and offer free parking and wifi. They are the Allenbell, the Autumn House, and the Leverton House. U: Do they have free wifi, and parking?   Free is my ideal price. S: Yes, the guesthouses all provide free wifi and free parking. Would you like to a book a room at one? U: No, but could you give me the postcode? S: There are three guesthouses that meet that criteria, Allenbell, Autumn House, and Leverton House. For which would you like the postcode? U: I have to work during my stay, so do you know which one has the best internet connection? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Allenbell features internet that's unanimously thought of extremely fast, while that at the Autumn House and Leverton House can be slow and frustrating at times.

src_text: reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.My family and I also had a great night just talking since the view was nice and the atmosphere was pleasant. 2.The restaurant does have a great view, so that helped provide some romantic ambiance, and the outdoor dining option was great because it gave us some privacy away from the crowd. [SEP] U: We are in cambridge for a visit and looking for an expensive place to dine in the centre. Are there any expensive Italian restaurants in the centre? S: Definitely! I recommend Caffe Uno, at 32 Bridge Street City Centre. U: How's the atmosphere here, that really matters to me when choosing? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that choose to dine at the Caffe Uno appreciated the pleasant atmosphere which had a bit of a romantic ambiance.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.I was deeply impressed by the sea view in front of the hotel, which was great and magnificent. 2.But the best was the great view. 3.The view was stunning and so much better than I even expected. 4.It was just incredible! [SEP] U: i want info on kirkwood house S: I can help you with that. What info did you need per say? U: Thanks, do you know if Kirkwood House has nice rooms with great views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes they do according to reviews left by previous guests the views are amazing, great, and stunning.

src_text: FAQs of LA MARGHERITA: 1.La Margherita offers alcohol. reviews of LA MARGHERITA: 1.The drinks are solid, and reasonably priced. 2.I like the arancini and the pinot noir my server recommended was great. 3.The adults also enjoyed an excellent bottle of pinot noir, which was really affordable given the good quality of the wine. 4.Unfortunately the wine left me disappointed, it just didn't taste right. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for a cheap Italian restaurant please. S: I have some in the north, center and west side. Do you have a preference in area? U: No, no preference. Please just find me one that has a table available for 4 people at 17:45 on Monday. S: I'm sorry but none of the Italian restaurants have reservations available at that time.  Do you want me to check for a different time? U: Yes, I'll try for a little earlier, how about 16:45? S: Booked at la margherita! Your reference number is NG7AU0Y2. Your table will be held for 15 minutes. U: I'm looking for a place that wall-known for its drink quality How does La Margherita rate. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most people said that the wine was the best alcoholic drink to get. Pinot noir was great quality wine, reasonably priced. But another customer said that wine wasn't great.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train that goes to cambridge, leaving after 12:30 on monday S: From where will you be departing? U: I am leaving from Ely. S: I have the TR4849 train leaving Ely at 13:35 on Monday. U: What will be my arrival time in Cambridge and what is the ticket price, please? S: The price is 4.40 pounds. You will arrive at 13:52. U: Perfect, could you also assist me in finding a place to stay? S: I sure can. What area would you like to stay? U: Oh I'm not picky on the area. I definitely need free wifi, moderate price, and 0 stars though. S: How about cityroomz? It is located in the centre of the city, is moderately priced, has 0 stars, and has free wifi. I think it would be perfect ofor you! U: Can you tell me if the showers have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, previous patrons staying at the Cityroomz have commented that the water pressure was disappointing and lackluster.

src_text: FAQs of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Yes, the restaurant does serve alcohol. reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Lots of foods and drinks to choose from here. 2.I had the cabernet sauvignon but it tasted a little flat and I would rate it average at best. 3.They have lots of drinks to choose from so it was easy for my daughter to decide what she wanted to drink. 4.I do have to praise their high quality drinks and food, because everything tastes amazing and is expertly-prepared. [SEP] U: I would like a cheap restaurant which serves italian food S: Da vinci pizzeria serves cheap italian food. Would you like their address or phone number? U: What is their address and what part of town are they in? S: Da Vinci Pizzeria is in the north part of town. The address is 20 Milton Road Chesterton. U: Sorry what type of food do they serve? S: They serve italian food. U: Do they have onsite parking for customers? S: Only street parking is available at this time. Do you have any other specific service needs? U: Does this restaurant serve alcohol to customer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Da Vinci Pizzeria serves alcoholic drinks, including cabernet sauvignon. Do you want to make a reservation?

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The staff was nice and helpful. 2.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 3.While at this location, I noticed that the staff was extremely kind and respectful to both of us. 4.The staff was friendly which made me feel comfortable and welcomed. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The staff was friendly with my requests. 2.It was actually my first time traveling alone, so I was super nervous, but the staff was so welcoming that I instantly felt at ease upon arrival. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train for Wednesday, heading into Cambridge? S: I have five trains that meet your criteria. U: I'm departing from london liverpool street and would like to leave after 16:15. Does this help? S: The TR2232 train is available. It departs wednesday at 17:39 from london liverpool to Cambridge. Would you like me to book you a ticket? U: Yes please book me a ticket. S: Just to clarify, would that be just one ticket or multiple tickets? U: Oh wait, before booking I would like to know what the arrival time and travel time is on that train. S: It will arrive by 19:07.  Do you need tickets? U: I need to know the travel time before booking. S: the travel time is 88 minutes. U: Thanks, I actually don't want to book just yet. I do need a place to stay though. Could you please suggest a hotel in a moderate price range? S: I found few hotel for you but before I make a reservation, do prefer it have Internet or parking option ? U: Yes, it will need to have free parking and free internet please S: Do you have a specific area you want to stay in? U: Yes, I am looking for something in the North. S: I see 9 options here. Do you prefer a guesthouse or a hotel? U: I think I'd like a moderately priced hotel, please. S: I have 2 in that area. They are Ashley hotel and Lovell Lodge. Would you like me to make reservations for one of these? U: Does the staff there have a reputation for being friendly? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The staff at the Ashley Hotel is seen as being friendly and welcoming to guests while the Lovell Lodge view their service as extremely kind and respectful.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a guesthouse in the north? S: We have 11 guesthouses available in the area, what is your price range and what amenities would you like in the guesthouse? U: It should include free parking. S: how about acorn house? U: Is the shower pressure strong at Acorn House? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to two past guests of Acorn Guest House, the shower pressure was too low and hard to get used to.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train going to london kings cross leaving on thursday? S: Did you have a certain time you needed to leave or arrive by? U: I would like to leave cambridge and arrive by 20:15. S: I could suggest train TR8636, which arrives by 07: 51, should I book? U: I don't need the booking yet. You've already give me the train ID. I just need the departure time and the travel time. Thanks. S: you leave at 7 and arrive by 7 51. U: What is the travel time? I'm also looking for information on a hotel, carolina bed and breakfast. S: The travel time is 51 minutes. As far as that hotel goes, it's a moderately-priced 4-star guesthouse on the east side. U: Is their breakfast good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Carolina bed and breakfast has a full English and Irish Breakfast that some guests said they enjoyed, but many also said they did not enjoy.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap hotel that includes free wifi. S: That gives us about 10 options. To narrow it down some, do you have a certain area of town you prefer? U: I don't care about the area it is in, but I will need free parking. S: Okay I could recommend the Allenbell which is a 4 star guesthouse with free parking in the cheap price range located on the east side. U: Does it have a good view of the surrounding area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Allenbell gets high ratings for its views with guests saying the amazing view was the first thing they noticed and it was even better than the pictures. Would you like to know more about them?

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.I appreciated the free Wi-Fi, but it didn't really make up for a pretty mediocre location. 2.The location made it easy to visit the sites, and that was great. 3.Allenbell is located close to the city center and public transportation. [SEP] U: Can you help me find information on a hotel called allenbell? S: The Allenbell Hotel is a 4 star guesthouse hotel, the price range is cheap. Internet and parking are available. Would you like to book a room? U: Is that in the right location though? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It's located close to the city center and public transportation, although not scenic in view. Is that what you need?

src_text: reviews of BLOOMSBURY RESTAURANT: 1.We liked that the food portions were big and drink prices were affordable. 2.The quality and the portions of food were good. 3.The portion size of the food options was really generous, and the quality seemed high - everyone was happy with what they ordered. reviews of THE VARSITY RESTAURANT: 1.But because the prices were cheap overall, we only got small amounts of them which was disappointing. 2.The drinks were kind of on the expensive size and the portions could have been a bit larger. 3.My only complaint is that the portion sizes of the foods were a bit excessively small. 4.They have large portions and a good variety of foods and drinks. 5.The portions were generous, but they weren't too expensive. src_text: reviews of PIZZA EXPRESS: 1.However, the location the restaurant was in was quite mediocre. 2.I really enjoyed the view and location, as it is in a great part of town. 3.Pizza Express is also a little far but their food is always good. reviews of PIZZA EXPRESS FEN DITTON: 1.We regretted the choice though at first since the location wasn't near where we were going next, but we decided to try it out anyways. 2.My one dislike of this restaurant is the location, since it isn't nearby to anything else I enjoy. 3.We especially loved the view and location. 4.The location is great, with high quality food and even vegetarian options. src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Loved the scenery outside and the room was well decorated and home-y. 2.I adored the view that this place offers, we found ourselves staring our rooms windows a lot during our stay. 3.Our room was clean and there is a nice view of the mountains. [SEP] U: I am looking for a train arriving by 21:45 and departing from cambridge. S: Alright. What day are you making this trip, and where would you like to travel to? src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.My friends and I enjoyed the cabernet sauvignon. 2.The food and drinks weren't that great though overall. 3.My Riesling was a good price and was delicious so it was not all bad. 4.If I were looking for a nice Italian place to go for a glass of wine, I might visit Prezzo again. 5.We also ordered beer, which was excellent as well. FAQs of PREZZO: 1.Prezzo serves alcohol. [SEP] U: Can you find me a good moderately priced hotel in cambridge?  No guesthouses please. S: the cityroomz is located downtown. would you like more info? U: Thank you! I am looking for a place in the West part of town, though. Are there any available? S: No, I'm sorry. Not in the moderate price range. I do have a cheap 4 star though. Would you like to check it out? U: How about any guesthouses that are moderately priced in the west with free parking? S: What about the hobsons house with internet and parking? U: that sounds good. there will be 7 persons for 3 nights starting on sunday S: I was able to book that for you successfully. our reference number is CW5RJ5HB. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Yes please, I need to find a restaurant in the same area as my hotel. I don't care about the type of food. S: There are 14 options to choose from, is there a particular cuisine you are wanting to try? U: I don't care what cuisine, but i'd like one in the moderate price range. S: Okay, I see three options here, which are british, indian, or italian food types. I recommend prezzo. Would you like a reservation? U: I would like a place that has highly-rated reviews for the quality of its beer. How does Prezzo rate? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: While the food at the Prezzo restaurant isn't considered great, customers do seem to agree that the drinks are excellent.

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.The bed was comfy so I slept well. 3.The only issue that I had is that the bed was not as soft as would have liked. src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 2.I had a great view of the mountains. 3.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.The sunset was really beautiful out on the balcony! 2.I was alone so I did not need much but it was very clean and had a nice view I enjoyed. 3.The room is big and I had a great view of the sunset. 4.The view was great - overlooked the ocean and was right by the beach. src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. [SEP] U: I need a five starts hotel close to a mall and main restaurants. The hotel should include free wifi in the room. S: I'm sorry, but there are no 5-star hotels anywhere in Cambridge. Would you like to broaden your criteria? U: How about something with 4 stars and something expensive. S: I have 2 options for you - The Huntingdon Marriott on the west side, and the University Arms in the center. Are you interested in one of these? U: Maybe.  Is either one a 4 star hotel?  If so, I'd like to book a room for 4 nights. S: Both are 4 stars. How many days would you be staying, and how many people are in your party? I can see if something is available. U: I need a reservation for 4 nights starting Saturday. S: How many are in your party? U: 3 people. Can I get the reference number please? S: I'm sorry, but there is nothing available at that time at either hotel. Would you like to try fewer nights or perhaps a different arrival day? U: Will you try Sunday arrival? S: Yes, I tried Sunday but it isn't available.  Can you shorten your stay at all? U: Yes, can you try it for 3 nights, please. S: Neither hotel appears to have three days available starting on Sunday for three people, can I look something else up for you? U: I may have been confusing you.  Could you try and book a 4 star, expensive hotel for 3 nights, starting on Saturday? 3 people.  Wifi please. S: Sure. I was able to book you for the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel. Reference #IHGCTXH9. Anything else I can help with? U: What are the views like from the hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Recent reviews of the views at the Huntingdon have been very positive. Do you have any other questions?
