src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.We could not enjoy the shower as the pressure was low. 2.The room was a bit small, so I felt a tiny cramped in there, and the water pressure could have been a lot better. [SEP] U: I would like to take a train to leave cambridge. S: I have 1,414 trains that are departing Cambridge this week. What day will you be traveling on? U: I'm going to peterborough on wednesday S: The TR3347 meets your current criteria, but you have a lot of options. Would you like to narrow it down further by departure time or arrival time? U: I need to arrive by 20:30. S: TR0797 leaves cambridge at 19:34 and arrives in peterborough at 20:24. Would you like to book tickets for this train? U: Yes please. I need tickets for 5 people and a reference number. S: Your booking was successful. The total for 5 people is 82.5 GBP and your reference number is 4G3J82OG. Is there anything else I can help with? U: I need a guesthouse that has free wifi S: There are lots of options.  What area would you like to stay in? U: I'm not picky. Where would you recommend that is in the moderate price range? I'll need free parking, too. S: There are 12. Is there a star rating you would like? U: Honestly, I always stay at the same place when we travel there, so I could really use a recommendation. Any one will do just with wifi and moderate pricing. S: I would recommend the Kirkwood House. It is located in the north. It has 4 stars and free parking and wifi. They are located at 172 Chesterton Road. U: Do they have showers with strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately the reviews say that the water pressure is low at the guest house. Do you need any other information?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train leaving after 18:00 on wednesday? S: Can you please give me your departure and destination, please? U: I want to leave after 18:00 to Broxbourne from Cambridge. S: I have one departing at 19:01. Would you like me to book a ticket? U: How much is the price per ticket? S: 17.90 pounds. Would you like me to book it? U: I'm also looking for a place to stay in the moderate price range. S: Is there a specific area you would like to stay in? U: I would like a hotel in the north side with four stars, please. S: There are 7! Do you need internet and parking? U: No but it needs to be a guesthouse. S: I have five places. Shall I book you one? U: Please, for 7 people, 4 nights.  The same day as my train.  What was the travel time on that train again? S: I have booked you at Acorn Guest House. Your reference number is MMSZTKRS. Your train trip is 60 minutes long, but you've not booked. Would you like to do that now? U: Can you tell me if the guesthouse shower has good water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews regarding the water pressure at the Acorn are not very good with guest saying it was really low or mediocre. Would you like to know more about them or have me look for a place?

src_text: reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.The only dislikes we had were the slow service time and the average drinks. 2.I was pleased with the great service from the wait staff, and my Hot Pot was really high quality and very tasty. 3.The only downside of the experience was the mediocre location and service, as the food took forever to finish. reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.The service was very friendly and good, the prices good too. 2.The workers were very friendly. 3.On top of that, the service was average and the food was rather basic. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: Need a place to dine, chinese near centre. S: I have 10 places. Would you like a certain price range? U: I prefer something cheap. S: There are three options, charlie chan, rice house and golden house.  Can I book you for one of those? U: Which of those three has the best service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews of the service at Charlie Chan are exemplary. The Rice House provides less with mediocre to great staff, and the Golden House offers a very friendly experience.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, we found that the room had a beautiful view to the sunset horizon outside. 2.The Carolina has good views. 3.It was nice to wake up in the morning and see the sun rising. 4.Parking was free and the view from the room was nice. 5.The view was really beautiful, too. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm trying to find a train from Cambridge that arrives by 20:30. S: Okay, what is your destination? U: My destination is stansted airport. S: No problem , the TR6539 train should arrive by 20:08, would you like to make a booking. U: No, can you find a guesthouse for me with a 4 star rating? S: How about TR6539 on Monday? It arrives by 20:08. U: That would be great. What is the total travel time of the train ride? S: This trip is about 28 minutes. Now we can get to finding you a guesthouse. What area would you like me to look for? U: East please. Something moderately priced? S: There are three moderately priced guesthouses in the east. I would recommend either Carolina Bed and Breakfast or Warkworth House. Would you like me to book one of them? U: Yes, let's try the Carolina Bed and Breakfast for four nights starting Thursday. S: Im sorry that day is unavailable, would a shorter stay work or any other day or place? U: Do they have any rooms that offer a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviewers loved the views from the bed and breakfast. One person said they enjoyed waking up to the sunrise every morning. Is there anything else you need to know?

U: I absolutely must have clean restrooms; is that a given at this location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, for the most part, guests at the Lensfield Hotel have reviewed the cleanliness levels of the rooms very highly.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.While the hotel was super noisy, because of its proximity to the highway, I was very happy with the shared kitchen that was made available for my stay. 2.But the nearby environment was noisy which affected my sleeping quality. 3.The only negatives were that it tended to be a bit noisy and the elevator wasn't available during our stay there, but otherwise it went well. 4.I very much enjoyed the quiet atmosphere to relax and wind down. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel that includes free wifi and free parking. S: There are definitely lots of places that provide complimentary parking and wifi. Do you prefer any particular part of town, or are you looking for a certain price range? U: I would like a hotel in the centre and it should be in the cheap price range. S: I don't have any hotels that meet your criteria but I do have two guesthouses available? Would that be okay? U: Yes, that would be fine. What are the names of the two guesthouses? S: One id alexander bed and breakfast and the other is el shaddai. U: Which one's better if you need a calm, peaceful environment? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The El Shaddai has been found to be a bit noisy, while the Alexander Bed and Breakfast also has issues with traffic noise and thin walls.

src_text: FAQs of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.The Cambridge Chop House serves a full range of alcohol drinks. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.I like the drinks and the food is top notch quality. 2.I ordered some excellent British Cuisine, including stout and a full English breakfast. 3.I ordered the beef wellington which was delicious the beer on the other hand was just okay. 4.First we ordered some tea along with Cornish pasty and we very much enjoyed that. 5.Too bad the drinks sucked though. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a train to cambridge that arrives by 17:15. S: We'll find you something. Where are you departing from? U: I am departing from London Kings Cross on Monday. S: I have train TR9114 that leaves at 15:17 and will get you into Cambridge by 16:08. Would that work for you? U: that is fine. get me the travel time S: The travel time for the TR9114 is 51 minutes. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Yes, I'm also looking for an expensive restaurant in the center of town. S: i have 33 expensive restaurants in the centre of town. what type of food would you like? U: The type of food is not important, but I need one that can seat 8 people at 21:00. Can you make a suggestion? S: I would recommend the Cambridge chop house.  It serves British food.  Would you like me to try to make a reservation? U: Do they have high quality stout? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I read one review that said they loved the stout at The Cambridge Chop House. Most other guests were very complimentary of the drink offerings, but a few diners thought their drinks were not up to par.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap place to stay that has free parking. S: There are 10 cheap places to stay with free parking. Do you want particular area of town? U: The area does not matter, but it should have a 4 star rating. S: The alexander bed and breakfast fits your needs. Would you like me to book a room for how many days and guests/ U: Is the Alexander Bed and Breakfast in an area that other people prefer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People differ in their views about the location. Some say it's not very close to shopping, and that the area is mediocre. But others say its very accessible to many other things.

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.The food was really small. 2.The food was of good quality and there was good vegetarian option but i you had overpriced your food and it was of Small portion 3.The servings could be bigger for the price but we enjoyed our food well enough. 4.What did disappoint though, was the small portion sizes. 5.The food was fresh and tasteful, and served with generous portions. 6.If only it was bigger, it would be amazing. [SEP] U: I'm going to cambridge and would like to know about places to go in town. I'm looking or a swimming pool attraction in the north. S: Wonderful! There are two, one is between victoria road and the river and the other is jedburgh court and kigs hedges. Which would you like? U: Choose the one with the best reputation for me. I will need the address and entrance fee as well please. S: Kings Hedges Learner Pool is at Jedburgh Court, Kings Hedges and the postcode is cb42xh. U: Thanks.  Can you help me find a Mediterranean restaurant as well? S: There are 3 in the centre of town.  Do you prefer expensive or cheap? U: I need it to be in the expensive price range and I'm looking for a table for 4. S: There are 2 expensive mediterranean restaurants in the centre.  In order to determine which one can accommodate you, I'll need to know what day you'd like. U: Monday, for 4 people at 15:00. S: I was able to book you a table at the la mimosa for 4 people.Ref No is A6JHOS2N. It will be reserved for 15 minutes. Anything Else? U: Can you tell me if the portions are filling there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The portion sizes at the La Mimosa are small. Do you want to cancel your reservation or would you rather keep it?

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The bed I had on this business trip put me to sleep fast, after a hard day of meetings. 2.It was so comfortable. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 2.The negatives is that the bathroom wasn't that clean when we first arrived and that the beds could've been more comfortable. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel, can you help? S: I can, we have 9 hotels, do you have anything else to narrow it down? U: It should be in the centre and be on the expensive side. S: I have 2 available hotels. One is the Gonville Hotel located on Gonville Place. The other is University Arms Hotel on Regent Street. Which one would you like to book? U: Can you book the one without wifi? S: they both have internet, for what days and how many people should I book? U: Can you tell me the softness of the bed, I want it to be comfy. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Gonville Hotel is renowned for their comfortable beds while University Arms Hotel gets mixed reviews on that topic. Are there any other questions for me at this time?

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.Accessible parking was easily available, which was really convenient, and they even offered some excellent breakfast options. 2.We also enjoyed the delicious breakfast options we got to select from. reviews of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.Very nicely done and yummy! 2.The options were plentiful and very well done. 3.When waking up in the morning, I was treated to a whole host of delicious food to eat. 4.The breakfasts were awesome. 5.I liked the central view of the city and its geographical location but I did not like the meals served especially breakfast FAQs of WORTH HOUSE: 1.Worth house offers breakfast at additional charge. FAQs of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.City Centre North B and B does offer free English breakfast. [SEP] U: I would like to go and visit Leicester. Do you think you can help me find a train to get me there? S: Sure! There are plenty of trains going to Leicester. What city will you be departing from? U: I will be leaving from cambridge. S: Perfect. What day would you like to travel on? Do you need to depart or arrive by a certain time? U: I will be traveling on Sunday and would like to arrive by 08:30 please. S: The first train leaves at 06:21 and arrives at 08:06. How many tickets would you like please? U: I need it for eight people, please. S: Great! You're booked on TR9187 with reference number MJJ7J6CV. Is there anything else I can help with? U: Yes! I also need to find an expensive guesthouse in the north. It should have plenty of free parking for my fancy car. S: I am sorry, there are no expensive guest houses in the north with free parking.  Would you like to try another area? U: Then how about one that is in the cheap price range? S: There are 2 options. City Centre north has a rating of 0 stars and Worth House has a rating of 4 stars. Would you like me to book either of them? U: Do either of them provide a good breakfast? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The City Centre North B and B offers plenty of delicious breakfast options, and the same can be received at the Worth House.

src_text: reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.The wait staff could certainly be more friendly but the location is great as is the view from the patio. 2.The view from the restaurant was excellent, it is in a very nice location. 3.If you don't mind the lack of a view from the dining room that is. 4.There is also a nice view of the city. reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.The only places they can use some improvement in is giving it all a better view which might also bring up the atmosphere as well 2.I have to say, the service was excellent, and the views from the restaurant can't be beat. 3.They also have a modest drinks menu with some affordable prices, but I was more interested in the beautiful view from my window seat, which allowed me to watch the sun setting as I dined. 4.The location could not be better: right in the heart of the city with excellent views after the sun goes down. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a moderately priced restaurant in the north part of town. I would like to know the type of food, address and phone number. S: first we have golden wok at 191 histon road chesterton c.b 4, 3.h l . it is chinese and it's phone number is 01223350688. next we have an indian restaurant at 7 milton road chesterton c.b 4, 1.uy. it is called the nirala U: Does this place have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Golden Wok has a nice view from the patio, but not always from the dining room. The Nirala has excellent views of the sunset from the window seats.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.But still, I appreciated the great view from my window, overlooking the nearby lake, and the room itself was very clean with a seriously comfortable bed. 2.Looking out of the balcony was the most beautiful view I've ever seen. [SEP] U: Hello.  I am excited to see some local tourist attractions on my trip to Cambridge.  Can you suggest some places to go? S: All saints church is available in the centre of town. U: I will be in the east and am wondering if there is a concerthall. S: No, there are no concert halls in the east. What else can I assist with? U: Can you tell me if there are any swimming pools located in the east? S: I have one and it is abbey pool and astroturf pitch. U: Can you give me more information on abbey pool. S: Sure! It's located on poolway, whitehill road, off newmarket road. Their phone number is 01223902088. Anything else I can help you with? U: Yes, I also need a place to stay in the east, moderately priced and with wifi. S: Warkworth House appears to fit your needs. Would you like to book a room? U: Can you book a room that specifies a glorious view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Warkworth house has an amazing view of a nearby lake. It shouldn't be hard to book you a room that you will enjoy.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Because I had a late arrival, the very comfy bed was a really nice perk as well. [SEP] U: A friend of mine mentioned this attraction called The Place. Can you give me some information about it? S: Yes, it is a nightclub in the south. Would you like the phone number? U: Yes. Phone number and address S: The Place is located at 22 Sidney Street, postcode cb23hg, and their phone number is 01223324600. Can I help you with anything else today? U: I am also looking for a place to stay in the east in the expensive price range. S: I have one listing for express by holiday inn cambridge, is that okay for you? U: I have a bad back, do they have comfortable beds? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The holiday express is said to have very comfortable beds according to one review. Do you want to book a room there?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 2.I had a great view of the mountains. 3.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay on the east side that includes free parking. S: I can help you with that!  First, let me get more information so that I can assist you better. Are you looking for a guesthouse or hotel? U: I would like a hotel with 3 stars and with free wifi please. S: There are none in the East. Perhaps another criteria change? U: How about the north part of town? S: There's the Hamilton Lodge. It's a moderate price guesthouse that has both free parking and wifi. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Do the rooms come with a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The guest reviews of the Hamilton Lodge all claim that it has good views from the rooms. Would you like to make a reservation?

src_text: reviews of RIVERSIDE BRASSERIE: 1.They have an outdoor area which was nice, and overall it was in a nice location. reviews of DE LUCA CUCINA AND BAR: 1.There's many outdoor tables, and large windows overlooking the river. I have asian and african cuisine U: I would actually like to find something that's serving modern European food, preferably in the centre. S: I have four options. Do you want cheap, moderate, or expensively priced? U: moderate please. S: We have two options - de luca cucina and bar or riverside brasserie.  Would you like me to book a reservation at either one? U: Which one has the better outdoor dining area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Riverside Brasserie has a nice outdoor location while that at the De Luca Cucina and Bar has many tables and overlooks a river.

src_text: reviews of ARCHWAY HOUSE: 1.The room had a nice view, you would love. 2.The room itself was clean and pleasant with a fantastic view of downtown. 3.The view from the hotel was gorgeous and I was able to enjoy it at my leisure. 4.We had a nice view that was relaxing. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The archway house guests have said that the view from the room is great, in fact it has been called gorgeous.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. S: TR5921 departs the airport at 18:24 and arrives by 18:52, does this suit your needs? U: yes, what is the travel time, train ID and price please per ticket S: Train TR5921, 44ld and leaves at 18:24 U: Could you confirm the travel time and price please? S: Train TR5921 leaves Stansted Airport at 18:24 and arrives in Cambridge at 18:52 at a price of 10.10 pounds per ticket.  Would you like to book this? U: Not, at the moment. S: There is one option available. It is cityroomz. Do you want to book? U: Yes,  please book it for the same day for a party of 4 for 4 nights. S: Do you want the reservations to begin on Friday? U: Is the shower pressure strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests were overwhelmingly disappointed by the lack of water pressure. Can I answer any other questions for you about Cityroomz?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip in Cambridge. src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.Accessible parking was easily available, which was really convenient, and they even offered some excellent breakfast options. 2.We also enjoyed the delicious breakfast options we got to select from. reviews of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.Very nicely done and yummy! 2.The options were plentiful and very well done. 3.When waking up in the morning, I was treated to a whole host of delicious food to eat. 4.The breakfasts were awesome. 5.I liked the central view of the city and its geographical location but I did not like the meals served especially breakfast FAQs of WORTH HOUSE: 1.Worth house offers breakfast at additional charge. 2.There are full English breakfast options available at Worth House. Can you book that for 6 people for me? S: Sure! I have 6 people booked for monday with reference number 3EBQSQSC and a total of 99.6 GBP. Can I help you with anything else? src_text: reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.The food was all high quality and affordable, I may have been in Thailand! 2.The food was great, and while the drinks were splendid and of wide variety, the prices were too high for both. 3.The food is good and affordable as are the drinks. 4.I think they are charging a bit too much, but I will say they did have many drink options to choose from as well as a decent sized menu. 5.I will say that while the food was amazing, but I was shocked when I saw how much it costed me. 6.Their Pad Thai and Red Curry are really delicious and for what you get, with the high quality food, it's super cheap too. reviews of SALA THONG: 1.I have only been to a few Thai places but heard Sala Thong had great food with affordable prices. 2.Between us we ordered the Thai Fried Rice, Green Curry, Red Curry, and Tom Kha Kai, all of which were excellent, affordable and came in large portion sizes. [SEP] U: I am looking for an expensive restaurant that serves Thai food. S: I have to options for Thai food in the expensive price range, Bangkok City and Sala Thong. U: Is there anything else? S: Those are the only results for expensive Thai food. U: Are any of them well known for their value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Bangkok City and Sala Thong restaurant has very high quality food and drinks that are very affordable. There are many drink options for your choosing.

src_text: reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.My only grip is the place where we sat was too close to the kitchen and out in the open. 2.The only downside is the pretty mediocre atmosphere of the restaurant, so don't go expecting to see great views or ambiance. 3.The place was clean and not as loud as I was expecting based on the vehicles outside and the line to get in. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.Overall I would recommend this place if you want good food, but don't really care for the ambiance. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay that has free wifi and parking. S: There are numerous hotels that match this criteria available. Do you have a specific area you'd like to stay, or a price range in mind? U: No particular area but I need it to be cheap. S: I found cheap guesthouses, is guesthouse what you are looking for? U: I'd prefer a hotel, rather than a guesthouse. S: There's one.  The Cambridge Belgry in the west.  It has a four star rating.  Should I book it for you? U: Yes please book it for 3 people for 2 nights starting monday S: I am sorry but it is not available for those times. Would you like to find another hotel? U: How about booking it for 1 night instead. S: I was able to book a reservation for 3 people for 1 night starting Monday, reference number D8UYVAY8.  Is there anything else you need assistance with? U: Yes I need a chinese place in the cheap range S: There are 4 in the price range you asked for: Charlie Chan, Rice House, The Lucky Star and the Golden house. Would you like more information on one of these ? U: Which one is known for good ambiance? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Charlie Chan and the Rice House ambiance is not as highly recommended. The Lucky Star and Golden House don't have any information regarding ambiance.

src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.Though it was only limited to American and European countries, nothing Asian. 2.They had a nice variety, including fresh fruit and freshly made overnight oats in to-go containers. 3.The breakfast options were great. 4.They had a literal continental breakfast, you could choose what you want depending on the country's cuisine. 5.Their breakfast selections were amazing, too. FAQs of ALLENBELL: 1.Breakfast at Allenbell is free when you book a room. reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Breakfast was always delicious, visually appealing and fresh. 2.However, I was disappointed at the breakfast which was not special at all and small in quantity. 3.We did enjoy the variety at breakfast. 4.Breakfast was excellent with a lot of good options. 5.Each morning, we got a free breakfast with our room. FAQs of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.Yes,  Autumn House offers a free English breakfast for guests. [SEP] U: Hello I'm looking for the shanghai family restaurant. S: Yes I got it, what can I do for you sir? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of THE HOTPOT: 1.The food was of good quality and portion, you had a nice outdoor but i didn't like the limited drinks reviews of HAKKA: 1.The have a nice outdoor dining area which was perfect for this summer night! src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.I didn't order any drinks, but they seemed reasonably priced based on the menu I saw. 2.The food was ok and the beer was definitely overpriced, however the service was excellent! 3.The service was great, food was superb, and on top of that the food and drinks were so cheap! 4.I could overlook it if only the drinks were expensive, or if a few of the food options were spendy, but every time I have a meal here, I leave feeling like I paid too much for my meal, which puts a damper on my mood. 5.The drink options are plentiful and affordable as well. FAQs of HAKKA: 1.You can order alcohol at this restaurant. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a high scale chinese restaurant. S: We have 9 expensive Chinese restaurants across town. Do you prefer a specfic part of town? U: Yes, I do. I would like it to be in the north. S: May I suggest Hakka, a very nice Chinese Restaurant in the north part of town. Shall I provide you with more information? U: Could you please tell me the pricing on their beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are mixed reviews on the affordability of drinks. Some say they're way too high and others are surprised at the low prices. Would you like me to find out more about beer, specifically?

src_text:
reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train going to cambridge that arrives by 18:30? S: Okay, I think I can help you. Where will be coming from? U: I will be departing kings lynn. Reference number is : 4NLGW7WM. U: Thanks so much. Can you also help me look for the Carolina Bed and Breakfast? S: Carolina Bed and Breakfast is in the East, it is a guesthouse in the moderate price range. Would you like to book a room? U: What is their breakfast menu? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to reviews, they have a full English and Irish breakfast that guests overall really enjoyed. Only a couple complained about the options.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. S: I don't have any sports located in the centre. May I try a different area? U: What about boats instead? S: Is there anything else I can do to assist you today? U: I am also looking for any information you might have on Gonville Hotel. src_text: reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.I have to say, the service was excellent, and the views from the restaurant can't be beat. [SEP] U: I'm looking to check out local colleges can you help me? S: Sure thing! There are several, do you know the area? U: I'm not particular on the area, do you have a recommendation? S: Christ's College is in the centre and has no entrance fee.  Their phone number is 01223334900, they are located on saint andrew's street, post code cb23bu.  Anything else? U: I'm looking for an indonesian restaurant in the north. S: I'm afraid we don't have any Indonesian restaurants. Is there something else that might work instead? U: Well how about one that serves indian food then? S: Would you like a restaurant in the moderate or cheap price range? U: It doesn't matter, I'd like to book it for 8 people on Thursday at 14:15. S: Both restaurants are booked at that time.  Will another time work for you? U: Yes, try 13:15, please. S: I have booked you for 8 people at 14:15 on thursday at the nirala.  The address is Victoria Avenue Chesterton.  Phone number 01733553355.  Anything else? U: Do they have good service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for that location, the service has been described as excellent!

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. [SEP] U: I need a place to dine on expensive crossover food. S: There are no places a any price range that serve this food type, shall I search for something else for you? U: are you sure? maybe try the centre? S: I am sorry there are none in the centre. Would you like to try a different type of restaurant? U: Sure, how about Chinese? S: There is no Chinese either. U: I really want to eat Chinese in the centre area of town.  Are you 100% positive that isn't possible?  I'll be heartbroken. S: Actually, there is chinese. I recommend Ugly Duckling. Do you want a reservation? U: Yes, please! There will be 7 of us dining at 13:15 on Friday. S: I made a booking for you. Do you need the reference number? U: Yes if i could get the reference number that would be great. I also need information on Hamilton lodge. S: Okay your reference number is C40IRNSV. U: Do the rooms have a lot of space? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews were split with the rooms called extremely large and spacious as well as on the small side. Do you need any other information?

src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.My friends and I enjoyed the cabernet sauvignon. 2.The food and drinks weren't that great though overall. 3.My Riesling was a good price and was delicious so it was not all bad. 4.If I were looking for a nice Italian place to go for a glass of wine, I might visit Prezzo again. 5.We also ordered beer, which was excellent as well. FAQs of PREZZO: 1.Prezzo serves alcohol. [SEP] U: Hello. I'm leaving the city on Wednesday and need to find a train, but it must be after 13:00. Can you help me book a ticket? S: There are over 100 different trains available, what destination do you have in mind? U: I would like to go to cambridge from london liverpool street. S: there is a train at 13:59 that arrives by 1527 U: That sounds perfect.  Can you book 7 seats for me? S: I was able to book the seats, reference number is 6KIWFNOU. U: I'm also looking for a moderate priced restaurant in the area of west. S: Would you be interested in british, indian, or italian? U: It doesn't matter. S: There is Prezzo which is an italian restaurant. would you like me to make a reservation? U: Does the Prezzo serve a high-quality Cabernet Sauvignon? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, one customer said that they really enjoyed their Cabernet Sauvignon. Would you like to book a reservation?

src_text: reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.It was a bit loud and the drinks could be bigger. 2.The location is good and the drinks are a good price. 3.Oh man, their drinks were affordable and their food was really good quality. FAQs of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.The YIPPE NOODLE BAR serves all forms of alcohol. [SEP] U: I need a train from cambridge to go to london liverpool street S: sure, what day are you traveling? U: I will be traveling on Thursday. S: Do you know what time you need to depart or arrive by so I can narrow the options? U: I will be traveling on a Sunday, and I need to arrive by 14:30 S: You will be traveling on Thursday or Sunday? You've said both. U: I should leave Cambridge on sunday and arrive in london liverpool street by 14:30. I need 4 tickets and a reference number. S: TR5504 would arrive at 13:27, would that work? U: Yes, that's perfect. I need tickets for 4 people, please. S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 66.4 GBP payable at the station . Reference number is : B8QZ32WO. Can I help with anything else? U: Yes, i need to find a restaurant to visit in the centre of town. Preferably in the moderate price range. S: There are 21 that fits your criteria. Which cuisine would you like, to help narrow your choices down? U: It doesn't matter. S: Yippee Noodle Bar meets your criteria, would you like their information? U: Do they have good valued beer? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for an architecture place to go in the centre of town. S: there are several architecture places you could go, all saints church,great saint mary's church,holy trinity church, and old schools, which one could you prefer? U: Old Schools sounds cool - can I have their phone number? S: You can contact Old Schools at 01223332320. Is there anything else I can assist you with? U: I'm looking for the gonville hotel. S: Gonville hotel is in the expensive price range in the centre would you like me to book it U: Do the showers at the Gonville hotel have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure at the Gonville Hotel is not rated highly for good water pressure. "Tricking and slow" is the way one guest described it.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. [SEP] U: Hello, we're planning on staying in Cambridge and would like to know if you have a train that departs around 12:00 from Cambridge proper. S: Yes, can you tell me where you would like to travel to and what time? U: I'll be going to London Kings Cross on Friday.  I need to arrive by 12:00 S: The TR1502 puts you in London Kings Cross at 11:51, will that work for you? U: Yes, please book that for 5 people. S: I was able to book you 5 tickets for that train. Your reference number is XNQN9BN0. Is there anything more I can assist you with? U: Yes, I'd like to find someplace to stay with free wifi in the centre of town, please. S: alexander bed and breakfast is a cheap location. Shall I book? U: I am actually looking for something in the more expensive range and it should also include free parking. S: There are two locations in the expensive range, Gonville hotel is a 3 star hotel and University Arms Hotel which is a 4 star hotel, which location would you prefer? U: Put me in the University Arms, same group of people for 3 nights starting Tuesday. S: I have booked that for you. Your reference number is 3JP83PAX. U: Is there a good view from the room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The University Arms Hotel has great, enjoyable views that are really picturesque. Is there anything more I can assist you with?

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I need a place to stay in Cambridge. I'm looking for a hotel with 0 stars. S: Is there a certain area you would like to be in? U: I don't really have an area in mind. I would just like for it to have free wifi and be a hotel instead of a guesthouse. S: Cityroomz over in Centre would work perfectly for you then!  They do have free wifi and are a moderately priced 0 star hotel.  Would you like a room? U: Yes, I would like to book it for 5 nights for two people starting on Monday. S: I have booked the cityroomz for you for 5 nights starting on Monday.  The reference number is MSZ63RPW.  Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Is the water pressure in the showers strong at this hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most customers said that the shower water pressure at Cityroomz is on the low side, and disappointing.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for a place to stay the night. I'd like a hotel, but nothing fancy, it can have zero stars and that's fine. Do you have any recommendations? S: Cityroomz is a hotel in the city center with 0 stars. It's moderately priced. Do you want me to book that for you? U: No, I don't need to book a room, but can I get their contact info and location please. Thanks. S: Certainly. Cityroomz is in the centre of town, and their address is Sleeperz Hotel, Station Road, postcode cb12tz. Their phone number is 01223304050. Can I help with anything else? U: Do they have internet? S: Yes, Cityroomz has internet.  Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Does this place have strong water pressure in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure in the rooms at Cityroomz leaves much to be desired as patrons state that its weak and disappointing.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 2.The room was clean, quiet, and the WiFi was quick. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel to stay in. It should be located in the centre and should include free parking please. S: Would you like a cheap or expensive hotel? U: I need a moderately priced hotel please. S: So sorry, we have no moderately priced lodgings in the centre. We do have two cheap guesthouses and two expensive hotels. Will either of those work for you? U: Do you have one in the north instead? S: The Hamilton lodge may be a good option for you. U: Are the rooms clean there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the rooms at Hamilton Lodge do seem to be clean. Past guests have referred to them as pretty clean.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place called maharajah tandoori restaurant. Do you know it? It's a restaurant. S: Yes, it's a luxurious place on the west side. Would you like the number, or a reservation? U: Yes, I would like to make a reservation for 6 people at 19:30 this Saturday. Could I also get the reference number? S: Yes! Your all set confirmation number is QX0059LN, anything else today? U: I was hoping to find a hotel that is 4 star. S: What part of town are you looking at staying in? U: I don't care, just as long as it's in the moderate price range. S: You have 11 options. They are all guesthouses. Would you like free parking or internet at your location? U: Oh, I really prefer a hotel.  Maybe you could find someplace that is cheap instead? S: the cambridge belfry is in the west. It's a cheap 4 star hotel. Are you interested in booking a night? U: Can you book a room that absolutely comes with high water pressure for a strong shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for this location, the water pressure is not good, low in pressure, and like if you were at home and others were showering at the same time.  Sorry to disappoint!

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I am trying to find a Jamaican restaurant S: We don't have any Jamaican restaurants here. Would you like to try something else? U: How about a expensive mediterranean? S: There are two restaurants, La Mimosa or Shiraz U: let's book a table at Shiraz. S: Can I get what day,time and how many people will be dining? U: Monday at noon and five. S: Your booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number is:  QJI9U6C7. Is there anything else I can assist you with today? U: Also looking for a place to stay. The hotel should include free parking and should include free wifi. S: I recommend acorn guest house on 154 chesterton road would you like me to book? U: Can I get the address, postcode and price range of that hotel? S: It is a moderate priced guesthouse. The address is 154 chesterton road and postcode is cb41da. Can I book you any rooms? U: Sure, that would be great. one person for 2 nights please. S: What day will you be arriving? U: The same day, I'd also like a taxi to go between the hotel and restaurant. S: I need to know the time you want to leave. U: Wednesday, I need to arrive to the restaurant by my booked time. S: I think we've almost mixed up your bookings! To clarify, you'd like a hotel reservation starting on Wednesday? Your restaurant booking is set for Monday. We can make changes! U: Is the shower pressure good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to reviewers, the water pressure was too low. Is there any other information that you need?

src_text: reviews of THE VARSITY RESTAURANT: 1.The atmosphere was excellent, the drinks were quite affordable, and the foods were clearly of superior quality. reviews of BLOOMSBURY RESTAURANT: 1.The restaurant offers a very pretty, picturesque view which gave it a really romantic atmosphere. 2.The food was of good quality, you had a nice view and location but i didn't like the No gluten-free option and Mediocre atmosphere [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel in Cambridge that has free parking and is in the expensive price range. S: I found five expensive hotels with free parking.  What part of town are you wanting to stay in? U: Are any of them guest Houses? S: I would like a guesthouse with free parking.  Do any of those 5 fit that? U: I am looking for a guesthouse in the expensive price range with free parking. S: I'm sorry, there are no expensive guesthouses with free parking.  Would you like to change one of your parameters and search for a moderate guesthouse? U: How about a moderate price range? S: I have the Archway house, it is a guesthouse in the moderate price range and has free parking. U: What is the full phone number and area code of the Archway house?  Also, is there a persian restaurant near the centre of the location? S: The phone number is 01223575314. What price range would you like the persian restaurant to be? U: Also expensive. May I have the post code and area of the Archway house as well? S: The Archway house is in the north area and the postcode is  cb43pe. U: Thank you. Did you locate a persian restaurant? S: There are no persian restaurants. Would you like to try something else? U: Somewhere that serves international food please. S: Sure I have three restaurants to choose from. Do you have a price range preference? U: Yes, it should also be moderate priced. S: I have found 2 restaurants, The Varsity or Bloomsbury. Which one would you prefer. U: Do they both have a nice relaxing vibe and atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The atmosphere at the Varsity Restaurant is excellent while that at the Bloomsbury Restaurant is romantic, however its also considered mediocre by some.

src_text: reviews of BEDOUIN: 1.The quality of food and drinks were good and the service was great. 2.The quality was also high and looked sophisitcated. 3.My beer was just okay and seemed to be priced higher that similar restaurants. FAQs of BEDOUIN: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at Bedouin. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to go in the centre. S: Okay! What kind of place would you like to go? U: I'm wanting to see the new Reese Witherspoon movie. Would they happen to have a cinema in that area? S: Yes, this is the only cinema in the area vue cinema. U: Could you tell me the postcode of that cinema? S: Vue cinema is located in the centre of town. Their post code is cb11ps U: Great!  I also want a restaurant in the same area, something expensive, please? S: There are more than two dozen expensive restaurants in that area.  What cuisine would you like? U: I'm not picky. Whichever one you choose will be fine. I just need a phone number, address, and postcode please. S: Alright It's called Bedouin it's an African cuisine. The information is the following; phone 01223367660, address 100 Mill Road City Centre, and the postcode is cb12bd. U: Do they have a good selection of high quality beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One person said that their beer was just okay, but other customers said that their drinks and general were high quality.

src_text: reviews of PIPASHA RESTAURANT: 1.The beer is the coldest draft I've had. 2.I ordered some samosas and those more than made up for the beer. 3.The beer I got served didn't taste right so I had to send it back. reviews of SITAR TANDOORI: 1.The food and drinks were very high quality! 2.It's food and drinks are very good, and the Dosa was especially nommy. 3.However, the drinks were not all that tasty, and the food was overpriced and not very tasty either. 4.I liked the location and drinks. [SEP] U: What can you tell me about Magdalene College? S: Magdalene College is located in the west area of town. There is no entrance fee. U: Thank you for your help. S: You're welcome. Let us know if you need anything else. U: I do, actually. I'd also like to find a good place to dine in the east. Do you know of any Swiss restaurants in that area? S: Unfortunately there doesn't seem to be any Swiss options in the east. Could I help you with anything else? U: Hmm, I was really looking forward to Swiss food. Ok, how about an indian restaurant in the east instead? S: That we can do. We have two moderately priced and two expensive Indian restaurants in the east. U: what are the two expensive indian restaurants? S: Sitar Tandoori and Pipasha Restaurant are the expensive options. U: Do they serve high quality drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the drinks available at Sitar Tandoori are high quality, however those at Pipasha Restaurant are sometimes disappointing.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: i am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should include free parking and should have a star of 4. S: Do you have a part of town you would prefer? U: No, I don't. I just need free parking and 4 stars. S: Okay, how about the Allenbell?  It's got 4 stars and free parking. U: That sounds good. Give me it's details regarding type of gursthouse, price range , area and address S: Allenbell is a cheap guesthouse on the east side of town. Its address is 517A Coldham Lane. Do you need any additional information? U: Do the rooms there have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms at the Allenbell have amazing, scenic views that are great and even better than the pictures.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel in the north to stay in. Can you help me with this? S: There are 13 hotels in the north. Do you want a guesthouse or a proper hotel? U: I'm looking for a proper hotel, please. If it had free wifi, well, I wouldn't complain about that either. S: The Ashley hotel is in the north and has both free internet and parking. Would you care to go here? U: Also, is it possible to get a room with a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, Ashley Hotel offers rooms with incredible views that are very beautiful to watch and to look at.

src_text: FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wifi is free at Acorn Guest House. 2.Acorn guest house has free WiFi. reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. [SEP] U: I need somewhere to stay. Should have free parking and free wifi S: What area of town and what is your price range? U: The centre of town and with a moderate price range. Nothing too expensive. S: What day do you need your reservation and for how many people and how long will you stay? U: I don't need to make a reservation. I am just looking for information on a hotel. Can you help me find a 4 star hotel in the North? S: There are 6 hotels in the north part of the city that fall in the moderate price range, have free wifi and parking, and have 4 stars. Any other specifications? U: I'm not looking to book yet, can you tell me their price ranges? S: They're all in the moderate price range. U: I need one near a swimmingpool. S: There are two Swimming pools in the north. There are no hotels with 4 stars, moderate price range, internet and free wifi. Would you like to change your search? U: I guess I'll change my price range. Are there any expensive hotels with all the amenities that I'd like along with free parking? S: Unfortunately, I do not have any that are in the expensive range. I have several 4-star moderately priced hotels or can I look for something else for you? U: On the swimming pool, what's the phone number and entrance fee? S: Please pick a pool first; Jesus Green Outdoor Pool or Kings Hedges Learner Pool? U: Let's go with Kings Hedges Learner Pool. S: Their phone number is 01223353248. As for entrance fee, I don't have the information to provide to you. I apologize. U: That's ok. I need a taxi to take me to and from the hotel and pool. I want to leave the pool by 02:15. S: We will have to know which hotel you are staying at first before booking a taxi. U: Okay. Is there a hotel close to Kings Hedges Learner Pool that has free parking and wifi? I would prefer a four star location in the north. S: There are seven that meet those requirements. Might I suggest the Acorn Guest House? I've heard it's quite nice. U: What is the price range for the Acorn guest house? S: The price there is moderate. U: Is there fast and stable internet connection at the location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, there does seem to be a stable internet connection at the Acorn Guest House. A past guest commented about it being super fast.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.The bathroom, which is super important to my family and me, was super clean when we checked in. 2.The bathroom was spotless, too. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The negatives is that the bathroom wasn't that clean when we first arrived and that the beds could've been more comfortable. 2.The place had everything we needed, a large big room that never felt cramp, a nice clean bathroom, and a very kid-friendly atmosphere. 3.When we went to use the facilities at this hotel, we both noticed how the bathrooms had been cleaned and they were pristine in quality. [SEP] U: I need train schedule information for Thursdays, please S: I can help with that. From where are you departing and to where are you going? U: departing from cambridge and arrive by 21:45 S: There are 168 trains that day. Do you have a destination in mind so I can narrow it down? U: I need to go to stansted airport please S: I would recommend train TR7966 that leaves at 05:40 U: That's fine. Please book one seat for me, please. S: Success. Your reference number is PMHZ3TJO. U: I am also looking for a hotel with free wifi, but it doesnt need to have free parking. S: Do you have a preferred area or price range? U: The area doesn't matter, but I would like it to be an expensive 4 star hotel. S: I have 2 options for you. The first is the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel in the west. The other is the University Arms Hotel in the centre. Do you have a preference? U: Well, I'm a germaphobe. Which is known for sanitized and pristine bathrooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They both have really good reviews on bathroom cleanliness. However, the University Arms does have a complaint that the bathroom wasn't very clean. Would you like to know anything else about either of them?

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: I need a place to stay in the east that has free wifi available. S: I found 7 hotels in the east that have free wifi. What is your price range? U: It doesn't matter about the price. I would like it to be a guesthouse though, if that's possible. S: I have 5 gueshouses. All located in the east. How many am I booking for and when? U: Any one would be fine can I get a room for 1 person for 2 nights starting tuesday? S: Booking was unsuccessful at autumn house. Do you want to find another hotel? src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.The location itself was in the heart of the town so I was able to go walk around after eating here. 2.Parking was a nightmare, I did not like coming in. 3.The location is good - it's out near a mall with a lot of parking spaces, so parking was a breeze, and it's conveniently right off the highway. 4.However, the location isn't great (not a lot of parking) and the food left a little something to be desired. 5.The location is really great. 6.With a location by the riverside, you can almost close your eyes and imagine you're taking afternoon tea in the idyllic English countryside when you're at Cotto's! U: No, thanks. Are you sure you can't find 1 star hotels? S: I'm sorry, I double checked but there are not any 1 star rated hotels available. Can I help you find something else that may be suitable? U: What about 4 star hotels? S: Yes, there are quite a few.  Did you have a particular price range in mind? U: No. I don't have a price preference. S: In that case, I would recommend alexander bed and breakfast. U: Do they have high-quality showers that spray with force? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, they don't have high quality forceful showers at Alexander Bed and Breakfast. Past guests have said that the water pressure is low.

src_text: reviews of RIVERSIDE BRASSERIE: 1.They have an outdoor area which was nice, and overall it was in a nice location. reviews of DE LUCA CUCINA AND BAR: 1.There's many outdoor tables, and large windows overlooking the river. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The De Luca Cucina and Bar features many outdoor tables that overlook the river, while the Riverside Brasserie also has a nice outside seating area.

src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.The location is actually not as remote as it seems and I made it there in about 10 mins by car. 2.Otherwise, loved the restaurant and wish that it was closer to my house, because the location is pretty inconvenient. 3.The location was nice and close to my home, and the staff was friendly enough. 4.The location isn't in the best of places and could be closer to town. [SEP] U: Can you find a place called lynne strover gallery. S: Yes, it is a museum in the west with free admission. Would you like the phone number? U: Yes, please. I also need to know what side of town they're on and what the entrance fee is. Thanks! S: Their phone number is 01223295264. Do you need anything else? U: I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in the centre of town. S: There are 33 expensive restaurants in the centre of town. Is there a type of food that you would prefer? U: North Indian, if possible. S: I'm sorry, there aren't any north indian restaurants out of that list, perhaps a different type of food? U: Hmm.. let's try one with Korean food then. src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The shower was a sad dribble of water. 2.It was challenging to rinse the shampoo efficiently. 3.The only negative was the low water pressure. [SEP] U: I am looking for information on a hotel called hobsons house. S: Hobsons House is a guesthouse found in the west side of town . It is in the moderate price range and is rated 3 stars. U: Do they have free parking? S: Yes hobsons house has both free internet and parking. Would you like to book a room? U: How is the water pressure there, is it strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the water pressure in the bathroom shower at the Hobsons House is a negative aspect of the property as its weak and insufficient.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I hate to say anything negative but if I had to nitpick something it was that the bathroom wasn't as clean as I would have liked and the water pressure was low. [SEP] U: Yes, I'm looking for a restaurant that serves American food and is in the center of town. S: The Gourmet Burger Kitchen is located on Regent Street in City Centre. U: That sounds good.  Can you provide me with their contact info? S: Their phone number is 01223312598. Do you need more information? U: What is the price range? S: It is expensive, but very good. U: I also need a hotel called lovell Lodege S: I will book it for you,is there anything else I can do for you ? U: Does lovell Lodege have strong water pressure in their showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, one aspect of staying at the Lovell Lodge that's a negative is the exceptionally poor water pressure in its bathroom.

src_text: reviews of SALA THONG: 1.We were sat on the top level with a beautiful view of the countryside which set the mood for what turned out a be a quite romantic dinner. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive restaurant that serves Thai food, please. S: There is one in the west and one in the centre of town. Do you have a preference in area? U: I don't have a preference in the area. I suppose you could book me a table for two people at 12:30 on Saturday. Also, could i get the reference number? S: I booked you a table at the sala thong in the west area for 12:30 Saturday. U: Thanks, please provide the reference number. S: The reference number is XLRSFB9Q. Is there anything else that I can do for you? U: Thank you for booking that. Could you please book me a taxi to leave from the centre of town at my hotel to the Sala Thong for Saturday at 11:30? S: In order to book the taxi, I will need the location of your hotel. U: I need to find a restaurant in the wast part of town. S: The Sala Thong restaurant is in the west part of town. U: Can you confirm whether the Sala Thong Restaurant has appealing views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I found one review and which the customer said the view was beautiful. Would you like more information?

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.The bed was comfy so I slept well. 3.The only issue that I had is that the bed was not as soft as would have liked. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay that includes free wifi and free parking. S: There an area of town or pricerange you want? U: a star of 4 and should be in the cheap range and in the North S: The Worth House in meets your needs. Would you like me to start a booking? U: Do the beds come with clean sheets and extra blankets? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The beds are noted for being comfortable. I do not have specific information on the sheets and extra blankets.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.When I went to go take a shower, I found that the very limited water pressure made it very difficult to get clean. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay. Are there any guesthouses that are moderately priced? S: Oh, yes. I have about 15 different options for you. Is there an area of town you prefer to stay in? U: No, I really don't care what area, but I would like it to have a 4 star rating. S: I have several 4-star guesthouses. Might I suggest the Warkworth house. It's located in the east and offers both free wifi and parking. U: That sounds perfect so long as it has free parking. S: It certainly does. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Yeah, but do they have the real showers that have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Warkworth House has very limited water pressure that makes it difficult to get clean. Would you like to make a reservation?

src_text: reviews of PIZZA HUT CITY CENTRE: 1.The foods were delicious and the food portions were good. 2.Pizza Hut City Centre has some good food portion sizes. 3.The inside is nice and you get a lot of food for the money. 4.Food obviously isn't the best and it's on the pricey size, but it'll fill ya up quick. [SEP] U: I need to book a restaurant. S: I'm happy to assist you. What type of cuisine would you like? U: I would really love to try christmas food. S: I'm sorry, I am not showing any restaurants serving Christmas food. Would you like to consider a different cuisine? U: I would love italian food then. S: We have 15 different Italian restaurants across town at different price ranges. Do you want to narrow down your choices? U: No thank you. I'll just need a price range and postcode for one of them. S: pizza hut city centre is inthe cheap price range. their postcode is cb21ab U: Does this place offer huge pizzas and highly rated food? If it does, I'm interested. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Pizza Hut City centre is a restaurant that has been highly ranked for its food as well as offering considerable food portions.

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.The bed was comfy so I slept well. 3.The only issue that I had is that the bed was not as soft as would have liked. [SEP] U: I want a train going to london kings cross. S: We have 70 trains that meet that criteria, what is your point of departure please? U: I am  departing from cambridge. S: Great! What day would you like to leave? Do you have any preferred times to leave and arrive by? U: I would like to travel on monday and leave after 15:30. S: There are four trains that depart every two hours. The earliest leaves at 17:70 and the last one leaves at 23:00. What's your preference? U: Please book the 17:70 for 3 people. S: Actually, the earliest train, TR7786 leaves Cambridge at 17:00 and arrives at 17:51. Should I go ahead a book this for 3 people? U: Yes please it needs to be for three people. S: I was able to book it, reference number is M9MIP9U1 U: Great, thanks! Also, can you tell me about the Worth House, please? S: i am not sure is that a restaurant? U: I didn't ask about a restaurant. I'm pretty sure that's a hotel. S: Sorry about that. Worth House is a cheap guesthouse located in the north. U: Does the hotel have great mattresses? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guess who stayed at Worth House have said the beds were comfortable, but others said that the beds were too soft for their taste.

src_text: FAQs of SAIGON CITY: 1.There are no outdoor seating at Saigon City. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a Japanese restaurant in the north of the centre. src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The view outside of my window was exquisite and beautiful. 2.I really liked the sunrise view at breakfast. 3.I enjoyed spending time here with my girl, as we took in the great view. 4.Talk about a place with a fantastic view, truly amazing. 5.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. [SEP] U: Hi there. Can you help me find a train going to London Liverpool Street? S: What day would you like to travel? U: I would like to leave from Cambridge on Friday. Any train after 16:00 should be fine. S: That's leaving after 16:00, yes? Or did you mean arriving after 16:00? If leaving after 16:00, the TR5212 leaves Cambridge at 17:59 and arrives at London Liverpool Street at 19:27. U: Yeah, that sounds good. Can you get me two tickets? S: I've booked you on the TR5212, the total fee is 33.20 GBP payable at the station. Your reference number is NJP5V947. Is there anything else you need? U: Yes, I'm also looking for a hotel called avalon. S: Sure I've got it right here. What do you want to know about it? U: Is there a beautiful view here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Avalon gets very high marks on their views with guests saying it's fantastic, great, exquisite, and beautiful. Would you like to make a reservation?

src_text: FAQs of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.Outdoor seating is available. reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.It was a beautiful spot to be eating outdoors. 2.We were out on the patio but being as the building is downtown, the view just isn't very good. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for an expensive restaurant. S: Okay, we have 57 restaurants in that price range. Are you looking for a place in a certain part of town? U: I'd like something in the centre if possible. S: Most of the expensive restaurants in Cambridge happen to be in the center of town! Would you like to try some British food at Fitzbillies? U: Its going to be sunny out, so do they have outdoor tables for me? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, they do have outdoor seating. Some people say that it is great, but others say the view isn't very good.

src_text:
reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. [SEP] U: Hi I need to find a restaurant in the Centre part of Cambridge that falls in the moderate price range, can you give me some suggestions please. S: There are several Italian, European, and Chinese restaurants in that area, would you like one of those options? U: A reservation at any will do. Please reserve a table for 3 at 19:15 on sunday. S: Lan hong house would be a good choice for Chinese. I will book that for you. Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is : US2BCO6D. U: I am looking for a place to stay in an expensive price range. I don't need any free parking. S: I have 5 hotels in the expensive price range, would you like to stay in a particular area of town? U: I don't care about the area, I just want it to be a hotel type and not a guesthouse. S: Great, both university arms hotel, and huntingdon marriott hotel are four stars. Can I book one of these for you? U: Book the Huntingdon Marriott please. S: Certainly, I'll just need the arrival and departure date as well as how many people will be staying. U: Arriving on Saturday and departing on Monday, please, for two adults. I'll also need the phone number, postcode, and internet availability with my confirmation number, please. S: The phone number is--01480446000 The postcode is--pe296fl. Yes internet is available. U: A room with a beautiful view is important for me. Does the room have a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure about the specifics, but one customer said they enjoyed the room view. Do you need to know anything else?

src_text: reviews of COTE: 1.That said, they didn't have much on the menu where non-alcoholic beverages are concerned, so the kiddos ended up with plain water. 2.All of my friends enjoyed their meals, in fact, and we were also glad that the non-alcoholic drinks menu was substantial, since only a few people in the group wanted to drink. [SEP] U: Hey any suggestions for good food? I'd also love to find a train that leaves on Friday from Broxbourne. S: First of all, there is a train leaving Broxbourne for Cambridge every hour on Friday. U: I would like to leave after 08:15 that morning. S: Is there a time you would like to arrive by? U: No specific time, but I'd love the time and train ID. S: First I need to verify if cambridge is your destination. U: yes, i'm traveling to cambridge. S: The TR3005 leaves at 8:32. It's travel time is 60 minutes. Would you like to book a seat? U: yes please book it for me thank you S: I will book it for you now. U: No thank you. I'm also looking for an expensive french restaurant. S: I found 2 restaurants located in the north and centre.  Do you care about the area? U: the centre please. can you reserve a table for friday please. S: And for how many people? U: It will be for 2 people on friday at 15:30 S: Okay, I've booked you a table for 2 at Cote on Friday at 15:30. Your reservation number is 6C4FPXC9. Your table will be reserved for 15 minutes. U: Does the restaurant have non-alcoholic beverages? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Past guests don't agree about the variety of non-alcoholic beverages. One comment said that the selection was substantial, but another said there wasn't much on the menu that was nonalcoholic.

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.The bed was comfy so I slept well. 3.The only issue that I had is that the bed was not as soft as would have liked.
