src_text: reviews of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.The food was a bit mediocre as well but the beverages and dessert make it worthwhile if you just want something light. 2.Some things I really enjoyed was the high quality drinks and the high food location. 3.Our server recommended a beer we enjoyed. 4.The drinks and food were also quite average. 5.However, the drinks were only okay, and there wasn't that much variety. 6.We were happy with the healthy order of Fish and Chips and Sheperd's Pie along with a lager which was great but too pricey for my taste. 7.I liked that there were so many drinks to choose from, and that they were high quality. FAQs of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.Travellers Rest serves alcohol including a range of craft beers. [SEP] U: Hi! I am attempting to find a restaurant in Cambridge called Traveller's Rest. Do you know of it? S: Sure, do you want me to make a booking or do you need more information? U: Do you know anything about their ratings or reviews for lager? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Travellers Rest restaurant serves alcohol including a range of craft beers and lagers which are viewed as average to high-quality.

src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.My friends and I enjoyed the cabernet sauvignon. 2.The food and drinks weren't that great though overall. 3.My Riesling was a good price and was delicious so it was not all bad. 4.If I were looking for a nice Italian place to go for a glass of wine, I might visit Prezzo again. 5.We also ordered beer, which was excellent as well. FAQs of PREZZO: 1.Prezzo serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I want a restaurant on the west end of town. S: OK.  Are you looking for any particular type of food? U: I don't care. S: Are you looking for a particular price range? U: A moderately priced restaurant would be good. S: Do you have a cuisine preference? U: No preference S: How about Prezzo?  They serve moderately priced Italian food on the west side of town. U: Do their reviews mention anything about their beer selection? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that have previously dined at the Prezzo restaurant were seemingly pleased with their beer selection.

src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The food was delicious but the drinks tasted flat. 2.The drinks were reasonably priced and the food was absolutely amazing, it both looked and tasted amazing, especially the spring rolls, possibly the best spring rolls I've ever tasted.. 3.The food and drinks were exceptional We had the Banh Cuon and Com Tam. 4.My beverage was so-so at best, but at least the drinks were cheap and there were lots of non-alcoholic options . 5.I thought the food and drinks were affordable. 6.The drink selection was expansive but pricey, and what I ordered did not stand out in any way. 7.They have good prices on drinks and good portions on meals. 8.After dinner I decided to order a drink, but was quite disappointed. 9.I found it to be a bit expensive for what was provided, especially compared to the delicious food. 10.Unfortunately the same can't be said for the drinks. 11.Thanh Binh also has a pretty great menu of specialty drinks with really reasonable and affordable prices, which is great because their non-alcoholic menu leaves a lot to be desired. FAQs of THANH BINH: 1.Thanh Binh does serve alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap restaurant in the west part of town. I'd also like the restaurant's phone number. S: There are two cheap restaurants in the west part of town.  La Margherita is an Italian restaurant and Thanh Binh is a Vietnamese restaurant.  Would you like the phone number for one or both of those? U: Vietnamese sounds good. Could I have the phone number for Thanh Binh? S: The phone number is 01223 362456. U: Can you tell me if Thanh Binh serves alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There is really only one customer mentioning alcohol. They have a lot of speciality drinks that are cheap to buy.

src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 2.My only dislikes were the poor location within the city, as well as the poor and outdated deocr on the inside of the restaurant. 3.The location ended up being not good though, because it was far from the bar I was going to. 4.If you're in the mood for Italian food, I would pass on Prezzo, which although in a great section of town with breathtaking views, is quite pricey and has very average foods. reviews of LA MARGHERITA: 1.Authentic Italian cuisine with great service and a really nicely located restaurant. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for a hotel in town with free parking and free wifi. S: The Ashley Hotel is a 2 star hotel and has free internet and parking. Would you like to book a room there now? U: Is it a guesthouse? S: No, it's a hotel. Would you prefer a guesthouse? U: Yes, I definitely want a guesthouse. S: There are 21 different guesthouses in the cambridge area. Did you have a certain area you wished to stay in? U: The area doesn't matter as long as I can book it for 8 people for 5 nights starting Friday S: There are 21 guest houses that meet that criteria. Do you have a price range or star rating preference? U: I would prefer at least three stars, please. S: I'm sorry, but there seems to be an error in my system. Could you please restate your requirements? U: I am looking for a gueshouse type hotel with at least three stars for 8 people for 5 nights starting Friday. S: Rosa's Bed and Breakfast is a four star guesthouse at extremely reasonable rates. Would you like me to see if I can book you there? U: Yes, please. Can I get the reference number, please? S: Alright, your room has been booked for 8 people, 5 nights starting Friday. Your reference number is CKLFOESQ. Can I help you with anything else? U: I would like to book a taxi to commute S: Where would you like the taxi to take you, and when would you like to be picked up? U: Well I suppose I should choose a restaurant first. Do you know of a seafood restaurant on the west side of town? S: I'm sorry but there are no seafood restaurants in that part of town. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: I'd like to find a restaurant that serve italian food and book a table for everybody at 14:45 the day i leave S: I'm sorry there are no tables available for 8 at that time. Would you like to try a different time? U: No, I need the same time. Are there other Italian restaruants on the west side? S: Yes there are 2 italian restaurants in the west side, one is prezzo, the other la margherita.  Do you prefer cheap or moderate price? U: Which place is located in an area with lots of different things to do? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: La Margherita is nicely located while Prezzo unfortunately is in a poor area of the city which is a downside.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: I am trying to find a hotel called warkworth house S: Call them at 01223363682 U: book it for 3 people and 5 nights starting from thursday. S: Your booking was unsuccessful. Could you book another day or a shorter stay? U: Is the environment quiet? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The noise level at the Warkworth House depends on the room, as some heard the main road, while others felt their stay was incredibly quiet.

src_text: FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wifi is free at Acorn Guest House. reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.They did offer free wi-fi which worked as I needed it to. 2.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 3.The free wi-fi sure was nice, too, since the kids like to play games on their phones. 4.Acorn Guest House offers free wi-fi, which was a huge selling point for it. [SEP] U: I would like to stay in a hotel that is moderately priced and includes free parking. Can you help? S: Acorn guest house is available would you like to try that? U: yes. can you please give me the address? S: Certainly. Their address is 154 Chesterton Road, postcode cb41da. Can I help with anything else? U: Will this hotel charge me a fee if I want to travel and stay with my cat? S: No pets or animals are allowed to stay at this location. Can I assist you with anything else today? U: Is there a charge for WiFi? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to past guests, the wifi was free. Past guests were happy with the speed and performance of the wifi.

src_text: reviews of SALA THONG: 1.Sala Thong has some of the best Thai food in the area. 2.Authentic flavors that reminded me of my trip to Thailand years ago. 3.The decor inside the restaurant was drab, but the food and service more than made up for it. 4.Overall, the food and drink were only okay, sadly. 5.Between us we ordered the Thai Fried Rice, Green Curry, Red Curry, and Tom Kha Kai, all of which were excellent, affordable and came in large portion sizes. [SEP] U: Yes, I am a looking for a train. Can you help me? S: Yes, I would be happy to. Let me get your information. What is your destination? U: I am coming from Bishops Stortford heading into Cambridge. S: What day do you want to travel? U: Tuesday, after 12:45 please S: There are 6 trains, do you have an arrival time? U: No, but I would prefer to leave after 12:45. S: Sounds good! Train TR8266 leaves at 13:29 putting you in cambridge at 14:07. Would you like me to book seats? U: Yes, make a booking for 2 people. S: You have 2 seats reserved on TR8266, ref# AZVRQ5NW. The total fee is 20.2 GBP, which you can pay at the station. U: I'm also looking for a place to dine that serves Thai food. S: Would you like to eat on the west or center of town? U: I do not have a preference as to which side of town the restaurant is on. S: I have 2 options availbable:  Sala Thong and Bangkok City.  Does either one sound good to your? U: Thank you! Is one of them an expensive restaurant? S: They are both expensive. Would you like to book a table? U: Which one has high quality Thai Fried Rice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that have previously dined at the Sala Thong restaurant have mentioned that their Thai Fried Rice is excellent.

src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.So don't come for the food, but do stay for the atmosphere. 2.There was only another party in the area so it felt like we were by ourselves. U: I'd like the restaurant to be in the centre. S: Curry Garden meets your criteria. The address is 106 Regent Street City Centre. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Does it have a good atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It has a good atmosphere, although it can be a bit quiet at times, so the atmosphere's desirability depends upon what you are looking for in a dining experience. Do you have any other questions about Curry Garden?

src_text: reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.The staff was friendly and there is a great patio area. 2.Both the hostess and my waitress were extremely friendly and helpful throughout my stay. 3.There's a great view and the staff is dynamite. 4.I just wish the wait staff had the same level of charm. 5.However, we found our food to be subpar, and the service was quite slow. 6.Their fried rice was good, and service was also surprisingly good. 7.Our waitress was too busy to pay us any attention it seemed. reviews of NANDOS: 1.The only downside was the waitress had a bit of an attitude but that didn't spoil an otherwise fantastic evening. 2.All of the food was average at best, and the service we found to be quite slow. 3.Food is always fantastic, as is the service, and it's located right in the best part of town, walking distance from all the major attractions. [SEP] U: Are there any cheap restaurants in the south part of town? S: There are two choices in the South area serving cheap food. Do you prefer Portuguese or Chinese? U: I do not have a preference. S: Nandos is the Portuguese place, and The Lucky Star is Chinese.  Would you like more information on one or both of those? U: Do they have great service? S: <extra_id_0>

trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Autumn House rooms are big and spacious. The views from your room are a great place to view the sunset in the evenings overlooking the ocean and the sandy beach.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I need somewhere to stay. src_text: reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.The food aside, the restaurant has a great view of the city, and it makes for a really nice date spot. 2.To add to that though their foods and drinks are awesome and the view of the place is very relaxing and professional. 3.I just expected a more pleasant view. 4.I disliked mediocre food and views however, given that the location was good. 5.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 6.It's surprising the place was so affordable for a place that had such a nice view. 7.What I didn't like so much was that although the restaurant is in the nice part of town, the views are mediocre at best. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to some of the reviews left by previous guests the views are great and amazing.  However some other reviews stated that the views are mediocre at best.

trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They both get high marks for value from former guests. The Ashley did have a complaint that it was overpriced. Would you like to know more about either place?

src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The restaurant is in a really nice part of town with plenty of parking available, it's incredibly picturesque so you can enjoy an after meal walk. 2.It's in a nice, convenient location near town, and the foods were good. 3.The restaurant was in a very nice location, but despite that the view was very mediocre and the atmosphere was average at best. 4.Their location is lovely, right in the heart of the city. 5.They are in a great accessible location with easy parking. 6.The inside is not very modern but the location is easy to get to. src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was clean and comfortable and not expensive. 2.It could ruin your stay if you mind that kind of thing. 3.Sadly though, I found that the bed in the room wasn't very comfortable at all. 4.I do have to say, though, the bed is extremely uncomfortable. 5.and the interior of the room was very good and bed was also very much comfortable. src_text: FAQs of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.The YIPPE NOODLE BAR serves all forms of alcohol. reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.We enjoyed that the menu offered multiple different non-alcoholic drink options, but we did not like how the drinks were poor in taste. 2.While the service was quite slow, the drinks and foods were very high quality, and the restaurant was in a wonderful location. 3.Washed it all down with a nice cold beer. 4.The beer was decent. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yippee Noodle Bar says that they serve all forms of alcohol, as well as having non-alcoholic options. The beer is decent, and nice and cold.

src_text:
reviews of LA RAZA: 1.If you're looking for a cool, hip Spanish restaurant to visit for tapas and drinks, I wouldn't recommend La Raza because their drinks were frankly not well-prepared and tasted pretty mediocre. 2.La Raza has good food and drinks. 3.Though I'm more of a beer drinker and stuck with one of their top quality, full bodied Spanish craft beers, my boyfriend tried a glass of one of their expensive, top quality Sangrias and loved it. 4.I also ordered a beer, which seemed to be of great quality along with their other drink choices. 5.I liked the sangria and the portion was large for my tortilla espanola. reviews of LA TASCA: 1.We liked the food since it was very good, and drinks too. 2.The portions are large and affordable, but the food was kinda lacking and so were the drinks. 3.Would be better if they had better drinks though. 4.They make good drinks. 5.The Good:
- Large food portions at an affordable price
- High-quality food
- Great view
The Bad:
- Mediocre drinks
- Limited Drink Menu
Overall not a bad spot to hang out and have a couple appetizers. [SEP] U: I need help finding a place that serves spanish food and is located in the centre, can you help me? S: La Tasca and La Raza serve Spanish food in the centre of town.  What price range would you prefer. U: I would like to know which one has high quality drinks. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the La Tasca and the La Raza get mixed reviews on their drinks, mostly good though. Would you like to know more about either of them?

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.Apparently they're known for having great drinks, but I only had the one since they were pretty expensive. 2.We didn't try any drinks, because we thought they seemed overpriced. 3.While the drinks are reasonably priced they aren't very good. 4.However, the drinks were pricy if you like to drink and I left a bit on the hungry side as the portions are small. The Graffiti is a restaurant that serves British food. The phone number is 01223277977. Would you like to make a booking? U: Do they have highly value drink options that are good value? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Graffiti restaurant does serve alcoholic beverages that are generally considered to be overpriced and expensive.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Allenbell has amazing views that are very scenic from the balcony. The great views look even better than in the pictures.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.It was pretty annoying. 2.The only downside to the hotel was the noise. [SEP] U: Hello, can you recommend any architecture that I could see in the Centre of town, please? S: Definitely! All Saints Church is a great place to visit, and it's free! U: Could I have the address and phone number? S: Jesus lane and 01223452587. Do you need help with anything else? U: Yes I need to find a place to stay with a 4 star rating in the center of town please. S: We have alexander bed and breakfast guesthouse and university arms hotel, do you have an interest in either? U: Which one of those is in a quieter place? S: <extra_id_0>

trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests that stay at Alpha-Milton Guest House unanimously are pleased with the views, as they're considered worthwhile and amazing.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay. I'd like to stay in a guesthouse that doesn't need to include internet. S: There are a total of 24 guesthouses available. Acorn Guest House has a 4 star rating, offers free wifi and free parking. Would you be interested in booking here? U: Probably yes, if it has strong water pressure. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure recieved several complaints from guests, stating that it was too low and made showering difficult.

src_text: reviews of LA RAZA: 1.If you're looking for a cool, hip Spanish restaurant to visit for tapas and drinks, I wouldn't recommend La Raza because their drinks were frankly not well-prepared and tasted pretty mediocre. 2.La Raza has good food and drinks. 3.Though I'm more of a beer drinker and stuck with one of their top quality, full bodied Spanish craft beers, my boyfriend tried a glass of one of their expensive, top quality Sangrias and loved it. 4.I also ordered a beer, which seemed to be of great quality along with their other drink choices. 5.I liked the sangria and the portion was large for my tortilla espanola. FAQs of LA RAZA: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at La Raza. [SEP] U: I am looking for a Thursday departure for a train going to Cambridge. S: To help you better with your travel plans, where are you planning on departing from? U: I am looking to depart from Birmingham new street after 12:45 S: There is a train leaving Birmingham New Street heading to Cambridge at 13.40. U: Great can I get the train ID, price, and arrival time for that one? S: Sure! The Train ID is TR7509.  The price is 75.10 poinds.  It arrives by 16.23.  Would you like for me to book it for you? U: I don't need train booking. I do need to find a cheap Spanish restaurant, though. S: La Raza is a cheap Spanish restaurant in the center of town. Do you need their address or perhaps I could make a reservation for you? U: Can you be most certain La Raza serves Sangria of superior quality? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Alcohol is served at La Raza. Beer is highly rated there. One guest said they really enjoyed their sangria.

src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.The restaurant had a beautiful view from the window of a nice part of town. 2.The view from our table was pretty disappointing, we couldn't see anything except all the other diners. 3.The food was of good quality , you had a nice view but i didn't like the food portion 4.We got seated extremely quickly and were given an amazing view of the cities skyline while we ordered and ate. [SEP] U: I want to find a restaurant in the north part of town that serves christmas food. S: There are no restaurants that seve Christmas food. U: How about asian oriental food? S: Saigon city serves Asian oriental food as is in the north part of town. U: Does it have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unless seated at one of the worse tables, diners at the Saigon City restaurant can expect to see beautiful views of the city skyline from the window.

src_text: reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.What I didn't like was the location. 2.Stazione is easy to overlook because the location isn't great - hard to find parking and crowded in the evening. 3.I love almost everything about this place: the food tastes authentic and well-prepared; the wine was delicious; the prices are really affordable; and the location of the restaurant is so close to home that I can get there in less than ten minutes time. 4.I like the location as it is convenient and the view is nice. [SEP] U: Are there any guest houses currently available iin the moderately priced range? S: Yes, I have 15 hotels that meet your needs. Would you like to narrow your search by area? U: yes I would like to be in the north with the same requirements, thank you S: I have nine guesthouses fitting this description. Do you have a preference on free wifi or parking? U: It really doesn't matter but I'll need to know if the particular hotel has free parking and internet please. S: That's completely fine!  Of the 9, 7 of them have 4 stars.  6 of those 7 have internet and parking. Would you like me to book one for you? U: I will hold off on the booking for now but thank you. I am also looking for a particular restaurant called stazione restaurant and coffee bar. Can you give me details? S: There is an italian restaurant by that name that is quite expensive. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Stazione Restaurant and Coffee bar is in a convenient location according to some, but others say it is hard to find parking and it's crowded. I don't know anything about the nightlife nearby, sorry.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. U: The price doesn't matter are there any 3 star places available? S: the lensfield hotel is a 3 star hotel in the south and gonville hotel is a 3 star hotel in the centre U: What is the price range and phone number of the gonville hotel? S: The phone number is 01223366611. It is expensive. U: Do they have strong water pressure in their showers? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ONE SEVEN: 1.The food was of good quality, affordable for drinks price, Various gluten-free options and a nice indoor d√©cor but i didn't like the Mediocre service and  view 2.The view here is nice and you can see lots of attractions outside, but I hated that I had to wait a while for my food and the service seemed, how to put it... lacking.... [SEP] U: Hi, I am traveling to Cambridge and am so excited to try some of your local restaurants.  Can you help me choose one? S: Sure can, what type of food would you like? U: I would love to find a good british place in the centre of town. S: There are 11 British Resturants in centre. What price point would you like? U: I'd like one in the moderate price range, please. S: Excellent. I have 5 options for you. Restaurant One Seven is a moderately priced British restaurant on Regent Street. Would you like the phone number? U: Does it have good service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, unfortunately, one aspect in which all previous guests agree, is that the Restaurant One Seven's service is lacking and mediocre.

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.Their drinks are alright. 2.My boyfriend and I tried the curry wurst and fondue It was fresh and authentic.. We also got some beer that was just alright. 3.The only issue was that the drinks were just mediocre, they were small for the price. FAQs of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.Alimentum serves alcohol. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for a guesthouse to stay at in the south area of Cambridge. Can you help me? S: I have three of them 2 that are moderate priced and 1 that is cheap. Do you have a preference? U: Can you book that for 7 people for 5 nights starting on friday? S: Your reference number is 7HHYRFA1. Can I help you with anything else? U: I am also looking for a place to eat that is in the same area as the hotel and the same price range. S: Sure, I have two moderately priced restaurants in the south. They are pizza hut cherry hinton and restaurant alimentum. Do either interest you? U: Can you get us a table at Restaurant Alimentum at 11:30 on Friday? S: I was able to book your table for Friday at 11:30 for 7 people, your reference number is EO14CHVW.  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Will this place have fine beer selections? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Restaurant Alimentum does have alcohol available for you to purchase. The beer is said to be mediocre as is the rest of their drinks selection.

src_text: reviews of ALPHA-MILTON GUEST HOUSE: 1.They just aren't comfortable and they feel hard. 2.The beds are not very good. 3.Everybody was in agreement, that the beds provided at this location were extremely comfortable and nobody wanted to get up in the morning. 4.Sleep was quiet but the bed could have been more comfortable. src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The view outside of my window was exquisite and beautiful. 2.I really liked the sunrise view at breakfast. 3.I enjoyed spending time here with my girl, as we took in the great view. 4.Talk about a place with a fantastic view, truly amazing. 5.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: Hi there. Can you help me find a train leaving on Friday? S: Please tell me what town are you departing from and what is your destination? U: On Friday, I would like to arrive in Cambridge by 16:45. S: There are over 100 trains available, could you please provide a departure location? U: I would like to leave from london kings cross. S: ok I have one leaving by 05:17, TR5219, would that be fine? U: Do you have one that arrives a little closer to 16:45. I don't want to get in too early. S: TR8842 will get you there at 16:08.  May I book it for you? U: Yes, I need it for 8 people.  I'm also looking for a guesthouse type hotel with free parking in the moderate range. S: Do you have a preference for the number of stars or the area? U: May I have a reference number for that train, please? S: Your reference number is RRNTTR7Z. We also have quite a few guesthouses, do you have an area you'd like? U: For the guesthouse, do you have one in the moderate price range that includes free parking? S: There are 12 options for moderately priced guesthouses, any area preference? U: The area doesn't matter. I just need one with rooms available for 3 nights starting on Friday. S: For how many people? U: I need it to be for 2 people. S: The Acorn Guest House on 154 Chesterton Road should be sufficient, shall I reserve a room for you now? U: Do you know if the showers in the rooms are high pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests have said that the water pressure is not very good and is hard to get use to.  Others have said that it is nothing to write home about.

src_text: reviews of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.I also highly recommend their list of wines, which is extensive and full of high quality options. 2.I liked the quality of drinks and food at the restaurant. 3.They said that the food was very tasty, and my wife and I did enjoy our alcoholic beverages. 4.I enjoyed my food but it was disappointing that there were so many drink options but they were pretty mediocre. 5.The drinks were at least very good so that made up for how long it took for them. 6.On the plus side, they had affordable prices, great quality foods, great drinks, and the service was great. FAQs of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.Yes, alcohol is available in the menu. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for an expensive restaurant on the south side of town. S: Frankie and Bennys serves Italian food, it is in the South Part of town, and the price range is expensive. Can I help you with anything else? U: Does the place have Pinot Noir that is of high quality? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure how good their Pinot noir is, but customers did mention that their list of wines was highly recommended. Some people did feel that their drink selection was mediocre though. Do you have any other questions?

src_text: reviews of CURRY KING: 1.The location was perfect and easy to get to and there was a lot of parking available. 2.Given the location, I just wish the views was better. 3.Will definitely eat here again due to nice and convenient location. 4.Additionally, it's a bit off the beaten path and not exactly easy to find. 5.I was surprised by how nice the location was but the drinks were expensive. 6.It's in one of the best parts of town too. [SEP] U: I'm looking for info about the curry king restaurant. S: It is in the centre of town, the expensive price range, their phone number is 01223324351and they are at 5 Jordans Yard Bridge Street City Centre U: Is it a nice location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Although the Curry King restaurant may be a bit off the beaten path for some, it's considered a nice location by most.

src_text: FAQs of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.There are outdoor seats available. reviews of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.I enjoyed the outdoor seating and my server was very attentive. [SEP] U: I have the name of a restaurant that I need some help finding, whenever you're ready. S: I'm ready. U: It is the Seasame Restaurant and Bar. S: I'm sorry but I was unable to find the restaurant you requested. Is there a type of food you were thinking about having? U: I misspelled the place it is sesame, can you look that up again and book 3 poeple at 17:00 on monday if available? S: Gladly. I have a table reserved for you at the Sesame Restaurant and bar for Monday at 17:00. Your reference is 5OEIV10L. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Can I reserve an outdoor table? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Sesame Restaurant and Bar has outdoor seating available which has been described as enjoyable, so yes.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The bathrooms were spotless, and modern. 2.I had to ask them to clean the bathroom again. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The bathroom was also exceptionally clean when we first checked in to the room. 2.Furthermore, I noticed that the bathrooms were not recently cleaned and it appeared that somebody had used them prior to my partner and I. 3.And lastly, I found that the bathrooms and other restroom facilities were pristine and clean. 4.I hate to say anything negative but if I had to nitpick something it was that the bathroom wasn't as clean as I would have liked and the water pressure was low. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a restaurant in the town centre that serves British food. S: There are 7 restaurants in the centre of town that serves British food. Is there any particular price range you are looking for? U: Yes, I'm looking for a moderately priced restaurant with British food. S: I can recommend Restaurant One Seven. Would you like to book a table with them? U: Sure. I will be booking 3 people at 17:45 on Wednesday. Could i also get the reference number, please? S: Your reservation is complete for a party of 3 at 17:45 at a British Restaurant  One Seven in centre, and your confirmation # is VLJLK60E. U: I also need a hotel in the same price range as the restaurant. S: There are 18 hotels in the Moderate price range, would you like me to narrow these down by searching other amenities or location? U: I would like something that is 2 stars and includes free parking. S: I have 2 options with those specifications. The Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge both with free wifi and parking. Which would you prefer? U: Which one has the cleanest bathrooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Lovell Lodge has original and clean bathroom which have been thoroughly cleaned including other restroom facilities.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. If that's acceptable to you, I'll go ahead and book it for you. U: No, that won't be necessary. Can you also help me find a place to stay at? S: sure, do you know what you're looking for? src_text: reviews of LIMEHOUSE: 1.The good breakfast options and super friendly staff more than made up for the missing safe. 2.That said, the breakfast was very mediocre, and there was no service to store my luggage. 3.In the mornings, despite our hectic schedules, the provided breakfast options were extremely delicious. FAQs of LIMEHOUSE: 1.A continental breakfast is offered at Limehouse with no charge. [SEP] U: Hi I am looking for a hotel called limehouse. S: Limehouse is a moderately priced guesthouse with 4 stars located North of cambridge. Their phone number is 01223300552. How else can I assist you today? U: Does this hotel have a large amount of breakfast choices? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, most people said that they had a good breakfast with good options. Only one person said it was a bit mediocre.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I also found that the bed was super comfortable to sleep in. 2.My room itself was extremely large and I felt extremely comfortable staying in this room. 3.The bed was also more comfortable than I expected. 4.But still, I appreciated the great view from my window, overlooking the nearby lake, and the room itself was very clean with a seriously comfortable bed. S: If you'd like something cheap, I recommend the Allenbell. For something moderately priced, I would recommend the Warkworth House. U: Could you book the Wartworth for one night, 1 person? S: What day will you be staying? U: Does the room have a comfortable bed? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Warkworth House is said to have really comfortable beds. I didn't find any negative reviews about them, only positive ones.

src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.If you are really hungry I recommend trying the full English breakfast as well as it is a great way to sample it all. 2.The portions were big which would be a plus except that I didn't want to take them home, they were so bad. 3.The food was very high quality and the portions were generous. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Cotto restaurant is known for serving decent food portions that are an added plus as well as generous.

src_text: reviews of WAGAMAMA: 1.Of course, all that good stuff comes at a significant price point, but that's probably the only bad thing about it. 2.I got a beer for a drink, which proved to be quite affordable. 3.The foods were all spectacular and tantalizing, and the beer was fresh, crisp, and quite affordable. src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was no more than a few noises I heard during my entire stay, I was able to keep my head clear. 2.I stayed here with my family, and we were able to get a good night's rest, as it was very quiet. 3.I mean they are like home comfortable, and also it's very quiet so we didn't have to worry about any loud noises. 4.This place definitely delivered in that regard. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 2.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 2.The location ended up being not good though, because it was far from the bar I was going to. 3.My only dislikes were the poor location within the city, as well as the poor and outdated deocr on the inside of the restaurant. 4.If you're in the mood for Italian food, I would pass on Prezzo, which although in a great section of town with breathtaking views, is quite pricey and has very average foods. src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.I was deeply impressed by the sea view in front of the hotel, which was great and magnificent. 2.But the best was the great view. 3.The view was stunning and so much better than I even expected. 4.It was just incredible! src_text: reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.The service was a bit slow and I wish they had more options for drinks. 2.Our server was great, really friendly and helpful. 3.The highlight was the service was really good because the staff were super friendly and were there to take care of my needs and the location was in a good area of town. 4.The service was great as we were helped as soon as we walked in and seated immediately. 5.The staff are super friendly, especially our server Laura. 6.The food came in pretty quickly as well after ordering. 7.The wait staff could certainly be more friendly but the location is great as is the view from the patio. 8.The staff are all kind and courteous. reviews of HAKKA: 1.She kept the drinks flowing, which we loved! 2.The food was ok and the beer was definitely overpriced, however the service was excellent! 3.Our waiter was very attentive. 4.Don't visit this place for the view, which is non-existent, but go there for the absolutely stellar service and warm, welcoming atmosphere - along with some of the best Chinese food you've ever tasted. 5.The service was great, food was superb, and on top of that the food and drinks were so cheap! reviews of THE HOTPOT: 1.We both enjoyed the service, convenient downtown location, and high-quality food. 2.We had to wait 15 minutes for our check. 3.It took us a while to be served. 4.Overall, the service was great and food tasted fresh and delightful. 5.The service is not the best either. 6.The only downside of the Hotpot was the slow service. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a hotel called city centre north b and b please? S: Yes, it's a guesthouse in the north part of town with cheap prices. Do you want me to book it for you? U: yes, please. 2 people for 3 nights starting on wednesday S: The booking was successful, your reservation number is OOMOE6L0. Is there anything else I can help you with? src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I was greeted immediately and treated like a guest in someone's home. 2.They were great the whole stay. 3.The staff was exceptional. 4.From the moment we checked in, the staff's friendly attitude was evident. reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.Room service was available, and the food was very unique and delicious, and the staff that brought it to us were always super friendly and professional. 2.Also the staffs were well trained, they helped me with the things that I needed and were polite at all times asking me what they could do more for me. reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.The staff was patient and helpful. 2.The staff was helpful and they were interested in our comfort. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.I did not find the staff very responsive or helpful. 2.When attempting to troubleshoot my issue with staff, they were disrespectful and rude. 3.Another added merit was that the hotel staff was very friendly and polite. src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The food was delicious but the drinks tasted flat. 2.The drinks were reasonably priced and the food was absolutely amazing, it both looked and tasted amazing, especially the spring rolls, possibly the best spring rolls I've ever tasted.. 3.The food and drinks were exceptional We had the Banh Cuon and Com Tam. 4.My beverage was so-so at best, but at least the drinks were cheap and there were lots of non-alcoholic options . 5.I thought the food and drinks were affordable. 6.The drink selection was expansive but pricey, and what I ordered did not stand out in any way. 7.They have good prices on drinks and good portions on meals. 8.After dinner I decided to order a drink, but was quite disappointed. 9.I found it to be a bit expensive for what was provided, especially compared to the delicious food. 10.Unfortunately the same can't be said for the drinks. 11.Thanh Binh also has a pretty great menu of specialty drinks with really reasonable and affordable prices, which is great because their non-alcoholic menu leaves a lot to be desired. src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.Restaurant Alimentum is a good place for European dishes at a good price. 2.We were a little disappointed in the price of the drinks, but I guess considering how reasonable the food prices are, they had to raise costs somewhere. 3.The goulash was so good that I wanted more after I was done, even though I was full, and the price was cheap as dirt. 4.My partner and I split a quiche and tapas, which came out to less than $30 for both of us - very reasonable price, especially considering the quality. 5.All and all it was a great experience with friendly waiters and food wasn't too expensive and a truly European experience. Would you like to narrow it down by rating or amenities? U: I would like somewhere with a 4 star rating at moderate price range S: I have 7 hotels that meet that criteria. Will you be needing internet? U: I won't need wifi, but I would like it to be a guest house. S: what about acorn guest house? U: Do you know if that location has showers with high water pressure?  Because that's what I would like. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews for water pressure at the Acorn aren't good. Guests said it was low and nothing to write home about. Would you like me to look elsewhere for a place with better ratings?

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I am hoping to get information about some places to go in the centre of town. S: Great saint mary's church is an architecture site in the centre of town. U: Can I get the address please? S: Great saint mary's is located at market square and the entrance fee is 2 pounds. May I help you with anything else? U: I'm also looking for somewhere to stay. S: What ammenities do you need for your hotel ? U: I would like it to be in the moderate price range and include wifi. S: I found quite a few. What area would you like it to be in? U: Do you have anything near my attraction in the centre part of town? S: Yes, there is one. It is cityroomz. Want me to book it for you? U: Do their showers have good water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the water pressure at Cityroomz has been said to be fairly low, and is not satisfactory for showering or washing hands.

src_text: reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.I was glad that they have a pretty extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options, because I did try one cocktail and found it to be pretty mediocre. 2.Speaking of drinks, this isn't a place I would recommend if you have kids who want a lot of soda options, because their non-alcoholic menu is pretty limited. 3.Their non-alcoholic drink menu is actually pretty impressive, too, which is something that rarely stands out at restaurants. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant in the moderate price range and in the centre of town. S: There are 21 restaurants in the centre of town in the moderate price range. U: Ok, how about chinese food? S: Yes, I recommend the Ian Hong House in the centre. Should I reserve a table for you? U: Can you check their menu and see if they have a selection of non alcoholic drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They do seem to have a large nonalcoholic menu, however there are not a lot of soda options if that is what you are looking for.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. [SEP] U: I am looking forward to try a local restaurant in Cambridge and I have clowns cafe particularly in my mind. Can you assist to book a table for me? S: I would be happy to help you book a table.  What day do you need your reservation? U: I would like it for Sunday. S: I need some additional information before I can book the table. How many people will be dining and at what time? U: Oh, I'll need a table for 5 at 11:45 on Sunday. S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number is : RMG9GA7O. U: Thank you, I also need to find a hotel with free wifi. S: I'll be glad to help with that. Do you have a preference for the area or the price? U: some place in the north with a 2 star rating. S: The Ashley Hotel on Chesterton Road meets that criteria. How does that sound? U: Do you know if the rooms there have good views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the rooms at The Ashley Hotel do have good views. Past guests have described the view as beautiful.

src_text: reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.The drinks were really affordable which was surprising, and there were lots of non alcoholic choices. 2.I found myself staring at a wall most of the time, and a lot of the drinks had alcohol in it. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip in Cambridge S: I can help you find what you are looking for. U: Thank you! Can you help me find a train to Norwich, please? S: Yes if you can tell me where you will leaving from and what day and time? U: I'll be leaving Cambridge on Monday at 9 PM. S: Train 2662 leaves Cambridge at 21:36 and arrives in Norwich at 22:55.  Would you like me to book a ticket for you? U: I need the train to arrive by 21:00.  Is there one at that time? S: May I recommend the TR9246 train arriving at 20:55 U: yes book that for 3 people please S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 52.8 GBP payable at the station .Reference number is : 8L54O12B. U: I am now looking to dine at mahal of cambridge S: Would you like more info or for me to book it? U: what kind of food do they serve and how expensive is it? S: It is a cheap Indian restaurant. Would you like to book a table? U: No. I think that is all. S: Is there anything else I can assist you with today? U: Are there a lot of drinks with no alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that have previously dined at the Mahal of Cambridge regard their menu of non-alcoholic drinks as plentiful.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I would like to come visit cambridge and need a train. S: Where will you be departing from? U: I am leaving from Birmingham New Street and want to leave on Tuesday. S: Sure, is there a particular time you'd like to either arrive or leave by? U: I need a train that will leave after 12:15 please. S: TR0734 leaves at 12:40, would that be okay? U: Yes, can you please make a booking for 4 people? S: Okay, I've done that for you. Your reference number is G1ZZIBBD U: Thank you. I'm also looking for a hotel called cityroomz. S: I've found cityroomz.  Would you like a room booked? U: Before I book can you tell me if they have high pressure showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the water pressure is poor at Cityroomz. Shall I search for another hotel option for you instead?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 2.I had a great view of the mountains. 3.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. [SEP] U: I am looking for information on the hamilton lodge hotel. S: The Hamilton Lodge is located in the northern part of town. It has three stars and moderate pricing. Would you like the address and phone number? U: Do the rooms look out on a pretty area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for this location, the views have been described as very nice, great, enjoyable, and surprisingly good.

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.The food did come in big portions so I was able to eat leftovers for days. 2.I had it with some naan and rice, and there was plenty of food even for two. 3.I only wish each portion had been bigger! 4.It was the size of a large plate and came with fresh fruit and other toppings so I could choose what I wanted on it. 5.You get a large portion and the food is good. 6.I paired the quiche with their waffle was gigantic. 7.We also liked the complimentary salads, which turned out to be necessary because the portion sizes are a little small. reviews of PIZZA HUT CHERRY HINTON: 1.In addition, the portions of foods were generous. 2.I ate more when I got home...Other than that the food wasn't expensive and tasted yummy. 3.Portions are huge. 4.It was delicious but I left still hungry because the portions were so small. [SEP] U: I am looking for a moderate priced restaurant in the south part of town. Could you recommend me three restaurants? S: Pizza Hut Cherry Hinton is a moderately priced Italian restaurant in the south of town, and Restaurant Alimentum is a moderately priced modern european restaurant in the south of town. U: Which of those has the most plentiful portions? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both places have mixed reviews on the portions with some saying the ports were huge and others saying they left hungry because the portions were so small. I would guess it depends on what's ordered. Would you like me to find another place that serves large portions?

src_text: reviews of BEDOUIN: 1.The quality of food and drinks were good and the service was great. 2.The quality was also high and looked sophisitcated. 3.My beer was just okay and seemed to be priced higher that similar restaurants. FAQs of BEDOUIN: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at Bedouin. [SEP] U: Hello, I'd like some information on a restaurant in the centre. S: I have many types of restaurants in the center. What type of cuisine are you looking for? U: I would like african food. S: I highly recommend bedouin located at 100 Mill Road City Centre. It is in the expensive range. Would you like me to book you a table? U: Is the Bedouin well known for its beer quality? That's important. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Bedouin does serve alcohol. The quality is high. Please remember it is an expensive restaurant and the beer will be priced accordingly.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip in Cambridge. S: OK, and how can I help you? U: I need to find a hotel in Cambridge. S: Any particular location or price range? U: Yes I would like to stay in an expensive hotel in the city center. S: University Arms is available. U: What's their address and star rating? And do they have free parking? S: University Arms Hotel Star rating is 4. Should i go ahead and book that for you? U: Does this hotel offer rooms with a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for this location, the view has been described as great, enjoyable, and picturesque!

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 2.The staff is also a joy to interact with, one of the most important parts of any stay. 3.We were greeted with very friendly staff. [SEP] U: I am looking for a cheap hotel with free parking. S: I can definitely help you out with that. Is there a certain area of town you'd like to stay in? U: I would prefer to be in the centre of town, and I need the hotel to include free parking. S: Alexander bed and breakfast is a guesthouse in town centre in the cheap price range. It has both free parking and wifi. Would you like to book a room? U: Can you make sure the staff is friendly S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, the staff at that location is friendly, a joy to interact with, and goes out of their way to be nice.

src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.The restaurant had a beautiful view from the window of a nice part of town. 2.The view from our table was pretty disappointing, we couldn't see anything except all the other diners. 3.The food was of good quality , you had a nice view but i didn't like the food portion 4.We got seated extremely quickly and were given an amazing view of the cities skyline while we ordered and ate. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to dine S: There are many different options in town! Do you have a particular type of food and price range in mind? U: Expensive is what I am looking for. I don't have a preference for the exact type of food. S: There is Saigon City which is asian oriental located in chesterton U: Do they have an excellent view of the city at the restaurant? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, you get an excellent view of the city skyline. Would you like to make a reservation or do you have any more questions?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: I am hoping you can help me with my planning.  I am trying to find information on the trains. S: I can definitely help you with that.  Can you give me more information, like your departure and destination preferences? U: I will be departing from Stansted Airport to go to Cambridge on Wednesday. S: I am getting the information up now, do you have a specific arrival or departure time? U: I would like to arrive by 13:15. S: TR6386 departs at 12:24 and arrives by 12:52. Would you like a ticket? U: No. Can you help me find a very cheap, not shabby hotel that has free parking? S: I have a lot of great choices to offer you. Do you have a preference to what part of Cambridge you'd like to stay in? U: itshould be in the centre S: There are two guesthouses: Alexander Bed and Breakfast, and El Shaddai. Would you like to stay in one of those guesthouses? U: Which one of them has free wifi? S: Both facilities do. U: book for 2 people for 2 nights from wednesday S: I made your reservation for 2 people for 2 nights starting Wednesday at the Alexander Bed & Breakfast. Your reference number is 8JX02F2T. Is there anything else I can do? U: Is their strong water pressure in the showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure in the showers at Alexander Bed and Breakfast is unfortunately low. Is there anything else I can do?

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. [SEP] U: I need to find entertainment in the centre. S: There are currently no entertainment locations in the centre of town. U: Hm. Okay. well how about a boat attraction? S: I'd recommend scudamores punting co on granta place, mill lane, cb21rs. Their phone number is 01223359750. Will that be all? U: No, I think that will be it. Cheers. S: Enjoy your boat ride, Thank you and have a great day! U: I will. After the boat ride I'll need a place to put my head down so please find me a moderately priced hotel S: There are 18 hotels that fall withing that range, any other preferences to narrow the search? U: Someplace on the north side of town, please. S: Any other preferences to narrow the search? U: Actually, whatever you have would be great. I'm not picky. But I will need to reserve a room for Sunday. S: I would suggest Acorn Guest House, it is rated 4 starts and has free parking and internet. How many people will be staying in the room? U: i need a hotel, not a guesthouse S: Okay, I found the Ashley Hotel rated 4 stars and the Lovell Lodge rated 2 stars. Both are priced moderate and both have wifi and parking. Which do you prefer? U: Which of the two hotels has the option to book a room with a view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Ashley Hotel has great views from its rooms, so that's a good choice for you. Would you like me to book you a room?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The breakfast options were plentiful, too. 2.In the morning, we were offered great breakfast choices, which we enjoyed. 3.In the morning I had breakfast and they had lots of things to choose from. 4.We have very different tastes in food, and we were both satisfied with what was available. FAQs of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The Hamilton Lodge offers a full English breakfast. 2.The Hamilton Lodge does not offer a free breakfast. You need to pay 10 GBP per person. [SEP] U: Can you tell me where the restaurant Tandoori Palace is located? S: Tandoori Palace is in the west, address 68 Histon Road Chesterton, postcode cb43le. U: Great, could you reserve me a table for 1 on Sunday at 18:15 please? S: I've done it. The reference number is LPNKZ7V5. Anything else I can do for you? U: I'm also looking for Hamilton Lodge. Do you have any information on it? S: It is a moderately priced guesthouse in the north. U: Do they have a nice variety of breakfast items to choose from? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, while the breakfast may not be free of charge, when staying at Hamilton Lodge on should expect a variety of satisfying options.

src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.The food quality was amazing, the Various non-alcoholic drink options was great, you had a Nice view but you had  no vegetarian option and bad Mediocre drinks 2.Tried some of their beer too, which was excellent, and I was glad to see that they had a pretty extensive menu of non-alcoholic drinks. reviews of HK FUSION: 1.The only thing I really disliked was the limited options for non-alcoholic beverages. 2.I don't drink alcohol and had to have water with my meal which was really unfortunate. [SEP] U: Could you help me find an expensive asian oriental restaurant? S: There are two restaurants. One located in the North area and Centre area. Which one would you prefer? U: Let's go with the centre. I need a reservation for 2 at 13:30 on Thursday. S: I am sorry there are no tables available,can I help you find another place to eat? U: I need a different restaurant in the same area and price range please. S: I could try Little Seoul, which is Korean, or possibly HK Fusion Chinese. If you want.  Would you like me to? U: Please choose a place with a variety of non-alcoholic beverages on the menu. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Little sepul has way more options. Some complained about the drinks just being average. But here is a wide array od non alcohol to choose from.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. [SEP] U: I am looking for an expensive restaurants in the west side of town. S: fantastic, i have nine options for you U: Do any of them serve European food? S: cambridge lodge restaurant does.can i book for you? U: No, but I'd like the address if you can give it to me. S: It is Cambridge Lodge Hotel 139 Huntingdon Road City Centre. U: Thanks!  I'll also be needing a place to stay.  A hotel in the south, preferably also in the expensive range. S: the lensfield hotel is a 3 stars and is located in the south U: no i wanted a 4 star hotel S: unfortunately, i don't have anything in that area that has a 4 star rating. U: Could you check in the north maybe? S: I do not have any in either area. Would you like to change or restate your perimeters? Then I can check again. U: Try the west, I meant to say that instead of north. S: There is the huntingdon marriott hotel would you like me to book you a room there? U: Does the room have a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There was only one guest that provided comments about the view at the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel and they found it to be likeable.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.And the cleanliness was really impeccable. 2.The bathroom was really clean upon check in as well. 3.I was happy with the clean bathroom, and overall I think I got a good value for my money. 4.The bathroom on the other hand needed a good clean. 5.Both the room and bathroom were really clean and well appointed. [SEP] U: I am looking for information in Cambridge S: What type of information can I help you with? U: I'll be leaving from Ely on Tuesday after 17:45. Are there any trains available then? S: The earliest train that days leaves at 19:35 will this work? U: Yes that works. What is the arrival time and price please? S: If you take the train departing Ely at 19:35 you will arrive by 19:52, and the cost is 4.40. U: Thanks! I'm also looking for a 4-star accommodation with free wifi. S: We have quite a few to choose from. Do you have a preference in price range or the area of town? U: Well, price should be in the moderate but i do want a 4 star hotel. S: I have no hotels in this area, only guesthouses. Would that work? U: that's fine, can you book one? S: I would recommend avalon, which is a 4 star guesthouse in the north. Will that work for you? U: Does it have a clean bathroom? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The cleanliness of the bathrooms at the Avalon are widely regarded as in impeccable condition by the staff.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant that serves Turkish food. S: There are 3 Turkish restaurants in the centre, what is your price range? U: I'm not picky about the price.  Could you recommend one and give me the price range? S: Sure. I recommend Efes Restaurant. It's menu is moderately priced and easy on the wallet. U: I also need a guesthouse with 4 stars. S: Which side of town would you prefer? U: In the same area as the restaurant, centre.  In prefer a cheap price range. S: The alexander bed and breakfast meets your needs and has breakfast!  Need a reservation? U: Is it next to any fun sightseeing attractions? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It doesn't sound like it. I found a lot of reviews is that it wasn't close to anything, but I did find a few that said it was very accessible.

src_text: reviews of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.I have to say though that the atmosphere of this place leaves a lot to be desired. reviews of RESTAURANT ONE SEVEN: 1.Upon arrival I really liked the d√©cor and setting of the place. 2.It set a great atmosphere for relaxing. [SEP] U: I am looking for a moderate priced restaurant while I am visiting. S: Is location a concern? U: Yeah, I'd like to stay in the centre of town. S: There are over 20 results. Would you like a certain type of food? U: Thank you! I don't care what kind of cuisine they serve. S: There's a fantastic British restaurant, Restaurant One Seven. Or  if you're interested in Chinese food, Jinling Noodle Bar also has wonderful reviews. Do either of those interest you? U: Do they have a good atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.The sunset was really beautiful out on the balcony! 2.I was alone so I did not need much but it was very clean and had a nice view I enjoyed. 3.The room is big and I had a great view of the sunset. 4.The view was great - overlooked the ocean and was right by the beach. [SEP] U: I'm looking for information on the Autumn House. Can you help me out? S: Autumn House is a cheap guesthouse with a 4 star rating on the east side of town. Do you need additional information or want to book a room? U: Do they have a nice view there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, it does. Past guests of Autumn House said that the view was very nice of the ocean and the sunset.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I hate to say anything negative but if I had to nitpick something it was that the bathroom wasn't as clean as I would have liked and the water pressure was low. [SEP] U: I want to find a place to eat Chinese in the cheap price range. S: I have 3 chinese restaurants located in city centre that meet your price range request.  Can I book one for you? U: Not today, can you recommend one of them to me? S: i recomend golden house. it is in the centre in 12 lensfield road city centre. can i give you the address U: I would like to book a table there. S: For what time? U: book a table for 6 people at 17:00 on saturday and give me reference number S: The reference number for you reservation is BCYNHP5W. U: Thanks! I'm also looking to stay at a hotel called Lovell Lodge, can you help me with that? S: The Lovell Lodge is a moderately priced 2 star hotel in the north part of town.  Would you like me to book it for you? U: Yes for 6 people, 3 nights on Saturday. S: I am very sorry, the system for booking hotel rooms seems to be down.  Can I do anything else for you today? U: Try it again. Also, does The Lovell Lodge have strong water pressure in the showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Lovell Lodge has low water pressure. Can I find out any other information about them for you today?

S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.The room was very big, which was surprising. 2.We have a big group and the space was appreciated! 3.We were thrilled with the big room. 4.The room was a bit small, so I felt a tiny cramped in there, and the water pressure could have been a lot better. 5.The room was also much bigger than expected, and there were great breakfast options to make everyone in the family happy. 6.And lastly, the room itself was extremely large and comfortable. 7.The room was large and airy. src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. 2.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 3.Everything was top notch and the beds were really comfortable. 4.I mean they are like home comfortable, and also it's very quiet so we didn't have to worry about any loud noises.
