src_text: FAQs of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Yes, the restaurant does serve alcohol. reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Lots of foods and drinks to choose from here. 2.I had the cabernet sauvignon but it tasted a little flat and I would rate it average at best. 3.They have lots of drinks to choose from so it was easy for my daughter to decide what she wanted to drink. 4.I do have to praise their high quality drinks and food, because everything tastes amazing and is expertly-prepared. [SEP] U: I am traveling to Cambridge and am looking for the restaurant called Da Vinci Pizzeria. S: I have found that restaurant for you, would you like the address? U: Yes, can I get the address and phone number please? S: The phone number is 01223351707 and the address is 20 Milton Road Chesterton U: Do they serve alcohol? I want champagne. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, they do serve alcohol, but I'm not sure if they specifically have champagne. Do you have any other questions for me?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I need a train for Tuesday that will leave at 2:15. S: there are 2,828 trains with you description, would you kindly specify where it is you are going where from and time U: I'm going from cambridge to broxbourne on tuesday after 12:15, what are my options for that? S: There are 11 different trains what time would you like to arrive? U: I don't care much about arrival time but I need to leave sometime after 12:15, please. S: TR5802 leaves at 13:01, will that work for you? U: Yes that works. I need a booking for 6 people. S: You are booked on TR5802. Your reference number is PEGFA2WO. The total fee is 107.4 GBP. Do you need help with anything else? U: I'm looking for the alexander bed and breakfast, could you get me the postcode and phone number? S: Certainly.  Their phone number in 01223525725, postcode cb12de.  Shall I book rooms for you at the guesthouse? U: How far is it from the Railway Station? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I do not know its proximity to the Railway Station, but past guests give mixed reviews as to the convenience of the location overall.

src_text: reviews of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.We chowed down on spring rolls, kung pao chicken, ma po tofu, and sweet and sour pork - and believe me when I say that we could have ordered more, because the menu prices are super affordable, including their drinks menu. 2.All of the food was high quality and was affordable. [SEP] U: I need a taxi to take me to the hotel from the airport now, can you give me the number to call? S: What specific time do you want to leave? U: Never mind. I'm looking for a guesthouse to stay at. It must be in the north and 4 stars. S: The Acorn Guest House is in the north and is rated 4 stars. U: Okay great. Could I have their postcode and phone number? S: The phone number for Acorn Guest House is 01223353888. The postal code is cb41da. Is there anything else I may help you with? U: Yes I am looking for information on the Sesame Restaurant and Bar. S: The sesame restaurant and bar serves Chinese food, located in the centre area at Hills Road City Centre, postal code cb21nw17. You can contact them at this phone number, 01223358899. U: Do they have spring rolls with good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Previous customers have stated that the spring rolls are of high quality, and are very affordable to buy.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.Also, the Wi-Fi was extremely slow. 2.This is very frustrating when you are trying to work and the delay is huge. 3.Also, the fast wi-fi was a huge plus for work I had to work to do on my laptop. FAQs of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.Wifi is free at Ashley Hotel. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip to Cambridge. I was hoping to find the attraction called magdalene college. S: Magdalene College is located in the west part of Cambridge. What information would you like about the college? U: I'd like the postcode and address, please. S: Magdalene College is located on Magdalene Street with a postcode of CB30AG. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: I'd like to find the Ashley Hotel, please. S: The Ashley Hotel is a moderately priced hotel on the north side of town. Would you like assistance booking a room there? U: Yes. I'd like to book a room on Friday for 2 nights for 7 people. S: That booking was unsuccessful. Would you like to try a different day, or a different length of stay? U: How about just for 1 night? Can I also get a reference number. S: The booking was successful. Your reference number is ZR1YUZB1. U: Great! Does the hotel offer free WiFi? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, The Ashley Hotel does have free WiFi available for their guest's use. Is there anything else that I can help you with at this time?

src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.I was alone so I did not need much but it was very clean and had a nice view I enjoyed. [SEP] U: I need a train out of Cambridge, but I need to arrive at my destination by 08:00. Are there any trains that early? S: That depends on your destination and the day that you would like to travel U: I would like to travel on wednesday going to stevenage, please. S: no record for the same, what other condition is available? U: Could you please check again? S: My records show that train  TR5695 leaves cambridge 05:21 and arrives at	stevenage at 06:10. Does this work for you? U: What is the price on that train? S: Fare price for train TR5695 is 12.80 pounds. Would you like a booking? U: No, I don't think I'm ready to reserve seats just yet, but could you help me find a 4-star place to stay on the east side of town? S: I sure can.  What price range were you considering? U: Price range does not matter. I do need parking though, do you have anything that includes parking? S: There are 5 options available. They are all guesthouses. I recommend autumn house. U: Does Autumn House have clean rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the rooms at Autumn House are described as very clean. Would you like me to reserve a room for you there?

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, we found that the room had a beautiful view to the sunset horizon outside. 2.The Carolina has good views. 3.It was nice to wake up in the morning and see the sun rising. 4.Parking was free and the view from the room was nice. 5.The view was really beautiful, too. [SEP] U: I need to stay at an expensive hotel that has a 4 star rating. Can you help me? S: I have two hotels that meet your criteria.  What area are you interested in? U: I miscommunicated before I apologize, I am actually looking for a 4 star guesthouse. S: I have no guesthouses in the area. Would you like me to check another star rating? U: How about one that is in the moderate price range. S: Yes, there are a number of options.  Would you like to narrow it down by area of town? U: No, I don't care about area.  Just pick one that you would recommend.  I'll need to book it for 6 people. S: I recommend carolina bed and breakfast. It's on the east side of town and has free parking and wifi. Does that work? U: Can I get a room with beautiful view at the hotel you recommended? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All reviewers agreed that the views here were really nice, beautiful and you can catch some great sun rises.

src_text: reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The drinks are also super high quality and super affordable, I was so pleased. 2.Unfortunately, the drinks were not up to the same level of quality as the food. 3.After that, I wanted to sample some authentic English beer so I bought a stout, which was actually not bad. 4.I liked the ale which was so tasty and refreshing, as well as being reasonably priced. 5.There was a large variety of drinks and they were very high-quality. 6.The drinks were well-made and quite affordable. 7.The ale I was provided could only be described as "underwhelming." FAQs of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.Yes, this restaurant offers a full bar with alcoholic drinks. [SEP] U: Please help me locate a train that departs from Cambridge and is going to Leicester. Thanks. S: What time would you like to leave? U: I'm flexible about departure time, but I must arrive by 18:45 on Saturday. S: There is a train that will arrive at 18:06. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Not yet but can I get travel time and train ID? S: The train ID is TR9193 for that trip. Can I help you with anything else? U: What is the travel time for the train?  Also, I need a place to eat in the centre.  It should be in the expensive range. S: I'm sorry that train ID is actually TR7600. The duration of trip is 105 minutes. As to locating a restaurant, what type of food would you like to eat? U: Any place in the centre with good food and service would be perfect. S: How about the midsummer house restaurant? U: Do they have high quality ale? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Midsummer House Restaurant does serve alcohol. The ale is tasty and refreshing, and most guests found the drinks to be in the affordable range.

src_text: reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.Speaking of drinks, this isn't a place I would recommend if you have kids who want a lot of soda options, because their non-alcoholic menu is pretty limited. 2.Their non-alcoholic drink menu is actually pretty impressive, too, which is something that rarely stands out at restaurants. 3.I was glad that they have a pretty extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options, because I did try one cocktail and found it to be pretty mediocre. reviews of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.My kids loved the kiddie cocktails! 2.Their drinks were really good, though expensive, and lacking in non-alcoholic options. 3.Service was great and they had a lot of options for non-alcoholic drinks! 4.My partner and I love to visit Jinling to enjoy the beautiful views from the restaurant and to enjoy our favorite dishes, and they do have an extensive non-alcoholic drink menu so there are plenty of other options to choose from. reviews of SHANGHAI FAMILY RESTAURANT: 1.Sarah is sober and loved all the non-alcoholic options for her! [SEP] U: Is there any chinese food around me right now? S: Yes. there's a total of 17 Chinese restaurants in town. Are you looking for a particular price range or specific part of town? U: I'd like something in the centre of town for a moderate price. S: We have jinling noodle bar, lan long house and shanghai family restaurant, any preferences? U: Which one has a better non alcoholic menu selection? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Jinling Noodle Bar and Shanghai Family Restaurant both have non-alcoholic drink menus that guests raved about. Lan Hong House had one negative review for non-alcoholic drinks but 2 that praised it for its extensive selection, so reviews are unclear.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The view outside of my window was exquisite and beautiful. 2.I really liked the sunrise view at breakfast. 3.I enjoyed spending time here with my girl, as we took in the great view. 4.Talk about a place with a fantastic view, truly amazing. 5.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. [SEP] U: I need a train that arrives by 11:45 leaving from Ely. Can you help me? S: What day will you be traveling? U: I'm leaving on Wednesday. S: Train TR5348 leaves at 05:35 and arrives at 5:52. Is that suitable for you? U: Does it go to Cambridge? S: Yes it does. U: That's great. Can you make a booking for me for 5 people? S: Booking for 5 people on TR5348 on wednesday at 05:35 going to cambridge was successful. I do not have reservation numbers at the moment. Cost is 4.40. U: I will need the reference number please. S: Booking was successful I will get you the reference number U: Okay, I need that. Didn't they give you a reference number when you booked it? S: I apologize for that. The booking number is OWXJ46II and the cost will be 22 GBP. U: Thanks. Now please help me find a moderate guesthouse that offers wifi S: There are 14 to choose from. Do you have a preference for area or star rating? U: I'd like to stay in Cambridge, but no area or star rating preference. Just the free wifi. Any suggestions? S: I recommend avalon, which is a 4 star lodging in the north. U: Sounds good, could I get a room with a view please? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Of course, nearly every room has a great one. Do you have any other requests before I book the reservation?

src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 2.The location ended up being not good though, because it was far from the bar I was going to. 3.My only dislikes were the poor location within the city, as well as the poor and outdated deocr on the inside of the restaurant. 4.If you're in the mood for Italian food, I would pass on Prezzo, which although in a great section of town with breathtaking views, is quite pricey and has very average foods. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train that leaves on Thursday after 21:30. S: Where will you be traveling to? U: I will be going to Broxbourne. S: I have 2 trains going to broxbourne, do you have an arrival time preference? U: i just want to leave after 21:30 S: Will an arrival time of 22:01 work for you? U: Yes, that would be fine. I'll need the price and travel time for that, please. S: will you be leaving cambridge? U: Yes, I'll be leaving from cambridge. What's the train number and cost? Oh, and how long is the trip? S: It costs 17.90 pounds.  I need to know your arrival time to determine the trainid. U: I also would like to book a table for 3 at prezzo for 16:00 the same day I arrive or Tuesday. I need the reference number also. S: I was able to reserve a table at Prezzo on Thursday at 16:00. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes, reference number R0Q4HL63. Can I assist with anything else? U: Is this restaurant in a convenient and easily accessible location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately as its situated in a poorer area of the city, the location of the Prezzo restaurant is one of the drawbacks.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I am  planning your trip in Cambridge.  looking for a place to dine. The restaurant should be in the cheap price range and should serve steakhouse food S: I have no places that meet your request. Would you like to try a different type of food? U: Sure, how about an Italian one? S: Is there a particular part of town you wish to dine in? U: Any area is fine, I just need to know the area and address. S: La margherita is located at 15 Magdalene Street City Centre in the west part of town. Do you need anything else? U: Yes, I also need a hotel in the north. S: The Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge both will meet your needs, would you like me to book you a room at either of those? U: I need one that offers free parking and that is a guesthouse. S: none of those do have parking. i recommend acorn guest house	instead U: Could you tell me do they have strong water pressure in the showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, those who stay at the Acorn Guest House will not be benefited from strong water pressure as theirs isn't anything to write home about and rather low.

src_text: FAQs of COTE: 1.The restaurant COTE does have outdoor seating. reviews of COTE: 1.The service is professional and they have a nice place to eat outside. [SEP] U: Can you find me a theatre? S: Would you like the mumford theatre? U: Yes and I need to know the entrance fee, address, and phone number S: The fee is not listed but the address is anglia ruskin enterprise, east road and the phone number is 08451962320. Can I help you with anything else? U: I am also looking for a French restaurant in the expensive range. S: I have two excellent options. Cote is in the centre of town, would you like me to reserve you a table? U: Do you know if they offer outdoor seating? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, I can check to see if they offer outdoor seating. It seems that they do offer an outdoor dining area. Would you like to reserve a table?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I Am looking for a four star guest house.. S: Yes I have several listings in different parts of the city. Do you have a price range or location preference? U: I'll need free wifi. S: That's no problem. 18 of our lodging establishments offer free wifi. Is there a price range or location you'd prefer? U: Not really, but I will need a room for 5 starting on Thursday. Are there any with that availability? S: How many nights would you like to stay? U: We'll be staying for five nights. S: I have made a booking at the acorn guest house for you. The reservation number is 0LV52R28. U: Is the water pressure in the showers good at the Acorn Guest House? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No the water pressure in the showers at the Acorn Guest House cannot be considered a benefit as theirs is rather low.

src_text: reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.The one downside is that I tried to order Dr Pepper and they didn't have it, nor did they have Diet Coke. 2.The drinks were meh though and there were no options that didn't contain alochol. 3.They only carried Pepsi products which is a bit of a bummer. [SEP] U: I am coming to Cambridge and need a place to stay. Is there a hotel in centre with free wifi? S: I recommend the university arms hotel on regent street. Would you like me to book your stay? U: Is that a guesthouse? I would like to stay in a guesthouse please. It doesn't need to have free parking. S: No it isn't. But the Alexander Bed and Breakfast and El Shaddai are both guesthouses that fit what you are looking for. Are you interested? U: El Shaddai sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about it? S: El Shaddai is a cheap guesthouse in the centre of town. the phone number is 01223327978. Can I be of further help? U: Yes, please. I'd like a reservation for 7 people for 4 nights starting on Tuesday. S: You're booked at the El Shaddai, ref #XS30YDOA. Can I help you with anything else today? U: Nothing else. Thank you for getting us booked. S: You're welcome. Have a great day! U: actually, i also need a chinese restaurant. S: I can help you with that. In what area of town and price range would you like to dine? U: I am looking for the south side and cheap please. S: The Lucky Star will fit your needs. Would you like me to make you  a reservation? U: Do they offer non-alcoholic drink options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Lucky Star doesn't have a lot of options for non-alcoholic drinks they only have Pepsi products.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Also, breakfast is delicious, they offer a good variety which surprised me. 2.We thought the room was super clean, and we very much enjoyed the breakfast options. FAQs of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The Alexander Bed and Breakfast offers a free continental breakfast. [SEP] U: Hello.  Can you find a taxi to pick me up at Darry's Cookhouse and Wine Shop sometime after 04:00? S: Not a problem. Where would you like to go? U: i would like to go to alexander bed and breakfast S: Great, I've got a white lexus picking you up at 04:00, your contact number is 07605710484. U: Does the hotel provide Full English breakfast? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I am not sure, but they do offer a free continental breakfast, will that be okay or do you want to go somewhere else?

src_text: FAQs of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.Outdoor seating is available. reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.It was a beautiful spot to be eating outdoors. 2.We were out on the patio but being as the building is downtown, the view just isn't very good. [SEP] U: I need a train leaving Cambridge on Sunday. S: Can I get your destination please? U: Stansted Airport please. S: What time would you like to leave? U: Leave after 14:45. I need a booking for 7 people and the reference number. S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 56.56 GBP payable at the station. Reference number is : LZY6ET2M. Is there anything else I can assist you with today? U: i'm also looking for info about a restaurant. S: What part of town would you like ? U: I am specifically looking for a restaurant called fitzbillies restaurant. I am wanting to book a table for 10:15 for 7 people on Sunday. S: Alright I booked that, and your reference is PMCEY5JA. Anything else I can do? U: Do they have nice outdoor dining areas? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Fitzbillies Restaurant does offer outdoor seating. The patio is located in the downtown area, in case that impacts your decision.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Because I had a late arrival, the very comfy bed was a really nice perk as well. [SEP] U: I am looking a hotel to stay in. Could you find me one on the more expensive side? But it doesn't need free parking. S: Sorry, nothing falls under those categories. Shall I check one WITH free parking? U: Yes, give that a try please. I also need free wifi. S: May I recommend the express by holiday inn cambridge? I'd like to know how many people are staying as well. U: Are the beds comfortable? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the beds at Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge are very comfortable to sleep in. Do you want to reserve a room?

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It was really good value for money (the total cost) and I enjoyed my stay. [SEP] U: Can you tell me about the Carolina B&B? S: The carolina bed and breakfast is a guesthouse in the east that is in the moderate price range. Are you looking to stay a specific day? U: Do you have the overall rating on the price relative to value with Carolina B & B? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People feel that the Carolina B & B is a good value for the money. Past guests have commented as such.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The breakfast options were plentiful, too. 2.In the morning, we were offered great breakfast choices, which we enjoyed. 3.In the morning I had breakfast and they had lots of things to choose from. 4.We have very different tastes in food, and we were both satisfied with what was available. FAQs of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The Hamilton Lodge offers a full English breakfast. 2.The Hamilton Lodge does not offer a free breakfast. You need to pay 10 GBP per person. [SEP] U: I need a local restaurant I can try while in Cambridge. I also need a 3 star moderately priced Hotel I can stay in while in Cambridge. S: Okay. What kind of cuisine would you like? U: I'm open to any kind of cuisine. Perhaps you can suggest one. S: Why don't we start with the room since those fill up much faster and we'll come back to the restaurant. I have several options in guesthouses but unfortunately no hotels. U: I need a place to stay that is a guesthouse with a 3 star rating in the moderate price range. S: Is there a particular area you prefer?  I have guesthouses located in the North, South and West areas of town, which would you prefer? U: I don't care, I just want it for 2 people for 2 nights starting on Sunday. S: We have Hamilton Lodge, a 3-star guesthouse in the north that's moderately priced. Would you like to book a room? U: Does it have good breakfast options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to past guests, there is a full English breakfast and many options to choose from but it is not free.

src_text: reviews of BEDOUIN: 1.The quality of food and drinks were good and the service was great. 2.The quality was also high and looked sophisitcated. 3.My beer was just okay and seemed to be priced higher that similar restaurants. FAQs of BEDOUIN: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at Bedouin. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train going to the stansted airport leaving after 18:45? S: What day will you be traveling and from where? U: I will be departing on Thursday from Cambridge. S: The earliest train is TR9030. It will depart at 19:40 and arrive at the airport at 20:08. The price is 10.10 pounds. Would you like to book? U: I'm not very good with numbers.  Can you tell me the travel time of that leg? S: Travel time is 28 minutes. Would you like reservations? U: No. Not interested in making a reservation but you can help me find a restaurant that serves Belgian food in the centre S: I'm sorry, we don't have any Belgian restaurants. Would you like to try a different type? U: How about African food? S: We do have an african restaurant called Bedouin. It is located in the centre and is in the expensive price range. Would you like me to book a table? U: How good is their beer list? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure how extensive their beer list is, but one customer said the beer was just okay and seemed to be a bit overpriced.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant in the moderate price range and in the centre of town. S: There are 21 restaurants in the centre of town in the moderate price range. U: Ok, how about chinese food? S: Yes, I recommend the Ian Hong House in the centre. Should I reserve a table for you? U: Yes please, I would like a table for 6 at 11:30 on Friday. S: I have booked a table for 6 people on Friday at 11:30, your reference number is 452NKGSN.  Can I help you with anything else? U: I need a hotel same price range as restaurant that includes free wifi and parking. Can you help with that too? S: Sure, I can help you with that.  Were you looking for a specific area of town? U: Well, let see. I am eating in the centre of town, so let me find a place in the centre. S: Sorry, I'm not finding anything. Want to change your location? U: Lets try a expensive price range S: We have two hotels that fit your criteria.  One has 3 stars, the other 4.  Do you have a preference? U: No preference really, just recommend one for me S: Okay! How about University Arms Hotel on Regent Street? U: Sure, does it have free wifi and free parking? S: yes they have both internet and wifi U: Does the hotel have rooms with a good view of the surrounding area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All of the reviewers thought that the views from their room were excellent. Is there any other information you need?

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: I am traveling to Cambridge soon.  I can't wait to try some local restaurants.  Can you help me with a place to stay? S: There are many hotels in Cambridge. Is there a particular area you would like to stay in? U: I need it to have 4 stars and parking too. S: I have 19 hotels that meet that criteria. Do you have a price range in mind? U: I don't have a price range, just whatever will get me a good hotel in the east area. S: I would like to recommend allenbell if that is alright with you? U: How clean are their rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms at the Allenbell are spotless, fresh and clean. They will totally impress the guest, even those who are picky about cleanliness.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. [SEP] U: I need some help choosing a train to Leicester. S: I can help you with that.  What is your departure site and day you would like to travel? U: I will be departing from Cambridge on Saturday. S: Do you have a time that you need to leave or arrive by? U: I need to leave after 21:00. S: The TR7610 leaves at 21:21 and is a 105 minute ride to Leicester.  Would you like me to book you seats? U: Great can you get me 7 tickets for that? S: TR7610 we have booked your train sir ! thank you ! U: Thank you very much! Also, can you recommend a hotel in the South part of town? I don't need internet or free parking. S: There were no hotels that matched your criteria. Would you like to try a different criteria? U: how about the north? S: How about the Ashley Hotel? They have free internet and parking, though. U: How are the views on offer at the Ashley Hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviewers have said that the Ashley Hotel offers guests an excellent view. Would you like me to make a reservation for you?

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The room was also quiet. 2.The only downside to the hotel was the noise that was all over the place, asides this...I would recommend the hotel to anyone and I also plan to stay there when I am in the city. 3.The other guests were just so noisy, I could not enjoy my stay. 4.I highly recommend Gonville Hotel for how quiet my room was and the absolutely stellar concierge service. 5.The major negative, however, is how noisy the hotel was. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.It was pretty annoying. 2.The only downside to the hotel was the noise. [SEP] U: I'd like to find a hotel in the centre of town with free parking, please. S: Sure thing.  There are 2 hotels available, Gonville hotel and University Arms Hotel.  Which hotel do you prefer? U: Which of the two options have the quietest environment? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One of the negatives to staying at the University Arms Hotel is the noise, which is also a downside of the Gonville Hotel.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a four star hotel on the north side S: I have eight results. Do you need free parking? U: Not really, and I'm not really concerned with wifi either. Which one do you recommend? S: How about Acorn Guest House? It's located at 154 Chesterton Road. U: What is the hotel's rating? S: It is rated 4 stars, U: Actually, could you double check whether the Acorn has free wifi? S: Yes, it does. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Does this room have good water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to reviews I found the water pressure in the bathroom is said to be quite mediocre. Would you like to know anything else?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. 2.One of the best things about the hotel is the view of the mountains from the balcony. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The view from the room was also amazing, and the cleanliness of the bathroom was top notch. 2.The view from the room was also breathtaking. reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. reviews of FINCHES BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.While on business, I stayed at this place, and really loved the view from the window. [SEP] U: I need a place to stay in West Cambridge,and it must include free parking. S: There are four options available. Do you have a particular price range in mind? U: No but it does need to be a hotel and I need to have free WiFi please. S: I still am showing 4 entries. Do you have a preference for stars? U: I don't have any preference. What are the options? S: Finches Bed and Breakfast, Hobsons House, Hunting Marriott Hotel, and The Cambridge Belfry are available. U: Could you recommend one with the best view from the rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I would recommend The Cambridge Belfry which has one of the best most beautiful mountain view from the balcony.

src_text: reviews of THE RIVER BAR STEAKHOUSE AND GRILL: 1.The views made up for the wait staff service, which was pretty substandard; maybe they were new hires or something. 2.I loved the quick service and extremely high quality food. 3.To top it off, the service was great. 4.For one, the service was very attentive and welcoming. 5.The service was prompt and quick as well. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay with free parking. S: There are several that offer free parking what is your price range? U: My price range is mid to high range. S: There are several hotels that fits that description what area would you like? U: I would like a hotel in the south with a star rating of 4. S: I have one listing for aylesbray lodge guest house. U: All right, if there are no hotels, the guest house will do. Could you give me the address and postcode, please? S: The address is 5 Mowbray Road and the postcode is cb17sr. Would you like me to book you a room? U: Not right now. Can you help me find a modern European restaurant that is cheap? S: I have one place in the Centre of town. Would you like me to book you in? U: Sure. Book it for 7 people at 11:15 on thursday. S: I have you booked at the river bar steakhouse and grill.   The reference number is BASBIQ2I, the table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Any other questions? U: Do the waitstaff at this location go above and beyond the call of duty? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The large majority of reviews are positive with customers saying service was great, quick, and attentive. Other say the service was like they were all new-hires.Is there anything else you like to know about them?

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.However, the low water pressure was a bit annoying. [SEP] U: I'm looking for someplace to stay. I'd like something expensive, and I don't need parking. S: I'm not showing anything in the expensive range without parking. There are five expensive hotels with parking. What area would you like to stay in? U: The area doesn't really matter. But I would want a hotel that includes wifi for free. S: How about the huntingdon marriott hotel, it is in the west in the expensive price range. It also has internet. Would you like to book? U: How is the shower water pressure in the hotel rooms? I need a room high pressure shower. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Huntingdon Marriot Hotel has low water pressure issues. Should we look at another place to stay?

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train from london liverpool street. S: I have many trains that leave from London Liverpool Street. When would you like to leave? U: I would like to leave on Sunday to Cambridge and get there by 16:00 or before. S: There are 5 options on Sunday from london liverpool street to cambridge. Would Sunday early morning be better? You could arrive by 07:07. Or would you prefer later in the morning? U: I would prefer later in the morning if possible. S: The TR9835 train leaves at 11:39. Would you like me to book that for you? U: Yes, please. I'll need to book for 6 people. S: Alright, you're all booked, your reference number is A6PU52R6. Anything else I can get for you? U: I'd like a place to stay in the east of the city. S: There are 6 guesthouses and 1 hotel in the east of Cambridge, ranging from cheap to expensive.  Do you have a preference? U: Are any of them moderately priced with free wifi included? S: Yes. I would recommend the Carolina Bed and Breakfast. Would you like to go ahead and book a room? U: Does it have good breakfast choices? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews are split, some people said that the breakfast was really not so great there and that the options were limited, but others said that they were delicious and plentiful.

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. [SEP] U: Is there a cheap restaurant in the north part of town? S: May I suggest Royal Spice, a cheap Indian restaurant in the north? U: Is there anything else? S: Da Vinci Pizzeria is a cheap italian restraunt in the north area of town. U: What is the address and phone number? S: Da Vinci Pizzeria is at 20 Milton Road Chesterton, and their phone number is 01223 351707. U: Do they have a good portion of foods here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Past guests differ in their opinion of the portion sizes. Some have described them as too small, but others say they are plentiful.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for an inexpensive hotel to stay in while I'm in Cambridge. I would like it to be a guesthouse type of room please. S: I have several throughout the city.  Is there any location you would prefer it in? U: No, but I want free parking. S: Great. I have 9 available that offer free parking. Is there a star rating you'd prefer? U: I'd prefer one with at least a 2 star rating. I'd also like one with internet. S: There are no 2 star hotels available. U: No star rating. I just need it to be a guesthouse, cheap, free parking and if they have internet. S: Okay I'll need some more information to book that for you. How many people, for how long and when please? U: I'm not ready to book just yet.  Do any have internet? S: How about the alexander bed and breakfast. And has free parking and free wifi. U: I really want great water pressure when I take a shower. Does the alexander bed and breakfast offer this? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Previous geuests have complained about the water pressure, commenting that it waa very low and made showering less than ideal.

src_text: reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.The interior of the restaurant was nicely decorated. 2.It was modern but inviting at the same time. reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.Last Friday, I visited The Nirala which had a fabulous indoor decor. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a hotel in the North part of Cambridge? S: I have two moderately priced hotels in the north for you.  The Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge. Would you like me to book one? U: Does it have internet? S: They do both have internet. U: I would like to book the Ashley Hotel. S: Great I can take care of that.  How many people?  How long will you be there and when will your stay start? U: There will be 7 of us arriving Sunday.  We will be staying 3 nights. S: I was able to book the room for you the reference number is HQKA3TBW. Can I help you with anything else? U: Yes I am needing a restaurant that is the same price range as my hotel and in the same area. S: There are two; The Golden Wok which is a Chinese place, and The Nirala, with Indian cuisine. Which would you prefer? U: Do they have nice indoor decor? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Golden Wok has a modern, but nicely decorated interior, while the Nirala restaurant also is known for having a fabulous decor.

src_text: reviews of MICHAELHOUSE CAFE: 1.I enjoyed the nice views that many seat options overlooked the town square so you felt part of the action. 2.The view was also stunning and the quality of the food was high and also fresh. 3.The location and view were amazing. 4.That said, it's right on a busy street, so there's not really any view to speak of. 5.I greatly enjoyed the beautiful view from our restaurant and all of the vegetarian options they offered. 6.They have a good view here and food is cheap, and that kind of shows since it isn't the best tasting ever. 7.The view itself was nice since we were right by the center stage where they played live European music. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a particular restaurant called michaelhouse cafe. S: Michaelhouse Cafe is an expensive restaurant in the center of town. It serves european food and is located at St. Michael's Church Trinity Street City Centre. U: doe  it have a good view from the room S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Michaelhouse Cafe has a nice stunning view of the town square which is right by the center stage where they play live European music.

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.Their beers were ok too and service was super friendly and nice. 2.The food was mediocre, but the drinks were very high quality! 3.While the drinks are reasonably priced they aren't very good. 4.The men had a lot of drink options to choose from but the drinks themselves just taste average. 5.The wine was good too. src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.I was deeply impressed by the sea view in front of the hotel, which was great and magnificent. 2.But the best was the great view. 3.The view was stunning and so much better than I even expected. 4.It was just incredible! src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. src_text: reviews of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.The only negative is that the location is just a 10 minute walk from my house; it's so yummy, I wish I lived right next door! 2.It was located in a mall so it was quite convenient but the view was of the parking lot so it was pretty bad. 3.The location wasn‚Äôt in the best part of town and it took a while to get there. U: I'm not picky, just let me know a few types of cuisine that are in the area please. S: Peking Restaurant as well as The Good Luck Food Takeaway serve Chinese food. src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.But still, I appreciated the great view from my window, overlooking the nearby lake, and the room itself was very clean with a seriously comfortable bed. 2.Looking out of the balcony was the most beautiful view I've ever seen. src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.We had a great time as the staff there is truly remarkable and the amenities were great. 2.I liked that the staff at the hotel was very friendly. 3.I was here with my family and we were welcomed with great smiles by the staff. reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The staff is also a joy to interact with, one of the most important parts of any stay. 2.We were greeted with very friendly staff. 3.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. [SEP] U: Could you help me find a cheap hotel in the center of town? S: I have two options to offer you, the 4 star Alexander Bed and Breakfast and the unrated El Shaddai. Would you like me to book you a room at one? U: Do either of them have friendly and welcoming staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, they both have really good reviews for their staff. Which one would you like to book?

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT TWO TWO: 1.You simply MUST try the Escargots de Bourgogne with the house Chardonnay, because they will blow your mind. 2.The quality of the food is impeccable, and the wine tastes sublime. FAQs of RESTAURANT TWO TWO: 1.Yes, this restaurant has a Wine and Drinks List. [SEP] U: Can you tell me about a particular hotel called the avalon? We'll arrive on Wednesday. S: Booking was successful. Reference number is : DYAMG2CY. Can I help you with anything else today? U: Yes, could you help me find a nice place to dine in the north. src_text:
reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: Hi, I need a train out of Cambridge, thanks! S: Sure, where will you be traveling to? U: I will be going to london liverpool street. S: There are 70 trains available. Is there a specific day and time you would like to leave or arrive by? U: I would like the train to leave on friday after 15:30. S: TR9956 I believe would be my choice.  Thank you. U: OK, can you book that for 8 people, please? S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 132.8 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : SEJBN5KV. U: Great, can't wait! Are you able to help us find a cheap Chinese restaurant somewhere near the city centre, also? S: Certainly! There are 3: Charlie Chan, Rice House, and Golden House. Do any of these sound like they'd be to your liking? U: Yes, all of them are. U: Could you try 11:15, please? S: I was able to get you at table at charlie chan at 11:15 for all 8 guests.  Your reference number is YZERKJXH.  Anything else I can help with? U: Is great service available at Charlie Chan? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, Charlie Chan has been complimented on its services, the waitstaff has been called nice and attentive, and the food arrived very fast.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Warkworth house is sometimes quiet, sometimes loud. It depends on the room you're staying in. I suggest avoiding the rooms that face the main road.

src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.I didn't order any drinks, but they seemed reasonably priced based on the menu I saw. 2.The food was ok and the beer was definitely overpriced, however the service was excellent! 3.The service was great, food was superb, and on top of that the food and drinks were so cheap! 4.I could overlook it if only the drinks were expensive, or if a few of the food options were spendy, but every time I have a meal here, I leave feeling like I paid too much for my meal, which puts a damper on my mood. 5.The drink options are plentiful and affordable as well. FAQs of HAKKA: 1.You can order alcohol at this restaurant. [SEP] U: I'm looking for specific restaurant. S: Do you know the name of this restaurant? U: The Hakka restaurant is located at 24 Milton Road Cambridge Cambridgeshire CB4 1JY.  The average cost is approximately 30 per person. S: Looks like you're doing my job for me! Did you want to know about the Hakka Restaurant then? U: Do they have a good selection of affordable beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most agreed that drinks here were decently priced. One thought the beer was a tad expensive. service makes up for it some.

I also need a place to stay.  I would like a hotel with a 4 star rating. S: Certainly, would you like a cheap hotel? Or expensive? U: I don't care about the price point.  But, I do want it to be on the west side of town. S: I recommend the Cambridge Belfry. It's a cheap hotel on the west side. Would you like me to book you a room? U: Does it mention having good water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Cambridge Belfry has really bad water pressure. I based that information off of two guest reviews.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The breakfast options were plentiful, too. 2.In the morning, we were offered great breakfast choices, which we enjoyed. 3.In the morning I had breakfast and they had lots of things to choose from. 4.We have very different tastes in food, and we were both satisfied with what was available. FAQs of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The Hamilton Lodge offers a full English breakfast. 2.The Hamilton Lodge does not offer a free breakfast. You need to pay 10 GBP per person. [SEP] U: Are there any theatres in Cambridge, particularly close to the city centre? S: There are four theatres in that area. Cambridge arts theatre is a nice one in that area. U: Wonderful.  Can you get me the address and postcode? S: Sure, the address is 6 saint edward's passage and the post code is cb23pj. U: Thanks.  I am also looking for a hotel in the north.  I want something with a 3 star rating.  Are there any available? S: Yes I have two both in the moderate price range. Any preference for amenities? U: I don't mind something a bit pricey, and I definitely need wifi. S: Hamilton Lodge has free wifi and is in the moderate price range. Would you like to book a room? U: Are there good choices for breakfast? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, they do have good choices for breakfast at Hamilton Lodge. Past guests have said they were satisfied.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel in the expensive price range. S: There are 5 expensive hotels available. Did you have a preference as to area of the hotel? U: No, it doesn't matter.  I would like a 4 star hotel with free parking though. S: There are two, one in the west and one the centre of town. U: Could you reserve the one in the centre of town for 3 nights starting Monday?  There will be 3 of us. S: Unfortunately, I wasn't able to book you for the day and time you wanted. Would another day or time be alright? U: Okay, could you try the other one, please? S: I couldn't book that one either. Would you like to change your criteria? U: I would actually like to book it for 8 people, not 3. S: Sure no problem. So the hotel is huntingdon marriott hotel and your reference number for the booking is 34BAQ2WK. Is there anything else I can help? U: Do they have a good view from the rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes they do.  Previous guests have stated in their reviews that the view is wonderful and great from the room.

src_text: FAQs of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.The YIPPE NOODLE BAR serves all forms of alcohol. reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.We enjoyed that the menu offered multiple different non-alcoholic drink options, but we did not like how the drinks were poor in taste. 2.While the service was quite slow, the drinks and foods were very high quality, and the restaurant was in a wonderful location. 3.Washed it all down with a nice cold beer. 4.The beer was decent. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for a moderate restaurant in the centre. What would you recommend? S: I found few restaurant that serve Asian and British food which food you prefer? U: Lets go with Asian. Can you book a table for 7 at 12:00 on Wednesday? S: Okay, I have booked you a table at Yippee Noodle Bar. Your reference number is OWLN59MN. U: Can you tell me if they have highly-rated reviews for their drink menu? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, I can find out that information for you. Yippee Noodle Bar has all forms of alcohol, as well as non-alcoholic drink options. The beer is cold and decent, and the drinks and foods are high quality.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.We could not enjoy the shower as the pressure was low. 2.The room was a bit small, so I felt a tiny cramped in there, and the water pressure could have been a lot better. [SEP] U: Hi I am looking for a moderate priced place to stay that has free wifi. S: Let's see what we can find. I have about 17 options. Do you have a certain area you prefer or maybe a price range preference? U: I would prefer moderate price range and wifi included S: How about kirkwood house? It's in the north. U: Is it a guesthouse? S: Yes it is a guesthouse.  Would you like me to book it for you? U: Does this place have stable water pressure in the showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the Kirkwood House isn't known for having high-quality water pressure in its bathrooms, as its often a criticism by guests.

src_text: FAQs of PREZZO: 1.Prezzo serves alcohol. reviews of PREZZO: 1.We especially enjoyed the drink options and had great service as well. 2.In addition to the alcoholic drinks, there were also many non-alcoholic options on the menu. 3.Prezzo is a nice place for good Italian food and a variety of drinks and wines. [SEP] U: I was hoping you can help me find a place to dine. I'm looking for an italian restaurant in the west. S: There's 2 Italian restaurants in the west, one cheap and one moderate in price. Which price range do you want? U: I would prefer a moderately priced one. S: Prezzo restaurant is moderately priced. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Are there a variety of quality beer choices? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure if their beer is of good quality, but I do know they have a good selection of alcoholic beverages.

src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.The only issues we had was that it was in a bad part of town, there wasn't any good parking nearby, and there wasn't any view to look at. 2.The location was pleasant, not far from other amenities in the city and with good parking. 3.Despite that, the restaurant was in a poor location in a bad spot in the city. 4.I hadn't had Chinese food in ages, so I looked on Yelp and found the Charlie Chan Chinese restaurant, which is nestled in the heart of the downtown business district. [SEP] U: We need to work off some energy - can you find us a multiple sports place in town? Closer to the city centre would be best. S: Unfortunately there were no matches for that criteria. U: Ok, how about a swimming pool in the centre of town? S: Parkside Pools is located at Gonville Place, postcode cb11ly. The phone number is 01223446100. U: What is the entrance fee? S: I am actually unsure of that, sorry. U: Also looking for  Chinese restaurant in the cheap price range. S: Charlie Chan is pretty good.  In the town centre. U: is the location good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for this location, the opinions are mixed.  Half found the location poor and in a bad part of town, whereas half thought it was pleasant and in the heart of the downtown.

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.We split a bottle of pinot noir and have a wonderful meal by the window overlooking the mountains. 2.Really, my only complaint is that the building is fairly small and not very well furnished, so the view isn't spectacular, but I have zero complaints about the food quality and can't wait to go back. 3.But when I sat at my table I had an outstanding view. reviews of PIZZA HUT CHERRY HINTON: 1.It was a really nice place to sit down and eat, because it's in a good location and has a beautiful view of the mountains. 2.She made sure I was comfortable, that I didn't have sun in my face and that I was able to partake in this amazing view that the restaurant has. [SEP] U: Hello.  Could you help me locate a good moderate restaurant in the south of the city? S: There are 2 options. Pizza hut cherry hinton serves Italian food and Restaurant alimentum serves modern European food. U: Do you have anyplace that serves Chinese food? S: I'm sorry, there are no Chinese restaurants located in the south that is moderately priced. U: Do you know if Pizza hut cherry hinton or Restaurant alimentum has a good view ? It will be great to have a place with a good view. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the Pizza Hut and the Alimentum have great views of the mountains and the guests love it. The Alimentum did have one complaint that said the view wasn't spectacular. Would you like to know anything else about them?

src_text: FAQs of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Little Seoul does offer outdoor seating. reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.It was also a nice place to eat since there was an outdoor dining area. [SEP] U: I need a Korean restaurant in the centre of town. S: How about little seoul? It's expensive and in the center of town. U: Is there other choices that you could provide? S: I'm sorry, there are no other options for the criteria you have provided. Would you like more information about little seoul? U: Do they have good handicap accessibility? S: Sadly, it is not wheelchair accessible. Do you still want me to book a table for you? U: Does this restaurant have any live music to entertain its guests? S: Unfortunately, this restaurant does not have any live music events. Would you still like to make a reservation? U: How about outdoor seating, is that available at this restaurant? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, when selecting to dine at the Little Seoul restaurant, individuals have the option to be placed in their outdoor seating area.

src_text: reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.It was very clean, as well. 2.But while the size of the room was quite good, it was definitely not freshly cleaned when we checked in, and because there was no concierge service, we couldn't find a more suitable hotel to book an alternate stay at. 3.During my recent stay at LEVERTON HOUSE with your family, I was very happy with the clean room especially the bathroom. [SEP] U: I am looking for the Museum of Archaelogy and Anthropology. Do you have any information on this attraction? S: Yes, this museum is in the town centre and the entrance is free.  Would you like the address and phone number? U: Yes please if you do not mind. S: The address of the Museum is University of Cambridge, Downing Street. The phone number is 01223333516. Can I help you with anything else? U: I am also looking for a hotel called Leverton House. Do you have any information on it? S: Yes, I do. The Leverton House is located in the east. It has 4 stars and is relatively cheap. It's located at 732-734 Newmarket Road. Phone is 01223292094. Does that help? U: Do they have clean rooms there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some past guests do feel that the rooms are clean, but there are guests who felt that their room was not freshly cleaned.

src_text: reviews of LA RAZA: 1.If you're looking for a cool, hip Spanish restaurant to visit for tapas and drinks, I wouldn't recommend La Raza because their drinks were frankly not well-prepared and tasted pretty mediocre. 2.La Raza has good food and drinks. 3.Though I'm more of a beer drinker and stuck with one of their top quality, full bodied Spanish craft beers, my boyfriend tried a glass of one of their expensive, top quality Sangrias and loved it. 4.I also ordered a beer, which seemed to be of great quality along with their other drink choices. 5.I liked the sangria and the portion was large for my tortilla espanola. FAQs of LA RAZA: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at La Raza. [SEP] U: I am looking for an affordable spanish restaurant. S: There is one match. La Raza is located at 4 - 6 Rose Crescent, cb23ll. Phone number is 01223464550. Would you like to book a table now? U: Could I get a glass of high quality Sangria there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that have ordered Sangria at La Raza have enjoyed the quality, which is on par with their other drink selection.

src_text: reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.The one downside is that I tried to order Dr Pepper and they didn't have it, nor did they have Diet Coke. 2.The drinks were meh though and there were no options that didn't contain alochol. 3.They only carried Pepsi products which is a bit of a bummer. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap place to stay in the south, can you give me information on my options. S: there is rosa's bed and breakfast in the south it is cheap, yet a 4 star. U: Is that a guesthouse? I don't want to stay in a guesthouse, I want to stay in a hotel please. S: We don't have any cheap hotels on the south side. You'll have to look elsewhere. U: Can you please look at a cheap guesthouse in the south side? S: rosa's bed and breakfast	fits your description. can we reserve? U: I would like to book it for 3 nights S: I'd be happy to book it for you. What day will you be arriving, and how many people will be staying? U: book it for 4 people and 3 nights starting from wednesday. S: booking was successful, confirmation # is PHSEY43R, anything else today? U: I am also looking for a place to eat, in the same price range as my hotel and preferably chinese food. S: we have quite a few would you like to reserve a table U: Not yet, can you find me one that is in the same area as the hotel? S: I found a restaurant for you! The Lucky Star is a Chinese Restaurant in the south and also has a cheap price range. U: Do they have sodas, teas and non alcoholic type drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They don't seem to have a large variety of non alcoholic type drinks. It appears they only offer pepsi products.

src_text: reviews of FINCHES BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The staff was friendly and made us feel welcomed and like we could reach out to them if we needed anything. 2.The staff did not seem to understand how frustrating that was for me. 3.And on top of that, I found the staff to be really unprofessional, which brought down the good vibes for my stay. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm interested in getting some information about the cherry hinton village centre in Cambridge. S: It is a multiple sports venue on the east side of town.  The phone number is 01223576412. U: What is their entrance fee? S: I'm afraid that the entrance fee is unknown. Would you like the phone number? U: No, thanks. Could you recommend a hotel in the west with free parking? S: The cambridge belfry is a cheap hotel, 4 star, and offers free parking and WiFi. Would you like me to book you a stay? U: Is it a guesthouse? I'm looking for a guesthouse. S: No, but the finches bed and breakfast is. Can I book you a room there? U: I actually don't need reservations just information.  What can you tell me about the Finches Bed and Breakfast? S: finches bed and breakfast is a 4 start guesthouse in the west part of town in the cheap price range with free internet and parking. U: Are the employees friendly and responsive? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One customer said the staff was accommodating and very nice, but most of the other past customers found the staff frustrating and unfriendly.

FAQs of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The Hamilton Lodge offers a full English breakfast. 2.The Hamilton Lodge does not offer a free breakfast. You need to pay 10 GBP per person. S: The Hamilton Lodge sounds like it's perfect for you. Would you like for me to make a reservation? U: Yes, please. 4 people for 4 nights starting on Monday. S: The hotel is unable to accommodate that stay. Could you shorten your stay? U: Try 2 nights, then. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Hamilton Lodge offers a full English breakfast. It is not free though, so you will have to pay extra in addition to your room. Is that okay?

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure was very low here so a shower takes a very long time. 2.I was glad I was travelling alone or showers would have taken forever. [SEP] U: I am trying to locate information about four star hotels in Cambridge. S: There is a huntingdon marriott hotel here, kingfisher way, hinchinbrook business park, huntingdon. Would you like to book? U: No, I just need one that is in the moderate price range. S: I'm sorry, I don't have anything in the moderate price range, would you like to search for something else? U: I need one in the south of town. S: I'm sorry, there are no moderately priced hotels in the south part of town that have 4 stars.  I do have a guesthouse that matches those parameters, would that do? U: how about with 4 stars then? S: Yes, there is one named Ayles Bray Lodge Guest House.   Does that sound good? U: What have previous guests said about the water pressure in the showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One should lower their expectations of the bathrooms at the Aylesbray Lodge Guest House as their water pressure is known to be low.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: Can you help me book a reservation at the Warkworth House hotel? S: Yes I could! How many people are staying, and what days would you like to stay? U: First, can you tell you me if they are known for having a quiet atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviews on the noise level at the Warkworth House hotel are a bit mixed.  Some claim it is a bit noisy with the road causing issues for light sleepers, while others claim the location was extremely silent and the hotel incredibly quiet.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Carolina Bed and Breakfast had a pretty mediocre location, it seemed too far away from the places I came to town to visit. [SEP] U: I'm looking for information on a hotel, the carolina bed and breakfast. S: Its a moderately priced four start hotel with internet. Do you need any more info? U: Is it in a convenient location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Caroline Bed and Breakfast is located in a pretty mediocre area. It is a bit far away from places in town.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure was very low here so a shower takes a very long time. 2.I was glad I was travelling alone or showers would have taken forever. [SEP] U: Hello! I'm looking for new places to go in Cambridge and am wondering if there is a theatre closeby. S: There are four theatres in the centre and one in the south. Which area do you prefer? U: Please recommend one for me that is in the center. S: How about cambridge arts theatre?  It's located at 6 saint edward's passage. U: Yes, that will do. I also need a place to stay. S: In what area would you like to stay? U: I am looking for a place in the south, and I don't need parking. But I do need 4 stars and wifi! S: Aylesbray Lodge Guest House matches all your criteria except it does have parking.  Would that be a problem for you? U: Yes, that's not a problem. S: Do you need more info, or would you like me to reserve a room for you? U: Does the shower have high water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Water pressure is low at Aylesbray Lodge Guest House resulting in showers taking longer. Do you need more information?

src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.The location itself was in the heart of the town so I was able to go walk around after eating here. 2.Parking was a nightmare, I did not like coming in. 3.The location is good - it's out near a mall with a lot of parking spaces, so parking was a breeze, and it's conveniently right off the highway. 4.However, the location isn't great (not a lot of parking) and the food left a little something to be desired. 5.The location is really great. 6.With a location by the riverside, you can almost close your eyes and imagine you're taking afternoon tea in the idyllic English countryside when you're at Cotto's! [SEP] U: I'm looking for information in Cambridge. Can you help? S: I'd be happy to help you with all things Cambridge. What can I help you find today? U: I'd like to find a restaurant called Cotto, please. S: Cotto is located on 183 East Road City Centre and has the postcode cb11bg. Is there anything else I could help you with today? U: Do they have a nice location for dining in there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location of Cotto is in the heart of the city, by the riverside. It is near a mall with parking spaces and right off of the highway.

src_text: FAQs of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.Alcohol is served at The Golden Curry. reviews of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.Good drinks though and cheap. 2.The King Fisher was refreshing and just as I remembered it, though it was quite pricey at $8. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a sporting attraction in the city centre. S: I don't have any sporting events in the centre. May I try a different area? U: Maybe we could try swimming instead? S: Yes, the Parkside Pools is available with that criteria. The phone number for it is 01223446100. Do you require any other information about it? U: please find me the address. S: It is located at Gonville Place, postcode cb11ly. U: I am also looking to eat out. Expensive Welsh food. S: I have nothing that match your search. Do you have another preference ? U: Are there any expensive restaurants in the centre? S: May I recommend Bedouin? It's an expensive african restaurant in the centre of town. U: How about an expensive restaurant in the centre that serves Indian? S: There are 5 restaurants that fit that criteria, Would you like me to make a recommendation? U: Yes please, I would like a quiet place as much as  possible. S: The Golden Curry should meet your needs.  What day and time would you like to book the table and for how many people? U: One more thing, I'd like a place that is well known for its highly-valued drink options for the money. How does Golden Curry rate? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure, some customers said the drinks were expensive and others said that they were well valued and cheap.

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.We had a great time as the staff there is truly remarkable and the amenities were great. 2.I liked that the staff at the hotel was very friendly. 3.I was here with my family and we were welcomed with great smiles by the staff. reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The staff is also a joy to interact with, one of the most important parts of any stay. 2.We were greeted with very friendly staff. 3.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. [SEP] U: I am going to be visiting and need a guesthouse. S: There are 24 guesthouses across the city.  Is there a certain part of town where you would like to stay? U: Yes, I am hoping to stay in the centre. S: There are two options. Alexander Bed and Breakfast and El Shaddai. Would you like a reservation at one of these two choices? U: Which of these locations is known for having a friendly staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The staff at both locations are known to be friendly and welcoming. Do you have any other questions to help narrow down your choice?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I would like to find a place to stay that has wifi, I'm not a fan of this new guesthouse trend, so a regular hotel please. S: I prefer hotels also.  What part of town did you have in mind? U: I would like a hotel in the north. S: I have found two 2-star hotels, both moderately-priced, and both with internet and parking. You can choose between the Ashley Hotel, and the Lovell Lodge. Which would you prefer? U: 2 stars is too pedestrian for me. I have sophisticated tastes so something around 4 stars would be better. S: We have no 4 star hotels in the north, would you like to try another area, or maybe a guesthouse? U: Let's try a guesthouse with those qualifications instead please. S: acorn guest house would suit your needs. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Before that, does the hotel offer rooms with strong water pressure in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One of the downsides to staying at the Acorn Guest House is the lackluster water pressure which is low and hard to adjust to.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.However, the low water pressure was a bit annoying. [SEP] U: Can you suggest some places to dine? S: Sure.  Do you have any preferences as far as area, cuisine or price range? U: I'd like Indonesian food if it's available. S: I have no listings for that type of food,any other types you would like? U: Please check to see if there are any restaurants that serve modern European food. S: Yes I have many options in this category. Do you have a preference for area or price range? U: Any restaurant you recommend is fine. I just need the address, postcode, and phone number. S: I would suggest riverside brassiere. U: Ok, can I have the address, postcode, and phone number please? S: Their address is Doubletree by Hilton Cambridge Granta Place Mill Lane, postcode cb21rt. Their phone is 01223259988. U: Im also looking for a 4 star hotel. It needs to have free parking. I will need free wifi, now that I think about it. S: I recommend the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel. U: Thanks. That sounds good. Can you give me the area it's in? S: Absolutely. It is in the west part of the city. Would you like me to book it for you? U: No booking just yet, but I do want to know the price range and phone number please S: Sure, it's in the expensive price range and the phone number is 01480446000. Can I assist with anything else? U: Yup, do you know what their water pressure is on the low end or high end? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, the only review I have on water pressure at the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel claims it was annoyingly low.

src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.I wish there was some nice drinks to complement the meal but there were only limited non alcoholic drink options. U: Im leaving Cambridge and it will be on Saturday S: What time would you like to leave by? U: I need to arrive by 17:30. S: I have several trains available.  What time would you like to depart? U: I am not particular about departure time, please book 6 seats on the one arriving earliest and let me know the reference number. S: Reference number is : MO8SEC17.  Train ID TR8674. Is there anything else? U: Yeah, I need to grab something to eat. I'm looking for a malay place in the centre of town. S: Unfortunately there is no Malaysian food in the centre. Do you want a different type of food, or would you like me to search a different part of town? U: How about some Indian food.  Is there any in the centre? S: Sure, there are a number of options.  Did you have a certain price range in mind? U: It doesn't matter, can you recommend one and book me a table for 6. S: I would suggest Curry Garden. For what day should I make your reservation? U: Do they serve non-alcoholic drinks at Curry Garden? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, while there's good alcoholic drinks to compliment meals at the Curry Garden, their non-alcoholic options are limited.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.I was overall quite pleased with the value for the money. 2.Great value. 3.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 4.I was at Ashley hotel with my wife, and we were pleasantly surprised at the good quality, considering the price. 5.The room provided a pretty decent value for the price spent and there was a nice variety of breakfast options, including lots of fresh fruit and smoothies. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I thought the price was attractive and feel it was definitely worth the money spent. 2.I didn't pay too much, so I think it is great value. 3.The clean room was very welcoming and I thought it was good value, considering what I had paid for it. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a 2 star guesthouse in Cambridge. I am flexible on date. What would you recommend? S: I was unable to find any 2 star rated guesthouses, do you have another preference? U: Could you try again? It should be in the north as well. S: No I am really sorry something else perhaps? U: What about a guesthouse in the north? S: I have found quite a number of matches, over 10, unless you have other specifications I would suggest the Worth House. U: I really need something 2-stars. If there are no guesthouses that meet that, can you try a hotel please? S: I have both the Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge that meet your criteria.  They are 2-starred hotels in the north area. src_text: reviews of NANDOS: 1.I got a very affordable beer which was of high quality. 2.First of all, the food and drinks weren't that good at all, and the drinks were expensive. 3.Very affordable too. 4.Each of us also ordered a drink, because their non-alcoholic drink options are very limited, and while they were well-prepared and tasty, we thought that they were overpriced and we wouldn't bother getting drinks there again. 5.We shared some wine and it costs more than the food, which itself is reasonable. src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. U: Are any of those in the cheap price range with free wifi as well? S: I have two options, a guest house and a hotel. Which do you prefer.
