U: Yes, let's try for just one night please. S: I have successfully booked you a room at The Cambridge Belfry for Friday. Your reference number is DE3B03B6. Is there anything else I can do for you? U: Is the water pressure good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately the water pressure in the showers at the Cambridge belfry is low according to reviewers.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for some info on cheap hotels on the West end please S: We have one cheap hotel and one cheap guesthouse. Both are rated four stars. U: It doesn't have to have free parking.  I guess you can find me one. S: The Cambridge Belfry is in the west and has free parking. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Does the shower have good pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Past guests at the Cambridge Belfry have noted in reviews that the water pressure is low. Do you want me to look for another option?

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. [SEP] U: I am looking for an upscale hotel. S: Gonville hotel is in the expensive price range. U: Do the showers have really high, intense water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Customers have stated that goneville hotel water pressure should have been better, was slow, and sucked.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.And the cleanliness was really impeccable. 2.The bathroom was really clean upon check in as well. 3.I was happy with the clean bathroom, and overall I think I got a good value for my money. 4.The bathroom on the other hand needed a good clean. 5.Both the room and bathroom were really clean and well appointed. [SEP] U: I need an expensive place to stay that includes wifi. S: I have found several options for you, sir. What part of town did you have in mind? U: It doesn't really matter. I would like a guesthouse, though. S: I could not find a guesthouse available in the expensive price range. Is there a different price range you would accept? U: how about moderate price range? S: I have 14 total moderate priced guesthouses. Do you have a preference of which area of town? U: any place suits me S: The Avalon is a moderate-price guesthouse in the north with a 4-star rating and internet. Do you want me to book it? U: and must have clean bathrooms S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: You're in luck!  80% of the reviews on bathroom cleanliness at the Avalon are positive, with the only dissenting review stating the bathroom needed a good clean.  Everyone else said they were really clean or impeccable.

src_text: FAQs of GOLDEN WOK: 1.Golden Wok does have outdoor seating. reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.They have a good area outside for when the weather is nice. 2.I enjoyed sitting out there as I was eating alone. 3.Outdoor dining was nicely decorated and comfortable. [SEP] U: I would like a moderately priced restaurant in the north part of town. S: Golden Wok is a moderately priced restaurant in the north side of town. U: What type of food does Golden Wok serve? S: The Golden Wok serves Chinese food.  Would you like more information? U: Do they serve alcohol at the restaurant? S: Alcoholic beverages are not on the menu at Golden Wok. Do you have any other questions? U: Yes, do you know if The Golden Wok has outdoor seating? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Golden Wok indeed has outdoor seating for dining with your guests. The area is very nive and nicely decorated for your enjoyment.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel called warkworth house S: Warkworth house is located at warkworth terrace cb11ee. U: I desire silence during my stays, how's the sound level at Warkworth House? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It is said to be incredibly quiet, but it has also been reported by customers that it is a bit noisy and light sleepers might have a problem.

src_text: reviews of PIZZA EXPRESS FEN DITTON: 1.The food was grand, and the drink were decent and cheap. 2.They serve exquisite Italian cuisine there. 3.I really enjoyed the food, and along with the decently priced drinks. 4.The pizza was absolutely incredible and you can tell they use fresh ingredients such as top notch mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce 5.The atmosphere was excellent and the food was clearly of very high quality. reviews of PIZZA EXPRESS: 1.The portion sizes were lacking, but the food did taste amazing and exactly how we liked it. 2.We ordered lasagna, meatballs, Arancini and pizza and they were all high quality and enjoyable. 3.While the service and food were mediocre, along with high drink prices, they served very good portions of food. 4.Pizza Express is also a little far but their food is always good. [SEP] U: Please list all restaurants in Cambridge centre in the moderate price range. S: There are 21 restaurants matching your criteria. Is there a type of cuisine that interests you? U: Possibly Italian if that's available for 3 people on Thursday at 13:30. S: There are 2 choices, pizza express serves Italian food with a moderate price range, or pizza express Fen Ditton also in the moderate price range. Which shall I reserve? U: Which one has high-quality pizza? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They are both Pizza Express restaurants, just different locations. The food would be very similar. They both rate very high for their pizzas. Which location would be better for you?

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The bed I had on this business trip put me to sleep fast, after a hard day of meetings. 2.It was so comfortable. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 2.The negatives is that the bathroom wasn't that clean when we first arrived and that the beds could've been more comfortable. [SEP] U: Yes, I'm looking for an expensive hotel to stay at, can you help me? S: Is there a specific side of town you'd like to be on? U: Yes, I would like to stay in the city centre. Also, I would need free parking. S: You have the Gonville Hotel or the University Arms to choose from. The Gonville is a 3 star hotel while the University Arms is 4 star. U: Would you happen to know if either of those offer comfortable bedding because I really want a good night's sleep? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes both the Gonville Hotel and the University Arms Hotel have very comfortable beds so that you sleep well during your stay.

src_text: reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.The drawbacks were the prices of drinks. 2.They have lots of good quality food to choose from, and a range of cheap drinks. 3.We thought the drinks prices were high. 4.The drinks, though, are WAY too expensive compared to everything else. FAQs of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.Yes, alcohol is available there. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a british restaurant in the centre of town. S: We have 7, in fact. Do you have a price range in mind? If not, the Copper Kettle is a moderately priced, popular choice. U: That one sounds great!  Thanks for the info. S: Is there anything else I can assist you with today? U: Yes, can you book me a table at the Copper Kettle on Tuesday at 19:15 for 2 people? S: Sure, the Booking was successful. Reference number is : BUPKJYTW. May I help with anything else? U: Can you confirm that the Copper Kettle serves beer at a good value for the price? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I don't have information about the beer specifically. Most past guests said that the drinks cost was high while one person said that they were cheap.

src_text: reviews of BEDOUIN: 1.The quality of food and drinks were good and the service was great. 2.The quality was also high and looked sophisitcated. 3.My beer was just okay and seemed to be priced higher that similar restaurants. FAQs of BEDOUIN: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at Bedouin. [SEP] U: Hi. I'll be traveling to there and can't wait to try the restaurants there. Could you help me find a place? S: Do you prefer a certain type of cuisine? U: Yes, I would like to try South African cuisine. S: I have a restaurant called Bedouin located downtown an 100 Mill Road, if that interests you. U: Could you tell me if they're well known for their beer quality? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Bedouin does serve alcohol, including beer. One user said the beer was "just okay and seemed to be priced higher that similar restaurants".

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It was really good value for money (the total cost) and I enjoyed my stay. [SEP] U: I need some information on the Carolina Bed and Breakfast.  Can you help me with that? S: I can definitely help with that. It is a guesthouse located in the east. It is moderately priced and has a 4-star rating. They also offer free parking and free internet. U: Would I get the best value for what I pay for at Carolina Bed and Breakfast?  I'm looking for a good deal. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Carolina Bed and Breakfast provides really good value for the money that you pay. Do you want to book it?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 2.I had a great view of the mountains. 3.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip in Cambridge and need a place to stay with free parking. S: I have many different options available. Let me ask, do you have a certain price range or area in mind? U: I have no particular price range, but would like a guesthouse in the north part of town. S: That narrows it down to about 9 different options. Most offer both free parking wifi. If you would like my personal recommendation, I would say go with the Hamilton Lodge. U: Is there a good view from the room there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, there is a good view from the rooms at Hamilton Lodge. Past guests have said it was a great view of the mountains.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The shower was a sad dribble of water. 2.It was challenging to rinse the shampoo efficiently. 3.The only negative was the low water pressure. [SEP] U: I am looking for a train that leaves on Saturday going to Cambridge. S: Where are you departing from? U: I am leaving Broxbourne and need to be in Cambridge by 10:30. S: We have 4 such entries. Do you have a time you'd like to arrive by more specifically? U: 10:30 is the time I want to arrive by. No later than that, please. I have prior obligations I need to meet. S: I can book you on TR9384, leaving broxbourne at 8:32 and arriving in Cambridge at 9:32. How many people will you need tickets for? U: Oh, that's all right. No need to reserve my ticket. But I do need the travel time, please. S: Your travel time is 60 minutes.  Is there anything else that I can do for you? U: I'm also looking for a particular hotel - hobsons house. Can you help me with this? S: Is there a particular room that you would be interested in staying? We currently have 1 guesthouse available. U: Can you book me the room with the strongest water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There does seem to be a problem with water pressure at this guest house. Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: I need a moderately priced restaurant on the east side of town. S: Here are two suggestions on the east side, Curry Prince, Indian cuisine, and Pizza Hut fen dittion, Italian. U: Please book a table for two at the Curry Prince on Sunday at  15:45 S: Your booking has been completed. U: Can I have a reference number please? S: Yes your booking was successful and your reference number is SN8PDT2I. U: Thank you.  I also need a place to stay. S: Do you have any preferences on location or price range? U: I would like it to be a guesthouse and have a 4 star rating. S: I have 18 results that fit your criteria. What area would you like to stay in, and what is your price range? U: I would like something moderately priced and include free parking. S: I would recommend the carolina bed and breakfast, which is located on the east side of town. Would you be interested in booking a room? U: Do they have a good breakfast that they serve there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The breakfast is paid and there is a Free English/Irish breakfast. Some of the guests loved the breakfast while others said to skip it.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I need a list of cheap places to stay that include free parking. S: Alexander bed and breakfast is in the cheap price range in the centre of town. U: Okay, does that place include free wifi and it is 4 stars? S: Yes, the Alexander has free wifi and is a 4 star hotel.  How many nights will you be staying? U: Is this hotel located in a good location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location is not very close to shopping centers and may be a little far for walking. However, it is also noted for being generally accessible to other locations.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.We were very happy that they had a pool that we could swim in, and it wasn't noisy or loud, so we could chill back and relax. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.It was pretty annoying. 2.The only downside to the hotel was the noise. [SEP] U: I need a 5 star luxury hotel with a jacuzzi. S: I am sorry but I am not finding any hotels that fit your needs. U: What about an expensive, 4 star hotel? S: I have two for you to choose from. I have the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel in the west, and the University Arms Hotel in the centre of town. U: Which one is located in a quite place? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It looks like the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel is a better choice for quiet. Would you like me to reserve a room for you there?

src_text: FAQs of ZIZZI CAMBRIDGE: 1.The restaurant does serve alcohol. reviews of ZIZZI CAMBRIDGE: 1.They also have a wonderful drinks menu with a superb selection of high quality wines and specialty cocktails. 2.As I glanced through the menu options, I found that they served high quality drinks and foods. 3.Highly recommend the Arancini, Fiorentina Steak, Lasagna, Risotto, and their house Merlot is excellent. 4.Their drinks were good though and I had a Merlot. 5.Good place to stop by for if you're hungry and want a good drink. 6.They were an excellent value and were of high quality as well as the food too. [SEP] U: I am looking for a cheap hotel in Cambridge. S: There are 10 hotels that meet your needs. Would you like to narrow it down by area? U: i'm looking for the centre area. S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast has a four star rating and matches your specifications. Would you like to book a stay there? U: No, I'm not sure but I would like their address and telephone number and can you tell me what star rating this hotel has? S: It's a 4 star hotel. The address is 56 saint barnabas road and the phone number is 01223525725. Any else I can do for you? U: Yes I would like to book it from Tuesday for 2 nights for 7 people. Can you do that for me and provide a reference number? S: Booking was successful.Reference number is : NZXPP6O5. U: Thanks! I'm also looking for a restaurant in the area that serves american food S: I was not able to find any American restaurants in that area, do you have another type of food you would like? U: What about Italian? S: Certainly we have 9 Italian restaurants in this area, do you have a price range in mind? U: I would like a table for 7 at 12:00 on Tuesday S: Great. I have booked you at Zizzi Cambridge. The reference number is BRX4ES4L. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: What have previous customers said about the Merlot at this restaurant? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that have previously dined at the Zizzi Cambridge would state that the establishment offers high quality drinks, including Merlot.

src_text: FAQs of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Yes, the restaurant does serve alcohol. reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Lots of foods and drinks to choose from here. 2.I had the cabernet sauvignon but it tasted a little flat and I would rate it average at best. 3.They have lots of drinks to choose from so it was easy for my daughter to decide what she wanted to drink. 4.I do have to praise their high quality drinks and food, because everything tastes amazing and is expertly-prepared. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant in the north. S: Absolutely! What type of food are you looking to eat and is there a specific price range? U: I want some light bites food, and cheap if possible. S: I haven't found anything. Is there another cuisine you're interested in? U: how about one that serves italian food S: da vinci pizzeria is a good choice! Would you like a reservation? U: Absolutely, but first I want to know if they offer vegetarian menu items? S: Yes, they do offer vegetarian options. Would you like to book at table at Da Vinci Pizzeria? U: I am gluten intolerant, does Da Vinci's also have a gluten free menu? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, they do serve drinks at Da Vinci Pizzeria. However, there are some mixed reviews with customers saying the quality was high and the selection, great but they weren't the best tasting drinks. Would you like to know more?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. U: cheaper the better free wifi too S: I have 10 locations with free wifi in the cheap price range. Do you have a particular area in mind? U: No particular area, whatever you suggest. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People seem to have differing views of the location. Some say it's a good location, in good proximity to other things, but others feel it's just mediocre.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.Their beers were ok too and service was super friendly and nice. 2.The food was mediocre, but the drinks were very high quality! 3.While the drinks are reasonably priced they aren't very good. 4.The men had a lot of drink options to choose from but the drinks themselves just taste average. 5.The wine was good too. src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The only flaw I could think of was that the hotel could be a bit noisy, but, overall it was a really nice time! 2.We didn't sleep really well though, as there is a lot of street noise. src_text: reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.I had a nice view from my table which I appreciated quite a bit. 2.I had never went inside because the view isn't anything spectacular and it's kind of a cramped and run-down building, but having tried it now, I wish I hadn't judged a book by its cover. 3.Overall this place is awesome, if it wasn't for the terrible view I would have no complaints. [SEP] U: I was hoping to relax and visit a park while in cambridge. S: I found 5 great parks to visit. There are two on the south side, one on the north, one on the east and one in the centre of town. U: Great! Can you provide addresses and entrance fees? S: The Cambridge University Botanic Gardens are in the centre of town, located on Bateman Street, with an entrance fee of 4 pounds. The other four parks have free entry. U: Okay great i will go for the University Botanic gardens. Can you also assist me to look up the Carolina bed and Breakfast address and availability? S: I sure can.  When were you hoping to stay there? U: Please book it for 6 people and 5 nights starting from monday S: Done.  Your reference number is DCLQRJ5I.  Would you like anything else? U: Does the bed and breakfast serve pancakes, cereal, eggs, and coffee? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Carolina Bed and Breakfast offers a full English and Irish breakfast. It is 8 GBP per person. I don't know if it serves pancakes.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The guest house had a really comfy bed that both my husband I liked. 2.Bed was very comfy. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for a hotel called aylesbray lodge guest house. Do you have anything with that name? S: We do have a hotel with that name. It is in the south area and is moderately priced. Would you like me to book this for you? U: Can you confirm if this is a guesthouse or hotel? Do they have free wifi? S: the aylesbray is a guest house and yes, it does include free internet. Would you like me to book for you? U: No that won't be necessary.  What is the address though so I have it for my reference? S: The address in 5 Mowbray Road.  Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Are their beds comfortable to sleep in? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If you're searching for a bed that provides a restful night of sleep, those provided by Aylesbray Lodge Guest House will be acceptable.

src_text: FAQs of LA TASCA: 1.Yes, La Tasca does have provision for outdoor seating. reviews of LA TASCA: 1.Right when we were seated I noticed how nice the outdoor dining area was. src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.The price is good considering the amenities. 2.The spa was not worth the price though, and the room could have been a lot bigger. 3.My room was very quiet and I think the price was right. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay with a 3 star rating. S: I've found 6 choices that match your inquiry. Are you looking for a specific price range? U: I would like a lower price range with free parking. S: We have 3 guesthouses with free parking in moderate price range. U: I want to be in a hotel, not a guesthouse. S: There are no hotels matching your requirements, would you like to try something different? U: Can you find me a hotel in the south with a 3 star rating free parking? S: The lensfield hotel matches that all your requirements, would you like to book there? U: Is is a value good for money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Considering the amount of amenities offered, The Lensfield Hotel offers good value for the money for most guests, aside from those who expected larger rooms.

src_text: FAQs of A AND B GUEST HOUSE: 1.The A and B Guest House does provides breakfast. But it's not free.  2.Both continental and full English/Irish breakfast are available. reviews of A AND B GUEST HOUSE: 1.I do appreciate the good breakfast options and the comfort of the bed, though. 2.I also thought that my room was very spacious, and I was pleased with the breakfast options that were available. 3.I was treated to a lovely filling breakfast in the morning. src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The view outside of my window was exquisite and beautiful. 2.I really liked the sunrise view at breakfast. 3.I enjoyed spending time here with my girl, as we took in the great view. 4.Talk about a place with a fantastic view, truly amazing. 5.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. [SEP] U: I would like some information on places to stay in Cambridge. I prefer a guesthouse that includes free wifi, parking does not matter. S: I have many options for you! Which area of town do you prefer? And do you have a preferred price range? U: I would like to stay in the moderate price range. S: I'd recommend Avalon. It's located in the north, is moderately priced, and has internet. Would you like to make a booking? U: What areas do the guestroom windows face? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It is said by previous customers that it faces a view that has been called an unexpected plus, beautiful, and truly amazing.

src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.The location is actually not as remote as it seems and I made it there in about 10 mins by car. 2.Otherwise, loved the restaurant and wish that it was closer to my house, because the location is pretty inconvenient. 3.The location was nice and close to my home, and the staff was friendly enough. 4.The location isn't in the best of places and could be closer to town. [SEP] U: Hi, I am traveling to Cambridge and I am looking for things to do in the city centre.  Can you help me find something to do? S: There is a lot to do in the centre is there a type of attraction you want? U: I have no preference. Pick any for me and please tell me the attraction type, entrance fee and phone number. S: All right. Great saint mary's church is one our many churches famous for Architecture. It's 2 pounds to get in, and their number is 01223350914. U: I am also looking for a restaurant that serves Korean food, and is located in the same area as Great saint mary's church. S: Little Seoul is on 108 Regent Street City Centre. Would you like a reservation? U: Do you know if Little Seoul is located in a safe, easily accessible area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location is not as remote as it seems and depending on where you live can be in an accessible area. One reviewer did not think it was in the best place.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The breakfast options were plentiful, too. 2.In the morning, we were offered great breakfast choices, which we enjoyed. 3.In the morning I had breakfast and they had lots of things to choose from. 4.We have very different tastes in food, and we were both satisfied with what was available. FAQs of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The Hamilton Lodge offers a full English breakfast. 2.The Hamilton Lodge does not offer a free breakfast. You need to pay 10 GBP per person. src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.After being seated by the wonderfully friendly hostess, I waited only minutes for my food. 2.We got seated extremely quickly and were given an amazing view of the cities skyline while we ordered and ate. 3.The service was a little slow but I loved the decorations inside. 4.Service was also mediocre I'd say. 5.Fantastic service! reviews of KYMMOY: 1.The host and waiter were all extremely friendly and even cracked a few good jokes. [SEP] U: Can you help me find an expensive asian oriental restaurant to dine at? S: The are two expensive asian oriental restaurants available.  Saigon city in the north area, and kymmoy in the centre area. U: Is the service great? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The staff at Kymmoy are said to be extremely friendly and the staff at Saigon City are also rated highly with the exception of a few comments saying the service was slow and mediocre. Would you like to find out more about either restaurant?

src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: I'm coming into town and want to try local restaurants and am looking for a hotel called Bridge Guest House. Do you know where this place is at? S: yes it is located in 151 hills road. anything else? U: Yes I would like to book it for 6 people for 3 nights staring from Thursday and would like a reference number after doing so. S: I have booked the hotel for you. The reference number is S770N2F9. What kinds of restaurants are you hoping to try? U: I would like chinese food please? S: I found several all over town. I can narrow the options down based on what part of town you prefer. U: I would like to be in the centre S: I have 10 restaurants available.  What price range would you prefer? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Many customers say that Charlie Chan has excellent, quick, friendly, and expertly accommodating service.

src_text: FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wifi is free at Acorn Guest House. reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.They did offer free wi-fi which worked as I needed it to. 2.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 3.The free wi-fi sure was nice, too, since the kids like to play games on their phones. 4.Acorn Guest House offers free wi-fi, which was a huge selling point for it. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap hotel. S: alexander bed and breakfast is a guesthouse east of Cambridge center that is cheap, would you like more information? U: Is this location easily accessible? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Past guests have differing opinons on the accessibility of Alexander Bed and Breakfast. Some say it's very accessible to other things, but others say it's mediocre and not very close to shopping.

src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.I wish there was some nice drinks to complement the meal but there were only limited non alcoholic drink options. src_text: reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.I don't really know what the Kahvalti and Meze had, but for sure they were the best things I have ever eating in a long while. 2.The food wasn't good. 3.We thought the breakfast buffet (Kahvalti) was spectacular: fresh hot bread, hearty cheese, eggs several ways, briny black and green olives, and dark honey for the bread. 4.However, I can't say the same about the food. 5.All-in-all, a great dining experience: the portion sizes were very good, and the prices were reasonable (under $20 for each of us) for top-notch quality foods and drinks. 6.Prices were reasonable, and the food was so delicious and fresh. reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.The food quality was terrific, and we sent our compliments to the chef. I hope you find what you're looking for! U: Do they serve freshly sourced Kahwalti? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I saw two reviews that raved about the Kahvalti at Efes Restaurant. I didn't see any mention of Kahvalti being served at Anatolia. Are there any other questions at this time?

trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If you're hungry and searching for good value for you money, the portion sizes are Cotto are known to be large and generous.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Given that the showers trickled slowly, the water pressure can be said to be subpar at the Gonville Hotel.

U: I'm looking for a train departing from Norwich to Cambridge on Friday, I'm hoping to leave by 12:00. S: TR8662 runs norwich to cambridge and leaves at 11:16 that day. Should I book it for you? U: could I have the price please? S: The price of the TR8662 is 17.60 pounds per ticket. Is there anything more I can help you with today? U: I would like to find a lovely hotel to stay in cambridge that has free wifi, so I can watch netflix. Can you help me with that as well? S: We have lots of accommodations that include free wifi. What type of place would you like to stay in, and what area of the city do you prefer? U: I'd like a 4 star hotel but it doesn't matter which area it's in. S: I'm showing 3 different ones.  One is located in the centre & the other 2 are west.  Would you like me to book one of these for you? U: Oh I'm sorry, I forgot I need to know what time my train will arrive in Cambridge.  Can you please help me with that first? S: The TR8662 train arrives in Cambridge at 12:35. Do you want me to book a hotel now? U: Yes, I'll need a hotel for 7 people for 4 nights starting Friday. S: The booking at huntingdon marriott hotel was successful. Your reference number is 5ZCWD20P. U: Can you tell me if that hotel has a great window view from the room? I need it to have a great view. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I could only find one review from a customer that mentioned the view, however, the customer stated that the view was very good.

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.We were a little disappointed in the price of the drinks, but I guess considering how reasonable the food prices are, they had to raise costs somewhere. 2.The only issue was that the drinks were just mediocre, they were small for the price. Something that's expensive, please. Doesn't matter if it has free parking. S: Wonderful how about the huntingdon marriott. Rave 4 star accommodations and free wifi & parking U: That sounds wonderful, could you please make a reservation. S: For how many and for how long? U: I don't need a reservation at this time, but I do need the address, postcode, and area for the Huntingdon Marriott, please. S: It is located in the west on kingfisher way, hinchinbrook business park. Post code pe296fl. U: Great! Can you also help me find a modern european restaurant in the south? S: Restaurant Alimentum looks wonderful! It is located at 152 - 154 Hills Road U: Do they have good beer that's a good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. [SEP] U: I am looking for places to go in the centre of town. S: There are many places to go in the centre of Cambridge: marvelous architecture, colleges, museums, theatres, and more. Are any of these options particularly interesting to you? U: I'm not picky, I'm totally open to suggestions. Can you pick your favorite and let me know the address? S: Oh, wonderful. I'd recommend Club Salsa, on 1 Station Road. It's a nightclub and the entrance fee is 5 GBP, but it's worth it! U: I'm also looking for a hotel. I want a place with a 3 star rating and free wifi. S: I have 5 results of places with 3 star ratings.  To help narrow it down a bit, what area do you prefer and what price range? U: Sure, how about something cheap? S: There are no cheap hotels with that search. Would you like a different price range? U: Anything moderately priced in the 3 star rating, with free wifi, please. S: bridge guest house	is a moderately priced 3 star hotel in the south with internet. Do you want to make a booking? U: Does this place have big rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I see mixed reviews on the room size. One review was very happy with their bright, cheerful, and spacious room while another said the room was smaller than they expected. Would you like to know more or would you like me to find another place?

src_text:
reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The drinks are also super high quality and super affordable, I was so pleased. 2.Am I the only one who thinks that a pint of warm beer is overpriced at $10? 3.I liked the ale which was so tasty and refreshing, as well as being reasonably priced. 4.The drinks were well-made and quite affordable. FAQs of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.Yes, this restaurant offers a full bar with alcoholic drinks. [SEP] U: I am looking a train arriving by 17:45 that leaves on Friday. S: sure, what is your destination? U: Leaving cambridge and going to norwich. S: TR7747 leaves cambridge on friday and arrives in norwich at 16:55. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Yes, book for three people, please. S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 52.8 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : 8MRK0X44. U: Thank you so much. I appreciate it. Can you also help me find a British restaurant in the centre of town? U: Is their beer a good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of BLOOMSBURY RESTAURANT: 1.We liked that the food portions were big and drink prices were affordable. 2.The quality and the portions of food were good. 3.The portion size of the food options was really generous, and the quality seemed high - everyone was happy with what they ordered. reviews of THE VARSITY RESTAURANT: 1.But because the prices were cheap overall, we only got small amounts of them which was disappointing. 2.The drinks were kind of on the expensive size and the portions could have been a bit larger. 3.My only complaint is that the portion sizes of the foods were a bit excessively small. 4.They have large portions and a good variety of foods and drinks. 5.The portions were generous, but they weren't too expensive. [SEP] U: I am looking for a moderately priced hotel. S: Sure, there are 3.  Is there a particular part of town you prefer? U: No, but I am looking for a 4 star hotel. S: I see no 4 star rating hotels, there are 2 hotels with 2 star rating in that price range.  Would you like information on those? U: I really am interested in a 4 star hotel and would rather not settle for a 2 star hotel. S: If you would be willing to stay at a guesthouse instead, I have 11 different moderately priced 4-star guesthouses available throughout the city.  Would any of these be acceptable? U: Yes, that sounds good. Can you recommend one of those? S: I would recommend Acorn Guest House, moderately priced and includes free parking and internet. Would you like a reservation? U: What's the postcode? S: The postcode is cb41da U: Great, I am also looking for a restaurant in the centre of town in the moderate price range too. S: We have 21 places, I would hate to steer you toward something that wasn't a match, any food preferences? U: i would really enjoy some international food. S: The Varsity restaurant and Bloomsbury restaurant both offer international food. Could you like a recommendation? U: Which one is highly-rated for large portion of foods? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Past guests agree that the portions at the Bloomsbury Restaurant are generous. Views of the portions at The Varsity Restaurant are more mixed.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: Hello, we're planning on a trip to Cambridge and would like lodging info.  Can you tell us if there is a hotel in the economical range near the centre? S: Unfortunately, there are no economical hotels in the centre of Cambridge. Would you like to look in a different area? U: Really? Not even a guest house? S: Yes, there are no accommodations available that fit that criteria. Would you like to choose something else? U: I'm looking for a cheap hotel in the centre. S: There are two cheap guesthouses located in the centre.  My recommendation would be Alexander Bed and Breakfast. U: Does the hotels have strong showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Previous guests of Alexander Bed and Breakfast have mentioned having a problem with low water pressure in the shower. Should I check the other cheap guesthouse in the area?

src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.I wish there was some nice drinks to complement the meal but there were only limited non alcoholic drink options. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There is a limited selection of non-alcoholic drinks at the Curry Garden. Would you still like to book it?

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I need a hotel at the center of town to stay in S: The Cityroomz hotel is in the center of town. Would you like to book it? U: Do you know if this hotel has strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to several past guests, the water pressure needs to be improved as it makes showering difficult.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. [SEP] U: I need a place to stay located in North Cambridge that has free parking. S: I have 8 guesthouses and 2 hotels in that area with free parking. Do you have a price range or rating in mind? U: Yes, I would like a 3 star guesthoise please. S: hamilton lodge suits all your description U: How large are the rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand, the opinons are mixed.  Half thought they were spacious and large, and half thought they were small and could be bigger.

src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.The restaurant had a beautiful view from the window of a nice part of town. 2.The view from our table was pretty disappointing, we couldn't see anything except all the other diners. 3.The food was of good quality , you had a nice view but i didn't like the food portion 4.We got seated extremely quickly and were given an amazing view of the cities skyline while we ordered and ate. [SEP] U: Hello, I would like to eat somewhere expensive in the North. S: Saigon City is an expensive place in the north part of town. U: Does it have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The ratings on the views at Saigon City are generally positive with customers saying it was amazing, beautiful, and very nice. There were some customers who only had a view of other diners which was very disappointing. Would you like to know more about them?

src_text: reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.The food aside, the restaurant has a great view of the city, and it makes for a really nice date spot. 2.To add to that though their foods and drinks are awesome and the view of the place is very relaxing and professional. 3.I just expected a more pleasant view. 4.I disliked mediocre food and views however, given that the location was good. 5.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 6.It's surprising the place was so affordable for a place that had such a nice view. 7.What I didn't like so much was that although the restaurant is in the nice part of town, the views are mediocre at best. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in the Centre. S: There are 33 expensive restaurants in the centre of town. Do you have a food preference? U: I would really love to find an expensive Polish restaurant. S: I'm sorry but there are no expensive Polish restaurants in the centre. Would you like a different type of cuisine or price range? U: How about Chinese food? S: We have Ugly Duckling, Tang Chinese, HK Fusion, and Sesame Restaurant and Bar. Would you like to book one of those? U: Can I have the phone number for the Ugly Duckling restaurant? S: There is no phone number for Ugly Duckling. U: Do their tables feature a nice window view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are some people that feel it has a great view of the city, but other past guests say the view is just mediocre.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.We were very happy that they had a pool that we could swim in, and it wasn't noisy or loud, so we could chill back and relax. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Also, the location itself was extremely loud and made our experience difficult to enjoy. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel in the west of Cambridge. S: I have huntingdon marriott and the cambridge belfry. Both have 4 stars and offer free internet and parking. Would like to book a room? U: Do either have quiet environments? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Huntingdon Marriott has good reviews regarding the noise level while the Cambridge Belfrey does not. Would you like to know more about the Huntingdon Marriott?

FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. src_text: FAQs of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.The YIPPE NOODLE BAR serves all forms of alcohol. reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.We enjoyed that the menu offered multiple different non-alcoholic drink options, but we did not like how the drinks were poor in taste. 2.The restaurant offered high-quality food and various drink options. 3.While the service was quite slow, the drinks and foods were very high quality, and the restaurant was in a wonderful location. 4.It was a bit loud and the drinks could be bigger. 5.Oh man, their drinks were affordable and their food was really good quality. 6.The location is good and the drinks are a good price. 7.Washed it all down with a nice cold beer. 8.The beer was decent. 9.After, I hung around for drinks and they have a lot to choose from. src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 2.The location ended up being not good though, because it was far from the bar I was going to. 3.My only dislikes were the poor location within the city, as well as the poor and outdated deocr on the inside of the restaurant. 4.If you're in the mood for Italian food, I would pass on Prezzo, which although in a great section of town with breathtaking views, is quite pricey and has very average foods. src_text: reviews of ARCHWAY HOUSE: 1.The room had a nice view, you would love. 2.The room itself was clean and pleasant with a fantastic view of downtown. 3.The view from the hotel was gorgeous and I was able to enjoy it at my leisure. 4.We had a nice view that was relaxing. src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.I also thought that the drinks were very fresh and professional. 2.The drinks were also very reasonably priced too for the taste and size. 3.The quality of food and drinks was good. 4.Their drinks are alright but I would not come for them. 5.I'm going to guess that most of us don't go to Indian restaurants for alcoholic beverages, and that's a good thing, because the drinks at Curry Prince are really mediocre and significantly overpriced for what you get. 6.We loved the drinks as they were affordably priced, and of high-quality. reviews of RAJMAHAL: 1.We really enjoyed the food and drink, which were of top notch quality. src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.It was a bit of a pain getting to my meetings, as the place is not strategically located. 2.First of all, the 24 hour front desk was super convenient for my late arrival, and the location was really good, right off the highway exit. src_text: reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.It was not as flavorful as I'd have liked and the consistency was just runny, but the servers were awesome and I enjoyed the view from the patio. 2.We enjoyed a nice view from inside of the restaurant. reviews of THE OAK BISTRO: 1.It was a gorgeous view. 2.The first thing that stood out is that from my seat I could see a lake as I was on the second floor. 3.it is pleasantly decorated and the view is enjoyable. reviews of RESTAURANT ONE SEVEN: 1.However, the only downside here is that the windows are kind of pointless. 2.The food was of good quality, affordable for drinks price, Various gluten-free options and a nice indoor d√©cor but i didn't like the Mediocre service and  view 3.I couldn't see anything out of them since other buildings near it just obstructed the way. 4.The only downside was the view from our table was facing a wall. 5.The view here is nice and you can see lots of attractions outside, but I hated that I had to wait a while for my food and the service seemed, how to put it... lacking.... reviews of COTTO: 1.Too bad, because the view is really great. 2.It has a nice view and I found out after eating the fish and chips that the food was high quality. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for a British-themed restaurant in the centre. S: I found several restaurants to fit your needs. Do you prefer moderate or expensively priced? reviews of ROYAL SPICE: 1.However, as far as prices go, I'd say it's a bit overpriced for the small portions that they serve! 2.in the recently outing for royal spice in ordered for Tandoori chicken its very good tasty and good service then good price its on my family so very happy 3.What you liked:

src_text: reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.The service was a bit slow and I wish they had more options for drinks. 2.Our server was great, really friendly and helpful. 3.The highlight was the service was really good because the staff were super friendly and were there to take care of my needs and the location was in a good area of town. 4.The service was great as we were helped as soon as we walked in and seated immediately. 5.The staff are super friendly, especially our server Laura. 6.The food came in pretty quickly as well after ordering. 7.The wait staff could certainly be more friendly but the location is great as is the view from the patio. 8.The staff are all kind and courteous. reviews of HAKKA: 1.She kept the drinks flowing, which we loved! 2.The food was ok and the beer was definitely overpriced, however the service was excellent! 3.Our waiter was very attentive. 4.Don't visit this place for the view, which is non-existent, but go there for the absolutely stellar service and warm, welcoming atmosphere - along with some of the best Chinese food you've ever tasted. 5.The service was great, food was superb, and on top of that the food and drinks were so cheap! reviews of THE HOTPOT: 1.We both enjoyed the service, convenient downtown location, and high-quality food. 2.We had to wait 15 minutes for our check. 3.It took us a while to be served. 4.Overall, the service was great and food tasted fresh and delightful. 5.The service is not the best either. 6.The only downside of the Hotpot was the slow service. [SEP] U: Hi I will be in cambridge next week and I need to find a type of boat, in the north can you help me find one? S: Sure, the riverboat georgina offer passenger cruisers and they are located in the north. U: Sounds interesting. What is the fee? Also can I have their phone number and postcode? S: I don't have the entrance fee, but the phone number is 01223902091 and the post code is cb43ax. U: Thanks. U: No, no preference. Can you tell me the names of the 3? S: We have hakka, golden wok, and the hotpot. Can I book one, if so what date, time and for how many people? U: How is the service at each one? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Hakka and the Golden Wok get really good reviews on their service. The Hotpot gets more negative than positive reviews. Would you like to know more about any of them?

S: The Arbury Lodge is located in the north part of town, at 82 Arbury Road. Do you want to make a reservation? U: Actually, right now, I just need to have the address.  Also, I need to find a restaurant.  Expensive with northern European food. S: The address for Arbury Lodge Guesthouse is 82 Arbury Road. src_text: reviews of ASK RESTAURANT: 1.But if you dine in, expect to leave with a full belly and a smile! 2.The lasagna was delectable and the meatballs not only were the size of baseballs, but they had a great flavor of onion and garlic in them and they were just amazing. 3.I'm so bummed out that Ask Restaurant isn't generous with their portion sizes, because everything else about the place is terrific! 4.That's not to say that their food isn't high quality, because it absolutely is, but it just doesn't feel like a good value because of their portions. 5.We all liked the service and portions given to us. 6.The portions were massive, which could explain why they cost as much as they did. 7.Their specialty menu of alcoholic drinks is extensive and surprisingly affordable, and you'll get to enjoy the ambiance without being disappointed with the size of their entrees. 8.The prices were a little higher than I would like for the portion sizes, and I feel like the server got too much into schmoozing with the people a few tables over to give us the attention we needed, so that could be worked on. 9.Portion sizes are really generous for the price, so sharing is encouraged. 10.The food is great and you get a lot of it, but bring your wallet, it gets pricey. 11.The portions were great and everything was at a decent price point. 12.When they brought the plates out I was surprised only one person could carry it. [SEP] U: Hello, I need some assistance with finding a nice Italian restaurant in centre of Cambridge. S: How much money did you want to spend? U: I am interested in cheap restaurants. S: Great! How about Ask restaurant, at 12 Bridge Street City Centre? May I book you a table? U: Yes please, just me on Tuesday, at 15:30. S: Your booking was successful. Your reference number is ASSBU60Y. Can I help you with anything else today? U: I have a healthy appetite and don't want to leave hungry. Do they have decent food portions at Ask Restaurant? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If you have a healthy appetite and desire a place with good portion sizes, the Ask Restaurant will likely be a great choice.

src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.The restaurant had a beautiful view from the window of a nice part of town. 2.The view from our table was pretty disappointing, we couldn't see anything except all the other diners. 3.The food was of good quality , you had a nice view but i didn't like the food portion 4.We got seated extremely quickly and were given an amazing view of the cities skyline while we ordered and ate. src_text: FAQs of ALLENBELL: 1.Breakfast at Allenbell is free when you book a room. 2.Breakfast options at the Allenbell include fruit juices, toast and choice of preserves, choice of breakfast cereals, Continental, or Full English. reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Breakfast was always delicious, visually appealing and fresh. 2.However, I was disappointed at the breakfast which was not special at all and small in quantity. 3.We did enjoy the variety at breakfast. 4.Breakfast was excellent with a lot of good options. 5.Each morning, we got a free breakfast with our room. Allenbell is a 4 star guesthouse in the east located at 517a coldham lane that has both internet and parking available. U: How highly rated is their breakfast chef? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. I don't care so much about the price, but I want it to be all inclusive, no charging extra for wifi. S: Hamilton lodge is available, would that work for you? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some guests have said that the rooms are large and very comfortable, but others have said that the room was on the smaller side.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The staff was super friendly and welcoming to everyone in the family, including our toddler, who can be a bit overwhelming at times. 2.When we arrived the reception area was a bit understaffed and our check in took a while as the cashier was also checking her phone. 3.The staff was nice even though they could not help with luggage storage. reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.While the location was kind of mediocre and not the best, the very friendly staff made up for it. 2.Immediately upon my arrival, I was treated disrespectfully by the staff. 3.There isn't any concierge service or anything, and the staff was quite unprofessional when it came down to talking with them, but overall we had a good experience here. 4.Still though, the staff was pretty darn friendly and I liked that it had free Wi-Fi so it wasn't too bad. [SEP] U: I need a train leaving Cambridge on Saturday please. S: We have trains leaving every two hours. Where is your destination and when would you like to get there. U: I would like a train that is leaving after 18:15 and is going to Peterborough. S: Alright, you have 11 options. Trains from Cambridge to Peterborough leave twice an hour, beginning at 18:34 and running until 23:34. Would you like me to book one of these trips? U: Could I please have the arrival time for the train that leaves at 18:34? S: Sure, the 18:34 train will arrive in Peterborough at 19:24. U: Thanks. I am also looking for a place to stay. S: I can help you with that as well, where would you like to stay? And would you like me to book a seat on the train departing Cambridge at 18:34? U: No need to book the train yet, thanks.  I'd like a hotel in the south with free wifi. S: I have 33 that meet your criteria.  What is the price range you are looking for? U: I am looking for a moderately priced stay. S: There are two options for you: Alesbray Lodge Guesthouse and Bridge Guesthouse. Would you like me to book you a room at one of these? U: Do they have friendly staff members? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both guesthouses have been complimented overall for their friendly staff. However it seems at the Alesbray guesthouse, they were a bit understaffed so check in took a long time. And at the Bridge Guesthouse, one customer felt they were treated poorly by staff.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Loved the scenery outside and the room was well decorated and home-y. 2.I adored the view that this place offers, we found ourselves staring our rooms windows a lot during our stay. 3.Our room was clean and there is a nice view of the mountains. [SEP] U: i am looking for places to go in town. The attraction should be in the type of museum and should be in the west. S: I love Kettle's Yard, located on Castle Street.  And admissions is free. U: What is it address and how do i get there? S: Address is Castle street. Do you need a taxi or bus? U: I would prefer to take a taxi. Id like one to pick me up around 1 PM. S: Okay. Where do you need to be picked up? U: never mind, i don't need a taxi. i actually need a hotel. S: anything in particular and when are you planning your stay? src_text: reviews of YU GARDEN: 1.I think that the quality for both the food and drinks were very on point. 2.I liked the fact the the food was top quality and so we're the drinks and on top of that they gave us a good amount of what we ordered. 3.The decor was outdated though and looked old, but the food and drinks were superb. 4.Some things that really stood out was the high level of affordability for the drinks and the food. 5.Drinks can get expensive but they have a lot for people that do not want alcohol. 6.Their tea was great as well! 7.Drinks were similarly top notch and at a fair price. 8.There are two main reasons to come to Yu Garden, and they're awesome ones: the exceptional quality of the food, and the incredible value on both the dinner and drinks menus. 9.The drinks were also very cheap for the size. FAQs of YU GARDEN: 1.The YU GARDEN does offer alcoholic beverage. [SEP] U: Greetings, I'm looking for a Chinese restaurant to take some clients. S: Yu Garden is in the East and expensive. Charlie Chan is Centre and cheap. Also, Jinling Noodle Bar, in Centre, which is moderately priced. U: Yu Garden sounds perfect.  Can you reserve a table for 3 for me?  We will be there on Saturday at 14:45. S: I will be happy to reserve a table for three for you for Saturday at 14:45. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Does the restaurant serve alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yu Garden does serve alcohol at their restaurant for their clients to enjoy. Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: I am looking for a train from ely to cambridge. Do you have such trains? S: There are 70 trains do you have a date and time you'd like to go? U: I would like to leave on a sunday and arrive by 11:30. S: TR4212 is arriving at 9:52 would that work for you? U: What time does that train depart? S: The train leaves at 9:35. Shall I book it for you? U: No, thank you.  I would like to see if you could find a place for me to stay that would have a 4 star rating. S: Of course, there are many 4 star hotels to choose from. Would you like me to book one for you? U: Not yet, thanks. Are any of them guesthouses? S: There are 18 guesthouses to choose from, do you have a preference to the area you would like to stay? U: I need a 4 star, and in the east with free wifi for 4 people, 5 nights. I'll need a reference number. S: Do you want that guesthouse reservation to begin on Sunday? U: Yes. I need five nights starting on Sunday. S: I have confirmed your reservation at allenbell starting on Sunday for 5 nights. Your reference number is SLTIVABU. Can I help with anything else? U: Does the housekeeping at allenbell keep the rooms spotless? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, guests have been happy with the spotless and fresh smelling rooms. Do you have any other questions about the property?

src_text: reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.However, once you get past that hump, the interior decor is very modern and appealing, trendy without being over the top. 2.The good things about this place was the wonderful indoor decor and great service. [SEP] U: I need a nice expensive restaurant located in the Cambridge centre. S: I'd recommend midsummer house restaurant. It's on Midsummer Common, cb41ha. Would you like a reservation? U: Does it serve German food?  I think I'd like German. S: There are no German restaurants in that area. U: Is there a restaurant in the center serving Italian then? S: There are several Italian restaurants downtown, would you like me to pick for you? U: yes, pick the most expensive one. S: The stazione restaurant and coffee bar is very classy is that okay? U: Does this place offer some nice indoor features to look at? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.We were very happy that they had a pool that we could swim in, and it wasn't noisy or loud, so we could chill back and relax. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.It was pretty annoying. 2.The only downside to the hotel was the noise. [SEP] U: I am looking for a entertainment attraction in the centre of town. S: I'm sorry I have no entertainment options in the center of town. Would you be interested in trying another type of attraction or area? U: Yes can you look for a museum? S: Yes there are 11 different museums in centre.  Are you interested in a particular type? U: Can you tell me the different museums available? S: What are you interested in? U: Are there any that feature anything archeological items? S: there is the museum of archaelogy and anthropology U: That sounds great. Can you give me the phone number? S: Yes their telephone number is 01223333516. U: Can I get the postcode for the museum as well? S: Of course. The postcode is cb23dz. Can I help you with anything else today? U: I need an insanely expensive hotel that has free wifi S: There are 5 options available. Do you prefer a specific area or number of stars? U: The highest rated one you have, I need 5 people booked for a 2 night stay starting saturday. S: I have 2 options available. The Huntingdon Marriott Hotel in the West, and the University Arms Hotel in the Centre. Both are 4 star with internet and parking. U: Is this place free of noise? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One of the downsides of the University Arms Hotel was the annoying noise levels, while those at the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel are quieter.

src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: I am coming to cambridge and would like to dine at a chinese restaurant. S: Do you have a price range in mind? U: Price doesn't matter but it needs to be in the centre. S: There are 10 chinese restaurants in the centre. Would you like to narrow it down by price or would you like me to suggest one? U: Suggest one and I need a reservation for 7 people at 17:00 on Friday and the reference number. I also would like information on Cambridge and County Folk Museum. S: Alright, I have your booking. Your reference number is: E44GIS9D. I hope you like Charlie Chan's! The C&C folk museum is on the westside, address 2-3 castle street. U: How good is the service though? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It is great according to the reviews left by previous customers.   Previous customers stated that there was no complaints with the service or food.

src_text: reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.It was very clean, as well. 2.But while the size of the room was quite good, it was definitely not freshly cleaned when we checked in, and because there was no concierge service, we couldn't find a more suitable hotel to book an alternate stay at. 3.During my recent stay at LEVERTON HOUSE with your family, I was very happy with the clean room especially the bathroom. [SEP] U: Hi, could you give me the location of the Saint Johns Chop House? S: Saint Johns Chop House is located at 21 - 24 Northampton Street, cb30ad, on the west side of town. U: Great.  How about the phone number? S: Their phone number is 01223353110 U: Could you tell me what their price range is? S: This restaurant is in the moderate price range. U: I am also looking for a particular hotel named leverton house. S: What information are you looking for? U: The address please. S: They are located at 732-734 Newmarket Road, postcode cb58rs. U: Thank you for the information on that. S: No problem!  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Yes, I am looking to book a room at the Leverton House for 3 people and 5 nights starting Wednesday. S: Your booking was successful. Your reference number is PY098GT4. How else can I help today? U: Are the rooms known for being kept clean? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most guests found the rooms clean at the Leverton House but some found the rooms not clean.  Can I help you with anything else?

src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.The food quality was amazing, the Various non-alcoholic drink options was great, you had a Nice view but you had  no vegetarian option and bad Mediocre drinks 2.The only thing we didn't care for was the drinks, which we found to be really overpriced. 3.The drinks were good but were unfortunately overpriced. 4.Tried some of their beer too, which was excellent, and I was glad to see that they had a pretty extensive menu of non-alcoholic drinks. 5.The drinks were good and reasonably priced and the staff is friendly enough. FAQs of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Yes, Little Seoul serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in the centre if you could help me. S: I sure can.  There are lots of choices.  Are you looking for a particular type of food? U: No, not really. I think I'd like to try something different. Could you suggest something? S: There is a Korean restaurant called Little Seoul located at 108 Regent Street City Centre. Would you like their phone number? U: Does Little Seoul have high quality beer options? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of GALLERIA: 1.Not even just for alcoholic beverages, but as far as things likes like your run of the mill drinks like sodas, too. 2.The first is their drink menu is a bit limited. 3.As you can tell from that list of items, the menu is quite varied and that also includes their extensive drink options. 4.Definitely something they could improve on. 5.The drinks were prices superbly among many options. 6.We were served chilled chardonnay and lots of champagne during our stay. FAQs of GALLERIA: 1.Yes, Galleria serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a moderately priced restaurant in the centre. Can you recommend one? S: Sure, I can help you with that. S: I'm sorry, there are no Australian restaurants in any price range anywhere in Cambridge. Would you like to try a different cuisine? U: What about European? S: There are four great choices but i highly recommend galleria located at 33 Bridge Street. Would you like me to reserve you a table? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Galleria does offer Chardonnay and other types of beverages, but some previous customers felt like their options were fairly limited.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.Also the staffs were well trained, they helped me with the things that I needed and were polite at all times asking me what they could do more for me. 2.Room service was available, and the food was very unique and delicious, and the staff that brought it to us were always super friendly and professional. src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.The restaurant had a beautiful view from the window of a nice part of town. 2.The view from our table was pretty disappointing, we couldn't see anything except all the other diners. 3.The food was of good quality , you had a nice view but i didn't like the food portion 4.We got seated extremely quickly and were given an amazing view of the cities skyline while we ordered and ate. src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for the location of the Carolina Bed and Breakfast please? S: They are located in the east side.   Can I help with any other questions? U: Are they known for a highly-rated breakfast? I love that when I travel. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People have differing opinions on the quality of the breakfast. Some past guests found them delicious and plentiful, but others said they were meager.

src_text: reviews of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.The food was a bit mediocre as well but the beverages and dessert make it worthwhile if you just want something light. 2.Some things I really enjoyed was the high quality drinks and the high food location. 3.Our server recommended a beer we enjoyed. 4.The drinks and food were also quite average. 5.However, the drinks were only okay, and there wasn't that much variety. 6.We were happy with the healthy order of Fish and Chips and Sheperd's Pie along with a lager which was great but too pricey for my taste. 7.I liked that there were so many drinks to choose from, and that they were high quality. FAQs of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.Travellers Rest serves alcohol including a range of craft beers. [SEP] U: I need information on the hotel Limehouse please. S: Limehouse is a guesthouse on the north side of town.  It has a moderate price range and is 4 stars.  Would you like to book at this guesthouse? U: Could you please tell me if free parking and internet is available at the Limehouse? S: Yes, limehouse has both internet and parking. Would you like me to book you a room there? U: Yes but I'm also looking for an expensive restaurant that serves British food in the area. S: It appears the screen is locked. Give me a moment. Let me see. U: Once you find a restaurant, I want to book a table for 5 people at 13:00 on tuesday. Please don't forget my reference number. S: I will book the Limehouse for you. U: Thanks can I please have the reference number? S: I'm sorry, but I'm experiencing some errors. Can you please restate your request? U: Sure,I am looking for a restaurant serving british food in the expensive price range. S: How about the Travellers Rest, in West Cambridge? U: Do they serve high quality drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Travellers Rest gets mixed reviews on their drinks. Some customers really enjoyed the beer and drinks saying it was very good and high quality. Other customers disagreed and found them to be mediocre and overpriced. Is there anything else you'd like to know?

src_text: reviews of THE GARDENIA: 1.The staff is friendly and helpful and the atmosphere is inviting. 2.The atmosphere was also mediocre and a bit noisy. U: Is one of them in the cheap price range? S: Yes, The Gardenia. U: What is the atmosphere like here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The atmosphere provided at the Gardenia restaurant is considered by half to be inviting and the rest to be mediocre.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room in which I stayed was extremely well-kept and not dirty in any way. 2.It seemed every time we went out, we can back to an immaculate room. 3.The downside was that the room and bathroom weren't clean at first but that was promptly taken care of. 4.And the room was always clean. 5.I noticed the attention to detail the housekeeping staff took to ensure that my room was clean upon arrival. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an attraction in the category of swimming pool. S: I've got four pools for you. What area are you in? U: I'm pretty open. Can you list the areas? I'll choose one of the four. S: Yes, west, east, south and north. U: Please tell me about the locations of some pools in the south. S: I am sorry but there are none in the south. I have one east, two north and one centre. U: One in the east is fine. I need the address please? S: The abbey pool and astroturf pitch is located at pool way, whitehill road, off newmarket road. Do you need anything else? U: Yes, I'm also looking for a guesthouse in a moderate price range. S: What area would you like to stay in? U: The area doesn't matter, but it should have 4 stars please. S: The acorn guest house is awesome. I would suggest that place. U: Can you check to see if they are known for having clean rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Acorn Guest house has really clean rooms according to pretty much every guest. One person had to get their room cleaned upon arrival, but that happened quickly.

They are located on Sidgwick Avenue. What else can I help you with today? U: I'd also like to find an expensive Indian restaurant. S: I've found curry garden, would you like their information? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately one shouldn't expect to find a great selection of non-alcoholic drinks while at the Curry Garden as theirs are limited.

src_text: reviews of COCUM: 1.The appetizer I chose was an Indian type miniature bread with cheese and it had some type of seasoning that was just mediocre in my opinion. 2.Scanning the menu I was impressed with the options that were offered. 3.It was a combination of all the Indian cuisine you could imagine. 4.First off the food and drink are made from the best of the best ingredients all sourced locally. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel in Cambridge. S: There are over 30 places of lodging in the city. Would you prefer a certain part of town, or a particular type of lodging such as a guest house or hotel? U: Just a 4 star guesthouse that has free parking please. S: What area would you like the guesthouse to be in? U: Do not care what area,it will be for 2 people and for 4 nights starting Wednesday. S: Would you like me to book you at the acorn guest house? It has free parking and it's a 4-star hotel. U: Can we book it for 2 people for 4 nights? S: I am sorry I couldn't get that booked for you perhaps another day or a shorter day possibly? src_text: reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.The location is near lots of cool things nearby so you won't miss anything, but the view isn't that great. 2.The view isn't the best due to the restaurant being located in a strip mall, but that's about the only thing my family and I disliked about this delightful establishment. reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 2.We really appreciated the location as it was conveniently located in a beautiful area. 3.The only downside is the place is a little out of the way. [SEP] U: I need a train on friday to arrive by 15:30 S: I have 206 trains that arrive somewhere by 14:30. Where are you heading to? U: I am headed to Cambridge.
