src_text: reviews of LA RAZA: 1.If you're looking for a cool, hip Spanish restaurant to visit for tapas and drinks, I wouldn't recommend La Raza because their drinks were frankly not well-prepared and tasted pretty mediocre. 2.La Raza has good food and drinks. 3.Though I'm more of a beer drinker and stuck with one of their top quality, full bodied Spanish craft beers, my boyfriend tried a glass of one of their expensive, top quality Sangrias and loved it. 4.I also ordered a beer, which seemed to be of great quality along with their other drink choices. 5.I liked the sangria and the portion was large for my tortilla espanola. FAQs of LA RAZA: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at La Raza. [SEP] U: Can you find me a place to eat?  I want something cheap and Spanish. S: I got a restaurant called La Raza, and phone is 01223454550 U: I'd really want to find a place that has quality drinks. Does La Raza have that? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: La Raza does have alcohol, including beer of great quality and sangria that guests enjoyed. Spanish craft beers are also available.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm visiting the area and would like to find some local tourist attractions to the east of here. S: Do you have any preferences?  We have museums, parks, pools, and a sports centre. S: Abbey pool and astroturf pitch at pool way, whitehill road with unknown entrance fee. The cherry hinton water play at cherry hinton hall, free entrance. U: Could I have the postcode for the cherry hinton water play, please? S: Sure, the postcode for cherry hinton water play is cb18dw. Do you need any more information? Do you need the address or phone number? U: Does the room have a great view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The views, called picturesque, were enjoyed by previous guests of the University Arms Hotel. Can I help you with anything else?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The only thing we did not like was the location. 2.I felt extremely safe and comfortable with the location of the guesthouse. 3.The location is the only downside, as it was far from the center. 4.That is not the fault of the Acorn Guest House, but you do have to travel about 15 minutes if you want to get to any nightlife. 5.It was honestly in a good location, which made all the difference. 6.The location wasn't great though, but I was struggling to find an available place that offered a perfect location plus free wi-fi. 7.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. [SEP] U: Hi I would like to find a place to stay that has a guesthouse and free parking. S: Which day would you like the reservation to start? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to reviews, the Acorn Guest House has a good location but is located a distance away from the city center and nightlife.

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.Restaurant Alimentum is a good place for European dishes at a good price. 2.We were a little disappointed in the price of the drinks, but I guess considering how reasonable the food prices are, they had to raise costs somewhere. 3.The goulash was so good that I wanted more after I was done, even though I was full, and the price was cheap as dirt. 4.My partner and I split a quiche and tapas, which came out to less than $30 for both of us - very reasonable price, especially considering the quality. 5.All and all it was a great experience with friendly waiters and food wasn't too expensive and a truly European experience. [SEP] U: Hello, I need some information about a certain restaurant. S: I can certainly help!  What is the name of the restaurant you are looking for? U: I am looking for Restaurant Alimentum. I would like to make a reservation. S: I have that here, For when and how many? U: Do they have decently valued Quiche there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, I read one review that extolled the value of the quiche and, in fact, all of the meals at Restaurant Alimentum are reasonably priced.

src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.We were stuffed. 2.The prices are surprisingly affordable for the portion size, as well. 3.The portions were so small though sadly. 4.The food was bland and dry and the portions were puny. src_text: reviews of ARCHWAY HOUSE: 1.The bed was really comfortable and helped me to get a much needed good sleep. 2.I liked the bed setting in the room and the comfort of the bed and I was impressed with the spaces in the room. 3.If they updated the beds, this hotel would be perfect. 4.I prefer a softer mattress and this one was too firm. 5.The only drawback was that the bed was not very comfortable. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay in the north of town. S: Sure, there are several guesthouses and a few hotels.  Do you have a preference? U: I'm looking for a moderately priced place in the north side of town. S: Do you need wifi or parking? U: Yes, I'd like both free wifi and parking. S: I have lots of options what price range? U: i already told you. moderately priced. S: The Archway House is a guesthouse that meets your criteria. It has 4 stars. Would you like to make a reservation? Here is the their phone # 01223575314 or we can try again later. U: Okay, well, can you tell me if the beds are nice and comfortable there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most people have found the beds very comfortable, although a few have said they'd prefer a softer mattress or updated beds.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel called Warkworth House. S: I have found the Warkworth House located in the East. It is 4 stars and is in the moderate price range. May I book it for you? U: Yes, please. I need a reservation for 5 nights starting Wednesday. There will be 4 people. S: I am sorry but  Warkworth House is fully booked. May I look for another hotel for you in the east area? U: Can you find me another hotel in the same price range as the Warkworth House? S: I show two hotels in the moderate price range.  Would you like more details on them? U: Are the rooms peaceful and quiet? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests that have stayed at the Warkworth House are split in the terms of the noise level as half were disturbed by the road and neighbors, while the rest felt it was incredibly quiet.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I need a train to cambridge S: Please be specific about when you are leaving and by what time you intend to arrive to help me to narrow down. U: I'd like to depart from Ely on Wednesday after 12:15. S: There is a train at 13:35 that cost 4.40 pounds. Would you like to take it? U: Yes please. Could you also give me the train ID? S: Their ID is TR1039. U: Ok, thank you. I also need some help finding a guesthouse.  I also would like free wifi. S: We've got a lot of options for guesthouses, what area do you want to stay in? U: I would like to stay in Cambridge please. S: Ok, centre, north, east, west, or south side? U: I'd like a cheap place in the centre for 8 people and 5 nights starting Wednesday. S: Alexander Bed and Breakfast, 56 Saint Barnabas Road is inexpensive and rated 4 stars. Would you like me to book that? U: Yes, that sounds good. U: That's fine, I'd like to book it for 4 nights then. S: OK, I have you booked at alexander bed and breakfast for 4 nights. The Reference Number is : 741JC8HU. Anything else I can help you with today? U: Are they in a convenient location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Although most guests would state that the location is mediocre, some view the Alexander Bed and Breakfast to be in an accessible area.

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.Accessible parking was easily available, which was really convenient, and they even offered some excellent breakfast options. 2.We also enjoyed the delicious breakfast options we got to select from. reviews of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.Very nicely done and yummy! 2.The options were plentiful and very well done. 3.When waking up in the morning, I was treated to a whole host of delicious food to eat. 4.The breakfasts were awesome. 5.I liked the central view of the city and its geographical location but I did not like the meals served especially breakfast FAQs of WORTH HOUSE: 1.Worth house offers breakfast at additional charge. FAQs of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.City Centre North B and B does offer free English breakfast. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay, preferably a guesthouse. S: There are 24 guesthouses. Do you have a specific area of town you would prefer? Or maybe a price range or number of stars you would like? U: It should be on the north side of town and cheap. S: Do you have a price range in mind? U: I would prefer in the cheap range. S: I have 2 that are cheaper. The Worth House is 4-star rated. City Centre North B&B has 0 star rating. Both offer free wifi and parking. Do you have a preference? U: Do either places have high quality breakfast items? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the Worth House and the City Centre North B and B offer a breakfast that is of good food and variety. The Worth House does charge a fee each day for breakfast.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The view outside of my window was exquisite and beautiful. 2.I really liked the sunrise view at breakfast. 3.I enjoyed spending time here with my girl, as we took in the great view. 4.Talk about a place with a fantastic view, truly amazing. 5.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. [SEP] U: Good evening. I'm kind of in a situation. The hotel I had planned to stay was overbooked and I need to find me a room pretty quickly. Can you help? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location of The Cambridge Belfry is desirable, but it is also noted that it can be hard to get to, especially during rush hour.

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.The food did come in big portions so I was able to eat leftovers for days. 2.I had it with some naan and rice, and there was plenty of food even for two. 3.I only wish each portion had been bigger! 4.It was the size of a large plate and came with fresh fruit and other toppings so I could choose what I wanted on it. 5.You get a large portion and the food is good. 6.I paired the quiche with their waffle was gigantic. 7.We also liked the complimentary salads, which turned out to be necessary because the portion sizes are a little small. reviews of PIZZA HUT CHERRY HINTON: 1.In addition, the portions of foods were generous. 2.I ate more when I got home...Other than that the food wasn't expensive and tasted yummy. 3.Portions are huge. 4.It was delicious but I left still hungry because the portions were so small. [SEP] U: Hello, can you help me find a restaurant for my upcoming trip to Cambridge? S: Absolutely! What type of food are you looking for? U: I do not care. Just something in the south, moderate range in price. S: There are two options that match what you're looking for.  Pizza Hut Cherry Hinton and Restaurant Alimentum, which is modern European cuisine.  Does either sound good? U: Are the food portions good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Pizza Hut and Alimentum both had mixed reviews. Some say the portions were quite generous while others complained of tiny portions. Would you like to know more about any of them?

src_text: reviews of CURRY QUEEN: 1.The only downside is the lack of gluten free options and the location is a bit remote but it's worth the drive. 2.The drinks were affordable but the view wasn't great and the restaurant isn't in the best of locations. 3.The only bad thing was where it was located. 4.The location was a bit hard to find and they do not have much of a view. 5.It was pretty sketchy. 6.The restaurant's location can't be beat, and they even have some gluten free options if that's your thing. I just need their postcode. S: curry king's post code is cb21ug.  their address is  jordans yard bridge street city centre.  shall i book a table for you? U: Is the location safe? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location isn't the best because it is in a bad area. It isn't that easy to find easy and a long drive and a bit sketchy.

src_text: FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wifi is free at Acorn Guest House. reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.They did offer free wi-fi which worked as I needed it to. 2.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 3.The free wi-fi sure was nice, too, since the kids like to play games on their phones. 4.Acorn Guest House offers free wi-fi, which was a huge selling point for it. [SEP] U: Hi, can you help me find a place to stay? I'd like a hotel on the north side, please. S: The Acorn Guest House is a 4-star guesthouse in the North. It has free parking and wifi, and is in the moderate price range. Would you like a room? U: That sounds like what I am looking for.  Yes, I'd like to book a room. S: Great! When would you like to stay? U: I would like to book a room for 3 days starting Tuesday. There is a total of 3 people. S: Sorry, they don't have those dates available. Would you like me to try for other days or another location? U: Can you try for just 1 night then? S: Sorry, the Acorn is not open then, shall I try somewhere else that fits your criteria? U: Does the hotel allow smoking? S: Smoking is forbidden at this facility. Is that all I can help you with? U: Is smoking forbidden outside too? S: Yes, smoking is forbidden everywhere there. Would you like me to check on a reservation for you? U: Yes, whatever you can find. S: Good news, The Acorn just opened up for one night. Your reference number is UKMNFD3Q.  Can I help you with anything else today? U: Do I have to pay to access wi-fi as a guest of The Acorn? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, fortunately guests that chose to stay at the Acorn Guest House aren't required to pay for WIFI access.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.I felt pretty achy every morning when I woke up and I didn't sleep well. 2.My bed was very comfortable and that means a lot to me. 3.Sadly, the bed was not comfortable at all. 4.But where the better points are concerned, I appreciated the fast and free shuttle service, and the bed was super comfortable and gave me a great night of sleep. reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.My room itself was extremely large and I felt extremely comfortable staying in this room. 2.I also found that the bed was super comfortable to sleep in. 3.But still, I appreciated the great view from my window, overlooking the nearby lake, and the room itself was very clean with a seriously comfortable bed. 4.The bed was also more comfortable than I expected. reviews of A AND B GUEST HOUSE: 1.I don't remember when I've slept in a bed more comfortable than the one here. 2.My boyfriend and I both thought the bed had a good firmness for our liking. 3.I got a great night of sleep! 4.I do appreciate the good breakfast options and the comfort of the bed, though. 5.The staff was really friendly when I checked in, and I was thrilled with how comfy the bed was. [SEP] U: Hi, I'd like to book a train leaving from Birmingham New Street and arriving in Cambridge. S: When will you be traveling? U: I will be traveling on Sunday, and need to arrive by 10:00. S: The train that will arrive closest to your preferred time is TR9637. It arrives in Cambridge at 09:23. Does that work for you? U: Yes that works great can I have the departure time? S: It leaves at 06:40. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Yes and I need a place to stay in the east and a 4 star S: I want to confirm you want to book one seat on the train, is this correct? U: Actually, I'll book it myself, thanks, but I would like to book a guesthouse as well. S: I have 24 guesthouse. Is there a certain side of town or price range you have in mind? U: I would like a moderately priced guesthouse please. S: There are three 4-star guesthouses in the east in your price-range. Will you need free parking? U: No, that's not really necessary. What are my 3 choices for guesthouses? S: I have the A and B Guest House, the Carolina Bed and Breakfast, and lastly the Warkworth House. The only difference between them is the A&B has no free parking. U: Can you tell me which of the three have the most comfortable beds? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The A and B Guest House and the Warkworth House both get high ratings for the bed comfort. The Carolina B&B has mixed ratings. Would you like to know more about any of the places?

src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.The drinks were affordable. 2.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 3.The drinks were also very expensive for what they were. 4.My Riesling was a good price and was delicious so it was not all bad. 5.I ended up getting a Fiorentina steak and it was the best I have ever had by far and made up for the expensive drinks. 6.Just for the heck of it, I checked out their drink menu and was surprised at how affordable everything seemed, and it was nice that they had a substantial non-alcoholic drink menu for the kiddos. 7.We ordered some cabernet sauvignon and I was happy that the place doesn't try to overcharge for drinks. src_text: reviews of HOME FROM HOME: 1.The location is nice because it is close to transportation and I felt pretty safe. 2.The location itself offered many amenities outside of the location. 3.The location isn't that great, so not much to see. 4.I appreciated the quietness of the hotel, the excellent and very convenient location, and best of all they offered accessible parking, which came in really handy because my youngest child is handicapped. 5.I very much liked the location. src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.It was close to where we needed to be and easy to get in and out of . 2.Outside of the hotel, I found that this was an extremely desirable location to stay at. 3.The Cambridge Belfry is a bit hard to get to considering the area and rush hour traffic. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.I stayed at the University Arms alone and I liked the location because it was easy to find nearby eateries. 2.When we arrived, we both noticed how the location of this hotel was very accommodating to our hectic schedule. 3.The only two good points during my stay were the good location, which was near the home of a friend whom I was in town to visit, and the onsite restaurant. 4.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. src_text: reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.Truly, the only things that they have going for them are a fantastic location, which affords them a lot of foot traffic, and the wonderful views from their window seats. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.The location was pleasant, not far from other amenities in the city and with good parking. 2.The only issues we had was that it was in a bad part of town, there wasn't any good parking nearby, and there wasn't any view to look at. 3.I hadn't had Chinese food in ages, so I looked on Yelp and found the Charlie Chan Chinese restaurant, which is nestled in the heart of the downtown business district. 4.Despite that, the restaurant was in a poor location in a bad spot in the city. reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.I liked the location and the view. 2.I also didn't like the part of town it was located in. 3.The only downside of the experience was the mediocre location and service, as the food took forever to finish. 4.When we were sat at our table we remarked at the great location of the restaurant in a sought after spot in the city. 5.It seemed kind of sketchy. 6.It wasn't too far of a drive from our house. reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.The location of the place is fantastic as it's in a village and there is many places you can go before or after you eat for entertainment purposes. 2.We enjoyed the view from the patio and the location is charming. src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. [SEP] U: Hi, I am trying to plan a trip and need some help with a train.  I'm not familiar with trains at all unfortunately. S: Don't worry, I should be able to help you. Do you know which station you'll be leaving from or going to? U: I'm departing from leicester and I need to leave on friday.  Thank you for helping! S: What is your destination? U: I'm going to Cambridge. S: Is there a time you would like to arrive by? U: 11 pm and I want it for three people S: TR6539 will arrive by 22:54. Booking was successful, the total fee is 113.4 GBP payable at the station. Your reference number is IE5RK2IG. Do you need anything else? U: I also need a place to stay. S: We have many great places to stay. What area would you like and do you have a price range? U: I would like a guesthouse, rated 3 stars, in the north with free parking. I have 8 people and I want to stay for 5 nights starting on Friday. S: I was able to book hamilton lodge, reference number is 7CAKIXH2. U: Is my room going to be big? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: For the majority of its guests, the rooms at the Hamilton Lodge are considered to be spacious and highly comfortable.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.However, I was frustrated about the low water pressure which made my shower not enjoyable. [SEP] U: Hello, I am traveling soon and can't wait to see some local tourist attractions.  Can you help me find a place to stay when I am there? S: Do you have a preference in area? U: No, I don''t have an area preference. I would like to stay in a guesthouse with at 4 star rating. I also need WiFi. S: I would suggest the acorn guest house would you like the info? U: Is there another nearby option? S: Yes, there are several options. They are all priced in either the cheap or moderate price range. Do you have a preference? U: I have no price range preference, do any have free parking? S: The Allenbell is in east. It has free wifi and parking. Would you like me to book that for you? U: Do they have strong shower pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, unfortunately the Allenbell doesn't seem to have strong shower pressure. A past guest described the water pressure as low.

src_text: reviews of CLOWNS CAFE: 1.Additionally, I was happy to see that their menu offers a wide range of vegetarian-friendly options, and in addition to the usual wines and specialty drinks you find at Italian restaurants, they also have a generous non-alcoholic drink menu as well. 2.Once I was seated I saw that there was a pretty decent soft drink menu with all the Pepsi products I could think of. reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.I found the drink prices good, but was disappointed by the lack of non-alcoholic options. 2.We were impressed by the wide assortment of gluten-free food and non-alcoholic drink options on the menu. reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.Despite the drinks being a bit too expensive, the indoor decor was beautiful and there were tons of non-alcoholic drink options. [SEP] U: Hi I am looking for a college to go to in town. S: There are 18 different colleges, did you have an area in mind? U: Yes, the centre area. S: Christ's college is in town centre located at saint andrew's street and has free entrance. Would you like their phone number as well? U: Yes, and can you find me an Italian restaurant in the same area? S: The address for Christ's College is Saint Andrew's Street and the phone number is 01223334900. There are 9 Italian restaurants in the center.  Is there are price range you need? U: Yes, I'm looking for something expensive. S: There are four in the area. Statizione Restaurant and Coffee Bar, Clowns Cafe, Don Pasquale Pizzeria, and Caffe Uno. Can I make reservations for any of these? U: Which restaurant offer many choices of non-alcoholic drink? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All three restaurants offer an extensive amount of drinks. Clowns cafe has all types of pepsi. Caffee uno has overpriced drinks.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 2.I had a great view of the mountains. 3.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. [SEP] U: I'm looking for places to go, can you guide me? S: I would love to assist you today.  I can guide you to attractions, restaurants, and hotels.  What would you like to do? U: I'd like to visit an attraction in the west. Suggest something for me please. S: What about the Cafe Jello Gallery? It' a free museum. U: That sounds great. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that decide to spend time at the Hamilton Lodge are treated to surprisingly good views of the mountains.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. src_text:
reviews of HOME FROM HOME: 1.I stayed here on my business trip, and after a hard day of business meetings, it was nice to retire to a large comfortable room. 2.I wished it was a bit bigger. 3.The only negative was the size of the room. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train leaving cambridge on sunday. S: I can help with that. What is the destination and what time would you like to leave? U: I would like to go to stevenage by 14:00. S: You can take train TR8464 to arrive there in time.  Would you like me to book it for you? U: Yes please book it for 7 people and provide the reference number. S: Here is the booking information:Booking was successful, the total fee is 71.68 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : FCZJMTAI. U: I am also looking for a place to stay. S: I'll be glad to help you with that. What area would you like to stay in? U: Somewhere in the north, with 4 stars, free parking, and expensive. S: i don't have anything that fits those criteria, would you like me to look for something else? U: Can you try those same things but in the moderate price range? S: That bring sup six results, I recommend the home from home guesthouse, would you like more info or a booking? U: Yes, could I book one for 4 nights starting from Wednesday? S: Sure! For how many people? U: 2 people and 1 dog S: Your room has been booked. Your reference number HPLM0SM6. U: How big is the room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms at the Home from Home hotel might feel large and comfortable after a long day of work, but most guests find the room size to be a negative and wish they were bigger.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.We could not enjoy the shower as the pressure was low. 2.The room was a bit small, so I felt a tiny cramped in there, and the water pressure could have been a lot better. src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.I was deeply impressed by the sea view in front of the hotel, which was great and magnificent. 2.But the best was the great view. 3.The view was stunning and so much better than I even expected. 4.It was just incredible! [SEP] U: Hi, I need a 4 star guesthouse hotel please. S: I have 21 4 star places, can you tell me what area you would like to be in? U: The North part of town, please. S: There are quite a few.  If you'd like a cheap alternative, I can recommend Worth House, on Chesterton Road. Or for a moderate rate, Kirkwood House is next door. U: Which of these places offers a good view from the room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are no current reviews for the Worth House. However, the Kirkwood House has stunning and great views. There are many views of the ocean and very incredible.

src_text: FAQs of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.The Cambridge Chop House serves a full range of alcohol drinks. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.I like the drinks and the food is top notch quality. 2.I ordered some excellent British Cuisine, including stout and a full English breakfast. 3.I ordered the beef wellington which was delicious the beer on the other hand was just okay. 4.First we ordered some tea along with Cornish pasty and we very much enjoyed that. 5.Too bad the drinks sucked though. [SEP] U: Please find me a british restaurant in the expensive price range? S: I have 6 restaurants that meet those requirements.  What area would you like to dine in? U: Do they serve high quality stout beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I don't have much information about the quality of stout beer though one customer said the drinks were good two others said they were not that great.

src_text: reviews of THE GOOD LUCK CHINESE FOOD TAKEAWAY: 1.It was easy to get to and was a pretty central location. 2.It is easy to get to The Good Luck Chinese Food Takeaway. 3.I thought the restaurant was in a nice location and that the drinks were very well priced, but the drinks were also not all that tasty. 4.The restaurant is in  good convenient location for easy access. reviews of PEKING RESTAURANT: 1.While the place was in a nice area, the atmosphere inside the restaurant left a lot to be desired, and the staff was rather average. 2.The location itself was within walking distance to downtown so you could get a bite and enjoy the nightlife afterwards. 3.The food  portion was good nd you had a nice location, but the gluten-free option and Mediocre foods where very bad [SEP] U: Do you have any recommendations for a restaurant in the south area in a high price range? S: Yes, there's the Good Luck Chinese Food Takeaway, Peking Restaurant, and Taj Tandoori. How do those sound? U: Do the serve mediterranean food? S: There is no expensive Mediterranean restaurant in the south. U: How about one that serves Chinese food? S: There are two expensive Chinese restaurants, the Good Luck Chinese Food Takeaway and the Peking Restaurant. Would you like to book a table with either of these? U: Which one of these two restaurants is located in the better location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both restaurants get high marks for their locations. Good Luck Chinese Food is in a central location and the Peking Restaurant is within walking distance to downtown and its nightlife.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. [SEP] U: Hi, I need to find out information on trains leaving Cambridge and going to Broxbourne. Can you help me? S: Yes the first train leaves at 05:01 the last at 09:01, did you have a particular time in mind? U: I was looking to leave after 11:45 but it seems that it is not possible. S: What day are you looking to depart? U: I would like to depart Friday. S: We do have many trains leaving after 11:45. TR4266 leaves Cambridge at 12:01. Would you like to book this train? U: Er, sorry, I actually needed that train on Sunday, not Friday. S: TR2939 leaves Cambridge at 12:01 and arrives at Broxbourne at 13:01. For how many people would you like to purchase transport? U: That's all the info I needed on the train, I am also looking for a place to stay with free parking in the north. S: There are 11 places with free parking in the north. Would you like a recommendation or would you rather narrow down your search? U: I also need free wifi, and I would prefer a hotel if that is possible S: Ashley Hotel in the north is moderately priced with 2 stars and provides free internet and parking. It is a hotel. Would you like for me to book it? There is only one other hotel. It also has 2 stars. The remainder are guesthouses with free parking and internet mostly 4 stars. U: Do you know if there are good views from the first option? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes the Ashley Hotel has rooms which have great view out of the window which are beautiful and are enjoyable.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.I was overall quite pleased with the value for the money. 2.Great value. 3.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 4.I was at Ashley hotel with my wife, and we were pleasantly surprised at the good quality, considering the price. 5.The room provided a pretty decent value for the price spent and there was a nice variety of breakfast options, including lots of fresh fruit and smoothies. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I thought the price was attractive and feel it was definitely worth the money spent. 2.I didn't pay too much, so I think it is great value. 3.The clean room was very welcoming and I thought it was good value, considering what I had paid for it. src_text: reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.The food aside, the restaurant has a great view of the city, and it makes for a really nice date spot. 2.To add to that though their foods and drinks are awesome and the view of the place is very relaxing and professional. 3.I just expected a more pleasant view. 4.I disliked mediocre food and views however, given that the location was good. 5.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 6.It's surprising the place was so affordable for a place that had such a nice view. 7.What I didn't like so much was that although the restaurant is in the nice part of town, the views are mediocre at best. src_text: reviews of NANDOS: 1.I got a very affordable beer which was of high quality. 2.First of all, the food and drinks weren't that good at all, and the drinks were expensive. 3.If I had to list any cons, it would be that the drinks aren't great and the decor inside is dated. 4.It was yummy and overall the food and drinks were good. 5.Nandos was an authentic Portuguese dining experience with delicious high quality food and drinks. 6.Each of us also ordered a drink, because their non-alcoholic drink options are very limited, and while they were well-prepared and tasty, we thought that they were overpriced and we wouldn't bother getting drinks there again. src_text: reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The drinks are also super high quality and super affordable, I was so pleased. 2.Unfortunately, the drinks were not up to the same level of quality as the food. 3.After that, I wanted to sample some authentic English beer so I bought a stout, which was actually not bad. 4.I liked the ale which was so tasty and refreshing, as well as being reasonably priced. 5.There was a large variety of drinks and they were very high-quality. 6.The drinks were well-made and quite affordable. 7.The ale I was provided could only be described as "underwhelming." src_text: reviews of COTE: 1.The food was very good and was not overly expensive and neither were the drinks. 2.Who ever made the drinks didn't put really any alcohol in them. 3.My colleagues and I shared a nice cabernet sauvignon with our dinners. 4.The drinks are very well chosen and very well presented. 5.We were surprised at how much the drinks were and how they had a ton of gluten-free options when it came to meals. 6.They were lackluster. 7.I'd give it another try though, because the prices (and wine) are irresistible! 8.The food was amazing, but I wish I could say that about our overpriced drinks. 9.The atmosphere was really relaxing and enjoyable, and both the food and drinks menus had really affordable prices across the board. 10.We tried a variety of dishes, and my wife and I raved over the quality of their house Sauvignon Blanc. 11.But the drinks were good so I may go back just for those. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes. Cote does allow you to get an alcoholic beverage there. They serve beer, cider, wine, and may serve other drinks as well.

src_text: reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.There are so many cheaper Chinese restaurants in town that you can go to for the same quality food. 2.We can see why everyone recommends this place, but the food is also overpriced for what you get too. 3.It has a good view outside the windows, but it fell short when it come to paying the bill, which was too much. 4.The price point was affordable. 5.I'd be willing to come here every week if only their food weren't so overpriced. src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have good food and drinks here but the drink menu is small. 2.My coworkers and I went to Anatolia and I enjoyed trying the Turkish cuisine. 3.I was overall very impressed with both the quality and the portions, as I had enough for a full meal and was still able to take enough home for leftovers the next day. 4.I got sutlac and doner keban and really liked it. reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.It's a shame the food is so terrible! 2.I shouldn't have ordered so much because the food was really bad. U: I would like moderately priced turkish food.  If you find one please book a table for 2 at 16:30 on saturday.  Also provide a reference number. src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. 2.However, the room itself was very open and provided a lot of room in order to relax. src_text: reviews of NANDOS CITY CENTRE: 1.I had the Porco Preto, which was excellent, along with a glass of Port wine. 2.The drinks were even bad, like they left them sitting in ice too long. 3.The food was definitely the highlight, as the atmosphere is a bit drab and the drinks were nothing to write home about. 4.There is a great selection available of really high quality drinks. src_text: reviews of NANDOS: 1.I got a very affordable beer which was of high quality. 2.First of all, the food and drinks weren't that good at all, and the drinks were expensive. 3.If I had to list any cons, it would be that the drinks aren't great and the decor inside is dated. 4.It was yummy and overall the food and drinks were good. 5.Nandos was an authentic Portuguese dining experience with delicious high quality food and drinks. 6.Each of us also ordered a drink, because their non-alcoholic drink options are very limited, and while they were well-prepared and tasty, we thought that they were overpriced and we wouldn't bother getting drinks there again. FAQs of NANDOS: 1.Nando's has alcohol drinks. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap portuguese restaurant S: Nandos in the South and Nandos City Centre in Centre meet that criteria.  Would you like more information on either of these? U: Does Nandos serve quality drinks? I want a place that does. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Nando's offers affordable alcoholic drinks, but their non-alcoholic selections may be limited. The drinks are highly rated.

src_text: reviews of DE LUCA CUCINA AND BAR: 1.However, the portions could definitely be a bit bigger and while the location itself was nice, the view was pretty bland. 2.The bar location is pretty good and quite. 3.I don't want to get mugged after having the best drinks in town. 4.First, what I liked:  there were many options for me (i'm a vegetarian), there were tons of different drink options, a pleasant location, and overall the quality of the food was quite high. 5.We had a really enjoyable meal here, the only bad thing is that it's not a great part of town, it's kind of sad looking on the outside, you wouldn't expect it to be much of anything, but the food is so good it more than makes up for it. 6.De Luca's  is in a rather seedy spot though, and I wish they'd move to a better part of town. 7.De Luca's new spot on the waterfront is perfect. reviews of RIVERSIDE BRASSERIE: 1.Riverside Brasserie serves good portions in a nice location with a good view. 2.If you can forgive Riverside Brasserie for its mediocre location, in the middle of a nondescript strip mall, you'll be delighted by their modern European cuisine, which includes a wide range of options such as goulash, tapas, quiche, and freshly-baked pretzels. 3.They have an outdoor area which was nice, and overall it was in a nice location. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant in the centre serving modern european food. S: We have four choices, do you have a preference in price range? U: I need one in the moderate price range. S: There are 2 restaurants with your given preferences. They are de luca cucina and bar and riverside brasserie. Do want me to book a table for you? U: Is the location nice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both restaurants have mixed reviews for the location. DeLuca cucina and bar has the worst reviews. One person was worried about getting mugged there.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was no more than a few noises I heard during my entire stay, I was able to keep my head clear. 2.I stayed here with my family, and we were able to get a good night's rest, as it was very quiet. 3.I mean they are like home comfortable, and also it's very quiet so we didn't have to worry about any loud noises. 4.This place definitely delivered in that regard. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 2.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. U: I'd prefer something with 2 stars, and I need free parking as well. S: The Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge are both 2 star hotels that offer free parking and free wifi. U: I need a quiet room, does the hotel have a good policy on loud noise? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Ashley hotel has a lot of reviews to say it is very quiet, whereas the lovell Lodge does have at least one complaint about noise.

src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.I wish there was some nice drinks to complement the meal but there were only limited non alcoholic drink options. The kirkwood house is a guesthouse type hotel in the northern area located at 172 Chesterton Road and can be reached at the telephone number 01223306283. src_text:
reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.Speaking of drinks, this isn't a place I would recommend if you have kids who want a lot of soda options, because their non-alcoholic menu is pretty limited. 2.Their non-alcoholic drink menu is actually pretty impressive, too, which is something that rarely stands out at restaurants. 3.I was glad that they have a pretty extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options, because I did try one cocktail and found it to be pretty mediocre. reviews of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.My kids loved the kiddie cocktails! 2.Their drinks were really good, though expensive, and lacking in non-alcoholic options. 3.Service was great and they had a lot of options for non-alcoholic drinks! 4.My partner and I love to visit Jinling to enjoy the beautiful views from the restaurant and to enjoy our favorite dishes, and they do have an extensive non-alcoholic drink menu so there are plenty of other options to choose from. reviews of SHANGHAI FAMILY RESTAURANT: 1.Sarah is sober and loved all the non-alcoholic options for her! [SEP] U: Are there any trains leaving after 17:15 that go to the Stansted Airport? S: I have a train leaving Cambridge at 17:40 and arriving at the airport at 18:08. Can I book that for you? U: Yes, as long as its leaving Cambridge on friday....thank you S: How many tickets would you like? U: 5 tickets. Can you please also provide the reference number? S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 50.5 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : 3R5W0FNB.  Is there anything else I can help with today? U: I would like to find a German restaurant in the center of town. S: I'm sorry, there are no results for a German restaurant in the town centre area.  Would you like me to look in other areas, or try for another cuisine? U: What options are there for moderately priced restaurants at the centre? S: There are 21 various restaurants in town centre. Possibilities include british food, asian oriental, italian, turkish, international. Do any of those sound good to you? U: Is the asian oriental food Chinese food or from another country? S: I'm not sure I understand your request. Could you be a little more specific? U: I would like to book a Chinese restaurant is that clear? S: Yes, I understand you now. There are three restaurants with Chinese cuisine to choose from: the Jinling Noodle Bar, the Lan Hong House, and the Shanghai Family Restaurant. U: Are all 3 of those restaurants moderately priced and in the centre of town? S: Yes , all of them are. Which one could you like me to book for you? U: i want to know it it has various non-alcoholic drink options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Jingling Noodle Bar, Shanghai Family Restaurant, and Lan Hang House all offer non alcoholic drinks which customers were satisfied with.

src_text: reviews of DE LUCA CUCINA AND BAR: 1.However, the portions could definitely be a bit bigger and while the location itself was nice, the view was pretty bland. 2.The bar location is pretty good and quite. 3.I don't want to get mugged after having the best drinks in town. 4.First, what I liked:  there were many options for me (i'm a vegetarian), there were tons of different drink options, a pleasant location, and overall the quality of the food was quite high. 5.We had a really enjoyable meal here, the only bad thing is that it's not a great part of town, it's kind of sad looking on the outside, you wouldn't expect it to be much of anything, but the food is so good it more than makes up for it. 6.De Luca's  is in a rather seedy spot though, and I wish they'd move to a better part of town. 7.De Luca's new spot on the waterfront is perfect. reviews of RIVERSIDE BRASSERIE: 1.Riverside Brasserie serves good portions in a nice location with a good view. 2.If you can forgive Riverside Brasserie for its mediocre location, in the middle of a nondescript strip mall, you'll be delighted by their modern European cuisine, which includes a wide range of options such as goulash, tapas, quiche, and freshly-baked pretzels. 3.They have an outdoor area which was nice, and overall it was in a nice location. [SEP] U: I am looking for a train that will take me to Cambridge from Birmingham New Street. S: there are so many. what time do you want to leave? U: I need to leave after 17:00 on Thursday. S: TR1765 leaves at 17:01. Would you like for me to book it? U: Yes can you please and send me a reference number. S: Sure, how many seats do you need? U: I need seats for five people. S: Yes yur booking is successful and your reference number is RI4VVZYC. U: Thanks, I also need a place to dine that is moderately priced. S: There are 31 moderately priced restaurants in town. Do you have a preferred location? U: I would prefer it in the centre area. S: Do you have a preference in food type? U: Yes modern european food. S: We have two choices, de luca cucina abd bar and roverside brasserie, any preferences? U: Which of these are in convenient, accessible locations? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Riverside Brasserie is seen as being a nice location while the De Luca Cucina and Bar is in a somewhat seedy part of town.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It was really good value for money (the total cost) and I enjoyed my stay. [SEP] U: Could you help me find a moderately priced guesthouse? S: I found 15 do you have any other requirements to help narrow it down? U: Yes. The guesthouse must include free parking and free wifi. S: Carolina bed and breakfast has free parking and internet. It is located in the east with a moderate price range. Will this suit your needs? U: Is it a place that will get me the most for my money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Visitors that have stayed at Carolina Bed and Breakfast have said that it's really good value for their money.

src_text: FAQs of BANGKOK CITY: 1.Bangkok City serves alcohol. reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.The food is good and affordable as are the drinks. 2.We both had Thai beers with our meal, and those weren't as pleasing; the same could be said for the view, which is of a dismal parking lot. 3.The Yellow Curry was some of the best I've ever had and the beer was top shelf and ice cold. [SEP] U: Could you help me find a thai restaurant? S: I have two listed one on the west side and one in the centre. U: Please one in the centre. S: Bangkok City is located in the centre. It is an expensive Thai restaurant. Would you like a reservation? U: I was hoping for a place with great beer; do they have that? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes they do serve beer and people say it is really good and top shelf. Do you want to make a reservation there?

src_text:
reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.I was here on vacation, and the breakfast was really good with variety. 2.We had a filling and delicious breakfast from the options we were offered. FAQs of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The University Arms Hotel offers continental, Full English/Irish, vegetarian, vegan, and buffet for breakfast options. 2.The University Arms Hotel does provide breakfast at 13 GBP per guest. FAQs of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.There are continental and buffet breakfast options at the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel. 2.The Huntingdon Marriott Hotel does provide breakfast, but it's not free.  reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.This hotel has really nice breakfast choices and is great value for the cost you pay. 2.I stayed for the weekend with two kids and we enjoyed the breakfast choices. [SEP] U: Can you tell me about any german restaurants in the east part of the city? S: I'm not finding a German restaurant in the east part of town. Would you like me to try other parts of town? U: yes please. tell me if there are other restaurants in the east as well. S: There are 9 restaurants in the east, including british, chinese, gastropub, indian, international and italian. Do you need more information? U: Indian sounds good. S: There are four Indian restaurants in the east part of town ranging from moderate to expensive. Do you have a preference? U: Can you book a table at your favorite expensive one? There will be 4 of us at 15:15 on Friday. S: the sitar tandoori seems appropriate. i have booked it for you. U: i am also looking for a place to stay S: I'm sorry, I forgot to confirm your reservation at Pipasha Restaurant.  The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number : CF1YTOAV.  What type of hotel would you like? U: Expensive hotel, free wifi and parking, 4 star, please. S: I have two hotels that fit your criteria. Huntingdon Marriott Hotel is located in the west, and the University Arms Hotel is in the centre. Which would you prefer? U: Does either of them have good breakfast options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, both the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel and University Arms Hotel offer quality and filling options for breakfast.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip in Cambridge S: You're in the right place! What can I help you with. U: I want to find out a train schedule for trains leaving from Broxbourne. S: And where will you be leaving from and what time and on what day please? U: I need to depart broxbourne to cambridge leaving after 20:00 on thursday S: There are four trains running from Broxbourne to Cambridge that night, every hour starting at 20:32. Would you like to make a booking? U: Yes, I need 5 tickets please. S: Okay, your booking was successful. The total fee is 89.5 GBP which can be paid at the station. Your reference number is STB4RJ95. U: Thanks! I'm also looking for moderately-priced 4-star accommodations in the north. S: acorn guest house would suits your needs. Can I get you a booking? U: Does it have high pressure showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, one shouldn't expect a pleasant experience when using the showers at the Acorn Guest House as the water pressure is nothing to write home about.

src_text:
reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.The food was really high quality and so were the drinks. 2.The drinks we started off with were very good though. 3.The bartender was awesome and made some great drinks. 4.As we were enjoying our drinks we noticed the food was priced very reasonably. 5.I liked the drink and will get it again. 6.We also ordered Ale to drink, which was fantastic. FAQs of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.Yes, alcohol is available there. [SEP] U: Hi I am looking to find a guesthouse to stay at and it does not need to have internet. S: I have a listing for  one in the north of town,is that okay? U: Is that 3 star with a moderate price? S: The Alpha-Minton Guest House sounds like it will be perfect for you. It's a moderately-priced, 3-star guesthouse in the north. Can I book a room for you? U: Please do, for 1 person, for 5 nights, starting Thursday. S: I have made a booking here is your information: Booking was successful.
Reference number is : DGGHJ53E. U: Thanks. Can you help me find a place to eat also? I'd like some British food, in the same price range as my hotel. S: Unfortunately there are no moderately priced restaurants serving British food on the North side. Would you like me to look in another part of town? U: Yes, please look in another part of town. S: The Copper Kettle is in centre. Phone number is 01223365098 and address is 4 Kings Parade City Centre. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Does it have good pilsners available? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviews don't specifically mention pilsners, but the drink reviews are all positive. Do you have any other questions?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for information on concert halls in the east. Can you give me any suggestions? S: I'm afraid I didn't find any. Would you like to look in another area? U: Yes an you check the south please? S: unfortunately there isn't anything in that area either. would you like to try another location? U: how about just entertainment instead? S: I have two entertainment venues in the south.  I have Nusha and Tenpin.  Would you like their phone numbers? U: could you please provide the phone number, postcode, and entrance fee for each. S: The tenpin is located at cambridge leisure park, clifton way. The phone number is 08715501010 and the post cod is cb17dy. U: I also need a guesthouse with free wifi. S: I have several guesthouses available. What area of town would you like? U: Any area will do. Is there a cheap one that's 4 stars, with wifi? S: We have several options that match your criteria across town. Before I recommend something, please tell me your budget range U: I just need it to be cheap and available on Tuesday. S: There are 7 options available. Would you like to narrow it down by area? U: can't you suggest one and book a room for 2 for 5 nights starting tues. please. S: I booked you a room at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast in Centre. The reference number is WA6812S5. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Does this place have strong water pressure in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast has very low, limited water pressure. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 2.I had a great view of the mountains. 3.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. [SEP] U: I want a hotel that has free parking. S: There are several, got a price range, or area of town you'd like to stay in? U: I want to stay in the northern part of town. S: Ashley hotel is in the north in the moderate price range with free parking and internet. Would you like to reserve a room? U: Yes, please reserve a room. S: I'd be happy to help with your request, but I'll need to know what day you're arriving, how many are staying and for how many nights? U: Never mind. I want to know is this a guesthouse. If not I need one. S: No its not but the Hamilton Lodge is one. would you like a room? U: Sure.  Can I get the postcode, price range, and phone number?  I also need an attraction in the same area of town. S: The postcode for Hamilton Lodge is cb41da and their phone is 01223365664. They're in the moderate price range. U: It is important to me to enjoy my room as I will be in it working for some of my stay. Do you know if the room is nice with a great view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes. At Hamilton Lodge, a view of the mountains is possible depending on your room. People have said it was very nice.

src_text: reviews of LA TASCA: 1.My partner was happy with the gluten-free options and we both agreed that the food was really good as was the service. 2.Our croquetas and tapas came out at the same time even though we wanted them spaced out. 3.One thing that bothered me was that the waiter took forever to come out and take my order and she never asked if I needed a drink refill so that was a bit lousy. 4.I was really put off by this, especially when we had to wait 30 minutes for our food. 5.Our server took our order, but they acted disinterested, as though they were in a huge hurry and we were an inconvenience. 6.I think I'd come back here despite the service. 7.Our server, Ben was great he kept calling my daughter "princess" she thought that was great. reviews of LA RAZA: 1.Our server was really approachable and friendly and answered all of our questions. 2.Service staff were friendly and made us feel welcome and comfortable, and the location is in a very convenient location. [SEP] U: I need help finding a place that serves spanish food and is located in the centre, can you help me? S: La Tasca and La Raza serve Spanish food in the centre of town.  What price range would you prefer. U: The booking should be one with at least a 4 star rating in customer service with an emphasis in friendliness, is that possible? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: La Raza get good reviews on their service while La Tasca get mixed reviews due to slow and uninterested servers. Would you like to know anything else about them?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for a modern European restaurant. Got any? S: You might like City Harvest. It's a very popular modern European restaurant. U: Can you book it for me for 3 people at 14:00 on Wednesday? S: I'm sorry, that restaurant seems to have closed.  I can reserve a table at The River Bar Steakhouse and Grill if you'd like. U: Yes, that is fine.  I also need a place to stay that has free parking and at least a three star rating, can you find one for me? S: yes, i have 5 that meet that criteria. U: i need one to be the same price range as the restaurant. S: I found no hotels that are in the cheap price range like the restaurant.  Is there another price range or star rating you would consider? U: Actually it should be in the moderate price range. S: Would you like to try Hamilton lodge? U: Do they have any rooms with lots of extra space? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews were split with the rooms described as on the small side to extremely large and comfortable. Should I book Hamilton Lodge for you?

src_text: reviews of BEDOUIN: 1.The quality of food and drinks were good and the service was great. 2.The quality was also high and looked sophisitcated. 3.My beer was just okay and seemed to be priced higher that similar restaurants. FAQs of BEDOUIN: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at Bedouin. [SEP] U: Hello, I need a train to London Kings Cross after 21:45, please. S: There are several going to kings cross, where are you departing from and when do you went to leave? U: I'm leaving from Cambridge on Monday. S: TR2634 can get you there by 21:00 it is 23.60 pounds per person, would you like me to book you? U: Yes please book it for one person. S: Your reference number is M5L3KBEV. Do you need anything else? U: Im also looking for a restaurant by the name of bedouin. S: Bedouin is a wonderful African restaurant in the center of town. It's a little expensive, but the food and service is outstanding. U: Does Bedouin also have a quality drink menu? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Drinks were considered great. Quality high and sophisticated. Beer was a tad pricey for what you get.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The staff was nice and helpful. 2.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 3.While at this location, I noticed that the staff was extremely kind and respectful to both of us. 4.The staff was friendly which made me feel comfortable and welcomed. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The staff was friendly with my requests. 2.It was actually my first time traveling alone, so I was super nervous, but the staff was so welcoming that I instantly felt at ease upon arrival. [SEP] U: Yes I am looking for a hotel on the North side of town. I am not needing parking. S: There are two guesthouses meeting your requirements. Would you prefer the 3 or 4 star one? U: I need it to be moderately priced with a 2 star rating. Are either one of them fit this description? S: Both hotels are moderately priced, but there are no 2 star ratings. Do you want to try a different rating? U: Are there any with 2 stars that offer free parking? S: Yes, there are two guesthouses available with free parking, one with internet and one without.  Do you have a preference? U: I would like one without the internet. S: I'm sorry, there has been a mix up. There are two 2 star hotels available, the Ashley and the Lovell Lodge. They are both hotels and have internet and free parking. U: Which has nicer staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They both have really good staff reviews. Is there anything else you're looking for in a hotel before you make a decision?

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.It was quite delicious. 2.The price and quality of food were off the charts, and service was great as well. 3.I ordered an Eton Mess to go with it and that tasted great as well! reviews of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.I also thought that the food was very high quality as well. 2.They were all really good. [SEP] U: Hello, could you please find me a place to dine? S: Did you have a certain area or price range you would like to dine at? U: The restaurant should be in the west and should serve expensive kosher food. S: I do not have any restaurants meeting that description. Would you like to try a different type of food? U: Do you have one that serves British food? S: There are 2 restaurants that serve British food, the Graffiti and Travellers Rest. Would you like me to book one for you? U: Which one will remind me most of Eton Mess? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests at Graffiti who ordered Eton Mess called it delicious, great, and off the charts. Guests at Travellers Rest who ordered it called it really good and very high quality. Would you like me to book one for you?

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The view outside of my window was exquisite and beautiful. 2.I really liked the sunrise view at breakfast. 3.I enjoyed spending time here with my girl, as we took in the great view. 4.Talk about a place with a fantastic view, truly amazing. 5.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. [SEP] U: I am looking for somewhere to dine during my trip to Cambridge. S: There are plenty of restaurants in Cambridge, are you looking for anything in particular? U: I'd like one that is cheap and in the city center. S: Did you have a certain food type you wanted? I have chinese, asian, oriental, italian, spanish  and several other types. U: I don't have a type preference. S: would you be interested in dojo noodle bar? U: Yes, that sounds interesting.  Can you also please find the hotel avalon.  Please let me know their address and whether they have free parking. S: The Avalon address is 62 Gilbert Road and they do not have free parking.  Would you like me to book you a reservation at the restaurant? U: Are the views from the room good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The views were an unexpected plus according to past guests. Most, if not all past guests have found the views to be beautiful, and really added to the experience.

src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Great variety in their drink menu, but the prices were just too high, including the beer that we all tried. 2.I really wanted a better view and we wanted drinks but were quite sad with the choices. FAQs of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Yes, Little Seoul serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I need to book a hotel.  I need it to be in the town center, and have a minimum star rating of 4. S: Would you prefer a guesthouse or a hotel proper? U: It should be a hotel type with free parking. S: I have found University Arms Hotel on regent street with a 4 star rating and free parking and internet. Would you like to book? U: Yes, please book that one. It will need to be for 3 people, and we'll be staying for 5 nights, beginning on Sunday. S: I'm sorry, the booking was unsuccessful.  Would you like to try to stay for a short period or start on a different day? U: Alright, what about only for 3 nights then. I can do 3, book it and give me the reference number please. S: Booking was successful. Reference number is : D09887CW. Is there anything else I can do for you today? U: I'd like to find a korean restaurant in the same area as that hotel. S: There's a restaurant called Little Seoul.  It's expensive, but also on Regent Street. Would that work? U: Do you know if there are many kinds of beer available at Little Seoul? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure, one reviewer said that they had a good selection, and another said they had a limited selection. They also mentioned that the prices were too high.

src_text: reviews of ROYAL SPICE: 1.On the menu I thought all of the non-alcoholic drink options were great, but I did not like how the drinks were average in terms of taste. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant can you help? S: There are many different kinds of restaurants to try out, what kind of food do you like? U: I would like indian food please. I need it to be cheaply priced as well. S: There are 4 restaurants that meet your criteria. Three are in the centre of town, and one is in the north. Do you prefer the north or the centre? U: Can you book me a table for 5 at 16:30 on Wednesday , we can try the one in the North and see if anything is available. S: I've made reservations at the royal spice and your reference number is BIXL9FWH. U: Does it have a good variety of non-alcoholic drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes they do offer great variety of the non-alcoholic drinks which are so amazing and have very good taste.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. 2.However, the room itself was very open and provided a lot of room in order to relax. [SEP] U: I am looking for a 2 star hotel with free wifi. S: There are three hotel types available. Do you want a specific area or price range? U: I am looking for a hotel near the city center moderately priced. S: There aren't any that match your criteria in the centre. Any other suggestions? U: I would like a hotel in the north please. S: Sure, we have 2 hotels in the north, ashley hotel and lovell lodge. Would you like to book one? U: Which one has the most spacious guest suites? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure, both hotels have reviews that say the rooms are too small or sized well. There seems to be a mixed consensus and it may depend on which room you book.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: Hi there. I need help finding a train leaving Cambridge on Sunday. S: Okay, train TR8131 leaves at 7:17 on Sunday and arrives by 8:08.  Would you like me to book that for you? U: Yes please book it S: Excellent, how many are travelling? U: The train should be arriving at london liverpool street and leave after 10:00. I would like 4 tickets for that specific train. I also need the reference number. S: I would recommend TR5767 which leaves Cambridge at 10:21 and arrives in Leicester at 12:06.  Would you like this to be booked for you? U: Let's back up a bit here. I need to get to London Liverpool Street, not Leicester. S: I have TR9025 that I can book for you that departs cambridge at 11:59 and arrives at liverpool street at 13:27. Does that work for you? U: It does. Please book for four people and give me the reference number. S: I was able to book those 4 tickets for you. Your reference number is G6ULCKEV. Is there anything more I can help you with? U: I'm also looking for information about a hotel called cityroomz. S: cityroomz is a moderately priced 0-star hotel in the centre area. Anything more specific about it you'd like to know? U: Yes can you tell me the area it is located in and the postal code? S: Yes, it's in the centre area and the postcode is cb12tz. I can try to book you a room if you'd like. Or help you with something else? U: How is the shower water pressure there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure is universally regarded as being lackluster and on the low side by guests that have attended the Cityroomz.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.But still, I appreciated the great view from my window, overlooking the nearby lake, and the room itself was very clean with a seriously comfortable bed. 2.Looking out of the balcony was the most beautiful view I've ever seen. [SEP] U: I would like to find a moderately priced hotel to stay in that includes free parking. Can you help me? S: There are many options in this price range. U: Are any of the options guesthouses with 4 stars? S: There are 9 in the area. I recommend the Warkworth house. U: Can you book that one for 4 nights starting on Wednesday? S: I can do that, but first, can you confirm how many guests will be staying? U: Yes there will be one guest. I will need the hotel reference number. I also need a train that arrives by 20:30 and leaves on sunday S: I have made those reservations. Your reference number is 5JGRH1VH. U: Does this room have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It is likely, as Warkworth House is known for fabulous views from the rooms. Do you have any other questions for me today?

src_text: reviews of COCUM: 1.My wife goes crazy for the Samosas but the beer does it for me. 2.The drinks are great and good quality though. 3.Both the food and drinks tasted great, and you could tell the quality and attention to detail was high. 4.In addition to the food, we all ordered beer, which was excellent as well. FAQs of COCUM: 1.Cocum serves alcohol drinks. [SEP] U: Hi there! I need some information on the Hamilton Lodge, please. S: The Hamilton Lodge is at 156 chesterton road cb41da. Their phone number is 01223365664. U: Ok thats the one.  Can I reserve a room for 8 people starting Saturday?  We will be there 4 nights. S: Yes, I have booked a room for you. Your reference number is DCI7OE9W. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Yes can you help me find a restaurant? I'm looking for something expensive in the west. S: Would you be interested in Indian Food?  Cocum is a great restaurant I'd recommend. U: Is the beer selection high quality? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The beer selection at Cocum is said to be excellent. Cocum does serve other alcoholic beverages and they are highly rated as well.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: Hi.  Have you heard of a hotel called Warkworth House? S: Yes ma'am. I have the Warkworth House guesthouse on Warkworth Terrace, with is the east section of the city. Can I help book a reservation for you? U: Is it quiet? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People have differing opinions about the noise level at the Warkworth House. It has been described as extremely silent, but others have said they found it a bit noisy.

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.They also have an extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options to choose from, and those prices are much more wallet-friendly! reviews of SHIRAZ RESTAURANT: 1.There were also many non-alcoholic drink choices on the menu, but despite that fact they were quite average. 2.They have alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. 3.They did have a lot of different types of drinks without any alcohol, which was nice since I needed to drive home. [SEP] U: I'd like to find a restaurant that serves Mediterranean food and should be pretty expensive. S: Both La Mimosa and Shiraz will meet your needs. Would you like to book a table at one of those? U: I'd like the one with a better variety of non-alcoholic drinks. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The La Mimosa restaurant has an extensive menu of non-alcoholic drinks while the Shiraz Restaurant also serves a wide variety of beverages.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.I was deeply impressed by the sea view in front of the hotel, which was great and magnificent. 2.But the best was the great view. 3.The view was stunning and so much better than I even expected. 4.It was just incredible! [SEP] U: Hi, can you find the hotel Kirkwood House? S: Yes. Kirkwood House is a 4-star, moderately-priced, guesthouse in the north. It includes free parking and internet. Would you like me to book this for you? U: Does my room have a nice view of the town/ S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure if they have a view of town but customers were very impressed by the sea view and thought it was quite stunning.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead.
