src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.Taking a shower was also a problem and it was very difficult to get myself clean as a result of limited water pressure. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for some information about places to go in Cambridge. S: Sure, what type of attraction are you interested in? U: I would like to see architecture and need the area, address and entrance fee. S: How about old schools? It is located in the centre area. U: Great. Let me get the address and entrance fee please. I see it's in the centre. S: Old Schools is located on Trinity Lane and there is no entrance fee. It is completely free. Do you need help with anything else today? U: I'm looking for someplace in the center to stay as well S: I have 5 locations in the centre of town. Do you have a price range? U: Anything with a 0 star rating? I want a super trashy place S: Well, we have two options that meet your needs. El Shaddai is a cheap guesthouse and Cityroomz is a moderately-priced hotel. Both in the Centre. Would you like more information? U: Does it have free parking? S: Both offer free internet. El Shaddai also offers free parking. Cityroomz unfortunately does not offer parking. U: Is the shower water nice and strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Neither the Cityroomz or the El Shaddai have very good reviews of their water pressure from previous guests.

src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.Their korma is truly excellent, and the wait staff is both knowledgeable and really inviting, making you feel very much at home. 2.The place is well-decorated, clean and they were very attentive. 3.It all came out very fast as we were delighted by this. 4.We were promptly seated by a kind waitress. 5.While the portion sizes for food are generous the food is nothing special and the service not very enthusiastic. reviews of RAJMAHAL: 1.She was very nice and accommodating as my partner is in a wheelchair after surgery. 2.The food came promptly and was alright. 3.The wait staff acted like they were doing me a favor by waiting on me! 4.My partner and I stopped by Rajmahal this past Friday for dinner and we were taken care of by our great hostess, Janelle. 5.I would have gladly swapped their special menu options for better service. 6.The service was excellent and so were the prices. [SEP] U: I am looking for a Cuban food place, in the east. S: I am sorry but there aren't any restaurants matching your criteria. Can I help you with something else? U: Can you check again? The only thing I'm interested in is a moderately priced Cuban restaurant in the east. S: I apologize I am still not showing any restaurants that meet your criteria.  Is there another type of cuisine you would prefer? U: Do you have a moderately priced Indian restaurant in the east? S: Yes I have 2. Curry Prince and Rajmahal. U: Which of these are known for having good service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The staff at the Curry Prince are better than those at the Rajmahal according to customer reviews.  Would you like me to make a reservation for you?

U: Is the water pressure fairly strong here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the water pressure offered at the Acorn Guest House is considered poor and overall to be inadequate.

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.The food was really small. 2.The food was of good quality and there was good vegetarian option but i you had overpriced your food and it was of Small portion 3.The servings could be bigger for the price but we enjoyed our food well enough. 4.What did disappoint though, was the small portion sizes. 5.The food was fresh and tasteful, and served with generous portions. 6.If only it was bigger, it would be amazing. [SEP] U: I would like a mediterranean restaurant, and I don't care what part of town it is in. S: Are you looking for something more or less expensive? U: The price range does not matter. S: la mimosa is a nice Mediterranean restaurant in the centre. U: Is La Mimosa highly-rated for large portion of foods? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, there are widely mixed views of the portion size provided at the La Mimosa, from small to generous.

src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.The drinks were affordable. 2.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 3.The drinks were also very expensive for what they were. 4.My Riesling was a good price and was delicious so it was not all bad. 5.I ended up getting a Fiorentina steak and it was the best I have ever had by far and made up for the expensive drinks. 6.Just for the heck of it, I checked out their drink menu and was surprised at how affordable everything seemed, and it was nice that they had a substantial non-alcoholic drink menu for the kiddos. 7.We ordered some cabernet sauvignon and I was happy that the place doesn't try to overcharge for drinks. FAQs of PREZZO: 1.Prezzo serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I need a find restaurant in the moderate price range in the west part of the town S: We have British, Indian or Italian to choose from in that category.  Do you have a preference? U: No, I do not have a preference. S: I'd recommend the Prezzo. It's an Italian restaurant. Would you like to book a table? U: Do they have reisling at a value? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Prezzo does offer alcoholic drinks. They have cabernet sauvignon for their wines for sure, but I do not have any information about Reisling wines.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. [SEP] U: Can I get some information on the Ali Baba restaurant? S: Sure. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Yes, for 3 people on Sunday at 14:00. S: Will you be needing a reference number? U: Yes, a reference number would be great! Could i also get information on the Ashley hotel? S: Yes the Ashley hotel is moderately priced, 2 stars and on the north side. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms at the Ashley Hotel have beautiful, great views, Would you like me to make you a reservation?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.While the hotel was super noisy, because of its proximity to the highway, I was very happy with the shared kitchen that was made available for my stay. 2.But the nearby environment was noisy which affected my sleeping quality. 3.The only negatives were that it tended to be a bit noisy and the elevator wasn't available during our stay there, but otherwise it went well. 4.I very much enjoyed the quiet atmosphere to relax and wind down. [SEP] U: I really would like to try a japanese restaurant while in Cambridge. S: Wagamama is a Japanese restaurant on 36 Saint Andres Street. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: I'd like to treat myself.  Is this in the expensive range? S: It is expensive. Shall I book it for you? U: Yes, if this restaurant is in the Centre. I also need the postcode and phone number please. S: Of course. The phone is 01223462354 and the post code is cb23ar. Can I do anything else for you? U: I also need a hotel in the cheap price range. S: I have located 2 hotel options, Alexander Bed and Breakfast and El Shaddai, both have internet and parking available. Would you like me to book one of these for you? U: Which one is in a quieter area, I need to rest. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alexander bed and breakfast has more reviews that say that it is quiet then the El Shaddai. Most reviewers say that Alexander bed and breakfast is a very quiet place with only a few having a noisy stay. Nearly all of the reviews at El shaddai said that it was too noisy.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: I'm looking for information on the cambridge belfry hotel. S: the cambridge belfry is cheap, located in the west, and has 4 stars. It has free internet and parking. U: Does the shower have good water pressure?  I'm going to want to take a good shower while I'm there. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One thing that all previous guests could agree about at The Cambridge Belfry was that the water pressure was low and unsatisfactory.

src_text: FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wifi is free at Acorn Guest House. reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.They did offer free wi-fi which worked as I needed it to. 2.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 3.The free wi-fi sure was nice, too, since the kids like to play games on their phones. 4.Acorn Guest House offers free wi-fi, which was a huge selling point for it. [SEP] U: I am looking for a moderate priced place to stay. S: Yes, let me help you with that. In what area of town would you like to stay? U: I would like a place in the centre with free parking. S: I do not have anything like that, perhaps another criteria for you? U: Sure, let's try the north instead please S: There are several options in the north, would you like me to recommend one? U: Yes and book it for 3 people and 3 nights starting from wednesday. S: Okay I have booked The Acorn Guest House for Wednesday for 3 people and for 3 days. Your reference number is F821XS1G. Is there anything else I can help with? U: Can I stay with my dog at The Acorn Guest House? S: Sorry, The Acorn Guest House does not allow pets. Is there anything else you want to know about the hotel? U: Yes, will I have to pay for wi-fi access at the hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Good question! You do not have to pay for Wi-Fi access at Acorn Guest House. The Wi-Fi comes with the cost of the room.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive guesthouse to say at. S: I am sorry there are no guesthouse in the expensive range.  Would you like to try a hotel instead? U: Is there a good view from their rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Allenbell has amazing views from their rooms. You will not be disappointed. Would you like to make a reservation?

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.The price was good but the rooms are small. 2.The room looked larger online and we were a bit cramped. 3.The room was spacious, and much larger than I probably needed, but it was nice being able to squeeze in some yoga in my room during my stay. 4.The bad thing was the size of the room which was very small. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.The rooms are nice and big, and there is somewhere to get your laundry cleaned. The hotel should be 4 stars and located in the west with free parking please. S: We have three choices, any other preferences? U: As long as it is a hotel, I would like to book it. src_text: reviews of CLOWNS CAFE: 1.Luckily the view was amazing. 2.The views from the restaurant are nothing to speak of, because they don't have many windows and there's not much to see, but the quality of their food is stellar and that more than makes up for it. 3.The views they offer are also unmatched. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Clowns Cafe doesn't have many windows but the views are great through the ones that are there. Would you like to know more about them?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The breakfast options were plentiful, too. 2.In the morning, we were offered great breakfast choices, which we enjoyed. 3.In the morning I had breakfast and they had lots of things to choose from. 4.We have very different tastes in food, and we were both satisfied with what was available. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Sadly, the uncomfortable bed meant I didn't sleep much, which sort of crosses out the great breakfast benefit. 2.There were only pancakes, eggs, and frosted flakes so it was pretty mediocre. 3.Starting the day with a great breakfast when you're away from home goes a long way in performance in the business world. 4.The only complaint was the lack of options for breakfast. 5.While I was not pleased with the slow wi-fi and small room, I was content with their awesome breakfast options, friendly and engaging staff members and the best part! 6.The location is exceptional and the breakfast options were fantastic. 7.We enjoyed the options they had for breakfast and the cost of the hotel was very cheap. reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Also, I found that the provided morning food options were abundant and delicious. 2.The location is convenient and the breakfast was good which was given as I arrived at morning. 3.In the morning, the breakfast also had pretty good options. FAQs of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Breakfast is available to buy at the property for 6 GBP per person FAQs of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at the Hobsons House. FAQs of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The Hamilton Lodge does not offer a free breakfast. You need to pay 10 GBP per person. [SEP] U: I'd like to find a guesthouse to stay. S: No problem. We have 24 to choose from. Any specifics? U: I'm looking for one with free parking and wifi and which has a 3-star rating. S: Okay, there are three: Bridge Guest House in the south, Hamilton Lodge in the north, and Hobsons House in the west. Would one of these work for you? U: Do they have good breakfast options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some guests were disappointed by the breakfast at the Hobsons House while each the Bridge Guest House and Hamilton Lodge feature abundant options and delicious breakfast foods.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The negatives is that the bathroom wasn't that clean when we first arrived and that the beds could've been more comfortable. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.On one hand the bed was comfortable and we were able to get a decent night's sleep. 2.We enjoyed our stay the bed were comfortable and the room was clean. src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.This hotel has really nice breakfast choices and is great value for the cost you pay. 2.It's cheap, so don't expect big bells and whistles. 3.The price was good but the rooms are small. 4.Overall, the hotel was a great value for the money! src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: have you heard of saint barnabas press gallery? S: Of course! Is a nice little museum on the east side. It's free to enter, and a nice place to spend an afternoon. U: may I have the address and area please ? S: Its on the east side at the belfast yard, coldham's road. Postcode cb13ew. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: I'm also looking for a guesthouse that includes free parking. S: There are a lot of options, what's your price range? U: The hotel should be in the moderate price range S: Acorn guest house is a moderate 4 star facility in the north. Would that meet your needs? U: That sounds great can you book a room for 4 people? We are checking in Monday and staying 4 nights. S: Your reservation for 4 at the acorn guest house for monday for 5 days 4 nights was successful. Your Reference number is : 7ERDYIN3. U: By the way, do you know if there is strong water pressure in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, guests staying at the Acorn Guest House won't be pleased with the lackluster water pressure provided in the showers.

src_text: reviews of LA RAZA: 1.If you're looking for a cool, hip Spanish restaurant to visit for tapas and drinks, I wouldn't recommend La Raza because their drinks were frankly not well-prepared and tasted pretty mediocre. 2.La Raza has good food and drinks. 3.Though I'm more of a beer drinker and stuck with one of their top quality, full bodied Spanish craft beers, my boyfriend tried a glass of one of their expensive, top quality Sangrias and loved it. 4.I also ordered a beer, which seemed to be of great quality along with their other drink choices. 5.I liked the sangria and the portion was large for my tortilla espanola. FAQs of LA RAZA: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at La Raza. [SEP] U: Yeah, my wife and kids are demanding Spanish food. Can we keep it on the cheap side, please? S: La Raza is an inexpensive Spanish restaurant at the centre. Would you like the address? U: Do they have high quality cocktails? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The La Raza restaurant is known to serve alcohol, however customers are split on whether their drinks are more than mediocre.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.On the other hand the room wasn't very clean and I felt uncomfortable sitting in the chairs or using the bathroom for fear of germs. reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.The bathroom, which is super important to my family and me, was super clean when we checked in. 2.The bathroom was spotless, too. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel in the west of Cambridge. S: I have huntingdon marriott and the cambridge belfry. Both have 4 stars and offer free internet and parking. Would like to book a room? U: Could I have which ever one has the absolute cleanest bathroom? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Marriott receives the higher marks for bathroom cleanliness, being called super clean and spotless.  Sound good to you?

src_text: reviews of GALLERIA: 1.I hope that the resort and the locals will improve on that going forward. 2.The Hot Mulled Cider I ordered was made to perfection! 3.On top of that, the drinks that we each ordered were phenomenal. 4.As much as the food and drinks were good, they are still some issues with the foods and drinks, as some of they were well below par and they are mediocre. 5.For someone who really appreciates a tasty drink with their meal, this definitely knocks the experience down a bit for me. 6.But what they DO offer is exquisitely-prepared food and drink from a wide range of European cuisines, including escargot, schnitzel, kunefe, and arancini. 7.I ordered a glass of Savignon Blanc with my meal and the wine really complimented the meal. FAQs of GALLERIA: 1.Yes, Galleria serves alcohol. [SEP] U: There's an attraction I'm looking for in Cambridge. S: Ok, are you looking for a church? U: No. I am looking for an attraction called Downing College. S: Downing College is in the centre on Regent Street.  The number is 01223334860. It is even free! U: Great! Thanks so much for the info. I am also hoping you might help me find a restaurant in the centre. S: There are many wonderful restaurants in the city centre. Do you have a price range? U: yes. it should be moderately priced. S: Were you interested in a specific kind of cuisine? U: European would be a nice change. S: Okay there are four matches for your request. May I make a suggestion? U: Yes, I would like your suggestion. S: The Galleria. Shall I book it? U: Do they have good drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Galleria has hot mulled cider, sauvignon blanc, and other types of drinks available. Guests called it everything from phenomenal to mediocre, so it depends on your tastes.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: Hi there. I'd like to find a place to dine in the city centre, preferable with Sri Lankan food. Do you have any recommendations? S: Sorry, I don't have any restaurants with sri lankan food in the centre. Would you like to try another type of food? U: Could you try again? Moderately priced, perhaps? S: Sorry, there was nothing found. Do you want to try a different kind of food? U: How about modern european food? S: There are two options for modern european food in centre in the moderate price range.  May I suggest Riverside Brasserie? U: Sure! Could you tell me the address - including the postcode and phone number please? S: Sure, they're located at the Doubletree by Hilton Cambridge Granta Place Mill Lane in postcode cb21rt. Their phone number is 01223259988. Can I help with anything else today? U: Great. I am also looking for a guesthouse to stay in and I don't need parking. S: Not a problem. Do you have a preference on area? U: Moderately priced in the centre, please. S: Unfortunately, there is no hotel in the moderately priced area U: Is there any other type of hotel in the area? S: Sorry, there are no guesthouse in centre within the moderate price range. Can I help you with anything else? U: I understand that there are no guesthouses in the area.  But can you see if there are other hotels in the area?  Moderately priced and in the centre, please. S: I was able to find cityroomz, it's a hotel in the centre that is moderately priced.  Can I make a booking for you? U: Does this place have high pressure showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, it doesn't appear that Cityrooms has high water pressure. Past guests have said that it's on the low side.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.This hotel has really nice breakfast choices and is great value for the cost you pay. 2.It's cheap, so don't expect big bells and whistles. 3.The price was good but the rooms are small. 4.Overall, the hotel was a great value for the money! [SEP] U: I want an expensive place to stay in the west side. S: The Huntingdon Marriott Hotel is an expensive, 4-star hotel in the west that offers free internet and parking. Would you like me to book this for you? U: I don't really need internet, but that sounds like everything else I want.  Yes, I'd like you to book it. S: OK, what is your arrival date, number of nights, and number of people in your party? U: I will hold off on the booking today I think I have all I need S: Okay, the phone number is 01480446000 for your convenience. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Actually, I would like to book the hotel for 6 people for 4 nights starting on Sunday. S: Booking was not possible. Would you like to try a shorter stay, fewer rooms, or another day? U: Yes, is 3 nights possible? Could I also please have a reference number? S: Great, the booking was successful.  Your reference number is HJHE475H.  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Do visitors get their money's worth while staying at this hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes they do get their value while staying at the hotel as it offers the best services at very affordable prices.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.It was a nice clean room with good wifi, which was great. 2.Room cleanliness is a gamble so if that's an issue for you, I'd avoid this place. 3.They also don't seem to always have housekeeping available. 4.I was surprised and happy that there was a laundry facility available, and the room was very clean and well appointed when I checked in. 5.The room was nice and big and I was able to do my laundry at there facility but the room was a bit dirty. 6.Our room was clean and there is a nice view of the mountains. reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.I found that the room had been cleaned by housekeeping to an exceptional degree. [SEP] U: Yes I'm looking for a train to cambridge that leaves on monday, would you please help me with that? S: I can help you with that! We have many options available on Monday, where are you travelling from? U: I am travelling from Peterborough. I would also like to arrive by 15:00. S: TR9063 arrives in Cambridge on Monday at 14:38, would you like to make a reservation? U: Book it for 6 people. S: I went ahead and booked that train. Your reference number is TQDMTW4Z. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: I need a place to stay too. S: Do you have an area, price range, or star rating in mind? U: A FOUR STAR RATING,WITH A PRICE RANGE IN THE NEIGHBORHHOOD OF 1000 POUNDS. PLEASE I WOULD LIKE TO BE IN THE LONDON,ENGLAND AREA IF I MAY TO BE NEAR THE CLUBS. S: Just for clarification would you like to be in the city centre? U: Just as long as it is located in the south. S: With a 4-star rating and located in the south, I have 2 options. Both are guesthouses. One is Aylesbray Lodge Guest House and the other is Rosa's Bed & Breakfast. U: I would prefer a very clean room S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Then you will probably want to stay at roses that and breakfast, as the Aylesbray Lodge guest house has a couple of negative reviews for their cleanliness.

src_text: reviews of SAINT JOHNS CHOP HOUSE: 1.Excellent British cuisine with high-quality drinks and diverse menu with lots of vegetarians options. 2.I might go back for the lively atmosphere and a tasty IPA, but I would skip having a meal here again. 3.It is also a good place to go for Stout. 4.The food and drinks are great here. 5.The food and drinks were good. 6.The only down side to it is the drinks which are mediocre in nature but all in all it is interesting place to relax and enjoy a superb meal. FAQs of SAINT JOHNS CHOP HOUSE: 1.Yes, Saint Johns Chop House serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I am looking for information in Cambridge S: I'm happy to help you with that. Is there something in specific I can tell you about? U: I'm staying in the west and I want to find a place near here that serves real British food. S: Saint johns chop house is in the moderate price range serving British food. U: Are they known for IPA quality? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Aside from a few that would disagree, for the most part, those that have dined at the Saint Johns Chop House thought that the IPA and drinks were great.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.However, I was frustrated about the low water pressure which made my shower not enjoyable. [SEP] U: We are planning to be in cambridge. We would like to go to a swimmingpool in the east. Are there any available in the east? S: Yes! Abbey Pool and Astroturf Pitch is in the East, on Pool Way, Whitehill Road, off Newmarket Road. Can I help you with anything else? U: Could I get the phone number and what the entrance fee is please? S: Of course! The phone number is 01223902088. The entrance fee is unknown, I'm afraid. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Could you give me some information about a hotel called Allenbell? S: Yes, the Allenbell is a 4-star guesthouse located in the east part of town. U: Can you tell the water pressure in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One of you said that the low water pressure at the hotel was a major problem. Do you need any other information?

src_text: FAQs of BANGKOK CITY: 1.Bangkok City serves alcohol. reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.The food is good and affordable as are the drinks. 2.We both had Thai beers with our meal, and those weren't as pleasing; the same could be said for the view, which is of a dismal parking lot. 3.The Yellow Curry was some of the best I've ever had and the beer was top shelf and ice cold. [SEP] U: I need a restaurant that serves Thai food, that is expensive and is in Cambridge please S: Bangkok City is located at 24 Green Street City Centre. Their number is 01223354382 U: Do they serve high-quality beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are mixed reviews for the beer at Bangkok City. One reviewer did not like the Thai Beer they had while another says the beer was top shelf and ice cold. Is there anything else you like to know about them?

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.We had a great time as the staff there is truly remarkable and the amenities were great. 2.I liked that the staff at the hotel was very friendly. 3.I was here with my family and we were welcomed with great smiles by the staff. reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The staff is also a joy to interact with, one of the most important parts of any stay. 2.We were greeted with very friendly staff. 3.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip to Cambridge and need to find a place to stay. S: Not a problem. We have 33 places to choose from. Do you have any preferences? U: I need someplace cheap near the center of town. Free wifi and free parking are a must. S: There are two places that fit your criteria. Alexander Bed and Breakfast and El Shaddai. Which are you interested in? U: I would prefer the one with the friendliest staff S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the Alexander and El Shaddai get really high marks for the friendliness of their staff. Would you like to know more about either place?

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. [SEP] U: I need help finding a particular hotel. S: Would you like to tell me the name of that hotel? U: The Worth House is what I'm looking for. S: Worth house is a guesthouse in the cheap price range in the north part of town. U: All right. Could you see if they have rooms for 6, for 4 nights beginning Friday? S: They do and the Booking was successful. Reference number is : ZN1NTVHW. U: I would also appreciate it if you could help me find a cheap restaurant serving food from Corsica S: I'm sorry. I'm not able to find any restaurants that fit your needs. Would you like to try a different food type? U: That's okay.  How about Italian food? S: There are a few. The Da Vinci Pizzeria is cheap. It's in the north part of town so it shouldn't be too far from Worth House. Would you like a reservation? U: Is the food portions good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The serving size portions at Da Vinci Pizzeria range from plentiful to too small as customers have differing opinions.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I was greeted immediately and treated like a guest in someone's home. 2.They were great the whole stay. 3.The staff was exceptional. 4.From the moment we checked in, the staff's friendly attitude was evident. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.However, the staff at this hotel treated my family poorly. 2.Also the staff was way too unprofessional when I had my dealings with them. 3.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. 4.The receptionist was super nice and answered all our questions. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.I did not find the staff very responsive or helpful. 2.When attempting to troubleshoot my issue with staff, they were disrespectful and rude. 3.Another added merit was that the hotel staff was very friendly and polite. [SEP] U: I am looking for information on some places I can go when I am visiting soon. S: There are lots of nice places. What would you like to do ? U: I would like to go to a museum that you recommend. I will need the phone number please. S: The Byard Art Museum is wonderful. Their phone number is 01223464646. U: I also need some where to stay, 4 star. S: There are three that meet your criteria. The Huntingdon Marriott Hotel, The Cambridge Belfry, and the University Arms Hotel. Would you like me to book one of those for you? U: Which one has employees that will try the hardest to help me? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Huntingdon Marriott hotel has the best reviews when it comes to staff. Would you like to make a reservation?

src_text: FAQs of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.Yes, alcohol is available there. reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.I also had a beer, which wasn't my first choice, but the drink options were limited. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a british restaurant in the centre? S: There are 7 moderate and expensive restaurants in the centre; do you have a price range you prefer? U: Anything is fine. I need a reservation for 2 at 11:15 on Monday. S: The reservation at The Copper Kettle on Monday at 11:15 for 2 people was successful. Your Reference number is : PLRLM5II. U: Can you tell me if they are well known for their various drink options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Copper Kettle does serve its guests alcoholic drinks, however their beverage options are rather limited.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The room was also quiet. 2.The only downside to the hotel was the noise that was all over the place, asides this...I would recommend the hotel to anyone and I also plan to stay there when I am in the city. 3.The other guests were just so noisy, I could not enjoy my stay. 4.I highly recommend Gonville Hotel for how quiet my room was and the absolutely stellar concierge service. 5.The major negative, however, is how noisy the hotel was. [SEP] U: Hi! Are there any European restaurants in the center of town? S: Yes, there are 8 results for European restaurants in town centre, what price range are you looking for? U: Very, very insanely expensive, money is no object. S: There are three expensive European restaurants in the Centre area.  Would you like to know the name and address of each location? U: Yes thank you S: Eraina is at Free School Lane CIty Centre, phone #01223368786. Would you like me to make a reservation? U: Yes, I need a reservation on Thursday at 16:30 for 4 people. S: Success! We've booked your reservation U: Can  I have the reference number please? S: Absolutely.  Your reference number is FXDNF0IU.  What else can I help you with? U: A hotel and should include free parking, in the expensive price range,for same group for 2 nights S: Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Yes, I need a hotel for 4 people with free parking in the expensive price range, for 2 nights S: And what day would you like the reservation for? U: I would like the hotel for two nights, starting on Thursday. S: You are booked at the Gonville Hotel your reference number is LIA4E1ME. Can I help you with anything else? U: Would you happen to know if the hotel is in a quiet area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to reviews left by previous guests it is pretty quiet, however there also reviews that say it is a very loud and noisy.

src_text: reviews of ARCHWAY HOUSE: 1.The room had a nice view, you would love. 2.The room itself was clean and pleasant with a fantastic view of downtown. 3.The view from the hotel was gorgeous and I was able to enjoy it at my leisure. 4.We had a nice view that was relaxing. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train for my trip to Cambridge.  I need it to leave on Monday and to depart from Peterborough.  Can you give me some times? S: Sure, there are plenty of available time starting at 05:19 and going all day.  Was there a particular time of day you wanted to depart? U: I want to arrive at or a little before 12:15, please. S: TR0919 leaves Peterborough at 11:19 and arrives at 12:09.  Would you like to book seats on that one? U: How long is the travel time. My math is not the best. S: My math isn't the best either but the travel duration is 50 minutes. I can help you book a seat on the TR0919 if you'd like. U: I am also looking for a hotel called Archway House. S: Archway house is a guesthouse located in the north part of town in the moderate price range at 52 gilbert road U: Does Archway House offer pleasant sights from its rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Archway House has a universally well-rated view of the downtown area, with people calling it anywhere from simply nice to gorgeous and fantastic.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. U: I would like Mediterranean food please. S: The gardenia fits that criteria would you like a reservation? U: Yes, could you please reserve a table for 6 at 18:00 on Saturday? src_text: reviews of THE OAK BISTRO: 1.The only downside is the mediocre atmosphere - the waiters aren't that friendly and it can get noisy in there. 2.The Oak Bistro was a nice, relaxing place to eat alone. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant in the moderate price range that serves bistro type food. S: I apologize but I was not able to find a moderately priced bistro.  Would you be interested in a different type of restaurant? U: How about one that serves british food then? S: I have found a few British restaurants in  your price range. Do you want a specific part of town? U: No, could you recommend me a place? I'm looking for to book a table for 2 on Thursday at 11:30. S: Okay, I've booked you at the Oak Bistro with reference number ANAMHNOW. May I help with anything else? U: Does it have a good atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The atmosphere is the only down side to dining at The Oak Bistro although its said to be relaxing if you are just eating alone.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: Hi! I'd like a hotel with a 4 star rating and free parking, please. S: Were you looking for a hotel in a particular area? U: I'm trying to stay on the east, if possible. S: I have 5 of them in the east. Three of them are cheap and two are moderate priced. Did you have a preference? U: The price doesn't matter. What do you recommend? S: I would recommend the allenbell. U: Does it have free wifi? S: Yes, it does have free wifi.  Would you like me to book this for you? U: Are the rooms cleaned thoroughly there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the rooms at Allenbell do seem to be cleaned thoroughly. Some past guests have described them as spotless.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.We could not enjoy the shower as the pressure was low. 2.The room was a bit small, so I felt a tiny cramped in there, and the water pressure could have been a lot better. [SEP] U: I'm looking for the hotel called Kirkwood House. S: What specific information are you looking for? U: I'd like to get the address, hotel type, and price range please! S: The kirkwood house is a guesthouse in the moderate price range. Their address is 172 chesterton road, post code cb41da. U: Does the Kirkwood House have good water pressure in their showers? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.The food was a bit pricey but the drink specials made up for that. 2.The food was of good quality and there was good vegetarian option but i you had overpriced your food and it was of Small portion [SEP] U: I'm looking for a particualr hotel called cityroomz? S: Yes, cityroomz is available. Would you like me to book a room for you? U: What is the star rating and price range of Cityroomz? S: 0 stars. moderate price range. U: Thank you. I'm also looking for an expensive restaurant that serves Polynesian food. S: Sorry I don't have any Polynesian restaurants in the area. is there another kind of food you are looking for? U: Hmm, I was pretty sure that there was a Polynesian restaurant in the centre of town. Would you mind double-checking? S: Nope. So sorry. No polynesian restaurants in the center. U: Which of these offer Hummus at a good price? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: While I don't see hummus mentioned, it's likely at a Mediterranean restaurant. The prices are considered a little high at Mimosa, though.

src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.It's a quiet area, but it's walking distance to the shops downtown and public transportation is super close. 2.The room is big and nice and quiet. 3.It was hidden in the edge of a quiet suburb and it was so peaceful we all loved it. reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 2.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 3.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. 4.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. [SEP] U: Good Afternoon, I am looking for a place to stay on the east side in a guest house S: There are 6 possible places that fit your request. Would you like more information or to add additional search preferences? U: Can you see if any of them offer free parking? S: 5 of the guesthouses offer parking. What is your price range preference? U: Honestly, any price range will do. Can you suggest one for me and help me with booking a room? S: Absolutely. Can I suggest the Warkworth House at a moderate price range, or the Autumn House at a cheap price range. Do either of these interest you? U: Are either of those located in a quiet area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Autumn House is located in a quiet area and is peaceful. Warkworth House has mixed reviews as it is near the main road causing some noise. Would you like me to book Autumn House for you?

src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.The location is actually not as remote as it seems and I made it there in about 10 mins by car. 2.Otherwise, loved the restaurant and wish that it was closer to my house, because the location is pretty inconvenient. 3.The location was nice and close to my home, and the staff was friendly enough. 4.The location isn't in the best of places and could be closer to town. [SEP] U: I would like a restaurant in the north part of town that serves korean food S: I'm sorry, there are no Korean restaurants in the north part of town. Can I help you find anything else? U: How about any area? S: little seoul is in the centre and serves korean food U: Is the place convenient and accessible location wise? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Little Seoul has a location that that could be closer to town according to some customers.  But others found it to be very convenient.  Do want to make a reservation?

src_text: FAQs of THE GANDHI: 1.Yes, The Gandhi does have outdoor seating. reviews of THE GANDHI: 1.You can sit outside. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant called the Gandhi. S: The Gandhi is at 72 Regent Street City Centre. Would you like a reservation or more information? U: Do they accept Mastercard payments? S: Yes, you can pay with your Mastercard at The Gandhi. Are there any other questions I may answer for you or would you like to reserve a table? U: Does the Gandhi have outdoor seating? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Gandhi does offer outdoor seating. I do not have more information. Would you like to reserve a table?

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. 2.However, the room itself was very open and provided a lot of room in order to relax. [SEP] U: Could you find a moderate priced place to stay for me?  I do need free WiFi. S: Absolutely. We have many guesthouses and hotels with free Wifi. Any other preferences? U: I'd prefer something with 2 stars, and I need free parking as well. S: The Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge are both 2 star hotels that offer free parking and free wifi. U: Which Hotel has the bigger rooms on average? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most, but not all, past guests were happy with the room size at Ashley. Lovell Lodge received mixed reviews as to the size of their rooms.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: I am looking for a guesthouse to stay at that has a 4 star rating. Can you help me? S: I have several options for you. Is there a particular area you're looking for? U: No.  But I would like a cheap guesthouse. S: Would you like to try Alexander Bed and Breakfast? U: Do they have strong showers there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It appears not, the Alexander bed and breakfast has a couple of bad reviews about the water pressure in their showers.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I'd like to find a restaurant that offers Asian Oriental cuisine, in the centre, if possible. S: Definitely! I have places from cheap to expensive, though my favorite is Yippee Noodle Bar, which is moderately-priced. U: I would like Yippee. S: I'd be happy to make a reservation for you.  What day/time will you be dining, and how many are in your party? U: Monday, 19:00, for 6 people. S: I have successfully reserved a table for your party of 6 at the Yippee Noodle Bar for Monday at 19:00. Your reference number is XSQHK9YG U: Great, I also need a hotel room if you can help me find something. S: Sure. We have several places ready to book. Which part of town would you like? U: The west please. S: There are 4 in that area do you have a price range or type of hotel you prefer? U: The hotel doesn't need to include internet. It should be in the same area as the restaurant. S: I have 5 different options for you. They vary in price range. Did you have a certain price range in mind? U: The price does not matter.   Please make a recommendation and book it for the same group of people and 4 nights starting from the same day. S: OK, you are booked in Cityroomz as requested, the reference number is A1ZBLCZ3, any further questions? U: Do they have strong water pressure in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All of the reviews of that the water pressure was very low at Cityroomz unfortunately. Is there any other information that you need?

src_text: reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.The food was wonderful and high-quality and the drinks were also high-quality and delicious! 2.I forgot to mention that the price is affordable - except some drinks were a little overpriced though. 3.We ordered the drinks which were decently good. 4.Everyone agreed the food was first rate, but we shied away from drinks due to the high prices. 5.We tried several of their authentic Chinese dishes, and thought the food quality was stellar, as well as their specialty drinks that you won't easily find anywhere else. 6.So I recommend going for the food and skipping the drinks. 7.I was glad that they have a pretty extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options, because I did try one cocktail and found it to be pretty mediocre. 8.What I disliked was that the drinks were too expensive. 9.The only negative is that their drinks are really overpriced, so I would recommend sticking to the non-alcoholic menu. 10.I didn't opt for any drinks as their drink prices were a little too high for my taste. FAQs of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.Lan Hong House does serve alcohol. [SEP] U: I am looking for a moderately priced restaurant that serves indian food. S: There are 4 restaurants to choose from. S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: FAQs of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Yes, the restaurant does serve alcohol. reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Lots of foods and drinks to choose from here. 2.I had the cabernet sauvignon but it tasted a little flat and I would rate it average at best. 3.They have lots of drinks to choose from so it was easy for my daughter to decide what she wanted to drink. 4.I do have to praise their high quality drinks and food, because everything tastes amazing and is expertly-prepared. src_text:
reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.Not it's fault about the location, but I'd love some luggage storage. 3.I was in town for a friend's wedding and the Hamilton Lodge was convenient enough but it is not near any public transportation. 4.I mean, the location was mediocre and there was no luggage storage, but whatever. 5.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. [SEP] U: Hello! I'm looking for a train that leaves after 10:15 on Sunday. S: Where is your departure and destination? U: The train should depart from cambridge and should go to peterborough, please. S: Train TR1492 departs from Cambridge at 10:34 on Sunday and arrives at Peterborough by 11:24. Would you like me to book you a ticket? U: Yes, please make a booking for 1 person. S: Unfortunately, there is not a train on Sunday matching your criteria. U: Are you sure there are no trains going from Cambridge to Peterborough on Sunday leaving after 10:15? What about TR1492 that you said? S: The TR1492 train to peterborough leaves at 10:34 and arrives at 11:24, may I book this trip for you? U: yes, book that for me and get me a reference number. S: The booking was successful, the total fee is 13.2 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : GQSOT34U. U: Thank you. Can you also help me find a hotel for my group? S: Do have any hotel preferences like price or location? U: The hotel name I am looking for is named Hamilton Lodge. S: The Hamilton Lodge is a guesthouse located in the north. They are moderately priced and have a 3-star rating. They offer both free wifi and free parking. U: Is this place in a good location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There is the number one complaint about the area itself being in a not so favorable place. You have to trek far to get anywhere. Location a bit of a challenge to find.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The view outside of my window was exquisite and beautiful. 2.I really liked the sunrise view at breakfast. 3.I enjoyed spending time here with my girl, as we took in the great view. 4.Talk about a place with a fantastic view, truly amazing. 5.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. [SEP] U: I need to take a train from Cambridge to London Kings Cross, it would need to be after 10. S: Okay. What day will you be traveling? U: On Friday after 10. S: The TR1502 leaves friday at 11:00. U: Yes, that will be great. How much does a ticket cost? S: A ticket is 23.60 pounds. U: Can you also give me the travel time? S: The travel time is 51 minutes. U: Thanks! Can you also see if there are any expensive, 4-star guesthouses in the north area of town? S: What you are looking for can not be found. Is there any other area you would mind searching in? U: No I want to stay in that area.  What other hotel accomadations are in the area? S: Avalon is a moderate priced 4 star guesthouse in the north part of town. It has free internent. Would you like more information or can I book it for you? U: Does this hotels rooms offer a great view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes it does, the sunset is especially beautiful and lovely to wake up to according to past customers.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure was very low here so a shower takes a very long time. 2.I was glad I was travelling alone or showers would have taken forever. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Customers have stated that the view at the Limehouse hotel was breathtaking, they enjoyed it very much.

src_text: reviews of THE GOOD LUCK CHINESE FOOD TAKEAWAY: 1.So, I'd go again to get food but not drinks. 2.A major plus was the food and drinks which were superb. 3.I thought the restaurant was in a nice location and that the drinks were very well priced, but the drinks were also not all that tasty. 4.We got some drinks too which were pretty mediocre even though there were lots of non alcoholic drink options. 5.The drinks were well made and so was the food. 6.The Kung Pao Chicken and Sweet and Sour Pork were as expected as were the drinks, just mediocre. src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.But still, I appreciated the great view from my window, overlooking the nearby lake, and the room itself was very clean with a seriously comfortable bed. 2.Looking out of the balcony was the most beautiful view I've ever seen. [SEP] U: Good morning. I am planning a visit to Cambridge and need some help with details. I hear there are a lot of places to see. S: There are plenty of attractions. What kind of view will I have from the room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Warkworth House has a number of rooms with fabulous views. Can I help you with anything else today?

reviews of PIZZA EXPRESS: 1.We wish they had better drinks, however, and the view inside the place was rather bland. 2.It wasn't that great though. 3.However for drinks we are going to The Gatsby next door because they don't what we like. 4.The drinks were great as was the nice d√©cor. 5.The drinks were excellent and of great quality. src_text: reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.The nice view from our window seats was a nice little bonus, and the attentive and courteous attention we received from the wait staff was very warm and welcoming. 2.Teach your servers how to upsell the drinks! 3.However the service never asked me if I wanted a drink or not. 4.Our waitress was nice enough but obviously new and needed more training. 5.The food was good, the location is superb and the service was top-notched. [SEP] U: I need to find a train that departs from Cambridge and arrives by 9:15. Can you help? S: What is your destination? U: I'm traveling to Ely. S: We can definitely help you with that, I just need to know the day you will be traveling. U: For today, arriving by 21:15. S: I'm sorry, I need to know the day you will be traveling. U: I am departing on Sunday. S: I have a train on Sunday that arrives at 20:07. Would that do? U: That's perfect.  Could you book it for 8 people? S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 28.16 GBP payable at the station . Reference number is : LZLSJZ1K. Anything else I can help with? U: Thank you! U: Do they have great service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The service at Bankok City is generally good but there have been complaints about the difficulty getting drinks or the staff being very new. Would you like more information for Bangkok City?

src_text: reviews of ARCHWAY HOUSE: 1.My room was nice and everything was clean including the bathroom. 2.I appreciated the clean bathroom, especially since I was travelling with the kids. 3.Upon using the restrooms, I found them to be recently cleaned and pristine. [SEP] U: I would like you to help me find a train departure. The train should leave on thursday and arrive at cambridge. S: Where will you be leaving from? U: From Bishops Stortford after 15:00 S: Alright, would you like me to make a booking for you? U: No, I just need the train ID and arrival time S: I'm sorry, there are no trains that day.  Would you like to try another day? U: I think you should try again. Cambridge to Bishop Stafford on Thursday. S: I have 5 trains.  They depart 15:29, 17:29, 19:29, 21:29, 23:29. They are all 38 mins travel duration. U: PLease give me the info for a train meeting the above listed criteria. S: Train# TR7759 departing from Cambridge at 15:29 arrives in Bishops Stortford at 16:07. Can I help you with anything else? U: I'm also looking for a place to stay. The hotel should include free parking and should include free wifi. S: There are about 8 choices. Did you want a certain area or price range? U: area and price are of no concern to me as long as the guesthouse has free parking and free wifi S: Ok! I suggest the Archway House. Would you like a room book? U: Do they mention having clean restrooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, there are reviews that mention clean restrooms at The Archway House. Past guests say the rooms were clean, with one even describing it as pristine.

src_text: FAQs of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.An Full English/Irish breakfast is available at the HOBSONS HOUSE 2.No,  breakfast is not free at the Hobsons House. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Sadly, the uncomfortable bed meant I didn't sleep much, which sort of crosses out the great breakfast benefit. 2.There were only pancakes, eggs, and frosted flakes so it was pretty mediocre. 3.Starting the day with a great breakfast when you're away from home goes a long way in performance in the business world. 4.The only complaint was the lack of options for breakfast. 5.While I was not pleased with the slow wi-fi and small room, I was content with their awesome breakfast options, friendly and engaging staff members and the best part! 6.The location is exceptional and the breakfast options were fantastic. 7.We enjoyed the options they had for breakfast and the cost of the hotel was very cheap. [SEP] U: I need a train from cambridge on sunday. S: There are several trains that match the criteria. what time do you want t leave? U: I am thinking the morning would be better for me. S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.On top of that it was in a really nice location. 2.While the service was quite slow, the drinks and foods were very high quality, and the restaurant was in a wonderful location. 3.The location is good and the drinks are a good price. 4.It was located in a nice area and had a nice view. 5.The place is in a nice location also, looking over the Steinhatchee river. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. src_text:

src_text: reviews of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.The location was perfect! 2.It is central to everything and very convenient. 3.Overall, it was a pretty average experience, but the kitchen sort of made up for the mediocre location. 4.The location is ideal. 5.It could have been better, but it also could have been worse. 6.The location was just okay though. 7.We were able to walk to pretty much anything we wanted to do, and when we had to take an uber it was a cheap ride. 8.I liked the central view of the city and its geographical location but I did not like the meals served especially breakfast [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap Italian restaurant. S: How about Pizza Hut City Centre?  I hear it is very good. U: I s it located in the north? S: No, that one was in the Centre.  But, da vinci pizzeria is in the north U: Da Vinci Pizzeria is fine can you book a table for one for Monday at 12:00? S: I will book it for you,is there anything else I can do for you ? U: Yes, what about the reference number? S: My system is down and I am unable to book at the moment.  Here is their # 01223351707 or we can try again later.  Sorry for inconvenience. U: Wow, really? Could you try again please? S: My apologies, this is actually a system issue and i cannot book.   I have reported in, in the meantime do you need other information? U: I will try back later for the reference number. Could you find me a place to stay that is near the restaurant? S: There are several in the moderate to cheap range. Do you have a star preference? U: no stars would work for me. S: I would recommend city centre north b and b. Would you like me to book that? U: Is it in a good location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The City Centre North B and B is located in a really good area according to most guests. A couple people say it was sort of mediocre though.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I hate to say anything negative but if I had to nitpick something it was that the bathroom wasn't as clean as I would have liked and the water pressure was low. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some guests like the location while other thought that it was not very close to any shopping or places of interest.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. src_text: FAQs of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Free English/Irish breakfast is available here. reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.I found that I did not need to go to the diner with my family because the provided breakfast was excellent. 2.I was here with my girlfriend, and we surely enjoyed the tasty breakfast options we got. 3.Also, the breakfast is to die for, we were always stuffed in the morning times. reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.I was more than happy to have breakfast there than to get something out. 2.People at fast food restaurants need to train here! 3.Best of all was the plentiful and delicious breakfast options that I really enjoyed! 4.I was super pleased with the very tasty breakfast options that I enjoyed the morning I checked out. 5.I very much enjoyed the breakfasts. 6.I was also pleased with the breakfast options. 7.Not only was the breakfast immaculate, but the staff was so friendly. 8.The options were great and the meals were always tasty!
