[SEP] U: I want to visit a restaurant that would be popular with college students and located near the center of town; can you make a recommendation? S: What type of food would you be interested in? U: Actually, I want to visit a college. Somewhere in the centre. S: I would suggest downing college, would you like the address? U: Yes, that would be great. Can you also give me the entrance fee and postcode for that college? S: The address is regent street and there is no entry fee. U: Thank you. Do you have the postcode, please? S: The postcode for Downing College is cb21dq. Anything else I have help you with? U: Yes, I need a place to eat in that area. I want Italian food. S: I would suggest pizza express. U: Does Pizza Express have a Cabernet Sauvignon that's of high quality? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews of drink quality at the Pizza Express restaurant vary greatly from excellent to unsatisfying.

src_text: reviews of RICE BOAT: 1.If you can overlook the boring, outdated atmosphere of Rice Boat, you'll be treated to an exceptional dining experience with truly authentic, carefully prepared Indian dishes that are some of the best I've ever tasted. 2.The decor has recently been renovated and the atmosphere is warm and welcoming. 3.However, the atmosphere was not that good. reviews of TANDOORI PALACE: 1.The atmosphere in the restaurant is mediocre, but the good portion sizes make up for it. reviews of MAHARAJAH TANDOORI RESTAURANT: 1.Also, having the nice view really helped out with the atmosphere. 2.I do recommend this place for special occasions. 3.The atmosphere inside was also a bit loud and boisterous, but we still had a good time. reviews of INDIA HOUSE: 1.Great ambience. reviews of COCUM: 1.The atmosphere was excellent, and between us we ordered Dosa, Butter Chiken, Korma, and Chaat for food, which was superb. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive place to eat in the west area of town. S: There are nine expensive restaurants on the west side of town. Did you have a specific cuisine in mind? U: Indian sound good. S: We have tandoor palace, cocum, rice boat, maharajah tandoor restaurant, and india house, which would you like to try? U: Which one of these restaurants has the best atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Of those options, Cocum and Maharajah Tandoor Restauarnt are both known for having excellent atmospheres. The Maharajah Tandoori has a great view as well.

src_text: reviews of DON PASQUALE PIZZERIA: 1.We ordered quite a bit but were glad to be able to take home leftovers. 2.Everything tasted amazingly, but the portion sizes were a little on the small side which wasn't great. 3.What I loved about my dish the serving size. 4.And while the portion sizes we received were very generous, the quality of the food was substandard at best. 5.My main complaint is the somewhat small portion sizes, but the flavor and quality made up for it. 6.The only downside was the rather small portion of our meals, so they weren't optimal for sharing. 7.We all definitely would've liked more of what we ate, but it at least tasted amazing. 8.They give out good portions that would satisfy anyone's appetite. reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.The portions are good and the taste is pretty good They have good drinks but they are pricy. 2.I am so glad they give nice size portions of food I cant stand eating somewhere and they only give tiny size portions and then I walk away hungry. 3.The food was excellent and came in good portions. 4.Things I really liked about the restaurant was the view, great service and the portion size. 5.The food was all so great and the portions were generous. [SEP] U: I would like to try an expensive, italian place while visiting cambridge. S: I have 5 of them. 4 in the centre area and one in the south. Would you like more information? U: Staying in the centre would be more convenient. What are my choices? S: How about cafe uno or don pasquale pizzeria? U: Which one is going to bring me more food? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: For the most part the portions at Caffe Uno are regarded as being large, while those offered at Don Pasquale Pizzeria are split fifty-fifty between generous and small.

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.The price and quality of food were off the charts, and service was great as well. 2.Their beers were ok too and service was super friendly and nice. 3.Initially I was put off by the high prices on the menu but the great service made up for it. 4.I enjoyed my time here just for the service and atmosphere. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for info on a restaurant in the west that serves french food. S: There are no French restaurants in the west. Would you like to try a different part of town or a different type of food? U: There are no expensive french restaurants in the west? S: Yes, that's right. U: What about an expensive place that serves British food? S: I have two that meets that criteria. I would like to recommend the graffiti it is in the west side and serves british food. U: Do you know if it has great service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The restaurant is known for having excellent service. The service is so good that some say it makes up for other flaws. Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 2.The location ended up being not good though, because it was far from the bar I was going to. 3.My only dislikes were the poor location within the city, as well as the poor and outdated deocr on the inside of the restaurant. 4.If you're in the mood for Italian food, I would pass on Prezzo, which although in a great section of town with breathtaking views, is quite pricey and has very average foods. [SEP] U: I would like to know if there is an Italian restaurant nearby me. S: We have 15 italian restaurants.  Let me find one close to you, what area are you in? U: I guess we don't need a restaurant after all. My husband isn't hungry. He wants to take a look at a college instead. S: There are many colleges to choose from, which area of town are you interested in? U: I would like to find one in the west. Are there any in that area? S: The are five colleges in the west. Would you like to visit a free one or one with an entrance fee? U: I don't care, just need the postcode, phone number, and address. S: Okay Churchill College is free and their address is  Storey's Way, their postcode is cb30ds and their phone number is 01223336233. U: I am also looking for a restaurant. The restaurant should be in the moderate price range and should be in the same area as the attraction. S: What type of food would you like? U: how about you suggest one and book a table for 4 at 15:15 on wednesday, and I'll need the reference number too please S: Ok, I've booked you a table for 4 at Prezzo. Reference number is YXVRL9YK, and the table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Do you need anything else? U: Is it in a safe area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The restaurant is in a poor area of the city but it has beautiful views. The restaurant needs an upgrade in decor and their prices were a bit pricey.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: Hello. I will be a tourist in Cambridge and I've heard there are many local attractions. S: Yes, we actually have over 79 attractions. Do you have a specific area of town or interest of attraction you are looking for? U: Can you recommend me a nightclub where I can get jiggy with it? S: Well, I think the jiggiest nightclub in town is the Soul Tree Nightclub, right in centre city! Plus the entrance fee is only 4 pounds. U: That is perfect can I have the postcode please? S: Sure! The postcode is cb23qf U: Thanks. Last time I stayed in Cambridge several years ago I stayed at the carolina bed and breakfast. Is it still around? S: Yes, it is still around. Would you like me to book the Carolina Bed and Breakfast? U: Do they have good breakfast options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are mixed reviews about the breakfast options at Carolina Bed an Breakfast. Some past guests were happy, but others were disappointed.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. [SEP] U: I am  looking for information in Cambridge. S: Can you be more specific please? U: Oops, sorry. I should have given you more info. I am wanting to find a train to get me to Bishops Stortford. S: Could you tell me what day and time you are wanting to leave? U: Me and 6 of my friends want to leave sometime after 8:30. S: Please tell me what place you want to depart from? U: I'll be leaving cambridge on Tuesday and need a booking. S: Ok, the first train after 8:30 is TR1562 and it leaves at 09:29, shall I book you? U: Yes, for 7. Please give me the reference number. S: Alright, you're all booked up. It will cost 70.7 GBP at the station, and your reference number is UXGLG4VF. Can I help you with anything else? U: Can I get an expensive place to stay?  A hotel more specifcally, 2 stars please. S: There is only one in that price range. It is express by holiday inn cambridge. U: Can you book a room for me? S: Of course! What day, how many people, and how many nights? U: I'm looking just for the phone number, address, and area of the hotel. S: Would you like express by holiday inn? U: Do they have good water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There were several complaints about the water pressure from previous guests. They mentioned that the water pressure in the shower is low, and it felt like a sprinkler overhead.

src_text:
reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: I don't know if this is possible but can you please get me some information on the alexander bed and breakfast? S: sure, i have their information. what would you like to know? U: Ah, I just wanted to know it was still open. Could you book me a room? S: Sure, what day would you like it for? U: 3 nights starting from friday. S: A reservation for 1 person? U: No, I would like it for 4 people. S: Booking was successful.
Reference number is : CRLJAWX3. U: Are the bathrooms showers renovated with really powerful showerheads? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the showerheads don't seem to be very powerful. Past guests have said that the water pressure is limited.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: I need a place to stay.  I would like a 4 star place in the east area. S: Sure we have 6 places, do you have any other preferences? U: Yes, I'd like a place that includes free wifi and it should be a hotel. S: I'm afraid all of our 4-star accommodations in the east are guesthouses. Would one of those suit you? U: No, it would not. What do you have in the west area? S: In the west I have two 4-star hotels - the cheap Cambridge Belfry and the expensive Huntingdon Marriott. U: Hmm, I think we are getting confused on what I need. I really need to find a hotel with 4 stars in the east. Or a guesthouse will do also. S: I think allenbell would suit you well. Would you like more information? U: Are the rooms kept clean there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviewers say that the rooms at the hotel are very clean. Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.Taking a shower was also a problem and it was very difficult to get myself clean as a result of limited water pressure. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm traveling to Cambridge and would like to find some places to go. Can you help me? S: Yes I can! There are a total of 79 different attractions in Cambridge that you can visit. Is there a particular type of attraction you would like to see? U: I'm looking for something in the centre of town, maybe an art museum? S: There are a couple locations that fit that criteria. Could I recommend William's Art and Antiques museum? U: That sounds great. Can I please have the address, entrance fee, and phone number? S: Yes! The address is gwydir street, no. 5 dale's brewery; the entrance fee is free; and the phone number is 01223311687. Can I help with anything else today? U: I'm going to need a place to stay that has free wifi and in a guesthouse. The hotel rating a zero star. S: El Shaddai fits your preferences and is located in the centre of town.  Would you like me to make a reservation? U: Does the shower have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, taking a shower at the El Shaddai presents guests with a problem as the water pressure is severely limited.

src_text: reviews of THE MISSING SOCK: 1.The people were friendly but the decor was unkempt and the view from where we sat looked out over a construction site. [SEP] U: I'd like a cheap restaurant in the east part of town. S: The Missing Sock serves cheap food in the East part of town. U: What type of food is served at the Missing Sock, and what is the address? S: the missing sock serves international food, they are located at Finders Corner Newmarket Road. U: Do the reviews mention anything about the decorations? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I only have one opinion from a past customer. This says that the decor was not very nice and was unkempt.

src_text: reviews of LOCH FYNE: 1.The only negatives were the lack of gluten-free options and the mediocre view at best. 2.My only critique is that from our window the view was very poor, and it showed us a gross alley. 3.And if you want a romantic date night, it doesn't get any better than Loch Fyne's oceanside views. [SEP] U: I want to find a restaurant in any part of town and serves seafood. S: Loch Fyne is a restaurant in the city centre that serves seafood. Would you like more information? U: Do you know if it has a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I have found from customer reviews, that while some previous customers liked the oceanside views, others found the views to be mediocre at best.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. [SEP] U: I be traveling to Cambridge and can't wait to try the restaurants, but could you help me with a finding a hotel? S: Would you prefer a guesthouse? The acorn guest house is in the north and moderately priced. 4 starts with free internet and parking U: I would prefer a hotel type hotel, it just needs to be in the moderate price range and doesn't need to have free parking, but needs wifi S: Sure! I found ashley hotel. It is located at 74 chesterton road. Would that work for you? U: Yes, that sounds like a good place.  I appreciate the information. S: You're welcome. Would you like a room, or perhaps I could help you with something else? U: Yes, can you tell me the star rating of that hotel? S: It has 2 stars. U: How's the view from the room? I want a good one. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Ashley Hotel provides a great view for their guests to enjoy during their stay.  Can I help you with anything else?

src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.Their korma is truly excellent, and the wait staff is both knowledgeable and really inviting, making you feel very much at home. 2.Between us we ordered Korma, Naan, Vindaloo and Chicken Tikka Masala, all of which were very affordable and well made. 3.The tandoori chicken was mediocre and not very good but everything else was fine. 4.So don't go if you want to get a buzz on, but absolutely check out this restaurant if you want high quality Indian food. reviews of RAJMAHAL: 1.It was still a nice meal 2.We really enjoyed the food and drink, which were of top notch quality. 3.The korma was AMAZING and my friends all liked theirs as well. 4.The portions were generous and the foods were high quality to boot. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a restaurant in the east that serves Indian food. S: There are 4 results. Is a moderate or expensive price range better? U: How about the moderate price range. S: There are 2 restaurants that meet your criteria - Curry Prince and Rajmahal U: Do either of those restaurants serve high-quality korma? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both restaurants get very high marks on their food, including Korma. One person at Rajmahal said the Korma was amazing. Which one sounds best to you?

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.Also, the Wi-Fi was extremely slow. 2.This is very frustrating when you are trying to work and the delay is huge. 3.Also, the fast wi-fi was a huge plus for work I had to work to do on my laptop. FAQs of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.Wifi is free at Ashley Hotel. [SEP] U: I need a cheap, 2 star hotel to stay at here in Cambridge S: I have no hotels matching your request. Would you like to change your price range or star rating and try again? U: Ok, find me a hotel that has free parking included then. S: The Cambridge Belfry has free parking and is in the cheap price range, would you like to book this hotel? U: Is it in the moderate price range? S: No, the hotel is within the cheap price range. Would you like me to alter the search? U: I would like one in the moderate price range. I need to book one for 4 nights for 4 people. S: I have found two hotels meeting your specifications in the moderate price range. Do you have any additional preferences? U: No, I just need a room for 4 people. We'll arrive on monday and stay 4 nights. S: I was able to book you at the Ashley Hotel on Monday for 4 nights/4 guests. Your reference number is KFHQFY56. Is there anything else I can assist you with? U: Does this hotel have a swimming pool on site? S: There is no onsite pool at the Ashley hotel at this time. Are you also looking at dining options? U: Yes, does the hotel charge for WiFi? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the hotel does not charge extra for wi-fi. It is included in the room price. Do you need to know anything else?

src_text: reviews of J RESTAURANT: 1.However, the food was pretty good so it was worth it. 2.Everything we got tasted amazing and we were very happy to take the leftovers home for lunch another day. 3.i have for yangzhou fried rice is very nice and then good quality good service in the J RESTAURANT and very happy in my family [SEP] U: Can you help me find a moderately priced hotels that has Wifi? S: There are 17. What part of town would you like to stay in? U: no preference. It needs to have 3 stars and offer free wifi. S: Hobsons house is in the west part of town U: That sounds great. I need to make a booking for sunday for 4 nights. S: How many people are in your party? U: Oh, yeah, five people, please. S: Ok, you're all booked! Reference number is 7IM8XDQ0. Can I be of further help? U: Thanks.  I'd also like to make a reservation at J Restaurant. S: How many people, what time and day please? U: Can you tell me if they have delicious yangzhou fried rice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, they serve a pretty good Yangzhou fried rice at J restaurant. What day would you like a reservation for?

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Hobsons House did not disappoint in that aspect. 2.The location is exceptional and the breakfast options were fantastic. [SEP] U: I am looking for a train that leaves on Saturday going to Cambridge. S: Where are you departing from? U: I am leaving Broxbourne and need to be in Cambridge by 10:30. S: We have 4 such entries. Do you have a time you'd like to arrive by more specifically? U: 10:30 is the time I want to arrive by. No later than that, please. I have prior obligations I need to meet. S: I can book you on TR9384, leaving broxbourne at 8:32 and arriving in Cambridge at 9:32. How many people will you need tickets for? U: Oh, that's all right. No need to reserve my ticket. But I do need the travel time, please. S: Your travel time is 60 minutes.  Is there anything else that I can do for you? U: I'm also looking for a particular hotel - hobsons house. Can you help me with this? S: Is there a particular room that you would be interested in staying? We currently have 1 guesthouse available. U: What is the rate for that? S: Unfortunately, I do not have that information, would you like the phone number for Hobsons House to check the rates? U: No, I'm sure it's just fine. Could you book a stay for eight, starting that same day? S: Are you wanting a stay for 8 days or 8 people? U: Is the location good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to reviews, guests are generally pleased with the location of Hobsons House. Would you like any more information?

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.They also have an extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options to choose from, and those prices are much more wallet-friendly! reviews of SHIRAZ RESTAURANT: 1.There were also many non-alcoholic drink choices on the menu, but despite that fact they were quite average. 2.They have alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. 3.They did have a lot of different types of drinks without any alcohol, which was nice since I needed to drive home. [SEP] U: Can you help me find an expensive restaurant in the centre area? S: There are 33 possible places that fit your request. For example, there is an expensive African restaurant in the centre. Is this something you would be interested in? U: How about mediterranean food? S: Sure, either La Mimosa or Shiraz both serve excellent Mediterranean food. U: Does it offer non-alcoholic drink options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both of these restaurants offer a wide variety of non-alcoholic drinks. Can I answer anything else to help you choose?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 2.I had a great view of the mountains. 3.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train departing from norwich leaving on sunday? S: I found 19 trains that leave Norwich on Sunday. Where will you be traveling to and do you have an arrival time in mind? U: I am traveling to Cambridge, of course! I can leave Norwich anytime after 12:45 S: i recommend TR2974 which leaves 17:16. can i book that one? U: Yes, that would be fine. I'll need it booked for 3 people. I'll also need the reference number, please. S: Okay, I've book you for 3 people on Sunday. You reference number is 4W6OGHUA. Can I help you with anything else today? U: Yes, I'm also looking for a place to stay in the north that has free wifi. S: I have 12 options available that match your request.  What price range would you like? U: The hotel should be in the moderate price range and should have a star of 4. S: what about hamilton lodge? its lovely U: Does it have a good view of the area around it? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If individuals enjoy great views during their stay, the Hamilton Lodge will certainly please with surprisingly good mountain sights.

S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.I also ordered some beer, which was also fantastic. 2.The Golden Curry offers great food and drinks at a wonderful location. 3.I will caution that the drink that I had (beer) was pretty mediocre and bland. 4.Once the beer arrived I noticed how delicious it was, a very high quality brew indeed! 5.Good drinks though and cheap. 6.The menu offered high quality drinks, as well as a lot of non-alcoholic drink choices. 7.The King Fisher was refreshing and just as I remembered it, though it was quite pricey at $8. FAQs of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.Alcohol is served at The Golden Curry. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip in Cambridge. I'm looking for a train. S: sure what day are you traveling? U: I plan to travel on friday. S: Where are you departing from? U: I am departing from Broxbourne and I would like the train to arrive by 10:00. What is the price for this? S: The TR5570 train will work. Would you like me to book you passage? U: No thanks. I just need the price per ticket. S: It will cost you 17.90 U: Okay thank you, I'm also looking for an Indian restaurant in the east that is expensive. S: I would suggest this one the golden curry. U: Does the Golden Curry serve high quality beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most of the past customers say that they offer high quality drinks including beer while one customer was unhappy with the beer which they called mediocre.

src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: I wanted to visit the Center, could you tell the the hours it is open? S: I'm sorry, which centre would you like to visit? U: I am looking for a place to go in the centre of town. Can you make suggestions? S: Vue Cinema is a great place in the centre of town for movies. Or there's Ballare which is a great nightclub. U: Can you tell me the postcode for Ballare? That sounds fun. S: Ballare postcode is cb23na. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: I was hoping for a cheap restaurant close to the Vue Cinema. S: we got 5. which type of food do you want? U: Do you have any that serve Australian? S: I have none that serve that food. Perhaps another type? U: What about chinese food? S: May I recommend Charlie Chan? It's a cheap chinese restaurant in the centre of town. Would you like to book any tables? U: Can you first confirm that Charlie Chan offers great service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Charlie Chan is well regarded for their excellent service that's fast and friendly. Would you like to continue with a reservation?

src_text: reviews of LIMEHOUSE: 1.The view was breathtaking, too. 2.I had to be up early for meetings every morning, so starting the day with my coffee and a great view was really nice. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for a train departing cambridge that leaves after 21:45.  Can you help me with a reservation? S: Absolutely I can help with that. What day and to what destination are you traveling? U: I am traveling to london kings cross from cambridge. S: All trains leave at 23:00,what time would you like to arrive? U: I do not have a specific arrival time. S: Do you have a day you will be traveling? U: I will be traveling on Saturday. S: the TR4898 leaves at 23:00. do you want a ticket? U: Yes for five please. I will take a suggestion as I'm not familiar with the area. S: I would recommend limehouse, a 4 star guesthouse located at 78-80 milton road. Would you like to book a room? U: Yes I would like to book it for 5 people. S: What day will you be checking in? U: I actually don't need to book. I would just like the phone number, postcode, and price range. S: Limehouse is a moderately priced establishment. They're in postcode cb42je and their phone number is 01223300552. Is there anything else you want to know? Or anything else I can help with? U: How are the views from the rooms there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The views from the rooms at Limehouse are labeled as breathtaking and enjoyable to wake up to each morning.

src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.We wished the portions were bigger. 2.The portions could be bigger for the price. 3.The only dislikes I would have is that the portion sizes of the foods were quite small, and there were no vegetarian options, sadly. 4.While the portion sizes for food are generous the food is nothing special and the service not very enthusiastic. 5.You gotta try the Butter Chicken, it was good, lots of it on the place and affordable. reviews of RAJMAHAL: 1.Also the portion sizes are a bit small so order more. 2.The portions were generous and the foods were high quality to boot. [SEP] U: I'd looking for a good restaurant on the east side.  I'd prefer the moderate price range, if possible. S: Would you prefer Indian or Italian food? U: I would like Indian please. S: There is curry prince, and rajmahal, would either of those work for you? U: Do they serve heaping portions of food here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The portions at Rajmahal are either generous or a bit small depending on the customer, while that at Curry Prince are generally seen as being a bit lackluster.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The shower was a sad dribble of water. 2.It was challenging to rinse the shampoo efficiently. 3.The only negative was the low water pressure. S: Great, what day, time, and number of people would you like to book for at Cocum? U: Please book a table for 7 people at 11:45 on monday. S: I'm sorry that time slot is not available that day. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One of the only negatives about staying at the Hobsons House is that the water pressure in the showers is extremely poor and unsatisfactory.

src_text: reviews of TANG CHINESE: 1.However, the indoor decor was a bit outdated and was average at best. reviews of HK FUSION: 1.On the other hand, the food dishes were quite expensive, and the decor inside the restaurant felt a bit dated and lacking. 2.I liked that the restaurant had high-quality food as well as nice interior decoration. reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.However, the indoor decoration was mediocre. reviews of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.We stepped in and were delighted at the decor of the place. 2.It was in a nice location and had some nice indoor decorations. src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.But still, I appreciated the great view from my window, overlooking the nearby lake, and the room itself was very clean with a seriously comfortable bed. 2.Looking out of the balcony was the most beautiful view I've ever seen. src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was no more than a few noises I heard during my entire stay, I was able to keep my head clear. 2.I stayed here with my family, and we were able to get a good night's rest, as it was very quiet. 3.I mean they are like home comfortable, and also it's very quiet so we didn't have to worry about any loud noises. 4.This place definitely delivered in that regard. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 2.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.On the plus side, the restaurant has a great location near lots of nightlife in the city, but you're going to need those nearby bars if you want to get a buzz on, because Hakka has a super limited drinks menu. 2.Their drink menu was fairly extensive though. 3.They had a really great selection of high-end beers to choose from. 4.The drink options are plentiful and affordable as well. src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for a restaurant called the hotspot. S: Wonderful! The address of the hotpot is 66 Chesterton Road Chesterton, and their telephone number is 01223366552. I can help you get a taxi there if you like. U: Thank you! Do you know what the price range is at the hotpot? S: It's an expensive restaurant. U: What part of the city is that in? U: Do they keep their rooms clean there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, those that stay at the Allenbell are typically impressed by the cleanliness and scent of the rooms.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The price that I paid was a good value for money. 2.It was a good value for the money. 3.The price was really high for what it offers though. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. 5.Other than this, it was great especially for the money. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, considering that most guests that have stayed at the Allenbell remarked on the value for one's money, it can be thought of being reasonable.

src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 2.The portions were kind of small but I guess that helps with portion control! 3.I was overall very impressed with both the quality and the portions, as I had enough for a full meal and was still able to take enough home for leftovers the next day. 4.But the portions were so stupidly small, and the quality was seriously mediocre. 5.However, the portion sizes were quite small, and we were disappointed in the very limited selection of non-alcoholic drink options for the kids in our group. 6.Between us we ordered Gozleme, Baklava, Borek, and Ayran, all of which were of great quality and were in large portions. 7.The portions were generous and the prices were fair. src_text: reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.The food aside, the restaurant has a great view of the city, and it makes for a really nice date spot. 2.To add to that though their foods and drinks are awesome and the view of the place is very relaxing and professional. 3.I just expected a more pleasant view. 4.I disliked mediocre food and views however, given that the location was good. 5.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 6.It's surprising the place was so affordable for a place that had such a nice view. 7.What I didn't like so much was that although the restaurant is in the nice part of town, the views are mediocre at best. [SEP] U: I am looking for places to go in the centre of town. S: What types of attractions are you interested in going to? U: I don't know.  Can you make some suggestions? S: There are many churches in the area to check out. U: A church sounds great.  It doesn't matter what type church it is.  Will you pick one and send me the address including the postcode? S: The address to all saints church is 	jesus lane. U: Can you also find me a restaurant? S: What type of food would you like? U: Reservation for 3 at 13:00 on Saturday at the Ugly Duckling. Please provide reference number. Book a taxi to arrive before the booked time. Phone number and car type. S: I have booked a table for 1300, for 3 people at the Ugly Duckling, reference #JBZ7ORDO. Where do you need the taxi to meet you? U: Does the restaurant have nice views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Ugly Duckling has a great stunning view of the city which is relaxing and professional. It makes for a really nice date spot.

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. [SEP] U: Hello! I'm looking for a fun attraction in the center of town. S: I have two nightclubs and a cinema. Would either  of these venues interest you? U: How about the cinema? Could you tell me their name, as well as their phone number and entrance fee? S: The Vue Cinema is located at The Grafton Centre on East Road. Their phone number is 08712240240 and there is no entrance fee listed. U: Thank you very much.  I am also interested in a hotel named "Bridge Guest House."  Can you please provide me with a bit of information regarding this hotel? S: Bridge guesthouse is moderately prices with 3 stars, wifi and parkign are included.  Would you like more info on them? U: Does it offer a room with lots of space where I don't feel cramped? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews on the room sizes are mixed with some guests loved how much space they had and others were disappointed. Would you like me to see if there is a larger room available?

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.The bed was comfy so I slept well. 3.The only issue that I had is that the bed was not as soft as would have liked. [SEP] U: I'm looking for information on a hotel called worth house. S: Worth House is a cheaply prices guesthouse in the north part of town. Is there more specific information you're looking for? Would you like to book a room? U: Can you tell me if the beds at Worth House will let guests get a great night's sleep? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, I can do that for you. If you like a firm mattress, then you will have a great night's sleep at Worth House.

src_text: reviews of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.The food was a bit mediocre as well but the beverages and dessert make it worthwhile if you just want something light. 2.Some things I really enjoyed was the high quality drinks and the high food location. 3.Our server recommended a beer we enjoyed. 4.The drinks and food were also quite average. 5.However, the drinks were only okay, and there wasn't that much variety. 6.We were happy with the healthy order of Fish and Chips and Sheperd's Pie along with a lager which was great but too pricey for my taste. 7.I liked that there were so many drinks to choose from, and that they were high quality. FAQs of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.Travellers Rest serves alcohol including a range of craft beers. reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.Their beers were ok too and service was super friendly and nice. 2.The food was mediocre, but the drinks were very high quality! 3.While the drinks are reasonably priced they aren't very good. 4.The men had a lot of drink options to choose from but the drinks themselves just taste average. 5.The wine was good too. FAQs of GRAFFITI: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at Graffiti. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for a restaurant. I would prefer an expensive restaurant in the west of the city. S: We offer 9 such places. U: Is there a British one available? S: Great choice!  I have two.  Graffiti and travellers rest.  Would you like me to book one of these? U: Which one has high quality wines? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Graffiti restaurant has drinks that are rather average, while the Travellers Rest's offerings are equally varied in quality.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.Overall though, I'd recommend it if you're on a budget. 2.I chose it for seeming like a good value for my money and for the location. 3.If I had been paying for this trip, I would be very upset with the amount of money that this place costs to stay at. [SEP] U: Hi, I am traveling to Cambridge next month and am so excited to see some local tourist attractions.  I do need help with a place to stay. S: What area of town will you be staying in? U: I need information for the warkworth house for my hotel. S: The Warkworth House is a guesthouse located on the east side of town in the moderate price range with a 4 star rating, free internet and parking. Anything else? U: What other services are included with booking? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I am not sure what other services are included, but some customers said it was a good deal, while one said it was overpriced.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should be in the type of guesthouse and should be in the cheap price range S: There are 9 cheap guesthouses in Cambridge.  To help narrow it down, is there a part of town you prefer? U: Not really. I'd like a 4 star guesthouse, though, is that possible? S: There are seven that fit. Might I suggest the alexander bed and breakfast? U: I think I have heard of that.  Can you just get me an address? S: Absolutely! The Alexander Bed and Breakfast is located at 56 Saint Barnabas Road. Would you like me to book your stay? U: Is the hotel located in a good spot? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alexander Bed And Breakfast is located at a good area, despite not being too close to shopping centers.

src_text: reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.The only dislikes we had were the slow service time and the average drinks. 2.I was pleased with the great service from the wait staff, and my Hot Pot was really high quality and very tasty. 3.The only downside of the experience was the mediocre location and service, as the food took forever to finish. reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.The service was very friendly and good, the prices good too. 2.The workers were very friendly. 3.On top of that, the service was average and the food was rather basic. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: While I am visiting Cambridge, I would like to stay at the Ashley Hotel. Where is it located? S: The Ashley Hotel is located at 74 Chesterton Road. Would you like the phone number? I can also book a reservation for you. U: Book me a room there for 2 night with 6 people, starting Friday. Also, I will need the reference number. S: Your booking was successful!  The reference number is DH7R8VDH.  Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: I'd like a cheap restaurant in the centre of the city. S: There are a few cheap restaurants in the center of the city. Would you like Asian Oriental or Chinese food? U: I would like Chinese food. S: I found three restaurants, Charlie Chan, Rice House, and Golden House, which would you like to book? U: Is the wait staff superb? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All three the Charlie Chan, Rice House, and Golden house all have superb staff that are friendly and helpful.

src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.My server seemed to disappear for several minutes at a time and ignored me when I tried to make eye contact. 2.The service was very prompt and quick. 3.We ordered the Baklava and Gozleme which were very well prepared and the service was out standing. 4.The only thing that wasn't that great was the service. reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.The staff were real friendly as well, and on top of that the food didn't assault our bank accounts. 2.The waitress we had catered to us constantly and she was really friendly too. 3.The service was also terrible so it made me very irritated. 4.The place was crowded, but we were seated within 5 minutes, had menus in our hands a minute later, and only had to wait 15 minutes for our food; for those concerned about hygiene, the dining area was spotless. 5.I'm not familiar  with Turkish food so I didn't know what to order but our waitress was very helpful and convinced me to try the Bklava and Borek. 6.First of all, the service was great! [SEP] U: I would like to book a table at a turkish place and is moderately priced. S: You have your choice of Anatolia or Efes restaurant. U: Is the service great? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the Efes Restaurant and Anatolia suffer from an inconsistent service, ranging from friendly and prompt to inefficient and terrible.

src_text: reviews of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.Our meal was expensive for the portion sizes but the food was good. 2.The food was to die for, and the portions were rather hefty, in a good way. 3.They do give you good sized food dishes but the service itself was not great. 4.The Cornish Pasty and Roast Dinners had generous portions and were made from high-quality ingredients. 5.The foods were overpriced but I guess you get what you pay for, since they were high quality and came in large portions. reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.The location is right downtown, which I like, and the portions are generous. 2.Great big portions, and packed with flavor. 3.However, the drinks were pricy if you like to drink and I left a bit on the hungry side as the portions are small. [SEP] U: I want a place to eat in the west. S: Do you have a particular type of food in mind? U: I have a taste for something British. S: Ok, there are three options in that area. Do you have a certain price range? U: I want the most expensive one. S: There's Graffiti and Travellers Rest. Which one of the two restaurants do you like? U: I need a place with large portions of food S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviews of Travellers Rest more consistently note their large portion size. Shall I book a table for you?

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. [SEP] U: I am looking for a train to Cambridge on Friday S: I can help with that. Where would you be departing from? U: I am departing from Ely and I need it to arrive by 20:30. S: The TR3492 arrives in Cambridge at 19:52. That's the last train before 20:30. U: That would be perfect. I don't need to book just yet. Was the Train ID TR3492? S: Yes the train id is TR3492. Is there anything else I can do for you? U: Yes, I'm looking for information about the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel. S: Sure! The 4-star Huntingdon Marriott Hotel is in the west of town, at Hinchinbrook Business Park. It's expensive, though parking and internet are included. Does that answer your question? U: Yes, can I have the postcode for it as well. S: Absolutely. Their postcode is pe296fl. Can I be of any further assistance today? U: Can you tell me if the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel has good views from its rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I only have the opinion of one guest who stayed at Huntingdon Marriott Hotel. They said that they liked the view from the room.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The staff was nice and helpful. 2.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 3.While at this location, I noticed that the staff was extremely kind and respectful to both of us. 4.The staff was friendly which made me feel comfortable and welcomed. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The staff was friendly with my requests. 2.It was actually my first time traveling alone, so I was super nervous, but the staff was so welcoming that I instantly felt at ease upon arrival. [SEP] U: Hi, I am planning a trip to your beautiful town and am looking for places to go when I get there.  Can you help me? S: Certainly.  Do you have any particular types of things you'd like to see? U: I'm interested in exploring the local architecture. S: There are many colleges and churches to see. U: Do you have a favorite? S: My favorite is clare hall. U: I need a place that is architecture. S: How about old schools?  It is architecture and a school! U: Could I have the postcode, area and entrance fee of what you recommend? S: Okay, Old Schools is on Trinity Lane and is in the centre. Post code is cb21tt and it is free admission. U: Thanks! I'm also looking for an expensive, 2-star place to stay in the north. Do you have anything like that? S: there are no expensive hotel in the north. can you change the location? U: I would like to stay in the north but can you try in the moderate price range and see if any are available? S: We have 2 matches. ashley hotel and lovell lodge. Both have the identical amenities. Do you prefer one over the other? U: Which one of the places has the most friendly staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The staff at the Ashley Hotel provides a friendly, welcoming experience, while that at the Lovell Lodge is also extremely kind and respectful.

src_text: reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The drinks are also super high quality and super affordable, I was so pleased. 2.Am I the only one who thinks that a pint of warm beer is overpriced at $10? 3.I liked the ale which was so tasty and refreshing, as well as being reasonably priced. 4.The drinks were well-made and quite affordable. FAQs of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.Yes, this restaurant offers a full bar with alcoholic drinks. [SEP] U: I am looking for a centrally located upscale restaurant. S: I can book you at the midsummer House Restaurant if you would like. U: Does the Midsummer House Restaurant serve a beer that's a good value for the price? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes pretty much everybody said that the beer there is good value for the price, only one person found it to be overpriced.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was no more than a few noises I heard during my entire stay, I was able to keep my head clear. 2.I stayed here with my family, and we were able to get a good night's rest, as it was very quiet. 3.I mean they are like home comfortable, and also it's very quiet so we didn't have to worry about any loud noises. 4.This place definitely delivered in that regard. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 2.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a night club in South Cambridge? S: The Place is located at 22 Sidney Street. Their phone number is 01223324600. You will need to call for their entry fee. U: Can you schedule me a taxi to take me there? S: I can book you a taxi, can you tell me the arrival or departure time? U: Also, I need a hotel with parking and 2 stars. S: I have three options for you - two in the north in the moderate price range and one that's expensive in the east. U: OK, tell me about the ones to the north. I need one that's a regular hotel and not a guesthouse. S: The ones in the north are the Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge.  Do you have a preference? U: Yes, the place need to be soft sounding place to stay S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Ashley hotel is said to be quieter than the lovell Lodge. Would you like to make a reservation there?

src_text: reviews of NANDOS: 1.Very affordable too. 2.Neither one of us is familiar with this type of food, but we both really enjoyed our Bacalhau and Alheira, and thought they were a really great value for the portion size. 3.We shared some wine and it costs more than the food, which itself is reasonable. reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.There are so many cheaper Chinese restaurants in town that you can go to for the same quality food. 2.We can see why everyone recommends this place, but the food is also overpriced for what you get too. 3.It has a good view outside the windows, but it fell short when it come to paying the bill, which was too much. 4.The price point was affordable. 5.I'd be willing to come here every week if only their food weren't so overpriced. [SEP] U: I need a cheap place to eat on the south side of town. S: Great, I have two places to recommend.  Nados serves Portuguese and the Lucky Star serves Chinese.  Which one do you like? U: Does Nados have a better value to eat for money than Lucky Star? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All guests seem to regard the value at Nandos to be good, while that at the Lucky Star is considered a bit overpriced.

src_text: reviews of RICE BOAT: 1.The drinks were not great but they were cheap so no complaints here. 2.I was also pleasantly surprised by their high quality drinks, and I really enjoyed the beer I had with my meal. 3.The waiter was nice and he recommended a great beer. FAQs of RICE BOAT: 1.Yes, Rice Boat serves alcohol. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for information about a restaurant called rice boat. S: Rice Boat restaurant is located on 37 Newnham Road. The phone number is 01223302800. The restaurant serves upscale Indian cuisine. U: I'm looking for a place that serves high quality drinks. How does the Rice Boat rate? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Rice Boat has many high quality drinks, including great beers, which the servers will be happy to recommend.

src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.The location is actually not as remote as it seems and I made it there in about 10 mins by car. 2.Otherwise, loved the restaurant and wish that it was closer to my house, because the location is pretty inconvenient. 3.The location was nice and close to my home, and the staff was friendly enough. 4.The location isn't in the best of places and could be closer to town. [SEP] U: I am looking for an expensive Korean restaurant. Can you tell me my options please? S: Little Seoul is the only one - it's an expensive korean place in the centre. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Is the location good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It depends on where you are located. If you require something close to town it may not be the best option.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.However, hotel was very noisy, which was a huge distraction to an otherwise good room. 2.Sometimes my kids make noise but we could hear noise from other room and TVs so I did not really worry about it. 3.If you want a quiet hotel, this one would be a pass because the outside was pretty noisy. [SEP] U: Hi, I'd like information on a particular hotel called the Kirkwood House. S: It's a guesthouse in the north. It's moderately priced. Do you want me to book it? U: Is it in a peaceful and quiet location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests of Kirkwood house have said that the rooms were noisy, and that they could hear kids in another room.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I'd really like to find a moderately priced guesthouse. S: May I suggest the Carolina Bed and Breakfast? It's located in the east and has 4 stars. There is parking and internet with this as well. U: I am looking for a guesthouse in the moderate price range which includes free parking. S: I'd suggest acorn guest house. Would you like a reservation? U: Can you tell me what you know about how strong the water pressure is at Acorn Guest House? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviewers were generally dissatisfied with the water pressure strength at Acorn Guest House. Do you have any other questions about the property?

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Loved the scenery outside and the room was well decorated and home-y. 2.I adored the view that this place offers, we found ourselves staring our rooms windows a lot during our stay. 3.Our room was clean and there is a nice view of the mountains. [SEP] U: I need a train from Cambridge on Tuesday S: There are plenty of those! Where are you headed, and at what time? U: I'm heading to Norwich and need to leave after 11:15 from Cambridge S: There are 13 trains. The one that leaves closest to your requested time is the TR5949, which leaves at 11:36. Does that interest you? U: Yes, that would be great!  I need 7 tickets, please.  Oh, and the reference number. S: I have booked the TR5949 for 7, departing from Cambridge at 11:36 and arriving in Norwich at 12:55. Reference number: UR9DKTIK. Anything else I can help you with? U: Yes, as a matter of fact, I also need a place to stay. S: There are many different hotels in Cambridge, do you have an area or price range in mind? U: Is there anything in the south with a star of 4? It doesn't have to have free parking. S: Sure, we have two hotels for you aylesbray lodge guest house, and rosa's bed and breakfast. can I book one of these for you today? U: Could we try the Aylesbury House? S: Alright. What day would you like to stay, how many nights and how many people? U: Actually I need more information on the hotels. Does Aylesbury House have free parking? S: The train was booked for 7 tickets departing at the correct time and providing the reference number. Also, more info is needed about a hotel. U: Does the Aylesbury House have a nice view of the city? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, the views from that location have lovely scenery, a nice view of the mountains, and many opportunities to stare out the window.

src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.They had a really great selection of high-end beers to choose from. [SEP] U: I'm hoping you can help me find a guesthouse. Parking is optional. S: a and b guest house is a nice one. Do you want to book ? U: Does it have a 3 star rating?  I'm also needing free wifi on this trip.  Thanks for helping me. S: It has a 4 star rating and does provide internet. Would you like a reservation? U: does it have free parking ? S: Parking is not included but internet is, do you want to book or search for something else? U: I need a hotel that has free parking S: which type hotel do you want? U: Any type that you have available. S: In that case I would recommend the Bridge Guest House, it has a 3 star rating and offers both free WiFi and free parking. Would you like to book it? U: Can I have the price range and phone number? S: The price range is moderate and the phone number is 01223247942. U: Also I need to find an expensive chinese restaurant book the table for 3 at 16:45 on tuesday S: Is there a particular part of town you would like to go to? U: I need that in the north please. S: I have 2 chinese restaurants in the north, the hakka and the hotpot, both expensive. Phone number is 0122568988 and 01223366552 respectively. Would you like me to book reservations for you? U: I love to try different beers. Do they have lots of different beer options at either Hakka or Hotpot? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, they do have a lot of beer options at Hakka. One past guest mentioned a good selection of high end beer.

src_text: reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.The location is near lots of cool things nearby so you won't miss anything, but the view isn't that great. 2.The view isn't the best due to the restaurant being located in a strip mall, but that's about the only thing my family and I disliked about this delightful establishment. reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.It was within our price range and a good value for our money. 2.It was good value for money, overall. 3.For the price though it was totally worth it and I we plan on coming back soon. src_text: reviews of COTE: 1.My friends had to drag me to Cote, because the location is really inconvenient to my home and required a 30 minute drive, but I'm so glad they did! [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for a restaurant by the name of Cote. Can you find this for me and book a reservation please? S: I sure can. Can I get a date and time, along with the amount of people that will be there? U: Can you tell me if they have a nice location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the distance required to reach the Cote restaurant can be considered inconvenient to those unwilling to make the drive.

src_text: reviews of HOTEL DU VIN AND BISTRO: 1.The drinks were a little bit on the higher priced side, so watch your wallet if you drop in. 2.But with this comes a price... my drink cost too much for a small child sized glass and it wasn't vegetarian friendly for one of my partners. 3.However, they did have great prices for their drinks, and the food portions were fantastic. 4.I will say though, all these things considered, I liked the fact that they had a lot of gluten-free options, and the drinks, though overpriced, did taste quite high quality - they weren't using bottom shelf gut rot liquor at least. FAQs of HOTEL DU VIN AND BISTRO: 1.The restaurant has a full bar and serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant in Cambridge that serves south indian food. S: I am sorry there are no restaurants in the are that match that description. U: What kind of moderately-priced restaurants are there in the center of town, then? S: We've got 21 moderately-priced restaurants in the centre. There are Asian Oriental, British, Chinese, European, Gastropub, International, Italian, Lebanese, Modern European, Spanish, and Turkish options. Do any of those interest you? U: Good. I would like to try Asian Oriental then. S: The Yippee noodle bar meets your criteria. Would you like me to book that for you? U: No thanks.  How about a moderately priced modern European restaurant? S: Hotel Du Vin and Bistro serves European food and is moderately priced. Does this sound good to you? U: Does their wine list include a nice Riesling that's not too expensive? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There is no mention of a resiling at this place. The drinks are a bit expensive. It does offer a full bar so plent of drinks.

src_text: reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.The food aside, the restaurant has a great view of the city, and it makes for a really nice date spot. 2.To add to that though their foods and drinks are awesome and the view of the place is very relaxing and professional. 3.I just expected a more pleasant view. 4.I disliked mediocre food and views however, given that the location was good. 5.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 6.It's surprising the place was so affordable for a place that had such a nice view. 7.What I didn't like so much was that although the restaurant is in the nice part of town, the views are mediocre at best. [SEP] U: I want a train that leaves on wednesday. S: Okay, I'd be happy to book that for you. Where would you like to go? U: I'm going to Cambridge from New Street in Birmingham S: How about train TR0014, leaving at 05:40? U: I need to make sure that I will arrive by 09:15? S: Yeah, that train will get you there by 8:23. U: Great. I'm also looking for information on the Ugly Duckling restaurant. S: The Ugly Duckling is a fantastic Chinese place in the center of town. It's expensive, but worth it. I'd be happy to book a table, if you like. U: Does it have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some guests were disappointed by the views at the Ugly Duckling, but others thought the same sights were stunning.

src_text: reviews of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.I also thought that the food was very high quality as well. 2.The food was to die for, and the portions were rather hefty, in a good way. 3.The foods were overpriced but I guess you get what you pay for, since they were high quality and came in large portions. 4.It wasn't all that great to be honest... 5.The drinks and food were also quite average. reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.The price and quality of food were off the charts, and service was great as well. src_text: reviews of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.It was kind of noisy and cramped. 2.But with the nice location and really superb food  with a very nice atmosphere it was well worth stopping there. 3.It wasn't a super place for a date either since the atmosphere was mediocre. 4.The restaurant had a pleasant atmosphere, but the food was a tad bit overpriced. 5.I did however feel that the atmostphere was quite mediocre. reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.What an experience and authentic feel. 2.The place looks very inviting and intimate. 3.I enjoyed my time here just for the service and atmosphere. I want it to be special, so maybe something expensive. S: You have two choices:the Graffiti or the Travellers Rest. Shall I book a table at one of them for you? U: Which one has a relaxed, casual atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Graffiti's atmosphere is said to be inviting and intimate. Traveller's Rest is pleasant, but may be on the noisy side.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. U: No, I want an expensive hotel with free wi-fi. S: How about the express by holiday inn cambridge, it's in the east. U: Does it have free parking? S: Yes it does. Would you like to go ahead and make a reservation? U: Is the shower's water pressure strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure is bad. A user said the shower water was like someone had a sprinkler overhead and wasn't good.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.But the value for the money just wasn't there. 2.I do have to say though, I thought that the room was overpriced for what it was, and I was disappointed that there was no elevator service. 3.I was happy with the clean bathroom, and overall I think I got a good value for my money. 4.I kept telling my family that I felt like we didn't pay enough for the services we were getting. 5.However, I found that the price per night for this room was too much and I wouldn't stay here of my own volition if I had to pay for it. 6.Honestly, Avalon is pretty overpriced for what you get. [SEP] U: I need a 4 star hotel on the north side. S: I have 7 moderately priced properties in the north with 4 stars, and 1 cheap one. Do you have a preference for price? U: Is there anything in the expensive price range? S: No, I'm sorry, there is not. U: How about just moderate? S: Yes, there are 7 properties fitting that description and they are all guesthouses. Would you like to book one? U: Yes, which one do you suggest? S: Avalon is my favorite. When do you want to stay? U: Do you think this hotel a good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The majority of reviewers not that the hotel was a bad value and overpriced. Only one person thought it was a good value.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. [SEP] U: I am looking for a museum to visit in the centre of town S: There are many museums in the centre of town, but I would recommend Broughton House Gallery. Could I be of further assistance? U: Yes, can you give me the postcode and entrance fee for that museum? S: Absolutely. There is no entrance fee for the Broughton House Gallery and the postcode is cb11ln. U: Thank you! Are there any guesthouses nearby? S: The Alexander bed and breakfast is located in the centre area. May I book this for you? U: Yes that will work, please book. S: Certainly. How long would you like to stay? U: I will need 3 nights for 2 people. S: What day would you like to start your stay? U: I would like to start my stay on Friday. S: Sorry, that booking is unavailable. Perhaps you'd prefer another day or a shorter stay? U: How about 6 people for 5 nights starting friday? S: oh that definitely worked. I have booked you in and your reference number is KVJNZBG6. U: Thank you. Can you please confirm for me that the guesthouse you booked for me is moderately priced? S: It is actually cheaply priced. Is that going to be okay? U: No, sorry. I am looking for something moderately priced. S: I'm sorry there are no moderately priced guesthouses in centre.  Would you like to try something else? U: Yes, please. We seem to have gone very astray. I need a moderately priced 3 star guest house. It doesn't matter where. S: Okay, there are four available. How about Hamilton Lodge in the north? It's at 156 chesterton road cb41da with phone 01223365664. Would that work for you? U: Can you tell me if the Hamilton Lodge has large rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: At The Alexander Bed and Breakfast , it's 50/50 on the size of the rooms. Only half of past guests were happy with the room size. Do you have any other questions?

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Loved the scenery outside and the room was well decorated and home-y. 2.I adored the view that this place offers, we found ourselves staring our rooms windows a lot during our stay. 3.Our room was clean and there is a nice view of the mountains. src_text: FAQs of LA TASCA: 1.Yes, La Tasca does have provision for outdoor seating. reviews of LA TASCA: 1.Right when we were seated I noticed how nice the outdoor dining area was. [SEP] U: Hello, can you recommend local restaurants? S: I have many options for restaurants in the area.  Is there a certain type of food you would like me to find information on? src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. [SEP] U: I am looking to go to a museum in the east part of Cambridge, can you help me find one? S: How about cambridge artworks? It's on the east side and it's free admission. U: That sounds good. What is the postcode? S: The postcode for Cambridge Artworks is cb13ef. Can I help you with anything else? U: I'm in need of a guesthouse. I'd like it to have three stars. S: There are 4 guesthouses available, two in the north, one each in the south and west.  Do you have a preference on area? U: Yes, I'd prefer a moderate place in the south. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Bridge Guest House is known to have smaller than expected rooms, but still bright and cheerful with enough space.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. [SEP] U: Hi. Could you help me with finding a hotel? S: Absolutely, do you have any other requirements? U: A 3 star hotel on the east side would be preferable. S: I don't have anything matching your request, would you like to change your hotel location or star rating? U: How about a 4 star hotel with free parking? S: I'm still not finding anything. Would you like a different area? U: I need a hotel for 4 people and 4 nights starting from thursday S: I'm sorry there are no matches. U: Oh wow. I really need to find something. Would you mind looking again? 4 Star rated in the east with free parking. I would really appreciate it. S: Sorry. There are no matches. Is there anything else I can do for you today? U: I'm sorry but I have a hard time believing there is no place to stay in the east with either a 3 or 4 star rating. S: There are actually no lodgings of any kind in the east part of town listed.  Would you like to try another area. The centre is very popular? U: Since you say there are no 3 or 4 star hotels in the east, I will settle for the centre of town. S: That was a mistake. There are lots of 4 star hotels here. What is your price range? U: Let's go expensive. I need to book it for 4 people for 4 nights on Thursday. S: I am sorry but there are no 4 star hotels in the east in the expensive range.  Would you like to try another price range, area, or star rating? U: This is really frustrating. Can you find me any 3 or 4 star hotels anywhere ? S: Gonville Hotel is a great hotel located in the centre. It's 3 stars and is in the expensive price range. Would you like me to book you a room? U: Is the water pressure in the showers good at that hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Gonville Hotel does not have good water pressure according to its customers.  Some have even said that they definitely need to get better water pressure due to it being very weak and only a trickle.
