src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The breakfast options were plentiful, too. 2.In the morning, we were offered great breakfast choices, which we enjoyed. 3.In the morning I had breakfast and they had lots of things to choose from. 4.We have very different tastes in food, and we were both satisfied with what was available. FAQs of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The Hamilton Lodge offers a full English breakfast. 2.The Hamilton Lodge does not offer a free breakfast. You need to pay 10 GBP per person. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train departing from birmingham new street going to cambridge? S: Absolutely. What day do you need to get to Cambridge, and at what time? U: train should arrive by 21:00 and should leave on tuesday S: There are trains that meet those requirements leaving once an hour starting at 05:40. U: Can you assist me with booking one? S: Lets narrow down the time a little, the TR 3802 leaves at 17.40 and arrives at 20.23 so that gives you a little extra time, would you like me to book you? U: That would be great. I also would like to book a guesthouse for my stay. S: Okay, great. You have a lot of options. Would you like to narrow it down by area, price range, or stars? U: Yes. It should have 2 stars and include free wifi. S: I do not have any in that star range. Shall I try something else? U: Maybe a star rating of 3 would be good.  Is there anything available? S: yes when were you planning your stay and for how many people? U: I need the reservation to be for 2 people and 2 nights please. S: Okay! Starting when? U: On Tuesday please. S: I've booked your room for two at Hamilton Lodge. You'll be staying for 2 nights beginning Tuesday. Your reference number is 3NT2B4SP. Can I help you find anything else today? U: Does the Hamilton's breakfast menu have lots of choices? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Correct, when selecting to stay at the Hamilton Lodge, one can expect to be offered a great number of choices for breakfast.

src_text: reviews of RIVERSIDE BRASSERIE: 1.The drinks we weren't crazy about. 2.Last night I went to the Riverside Brasserie with some colleagues of mine and I tried the souvlaki and what I thought would be a good mixed drink except it wasn't. 3.Now, the food itself was delicious, as were the drinks (happy hour prices all night long, too!). 4.My margarita just tasted like sour mix and my wife couldn't finish her drink because they made it too strong. 5.My colleagues didn't like theirs either and they had different type drinks. 6.I like their drink menu but my drink was just alight, I tried the tapas and the portions were large. 7.The drinks themselves were not the best tasting even though they offered many options. FAQs of RIVERSIDE BRASSERIE: 1.There are alcoholic drinks available at Riverside Brasserie. [SEP] U: Hi there. I'd like to find a place to dine in the city centre, preferable with Sri Lankan food. Do you have any recommendations? S: Sorry, I don't have any restaurants with sri lankan food in the centre. Would you like to try another type of food? U: Could you try again? Moderately priced, perhaps? S: Sorry, there was nothing found. Do you want to try a different kind of food? U: How about modern european food? S: There are two options for modern european food in centre in the moderate price range.  May I suggest Riverside Brasserie? U: Does it have good Chardonay there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure, but many customers complained about their drinks not being good and being too sour. Would you like to look at some other options?

src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The food was delicious but the drinks tasted flat. 2.The drinks were reasonably priced and the food was absolutely amazing, it both looked and tasted amazing, especially the spring rolls, possibly the best spring rolls I've ever tasted.. 3.The food and drinks were exceptional We had the Banh Cuon and Com Tam. 4.My beverage was so-so at best, but at least the drinks were cheap and there were lots of non-alcoholic options . 5.I thought the food and drinks were affordable. 6.The drink selection was expansive but pricey, and what I ordered did not stand out in any way. 7.They have good prices on drinks and good portions on meals. 8.After dinner I decided to order a drink, but was quite disappointed. 9.I found it to be a bit expensive for what was provided, especially compared to the delicious food. 10.Unfortunately the same can't be said for the drinks. 11.Thanh Binh also has a pretty great menu of specialty drinks with really reasonable and affordable prices, which is great because their non-alcoholic menu leaves a lot to be desired. FAQs of THANH BINH: 1.Thanh Binh does serve alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm looking for Scandinavian food in any area. S: I am not able to locate a Scandinavian restaurant; do you have a second choice? U: Yes, could you look for a Vietnamese restaurant? S: Thanh Binh is a Vietnamese restaurant in the west of town, and is in the cheap price range. U: Is this facility accessible for people with disabilities? S: If you have a wheelchair the restaurant has no wheelchair access. Does that work for you? U: Does it also have vegetarian options? S: Yes, vegetarian dishes are available at Thanh Binh. What else may I help you with? U: Could I order an alcoholic beverage at Thanh Binh? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, when selecting to dine at the Thanh Binh one can expect to be able to order an alcoholic beverage.

src_text: FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wifi is free at Acorn Guest House. reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.They did offer free wi-fi which worked as I needed it to. 2.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 3.The free wi-fi sure was nice, too, since the kids like to play games on their phones. 4.Acorn Guest House offers free wi-fi, which was a huge selling point for it. [SEP] U: Yes, I'm visiting Cambridge and want to know about Cambridge Artworks in town? S: It is a museum in the eas part of town on 5 greens road, is there more you would like to know? U: Can I please have the phone number? S: Certainly.  The phone number is 01223902168. U: I need a 4-star place to stay in the north part of town. S: Do you have a preference for parking/wifi/price range? U: No, I don't really have a reference for any of those, I don't even need internet. S: The Acorn Guest House, on 154 chesterton road is available, shall I book it for you? U: Does it have free wifi? S: Yes it does.  Would you like me to book it for you? U: Does that mean that the hotel will not charge me if I use the WiFi? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: That's right! The WiFi is free for all guests at The Acorn Guest House. Would you like to make a reservation for a room?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: Hello, are there any centrally located hotels in Cambridge with free parking? S: There are a few hotels that meet your criteria. Would you be interested in the Alexander Bed and Breakfast? It has four stars with cheap prices. U: I am looking for a good location, is this hotel in a central location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are mixed ratings for the location for the Alexander B&B. Depending on what they're looking for, some found the location to be quite convenient while others claim it was mediocre and not very convenient. Would you like me to find another place with better ratings?

src_text: FAQs of BANGKOK CITY: 1.Bangkok City serves alcohol. reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.The food is good and affordable as are the drinks. 2.We both had Thai beers with our meal, and those weren't as pleasing; the same could be said for the view, which is of a dismal parking lot. 3.The Yellow Curry was some of the best I've ever had and the beer was top shelf and ice cold. [SEP] U: Hi, I am searching for a nice Thai restaurant in Cambridge Centre S: The only Thai restaurant located in Centre Cambridge is Bangkok City. Would you like the address? U: Does Bangkok City serve high quality beers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to some of the reviews left by previous guests the beer was ice cold and great.  However other reviews stated that the beer was not pleasing.

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. [SEP] U: I will be in the centre of cambridge.  I am looking for any type of attraction involving architecture. S: I'd recommend All Saints Church on Jesus Lane. Did you need help with anything else? U: Can you give me the postcode for that? S: The postcode is CB58BS. Can I help you find anything else? U: I need a place to stay. S: There are 33 places to stay, do you have any requirements? U: I need something in the south and free parking. S: I would recommend the Bridge Guest House based on your criteria. Would you like me to book you a room? U: Are the rooms extra large? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests have offered mixed reviews for size of the rooms at the Bridge Guest House. Some say the rooms are smaller than expected while others are satisfied with the space and brightness.

src_text: reviews of ALPHA-MILTON GUEST HOUSE: 1.The views were amazing. 2.While I was there I really admired the view. 3.Just a bit disappointed at the rooms not being clean when we arrived, but the views are worth it. 4.The view is also very nice. 5.We were not disappointed. 6.My partner and I did like the size of the room and we enjoyed the view. 7.What stood out to me the most is just how quiet it was, but on top of that, the views were great. [SEP] U: I going to be staying in the centre part of town, what is there to do at that area? S: There's a lot of popular attractions in the centre of town, including boating, cinema, museums, nightclubs, and much more. Do you have a specific preference? U: No, I don't have a preference. What's a good place to go to? S: I would suggest the Museum of Archaelogy and Anthropology.  It is located at University of Cambridge, Downing Street and has free admission. U: May I get the postcode, phone number for that attraction? S: Yes, the postcode is cb23dz. The phone number is 01223333516. Can I help you with anything else? U: Yes, I'd like information about the Alpha Milton guest house. S: alpha-milton guest house is a moderate priced 3 start guesthouse in the north, it does not have free internet or parking. They are located at 63 milton road. U: Is there a good view from the room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All the reviews say the views from the room are excellent. Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.View is just ok, nothing great. 2.First of all the view was wonderful, lots of windows going to the downtown area. 3.It was located in a nice area and had a nice view. 4.The place is in a nice location also, looking over the Steinhatchee river. [SEP] U: I need a train from cambridge to go to london liverpool street S: sure, what day are you traveling? U: I will be traveling on Thursday. S: Do you know what time you need to depart or arrive by so I can narrow the options? U: I will be traveling on a Sunday, and I need to arrive by 14:30 S: You will be traveling on Thursday or Sunday? You've said both. U: I should leave Cambridge on sunday and arrive in london liverpool street by 14:30. I need 4 tickets and a reference number. S: TR5504 would arrive at 13:27, would that work? U: Yes, that's perfect. I need tickets for 4 people, please. S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 66.4 GBP payable at the station . Reference number is : B8QZ32WO. Can I help with anything else? U: Yes, i need to find a restaurant to visit in the centre of town. Preferably in the moderate price range. S: There are 21 that fits your criteria. Which cuisine would you like, to help narrow your choices down? U: It doesn't matter. S: Yippee Noodle Bar meets your criteria, would you like their information? U: does it have a great view though S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It has lots of windows facing the downtown area, and many people say the view is good. Some say it is just ok though.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay. It needs to be a guesthouse and include free wifi. S: There are 23 hotels that meet your needs. Would you like to narrow your search by area and/or price range? U: I would like for it to be cheap and include free parking. S: There are nine guesthouse hotels in various areas. What part of town are you hoping for? U: Nothing in particular. I just need it booked for 6 people for a total of 4 nights starting from sunday. I'd also like the reference number, please. S: Sure! We will book you in a hotel with 4 stars.  The reservation will be for 6 people for 4 nights.  How many rooms would you like to reserve? U: Well, for six people I suppose I will be needing three rooms, for four nights, starting Sunday. S: You're booked at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast, 517a coldham lane, for 6 people for four nights tarting Sunday. Your reference number is JXVKZ7KV. U: Will the water pressure in the showers be fast and hard? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alexander bed and breakfast has water pressure issues, meaning that the water pressure is low. Want to book somewhere else?

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel to stay at in the centre, can you look this up for me? S: There are three hotels in the center of town. Do you prefer something moderate or expensive? U: Not in terms of that, but do they have free parking and have a 3 star rating? S: The Gonville hotel has 3 stars and parking, and the University Arms hotel has 4 stars and parking. They are both expensive. Would you like more details? U: Okay, I'd like to book a room at the Gonville Hotel for 4 nights. There will be 6 people and we will be arriving on Saturday. S: I'm sorry, there are no rooms available for that length of stay.  Could you shorten your stay or book a different day possibly? U: Yes, what about 2 nights instead of 4? S: Sure, that worked.  You have booked 2 nights and your reference number is RU89U6V8.  Can I be of further help today? U: Do they have showers with high water pressure at the gonville hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, the water pressure isn't good. Will that still work, or should I cancel and start another booking?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I'm looking for somewhere to stay in North Cambridge. I would like it to be a guesthouse S: There's eleven different entries for those criteria. Is there anything else you require, such has internet or parking? How about a price range? U: I would like a hotel with 4 stars. S: Alright. There are 8 different guesthouses that are 4 stars. May I recommend the Acorn Guest House? It is moderately priced and provide free wifi and parking. U: Does the Acorn have good water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, unfortunately the water pressure provided in the bathroom showers of the Acorn Guest House is rather lackluster.

src_text: reviews of WAGAMAMA: 1.Of course, all that good stuff comes at a significant price point, but that's probably the only bad thing about it. 2.I got a beer for a drink, which proved to be quite affordable. 3.The foods were all spectacular and tantalizing, and the beer was fresh, crisp, and quite affordable. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: At Wagamama, alcoholic drinks are served. The beer is said to be fresh, crisp, and quite affordable, although this is a restaurant with a higher price point.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. [SEP] U: We are visiting for a couple days and would like to see some boat attractions in town.  What do you have available? S: Depends on what area of town you'll be visiting. U: I haven't decided on what area of town I will be staying in, I would just like to know the boat attractions please. S: There are only boat attractions in the east, north and centre so If i was you I wouldn't stay in the west or south. U: Ok.  I would like the name of a specific boat attraction please. S: The camboats in the east side is highly suggested.  Would you like any information on them? U: What is the entrance fee? S: I'm sorry, but I have checked all the boat attractions in the other areas of town and none have entrance fees listed. Can I help with something else? U: Yes, can you get me information about Huntingdon Marriott Hotel? S: It's an expensive 4 star hotel at kingfisher way, hinchinbrook business park, huntingdon on the west side of town. Phone number is 01480446000 and postcode is pe296fl. Provides free internet/parking. U: Do the rooms in this hotel have good views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests who have stayed at the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel have commented that they liked the view from their room.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.This is very frustrating when you are trying to work and the delay is huge. 2.Also, the Wi-Fi was extremely slow. 3.Also, the fast wi-fi was a huge plus for work I had to work to do on my laptop. S: Yes, both of them are!  We've got Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge.  Do you have a preference? U: Does either Ashley Hotel or Lovell Lodge have excellent WiFi? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Ashley Hotel has wifi, but a majority of the guests said that it was slow. Only one person found it to be fast.

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.Apparently they're known for having great drinks, but I only had the one since they were pretty expensive. 2.We didn't try any drinks, because we thought they seemed overpriced. 3.While the drinks are reasonably priced they aren't very good. 4.However, the drinks were pricy if you like to drink and I left a bit on the hungry side as the portions are small. FAQs of GRAFFITI: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at Graffiti. [SEP] U: Can you tell me a little about the clare college? S: Clare College is, obviously, a college located on the west side. Address is trinity lane, postcode cb21tl. Phone is 01223333200. There is an entrance fee of 2.50 pounds for events there. U: Thank you so much! S: You're welcome. Can I help you with anything else today? U: Yes what restaurants are in the west area in the expensive price range? S: There are many to choose from. What sounds good? British, European, Indian or Thai? U: Don't care as long as it's expensive and in the west side. S: I suggest the graffiti that serves british food. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Would one have a decent value of wine for one's money at the Graffiti? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Probably not, most of the customers said that the drinks there were too expensive or overpriced. Do you want to look at some different options?

src_text:
reviews of HOME FROM HOME: 1.The location is nice because it is close to transportation and I felt pretty safe. 2.The location itself offered many amenities outside of the location. 3.The location isn't that great, so not much to see. 4.I appreciated the quietness of the hotel, the excellent and very convenient location, and best of all they offered accessible parking, which came in really handy because my youngest child is handicapped. 5.I very much liked the location. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train leaving cambridge on sunday. S: I can help with that. What is the destination and what time would you like to leave? U: I would like to go to stevenage by 14:00. S: You can take train TR8464 to arrive there in time.  Would you like me to book it for you? U: Yes please book it for 7 people and provide the reference number. S: Here is the booking information:Booking was successful, the total fee is 71.68 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : FCZJMTAI. U: I am also looking for a place to stay. S: I'll be glad to help you with that. What area would you like to stay in? U: Somewhere in the north, with 4 stars, free parking, and expensive. S: i don't have anything that fits those criteria, would you like me to look for something else? U: Can you try those same things but in the moderate price range? S: That bring sup six results, I recommend the home from home guesthouse, would you like more info or a booking? U: Is this hotel in a good location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: While the location isn't perfect, Home From Home is generally enjoyed by its guests that feel it's in a quiet and convenient spot.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Carolina Bed and Breakfast had a pretty mediocre location, it seemed too far away from the places I came to town to visit. It's located at 138 Peme Rd.  How many nights and how many people?  When will you need this? U: Is that the one that's going to be close to other places for travel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One drawback to the Carolina B&B is that it is not located near many attractions and you may need to travel a bit to see the most popular sites.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. src_text: reviews of FINCHES BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The staff was friendly and made us feel welcomed and like we could reach out to them if we needed anything. 2.The staff did not seem to understand how frustrating that was for me. 3.And on top of that, I found the staff to be really unprofessional, which brought down the good vibes for my stay. src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. [SEP] U: I need a train that leaves after 11:00 and goes to Cambridge S: What day would you be traveling? U: I will be traveling on Saturday from Norwich. S: The earliest train leaves at 11:16 and every hour thereafter.  A ticket costs 14.08 pounds.  Can I help you book? U: Please book the 11:16 train for 5 people and can I please have the reference number? S: Alright, I have 5 tickets booked. your reference number is UDGBVRLM. U: I also need to book accommodations. Would you like to book a room with one of these? U: I need one that includes free parking, but it does not need to have internet. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Gonville Hotel needs better water pressure as it is slow and sucks. The water pressure at The Lensfield Hotel is unknown.

src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.The sunset was really beautiful out on the balcony! 2.I was alone so I did not need much but it was very clean and had a nice view I enjoyed. 3.The room is big and I had a great view of the sunset. 4.The view was great - overlooked the ocean and was right by the beach. [SEP] U: I need a place to stay that has 4 stars and includes free parking. S: There are many high quality places to stay here, we have 19 4 stars places to choose from, any other preferences? U: I would like it to be in the east. S: Autumn house	is available, would you like to book that? U: Does the room have a beautiful view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews on the view at the Autumn house are universally positive.  Props are given to the balcony view, the beach and the view of the sunset.  Sounds nice, right?

src_text: FAQs of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Little Seoul does offer outdoor seating. reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.It was also a nice place to eat since there was an outdoor dining area. [SEP] U: I am traveling to Cambridge and looking forward to try local restaurants. S: We have many options available.  What type of food would you like to eat? I need seats for 6 people and the reference number please. S: I can do that for you! Where would you like to go? U: We need to go to Cambridge. S: TR3225 leaves Kings Lynn 10:11 and arrives in Cambridge at 10:58. Do you want me to book this train for you? U: How much is the WiFi service on the train? S: The Wi-Fi service on the train is free. Would you like to purchase a ticket on this train? U: yes and please include a reference number S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 58.8 GBP payable at the station .Reference number is : USQHZNBW. May I assist you with anything else ? src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.I also thought that the drinks were very fresh and professional. 2.The location of this place is pleasant and the drinks here are reasonably priced. 3.The drinks were also very reasonably priced too for the taste and size. 4.The quality of food and drinks was good. 5.So don't go if you want to get a buzz on, but absolutely check out this restaurant if you want high quality Indian food. 6.Their drinks are alright but I would not come for them. 7.We had a lot of drink options to choose from including drinks without alcohol since my partner was going to drive home. 8.I did however not care for the fact that the drink options were sparse. 9.I'm going to guess that most of us don't go to Indian restaurants for alcoholic beverages, and that's a good thing, because the drinks at Curry Prince are really mediocre and significantly overpriced for what you get. 10.We loved the drinks as they were affordably priced, and of high-quality. 11.In addition to that, all of the drinks were very well priced. src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.Restaurant Alimentum is a good place for European dishes at a good price. 2.We were a little disappointed in the price of the drinks, but I guess considering how reasonable the food prices are, they had to raise costs somewhere. 3.The goulash was so good that I wanted more after I was done, even though I was full, and the price was cheap as dirt. 4.My partner and I split a quiche and tapas, which came out to less than $30 for both of us - very reasonable price, especially considering the quality. 5.All and all it was a great experience with friendly waiters and food wasn't too expensive and a truly European experience. src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.My server seemed to disappear for several minutes at a time and ignored me when I tried to make eye contact. 2.The service was very prompt and quick. 3.We ordered the Baklava and Gozleme which were very well prepared and the service was out standing. 4.The only thing that wasn't that great was the service. reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.The staff were real friendly as well, and on top of that the food didn't assault our bank accounts. 2.The waitress we had catered to us constantly and she was really friendly too. 3.The service was also terrible so it made me very irritated. 4.The place was crowded, but we were seated within 5 minutes, had menus in our hands a minute later, and only had to wait 15 minutes for our food; for those concerned about hygiene, the dining area was spotless. 5.I'm not familiar  with Turkish food so I didn't know what to order but our waitress was very helpful and convinced me to try the Bklava and Borek. 6.First of all, the service was great! src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 2.The location ended up being not good though, because it was far from the bar I was going to. 3.My only dislikes were the poor location within the city, as well as the poor and outdated deocr on the inside of the restaurant. 4.If you're in the mood for Italian food, I would pass on Prezzo, which although in a great section of town with breathtaking views, is quite pricey and has very average foods. [SEP] U: I want a cheap Italian restaurant in the south side of town. S: I'm sorry. I cannot find a cheap Italian restaurant in the south side of town. src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ONE SEVEN: 1.The food was of good quality, affordable for drinks price, Various gluten-free options and a nice indoor d√©cor but i didn't like the Mediocre service and  view 2.The view here is nice and you can see lots of attractions outside, but I hated that I had to wait a while for my food and the service seemed, how to put it... lacking.... What is the  train ID, travel time, and arrival time? S: Train ID is TR0992, it departs at 16:48 and arrives at 17:38. U: how long is the train ride? S: The train ride will last 50 minutes from 16:48 to 17:38. U: Great, thanks. Can you also help with finding a great restaurant to eat at. I want something in the centre of town and moderately priced if possible. S: great, i have 21 options for you! U: 21 in the moderate price in the centre? Which one do you say is best? S: It would really depend on what kind of food you like. What is your favorite cuisine? U: I'm open to anything, Ill go with what you recommend and take a booking for three people at 20:00 on friday. S: I have reserved a table for you at Restaurant One Seven, it's a real popular locale. Your reference number is JNNU896Z. U: Does the restaurant have good service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both reviewers did not think that the service was good at the restaurant unfortunately. Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure was very low here so a shower takes a very long time. 2.I was glad I was travelling alone or showers would have taken forever. [SEP] U: I'm trying to take a train from bishops stortford to cambridge S: Okay great, there are plenty of options for you. Did you have a certain day and time in mind for departure? U: I want to leave on monday after 18:30. S: There is a train that leaves at 19:29, would you like to book it? U: What is the arrival time? I also need the train ID and price. S: Your arrival time is 20:07 on train TR5806. Total price is 10.10 pounds. Would you like me to book a ticket? U: No that won't be necessary. I would like to find a place to stay though, and I'll need free parking. S: Indeed, we have many options with free parking. Would you prefer a guesthouse or a hotel? U: Well, I need a place in the south with a 4-star rating, but either hotel or guesthouse is OK. S: aylesbray lodge guest house is in the moderate price range and rosa's bed and breakfast is in the cheap price range.  Which do you prefer? U: Can you send me the hotel type and postcode and whether they have internet? S: Both have internet and are guesthouses. Aylesbray lodge's postcode is cb17sr. Rosa's postcode is cb22ha. U: The hotel has strong water pressure in the showers I take it? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The showers at the Aylesbray Lodge Guest House could take forever as the water pressure is very low. Would you like any more information?

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. src_text: reviews of TAJ TANDOORI: 1.When we walked in the door, we were taken aback by the atmosphere. 2.The food was of good portion and good atmosphere and services, but i didn't like the Mediocre foods 3.It was amazing. 4.The food was just as good as the atmosphere. 5.It really transported us to India. reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.It was in the heart of the city and had a very vibrant and charming atmosphere. 2.We enjoyed the atmosphere at the restaurant. 3.It is nice inside and comfortable. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: In Taj Tandoori, you will be transported to India just with the interior atmosphere. At the Curry Prince, the atmosphere is comfortable and vibrant. You will be charmed.

src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The restaurant is in a really nice part of town with plenty of parking available, it's incredibly picturesque so you can enjoy an after meal walk. 2.It's in a nice, convenient location near town, and the foods were good. 3.The restaurant was in a very nice location, but despite that the view was very mediocre and the atmosphere was average at best. 4.Their location is lovely, right in the heart of the city. 5.They are in a great accessible location with easy parking. 6.The inside is not very modern but the location is easy to get to. S: There is a restaurant called Thanh Binh.  Would you like me to book a table? U: Does it have a good location to the sights? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. S: I have five hotels that match your requests. U: Do they include wifi? S: Yes all of them do. May I recommend something to you? U: I am open to any hotel that matches my requests. src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.The food was really small. 2.The food was of good quality and there was good vegetarian option but i you had overpriced your food and it was of Small portion 3.The servings could be bigger for the price but we enjoyed our food well enough. 4.What did disappoint though, was the small portion sizes. 5.The food was fresh and tasteful, and served with generous portions. 6.If only it was bigger, it would be amazing. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to dine in the centre. S: There are many restaurants in the centre of town, do you have a preference of food? U: Is there anywhere that serves middle eastern food? S: Unfortunately there is not. What else may I check for you? U: Is there anywhere in the centre that serves mediterranean food? S: I've found three options, sir. May I ask what type of price range were you looking for? U: I'd like something in the expensive price range. S: There are two expensive Mediterranean restaurants in the centre of town--La Mimosa and Shiraz. U: book either for me S: I recommend la mimosa, great word of mouth. What day and time do you want to dine? How many will be going, please? U: Can we do Saturday at 15:00? S: Sure for how many people? U: Never mind. I'll book the table myself. May I have the address and postcode? And the phone number, while you're at it. S: Of course. La Mimosa is located at Thompsons Lane Fen Ditton. The post code is cb58aq. The phone number is 01223362525. Do you need any further assistance? U: Can you confirm that La Mimosa serves good portion sizes? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: A lot of guests were disappointed with the serving sizes at La Mimosa. They are apparently quite small according to most guests, but one person said the sizes were generous at least.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.The only thing I didn't love was the mediocre d√©cor inside the restaurant. 2.If there's anything negative to say, its that the interior decor is uninspiring, but it's easy to look past that when the food is this good! reviews of THE HOTPOT: 1.I thought first that the Nice indoor decor was well presented. 2.I'll be honest that their decor is nothing impressive and seems pretty outdated, but if you're interested in food over ambiance, you can't miss with The Hotpot! [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for a place to stay. I'd like it to be in the north and have zero stars. S: The city centre north b and b matches your request. Would you like to book it? I will need the dates you want to stay in order to book it please. I would be happy to book a reservation for you. U: Do either of them have nice indoor decor? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Visitors to Hakka have stated that its decor is mediocre and uninspiring, but have otherwise enjoyed the food. The Hotspot have slightly better indoor decor, but it can also be classified as a bit outdated.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. src_text: reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.It was all tied up nicely together with outdoor seating that overlooks a beautiful lake. 2.Also, the view was just okay. 3.The only downside of Backstreet bistro was the poor view from our table of an alleyway in the city. 4.They knew this, as they imported very special wines and beers to enjoy this view. 5.We wished it had a better view. reviews of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.I greatly enjoyed the gorgeous view from our window, as well as the best priced food I have seen lately. 2.Some things that I was really disappointed was the lackluster view and service that was less than spectacular. 3.The view from in the restaurant wasn't that great, as we just saw the side of another large building, but I forgot all about that as we enjoyed our large portions of delicious food. 4.At first my friend complained about the view from the table, and then that there were no gluten-free options on the menu. src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.The bathroom, which is super important to my family and me, was super clean when we checked in. 2.The bathroom was spotless, too. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The negatives is that the bathroom wasn't that clean when we first arrived and that the beds could've been more comfortable. 2.The place had everything we needed, a large big room that never felt cramp, a nice clean bathroom, and a very kid-friendly atmosphere. 3.When we went to use the facilities at this hotel, we both noticed how the bathrooms had been cleaned and they were pristine in quality. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I would recommend the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel which has a spotless bathroom that is cleaned regularly.

src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.She kept the drinks flowing, which we loved! 2.The food was ok and the beer was definitely overpriced, however the service was excellent! 3.The service was great, food was superb, and on top of that the food and drinks were so cheap! 4.Our waiter was very attentive. 5.Don't visit this place for the view, which is non-existent, but go there for the absolutely stellar service and warm, welcoming atmosphere - along with some of the best Chinese food you've ever tasted. reviews of THE HOTPOT: 1.We had to wait 15 minutes for our check. 2.Overall, the service was great and food tasted fresh and delightful. 3.We both enjoyed the service, convenient downtown location, and high-quality food. 4.The service is not the best either. 5.It took us a while to be served. 6.The only downside of the Hotpot was the slow service.
