src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.Sadly, the room was not clean. 2.I had to wait until morning to have that issue addressed. 3.The only things that my partner didn't like was the room not being cleaned when we first checked in and it being overpriced compared to the other options nearby. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive hotel. S: Okay I can help with that. What area would you like to stay in? U: I would like to stay in the North please. S: I'm sorry, we don't have an expensive hotel in the north end. Will anything else do? U: Well, the area doesn't matter, as long as it offers free parking. S: How about the Gonville Hotel in the centre area of town? U: Do customer reviews say the Gonville hotel has clean rooms for its guests? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It seems that the rooms are not always as clean as their guests would prefer. Should I keep looking for a better option?

src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.The location itself was in the heart of the town so I was able to go walk around after eating here. 2.Parking was a nightmare, I did not like coming in. 3.The location is good - it's out near a mall with a lot of parking spaces, so parking was a breeze, and it's conveniently right off the highway. 4.However, the location isn't great (not a lot of parking) and the food left a little something to be desired. 5.The location is really great. 6.With a location by the riverside, you can almost close your eyes and imagine you're taking afternoon tea in the idyllic English countryside when you're at Cotto's! [SEP] U: Hi, I'm starving and would like to find a moderately priced restaurant in the centre please S: Great, I have 21 options for you! U: That's a lot of options, can you narrow them down for me by type? S: Do you have a type of food in mind or do you want a recommendation? U: I do not have a type in mind so I would love to get your recommendation! S: cotto is my all time favourite. it serves british food. can i reserve for you? U: Is this considered a nice location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The majority of visitors that dined at the Cotto restaurant thought that the location was great, being situated by the riverside.

src_text: reviews of PEKING RESTAURANT: 1.I'm not disappointed, because when I arrived, while not the best looking place, I knew it was going to taste good. 2.Very pretty place to visit. reviews of THE GOOD LUCK CHINESE FOOD TAKEAWAY: 1.The restaurant is nice inside and the view is worthwhile. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to eat that's expensive and has Chinese food. Can you help me? S: Sure. I have a number of different restaurants available.  Do have a preference for the area? U: I prefer a restaurant in the south. S: You can choose from The Good Luck Chinese Food Takeaway or Peking Restaurant. Which would you like? U: Which one has nice indoor decor? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Good Luck Chinese Food Takeaway is said to be nice inside, whereas the Peking Restaurant is not the greatest looking.

src_text: FAQs of ZIZZI CAMBRIDGE: 1.The restaurant does serve alcohol. reviews of ZIZZI CAMBRIDGE: 1.They also have a wonderful drinks menu with a superb selection of high quality wines and specialty cocktails. 2.As I glanced through the menu options, I found that they served high quality drinks and foods. 3.Highly recommend the Arancini, Fiorentina Steak, Lasagna, Risotto, and their house Merlot is excellent. 4.Their drinks were good though and I had a Merlot. 5.Good place to stop by for if you're hungry and want a good drink. 6.They were an excellent value and were of high quality as well as the food too. [SEP] U: I need a train to Cambridge on Thursday please S: What departure location will you be using? U: leicester please and can you bookn that for me ? S: I would be happy to book that for you!  What time would you like to depart? U: I need it arrive by 13:30 and needs to depart from leicester. S: If you'd like something very early, the TR6125 departs Leicester 05:09 and arrives Cambridge 06:54. Would you like a seat on this train or shall we look for something later? U: That is good. I would like the price also please. S: The price per ticket for that route is 37.80 pounds. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Yeah, I'm looking for an Italian restaurant in the centre of town. S: There are 9 great places to choose from. Would you like to stay in a certain price range? U: Yes I need the cheap price range S: I recommend zizzi cambridge on Regent Street.  Would you like me to make reservations? U: Do they have a good Merlot? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Zizzi Cambridge has a good merlot according to a couple of reviews I found. Want to make a reservation?

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It was really good value for money (the total cost) and I enjoyed my stay. [SEP] U: My friend told me about a place called the Carolina Bed and Breakfast. Do you know anything about it? S: It's a 4 star guesthouse. What information would you like to know about it? U: Can you give me the postcode?  And, do they have internet? S: The postcode is cb13nx, and they do have internet. U: Is the Carolina Bed and Breakfast a good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to those that stayed at the Carolina Bed and Breakfast, the location was really good value for money.

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.The food was really small. 2.The food was of good quality and there was good vegetarian option but i you had overpriced your food and it was of Small portion 3.The servings could be bigger for the price but we enjoyed our food well enough. 4.What did disappoint though, was the small portion sizes. 5.The food was fresh and tasteful, and served with generous portions. 6.If only it was bigger, it would be amazing. [SEP] U: Hi, can you help me plan my Cambridge trip? I need a train from London Kings Cross to Cambridge. S: I can help you with that. One leaves friday at 05:17, is that time okay for you? U: Actually, I need to leave Tuesday after 10:30. S: I have a train that leaves Tuesday at 11:17 that will arrive at 12:08. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Yes, please make a reservation for 6 people. I'll need the reference number. S: I was able to book your train. Your reference number is F13RS8CP. Is there anything else that you need? U: I'm also looking for a place to eat. I would like an expensive south indian restaurant. S: It looks like we don't have any of those. Would you like to try something else? U: Hmm, are you sure? I want something south indian, expensive and in the centre of town. S: I have curry garden	for Indian in the centre of town, but no south indian. U: What about one that serves mediterranean? S: I have two options. I can recommend la mimosa. Would you like me to reserve a table? U: Do they offer good portions of food? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: With very few exceptions, people think the portions are too small, and don't provide value for the cost.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The shower was a sad dribble of water. 2.It was challenging to rinse the shampoo efficiently. 3.The only negative was the low water pressure. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for information on a hotel called Hobsons House. S: Hobsons House is a 3 star, moderately priced guesthouse in the west. Would you like me to book a room for you? U: Yes please make sure the place has strong water pressure in shower. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The previous guests have complained that the water pressure was an issue. They said it felt like a dribble of water, it was challenging to rinse the shampoo out completely, etc.

src_text: FAQs of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.The YIPPE NOODLE BAR serves all forms of alcohol. reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.We enjoyed that the menu offered multiple different non-alcoholic drink options, but we did not like how the drinks were poor in taste. 2.The restaurant offered high-quality food and various drink options. 3.While the service was quite slow, the drinks and foods were very high quality, and the restaurant was in a wonderful location. 4.It was a bit loud and the drinks could be bigger. 5.Oh man, their drinks were affordable and their food was really good quality. 6.The location is good and the drinks are a good price. 7.Washed it all down with a nice cold beer. 8.The beer was decent. 9.After, I hung around for drinks and they have a lot to choose from. [SEP] U: I am looking for information on the Yippee Noodle bar. S: Sure! Yippee Noodle Bar is a moderately priced Asian Oriental restaurant in the centre of town. What other other information can I get for you? U: Is the restaurant accessible to handicapped patrons? S: Yes, there is handicapped accessibility at the restaurant for patrons. What else can I find for you today? U: can i get the address and phone number? S: Sure, yippee noodle bar is located at 40428 King Street City Centre. The phone number is 01223518111. How else may  I assist you? U: On second thought, could you book me a table for 5 people at 12:30 on Sunday? S: The Yippee Noodle Bar doesn't have a table available at that time. Would you like to try another? U: do you offer baby chairs? S: Yippee Noodle Bar does offer infant chairs. Would you like to book a reservation at another time? U: Sure, please try for 11:30 Sunday.  Still 5 people.  Thanks. S: All right, your table is reserved. The reference number is GVNN1K5V. U: I was also wondering if this place serves alcohol. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Yippee Noodle Bar offers an alcohol menu with drinks that are affordable and many many choices that will satisfy your taste buds.

src_text: reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.The drinks were really affordable which was surprising, and there were lots of non alcoholic choices. 2.I found myself staring at a wall most of the time, and a lot of the drinks had alcohol in it. [SEP] U: Hi. Can you help me find a restaurant? S: Yes, there are a lot of available restaurants. May I help you narrow down your choices? U: I'm looking in particular for the Mahal of Cambridge. S: Mahal of Cambridge is located at 3-5 Millers Yard Mill Lane.   Would you like me to book a reservation for you? U: Does the restaurant offer non-alcoholic beverages? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There seems to be conflicting information, they do offer a lot of different non-alcoholic beverages according to one customer, but another complaint saying that pretty much every drink had alcohol in it.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.Once inside the room, we were impressed with how clean the bathroom was though. 2.The downside was that the room and bathroom weren't clean at first but that was promptly taken care of. [SEP] U: I need to find a hotel with free wifi to stay at. Can you help me? S: I sure can.  Are there any other requirements you'd like to include in your search? U: I would like a 1 star hotel. S: I am sorry but could not find a 1 star hotel with your needs.  If there is anything else I can help you with let me know, thaks. U: ok, try a 4 star hotel. S: There are several 4 star hotels. Do you have a particular area in mind? U: The area doesn't matter. If you could give me the name, phone number and address of a 4 store hotel; that would be fine. S: I recommend the acorn guesthouse it's located at 154 chesterton road and their number is 01223353888. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Can you make certain the guesthouse has clean restrooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One of the past guests says that the bathroom wasn't clean at first but then it was cleaned quickly. Another person was impressed by the cleanliness.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: I want to try a local restraint, can you help? S: By restraint, do you mean a restaurant? U: Yes, sorry.  I would like to try Indonesian food tonight and I would like it in Centre please. S: I don't have anything that meets those requirements. Can I try something else? U: Are there any lebanese options available? S: Yes! The Ali Baba is a moderately-priced Lebanese restaurant in the centre of town. Would you like to reserve a table? U: Yes, I would like to book a table for 6 people at 20:00 on Thursday. Please give me a reference number. I am also looking for a 4 star guesthouse. S: Your reference number is AMV1FOTC.  Would you like me to find a guesthouse in the city centre? U: The location doesn't matter, it just needs to be cheap. S: Alexander bed and breakfast is a cheap, four star guesthouse in centre.  Would you like me to book it for you? U: Does this place have strong water pressure in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Alexander doesn't offer great water pressure. One person complained that his was wife could barely take shower because water was too low.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Also, the larger size of our room made the experience within the room that much more comfortable. 2.The cons are that the rooms are tiny, I couldn't comfortably walk around in mine alone. 3.Multiple people would probably be a nightmare. [SEP] U: Could you help me find a train to norwich? S: Not a problem. Where are you departing from, and what day would you like to travel? U: I want to leave from cambridge on wednesday. S: What time of day would you like to travel? U: I don't have a preferred departure time but the train should arrive by 18:15. S: TR1871 arrives by 16:55 and TR6838 arrives by 17:55. They are both the same price. Would you like to book one of these? U: Book the TR6838 please. I'm also looking for a place to stay if you don't mind. S: I have several different hotels. Are you wanting a certain area of town or any special accommodations? U: I would prefer it to be a 4 star hotel, with free parking. S: We have several hotels that meet your requirements. Would you prefer a hotel that is cheap or moderate in price? U: Oh, I really don't worry about the price, so long as it has four stars and free parking. S: Alright, might I suggest the Alexander Bed and Breakfast then? U: Could you make sure the rooms are the large? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms here are a bit cramped and tiny if you need many people to stay here. One guest experienced a large room that made it comfortable.

src_text: reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.Another plus were the portions. 2.Boy there was a lot of food! [SEP] U: I am looking for a particular restaurant S: I can look it up by name if you are looking for a certain one, what is the name of the restaurant you are needing information on? U: Please look up yippee noodle bar. S: Yippee Noodle Bar is an asian oriental place in centre with a moderate price range. It's location is 40428 King Street City and phone 01223518111. U: How are their portion sizes? I want to eat a lot. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The portion sizes at Yippee Noodle Bar are very generous. Can I answer anything else for you about the restaurant?

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.We were a little disappointed in the price of the drinks, but I guess considering how reasonable the food prices are, they had to raise costs somewhere. 2.The only issue was that the drinks were just mediocre, they were small for the price. FAQs of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.Alimentum serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I am looking for a gastropub in the south. S: I'm sorry I couldn't find any Gastropubs in the South. Is there another type or area which you would like to try? U: Are there any Gastropubs in town? S: As a matter of fact, it appears all of the gastropubs in Cambridge have closed. Is there anything else that interests you? U: How about a modern European cuisine in the south area? S: There is a restaurant called restaurant alimentum that meets your criteria. U: Does Restaurant Alimentum serve beer that's worth the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, people say that the drinks are a bit mediocre and small for the price. Would you like to look at another restaurant?

src_text: reviews of WAGAMAMA: 1.Of course, all that good stuff comes at a significant price point, but that's probably the only bad thing about it. 2.I got a beer for a drink, which proved to be quite affordable. 3.The foods were all spectacular and tantalizing, and the beer was fresh, crisp, and quite affordable. FAQs of WAGAMAMA: 1.Yes, Wagamama serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I am in the center are of Cambridge, are there any Japanese restaurants in that part of town? S: Yes. There is one Japanese restaurant in the centre. It is called Wagamama and is in the expensive price range. Would you like me to place a reservation? U: Is the beer good and plentiful compared to the cost? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most of the reviewers of the restaurant said that the beer was a good price. One person did say that everything was too expensive

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.When I went to go take a shower, I found that the very limited water pressure made it very difficult to get clean. reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.However, I was frustrated about the low water pressure which made my shower not enjoyable. [SEP] U: I need to book a hotel in the east that has 4 stars. S: I can help you with that. What is your price range? U: That doesn't matter as long as it has free wifi and parking. S: If you'd like something cheap, I recommend the Allenbell. For something moderately priced, I would recommend the Warkworth House. U: Is the water-pressure strong at this hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: A previous Allenbell guest found the low water pressure frustrating and a previous Warkworth House guest found the limited water pressure to make showering difficult. Do you have any other questions?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: Hello I'm looking for a cheap hotel that includes wifi. S: I actually have just one located in the west that is cheap. It is the Cambridge Belfry. They are 4-star rated and offer free parking and wifi. Can I book you? U: Does the Cambridge Belfry have high water pressure? I must have a strong shower every morning, please? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, if you require a shower with high water pressure, the Cambridge Belfry will disappoint with its low offering.

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.Taking a shower was also a problem and it was very difficult to get myself clean as a result of limited water pressure. [SEP] U: i'm looking for places to go in town S: sure. What do you like to do ? U: A park in the north part of town S: Milton country park is located at milton country park, milton. Do you need anything else? U: I'm looking to stay at a guesthouse in the centre. S: El shaddai is located in the center and is a cheap one. Would you like me to book room(s) for you? U: How strong is the water pressure there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The hotel seems to have a bit of a problem with low water pressure. If that's important to you, perhaps a different hotel would be better.

src_text:
reviews of HAKKA: 1.I didn't order any drinks, but they seemed reasonably priced based on the menu I saw. 2.The food was ok and the beer was definitely overpriced, however the service was excellent! 3.The service was great, food was superb, and on top of that the food and drinks were so cheap! 4.I could overlook it if only the drinks were expensive, or if a few of the food options were spendy, but every time I have a meal here, I leave feeling like I paid too much for my meal, which puts a damper on my mood. 5.The drink options are plentiful and affordable as well. FAQs of HAKKA: 1.You can order alcohol at this restaurant. [SEP] U: I have a trip on wednesday and I need a train that departs from birmingham new street. S: there are many that day. can you specify your  destination? U: The train should depart from birmingham new street and should leave on wednesday.
The train should leave after 10:15 and should go to cambridge S: TR7940 leaves at 10:40.  Would you like me to book some seats for you? U: Yes, please book two seats for me at 10:40. What time will it arrive in Cambridge? S: You will arrive by 13:23.  I have 2 seats booked for you, and the reference number is RBQLUN8O.  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: I need the price for the train that leaves at 10:40 for one and the arrival time. S: The price is 75.10 per ticket and arrives at 13:23 U: Thanks so much.  Could I bother you to help me find an expensive Chinese restaurant? S: We have several. What part of town would you like it in? U: No preference. But please make sure I get the address. S: i recommend a place called Hakka. they are located on milton road chesterton. U: Do they have a good selection of affordable drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: At Hakka, there is alcohol available for purchase. They have plentiful drink options that are affordable.

src_text: reviews of PEKING RESTAURANT: 1.The food came out hot and tasted amazing as well. 2.I was only vaguely familiar with the dish hot pot but Peking Restaurant delivered a truly amazing first time experience with this dish. 3.Scrumptious and cooked to perfect, it is a must to try when coming here. 4.This is one of the best Chinese food places I have been to and I will definitely be back. 5.All the food tasted great. 6.Yep, it was delicious, yummy and very cheap for what you get. 7.The other dish I tried was dumplings which paired great with my main dish, the hot pot. 8.All of the food tasted great. 9.The food was great and tasted fresh. 10.They threw in a bunch of meats, veggies in a hot broth and I just loved that they made the soup fright in front of me! 11.The food  portion was good nd you had a nice location, but the gluten-free option and Mediocre foods where very bad 12.It offered good quality of food and the portions were good. 13.very yummy, a tad expensive but overall it was 10/10. 14.The food and drinks were excellent and were huge portios. 15.I would definitely recommend this place to satisfy your Chinese craving and high quality foods to boot. 16.It was a good, delicious combination. 17.Fresh and flavorful. [SEP] U: I'm going to be in the area soon to try some restaurants, but I'm having trouble finding information on one in particular. S: I have a vast array of restaurants.  What type of food would you like, how much do you want to spend and what area would you like? U: iM LOOKING FOR THE peking restaurant WHAT TYPE OF FOOD DOES IT SERVE AND I ALSO NEED THE ADDRESS S: It is an expensive Chinese restaurant located at 10 Homerton Street City Centre. Is there anything else you need? U: Can you please check if they serve freshly sourced Spring Rolls? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, spring rolls were not explicitly mentioned so I'm not sure customers' opinions on them. People were satisfied with the food quality.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train that leaves on monday after 16:15.  Any suggestions? S: Where are you departing from and what is your destination? U: I'm leaving Cambridge and headed to Ely. S: There is a train to Ely that leaves at 17:50 on Monday. Would you like me to book it? U: No, I just need the train ID and arrival time. S: Sure the train id is TR4294 and the arrival time is 18:07. U: I am also looking for a guesthouse with a rating of 4 stars. S: I have several guesthouses with 4 star ratings. Is there a particular area you'd like to be in? U: It does not matter but I  would like free parking. S: What price range would you like? U: Price range is not important, just the four stars. S: What area of town would you like? U: As long as it has free parking, that's all I really need. Can you recommend one and tell me a little about it? S: I have 5 guesthouses with free parking. I recommend the Acorn Guest House in 154 Chesterton Road, postcode cb41da. U: Is there strong water pressure in the showers there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, unfortunately water pressure isn't one of the highlights of staying at the Acorn Guest House as theirs is pretty weak.

src_text: FAQs of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.Outdoor seating is available. reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.It was a beautiful spot to be eating outdoors. 2.We were out on the patio but being as the building is downtown, the view just isn't very good. [SEP] U: I am looking for a train departing from Cambridge that would arrive by 19:45. S: There are 1,029 trains that meet your needs. Would you like to narrow it down by destination, day, and/or the time it leaves? U: Yes, I need a train that goes to Ely and leaves on Sunday. S: Train TR5389 leaves Cambridge at 17:50 and arrives in sly at 18:07. Can I book this for you? U: That works, can you book 2 seats for me please? S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 7.04 GBP payable at the station. Reference number is : 9YZO84HU. Can I help you with anything else? U: I am also looking for a very expensive restaurant located in the Centre. Do you have any suggestions? S: There are 33 expensive restaurants in the centre. Is there a particular kind of cuisine you're looking for? U: Yes, I'd prefer British food. S: There are 3 results for expensive british food in the centre area. The first is fitzbillies restaurant, would you like more information on it? U: Yes, please. Can you check if this restaurant has a nice outdoor dining area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are some mixed reviews on the dining area outdoors. Some customers loved the view while others were not so impressed with the view of downtown. Would you like to know more about them?

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.I would expect to pay a lot more considering where the hotel is located. 2.The hotel is a great value for money. 3.Given the location of the hotel, the value of money was good, too. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay and it should include free wifi and free parking. S: We have quite a few lodgings which offer both. Do you have a preference as to what type of lodging, a guesthouse or hotel? U: I'm looking for a 0 star guesthouse. S: I have two options. City Centre North B&B is in the north, and El Shaddai is in the Centre. Do you have a preferencE? U: Will you tell me if El Shaddai is a good value? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The hotel is a great place that offers good value for the money. It is in a great location for being so reasonably priced.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap hotel on the east side of the city. Can you recommend anything? S: The Allenbell is a good choice for you. Would you like more information on the Allenbell? U: Yes, does it have free parking? S: Yes, it does! Would you like to book a room? U: Not yet, can you first confirm whether the rooms at the Allenbell are thoroughly cleaned? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, one guest who claims to be picky about cleanliness found the room to be spotless and another guest was impressed by the clean and fresh smelling room during their stay. Would you like to book that room now?

src_text: reviews of SHANGHAI FAMILY RESTAURANT: 1.You get plenty to eat for the money that's for sure! 2.I did like the affordable Price for the drinks and the foods. 3.This is always a good place if you are looking for an affordable meal at a very good price. 4.The price for the food was amazing considering how good it was, and it was close to my home which was a plus. 5.It was kind of expensive though so I'm not sure if I would return. 6.It was all good and at a great price. reviews of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.It was pretty overpriced but the food was high-quality. 2.In the end, it was definitely worth the price and I recommend it. 3.Overall the food was very inexpensive, and it was all delicious, hot, and fresh. 4.Not only that but the food as well as the drinks was priced well within our budget. 5.The only kind thing that I can say about Jinling Noodle Bar is that their prices are amazingly affordable, but I have a theory: their prices are so low because everything else about the place is totally mediocre! reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.Their food always tastes so authentic and wonderfully-prepared, and the best part is how amazingly affordable their entire menu is. 2.I forgot to mention that the price is affordable - except some drinks were a little overpriced though. 3.We will be back soon as a family-- and did I mention it's affordable? 4.I ordered the dumplings, which were very well prices. 5.On top of the high quality and excellent value of their food, the atmosphere at Lan Hong House is just wonderful - lively yet welcoming, and never too loud to have an intimate conversation with your dining partners. 6.Overall a nice place with a manageable budget. [SEP] U: Could you recommend a Chinese restaurant for me to try? S: Sure I have them in all price ranges all over the city. Do you have an area you prefer? U: The centre of the city, with a moderate price range, please. S: Okay, I was able to find 3 restaurants for your preference. I have jinling noodle bar, Ian hong house, and shanghai family restaurant... is there any preference on one of these? U: Do any of the reviews mention the value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: For the most part the Jinling Noodle Bar is affordable as are both the Lan Hong House and the Shanghai Family Restaurant.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: I'm in need of a train coming from cambridge that should leave on monday. S: Where would you like to go to? U: We are traveling to broxbourne. Oh, and we should leave after 21:45 too. S: I have two trains available that meet all of your requirements, would you like me to book a ticket for you? U: Yes please. I need 5 tickets. S: You're booked on TR9611, leaving at 22:01. The total fee is 89.5 GBP payable at the station. Reference number is : 18PWJ7X3. U: Thanks so much. Can you also look up a hotel for me? S: What area and price range would you like the hotel in? U: I need you to look up warkworth house for me. S: Alright, I've looked up warkworth house. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Is this place really, really quiet, so I can concentrate and not be interrupted by a lot of noise? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People seem to vary in their opinions of the noise level at Warkworth House. Some people find it quiet, but others feel it can be noisy, especially for rooms near the main road.

src_text: reviews of THE GARDENIA: 1.The beer were not that great though but there's lots to choose from. 2.The waiter kept my beer fresh and was perfect from the tap. 3.Their drinks are likewise of premium quality. 4.So they win when it comes to drinks. 5.They have lots of choices to choose when it comes to drinks and the drinks were very good, and cheap too. FAQs of THE GARDENIA: 1.The Gardenia serves alcohol. [SEP] U: Do you have any great places to visit in the centre? S: Indeed we do! 44 of them, in fact. We have nightclubs and concerthalls as well as museums and theatres. What strikes your fancy? U: Not really, what do you suggest, and can you provide address and phone number? S: Primavera is a museum in the centre located at 10 king s parade. The phone number is 01223357708. U: Great I'm also looking for a tuscan restaurant in the centre of town too S: i dont have anything available. for that. Do you have another choice U: Ok, what about mediterranean food? S: Do you have a price range?  There are both cheap and expensive options. U: Price range doesn't matter. S: I would suggest la gardenia. U: Does it have high-quality beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They get some high ratings for their alcoholic beverages although the beer comments are mixed. One person said the options were plenty but the beer was mediocre. Another said they like the beer that was fresh from the tap. Is there anything else you like to know about them?

src_text: reviews of THE GANDHI: 1.Between us we ordered Chaat, Naan, Samosas, and Windaloo, all of which were in large portion sizes and were very tasty. 2.They have good Indian dishes that are fresh and authentic. 3.The foods were of high quality. 4.The food itself was very good. 5.Both were excellent! 6.We had chicken tikka masala and butter chicken and they were very good. 7.Food was just mediocre though. 8.The dishes were good and well made. 9.But if you just want good food, you might want to give it a try. 10.Between us we ordered Chicken Tikka Masala and Tandoori Chicken, both of which were superb. 11.High quality ingredients, and great prices. 12.They didn't have much in the way of drinks, or should I say, the drinks weren't that good compared to the food and it seemed the atmosphere was a bit dull. 13.It was really good, and not only that, but it was also affordable. 14.The drinks and food were both great. 15.The korma was very delicious and tasted very authentic, like other Indian restaurants. reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.I will say the food and drinks made up for the lackluster service we've received. 2.Going on a Friday night, I appreciated the various drink options and the quality of the food. 3.My boyfriend had the tandoori chicken and it was piping hot and so good. 4.They offer great non-alcoholic drink options with authentic and tasty food. 5.The food prices were affordable and the quality of the food was good. 6.The food was incredibly good, some of the best Indian cuisine I've ever had! 7.Everything was high quality and the drinks were perfect as well. 8.I ordered some drinks and Korma, which was deliciouis, the Samosas were fresh and cooked to perfection, I also loved the Dosa and Naan. 9.The food and drinks quality were great so no complaints there. 10.The quality of food was excellent. 11.I got samosas which turned out pretty good. 12.I got the korma, tandoori chicken, biryani and samosas, and they were all superb. 13.They blended together to form the perfect meal for me and I will definitely be going back. 14.The food was amazing! reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.The food itself was exceptional, the plate sizes were quite large so I certainly recommend bringing your appetite! 2.I was eating like a King! 3.Thankfully, the affordable price of the food more than made up for that, and the food was really high quality and tasty as well. 4.We greatly enjoyed the delicious vegetarian options because they were so high quality and the drinks were nice and affordable. 5.The food was very high quality and gluten-free! 6.To call this Indian food would cause shame to the Indian culture. 7.The food definitely complimented it as it was super fresh and the cooks were very generous with their portions. 8.We split the Chicken Tikka Masala and Vindaloo of a recommendation from a friend, and they did not disappoint. 9.The amount of spices were quite lacking and it just felt like a pretty basic rice dish. 10.Everything was fresh and good. 11.The food itself was nothing to write home about, to be honest, not terrible, but not good either. 12.They tasted incredible! 13.The food was just as sad as their atmosphere. 14.But as we started eating, the food didn't taste that great. 15.Don't go here for the decor, which is pretty mediocre and uninspiring, but definitely check out Mahal of Cambridge for their excellent, affordable food options! [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for a train to Birmingham New Street that will leave on Wednesday. S: I have trains departing cambridge to birmingham new street Wednesday every hour starting at 5:01, is there a particular time you would like to depart at? U: Departing time, no, but I'd like to arrive at birmingham new street by 16:45 S: I can get you there at 16:44, if you like. TR8860 will depart cambridge at 14:01. Would you like to book tickets on that train? U: No. I require the travel time, price, and train ID. S: That's Train TR8860. Travel time is 163 minutes. The ticket costs 75.10 pounds. Can I help with anything else? U: I'm looking for a place to dine, preferably an Indian restaurant. S: I found 22 restaurants, do you have a preference of area or price range? U: I'd like something cheap and in the centre, please. S: I have three locations fitting those criteria. The Kohinoor, The Gandhi, and Mahal of Cambridge. Should I book you at any of these locations? U: Which place has high-quality food in general? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes let me check. All three of them have very delicious food that is fresh and exceptionally tasty for your choices.

src_text: FAQs of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.The YIPPE NOODLE BAR serves all forms of alcohol. reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.We enjoyed that the menu offered multiple different non-alcoholic drink options, but we did not like how the drinks were poor in taste. 2.The restaurant offered high-quality food and various drink options. 3.While the service was quite slow, the drinks and foods were very high quality, and the restaurant was in a wonderful location. 4.It was a bit loud and the drinks could be bigger. 5.Oh man, their drinks were affordable and their food was really good quality. 6.The location is good and the drinks are a good price. 7.Washed it all down with a nice cold beer. 8.The beer was decent. 9.After, I hung around for drinks and they have a lot to choose from. [SEP] U: Hello, can you show me any moderately-priced restaurants in the Centre of town, please? S: Yes, there are over 20 of various types, do you have any type of food that you are craving? U: I am looking for Thai food. S: I'm sorry, there isn't a Thai restaurant there.  Any other ideas? U: What about asian oriental? S: Yippee Noodle Bar meets your criteria. Would you like to book a table? U: Do they serve alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to guests that have previously dined at the Yippee Noodle Bar, the restaurant does serve alcohol.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, we found that the room had a beautiful view to the sunset horizon outside. 2.The Carolina has good views. 3.It was nice to wake up in the morning and see the sun rising. 4.Parking was free and the view from the room was nice. 5.The view was really beautiful, too. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for a train arriving in Cambridge by 21:15. S: Can you tell me where you will be departing from and what day you would like to travel? U: Sure, I'll be leaving from Norwich.  Oh, and I'd like to travel on Friday please. S: I would recommend TR9589 which leaves Norwich at 19:16 and arrives in Cambridge at 20:35. U: Okay great. Can you help me make a booking for 6 people please? S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 105.6 GBP payable at the station. Reference number is : 2CUTCPH6. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: I need a play to stay in the east in the moderate price range S: I will look that up for you,do you want a hotel ? U: Yes, with a star of 4 please. S: I do not have any 4 star hotels in the east.  Would you like to try another area or maybe go with a price range in the East? U: Oh my. Are there any moderate-price guesthouses in the east with 4 stars? S: Yes, I found three. I would recommend Carolina Bed and Breakfast it is moderately priced and located in the East. Would you like a reservation? U: Wait, can I get a good view from the room at Carolina Bed and Breakfast? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, guests that have previously stayed at the Carolina Bed and Breakfast all agree that the views are beautiful, especially of the sunset.

src_text: FAQs of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Breakfast is available to buy at the property for 6 GBP per person 2.Breakfast is continental and full English/Irish. reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Also, I found that the provided morning food options were abundant and delicious. 2.The location is convenient and the breakfast was good which was given as I arrived at morning. 3.In the morning, the breakfast also had pretty good options. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train that leaves on friday departing from bishops stortford? S: Absolutely! What time do you need to arrive by? U: I need to leave after 09:15, please. S: You have a few options available if you're traveling from bishops stortford to cambridge. There is a train leaving at 09:29, Does that work for you? U: Great. Let's book it for 6 people. Give me the reference number. S: Your train has been booked for 6 people. The train ID is TR2083. Your reference number is WCVY3PV1. U: Thanks. I'm also looking for information on moderately priced hotels with free wifi. S: You have 17 options that meet that criteria. Would you like a recommendation or do you want to narrow your options down? U: The place must have a 3 star rating and include parking. S: Do you have a preferred area of town? U: No I do not. S: I'm sorry.  Nothing is coming up for your specifications.  I need you to narrow down your info. U: Well lets try again and book me in what you choose for 2 nights from Friday for 6 people. S: How about bridge guest house? They are moderately priced with free wifi and parking and 3 stars. U: Is there a good variety of breakfast options here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Bridge Guest House does offer a good variety of English/Irish breakfast options for an affordable price of 6 GBP per person during your stay.

src_text: reviews of LIMEHOUSE: 1.The view was breathtaking, too. 2.I had to be up early for meetings every morning, so starting the day with my coffee and a great view was really nice. [SEP] U: Hi. I'm looking for information on a hotel called the Limehouse. S: Limehouse is a guesthouse in the north part of town, it's rated 4 stars and in the moderate price range. It has free parking and internet. Would you like to book? U: Will I like the view out of my window? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Limehouse has a great view that is really nice and breathtaking. Would you like me to book it for you?

src_text: reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.The service was a bit slow and I wish they had more options for drinks. 2.Our server was great, really friendly and helpful. 3.The highlight was the service was really good because the staff were super friendly and were there to take care of my needs and the location was in a good area of town. 4.The service was great as we were helped as soon as we walked in and seated immediately. 5.The staff are super friendly, especially our server Laura. 6.The food came in pretty quickly as well after ordering. 7.The wait staff could certainly be more friendly but the location is great as is the view from the patio. 8.The staff are all kind and courteous. reviews of HAKKA: 1.She kept the drinks flowing, which we loved! 2.The food was ok and the beer was definitely overpriced, however the service was excellent! 3.Our waiter was very attentive. 4.Don't visit this place for the view, which is non-existent, but go there for the absolutely stellar service and warm, welcoming atmosphere - along with some of the best Chinese food you've ever tasted. 5.The service was great, food was superb, and on top of that the food and drinks were so cheap! reviews of THE HOTPOT: 1.We both enjoyed the service, convenient downtown location, and high-quality food. 2.We had to wait 15 minutes for our check. 3.It took us a while to be served. 4.Overall, the service was great and food tasted fresh and delightful. 5.The service is not the best either. 6.The only downside of the Hotpot was the slow service. [SEP] U: So I'm planning a trip and I need some information about where to stay in the North. I prefer hotels with free parking S: sure, i have 11 options for you U: north 2 star  and should include free wifi S: Can I recommend the Lovell Lodge and make you a reservation? U: Yes please. I need the reservation to be for 5 people and 4 nights starting on Friday. S: Booking was successful. Reference number is : 8FI2LR0P. U: Thank you. I would also like to find a Chinese restaurant in the same area. Can you let me know what is available? S: You have your choice of Hakka or The Hotpot, in luxury options, or the moderately priced Golden Wok. U: Which one has the most expert waiters? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The waiters and service at Hakka are great, that at Golden Wok are varied between courteous and slow, and those at the Hotpot are regarded as slow and mediocre.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: Hello. I'm looking for a moderately priced four star hotel in Cambridge. Can you make some recommendations? S: There are 11 4-star hotels within your price range. Do you need internet and/or parking? U: I need internet but not interested in parking S: The acorn guest house may be a great option. U: If there are no hotels, a guesthouse would be fine, I suppose. S: Could you like me to book that for you? U: Does it have poor water pressure in the showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, the water pressure there has been described as pretty low and nothing to write home about.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay.  Preferably a guesthouse with free parking included. S: We have 21 entries that match your search. Do you have any other preferences? U: I would like the hotel to be expensive. S: We don't have any expensive guesthouses. Would you like to try a hotel or a guesthouse in a different price range? U: How about a cheap one? S: The alexander bed and breakfast is available and in the cheap price range. U: OK, book that for 4 people. We'll arrive monday and stay 4 nights. And can I have the reference number? S: Great! I was able to book that for 4 people and your reference number is F6FSFJ75. Anything else I can help you with? U: Is the venue convenient? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some people say it is in a good location and is close to many other things, but others say it is not within walking range of any points of interest and the location is mediocre.

src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.I was alone so I did not need much but it was very clean and had a nice view I enjoyed. [SEP] U: I would like to book a hotel in Cambridge. Is there any availability at the Autumn House? S: When would you like to visit autumn house? U: Do they do a good job at cleaning the rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Autumn House has very clean rooms. Would you like me to go ahead and book a room for you or do you have any other questions?

src_text: reviews of ARCHWAY HOUSE: 1.The room had a nice view, you would love. 2.The room itself was clean and pleasant with a fantastic view of downtown. 3.The view from the hotel was gorgeous and I was able to enjoy it at my leisure. 4.We had a nice view that was relaxing. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for a 4 star hotel or guesthouse that includes free wifi. Can you help me? S: Sure thing, looks like we have several options here. Do you want to stay in a certain part of town, or do you have a price range you're looking for? U: I might, but first do they have free parking? [SEP] U: I need to find a train going to Broxbourne leaving from Cambridge. Can you help? S: I sure can!  The TR6549 leaves at 05:01.  Need a ticket? U: I need to leave on Sunday and arrive by 18:45. S: I can book you TR4481 that leaves at 17:01 and arrives at 18:01. Do you want me to book it? U: Yes please book it for me. S: I can do that.  First, let me confirm how many tickets will be needed? U: I will only need one ticket. S: Great your booking was successful and your reference number is 875DQ3RF. U: Thanks. I am also looking for a hotel called the Warkworth house. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some of the former guests have been delighted with the quietness of their rooms while other complained of too much noise inside and from outside of their rooms. Would you like me to find a more quiet place?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.I will say though, the bed wasn't really comfortable at all. 2.It made my back hurt like crazy when I woke up. 3.However, I felt that my bed was of extremely poor quality and was not comfortable. 4.The staff welcomed us with big smiles, and we slept like babies in the comfy beds. [SEP] U: Saturday train from Norwich please. S: The train from Norwich to Cambridge is about 45 minutes.  Do you have a preferred departure or arrival time? U: Yes please. I would like to arrive by 14:00. S: The best response I have to that is a train arriving at 13:35. Would you like me to book that option for you? U: Yes, for 7 people please. S: You have been successfully booked for 7 people on Train TR2334, Reference number 01MDBEIB. It departs Norwich at 12:16. Your total cost is 98.56 and is payable at the station. U: I am also looking for a place to stay. I'd like a hotel with a star of 4 of course that will include free parking. S: I will book it for you,is there anything else I can do for you ? U: Before you book, the hotel has to be in the north, also. Do you have a hotel meeting my needs? S: The Cambridge Belfry is perfect for you. Would you like me to book it? U: Yes, please book that for the same group of people for 4 nights the same day. Wednesday would work also, and I need the reference number. S: Unfortunately, I can't book either days for you. U: Is there any other hotels that would work in that area that are 4 star? S: I don't have any hotels in that area that are 4 star. I do have several guesthouses. Would that work for you? U: No, I would really like a 4-star hotel in the north area with free parking. Can you please check again? S: Sorry, there are only guesthouses. U: I guess we will take a guesthouse then.  Which one would you recommend? S: I recommend the acorn guest out. Shall I book that then. U: Are their mattresses comfortable enough to spend all day relaxing? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: While there are comments about the beds being comfortable, most of the past guests felt that the beds were of poor quality and not comfortable.

src_text: reviews of COTE: 1.That said, they didn't have much on the menu where non-alcoholic beverages are concerned, so the kiddos ended up with plain water. 2.All of my friends enjoyed their meals, in fact, and we were also glad that the non-alcoholic drinks menu was substantial, since only a few people in the group wanted to drink. src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. src_text: reviews of LOCH FYNE: 1.Everyone was very happy with the quality of the food overall and everything tasted delicious! 2.But I know what you're thinking: this place must be expensive, right? 3.In addition to amazingly fresh seafood that's top quality all-around, their menu is genuinely affordable, especially their various specialty cocktails. 4.When the food arrived I was impressed with the size of the portions, the plates were quite full. 5.You haven't lived until you've tried their grilled lobster, smoked salmon, jellied eels (sounds weird, but they're sublime), and their potted shrimps. 6.WRONG! [SEP] U: I am looking for an expensive restaurant in the centre at Cambridge. S: There are 33 restaurants that fit your requirements, is there a type of cuisine you are interested in? U: The restaurant should serve seafood. S: Loch Fyne is an expensive seafood restaurant in the centre.  Should I book it? U: I want a place with smoked salmon, do they sell it? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, smoked salmon is one of the many fish and other seafood options available at Loch Fyne. Should I book a table for you?

src_text: reviews of ERAINA: 1.There was a seemingly endless number of non-alcoholic drink options and the food was of a very high quality. 2.I will admit that the service was not the best, and there were only a new non-alcoholic beverage options. 3.I do not drink alcohol, so this was kind of a bummer, but I still enjoyed myself. reviews of MICHAELHOUSE CAFE: 1.To start, they have a great selection of non-alcoholic drinks, which was good for the kids. 2.While I loved the non-alcoholic drink choices on the menu, I thought the portion sizes of the foods were far too small. 3.The only thing is there were not a lot of non alcoholic drinks to choose from and I like to switch up my drinks from time to time. src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I hate to say anything negative but if I had to nitpick something it was that the bathroom wasn't as clean as I would have liked and the water pressure was low. [SEP] U: I would like to book a train out of Cambridge, please. S: I'd by happy to help. Where would you like to arrive? U: I want to go to london liverpool street. S: On what day and time will you be traveling? U: Tuesday leaving sometime after 18:45. S: Ok, TR 3515 leaves on Tuesday at 19:59. Would you like to book it? U: Yes, that sounds great. S: How many seats will you need for this trip? U: Actually, I can book it separately. But I will need help booking a hotel -- the Lovell Lodge S: I can help with that! How many people will be staying, for how long, and which day would you like to arrive? U: Do you know if their showers have high pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, I have read a review of the Lodge that mentioned that the water pressure is low. Do you have any other questions for me?

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.Taking a shower was also a problem and it was very difficult to get myself clean as a result of limited water pressure. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel called the El Shaddai in Cambridge. S: Yes, the El Shaddai is a guesthouse in the area of Centre, it has free internet and parking and is on the cheap side. When would you like to book for? U: What is the rating of this hotel? S: It has 0 stars. U: Does it at least have good water pressure in the shower? I had some bad experiences with cheap hotels. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, when staying at the El Shaddai, one shouldn't expect to be overwhelmed with the water pressure, as it's limited at this location.

src_text: reviews of COCUM: 1.My wife goes crazy for the Samosas but the beer does it for me. 2.The drinks are great and good quality though. 3.Both the food and drinks tasted great, and you could tell the quality and attention to detail was high. 4.In addition to the food, we all ordered beer, which was excellent as well. FAQs of COCUM: 1.Cocum serves alcohol drinks. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm trying to find out more about a restaurant called cocum. What can you tell me? S: It is an Indian restaurnat in the west part of town. It is expensive. U: Does their menu include premium beers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those with previous experience eating at the Cocum restaurant mention that their menu includes great premium beers.

src_text: reviews of LA RAZA: 1.If you're looking for a cool, hip Spanish restaurant to visit for tapas and drinks, I wouldn't recommend La Raza because their drinks were frankly not well-prepared and tasted pretty mediocre. 2.La Raza has good food and drinks. 3.Though I'm more of a beer drinker and stuck with one of their top quality, full bodied Spanish craft beers, my boyfriend tried a glass of one of their expensive, top quality Sangrias and loved it. 4.I also ordered a beer, which seemed to be of great quality along with their other drink choices. 5.I liked the sangria and the portion was large for my tortilla espanola. FAQs of LA RAZA: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at La Raza. [SEP] U: Do you have information on La Raza? S: La raza is a spanish restaurant in the centre area. It is considered cheap U: Do they have a high-quality Sangria selection? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to those who have previously dined at the La Raza restaurant, while they enjoyed the Sangria, the other drinks were a bit mediocre.

src_text: reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.It was very clean, as well. 2.But while the size of the room was quite good, it was definitely not freshly cleaned when we checked in, and because there was no concierge service, we couldn't find a more suitable hotel to book an alternate stay at. 3.During my recent stay at LEVERTON HOUSE with your family, I was very happy with the clean room especially the bathroom. [SEP] U: I am looking for place to stay in Cambridge. I would like a 4 star hotel that includes free parking, please. S: I have many available. Did you have a specific area in mind? U: I have no preference in area but I would like something in the cheap price range. S: How about the Leverton House in the east? U: What is the rating of Leverton House cleanliness for their rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most guests to the Leverton House will be satisfied with the cleanliness of the rooms, but at times, there are circumstances in which rooms haven't been properly freshened before new visitors arrive.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: I'm needing a place to eat on the eastside. S: Ok, there are nine places in that area. Do you have a type in mind? U: Yes italian food please. S: I recommend the Pizza Hut Fen Ditton.  Its on Cambridge Retail Park, Newmarket Road. Would you like a reservation? U: Yes, please. I'll be there on tuesday with a party of 4. Is there space at 15:00? S: Reference number is : 6V0LTWHG. Anything else? U: Yes,  is the Allenbell hotel still in Cambridge? S: Yes the Allenbell is in east Cambridge. Would you like me to book a room? U: Are the rooms spotless? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviews on the Allenbell's cleanliness indicate its one of the hotel's strong suits.  The rooms were spotless and had a fresh scent.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: Hello, I am planning my trip to Cambridge and need some help finding places to go in town when I get there. S: Sure, we have much to offer. Did you have anything specific in town? U: I'm looking for a theatre. S: There are 4 in the city centre and one in the south - do you prefer one area over the other? U: Can you give me the address to the one in the south please? S: It is called The Junction. It is located on Clifton Way. Their postcode is cb17gx. Their phone number is 01223511511. Anything else I can help you with today? U: Yes, do you have information on the cambridge belfry? S: The Cambridge Belfry is a 4 star hotel in the cheap price range with internet and parking. U: does the place have strong water pressure in shower S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One aspect of staying a the Cambridge Belfry in which guests can agree is the water pressure is extremely poor.

src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.To drink you can't go wrong with the lager. 2.The drinks were okay but they were overpriced. 3.The only disappointing thing was the drinks as they didn't seem fresh. FAQs of COTTO: 1.Cotto serves wine and beer. [SEP] U: I need suggestions for a moderately priced restaurant in the center part of town. Can you help me? S: There are 21 matches. What type of food do you want? U: We're willing to experiment.  I have 7 people.  Anything you recommend? S: There is a British restaurant named cotto that you may want to try. U: Is Cotto known for the quality of their drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Cotto gets some mediocre reviews on their drinks. Customers say the drinks are not fresh or just okay while being overpriced. Would you like me to find a place with better ratings in that area?

src_text: reviews of RIVERSIDE BRASSERIE: 1.Riverside Brasserie serves good portions in a nice location with a good view. 2.However, the portions of the food were small. 3.Portion sizes were small and food wasn't that great. 4.Their portion sizes are really generous - great for sharing with friends and family - and their prices are incredibly affordable, which will definitely make this place ore popular and more of a challenge to get into before long. 5.I like their drink menu but my drink was just alight, I tried the tapas and the portions were large. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a modern european restaurant that had a moderate price range. S: The riverside brasserie matches what you're looking for. Will this work? U: Do the reviews mention anything about the portion sizes? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Riverside Brassiere has mixed reviews about their portion sizes. Half said they were huge and generous, the other half complained about them being small.

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.Taking a shower was also a problem and it was very difficult to get myself clean as a result of limited water pressure. reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. Do you prefer any particular part of town, or are you looking for a certain price range? U: I would like a hotel in the centre and it should be in the cheap price range. S: One id alexander bed and breakfast and the other is el shaddai. U: What star ratings are they? S: Alexander bed and breakfast is 4 stars and el shaddai is 0 stars. U: Does the shower have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure at both is not great. Would you like to search for something else with better shower options?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.On the other hand the room wasn't very clean and I felt uncomfortable sitting in the chairs or using the bathroom for fear of germs. reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.The bathroom, which is super important to my family and me, was super clean when we checked in. 2.The bathroom was spotless, too. [SEP] U: Can you tell me a good museum in town? S: Sure, what part of town did you want to visit? U: I'd like to visit something in the west part of town. S: I'd recommend cafe jello gallery. Their phone number is 01223312112. Can I help you with anything else? U: Could you provide me with the address and entrance fee? S: It is free to enter and the address is 13 magdalene street. Can I help you with anything else today? U: Yes, I also need a place to stay in the west area. It should be 4 stars and have free wifi. S: If price is not an issue, I recommend the expensive Huntingdon Marriott hotel. If you want something cheaper, I recommend the Cambridge Belfry. U: Do you get a clean bathroom staying there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I would advise you stay at the Huntingdon Marriot Hotel then, as it has impeccable cleanliness according to reviews.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: i need a train  from stansted airport  to cambridge S: What day and approximately what time will you be traveling to Cambridge? U: I need to get there by 20:30 on Wednesday. S: You could grab the TR3828 leaving stansted airport it will get you there by 09:52. U: Can you get me there a little bit earlier? S: How about 05:24 that is the earliest, how many tickets please? U: There will be 8 of us. S: Okay, I have you booked for train TR5910. The total fee is 80.8 GDP.  Is there anything more I can do for you? U: I also need a guesthouse for 8 and needs to be a 4 star S: There are 5 different options that fit that criteria, 2 in the east, 2 in the north, and one in the city centre. Would you like to hear more about these? U: Which of those have free wifi? S: There are actually 18 different options to choose from. Is there a certain part of the city you'd like to stay in, or a particular price point? U: Any price point is fine as long as it is 4 star and has free parking. S: How about Allenbell? U: Do the reviews mention a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for this location, the views have been described as amazing, great, scenic and better than in the pictures!

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: I want to find a hotel to stay at that has free wifi and is moderately priced. Can you help? S: Is there a particular area of town that you prefer? U: Yes, I'd like to be on the east side.  The hotel should have a 4 star rating please. S: There are 3 guesthouses that meet your needs. 2 of them have free parking along with the Internet, and one does not. Carolina Bed and Breakfast is very nice. U: Ok, Carolina B&B it is. Can you book me a room for 1 person staying 5 nights on Sunday please? S: Your booking was successful and your reference number is BCT54NA8. May I help you with anything else today? U: Yes I also need a train. Can you help me? S: Definitely.  When were you wanting to travel? U: What is breakfast names? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The breakfast options at the Carolina Bed and Breakfast are seen as being both mediocre and meager or delicious and plentiful depending on the guest.

src_text: reviews of HOME FROM HOME: 1.I stayed here on my business trip, and after a hard day of business meetings, it was nice to retire to a large comfortable room. 2.I wished it was a bit bigger. 3.The only negative was the size of the room. [SEP] U: I would like to book a train that is running on Tuesday and departs anytime after 20:15, can you help me with that? S: Where would you like to travel from and to? U: The train should depart from cambridge and travel to peterborough. S: Sure, I have 7 trains that would work. The closest to your requested time is the TR5110 that leaves at 20:34. U: That will work. What is the price and arrival time for that? S: That will cost you 16.50 pounds and you will arrive by 21:24. U: That is great. I also want to know about a hotel called home from home. Can you find it for me. S: Certainly. Home from Home is a guesthouse on the north end of the city. It offers free internet and parking and is moderately priced. Would you like to book a room? U: I prefer a really spacious room, so can you check on the size of guest rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If you appreciate a spacious room during your stay, those at Home From Home will likely disappoint as theirs as seen as a bit small.

src_text:
reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. [SEP] U: I want to find out about expensive restaurants in the centre. S: There are 33. What kind of cuisine would you like? U: Expensive and in the cetre of town and I need you to book it for 6 at 20:00 on Wednesday S: The price range is not cuisine. What kind of food do you like? U: I do not care about the kind of food. Surprise me. S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is : F6AK4P82. U: Get me a hotel in the same area with the same price range for 5 staying for 2 nights, with a taxi that arrives at the restaurant by the booked time S: How does the gonville hotel sound to you? U: Is the water pressure in the hotel strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the water pressure in the showers at the Gonville Hotel are far from strong, as guests regard it as trickling and poor.

src_text: reviews of ALPHA-MILTON GUEST HOUSE: 1.The views were amazing. 2.While I was there I really admired the view. 3.Just a bit disappointed at the rooms not being clean when we arrived, but the views are worth it. 4.The view is also very nice. 5.We were not disappointed. 6.My partner and I did like the size of the room and we enjoyed the view. 7.What stood out to me the most is just how quiet it was, but on top of that, the views were great. [SEP] U: Can you tell me about cineworld cinema? I'd like a train into Cambridge on Thursday leaving around 09:00 also.  I'll be leaving from Stratford. What is the fair? Thank you. S: OK, one at a time. Cineworld Cinema is located at cambridge leisure park, clifton way, in the south part of town. U: Can I have the postcode and phone number, please? S: The postcode is cb17dy	and the phone number is 00872208000.  Now, let's check on that train. U: Thank you. Again, I will be leaving from Stratford around 09:00 going to Cambridge and I would like to know the fair also. S: I'm sorry, there seems to be an error. Would you please restate your requirements? U: Forget the train for now, I need a 3 star guesthouse. S: The alpha-milton guest house is located in the north with postcode cb41xa and is 3 stars.  Its phone number is 01223311625.  Would you like me to book this? U: Do they have rooms with great views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, nearly every guest notes how great the views are. Can I answer any other questions, or shall I book it for you?

src_text: FAQs of GOLDEN WOK: 1.Golden Wok does have outdoor seating. reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.They have a good area outside for when the weather is nice. 2.I enjoyed sitting out there as I was eating alone. 3.Outdoor dining was nicely decorated and comfortable. [SEP] U: I would like to find a guesthouse to stay in that's in the expensive price range. Can you help me? S: There are zero guesthouses in the expensive range. Would you like to explore hotels or other price ranges? U: Ok. Can we look for something on the north side? S: There are several moderately priced guesthouses in the North.  Arbury Lodge, perhaps?  It has a 4 star rating. U: That sounds like a good option! Does it include internet? I won't be needing it during my stay, but I'd like to know. S: Yes, the arbury guest house offers internet U: Can you book it for me? S: How many people and how many days would you like to book for? U: Are there any rooms with extra beds? S: Sorry, extra beds are unavailable at Arbury Lodge. Would you like me to make reservations here or look for another hotel? U: Please book for 2 people, for 5 nights, starting from Wednesday. S: I have you booked for a room on Wednesday, for 5 nights, for two people.  Your reference number is JHI0YPSS.  Would you like help with anything else? U: looking for a restaurant. The restaurant should serve chinese food and should be in the same price range as the hotel S: There are four! 3 in the centre, and 1 in the north! U: I want the one in the north please S: golden wok is what you're looking for, can i book it for you? U: Is there outdoor seating? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Golden Wok restaurant does provide its customers with outdoor dining that's nicely decorated and comfortable.

src_text: reviews of WAGAMAMA: 1.The quality of the drinks was good and the service was good. 2.The foods were all spectacular and tantalizing, and the beer was fresh, crisp, and quite affordable. 3.Same has to be said about the drinks options they offer and their quality - only top notch brews and bottles, very very nice. FAQs of WAGAMAMA: 1.Yes, Wagamama serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I am looking for an expensive place to eat. S: We have plenty of high end expensive options in Cambridge, 57 to be exact.  Anything I can do to narrow down your options? U: Are there any Japanese restaurants in the centre of town? S: There are not any expensive Japanese restaurants in the centre, but there is a moderately priced one. Would that work for you? U: Could you check again for an expensive one? S: It is wagamama, would you like a reservation? U: Do they serve high quality beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Wagamama serves alcohol, including beer. One reviewer called their beer "fresh, crisp, and quite affordable". Would you like a reservation?

src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Great variety in their drink menu, but the prices were just too high, including the beer that we all tried. 2.I really wanted a better view and we wanted drinks but were quite sad with the choices. FAQs of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Yes, Little Seoul serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm trying to figure out my eating options. Are there any expensive restaurants in the centre? S: There are 33 expensive restaurants to choose from in the centre. To narrow down results, what type of food are you wanting to eat? U: How about a place that serves canapes? S: There are no expensive restaurants in the centre of town serving canapes U: Aww, that's too bad. Do you have any that serve korean food? S: Yes, little seoul is a great place for korean food. U: Do they serve a nice variety of drinks at Little Seoul that are highly-rated by the customers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure, one customer said that they had great variety in the drink menu whereas another said that the drink choices were quite sad.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Hobsons House did not disappoint in that aspect. 2.The location is exceptional and the breakfast options were fantastic. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a place to dine in Cambridge? S: Was there a particular area of town you wanted to dine in? Or a particular style of cuisine? U: I would really like some Malaysian food tonight, moderate in price please. S: I am not finding any Malaysian restaurants in the city. Would you like a different type of food? U: Could you try one similar only Indian this time? S: What area of town are you looking to dine in? U: Area does not matter. S: Do you have a preference to price? I have many Indian restaurants of varying price all over the city. U: I would like to stay in the moderate price range. S: There a 4 restaurants that would work. Two are in the east. One in the north. One in the west.  Would you like me to recommend one? U: Yes can you please five me a recommendation. S: I recommend the curry prince then. Do you need anything else? U: Can I get a table for 3 people at 11:00 on Wednesday? S: Okay, I've got it for you!  The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.  Your number is : PD3GXPL6. U: I also need a place to stay that is cheap. S: There are many hotels in your price range. What area would you like to stay in? U: The area does not matter as long as it is in the type of guesthouse and should have a star of 3. S: Unfortunately, I don't have anything that is cheap with 3 stars. Is there a different area or type of room you would like? U: How about a 3 star guesthouse in the moderate price range? S: I have the hobsons house it is in the west moderately priced with 3 stars. Would you like reservations? U: Does the Hobsons House have internet? S: Yes, it does. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Is it located in a nice part of town? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It has been said the it does not lack anything in the area of location.  It has even been referred to as an exceptional location.

src_text:

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.Accessible parking was easily available, which was really convenient, and they even offered some excellent breakfast options. 2.We also enjoyed the delicious breakfast options we got to select from. reviews of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.Very nicely done and yummy! 2.The options were plentiful and very well done. 3.When waking up in the morning, I was treated to a whole host of delicious food to eat. 4.The breakfasts were awesome. 5.I liked the central view of the city and its geographical location but I did not like the meals served especially breakfast FAQs of WORTH HOUSE: 1.Worth house offers breakfast at additional charge. 2.There are full English breakfast options available at Worth House. FAQs of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.City Centre North B and B does offer free English breakfast. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap guesthouse. S: I found nine cheap guesthouses.  Would you like to book at the Allenbell?  It has 4 stars and is in the east side. U: Do you have anything on the North side? S: There are two options on the North side, City Centre North B and B or Worth House. Would you like more information about either of those establishments? U: does either of these locations have good breakfast options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The breakfast options at City Centre North B and B are plentiful and awesome, while those at Worth House are delicious as well.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.I was deeply impressed by the sea view in front of the hotel, which was great and magnificent. 2.But the best was the great view. 3.The view was stunning and so much better than I even expected. 4.It was just incredible! trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes you will according to the reviews left by previous guests.  Guests hace called the views wonderful, great, stunning, and just incredible.
