src_text: reviews of THE HOTPOT: 1.The quality of the food was also immensely beneficial and brought about a very fresh taste. 2.The food was also very on point, as it tasted highly fresh and authentic. 3.I like that the portions were big and that the food tasted good. reviews of HAKKA: 1.The service was great, food was superb, and on top of that the food and drinks were so cheap! 2.We ordered dumplings and yangzhou fried rice and we were not disappointed! 3.Our food and beverages were amazing. [SEP] U: I would like to find an expensive restaurant in the north part of Cambridge. S: Sure what type of food are you wanting to eat? U: How about chinese food? S: There 2 of them - the Hakka and the hotpot. Which one would you like to try? U: Do either of them have top notch Yangzhou Fried Rice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Hakka is the only restaurant that mentioned Yangzhou. The customer who had it said they were not disappointed.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.While the hotel was super noisy, because of its proximity to the highway, I was very happy with the shared kitchen that was made available for my stay. 2.But the nearby environment was noisy which affected my sleeping quality. 3.The only negatives were that it tended to be a bit noisy and the elevator wasn't available during our stay there, but otherwise it went well. 4.I very much enjoyed the quiet atmosphere to relax and wind down. [SEP] U: I am looking for a certain cool place to go in town. Could you help me narrow it down? S: Sure, are you looking for an attraction in a particular area? U: Yes. I'd like the attraction to be located in the Centre. S: There are 79 attractions in the center. Are you looking for something in particular? U: Ah, so sorry, I am looking for a theatre. And if you could tell me about any entrance fees? S: There are four theatre's in the centre of town. I am sorry but there is no information available on their entrance fees. Would you like more information on one of them. U: Are you absolutely sure? Usually there's some kind of indication about cost of entry. S: Okay can I recommend adc theatre then? U: Okay. I also need a place to stay that is cheap and includes free parking. S: The Alexander bed and breakfast  and el shaddai are in the centre area. Would you like a room booked in either one of those? U: Thanks, is either hotel in a quiet area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes the hotel is in good position and very quite place as it is far from town from a lot of noise that disturbs many.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The staff welcomed us with big smiles, and we slept like babies in the comfy beds. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel, is that something you help with? S: There are 33 hotels, is there a specific area you are looking for? U: I'm looking for somewhere classy and expensive, where they don't skimp on amenities like free wifi. Are there any like that? Would you like me to try a different price range? U: Yes please, could you try finding me a guesthouse in a moderate price range? S: There are no expensive guest houses. U: I would settle for a moderate price ranged one. S: There are some in the north and one in the east.  Does either option sound better? U: moderately priced with a 4 star rating. For 4 people for 5 nights on thursday. S: Do you want a hotel in the north or east? U: It doesn't matter. Whichever one you think is best. S: How does acorn guest house sound? They're on 154 chesterton rd and you'd get free parking, too. U: Is this hotel known for it's accommodating and pleasant staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Staff at The acorn guest house have been described as welcoming and greeted their customers with really big smiles.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, we found that the room had a beautiful view to the sunset horizon outside. 2.The Carolina has good views. 3.It was nice to wake up in the morning and see the sun rising. 4.Parking was free and the view from the room was nice. 5.The view was really beautiful, too. src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, you will get good service at Charlie Chan. Past guests say the service was excellent, and they had no issues with it.

src_text: reviews of SHANGHAI FAMILY RESTAURANT: 1.You get plenty to eat for the money that's for sure! 2.I did like the affordable Price for the drinks and the foods. 3.This is always a good place if you are looking for an affordable meal at a very good price. 4.The price for the food was amazing considering how good it was, and it was close to my home which was a plus. 5.It was kind of expensive though so I'm not sure if I would return. 6.It was all good and at a great price. reviews of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.It was pretty overpriced but the food was high-quality. 2.In the end, it was definitely worth the price and I recommend it. 3.Overall the food was very inexpensive, and it was all delicious, hot, and fresh. 4.Not only that but the food as well as the drinks was priced well within our budget. 5.The only kind thing that I can say about Jinling Noodle Bar is that their prices are amazingly affordable, but I have a theory: their prices are so low because everything else about the place is totally mediocre! reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.Their food always tastes so authentic and wonderfully-prepared, and the best part is how amazingly affordable their entire menu is. 2.I forgot to mention that the price is affordable - except some drinks were a little overpriced though. 3.We will be back soon as a family-- and did I mention it's affordable? 4.I ordered the dumplings, which were very well prices. 5.On top of the high quality and excellent value of their food, the atmosphere at Lan Hong House is just wonderful - lively yet welcoming, and never too loud to have an intimate conversation with your dining partners. 6.Overall a nice place with a manageable budget. [SEP] U: Can you help me take a train from Cambridge to Stansted Airport? S: What day and time would you like to travel? U: I would like to travel saturday and leave after 21:00 S: The TR2605 train meets your criteria. Would you like to make a booking? U: Yes, please. I need 4 tickets. S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 40.4 GBP payable at the station . Reference number is : BOI263IB. U: I am  also looking for a place to dine. S: I can help you with that. What part of town are you looking to dine in and is there a certain price range you would like to stay in? U: Anywhere downtown and keep the price moderate please. S: I assumed that by downtown you meant centre, I ran a search and there were 21 moderately priced restaurants, any repferences? U: I think Chinese would be good. S: There are three Chinese restaurants in the center of town: jinling noodle bar, lan hong house and shanghai family restaurant. Do you have a preference? U: Which one is a place to eat with good value for money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Lan Hong House and the Shanghai Family Restaurant have very affordable prices that are very good. The Jingling Noodle Bar is a expensive but very delicious food.

src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.The sunset was really beautiful out on the balcony! 2.I was alone so I did not need much but it was very clean and had a nice view I enjoyed. 3.The room is big and I had a great view of the sunset. 4.The view was great - overlooked the ocean and was right by the beach. src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.It was a nice, quiet room for a good nights sleep. 3.I stayed on a business trip, and I really appreciated how quiet the accommodations were. reviews of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.The place and the location was quiet though, which was appreciated since I had early morning meetings every day. 2.However, there was often disruptive noises outside of my room that made it difficult to enjoy the room. [SEP] U: I want to find a place to stay in the cheap price range with free parking. S: I have 10 places matching your request.  What part of town would you prefer? U: North part of town,please. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Worth House is quieter than City Centre North B and B. City Center North B and B had some complaints about noise.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. [SEP] U: I am looking for an expensive Indian restaurant. S: There are several options, is there a specific area you prefer? U: Yes, I'd like to find one in the centre. S: How about the curry garden that is in the centre of town and serves indian food? U: Is Curry Garden expensive? If so, I want to make a reservation for Sunday. S: Yes it is expensive. Their address is 106 Regent Street City Centre. How many people shall I reserve it for and at what time? U: 1 person and 12:15 on Sunday or Thursday. I also need a reference number S: I can reserve a table for 1 on Thursday at 12:15. Should I book it for you? U: Yes I already asked you to do it!! And send the reference number! S: There seems to be an error in the restaurant booking system. Do you need anything else, like a hotel or taxi in the meantime? U: Could you please try again? I really need that reservation. I'd prefer it for Sunday but if they can't accommodate that time, Thursday will suffice. S: Neither of those days seem to be available. Would you like me to try a different restaurant. Panahar is expensive and in the same area. U: Could you try again, just want something on Thursday, at 12:15. S: Good news, the booking system finally worked and I made the reservation! Your reference number is I3VJP80T U: Great. Now I need somewhere to stay. I want an expensive place with 2 stars plus parking and wifi too. S: express by holiday inn cambridge is the only available hotel we have. Would you like me to make the reservation? U: Yes, please, for 4 people, 4 nights. Same day as the restaurant booking. S: Your all set, the reference number is 6BRFT2OA, is there anything else I can do for you today? U: This has strong water pressure correct? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the water pressure in the showers at the Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge is one of its downfalls as guests regard it's flow as that of a small sprinkler.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are mixed reviews of the sound level at the Warkworth House as some mentioned road noise and loud neighbors, but others thought it was silent.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The staff was nice and helpful. 2.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 3.While at this location, I noticed that the staff was extremely kind and respectful to both of us. 4.The staff was friendly which made me feel comfortable and welcomed. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The staff was friendly with my requests. 2.It was actually my first time traveling alone, so I was super nervous, but the staff was so welcoming that I instantly felt at ease upon arrival. [SEP] U: I am looking for a 2 star hotel with free wifi. S: There are three hotel types available. Do you want a specific area or price range? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The staff at the Ashley Hotel is welcoming and friendly, and the same could be said about the service provided at the Lovell Lodge.

src_text: reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.Truly, the only things that they have going for them are a fantastic location, which affords them a lot of foot traffic, and the wonderful views from their window seats. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.The location was pleasant, not far from other amenities in the city and with good parking. 2.The only issues we had was that it was in a bad part of town, there wasn't any good parking nearby, and there wasn't any view to look at. 3.I hadn't had Chinese food in ages, so I looked on Yelp and found the Charlie Chan Chinese restaurant, which is nestled in the heart of the downtown business district. 4.Despite that, the restaurant was in a poor location in a bad spot in the city. reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.I liked the location and the view. 2.I also didn't like the part of town it was located in. 3.The only downside of the experience was the mediocre location and service, as the food took forever to finish. 4.When we were sat at our table we remarked at the great location of the restaurant in a sought after spot in the city. 5.It seemed kind of sketchy. 6.It wasn't too far of a drive from our house. [SEP] U: I'm looking for cheap eats in the centre. S: Yes I have many Chinese and Asian restaurants as well as Spanish, Portuguese and Indian cuisines matching your price requirements. Any preference? U: I am interested in Chinese food. S: I found three Chinese restaurants in the centre: Charlie Chan, Rice House and Golden House. Would you like me to book you a table? U: Are any of those places in a really nice location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location of Charlie Chan is mixed with many thinking it's in a bad part of the city. The same could be said about that of the Rice House restaurant. However, the Golden House is considered to be in a fantastic spot.

src_text: reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.I don't really know what the Kahvalti and Meze had, but for sure they were the best things I have ever eating in a long while. 2.The food wasn't good. 3.We thought the breakfast buffet (Kahvalti) was spectacular: fresh hot bread, hearty cheese, eggs several ways, briny black and green olives, and dark honey for the bread. 4.However, I can't say the same about the food. 5.All-in-all, a great dining experience: the portion sizes were very good, and the prices were reasonable (under $20 for each of us) for top-notch quality foods and drinks. 6.Prices were reasonable, and the food was so delicious and fresh. reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.The food quality was terrific, and we sent our compliments to the chef. src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.During my recent stay at LEVERTON HOUSE with your family, I was very happy with the clean room especially the bathroom. 2.It was very clean, as well. 3.But while the size of the room was quite good, it was definitely not freshly cleaned when we checked in, and because there was no concierge service, we couldn't find a more suitable hotel to book an alternate stay at. reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.I was alone so I did not need much but it was very clean and had a nice view I enjoyed. src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Further, they made me feel like they were happy to serve me whenever I needed anything or called. 2.The Allenbell is a very friendly place to be, as I and my family were welcomed with warm smiles. 3.They were very friendly. 4.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 5.While the staff was incredibly friendly, I was disappointed that housekeeping was not offered on a daily basis. 6.They were unfriendly and unprofessional, which was really disappointing. 7.First, I'd like to say that the staff was wonderful. 8.Unfortunately, the staff really ruined our stay. U: I want it to be a guesthouse,have free parking. S: I would reccomend the allenbell. Will this work for you? U: Are the staff welcoming? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most people feel that the staff is welcoming, describing them as wonderful and incredibly friendly. But there were people who felt that the staff would be a reason to not stay there again.

U: Is it centrally located to the downtown area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I don't have that information, but the location has received mostly positive reviews for this particular location.

src_text: reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.Everything is very high quality, but the service is lacking. 2.Our waitress wasn't all that friendly but we had a good time anyway. 3.Things I really liked about the restaurant was the view, great service and the portion size. 4.The high point was the food, and the meatballs and pizza were excellent, but the lackluster wait staff definitely put a damper on our evening, and we probably won't return. 5.Everything was very affordable, including the drinks and the service was very good as well. 6.The service was great, and it was in a nice location too. 7.Overall well pleased high-quality food and service. 8.However, the service was as mediocre as the drinks: in both cases, we were left unsatisfied. reviews of CLOWNS CAFE: 1.The wait staff kept our glasses full. 2.All of the food was high-quality and the service was great. reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.We had to wait a while before we were seated. 2.However, the service offered left a lot to be desired. 3.The good things about this place was the wonderful indoor decor and great service. 4.If I had to take one star off my review, I'd say that the service wasn't the best, but my server may just have been having an off night. 5.The drinks were affordable and our waiter suggested the perfect pairings for each of the dishes my colleagues and I ordered - lasgna, meatballs and spaghetti, risotto, and bolognese. 6.We wanted a booth, but there were none available for a party of four. 7.The wait staff were prompt with the drinks and someone was always around to attend to our needs. 8.Our server was friendly and affable. reviews of DON PASQUALE PIZZERIA: 1.But the thing is that the service was bad and the food was bad. 2.But once I got in I cheered up since the service was great. 3.This wouldn't be a nice place for a date because of terrible service and the terrible view of the parking lot. [SEP] U: I would like to go to an expensive Italian restaurant for dinner. S: which area of town are you interested in dining in? U: The centre is my preference.  Thank you. src_text: reviews of LA RAZA: 1.If you're looking for a cool, hip Spanish restaurant to visit for tapas and drinks, I wouldn't recommend La Raza because their drinks were frankly not well-prepared and tasted pretty mediocre. 2.La Raza has good food and drinks. 3.Though I'm more of a beer drinker and stuck with one of their top quality, full bodied Spanish craft beers, my boyfriend tried a glass of one of their expensive, top quality Sangrias and loved it. 4.I also ordered a beer, which seemed to be of great quality along with their other drink choices. 5.I liked the sangria and the portion was large for my tortilla espanola. FAQs of LA RAZA: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at La Raza. Would you like the phone number? U: What is the address? S: The address for La Raza is 4 - 6 Rose Crescent.  Would you like their phone number? U: Can you first tell me if they have a high-quality selection of sangria? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: At La Raza, alcohol is served, including beers. Many people there who tried the sangria said they loved it.

U: Hmm okay can you search for chinese food instead then please? S: There are 10 entries here. I recommend charlie chan. U: Do they have great service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The service is excellent and items come out quickly. The service seems to be the high point of the restaurant.

src_text: reviews of LA RAZA: 1.If you're looking for a cool, hip Spanish restaurant to visit for tapas and drinks, I wouldn't recommend La Raza because their drinks were frankly not well-prepared and tasted pretty mediocre. 2.La Raza has good food and drinks. 3.Though I'm more of a beer drinker and stuck with one of their top quality, full bodied Spanish craft beers, my boyfriend tried a glass of one of their expensive, top quality Sangrias and loved it. 4.I also ordered a beer, which seemed to be of great quality along with their other drink choices. 5.I liked the sangria and the portion was large for my tortilla espanola. FAQs of LA RAZA: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at La Raza. [SEP] U: I wanted to visit the restaurant named La Raza, could you tell me the hours it is open, and if I should try to book a reservation? S: Sure, I can find that information for you.  I can also book a reservation for you if you have a certain time you wanted to go? U: What type of food does La Raza serve? And what area is it in? S: La Raza is a Spanish restaurant in the city center. U: Is La Raza known for having really great beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, according to the majority of customers that dined at La Raza, the beer provided is of great quality.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: I am looking for the Warkworth House hotel. S: Warkworth House is a 4 star moderately priced guesthouse on the eastside. It offers free wifi and parking. Would you like the address or phone number? U: Do you know if this is in a quiet area of town? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Warkworth house is located in a quiet area and has quiet rooms according to most guests. One person did complain about the noise, though.

src_text: reviews of TAJ TANDOORI: 1.The food was delicious sadly the portions were a bit small. 2.The flavor was spot on, however, I did feel it was quite overpriced for the amount of food you get. 3.The food was of good portion and good atmosphere and services, but i didn't like the Mediocre foods [SEP] U: I am interested in seeing some of the attractions in town, particularly in the south. Can you help me? S: Sure! Museum? Nightclub? Movies? You name it! U: I have no preference, but you can suggest a Museum for me. S: There are no museums in the south. Would you like to try a different area or different attraction? U: That's too bad.  Can you find me a restaurant in the expensive price range in the south instead? S: I have about 5 places to choose from. I have 2 chinese places, an indian place, an italian place and lastly a place that serves delicious Mexican food. U: I would like Indian food. S: Very good choice.  The taj tandoori restaurant is located at 64 cherry hinton road cherry hinton.  Phone number is 01223412299 and post code is cb17aa.  Anything else? U: Do the reviews mention anything about large portion sizes? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most past customers said that the portions were small while one past customer mentioned that the portions were good.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Carolina Bed and Breakfast had a pretty mediocre location, it seemed too far away from the places I came to town to visit. [SEP] U: I was hoping to relax and visit a park while in cambridge. S: I found 5 great parks to visit. There are two on the south side, one on the north, one on the east and one in the centre of town. U: Great! Can you provide addresses and entrance fees? S: The Cambridge University Botanic Gardens are in the centre of town, located on Bateman Street, with an entrance fee of 4 pounds. The other four parks have free entry. U: Okay great i will go for the University Botanic gardens. Can you also assist me to look up the Carolina bed and Breakfast address and availability? S: I sure can.  When were you hoping to stay there? U: Is the area near downtown? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for this location, the only thing I can tell you about the location is it is pretty mediocre and far away from places in town one patron wanted to visit.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The bathrooms were spotless, and modern. 2.I had to ask them to clean the bathroom again. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The bathroom was also exceptionally clean when we first checked in to the room. 2.Furthermore, I noticed that the bathrooms were not recently cleaned and it appeared that somebody had used them prior to my partner and I. 3.And lastly, I found that the bathrooms and other restroom facilities were pristine and clean. 4.I hate to say anything negative but if I had to nitpick something it was that the bathroom wasn't as clean as I would have liked and the water pressure was low. [SEP] U: We're looking for a place to stay in Cambridge.  We're looking for a hotel with free wifi and free parking. S: We have many hotels all over the city. When would you like to book the rooms for and how long is your stay? U: I would prefer a hotel in the moderate price range. S: The Ashley hotel and the Lovell lodge are both hotels in the north, moderate price range with offer free wifi and parking. Which one do you prefer? U: Which has cleaner bathrooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both offer for most part pristine bathrooms. Ashley hotel the customer had to ask to be cleaned better. Lovell a customer addressed uncleanliness to staff who fixed the issue.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The shower was a sad dribble of water. 2.It was challenging to rinse the shampoo efficiently. 3.The only negative was the low water pressure. [SEP] U: I'm just needing a place to stay. S: Do you have a price range in mind? U: I don't want anything too cheap or anything that will break the bank, just somewhere moderately priced. S: Okay. What part of town will you be visiting? U: The west part I need the address and phone number and zip. S: It is called Hobsons house, it is on 96 Barton road. their number is 	01223304906, cb39lh is their postcode. U: Does that have free wifi and parking? If so, I'd like a reservation. S: Yes, it does have parking and internet. What day would you like to begin your stay, how many days in total, and how many people please? U: I want the shower to have a lot of water pressure. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It doesn't appear that there is a lot of water pressure at Hobsons House. Past guests have said that it is very low.

src_text: FAQs of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Free English/Irish breakfast is available here. reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.I found that I did not need to go to the diner with my family because the provided breakfast was excellent. 2.I was here with my girlfriend, and we surely enjoyed the tasty breakfast options we got. 3.Also, the breakfast is to die for, we were always stuffed in the morning times. [SEP] U: I have a hotel in mind that I need some help to book. S: Okay, can you provide the name of the hotel please? U: I would like to book the Aylesbray Lodge guest house, for 1 person, 3 nights, starting Friday S: I have you booked for 3 nights starting on Friday.  The reference number is  8FLXFYYW.  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Are there good breakfast options offered at the Aylesbray Lodge? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Patrons at Aylesbray Lodge say they offer tasty breakfast options such as a English/Irish breakfast.  Is there anyting else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.Where this restaurant is located is excellent. 2.If this restaurant come somehow magically get up and move to a prime location, it would probably be my number one favorite restaurant right now. 3.It is not in the best area, also not the worst, but still not great, and not a great view to enjoy while you eat your fabulous dinner and stout. 4.To begin with, the restaurant is in a lovely location. 5.Additionally, the restaurant was conveniently located, just 5 minutes walk from the subway. 6.Central to everything, but still off the beaten path and reminded me of a quaint restaurant you might find in the UK. 7.It was a really nice location, but it's a shame that the food was overpriced. reviews of BEDOUIN: 1.Being nearby, it's not in the best location, since it's in a not so busy town. [SEP] U: I'm looking for theatres in the centre of town. S: The adc theatre is a nice attraction. U: Great. Can I have the address please? S: ADC Theatre is located on Park Street in postcode CB58AS. Their phone number is 01223300085. Can I help you with anything else? U: I would love some help finding a nice restaurant to take my wife to. Something expensive. S: Are you looking for a particular type of food? U: Not really, but I would prefer it to be in the Centre also, close to the theatre. S: There are a few options in the Centre including Bedouin, an African restaurant, and Midsummer House Restaurant, a traditional British restaurant. Do these interest you? U: Is the location nice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Bedouin is not in the best location because it is in a less buy part of town and the Midsummer House Restaurant get high praise for its location by most customer but some do find it to be off the beaten path.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. [SEP] U: I'm looking somewhere to stay with free wifi and free parking S: Archway house is a good choice! U: Does Archway House have two stars? I require that rating. S: No, I think Ashley hotel might be more in your range. U: Is it in the east?  I need a hotel in the east. S: Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge is in the eastern part of town. Would you like me to book you a room? U: Does the Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge have good water pressure in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for that location, the water pressure there has been described as unlikable and like a sprinkler.

src_text: reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.The wait staff could certainly be more friendly but the location is great as is the view from the patio. 2.The view from the restaurant was excellent, it is in a very nice location. 3.If you don't mind the lack of a view from the dining room that is. 4.There is also a nice view of the city. reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.The only places they can use some improvement in is giving it all a better view which might also bring up the atmosphere as well 2.I have to say, the service was excellent, and the views from the restaurant can't be beat. 3.They also have a modest drinks menu with some affordable prices, but I was more interested in the beautiful view from my window seat, which allowed me to watch the sun setting as I dined. 4.The location could not be better: right in the heart of the city with excellent views after the sun goes down. [SEP] U: Is there a moderately priced restaurant in the north part of town? S: There are two moderately priced restaurants in the north part of town, Golden Wok, a Chinese restaurant, and The Nirala, an Indian restaurant. Would you like more information on either of these? U: Do they have nice views out of the windows? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both restaurants feature at least some tables with excellent views. Would you like me to book a table at either of them?

src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.I wish there was some nice drinks to complement the meal but there were only limited non alcoholic drink options. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for some information for my upcoming trip.  Specifically, I am looking for an Indian restaurant. S: There are 22 Indian restaurants in town. Do you prefer a particular price range? U: I would like one in the centre area, but maybe you could pick me a good one. S: I would recommend curry garden as they are very good. U: How extensive is the nonalcoholic drink menu at Curry Garden? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Curry Garden has only a limited option of  non-alcoholic drinks. Would you like to make a reservation ?

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.We could not enjoy the shower as the pressure was low. 2.The room was a bit small, so I felt a tiny cramped in there, and the water pressure could have been a lot better. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to eat that is cheap. S: What type of food are you interested in? U: I'd like some Italian food. S: La Margherita is a great (and cheap!) Italian place on the west side of town. Would you like a table there? U: Yeah. Can I get one for 8 people on friday at 14:30 please? S: Absolutely, will you be needing a reference number? U: Yes, I definitely need the reference number. Thank you. S: Great, you are all booked and ready to go. Your reference number is 8ON7IKVZ. Would you like me to help you with anything else? U: Well now that you've asked, I would like some information about the kirkwood house hotel S: It is a moderate price range with internet and parking. Would you like me to book a room? U: Does that hotel have a shower that doesn't have low water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests felt the water pressure was too low at Kirkwood House making showers less enjoyable. Would you like me to book a room?

src_text: FAQs of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.Continental and buffet options are available for breakfast at Warkworth House. 2.Yes, Warkworth House provides free breakfast. reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.In the morning, I was treated to a lovely variety of delicious foods for breakfast. 2.My work called me up and needed me to go on a business trip, so I went here, and oh boy I must say they have really good breakfast options and the WiFi was super fast. [SEP] U: I need a train departing from cambridge going to leicester. S: What day did you want to travel on? U: I'll be going on Wednesday, after 13:15. S: We have one that leaves at 13:21, and arrives by 15:06 would you like me to book this for you at 37.80 pounds. U: That's perfect. I need 5 tickets S: Ok.  I've reserved 5 tickets for Wednesday leaving Cambridge and arriving in Leicester at 15:06.  Your reference # is A4T8DCJA. U: Thank you. I also need information on a hotel called warkworth house. S: Warkworth House is a guesthouse in the east side of town, would you prefer a different part of town? U: Does Warkworth House offer a good variety of food at their breakfast service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Patrons that have stayed at Warkworth House say breakfast has good delicious options.  Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of WAGAMAMA: 1.The quality of the drinks was good and the service was good. 2.The foods were all spectacular and tantalizing, and the beer was fresh, crisp, and quite affordable. 3.Same has to be said about the drinks options they offer and their quality - only top notch brews and bottles, very very nice. FAQs of WAGAMAMA: 1.Yes, Wagamama serves alcohol. [SEP] U: i need information about wagamama restaurant. S: i have their info, what would you like to know? U: DO they have highly rated reviews for beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Drinks were called top notch and one reviewer described the beer as fresh, crisp, and quite affordable. Should I book it?

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.Taking a shower was also a problem and it was very difficult to get myself clean as a result of limited water pressure. [SEP] U: Hello, I would love to try a few local restaurants and am looking for a hotel with free parking and 0 stars. S: There aren't any 0 star hotels in Cambridge. Would you be interested in a different place to stay? U: Are there any 0 star ratings in the west?  I'm looking for a cheap hotel basically! S: I have the cambridge belfry in west. It is a 4 star but cheap price. U: Yes, I think that might be a good choice. Can you make a booking for me? S: Yes can i get your booking information please. U: I am wanting either a hotel or guesthouse with a 0 star rating that has free parking. And I want it to be cheap in the west. Can you check that? S: we got none in that class. maybe you should look up the 4 star one. U: I am sorry. I would not mind one that is in the centre, cheap, and 0 star. Can we try that? S: There is a guesthouse in the centre which has 0 stars and in the cheap price range. It is called el shaddai. Would you like me to book that for you? U: Is the water pressure very strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, one shouldn't expect to experience strong water pressure when staying at the El Shaddai as theirs is limited.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: Hello Cambridge Towninfo Center representative. I desire a place to stay that 5 stars, cheap and includes free wifi. Can you help? S: I'm sorry but I'm not finding anything that matches your criteria. Can I help with something else? U: How about changing that to a 4 star rating? S: That we have! Do you have a preference on the area? U: No preferences on the area, but I want to book it for 1 person for 5 nights starting from wednesday. S: How does the Alexander bed and breakfast in the centre sound? U: Do you know if the Alexander Bed and Breakfast is in a good location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some found Alsxander Bed and Breakfast to be in a good location near a few different attractions. Others found the location to be mediocre, and noted it was not very close to shopping centers.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 2.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. 2.One of the best things about the hotel is the view of the mountains from the balcony. reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip to cambridge, and I am looking for a place to stay. I would like it to include free parking and free wifi a well. S: I have five hotels that have free parking and wifi. Any specific star rating or price range? U: Are any of them 4 stars? Looking specifically for a 4 star hotel. S: If only a hotel will do, you have 3 options: Huntingdon Marriott and Cambridge Belfry are in the west of town, while the University Arms is located in the center. U: Which hotel has the best views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All three of them have really great reviews for their view. Do you have any other questions about the rooms?

src_text: reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.The ambiance of the restaurant was superb. 2.It was modern but inviting at the same time. reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.The only places they can use some improvement in is giving it all a better view which might also bring up the atmosphere as well 2.It can get loud inside sometimes when they are really busy. 3.It is a little loud when they get busy. 4.Me and my husband mentioned feeling like we were in India, not to mention the food... [SEP] U: I am looking for a moderately priced restaurant in the north part of town. S: There is the Golden Wok for Chinese food and the Nirala for Indian food. U: Which one is located in a place that has a good atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Golden wok has the best reviews for its atmosphere. Nirala has mediocre reviews for its atmosphere.

src_text: reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.I disliked mediocre food and views however, given that the location was good. 2.The restaurant was located in a nice area. 3.However, the location of the restaurant was mediocre at best, as it was in a bad spot in town. 4.What I didn't like so much was that although the restaurant is in the nice part of town, the views are mediocre at best. [SEP] U: Please help me find an expensive restaurant that serves Chinese food. Thank you. S: I have several options for you. Do you have a certain area in mind? U: Area does not matter, Ill go with anyone that you recommend, please book me for thursday at 19:15 for 6 people. S: Ok, you have a reservation at the Ugly Duckling. The reference number is MHERLSWD. Do you want the address? U: Is this location in a good, accessible neighborhood? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: While the food at the Ugly Duckling may be mediocre, the location is considered from average to good.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive chinese restaurant in Cambridge. S: Any particular area you have in mind? U: I'd like to be where all the action is in the centre of town. S: I have 4 options that meet the choice of your request though i done have the phone number of one. Do you wish i help you choose one? U: Yes, please pick one for me.  I need the address with postcode.  I'd also like the phone number too.  Thanks for your help! S: how about sesame restaurant and bar? U: I would love to try that restaurant. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alexander bed and breakfast is not very close to shopping and you can't walk to any places of interest but some people say they like the location.

src_text: FAQs of BANGKOK CITY: 1.Bangkok City serves alcohol. reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.I think they are charging a bit too much, but I will say they did have many drink options to choose from as well as a decent sized menu. 2.The food was great, and while the drinks were splendid and of wide variety, the prices were too high for both. [SEP] U: Hi, I am searching for a nice Thai restaurant in Cambridge Centre S: The only Thai restaurant located in Centre Cambridge is Bangkok City. Would you like the address? U: Do they have a varied beer menu? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are a variety of dofferent drink options, including beer, but some customers felt that the drinks are fairly expensive.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: i need a place to stay S: Ok, and what part of the city would you like to stay in? U: Downtown. In a guest house maybe. S: I'm sorry, can you be more specific? Our city is divided into North, West, East, South and Centre. U: I don't have a certain area in mind. But, I would like it to have 4 stars and that it is a guesthouse and not a hotel. S: great, i have 18 options for you! U: Okay, thank you! Will you please book it for 5 people for 4 nights, starting Tuesday? S: Do you have a price range? The prices range from cheap to expensive. U: Yes expensive and also looking for places to go nearby S: The only 4 star guest house I found in the centre of town is a cheap one- the alexander bed and breakfast. Shall I book that for you? U: Yes.  Book for 5 people, 4 nights and starting on Tuesday. S: Ok, the booking was successful. Reference number is : NMT6HX2V. Can I help with anything else? U: i need to book a car S: Alright, shall I call a taxi or a bus for you? U: a taxi that should leave by 05:30 S: what will be your destination? U: Wait, I need to find a museum in the centre first, then i can get a taxi. I'm very sorry, I got a little ahead of myself. S: There are 11 museums in the center. I recommend the whipple museum of the history of science for hours of fun. Do you need more information? U: Yes, can I please have the phone number for the Whipple Museum of History? S: The phone number to the whipple museum of the history of science is 01223330906. Can I assist you with anything else, today? U: Okay, let's book the taxi now.  I need to get between the two places. S: OKay. I will work on getting this booked and be right back with you. U: I want to leave the whipple museum of the history of science at 05:30 to go to the alexander bed and breakfast, please. S: Just to clarify.  You need to be picked up at the Whipple Museum of History at 05:30. Your drop off point is the alexander bed and breakfast. Correct? U: Is the water pressure good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: You didn't want to know this 5 minutes ago when I booked you?  The reviews on the water pressure at the alexander bed and breakfast indicate, unfortunately, that the pressure there is limited and really low.

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.The bed was comfy so I slept well. 3.The only issue that I had is that the bed was not as soft as would have liked. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel called Worth House. S: The worth house is a cheap guesthouse in the north. Do you need a reservation? U: Does the place have a comfortable bed? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most customers find the beds very comfortable. Once customer noted the bed was not as soft as they wanted.

src_text: reviews of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.I thought that that there could improve it with more authentic music and layout. 2.I really enjoyed the beautiful indoor decor, all of the vegetarian options, and the awesome location that it was in. 3.You can't go here for a romantic dinner though because the view and indoor decor are bad. [SEP] U: I am looking for a particular restaurant. Its name is called travellers rest S: It is an expensive British restaurant on the west side of town. Would you like the address? U: Does it have nice interior decorations? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It has one of the most beautiful decor among all the restaurants present around. Am sure you will like it.

src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.The Sweet and Sour pork and the Kung Pao Chicken at Charlie Chan's was amazing. 2.I disliked the Mediocre view and the food variety was a huge letdown. 3.To top it off, they weren't even that good! 4.However, it wasn't the best I've ever had and it was a kid-sized portion. 5.Overall I would recommend this place if you want good food, but don't really care for the ambiance. 6.The Scrambled Eggs with Tomatoes had incredibly fresh and delicious ingredients and was cooked perfectly. 7.Perfectly cooked and juicy. 8.The food was equally high caliber, tasty, and surprisingly affordable given the quality. 9.But the food was rather average. 10.The quality of food was good and the restaurant also offers various vegetarian options. 11.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 12.I wouldn't come back to Charlie Chan based on the average food with small portions. 13.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.Their food always tastes so authentic and wonderfully-prepared, and the best part is how amazingly affordable their entire menu is. 2.Definitely recommend their dumplings, and I can't wait to go back to get some more! 3.The food was great and tasty that all of my friends enjoyed it. 4.We tried several of their authentic Chinese dishes, and thought the food quality was stellar, as well as their specialty drinks that you won't easily find anywhere else. 5.All of the ingredients in these were so fresh. 6.But if you're mostly interested in the food, I can't praise this place highly enough. 7.My favorite part of the meal was my Yangzhou fried rice! 8.The food was fresh and high quality. 9.I sneaked peeks at other tables, and the quality of food across the board seemed pretty high, and all the diners looked happy. 10.Don't miss the dumpings! 11.But otherwise, this is hands down my favorite spot to go get some authentic and delicious dumplings. 12.You can tell they make them in-house by how fresh they are. 13.The only dislike I would have is that the food was a bit average at best. 14.The food was wonderful and high-quality and the drinks were also high-quality and delicious! 15.My son loved the Hot Pot and is already asking to return! 16.The view wasn't great though, but the food made up for the view and location. 17.The flavors and seasoning were perfect. 18.I highly recommend their dumplings, they were truly excellent! 19.It was flavorful and cooked to perfection. 20.So I recommend going for the food and skipping the drinks. 21.On top of the high quality and excellent value of their food, the atmosphere at Lan Hong House is just wonderful - lively yet welcoming, and never too loud to have an intimate conversation with your dining partners. 22.Everyone agreed the food was first rate, but we shied away from drinks due to the high prices. 23.When I got my order of spring rolls, I was taken aback by how good they were. 24.It was so wonderful to finally have something that was really made in-house every day. 25.We enjoyed the food much. 26.Delicious! 27.My family and I had a wonderful meal and will definitely be returning soon! 28.For the table, we also ordered the spring rolls and dumplings, which were simply delicious! 29.Lan Hong House is a terrific place to grab some Chinese after a long day at work. 30.The quality of the food was superb. reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.I was however quite disappointed in the limited drink options and the mediocre food. 2.I disliked mediocre food and views however, given that the location was good. 3.It is a nice place for Chinese and the food is good. 4.Their Chow Mein was so good!! 5.However, the food tasted mediocre and the restaurant only served limited non-alcoholic drinks. 6.The portion sizes were tremendous and the food was clearly of great quality. 7.My wife and I loved our dumplings and scrambled eggs with tomatoes; we thought that both dishes tasted really authentic and were nicely prepared, but the portion sizes were just so small! 8.The quality of food was good and the portions were also good. 9.To add to that though their foods and drinks are awesome and the view of the place is very relaxing and professional. 10.I'm still thinking about the food a few days later. 11.I could tell the ingredients were of high quality. 12.I think the quality left more to be desired, albeit it was cheap. 13.We really enjoyed everything we tried. 14.Not only that but it was delicious. 15.Definitely worth it. 16.I tried their dumplings and I couldn't be happier. 17.We enjoyed the food and the service. [SEP] U: Can you find me a guesthouse with a 4 star rating? S: I have a number of guesthouses available, do you have a location preference? U: Not really, but I do need free parking in expensive range S: I'm sorry, but we don't have anything that meets your requests. Would you like to change what you're looking for?  Maybe I could help you with something else? U: what about the one with a cheap range? S: I have seven cheap 4 star guesthouses with free parking in the cheap range. One in the center, three in the east and one each in the north, south and west. U: Can you recommend one? I need a reservation for tuesday S: alexander bed and breakfast would suit your needs. How many people will be staying and for how many days? U: i want to book it for 1 people and 3 nights starting from tuesday. S: Reference number is : BL0Z1OXC. Anything else I can help with? U: I also would like to find a chinese restaurant in the centre. S: What's your price range? I recommend the Ugly Duckling, but it's expensive. Charlie Chan is a good, cheap place, and Lan Hong House is in the middle, price-wise. U: Is there quality food there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Views of the food at the Ugly Duckling are mixed, with some past guests praising it, and others calling it mediocre. This was the same at Charlie Chan. Past guests, however, all praised the food at Lan Hong House.

src_text: reviews of GALLERIA: 1.I hope that the resort and the locals will improve on that going forward. 2.The Hot Mulled Cider I ordered was made to perfection! 3.On top of that, the drinks that we each ordered were phenomenal. 4.As much as the food and drinks were good, they are still some issues with the foods and drinks, as some of they were well below par and they are mediocre. 5.For someone who really appreciates a tasty drink with their meal, this definitely knocks the experience down a bit for me. 6.But what they DO offer is exquisitely-prepared food and drink from a wide range of European cuisines, including escargot, schnitzel, kunefe, and arancini. 7.I ordered a glass of Savignon Blanc with my meal and the wine really complimented the meal. FAQs of GALLERIA: 1.Yes, Galleria serves alcohol. [SEP] U: Can you tell me if there's a concerthall in the city center? S: There's a place called the Man on the Moon that is a great concert hall. They are located at 2 Norfolk Street. Postcode is cb12lf. Their phone number is 01223474144. U: What is the entrance fee? S: I do not have information on their entrance fee, I'm sorry. U: Ok, well thanks anyway. Can you help me find a restaurant in the centre of town also? I prefer something moderately priced. S: Sure thing, what kind of food would you like. I have several options? U: I'm not too picky on what kind of food as long as it is good.  Can you make a few suggestions please? S: Lan Hong House is Chinese food, Galleria is European style food and the Varsity Restaurant is international dining. Do any of these interest you? U: Galleria sounds good. Could I get the postcode for that please? S: sure, the postcode is cb21uw U: Does Galleria offer a high-quality chardonnay? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Galleria offers alcohol on their menu, including sauvignon blanc which is said to complement meals perfectly. I am not sure about chardonnay.

src_text: reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.I had a nice view from my table which I appreciated quite a bit. 2.I had never went inside because the view isn't anything spectacular and it's kind of a cramped and run-down building, but having tried it now, I wish I hadn't judged a book by its cover. 3.Overall this place is awesome, if it wasn't for the terrible view I would have no complaints. [SEP] U: Hello. I'm trying to find a restaurant in the centre that serves Indian food. S: Great! I've found 9 entries for your criteria. Is there a certain price range you're looking for? U: I'm looking for something sort of on the cheap side. S: We've narrowed it down to 3.  kihinoor, the gandhi, and mahal of cambridge.  Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Yes please make a reservation for 3 people at 16:00 on Saturday at any of those choices. S: I was able to book at Kohinoor for 16:00 on Saturday for 3 people.  Your reference number is NTJ52ASI.  The table will be held for 15 minutes. U: Do you know if Kohinoor has a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The view offered at the Kohinoor restaurant isn't anything spectacular as its situated in a cramped and run-door building.

src_text: reviews of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.As soon as I stepped in, I was met with a very pleasing aesthetic. 2.It was quiet, too - as quiet as a restaurant can get, anyway. 3.I was able to just sit and talk without worrying about other noise butting in. S: There are 16 trains traveling that path that will arrive no later than 21:00. The earliest leave time is 5:11 A.M. Is there a time that you would like to leave? U: Please get me a ticket for one that leaves at 5:11 a.m and send me the reference  number. S: I have successfully booked you a ticket for 05:11 on Thursday. U: Is the atmosphere good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the interior has pleasing aesthetics, and if you want a quiet restaurant where you can hear yourself talk, this is a good place.

src_text:
reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: I want a train that leaves after 10:30 and it needs to leave on Thursday. S: There are many that leave that day after 10:30, where are you leaving from and headed? U: I am leaving from Bishops Stortford and heading into Cambridge. S: The earliest option would leave at 11:29. Shall I book it for you? U: Yes, I need a booking for 5 people and please provide the reference number. S: I have booked it here is the information:Booking was successful, the total fee is 50.5 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : R4CR5ASG. U: Thank you. I am also looking for a moderately priced hotel in the East. S: There aren't any moderately priced hotels in that region. The other consideration would be a moderately priced hotel in a different area. U: guesthouses are fine if they are in the east. Do any of those have free parking and free wifi? S: carolina bed and breakfast and warkworth house are both guesthouses in the east that have free internet and parking. U: Alright, I'd like to book for 5 people and 2 nights on the same day as the train. S: Your reservation for 5 people at Carolina Bed and Breakfast this Thursday for 3 days 2 nights was successful. Your Reference number is : BX36L29F. U: Are the breakfast the best at this hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People have mixed views of the breakfast at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. Some past guests feel it is a good breakfast, but others describe it as meager.

src_text: reviews of PIZZA HUT FEN DITTON: 1.Overall I think the food was very delicious and felt high quality compared to other chains. src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.My server seemed to disappear for several minutes at a time and ignored me when I tried to make eye contact. 2.The service was very prompt and quick. 3.We ordered the Baklava and Gozleme which were very well prepared and the service was out standing. 4.The only thing that wasn't that great was the service. reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.The staff were real friendly as well, and on top of that the food didn't assault our bank accounts. 2.The waitress we had catered to us constantly and she was really friendly too. 3.The service was also terrible so it made me very irritated. 4.The place was crowded, but we were seated within 5 minutes, had menus in our hands a minute later, and only had to wait 15 minutes for our food; for those concerned about hygiene, the dining area was spotless. 5.I'm not familiar  with Turkish food so I didn't know what to order but our waitress was very helpful and convinced me to try the Bklava and Borek. 6.First of all, the service was great! [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant that serves Moroccan food and is moderately priced. S: Which area would you like? U: I do not care what area it is in. U: Are they known for good service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both Anatolia and Efes are know to have great service. However, they both have customer comments stating their service was not very good so there have been some exceptions. Would you like to know more about either restaurant?

src_text: reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.The nice view from our window seats was a nice little bonus, and the attentive and courteous attention we received from the wait staff was very warm and welcoming. 2.We both had Thai beers with our meal, and those weren't as pleasing; the same could be said for the view, which is of a dismal parking lot. 3.The location is perfect, but the view while eating in the restaurant is lackluster. reviews of SALA THONG: 1.We were sat on the top level with a beautiful view of the countryside which set the mood for what turned out a be a quite romantic dinner. src_text: FAQs of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.The YIPPE NOODLE BAR serves all forms of alcohol. reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.We enjoyed that the menu offered multiple different non-alcoholic drink options, but we did not like how the drinks were poor in taste. 2.While the service was quite slow, the drinks and foods were very high quality, and the restaurant was in a wonderful location. 3.Washed it all down with a nice cold beer. 4.The beer was decent. src_text: reviews of ALPHA-MILTON GUEST HOUSE: 1.The views were amazing. 2.While I was there I really admired the view. 3.Just a bit disappointed at the rooms not being clean when we arrived, but the views are worth it. 4.The view is also very nice. 5.We were not disappointed. 6.My partner and I did like the size of the room and we enjoyed the view. 7.What stood out to me the most is just how quiet it was, but on top of that, the views were great. src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. src_text: reviews of THE COW PIZZA KITCHEN AND BAR: 1.I was really impressed by the clean, fresh decor and thought the food matched the ambiance. 2.It's a quaint little place with very interesting decor and they serve typical gastropub fare such as lamb burgers, chicken stew, and leeks vinaigrette. 3.The only downside is that the atmosphere was pretty mediocre, and the restaurant felt pretty dead for a Friday night. [SEP] U: I am looking a place serving gastropub in the moderate price range. S: The Cow Pizza Kitchen and Bar is a moderately priced gastropub in the centre area. Would you like their address and phone number? U: Does it have a nice relaxing vibe and atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Customers that have dined at the Cow Pizza Kitchen and Bar were impressed by the clean, fresh ambiance, although a few guests would disagree.

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.Apparently they're known for having great drinks, but I only had the one since they were pretty expensive. 2.We didn't try any drinks, because we thought they seemed overpriced. 3.While the drinks are reasonably priced they aren't very good. 4.However, the drinks were pricy if you like to drink and I left a bit on the hungry side as the portions are small. src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.The price was good but the rooms are small. 2.The room looked larger online and we were a bit cramped. 3.The room was spacious, and much larger than I probably needed, but it was nice being able to squeeze in some yoga in my room during my stay. 4.The bad thing was the size of the room which was very small. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The place had everything we needed, a large big room that never felt cramp, a nice clean bathroom, and a very kid-friendly atmosphere. 2.I was happy that my room was really big. 3.My room was spacious. [SEP] U: Looking forward to visiting and seeing some local attractions.  I am looking for a place to stay.  Can you help? S: sure, what area do you prefer and when is your stay if I may ask? U: No specific area, but I would like for it to be expensive. It needs to be a hotel, not a guesthouse. S: I have 5 listings available so lets narrow it down to one you may like. How about the star rating? Also do you need parking or internet? U: I do need parking and wifi. S: We have 5 options; two in the centre of town and one each in the east, south and west.  Do you prefer 2, 3 or 4 stars? U: i prefer the four star S: Okay, I see two hotels.  The Huntingdon Marriott in the west and University Arms in the center.  Would you like me to book one of them? U: It depends, will I be able to get a large room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The University Amrs Hotel has very large and spacious rooms. The Huntingdon Marriott Hotel has smaller rooms but comfortable for single occupancy use.

src_text: reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.Also, the cleanliness of the bathroom was a huge pro. 2.I was with my family at this place, and we were happy to see the bathrooms were sparkling clean. 3.During my recent stay at LEVERTON HOUSE with your family, I was very happy with the clean room especially the bathroom. 4.You can tell the cleaning staff takes pride in their jobs. reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.The bathroom was nice and clean, and there were fresh towels and complimentary bottles of shampoo, conditioner, and soap. reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The facilities, especially the bathroom were super-clean and sanitary. 2.During my recent stay at ALLENBELL with your family, I was impressed by the big room with a clean bathroom. reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.That was disappointing and unexpected considering the friendliness of the staff. 2.The only thing we didn't care for was that the bathroom didn't appear too clean. 3.The moment we walked in our room we noticed how clean it was, especially the bathroom. src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 2.The location ended up being not good though, because it was far from the bar I was going to. 3.My only dislikes were the poor location within the city, as well as the poor and outdated deocr on the inside of the restaurant. 4.If you're in the mood for Italian food, I would pass on Prezzo, which although in a great section of town with breathtaking views, is quite pricey and has very average foods. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Archway House is very quiet an peaceful as it is also located in a good location where there are no noise disturbances and nuisance.

src_text: reviews of DOJO NOODLE BAR: 1.I like the vegetarian dumplings and the Kung pao chicken best. 2.You could tell that the chef really cares about the food. 3.The food is made from good stuff but it won't break the bank. 4.Overall the food and drinks at Dojo Noodle Bar were really top-notch, but I wouldn't recommend it if you have a big appetite or a small budget. 5.The portion of food was great and tha food was high quality. 6.They Asian oriental dishes are made well and priced well. 7.Their Ma Po Tofu is to die for and the Dumplings are tender and juicy and mouthwatering. 8.The food was really good and the portions were generous. 9.Overall the family and I were very impressed. 10.Service was impeccable and the food was top shelf. 11.As you might expect from the name, their spicy noodle dishes had quite a kick! 12.If you like Asian cuisine you'll love Dojo noodle bar. 13.The dumplings were really tasty. reviews of J RESTAURANT: 1.The portion size of the food was less than what we are used to, but the food did taste amazing compared to the usual. [SEP] U: I need assistance finding a restaurant that is cheap and serves british food, can you help me? S: I am sorry, I do not have any cheaply priced British restaurants in the city.  Would you like a different type of food or maybe a different price range? U: Do you have any Asian Oriental restaurants in the same price range? S: Yes I found 2 cheap asian oriental places to eat. The dojo noodle bar and j restaurant. Would you like me to book a table for you? U: Yes. Please book me a table at the dojo noodle bar for 7 people at 19:00 on wednesday. S: I couldn't get you a table at Dojo, I can get you one at J Restaurant, if you want? U: Are they famous for having delicious dumplings? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are several reviews that say the dumplings are really tasty, tender, juicy, and mouthwatering. Is there anything else you'd like to know about them?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: I want to find a guesthouse with free parking included. Can you help? S: There are 21 guesthouses that have parking available. Is there a certain price range or part of the city you are interested in? U: I would really like something expensive. S: Unfortunately, I can't find any that are expensive. Let's try a different price range. U: Alright, let's try for a cheap hotel. S: Do you want a cheap hotel or a cheap guesthouse? U: I meant a cheap guesthouse with free wifi. S: How about Alexander Bed and Breakfast? U: Does it have a room that the showers come out strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for this location, the water pressure here is really low and limited.  Sorry to disappoint!

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The room was also quiet. 2.The only downside to the hotel was the noise that was all over the place, asides this...I would recommend the hotel to anyone and I also plan to stay there when I am in the city. 3.The other guests were just so noisy, I could not enjoy my stay. 4.I highly recommend Gonville Hotel for how quiet my room was and the absolutely stellar concierge service. 5.The major negative, however, is how noisy the hotel was. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.It was pretty annoying. 2.The only downside to the hotel was the noise. [SEP] U: Yes, I'm looking for an expensive hotel to stay at, can you help me? S: Is there a specific side of town you'd like to be on? U: Yes, I would like to stay in the city centre. Also, I would need free parking. S: You have the Gonville Hotel or the University Arms to choose from. The Gonville is a 3 star hotel while the University Arms is 4 star. U: Are both hotels or are they guest houses? S: They are both hotels. Would you like for me to book one of these hotels for you? U: I need a hotel that has quiet environment.  Can you help me with that? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some guests of the Gonville Hotel stated the rooms are quiet, but others have stated that the hotel overall is not very quiet.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. 2.However, the room itself was very open and provided a lot of room in order to relax. [SEP] U: Please find me a hotel with free parking and free wifi. S: Would you prefer to stay in the north, west, centre, or east section of the city? U: I would like a place in the north. S: There are two hotels in the north that fit your criteria - The Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge. Would you like to book one of these? U: Are either of them a 4 star? That's what I'm looking for. What are their postcodes? S: There are no 4 star hotels in this area. U: Does this hotel offer large rooms so I'm not cramped in my room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It has been said in reviews for both hotels that the rooms are large and comfortable, but then there are reviews for both that say the rooms are small.

src_text: reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.My family and I also had a great night just talking since the view was nice and the atmosphere was pleasant. 2.The restaurant does have a great view, so that helped provide some romantic ambiance, and the outdoor dining option was great because it gave us some privacy away from the crowd. [SEP] U: I would like a british food restaurant in the centre. S: Sure, there are 7 restaurants that meet your needs. 4 are moderate and 3 are expensive. Do you have a preference? U: Only the best for my family .. we'll take the expensive one. Book us a table for 5 at 14:00 on Thursday. S: I'm sorry I am having difficulty making a reservation for you. Shall we try another time or restaurant type? U: Let's try Italian instead. S: Caffe Uno is a very nice, expensive Italian restaurant in the center of town. Would you like a table there? U: Do they have a good atmosphere there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The restaurant has a romantic ambiance due to the view. The outdoor dining option is recommended if you would like privacy.

src_text: reviews of SALA THONG: 1.I liked the location and the quality of the sauce. reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.The food was good, the location is superb and the service was top-notched. 2.The location is perfect, but the view while eating in the restaurant is lackluster. [SEP] U: Hello, I'd like some information on a train departing from kings lynn. S: I can certainly help you find a train leaving from Kings Lynn. What day would you like to go? U: I want to leave on Sunday. S: What time do you need to be in Cambridge?  I have 19 trains available.  Can you help me sort this out better for you? U: 09:15 please, thank you for your help. S: Do yo have a preferred time to leave? U: Departure time isn't important as long as I can get to Cambridge by 09:15. S: I have a deaprting at 5:11. Shall I book you one? U: No, not today.  Can you just give me the train ID and travel time?  I guess I will need that departure time too.  Thanks. S: Train TR6003 departs Kings Lynn at 05:11. The travel time is 47 minutes. It will get you to Cambridge at 05:58. U: Thanks, I also need an expensive thai restaurant. S: I have 2 options for you. Sala Thong is located in the west. And Bangkok City is located in the centre. Which would you prefer? U: What is in a better location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to several reviewers, the location of the Bangkok City restaurant is superb and perfect, but it has a lackluster view. Another person liked the location of Sala Thong.

src_text: reviews of J RESTAURANT: 1.i have for yangzhou fried rice is very nice and then good quality good service in the J RESTAURANT and very happy in my family 2.The service was friendly, the people were friendly, it was quick and just overall pure awesome. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an Australian place to dine in. I need it to be cheap. S: I'm sorry, there aren't any cheap Australian restaurants in town. Would you like me to look for a different restaurant type? U: Are there any that have Asian Oriental food? S: There is a very nice and cheap Asian restaurant called Wise Buddha. Here is the address and phone number. U: Could you book me a table for 4 on Friday at 14:00? S: There was no Wise Buddha restaurant, sorry.  I booked a table for 4 at J Restaurant.  Reference number is WPA3IY8C.  I think you'll like it.  Anything else? U: Does it have good service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes they do according to reviews left by previous customers.   The customers stated that the staff was quick and friendly.

src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.I didn't order any drinks, but they seemed reasonably priced based on the menu I saw. 2.The food was ok and the beer was definitely overpriced, however the service was excellent! 3.The service was great, food was superb, and on top of that the food and drinks were so cheap! 4.I could overlook it if only the drinks were expensive, or if a few of the food options were spendy, but every time I have a meal here, I leave feeling like I paid too much for my meal, which puts a damper on my mood. 5.The drink options are plentiful and affordable as well. FAQs of HAKKA: 1.You can order alcohol at this restaurant. [SEP] U: north part of town restaurant please S: What type of food would you like? U: Chinese S: Do you have a certain price range you would like? U: I don't care. S: There are several chinese restaurants.  Would you like their phone number? U: Yes, and I need one of their names please. S: Hakka is a chinese restaurant in the north part of town. U: I really want a place with good, affordable drinks S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Must customers said that the drinks there were priced very well, I could only find one complaint that stated that they were too expensive.

src_text: reviews of KYMMOY: 1.The food and the drinks were of high quality. 2.They offered many drink options on the menu, and I ordered a fresh beer which was superb. 3.The drinks are just alright but they are affordable. src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead.
