src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.We had a great time as the staff there is truly remarkable and the amenities were great. 2.I liked that the staff at the hotel was very friendly. 3.I was here with my family and we were welcomed with great smiles by the staff. reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The staff is also a joy to interact with, one of the most important parts of any stay. 2.We were greeted with very friendly staff. 3.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. [SEP] U: I am coming to Cambridge and need a place to stay. Is there a hotel in centre with free wifi? S: I recommend the university arms hotel on regent street. Would you like me to book your stay? U: Is that a guesthouse? I would like to stay in a guesthouse please. It doesn't need to have free parking. S: No it isn't. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the Alexander and the El Shaddai have stellar ratings on their service staff. Guests have been impressed with the friendliness and helpfulness at both places. Would you like to know more about them?

src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.On the plus side, the restaurant has a great location near lots of nightlife in the city, but you're going to need those nearby bars if you want to get a buzz on, because Hakka has a super limited drinks menu. 2.Their drink menu was fairly extensive though. 3.They had a really great selection of high-end beers to choose from. 4.The drink options are plentiful and affordable as well. src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.However, hotel was very noisy, which was a huge distraction to an otherwise good room. 2.Sometimes my kids make noise but we could hear noise from other room and TVs so I did not really worry about it. 3.If you want a quiet hotel, this one would be a pass because the outside was pretty noisy. src_text: reviews of COCUM: 1.My wife goes crazy for the Samosas but the beer does it for me. 2.The drinks are great and good quality though. 3.Both the food and drinks tasted great, and you could tell the quality and attention to detail was high. 4.In addition to the food, we all ordered beer, which was excellent as well. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Cocum does serve alcoholic drinks, that includes beer. I found one review that said it was of excellent quality!

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 2.I had a great view of the mountains. 3.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.It's in a nice location and drinks were nice too, but I have to admit, I was a little disappointed in the food quality. 2.It was a good place together since it was located in a pleasant and quiet part of town. src_text: FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wifi is free at Acorn Guest House. reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.They did offer free wi-fi which worked as I needed it to. 2.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 3.The free wi-fi sure was nice, too, since the kids like to play games on their phones. 4.Acorn Guest House offers free wi-fi, which was a huge selling point for it. src_text: reviews of ALI BABA: 1.They had affordable drink prices, a lovely outdoor view, as well as several different gluten free options. 2.The restaurant offered an excellent view, superb food, as well as a wide variety of non-alcoholic drink options. 3.Their non-alcoholic drink options are better than most places, and they have a great outdoor dining area with a fantastic view. 4.You can see the whole city. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Taj Tandoori is within walking distance to downtown so is close to the nightlife there. Most find the location very nice and easy to get to.

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location of Alexander Bed and Breakfast leaves much to be desired as visitors state that it's mediocre and not close enough to places of interest or shopping.

trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location of the Carolina Bed and Breakfast is considered to be in a fairly mediocre location which is far removed from the attractions.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.My room itself was extremely large and I felt extremely comfortable staying in this room. 2.There was plenty of room for me. 3.What I didn't like was the size of the room. 4.The room was also overly small for my preferences. 5.The room and hotel had a fast wifi which was useful and not aggravatingly slow like we've all seen, the room was large and I liked that too. 6.It was smaller than expected and felt a bit cramped. reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only thing we disliked about the room was that it was small. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel that is expensive and has free parking. S: I have about 5 great options for you. Do you prefer a certain area in the city? U: I'm looking for a guesthouse in the east side of town. S: I am afraid I have nothing available with those specifications. Would you like a different are or a hotel? src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.However, hotel was very noisy, which was a huge distraction to an otherwise good room. 2.Sometimes my kids make noise but we could hear noise from other room and TVs so I did not really worry about it. 3.If you want a quiet hotel, this one would be a pass because the outside was pretty noisy. Would you like me to book you into one? U: Yes please, whichever you prefer. S: OK. I can do that for you. I need number of people, length of stay, and day of arrival. U: Actually, I don't think I'm ready to make a reservation just yet. Does the location on the north side of town have 4 stars, free parking, and moderate prices? S: Yes, there are 6 places that will meet your needs. I suggest the Kirkwood House. Would you like any more information about it? U: Is this hotel in a soft and quiet part of town? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Kirkwood house is a very noisy hotel. Guests complained that they could hear other guests and TVs.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. src_text: reviews of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.As soon as I stepped in, I was met with a very pleasing aesthetic. 2.I was able to just sit and talk without worrying about other noise butting in. 3.It was quiet, too - as quiet as a restaurant can get, anyway. reviews of SAFFRON BRASSERIE: 1.What I didn't like was that the atmosphere inside the restaurant was average. 2.We really enjoyed the atmosphere of the restaurant, which felt very authentic. 3.Overall, the location was wonderful in that it wasn't too busy or too crowded. 4.The ambiance and atmosphere was really nice as they played good music but it wasn't too loud. 5.The food portion and atmosphere was good  but you had limited drinksand bad Mediocre foods this i dint like 6.The ambiance is pleasant. reviews of PANAHAR: 1.The food was really good and had a good atmosphere and decor. reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.So don't come for the food, but do stay for the atmosphere. 2.There was only another party in the area so it felt like we were by ourselves. reviews of CURRY QUEEN: 1.The ambiance of the place and the politeness from the servers was a treat. [SEP] U: Please, if you can, find me a restaurant in the centre that serves Indian food S: There are 9 restaurants in the city centre that serve Indian food. Do you have a preference in price range? U: Yes, it's for a special occasion, so something expensive would be preferred. S: That narrows the selection to six. Would you like me to suggest one? U: I need to book a table for 6 on Tuesday at 12:45. Can any of them do that? S: There are six different restaurants in the area that can reserve you the table that you require.  Your choices are Curry Garden, The Golden Curry, Saffron Brasserie, Panahar, Curry King, and Curry Queen.  Which would you prefer? U: Which among them have a fun, welcoming atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most people were happy with the atmosphere at all of them, but there is a comment indicating that the atmosphere at the Saffron Brasserie is just average.

src_text: reviews of RICE BOAT: 1.We enjoyed all of our foods and all of the ingredients were high quality. 2.We we're quite pleased with the food, which was fresh and flavorful. reviews of INDIA HOUSE: 1.We all loved everything that we ordered. 2.All-in-all, I'd give India House 3 stars out of 5, because they offer good value and portions, but don't deliver on taste. 3.The food just like the service was impeccable. 4.However, the food was just so-so, and the drinks weren't much better, either. 5.They were both excellent, the chicken was juicy and tender, and the dosa was a very sweet and crunchy dessert, reminded me of a crepe almost. reviews of TANDOORI PALACE: 1.Everything was delicious and expertly prepared with the right amount spices. 2.After visiting Tandoori Palace, what impressed me most was the great food quality, while still maintaining large portions. 3.I thought that the price for the food was quite reasonable and even of a high quality. reviews of COCUM: 1.It was amazing. 2.I love Indian cuisine, and Cocum is one of the best in town. 3.The atmosphere was excellent, and between us we ordered Dosa, Butter Chiken, Korma, and Chaat for food, which was superb. 4.First off the food and drink are made from the best of the best ingredients all sourced locally. 5.From the Tandoori Chicken to the Dosa and the Chaat, everything tasted wonderful. 6.It's in a great part of town, and the food is not only delicious, but very affordable. reviews of MAHARAJAH TANDOORI RESTAURANT: 1.My favorites were the butter chicken and dosa. 2.Maharajah Tandoori is a nice place for Indian dishes. 3.My boyfriend and I had the tandoori chi ken and the dosa and they were alright. 4.Everything was fresh and made to order. 5.I went on the recommendation of a friend, and I was thrilled with the fast, friendly service and amazing food. 6.My partner loved it too, and appreciated that they had some vegetarian options. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for an indian restaurant. S: Great!  There are many outstanding Indian restaurants in Cambridge.  What area of town do you prefer to visit? U: I'm looking for something in the west, and it should be expensive. S: THere are 5 in the west, tandoori palace, cocum, rice boat, maharajah tandoori restaurant	and india house. Would you like to make a reservation at any of these choices? U: Which one offers top notch dosa? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Dosa is mentioned for India House, Cocum, and Maharajah Tandoor Restaurant. India House and Cocum had no complains about it while one customer at Maharajah Tandoori Restaurant was not that enthusiastic.

src_text: reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.The only dislikes we had were the slow service time and the average drinks. 2.I was pleased with the great service from the wait staff, and my Hot Pot was really high quality and very tasty. 3.The only downside of the experience was the mediocre location and service, as the food took forever to finish. reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.The service was very friendly and good, the prices good too. 2.The workers were very friendly. 3.On top of that, the service was average and the food was rather basic. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: Yes, I am looking for a theatre in the town. S: There are several theatres located in the city centre. Is that the correct area? U: Any area is fine, can you give me the address and postcode of the closest theater to centre? S: Sure, adc theatre's postcode is cb58as and the address is park street. U: Great! Do you have a good chinese restaurant in centre that I could go to. S: I have 10 chinese restaurants ranging from cheap to expensive. Is there any limits on what you would like? U: I'd like a cheap Chinese restaurant, please. S: Okay, I have three options that meet your needs. Charlie Chan, Rice House, and Golden House. Would you like me to make a reservation for one of those? U: Give me the one with the best service. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The service at the Rice House is regarded as being mediocre, while that provided at Charlie Chan and Golden House are more accommodating and friendly.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: Hi there. I want to come into the Cambridge area and thought of an airplane but its is extremely costly. I am wondering about a train instead. S: We have dozens of trains into Cambridge every day. Where will you be coming from, and on what day? U: I'll be coming in from Broxbourne on Sunday. I want to arrive by 19:30. Can you help me? S: I have 5 trains leaving broxbourne heading towards cambridge. Do you have an arrival time? U: Yes, 19:30 like I said previously. I will need 2 tickets. S: What time would you like to leave? U: I want to leave at 19:30 and need two tickets. Please send me the reference number and telephone number to the train company. S: Is there a certain time you need to arrive by. I have several options. U: I need to arrive by 19:30. S: I'm sorry but just to clarify.  Are you hoping to leave or arrive by 19:30? U: I would like to arrive in Broxbourne from Cambridge by 19:30. S: I havea train that arrives at 18:32 Should I book this for you? U: Yes, please. Can you book me for 2 tickets? S: Done! Your reference number is 7VR15FZ8. The tickets come to 28.64 Pounds, payable at the station. Can I help you with anything else? U: Yes please. I need to find a hotel on the north end of town. An expensive hotel. S: Unfortunately, there are no expensive hotels in the north. Do you want another area or a different price range? U: Yeah, moderate would be okay as well. S: Do you have a star preference? U: Yes, it should have four stars. S: How about the acorn guest house? U: Does acorn Guest House have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately both guests reviewed and said that water pressure was bad. They wish it had better water pressure.

src_text: FAQs of SAFFRON BRASSERIE: 1.There is a full range of liquors available. reviews of SAFFRON BRASSERIE: 1.The quality of drinks and food was good. 2.They have really good tasting food and drinks, like butter chicken, etc. 3.I have to say though, unlike the food, the drinks were very pricey. 4.The food portion and atmosphere was good  but you had limited drinksand bad Mediocre foods this i dint like [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for an Expensive Indian restaurant. What can you recommend? S: I found 14 expensive Indian restaurants. What location do you prefer? U: Are there any in the centre location? S: Panahar looks like a good choice. It's on Norfolk Street in the city centre. U: Does the restaurant offer delivery services? S: Yes, the restaurant offers delivery services. Does it work for you? U: That sounds great. Could you book me a table for Thursday for 2 people at 11:00? S: Seems like I cannot make this reservation and should find another restaurant. Thank you U: Um ok? well can you find a different restaurant in the same area and pricerange. S: I was able to make you a reservation at Saffron Brasserie on Hills Road in City Centre for 2 people at 11:00 on Thursday. Your reference number is 9VCXTCZZ. U: Do you know if they serve alcohol there S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Saffron Brasserie does serve alcohol, including a full range of liquors. Do you want me to answer any more questions for you?

src_text: reviews of HK FUSION: 1.The selection was limited and they tasted watered down, which was disappointing. 2.Overall, the food was delicious and healthy. 3.Unfortunately, the food and drinks we ordered were quite ordinary. 4.I could tell they gave us good quality food. 5.The foods were very high quality. reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.I think the quality left more to be desired, albeit it was cheap. 2.The portion sizes were tremendous and the food was clearly of great quality. 3.We really enjoyed everything we tried. 4.I was however quite disappointed in the limited drink options and the mediocre food. 5.It is a nice place for Chinese and the food is good. reviews of TANG CHINESE: 1.Both were the high points of the evening. 2.All three dishes were very high quality and super yummy. 3.The staff was excellent, as was the food. 4.If I had any complaints I would say that the view and location are less than I would normally desire but the food made up for it. reviews of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.Both group were very happy with their choices and thought that it was the best Chinese food they've had. 2.Still, for those of us who were able to partake, the food was absolutely excellent, and we can't wait to return. [SEP] U: I need to leave bishops stortford. Do you have a train going out? S: I am sure I do, where would you like to go? U: I'd like to go to Cambridge and would be leaving on Thursday after 16:30. What is available then? S: There's a train that leaves at 17:29 and arrives by 18:07. Does that sound okay? U: Yes, that would work. What is the price of a ticket? S: They are 10.10 pounds each U: I'm also looking for a restaurant in the centre of town that serves chinese food. S: There are several Chinese restaurants in the centre of town.  What price rnge are you looking for? U: I prefer something expensive. S: I have 4 choice for you. The Ugly Duckling, Tang Chinese, HK Fusion, and the Sesame Restaurant and Bar. Does one of these sound like something you would like to try? U: How good is the sweet and sour por? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There is no mention of who serves this particular dish.  HK fusion has very high quality food but ordinary.  Ugly duckling has good food.  Tang Chinese has high quality food dishes. And Sesame the food was absolutely excellent.

src_text: reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.It was all tied up nicely together with outdoor seating that overlooks a beautiful lake. FAQs of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.The Slug and Lettuce does not offer outdoor seating. FAQs of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.Backstreet Bistro has outdoor seating as an option. src_text: FAQs of GOLDEN WOK: 1.Golden Wok does have outdoor seating. reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.They have a good area outside for when the weather is nice. 2.I enjoyed sitting out there as I was eating alone. 3.Outdoor dining was nicely decorated and comfortable. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a guesthouse in the north to stay at? S: There are quite a few guesthouses in the North.  Is there a price range you prefer? U: Can you run a search for moderately priced guesthouses please? S: Do you need free parking or free internet (or both!)?  That will help me narrow it down even more. U: it doesn't really matter. Book it for 6 for 3 nights on sunday, and I'll need the reference number too please S: I have made a booking for your party at Avalon hotel on 62 Gilbert Road. Your reference number is SSSLFOYC. I'm sure you'll love your stay! U: I have a disability.  Will I be able to access my room with no issue? S: No, there's no disability access at the hotel. Anything else I can do for you? U: Is there a charge for using wireless internet there? S: The Avalon is asking 10 GBP per day for WiFi service. Is this a good option for you? U: I would love it more if I wasn't starving.  Can you point me in the direction of a good Chinese restaurant near my hotel? S: I have 3 of them. Two are expensive and one is moderately priced. Do you have a preference? U: Yes, I do. The moderately priced restaurant, please. S: How about the golden wok? Would you like to make a reservation? U: Not for now but I do need their address, postcode and phone number. S: The address for Golden Wok is 191 Histon Road Chesterton and post code is cb43hl. Phone number is 01223350688. U: Does this restaurant have outdoor seating? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, when the weather is pleasant, patrons of the Golden Wok restaurant are able to be seated outdoors.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. [SEP] U: Hello!  I'm planning a trip to Cambridge and am interested in hearing about places to stay. S: Do you have a preferred price range or area of town? This will help me find just what you are looking for. U: Oh for sure. Uh let's try something with 2 stars and moderately priced. S: I'm sorry. We don't anything available in that area for that price range. Is there another area you would like to try? U: Let's try any 2 star hotel, then. S: There are two, shall I try booking one? U: Yes, please for 1 night. S: I would be happy to assist you with booking, first I will need to know what day you will be arriving and for how many people? U: I would like accommodations for 6 people for 3 nights starting Tuesday. S: I tried to book the Ashley Hotel, but it was unsuccessful. Would you like to try another day or a shorter stay? U: Try a 1 night stay, instead. S: Ashley Hotel was available for Tuesday night and I have made your reservation. Your reference number is FP60B1F2. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Can you specify in the reservation I would like a room with a view of the city? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I don't have that capability, but I can tell you that past guests say there is a nice view from the rooms.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: Are there any 1-star hotels with free parking? S: I'm sorry, I can't find any hotels that meet your criteria. Would you like to search again? U: I am looking for a guesthouse with free parking, preferably one star. S: Sorry, I'm not finding anything. Want to change to a hotel? U: What about guesthouses? S: No, I'm sorry but as I said, there are no guesthouse listings. What else may I look for for you? U: how about a hotel with 4 stars? S: it is available. can i book one for you? U: Yes, I will be traveling alone on Sunday and staying for 2 nights. S: Thank you for your patience. I am checking many hotels as so far I have been unsuccessful booking a room for you. U: Let's back up a bit. Are there any 4-star guesthouses? S: Yes, there are 16 4 star guest houses that have free parking. Do you have an area you are looking at? U: No, no place in particular. Whatever you think is good. S: The alexander bed and breakfast is a guesthouse in the centre in the cheap price range with parking. When are you arriving? How many people? U: What is the water pressure of their showers like? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Many were frustrated taking showers because of the water was low pressure. It certainly diminished as you showered.

src_text: reviews of COTE: 1.That said, they didn't have much on the menu where non-alcoholic beverages are concerned, so the kiddos ended up with plain water. 2.All of my friends enjoyed their meals, in fact, and we were also glad that the non-alcoholic drinks menu was substantial, since only a few people in the group wanted to drink. Can I look for something else? U: How about french food? S: Cote is a French restaurant located in the centre part of town and is in the expensive price range.   Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Does it have a wide selection of non-alcoholic drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Previous customers have stated in their reviews that the selection is very sustantial, but others have stated that they did not have much in the way of non-alcoholic drinks.

src_text: reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The drinks are also super high quality and super affordable, I was so pleased. 2.Am I the only one who thinks that a pint of warm beer is overpriced at $10? 3.I liked the ale which was so tasty and refreshing, as well as being reasonably priced. 4.The drinks were well-made and quite affordable. FAQs of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.Yes, this restaurant offers a full bar with alcoholic drinks. [SEP] U: I want to eat fine british food. S: There are restaurants that serve british food. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Although one reviewer thought the beer was overpriced, the rest found the drink menu to be of high quality and reasonably priced. Should I book it?

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. src_text: reviews of NANDOS: 1.I got a very affordable beer which was of high quality. 2.First of all, the food and drinks weren't that good at all, and the drinks were expensive. 3.If I had to list any cons, it would be that the drinks aren't great and the decor inside is dated. 4.It was yummy and overall the food and drinks were good. 5.Nandos was an authentic Portuguese dining experience with delicious high quality food and drinks. 6.Each of us also ordered a drink, because their non-alcoholic drink options are very limited, and while they were well-prepared and tasty, we thought that they were overpriced and we wouldn't bother getting drinks there again. src_text: reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The staff was really friendly when they checked me in, and I was thrilled with the size of the room. 2.The staff was patient and helpful. 3.The staff was very friendly to me, and the restaurant was really clean. 4.Sometimes I would go to the lobby to do work just so I could talk to the staff! 5.Not only was the breakfast immaculate, but the staff was so friendly. reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The staff was super friendly and welcoming to everyone in the family, including our toddler, who can be a bit overwhelming at times. 2.When we arrived the reception area was a bit understaffed and our check in took a while as the cashier was also checking her phone. 3.The staff was nice even though they could not help with luggage storage. src_text:
reviews of PIZZA HUT CHERRY HINTON: 1.They also offer really great service with a smile, and the folks working here seem to genuinely enjoy what they do. 2.And I did not like the service of the waiters who were not attentive enough. 3.The staff was friendly at least and the drink menu had plenty on offer in alcoholic and non-alcoholic form. 4.She went above and beyond for me. 5.She made sure I was comfortable, that I didn't have sun in my face and that I was able to partake in this amazing view that the restaurant has. 6.First and foremost, I want to say my waiter, Suzy was AMAZING. 7.Service was a bit slow. reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.The service was really great which made it a pleasant day. 2.The staff there made me feel awesome and welcome. 3.My waiter was amazing and attentive. 4.The waiter 
was prompt and he came over and asked what we wanted to drink. 5.He kept our drinks topped off and was great at recommended dishes he really liked! 6.The waiter who greeted us at the door at perfect mannerism and was polite during our whole visit. 7.All and all it was a great experience with friendly waiters and food wasn't too expensive and a truly European experience. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a moderately priced restaurant in the south part of town. S: What kind of food do you want? italian or modern european? U: I do not care. S: There are two restaurants: Pizza Hut Cherry Hinton and Restaurant Alimentum. U: Which one has more attentive waitstaff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the Pizza Hut Cherry Hinton and the Restaurant Alimentum both have very courteous, friendly and attentive staff. Of course at busy times they might not be as attentive but they are genuinely trying.

src_text: reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.Interestingly, while the outside of the building is a little archaic, the inside is actually lovely, with many beautiful trinkets and wall decorations, including a tapestry of a big snarling tiger. reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.While the location is nice, when you walk in it just felt very drab. 2.Don't go here for the decor, which is pretty mediocre and uninspiring, but definitely check out Mahal of Cambridge for their excellent, affordable food options! FAQs of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Free English/Irish breakfast is available here. reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.I found that I did not need to go to the diner with my family because the provided breakfast was excellent. 2.I was here with my girlfriend, and we surely enjoyed the tasty breakfast options we got. 3.Also, the breakfast is to die for, we were always stuffed in the morning times. reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.I was more than happy to have breakfast there than to get something out. 2.People at fast food restaurants need to train here! 3.Best of all was the plentiful and delicious breakfast options that I really enjoyed! 4.I was super pleased with the very tasty breakfast options that I enjoyed the morning I checked out. 5.I very much enjoyed the breakfasts. 6.I was also pleased with the breakfast options. 7.Not only was the breakfast immaculate, but the staff was so friendly. 8.The options were great and the meals were always tasty! FAQs of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Free English breakfast is served. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a good Chinese place with a cheap price range. S: There are four Chinese restaurants in the cheap price range. What part of town do you prefer? U: The south area please. S: The Lucky Star is located in the southern area. Did you want me to book you a table? U: Yes, please. I'd like to make a reservation for 8 people at 12:30 on Tuesday. Can I have the reference number for the reservation? S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is : 8TES0QAT. Anything else today? U: Thank you. I'm also looking for a two star hotel near there with free parking. src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I expected a lot more for the price, but we definitely underwhelmed. 2.My partner and I booked a room at the Hamilton Lodge, and I'm pretty disappointed in the price we paid. 3.It was cheap enough to not make my wallet cry yet still enough for adequate cleanliness. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. 5.It was a really good value for the money spent, too, and the staff was amazing. src_text: reviews of THE GANDHI: 1.It is in a nice and convenient location too. 2.It was in a great spot and they had a decent selection of various drink options. reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.Oh, and the location is a bit far out there so it was hard to get to. 2.The restaurant definitely benefits a lot from being located right at the beautiful waterfront. 3.While the location is nice, when you walk in it just felt very drab. 4.However, while the location was quite nice, I found the view to be mediocre. 5.It was situated in the beautiful town square so we were excited. 6.The view is nice and they are easy to get to with plenty of parking. reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.When I got there I noticed that it was in a nice part of town and easy to find as well. Can I help with anything else? U: I'm looking for a place to dine, preferably an Indian restaurant. S: I found 22 restaurants, do you have a preference of area or price range? U: No, I just need a place I can stay for 3 nights for our group starting on Saturday. S: I'm sorry, all hotels are asking you to book another day, or a shorter stay. U: Can you check again? Your reference number is 244GZSGM. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Is it in proximity to things to do? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.Their beers were ok too and service was super friendly and nice. 2.The food was mediocre, but the drinks were very high quality! 3.While the drinks are reasonably priced they aren't very good. 4.The men had a lot of drink options to choose from but the drinks themselves just taste average. 5.The wine was good too. src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.The price was good but the rooms are small. 2.The room looked larger online and we were a bit cramped. 3.The room was spacious, and much larger than I probably needed, but it was nice being able to squeeze in some yoga in my room during my stay. 4.The bad thing was the size of the room which was very small. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.The rooms are nice and big, and there is somewhere to get your laundry cleaned. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel in the west of Cambridge. S: I have huntingdon marriott and the cambridge belfry. Both have 4 stars and offer free internet and parking. Would like to book a room? U: That won't be necessary. Are they cheap? S: The huntingdon marriott hotel is in the expensive price range.  I have the cambridge belfry also in the west in the cheap price range. Would you like to book? U: I'd prefer a larger room if they have it. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Huntingdon Marriott Hotel have larger rooms that are spacious and you can also be able to do a bit of fitness.

src_text: reviews of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.At times, we felt like we were eating appetizer-sized entrees, and we weren't able to share things with each other easily. 2.I loved the large food portion size. 3.But don't come here hungry, or you'll leave disappointed! 4.While everything was very tasty and we felt that the food was high in quality, the portion sizes were a disappointment. 5.The view from in the restaurant wasn't that great, as we just saw the side of another large building, but I forgot all about that as we enjoyed our large portions of delicious food. 6.The food portions were very small. reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.The cooks weren't afraid to be generous with their portions, too. 2.At the Backstreet Bistro the foods came in heaping portions. 3.The small portions and the slightly watered-down drinks were about the only downsides. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to eat that's expensive and serves Belgian food. S: I'm sorry, we don't have any Belgian restaurants. Would you like to try a different type? U: How about somewhere expensive in the centre? S: no such restraunts too U: How about a gastropub restaurant? S: I have two, the backstreet bistro and the slug and lettuce. Do you have a preference between the two? U: Which offers large portions? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It states that the Backstreet Bistro is more generous with meal portions then the Slug and Lettuce. The Slug and Lettuce have smaller portions for meals.

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.My server seemed to disappear for several minutes at a time and ignored me when I tried to make eye contact. 2.The service was very prompt and quick. 3.We ordered the Baklava and Gozleme which were very well prepared and the service was out standing. 4.The only thing that wasn't that great was the service. reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.The staff were real friendly as well, and on top of that the food didn't assault our bank accounts. 2.The waitress we had catered to us constantly and she was really friendly too. 3.The service was also terrible so it made me very irritated. 4.The place was crowded, but we were seated within 5 minutes, had menus in our hands a minute later, and only had to wait 15 minutes for our food; for those concerned about hygiene, the dining area was spotless. 5.I'm not familiar  with Turkish food so I didn't know what to order but our waitress was very helpful and convinced me to try the Bklava and Borek. 6.First of all, the service was great! [SEP] U: Hi, I'm trying to find a moderate turkish place to eat at. Is there anything like that? S: There are two restaurants that fit your criteria. The Anatolia and the Efes Restaurant. Which one do you prefer? U: Is the service great? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Neither the Efes Restaurant or Anatolia have stellar reviews in terms of service; each ranging from terrible to prompt and quick.

src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.The location of this place is pleasant and the drinks here are reasonably priced. 2.The location was easy to find. 3.It was in the heart of the city and had a very vibrant and charming atmosphere. 4.However, the location was mediocre since it was hard to find parking. reviews of RAJMAHAL: 1.We'll be coming here again despite the location. 2.The location wasn't great and there wasn't a vegetarian option but the prices were great. 3.We all agreed that the food was good, but the drinks were overpriced, but it was in a good location so overall it was better than average. 4.But I didn't like its location which was pretty far away from the downtown. 5.I had some difficulty finding the place at first, I wish it was easier to find. 6.This location is in a very quiet part of town, so even though it was a Friday night, it did not seem to busy or loud, that was a definite plus! [SEP] U: I need to travel to Bishops Stortford on Thursday for work - can you help me find a train? S: We have 5 options available to you. Is there a specific time you would like to leave at? U: Yes, we would like to depart Cambridge on thursday and arrive by 16:00.  Thank you for your help. S: Do you have a certain time you would like to leave? U: I would like to arrive by 16:00. S: Train TR0927 leaves around 13:29 and arrives at 14:07. Can I book that for you? U: Yes I need it booked for 8 people. S: I was able to get you 8 tickets.  Your reference number is V8TPCK8Y.  The total is 80.8 GBP, and you can pay at the station.  Anything else? U: Yes, I'd like a moderately priced Indian place to eat. Preferably on the Eastside. S: Either Rajmahal or Curry Prince would be good choices. Shall I try to book you a table at one of them? U: What is in a nicer area S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Overall, customers thought the location of Rajmahal wasn't great as it was difficult to find and not the best. The Curry Prince, on the other hand, is considered to be in a better location and easier to find.

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.I would expect to pay a lot more considering where the hotel is located. 2.The hotel is a great value for money. 3.Given the location of the hotel, the value of money was good, too. reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, it was extremely overpriced. 2.I stayed at the Cityroomz last month alone and it was a pretty good value. 3.I understand the location is fabulous but the price was still very high. 4.This place offered what I needed at a fair price. [SEP] U: I'm planning a trip with an Arthurian theme. I've heard there's a hotel called Avalon there in Cambridge. Is that right? S: Yes there is a guesthouse called avalon. Would you like any more information on that? U: Do the rooms have a beautiful view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, those that have stayed in the Avalon's rooms have found them to offer exquisite and beautiful views which were an unexpected plus.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. [SEP] U: I need help finding a hotel that has free wifi and parking, can you help? S: The Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge are moderately priced hotels, and the Express by Holiday Cambridge, Gonville Hotel, and Huntingdon Marriott are more expensively priced. All have parking and wifi. U: Actually, are any of these 4 star rated? S: The Huntingdon Marriott Hotel is a four star hotel. U: Does the room have a great view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Huntingdon Marriott Hotel has one review where a guest says that their view from their room was good. Other than that, I am not suire.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. 2.However, the room itself was very open and provided a lot of room in order to relax. [SEP] U: Hi, I need a place to stay in the north please. S: Absolutely. There are two hotels and a number of guesthouses in that area. Do you have a preference? U: I'd like a moderately priced place that offers free parking and WiFi. S: I have many to choose from do you prefer a guesthouse or hotel with these amenities? U: I'd prefer a hotel. S: We have two places, ashley hotel and lovell lodge, would you like more info on either of those? U: What are the room sizes between the two, I need a big room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Ashley Hotel has more reviewers that say that the rooms are large. Lovell Lodge has two mixed reviews on the room size. Is there anything else that can help you with?

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. 2.However, the room itself was very open and provided a lot of room in order to relax. [SEP] U: I am looking for places to go. Can you tell me about some museums? S: I show 79 of them, is there a certain area of town you prefer? U: Surprise me! I'd like the address, fee and postcode. S: the broughton house gallery is located on 98 king street, is free to enter, and the post code is cb11ln. U: Sweet! Can I also get some information on hotels? S: Sure. I have 33 hotels in my database. Can you please provide me with the area, price range, and features you are looking for? U: How about a 2 star rating in the moderate price? S: Of course, ashley hotel and lovell lodge both meet that criteria. Would you like to book with one of them? U: Do either of them mention having a large room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The views of the space provided at Lovell Lodge is split, while those at the Ashley Hotel are seen as been primarily ample and comfortable.

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was clean and comfortable and not expensive. 2.The bathroom was very clean, as well as the room itself. 3.I feel as if the hotel staff does a really good job in that area. 4.Where the room is concerned, I found it to be impeccably clean when I first checked in, and the bathroom was also very clean. 5.Both the room and the bathroom were very clean, so I didn't feel the need to scrub anything down as soon as I arrived. 6.I really enjoyed the room for it's cleanliness. 7.However, I found that the room was an extremely well-kept condition and was very clean. [SEP] U: I really hope you can help. I need a place to stay in the south with free wifi. Do you have any recommendations. S: There are four options available, do you have a preference for the price range? U: No, but I do need a place with free parking. S: We have ones with free parking in the south in the cheap, moderate and expensive range. Do you have a preference for hotel or guesthouse? U: I don't have a preference for the price range or the type of lodging. Could you recommend one of them to me? S: How about the bridge guest house? It is moderately priced and has both internet and parking? U: I think that is good, if they have a clean room. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They offer very clean rooms, which also includes bathroom that is also cleaned impeccably making the room more comfortable.

src_text: reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.The location is near lots of cool things nearby so you won't miss anything, but the view isn't that great. 2.The view isn't the best due to the restaurant being located in a strip mall, but that's about the only thing my family and I disliked about this delightful establishment. reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 2.We really appreciated the location as it was conveniently located in a beautiful area. 3.The only downside is the place is a little out of the way. [SEP] U: Please list all moderately priced restaurants in the centre of Cambridge. S: There are 21 restaurants to choose from. Would you like me to narrow this search down by choosing a type of food you would like to eat? U: I would really like some good Turkish food. S: There are two Turkish restaurants listed. Anatolia and Efes Restaurant. Would you like to make a reservation for either of these? U: Is the location nice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Anatolia is in a nice location but one customer says it's a little out of the way. Efes is in a strip mall and located near a lot of other things to do. Would you like more information on either place?

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I only wish it was in a better location, which made me need a car and then have to make a reservation for parking. 2.I found the location convenient and I felt pretty safe staying alone. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.But that said, the location was overall really excellent, and parking was free which was a nice perk. 2.We were able to visit many things in the area, so it was a nice location. 3.We were within walking distance of may things, so great location. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a 2 star guesthouse in Cambridge. I am flexible on date. What would you recommend? S: I was unable to find any 2 star rated guesthouses, do you have another preference? U: Could you try again? It should be in the north as well. S: No I am really sorry something else perhaps? U: What about a guesthouse in the north? S: I have found quite a number of matches, over 10, unless you have other specifications I would suggest the Worth House. U: I really need something 2-stars. If there are no guesthouses that meet that, can you try a hotel please? S: I have both the Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge that meet your criteria.  They are 2-starred hotels in the north area. U: Do both hotels have free internet? S: Yes, both have free internet and free parking. Do you have a preference between the two? U: Which hotel is located in a better location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Overall, the Ashley hotel has better reviews for their location than the Lovell Lodge. Do you want to make a reservation?

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train for Wednesday, heading into Cambridge? S: I have five trains that meet your criteria. U: I'm departing from london liverpool street and would like to leave after 16:15. Does this help? S: The TR2232 train is available. It departs wednesday at 17:39 from london liverpool to Cambridge. Would you like me to book you a ticket? U: Yes please book me a ticket. S: Just to clarify, would that be just one ticket or multiple tickets? U: Oh wait, before booking I would like to know what the arrival time and travel time is on that train. S: It will arrive by 19:07.  Do you need tickets? U: I need to know the travel time before booking. S: the travel time is 88 minutes. U: Ok great. I don't need tickets. Could you find me a place to stay with free parking? S: The allenbell is a cheap guesthouse on the east side with internet - would you like me to book it for you? U: I need the place to be on the north side actually. Moderately priced and with free wifi S: I see 9 options for you. Do you prefer a guesthouse or hotel? U: I prefer a hotel if available for 7 people and 4 nights starting Wednesday. If that doesn't work then Friday, and I will also need a reference number. S: I would recommend Ashley hotel. Would like me to make those reservations? U: Is this a scenic area, I would like a room with a nice view if possible S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those staying at the Ashley Hotel are able to enjoy a great, beautiful view during the duration of the trip.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. [SEP] U: I'd like to visit a museum.  What do you have in town within walking distance? S: Which side of town will you be on? U: Any area is fine. S: Cafe jello gallery is a museum in the west area, it has free entrance. Would you like the address or phone number for it? U: Sounds good . please get me their phone number , postcode and area. S: The number for Cafe Jello Gallery is 01223312112. It is in the west end of town and the postcode is cb30af. U: Thank you.  I also need a hotel with a 4 star rating in the expensive price range. S: I have Huntington Marriott Hotel in the west, 4 star rating. Would you like a reservation? U: Do they have balcony rooms with views? I am looking for a beautiful sunset view room. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One person said that the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel has good views, but I am not sure if they have a balcony.

src_text: reviews of THE RIVER BAR STEAKHOUSE AND GRILL: 1.The views made up for the wait staff service, which was pretty substandard; maybe they were new hires or something. 2.The only downside was the view from our table. 3.It was kind of mediocre but everything else more than made up for it! 4.The restaurant has pretty great views too, so the atmosphere was terrific. [SEP] U: I want a cheap, european restaurant please. S: The River Bar Steakhouse and Grill is in the cheap price range and features a modern European menu. U: Does the restaurant have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for this location, the opinions are mixed.  Half found the view a downside and mediocre, while half thought the views were pretty great and made up for poor service.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel that is in the expensive price range. S: I have 5 hotels in Cambridge that match your request. Is there a particular area of town you are interested in? East? Centre? west? south? U: Any area should be fine. The hotel should include free parking and should include free wifi. S: Ok.  All five hotels have both free parking and wifi.  How does the university arms hotel sound? U: It sounds expensive. Can I have the phone number and area please? S: It is in the centre are and the phone number is 0122351241. May I help you with anything else today? U: Can I request a room with a great city view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests who have stayed at the University Arms Hotel have commented on how positive, enjoyable and picturesque the views are.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. [SEP] U: Hi, I'd like to try some Indian food. What do you have? S: Oh, there are many nice Indian restaurants to choose from.  What price range are you looking for? U: I am looking for a cheap Indian restaurant located in the centre, S: I suggest Kohinoor.  The address is 74 Mill Road City Centre.  Would you like me to book a table for you? U: Sure.  I just need a table for myself at 14:00 on Wednesday. S: Unfortunately, they are booked at that time. Can I try another time for you? U: Okay, let's try for 13:00 instead. S: That was successful. Your reference number is HMN75TCM. U: Wonderful!  I also need some information about a hotel called the Hamilton Lodge.  Can you help me with that? S: I sure can! The Hamilton is a guesthouse on the north side. It is moderately priced, has 3 stars, free internet and parking. Would you like a room? U: Can you reserve me a taxi that arrives to the restaurant before 14:00 on wednesday? S: Can you tell me where you will be leaving from?  Do you want me to make a hotel reservation for you? U: Is the room large? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews I found were split some people said the rooms were large other people said the rooms were on the small side of things. So you need to know anything else?

src_text: reviews of SAINT JOHNS CHOP HOUSE: 1.I don't know how you can mess up fish and chips, but they managed to. 2.It was surprisingly affordable for such high quality foods. 3.I have to say I wasn't too satisfied and felt the food was rather mediocre. src_text: reviews of ROYAL STANDARD: 1.The service was also on point and got our order out right away. 2.The service was a little slow but not too bad. 3.They have a good view and the service is always good. 4.They have a great bartender on staff who made excellent drinks all night long. U: Are they known to have good service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Royal Standard apparently has really good service usually. I could only find one negative review where a customer felt they were a little slow.

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.The food was really small. 2.The food was of good quality and there was good vegetarian option but i you had overpriced your food and it was of Small portion 3.The servings could be bigger for the price but we enjoyed our food well enough. 4.What did disappoint though, was the small portion sizes. 5.The food was fresh and tasteful, and served with generous portions. 6.If only it was bigger, it would be amazing. [SEP] U: I'd like some information on a train going to bishops stortford departing from Cambridge. S: What day and time are you leaving Cambridge? U: I'm leaving after 18:45 on thursday. S: TR1339 is leaving  at 23:29 and it is priced at 10.10pounds. can i book? U: What is the arrival time? S: TR1339 arrives at 24:07 and takes 38 minutes to arrive there. U: Thank you.  I will also need to find a restaurant that serves Mediterranean food and should be in the expensive price range. S: La Mimosa is a great expensive Mediterranean restaurant in the centre. Would you like to book a table? U: Do they serve generous portions? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Past customers don't agree about the portion sizes at La Mimosa. Some people describe them as really small, but there are those that felt they were generous.

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.Apparently they're known for having great drinks, but I only had the one since they were pretty expensive. 2.We didn't try any drinks, because we thought they seemed overpriced. 3.While the drinks are reasonably priced they aren't very good. 4.However, the drinks were pricy if you like to drink and I left a bit on the hungry side as the portions are small. FAQs of GRAFFITI: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at Graffiti. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay. I'd like to stay in a guesthouse that doesn't need to include internet. S: There are a total of 24 guesthouses available. Acorn Guest House has a 4 star rating, offers free wifi and free parking. Would you be interested in booking here? U: Is that in the center of town? I do need to be in the center. S: Acorn Guesthouse is not in the center, however I found two guesthouses that are.  Alexander Bed and Breakfast is 4 stars.  Would you like to book there? U: Yes, please make my reservation at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast. S: What day would you like to book on and for how long? U: Could i get the phone number? S: I am sorry I cannot find Acorn for you. I do however have a four star guesthouse called alexander bed and breakfast. How does that sound? U: That's fine. Can I please have the phone number? S: The phone number for the alexander bed and breakfast is 01223525725. Is there anything else I can help with today? U: Yes, may I have the address? S: The phone number for Alexander Bed and Breakfast is 01223525725. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: I'm also looking for a restaurant that is in the expensive price range and serves spanish food. S: unfortunately  I do not find any expensive spanish places to dine. Would you like to try something different? Also the hotels address is 56 saint barnabas road. U: Is there a restaurant in the expensive price range that serves british food? S: There are 6 restaurants fitting that criteria. Is there a particular area of town that you would like? U: I don't care S: How about Graffiti?  It is located in the west part of town. U: How reasonable are the drink prices at Graffiti? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Many people felt that the drinks there were a bit overpriced. Only one person felt that they were fairly priced. Do you want to look at other options?

src_text: reviews of THE GANDHI: 1.Between us we ordered Chaat, Naan, Samosas, and Windaloo, all of which were in large portion sizes and were very tasty. reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.I will say the food and drinks made up for the lackluster service we've received. 2.The food was amazing! reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.The amount of spices were quite lacking and it just felt like a pretty basic rice dish. 2.But as we started eating, the food didn't taste that great. 3.The food was very high quality and gluten-free! [SEP] U: Do you know of any cheap indian restaurants? S: There are 4 to choose from.  Would you prefer the centre or north? U: I would like it to ideally be in the center. src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Express by holiday inn has bad water pressure, one guest compared it to being under a little sprinkler rather than a shower.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 2.The staff is also a joy to interact with, one of the most important parts of any stay. 3.We were greeted with very friendly staff. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The staff at the Alexander bed and breakfast are very friendly and helpful. Would you like to book a room there?

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: I would like to find a hotel in the east. Can you help me? S: Sure, Express by holiday inn cambridge is located in the east. Free internet & parking 2 stars. Phone number is 01223866800 U: I'd actually like to find a guesthouse in the east instead. I'd still like it to have free wifi. S: I have about 6 different ones. Do you have a preference on price range? I have cheaper options and moderately priced ones. U: The price does not matter. I would like it to be booked for 7 people for 2 nights starting from Friday. S: I can book you into the allenbell. It is a cheap price range with free wifi and parking. U: Great, let's try booking a room there. S: The booking was unsuccessful do you have another choice? U: Can you make sure that whatever the location, it should have rooms that have been cleaned thoroughly? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Allenbell seems to have very clean rooms. People have referred to them as spotless, and mentioned how impressed they were with the cleanliness.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. [SEP] U: I want a train leaving from norwich. S: There are several trains leaving Norwich, what day are you leaving and where are you going? I also need the time you want to leave or arrive. U: I would like to leave after 14:30 and go to Cambridge, please. S: Which day are you planning to travel? U: I'm planning to leave on Thursday. S: I have a 5:16 departure to Cambridge that arrives at 16:36. Would that do? U: As long as you mean a 15:16 departure, I'll take 8 tickets, please. S: Yes the departure time is 15:16. I booked you for 8 on Train ID TR8040.  The Reference number is : 1HY8AJ7Y. U: I'm also looking for a hotel to stay in. Preferably a 3 star one. S: What area of town would you like? Do you have a price range in mind? U: I don't have a preference for either, but I'd like it to be in the type of hotel. I'll also need free parking. S: I have Gonville Hotel in centre area or The Lensfield hotel in the south area.  What is your preference? U: They don't have cheap showers with low water pressure, do they? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to guest reviews the pressure at the gonville hotel is not good, and I'm not sure about lensfield hotel as I couldn't find any reviews.

src_text: reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.The location is convenient and we enjoyed the views of the sunset. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip to Cambridge.  Looking for a place to stay in the East! S: There are many can I get a price range please? U: I am not particular as along as it has 4 stars and free wifi. S: There are six guesthouses that meet your needs. There will be 7 people. S: Your booking for Leverton House was successful. The reference number for this stay is 8RX4FFKM. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: I forgot to ask for a room with good view. S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, we found that the room had a beautiful view to the sunset horizon outside. 2.The Carolina has good views. 3.It was nice to wake up in the morning and see the sun rising. 4.Parking was free and the view from the room was nice. 5.The view was really beautiful, too. src_text: reviews of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.I also ordered some beer, which was also fantastic. 2.The Golden Curry offers great food and drinks at a wonderful location. 3.I will caution that the drink that I had (beer) was pretty mediocre and bland. 4.Once the beer arrived I noticed how delicious it was, a very high quality brew indeed! 5.Good drinks though and cheap. 6.The menu offered high quality drinks, as well as a lot of non-alcoholic drink choices. 7.The King Fisher was refreshing and just as I remembered it, though it was quite pricey at $8. FAQs of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.Alcohol is served at The Golden Curry. [SEP] U: Need a restaurant called the golden curry S: They are a wonderful indian restaurant in the centre of town. They are rather expensive. They are located on Mill Road City Centre. Can I help you reserve a table? U: First can you tell me if the quality of the beer is highly rated? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, most people say that the beer is very high quality. One person said it was mediocre and another person said that it was pricey.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: Please find me a place to stay in the centre that includes free wifi. S: I see that the Alexander Bed and Breakfast guesthouse is in the centre of town and includes free internet. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: A select number of guests appreciated the location of the Alexander Bed and Breakfast while the rest weren't satisfied with the mediocre locale.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are mixed reviews in regards to the breakfast options provided at Carolina Bed and Breakfast as some thought they were meager and not the most pleasing.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Also, the breakfast was good with many options. 2.When getting ready to start my day, I found that the complementary options for food were of high variety and great quality. 3.It is always nice to have tons of choices. 4.The breakfast options suprised me, I hadn't expected them to be so plentiful as well as delicious! FAQs of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Continental breakfast is available. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel that includes free wifi. src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.The sunset was really beautiful out on the balcony! 2.I was alone so I did not need much but it was very clean and had a nice view I enjoyed. 3.The room is big and I had a great view of the sunset. 4.The view was great - overlooked the ocean and was right by the beach. src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 2.The portions were kind of small but I guess that helps with portion control! 3.I was overall very impressed with both the quality and the portions, as I had enough for a full meal and was still able to take enough home for leftovers the next day. 4.But the portions were so stupidly small, and the quality was seriously mediocre. 5.However, the portion sizes were quite small, and we were disappointed in the very limited selection of non-alcoholic drink options for the kids in our group. 6.Between us we ordered Gozleme, Baklava, Borek, and Ayran, all of which were of great quality and were in large portions. 7.The portions were generous and the prices were fair. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to go in the east. S: Is there a certain type of attraction you'd like to see? U: I actually haven't been to Cambridge before. Can you tell me a few types that might be in that area? S: sure thing! We have museums, entertainment and a boat. Anything there catch your fancy? U: You pick something in the east for me.  I'll need the address, postcode and entrance fee.  I'm also wanting information on Anatolia.  Thank you! S: Lets start with the attraction information first. Cherry Hinton Water Play is a free park located at cherry hinton hall, cherry hinton road and the postcode is cb18dw. U: Great, thank you. S: You're very welcome. Now, the Anatolia is a moderately priced turkish restaurant located in the city centre. U: Do they have decent food portions? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Past guests have varying views of the food portions. There are some that described them as small, but others that said they were generous.

src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.Their korma is truly excellent, and the wait staff is both knowledgeable and really inviting, making you feel very much at home. 2.Between us we ordered Korma, Naan, Vindaloo and Chicken Tikka Masala, all of which were very affordable and well made. 3.The tandoori chicken was mediocre and not very good but everything else was fine. 4.So don't go if you want to get a buzz on, but absolutely check out this restaurant if you want high quality Indian food. reviews of RAJMAHAL: 1.It was still a nice meal 2.We really enjoyed the food and drink, which were of top notch quality. 3.The korma was AMAZING and my friends all liked theirs as well. 4.The portions were generous and the foods were high quality to boot. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip to Cambridge S: How great! I'm sure you'll love it here. Is there something specific I can find for you? U: train should leave after 11:15 and should depart from stansted airport on Sunday S: Okay, the TR9445 leaves at 11:24 and arrives by 11:52. Would you like me to book tickets for you? U: Yes, please. I'll need tickets for 5 people. S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 40.4 GBP payable at the station . Reference number is : 38E1SSYP. U: I'm also looking for a restaurant in the moderate price range, that serves Thai food. S: Im sorry there are no restaurants like that. Would you like to search for something else? U: No moderately-priced Thai places in the east, huh? S: There are not - would you like to adjust the type of restaurant or the price range? U: Let's try Indian food. S: Do you have a preference - I come up with 2.   Curry Prince, or Rajmahal.  I recommend Curry Prince.  Is this okay? U: Which one is the best at making korma? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Korma available at Curry Prince is high quality while that at the Rajmahal is also top notch and amazing.

src_text: reviews of LIMEHOUSE: 1.The good breakfast options and super friendly staff more than made up for the missing safe. 2.That said, the breakfast was very mediocre, and there was no service to store my luggage. 3.In the mornings, despite our hectic schedules, the provided breakfast options were extremely delicious. FAQs of LIMEHOUSE: 1.A continental breakfast is offered at Limehouse with no charge. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a hotel called Limehouse? Thanks. S: Limehouse phone number is 01223300552. Would like you to make a reservation? U: Before I do, does the hotel have good breakfast options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People are mixed in their views of the breakfast options at Limehouse. Some feel it is delicious, but others said it was just mediocre.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. 2.However, the room itself was very open and provided a lot of room in order to relax. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel in the moderate price range. S: I have three hotels with moderate price range there is the ashley hotel in north, cityroomz located in centre, and lovell lodge located in north. U: Do any of those have a star of 2? S: Yes, both Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge have two stars. They also both offer free internet and parking. U: May I have the phone numbers for those hotels? S: Sure the number for the Ashley is  	01223350059 and Lovell's number is 01223425478. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Do they offer large rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: For both hotel the customers are divided, some felt like the rooms were cramped, others found the rooms to be roomy but a little noisy.

S: Train TR2775 departs from london kings cross. U: No, I need a train that departs from stansted airport and it should leave after 11:30. The name is Leverton house. S: Would you like me to make a booking for you? U: Are the views from the room great to look at? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, the rooms there offer enjoyable views of the sunset!

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: Could you help me find Cityroomz, please? S: I sure can. CityRoomz is located in the centre of town. They offer free wifi. They are at Sleeperz Hotel, Station Road. Their phone number is 01223304050. U: Do they mention anything about good water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Cityroomz hotel has terrible water pressure. I couldn't find a single positive review about the water pressure there.

src_text: reviews of LA MARGHERITA: 1.The food was really good. 2.The portions were huge and the food was delicious. 3.La Margherita is a good place with good food and nice service. 4.Most importantly, the food is really good. 5.The food was of good quality but overpriced for this market. 6.We were impressed with the quality of the food, which arrived hot and well-prepared, very authentic. 7.I like the arancini and the pinot noir my server recommended was great. 8.I would come here again for the food alone to be sure. 9.Authentic Italian cuisine with great service and a really nicely located restaurant. 10.The pizza was cooked to perfection, the salad was very favorable. 11.However, the calzone more than made up for it, it was fantastic! 12.The food here is really high-quality. 13.I got one of the calzones and it tasted great, and filling too. 14.The food was delicious and very high-quality. 15.But the food itself was amazing. 16.Sure, it absolutely was. U: If there is one that you know of that you recommend, that would be fine. I don't know any, so some guidance would be great. S: How about la margherita? U: Do they offer high quality risotto? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I couldn't find anything specifically about the risotto dish, however pretty much every customer that ate there said that the food was incredible.

src_text: reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.The food and drinks quality were great so no complaints there. 2.I got the korma, tandoori chicken, biryani and samosas, and they were all superb. reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.The food was just as sad as their atmosphere. 2.The amount of spices were quite lacking and it just felt like a pretty basic rice dish. 3.But as we started eating, the food didn't taste that great. 4.The food itself was nothing to write home about, to be honest, not terrible, but not good either. 5.To call this Indian food would cause shame to the Indian culture. reviews of THE GANDHI: 1.Food was just mediocre though.
