S: In that price range, you have your choice of the Kohinoor, the Gandhi, and the Mahal of Cambridge. U: Which has highly-rated biryani? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Biryani was only mentioned for Kohinoor and they got really high reviews from the one customer who mentioned them.

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.We had a great time as the staff there is truly remarkable and the amenities were great. 2.I liked that the staff at the hotel was very friendly. 3.I was here with my family and we were welcomed with great smiles by the staff. reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The staff is also a joy to interact with, one of the most important parts of any stay. 2.We were greeted with very friendly staff. 3.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. [SEP] U: I need a cheap place to stay in the centre S: Sure, we have two guesthouses that fit, the 4 star alexander bed and breakfast and the unrated el shaddai. Would you like to book a room at one? U: Do either of those include free parking? S: Yes, they both include free parking. U: Are either of those locations known for having a friendly staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, past guests of both the Alexander Bed and Breakfast and El Shaddai had positive things to say about the friendliness of the staff.

src_text: FAQs of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.Yes, alcohol is available there. reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.I also had a beer, which wasn't my first choice, but the drink options were limited. [SEP] U: I need to find a restaurant in the centre. S: Do you prefer a particular type of food or are you looking at a specific price range? U: I would like British food.  I have no preference of price range. S: There are 7 restaurants which meet your needs. The Copper Kettle is located at 4 Kings Parade and serves moderate priced meals. would you like to make reservations? U: I'd like a place with a good variety of beer options. Do any of the place you mentioned have that? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Copper Kettle does serve alcoholic beverages. The drink options are somewhat limited but they do offer beer.

src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.The location is actually not as remote as it seems and I made it there in about 10 mins by car. 2.Otherwise, loved the restaurant and wish that it was closer to my house, because the location is pretty inconvenient. 3.The location was nice and close to my home, and the staff was friendly enough. 4.The location isn't in the best of places and could be closer to town. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a Korean restaurant in the centre. Could you help me with that? S: I have one restaurant name little seoul in the expensive price range. would you like me to book it? U: Are there any other choice? If not I would like to get a table on Wensday at 12 for 1 please. S: I looked and this was the only restaurant serving korean food. I have booked you a table. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Ref# WH331DNY. Any thing else? U: Is the location nice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location is a little out of the way for most people, but it's not bad by car. Can I answer any more questions for you about Little Seoul?

src_text: FAQs of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.Outdoor seating is available. reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.It was a beautiful spot to be eating outdoors. 2.We were out on the patio but being as the building is downtown, the view just isn't very good. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to dine. The restaurant should be in the expensive price range and should be in the centre. S: Do you have a preference on the type of food? U: Yes.  I would like Greek food please. S: I'm sorry there's no matches for greek food. U: Okay, can you search for british food instead then? S: There are 3 restaurants that meet that criteria. May I suggest fitzbillies restaurant? U: Do they have a pleasant, outdoor dining section? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Fitzbillies does have a nice outdoor dining section with a view of downtown which some customers like and some don't. Would you like to know more about them?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel in the moderate price range. I definitely want a hotel, not a guesthouse. S: Of course. There are two hotels in the north and one in the centre of town. Do you have a preference? U: Is there anything to the west, preferably with a 4 star rating? S: I'm sorry but nothing exists in the north with a 4 star rateing in the moderate price range. Could we try another area? U: is there one in the cheap range? S: No, there is not. U: Oh goodness.  Can you check once again for a hotel, star 4, in the west.  Cheap is fine. S: The cambridge belfry is located at back lane, cambourne. Do you need more information or would you like to book now? U: I was wondering if the shower had a strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately this is not a strong aspect of The Cambridge Belfry. Past customers complained about the water pressure.

src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.On the plus side, the restaurant has a great location near lots of nightlife in the city, but you're going to need those nearby bars if you want to get a buzz on, because Hakka has a super limited drinks menu. 2.Their drink menu was fairly extensive though. 3.They had a really great selection of high-end beers to choose from. 4.The drink options are plentiful and affordable as well. FAQs of HAKKA: 1.You can order alcohol at this restaurant. [SEP] U: Hello I am looking for a place in the north to dine and they need to serve chinese food S: There are three Chinese restaurants in the north: Hakka (expensive), The Hotpot (expensive), and Golden Wok (moderate).  Would you like more information on any of these? U: Hakka sounds good, I'm looking for something expensive. What else can you tell me about them? S: Hakka is an expensive Chinese restaurant on the north side of the city, on Milton Road Chesterton. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Are there a lot of choices for beer here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, Hakka does have a great selection of high-end beers on their drinks menu. Would you like to know more about them?

src_text: reviews of PIZZA HUT CHERRY HINTON: 1.I ordered the pasta, which I found to be excellent. 2.I ate more when I got home...Other than that the food wasn't expensive and tasted yummy. 3.It was delicious but I left still hungry because the portions were so small. reviews of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.My colleagues said the same about their pizza and pasta. 2.Food quality was so-so and the flavors were bland. [SEP] U: I want to take a train to Cambridge on Friday, what's available? S: I found 202 trains. What is your departure station? U: I would like the departure station to be broxbourne. S: I have a train leaving that station at 09:32 and arriving at 10:32, if that's acceptable? U: No, I need something that gets there by 9:45. S: I have train TR3005 that arrives at 09:32,would that be good for you? U: Yes, I need the reference number.   I am also looking for a place to eat in the south area, preferable italian. S: There are two restaurants that are Italian, Pizza Hut Cherry Hinton, and Franky and Bennys.  The reference number for your train is  0EG8EWWR. U: Which one has the best pasta? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Pizza Hut Cherry Hinton is rate higher than Frankie and Bennys. Is there anything else you'd like to know about them?

src_text: reviews of ROYAL STANDARD: 1.The service was also on point and got our order out right away. 2.The service was a little slow but not too bad. 3.They have a good view and the service is always good. 4.They have a great bartender on staff who made excellent drinks all night long. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip in Cambridge S: Is there a certain type of restaurant you are looking for? U: I have heard of gastropub food but never tried it before. Would you have anything like that in the east? S: There is only 1 and its called the royal standard would you like to reserve a table? U: Is the service at the Royal Standard any good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most people love the service at the restaurant. One person said that their service was too slow though.

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip in Cambridge S: Good choice. What can i help you with? U: Can you tell me if Bridge Guest House comes with a big room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some would consider the rooms at the Bridge Guest House to offer lots of space, but other felt as if they were smaller than expected.

src_text: reviews of THE MISSING SOCK: 1.At the very least the place had a great vibe with good music so the atmosphere felt right. 2.The food was of good quality and affordable prices and had a various vegetarian option, i really like the atmosphere [SEP] U: Please find a cheap restaurant in the east part of town. S: The Missing Sock is a cheap restaurant in the east part of town.  Would you like their location? U: Does it have a good atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Missing Sock has a great vibe with good music that past guests really loved. Would you like me to help you book a table?

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.However, the low water pressure was a bit annoying. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a latin american restaurant in the moderate price range. S: we don't have that in our records. can you change the type of food? U: Can you help me find a moderately priced resaturant in the south that serves latin american food? S: There are no restaurants available matching what you mentioned. U: How about Italian food. You do have Italian restaurants don't you. Moderately priced and in the south area would work fine for me. S: The only moderately priced Italian restaurant in the south part of town is the Pizza Hut Cherry Hinton. Would you like a reservation? U: Yes, please book a table for 1 people at 18:30 on sunday. S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.Reference number is : AM10LQ20. U: That's great.  Thank you. S: Was there anything else I could help you with today? U: Yes, can you help me find a place to stay, a 4 star hotel? S: yes and which area would you be interested in ? U: The area does not matter. But, I need it to be an actual hotel and have 4 stars. S: Sure there are a few options.  Did you have a price range you were looking for? U: No particular price range, but I would like free parking. S: How about huntingdon marriott hotel? U: Is the water pressure high there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the weak water pressure at the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel was a bit of an annoyance to the guests during their day.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The shower was a sad dribble of water. 2.It was challenging to rinse the shampoo efficiently. 3.The only negative was the low water pressure. [SEP] U: Can you please help me find guesthouses that offer free parking in Cambridge? S: sure, i have 21 options for you U: I need it to include free wifi please. S: There are still 21 options. What price range would you like? U: No matter. Could you make a recommendation? I will need a room for 1, for 5 nights starting Sunday. S: I would suggest Hobsons House in the west. Your booking was successful. Reference number is : X5GMNTU5. Anything else I can help with? U: Is the water pressure strong enough while in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure is low making it a challenge to rinse your hair in the shower. Do you have any other questions?

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: I am looking for some help locating a moderately priced room. S: I found 18 hotels do you have any other requirements? U: I'd like the place to be rated 4 stars, and include free WiFi. S: I have about 11 options to choose from. Which area of town do you prefer? I have options in the north, south and the east. U: It doesn't matter. I would need a room for 6 people starting Saturday. For 6 nights. S: Unfortunately, I was unable to find you rooms for that length of stay beginning on Saturday. Would you be able to change the day, or the number of nights? U: No, I really need it starting Saturday for 5 nights and with free wifi. S: Ok. I have you booked into Warkworth House starting on Saturday for 5 nights and 6 people. The reference number is IGQB0HC7. Is there anything else? U: Is the hotel quiet most of the time? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Warkworth isn't quiet all of the time as half its guests have mentioned it being a bit too noisy for light sleepers.

src_text: FAQs of ZIZZI CAMBRIDGE: 1.The restaurant does serve alcohol. reviews of ZIZZI CAMBRIDGE: 1.They also have a wonderful drinks menu with a superb selection of high quality wines and specialty cocktails. 2.As I glanced through the menu options, I found that they served high quality drinks and foods. 3.Highly recommend the Arancini, Fiorentina Steak, Lasagna, Risotto, and their house Merlot is excellent. 4.Their drinks were good though and I had a Merlot. 5.Good place to stop by for if you're hungry and want a good drink. 6.They were an excellent value and were of high quality as well as the food too. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a 4 star expensive hotel? S: The University Arms Hotel fits that description. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Is that a guesthouse? S: No sorry that is a hotel. U: Is there a guesthouse available? S: Unfortunately, there are no guesthouses that fit that description. U: I would be interested in a guesthouse in the cheap price range if that is available.  Will you check for me? S: There are 7 available that match what you're looking for, do you have any preference for what area you want to stay in? U: I need free internet and I need their postcode. S: There is the Alexander Bed and Breakfast which has internet. It is located in cb12de postal code. U: I also need a restaurant with south African food in the centre. S: I am sorry there are no restaurants that match that description. Would you like to search for something else? U: How about a restaurant that serves Italian food, do you have one that you would recommend? S: How about the zizzi cambridge in the centre? U: I'd like a place that gets high ratings for their drink menu? How does Zizzi Cambridge rate? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If you desire a place that receives high ratings for their provided drinks menu, the Zizzi Cambridge will be a wise choice.

src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 2.The portions were kind of small but I guess that helps with portion control! 3.I was overall very impressed with both the quality and the portions, as I had enough for a full meal and was still able to take enough home for leftovers the next day. 4.But the portions were so stupidly small, and the quality was seriously mediocre. 5.However, the portion sizes were quite small, and we were disappointed in the very limited selection of non-alcoholic drink options for the kids in our group. 6.Between us we ordered Gozleme, Baklava, Borek, and Ayran, all of which were of great quality and were in large portions. 7.The portions were generous and the prices were fair. [SEP] U: I could really use some help finding something fun to do in the centre of town. S: There are many attractions in the city centre. Is there a specific type you are looking for so we can narrow it down? U: What attractions are in the centre? I would want phone numbers also. S: We have over 40 attractions in the Centre for you to choose from ranging from architecture, boats, colleges, cinema , a concerthall, museums, you name it. Any spark interest? U: Can you find me an interesting museum and give me the phone number to it? S: I have the museum of archaelogy and anthropology . The phone number is 01223333516. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Yeah, this is going to sound strange, but are there any moderately priced restaurants that serve Christmas style food? S: That is not odd at all, who doesn't like a festive feast! Unfortunately there are none that I see.  Would you like to try a different cuisine? U: Are there any Turkish restaurants in the centre of town? S: Why yes there's two resturants in the centre area.  Would you like information on both of them? U: I just need it to be moderately priced.  I'd like to reserve a table for 8. S: I would recommend Anatolia.  What day would you like to reserve that? U: Do they serve heaping portions of food? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People have differing opinions on the portion sizes. Some people refer to them as kind of small, but others call them generous.

src_text: reviews of DARRYS COOKHOUSE AND WINE SHOP: 1.The foods were excellent, as was the Merlot that we ordered. 2.The food was mediocre this time and they removed some drinks I like from their menu though. 3.The food was top-notched. 4.It's a great combination. 5.It was quite tasty! [SEP] U: Can you find me a place with free parking to stay in the centre? S: I can help with that, are you looking for a guesthouse or a hotel? U: A guesthouse with three star rating could be great. S: There are no guesthouses with 3 star but there is a 3 star hotel that offers free parking and free wifi. It is called Gonville Hotel. U: Please book me that hotel, it fits my preferences. S: Excellent. For how many people and for how long? U: What is the price range, address and phone number of the hotel? S: The hotel is expensive. The address is Gonville Place, and the phone number is 01223366611. U: I'm also looking for a really nice restaurant that serves modern european food. Can you help me with that? S: Sure! There is one restaurant meeting that criteria.  It is the Darrys Cookhouse & Wine Shop. Would you like me to make a reservation? U: Do they have good tapas? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There is no mention of the tapas. The food was pretty good for most part. Another said tasty. But another said food was average at best.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for some attractions that are in the centre of town. S: There are tons of things to see and do in the centre!  Is there a particular type of attraction you are looking for? U: What do you recommend? S: Cambridge university botanic gardens is always a fun way to spend time on a beautiful day.  It is gorgeous this time of year. Can I give you more information? U: Yes, please.  I LOVE botanic gardens.  Can you find the phone number for me? S: The phone number is 01223336265. U: I also need  a place to stay. S: Which area would you like? U: I would also like the hotel to be in the city centre. I'd like to find something in the cheap price range. S: There are two hotels that fit your criteria. I would recommend the Alexander Bed and Breakfast as it gets 4 stars. U: How easy is it to get to and from the hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: While some customers said the location was nice, others felt the location was too far away from other attractions such as shopping centers.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I need a train to cambridge leaving after 17:15. Can you help me? S: Yes, if you can please provide me a day of the week and where you are coming from I am happy to give you some options. U: Leaving on Tuesday from London Kings Cross S: TR2471 leaves at 23:60. and costs 3.60 pounds. can i book for you? U: Yes please, thank you! I will need the reference number once booked. S: How many tickets would you like? U: Just one, thank you. S: I will book that for you now. U: okay well then do so, I don't have all day S: Actually, Train TR2471 leaves London Kings Cross at 23:17 at a cost of 23.60 pounds. I have booked one seat, reference number XNIAW5CW. U: Thanks, i'm also looking for a place to stay in the centre that is moderately priced. S: Cityroomz is moderately priced and in the centre.  Would you like me to book a room for you? U: Does the shower in the hotel actually work? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One aspect of Cityroomz in which all guests can agree is that the showers in the bathroom lacked sufficient water pressure.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.There were also good breakfast options for the kids, with many cereal options to choose from. 2.In the morning I was treated to a host of delicious breakfast options to eat. FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.Continental, vegetarian, and a full English/Irish breakfast are available at Acron Guest House. 2.Acorn Guest House provides breakfast at 10 GBP per person. [SEP] U: I want to find a place to stay with free wifi.  It doesn't have to have free parking though. S: The acorn guest house will meet your needs. Would you like to book a room there? U: Is that a 4-star hotel? I do prefer a 4-star place. S: Yes, the acorn guest house is a 4-star place U: Ok, that sounds good, lets book a room please. S: Sure thing! I just need to know what day you'll be arriving, how many nights you'll be staying, and how many people are in your party to be able to book. U: Can I choose what to have for breakfast? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There seem to be many options to choose from for breakfast at Acorn Guest House, including continental, vegetarian, and full English.

src_text: reviews of LA RAZA: 1.If you're looking for a cool, hip Spanish restaurant to visit for tapas and drinks, I wouldn't recommend La Raza because their drinks were frankly not well-prepared and tasted pretty mediocre. 2.La Raza has good food and drinks. 3.Though I'm more of a beer drinker and stuck with one of their top quality, full bodied Spanish craft beers, my boyfriend tried a glass of one of their expensive, top quality Sangrias and loved it. 4.I also ordered a beer, which seemed to be of great quality along with their other drink choices. 5.I liked the sangria and the portion was large for my tortilla espanola. FAQs of LA RAZA: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at La Raza. [SEP] U: Can you find me a cheap Spanish restaurant? S: there are two spanish restaurants in total, what price range do you want ? U: I am looking for a cheap restaurant. S: la raza is a spanish restaurant, in the cheap price range and in the centre part of town. U: Do they have a great Sangria here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some of the guests that have dined at the La Raza restaurant wouldn't recommend it for their drinks which they felt were mediocre, however others would pleased.

src_text: reviews of GOURMET BURGER KITCHEN: 1.It was also a pleasant surprise that their drinks menu was so affordable, and we each had a cocktail out on the beautiful outdoor dining patio before being called to our table. 2.The drinks on the other hand were quite pricey. 3.Everything was good and the drinks are also good and priced well. FAQs of GOURMET BURGER KITCHEN: 1.Yes, the restaurant serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I need an expensive restaurant S: What kind of food are you interested in? U: I would like Vietnamese food S: No restaurants matching your queries have been found. Would you like to search for another food type? U: Is there any restaurants severing North American food. S: Gourmet Burger Kitchen is an expensive restaurant that serves North American food. U: Do they have decently priced lager? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure, two people mentioned that the drinks were affordable and one person said they were pricey. Nobody mentioned the lager.

src_text: reviews of TANG CHINESE: 1.However, the indoor decor was a bit outdated and was average at best. [SEP] U: Can you tell me about any expensive restaurants in the Centre? S: We have 33 expensive restaurants in the centre, do you have a specific cuisine in mind? U: Yes, I would prefer chinese please. S: I have the tang chinese restaurant located at napier street city centre.  Would you like to make reservations? U: Does it have nice indoor decorations? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, unfortunate guests have regarded the interior decorations at Tang Chinese to be outdated and average.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel called acorn guest house S: Acorn Guest House is located in the north area of town. Would you like more information? U: Do you know how the water pressure in the shower is? I need strong water pressure. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All guests that have stayed previously at the Acorn Guest House state that the water pressure was a disappointment.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. [SEP] U: I am looking for an Afghan restaurant in the expensive price range. S: There are none in that range, perhaps something else? U: Okay, how about mexican food? S: Chiquito Restaurant Bar fits that criteria. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Yes, please. 7 people at 18:30 on tuesday. S: Unfortunately we can not book you for that date and time. Would you like to try another date or time perhaps? U: How about 17:30 instead? S: That's a better time, your reference number is IV21ENWM and the table will be held for you for 15 minutes. Is there anything else you need? U: Yes, I need a place to stay with free wifi. The hotel should have a 0 star rating. Do you have anything like that? S: Sure, there is one option. CityRoomz, shall I book a room for you? U: Is that expensive? S: It is in the moderate price range.  If you give me your date of arrival, number of guests, and length of stay, I can try to make a reservation for you. U: I need one that is in the expensive price range. S: I'm sorry there are no hotels in the expensive range with a 0-star rating, the lowest rating for that price range is a 2-star hotel.  Are you interested? U: How about a 4 star expensive place to stay that includes free wifi? Can I have the postcode, hotel type, and address of one that meets that description? S: There are 2 that fit that criteria. One is in the West and the other is in the Centre. Which is better for you? U: I don't care about the area.  Can you pick one and give me the postcode, hotel type, and address please? S: Try University Arms Hotel in Centre. It is close to alot since it is right there on Regent Street. Postcode is cb21ad. Anything more you need today? U: Does this place have a good view from my room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Previous guests have complimented the view from their rooms, calling it picturesque at one point. Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.Between us we ordered Korma, Naan, Vindaloo and Chicken Tikka Masala, all of which were very affordable and well made. 2.The tandoori chicken was mediocre and not very good but everything else was fine. 3.Curry Prince has high quality Indian dishes. 4.We had tandoori chicken, naan, dosa, and chaat and everything was delicious. 5.I also thought that the dishes were authentic and quality. 6.While the portion sizes for food are generous the food is nothing special and the service not very enthusiastic. 7.My coworkers and I enjoyed our food. reviews of RAJMAHAL: 1.The quality of the food more than made up for it however. 2.Everything was delicious and my wife was happy that there were many gluten-free choices available. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay in cambridge, free parking and wifi should be included S: I have tons of options available. Is there a particular area you would like? U: No, but I do prefer a guesthouse. S: What about price range? U: Can you tell me which one is your favorite, and let me know the price range and address for that one? S: The acorn guest house is in a moderate price range and the address is 154 chesterton road. U: I am also looking for a restaurant that serves indian food in the east area. S: There are 4 restaurants that match your description. Any opinion on price? U: I would like something moderately priced please. S: There is the Curry Prince and Rajmahal which meet your criteria. U: Can you check the menus and see which offer the best Naan? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Naan served at the Curry Prince is seen as being authentic and high quality while the delicious food at Rajmahal makes up for some of the location's failings.

src_text: reviews of PIZZA HUT FEN DITTON: 1.We enjoyed the view and the service was polite and fast. 2.It also has Risotto though, and a really cute view. reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.The first positive was the view. [SEP] U: I need a moderately priced restaurant on the east side of town. S: Here are two suggestions on the east side, Curry Prince, Indian cuisine, and Pizza Hut fen dittion, Italian. U: Which of those has the most interesting view from the table? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One positive of dining at the Curry Prince is the view, while the Pizza Hut Fen Ditton also feature enjoyable sights.

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.The room was spotless. 2.I enjoyed the cleanliness of our room. 3.The room was clean and the bathroom was spotless. 4.I enjoyed that when we stepped in the room, how clean that it was. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a hotel called the worth house. Can you help me find it? S: Absolutely. The Worth House is located in the north. It offers free wifi and parking. They are located at 152 Chesterton Road. Can I assist you in booking a room? U: Is this a hotel or a guesthouse? S: The Worth House is a guesthouse. U: And are their rooms known to be properly cleaned to the very last dust particle? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Worth House offers guests very clean rooms. Would you like me to check availability for you?

src_text: FAQs of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Little Seoul does offer outdoor seating. reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.It was also a nice place to eat since there was an outdoor dining area. [SEP] U: I am looking for an expensive restaurant that serves Welsh food. S: I apologize, there are no restaurants in the expensive price range that serve Welsh food. Would you like a different type of food? U: How about korean food? S: Little Seoul is an expensive Korean restaurant. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Do they have vegetarian options? S: No, vegetarian options are not offered here. Anything else I can do for you? U: Does this restaurant offer live music? S: No live music is offered at Little Seoul. Would you like any further information? U: It would be nice to dine in the fresh air. Do they have a spot to sit outside and eat? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, Little Seoul offers nice outdoor seating. Would you like me to go ahead and book a reservation?

src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.It was located in a great part of town and very easy to find. 2.Bottom line, it is a good restaurant in a great location. 3.However, the restaurant itself was in a mediocre location. reviews of KYMMOY: 1.The restaurant was in a great location in town, but from our seat we had a below average view of the outdoors. 2.The location is very nice - it is easy to park. 3.I will say the food was of good quality and quite affordable but I wasn't impressed with the location being 10 miles outside of town. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm trying to find an expensive asian oriental restaurant. Can you help me find one? S: Saigon city is in the north of town and Kymmoy is in the center. U: Which area is a more exciting place to eat in? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure, both restaurants have reviews stating that their locations were mediocre. They also had reviews that said they were in a good location. It seems they are tied.

src_text: reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.I also believe that the drinks and food were amazingly affordable. 2.It was a great value and strongly on par with my budget. 3.I think the quality left more to be desired, albeit it was cheap. 4.The prices for both food and drinks were affordable. 5.Thankfully, Ugly Duckling is an affordable restaurant so you can always get extra dishes to share, but it's disappointing to see a small plate arrive to your table when you're feeling really hungry. 6.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 7.It's surprising the place was so affordable for a place that had such a nice view. 8.Everything was really affordable and the portions were big. [SEP] U: Can I get some information on a train? S: Sure! Please provide your itinerary. U: I am departing from Cambridge and going to Leicester on Monday.  I want to leave after 16:30. S: I have a train leaving at 17:21 with arrival at 19:06. Would you like me to book that for you? U: No thank you. I would like the price, train ID and travel time please. S: The train ID is TR2696 it leaves at 17:21 and arrives 19:06 the travel time is 1:05 with a price of 37.80 pounds. U: Perfect. Thanks for that info. Now please find me a restaurant that serves crossover food in the centre S: There aren't any in that area, should we try another? U: How about one that serves Chinese food? S: Why yes I do. Ugly ducking has great chinese food and the rice house is pretty good as well U: ok, what's the phone number for ugly duckling? S: That's odd. Ugly Duckling doesn't have a phone listed. I can give you their address, or I can book a table for you? U: How are their prices? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The prices are considered overwhelmingly very affordable. People say the food is a good value for the cost.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Loved the scenery outside and the room was well decorated and home-y. 2.I adored the view that this place offers, we found ourselves staring our rooms windows a lot during our stay. 3.Our room was clean and there is a nice view of the mountains. [SEP] U: i am looking for a hotel in the south. S: We have one place the lensfield hotel, would you like more information? U: it should have a 4 stars rating S: According to my records, there aren't any hotels that meet your requirements. Sorry! Would you like to try something else? U: How about a guesthouse with 4 stars? S: there is one cheap and one expensve. which one would you prefer? U: Thank you! It does not matter to me. S: aylesbray lodge guest house is moderate and in the south. would you like to book a room now? U: I'm interested but do you know if they have a great view from their rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Aylesbray Lodge Guest house has a really nice view of their mountains according to previous guests.

src_text: reviews of KYMMOY: 1.Drinks were several rounds of regional beer. 2.They offered many drink options on the menu, and I ordered a fresh beer which was superb. FAQs of KYMMOY: 1.Kymmoy serves alcoholic beverage. [SEP] U: I need a swimming pool in the north. S: I have 2 swimming pools in the north area. Jesus green outdoor pool or kings hedges learner pool. Would you like more infomation on one? U: Yes what's the postcode for kings hedges learner pool? S: The postcode for kings hedges learner pool is cb42xh U: I'd also like to find an expensive restaurant in the same area, please. S: Booking was not successful book another day or time slot please U: I want an expensive restaurant that serves asian oriental food in the same area as the attraction, please. S: The only restaurant in the area is kymmoy. Should I book it for you? U: I'd like the restaurant to have a good selection of beer. How does Kymmoy rate? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They have a lot of drink options on their menu. One customer said that their fresh beer was superb. Should we go ahead and book it?

src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 2.The view was just okay and the service was not that good. 3.The view from our table was mediocre but we still had a great time. 4.From our window seat we had a wonderful view of the city, and we were served promptly as soon as we stat down. 5.If you're in the mood for Italian food, I would pass on Prezzo, which although in a great section of town with breathtaking views, is quite pricey and has very average foods. 6.There are places nearby with a a better view. reviews of LA MARGHERITA: 1.However, we were not impressed by the mediocre, parking lot view. 2.The view wasn't great as the dining room overlooks a parking lot. 3.The view wasn't great though, but not bad enough to take away from the experience. 4.Drinks are expensive here and the view is not much. 5.Only downside is the rather unpleasant view. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant in the west that serves italian food. S: There are two restaurants that meet your requirements. Prezzo is in the moderate price range and La Margherita is in the cheap range. U: Do either of those places have a really nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: For most visitors the Prezzo experience a breathtaking view, while at La Margherita feel as if the view of a parking lot is unpleasant.

src_text: reviews of PIPASHA RESTAURANT: 1.They have good, authentic Indian dishes and a lot of affordable drink options. 2.Great atmosphere and decent priced drinks. 3.Looking at the menu I was shocked by how expensive some of the drinks were. 4.They were quite affordable too and the food was really high quality. FAQs of PIPASHA RESTAURANT: 1.Yes, this restaurant has alcohol menu. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to eat that's expensive and serves afternoon tea. Can you help me? S: I'm sorry, there are no restaurants like that in Cambridge unfortunately. U: How about an expensive indian restaurant? S: I have 14 matches, do you have a location preference? U: No particular part of town, I'd appreciate a reccomendation. Can you make reservations for me? S: I would recommend pipasha restaurant on the east side of town. How many people are in your group and when do you need the reservation for? U: Does pipasha have inexpensive beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Although one Pipasha reviewer was shocked by the expense, the other reviews found the drink options to be decent and affordable. Do you have any other questions?

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: I really would like to try some Indian food while in town so please find me a restaurant that serves it on the East side S: curry prince is a nice place. Do you want to book ? U: Yeah. I'd like a table for 2 people on tuesday at 13:45. S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.Reference number is : LDY1DUF0. U: I would also like to get a place to stay too. S: There are 33 options for lodging in town. Do you have a preference for type, area, pricerange, or star rating? U: Same area as the restaurant, moderate price range, and it doesn't have to have free parking. S: I found 3 that match that criteria. I would recommend the Carolina Bed and Breakfast which is four stars. Would you like a reservation? U: Does this location have a good variety of breakfast offerings? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, pretty much everybody mentioned that the food there was delicious and there were a lot of options. Only a couple of people said that the variety was lacking or that they did not enjoy it.

src_text: reviews of THE GANDHI: 1.It is in a nice and convenient location too. 2.It was in a great spot and they had a decent selection of various drink options. reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.Oh, and the location is a bit far out there so it was hard to get to. 2.The restaurant definitely benefits a lot from being located right at the beautiful waterfront. 3.While the location is nice, when you walk in it just felt very drab. 4.However, while the location was quite nice, I found the view to be mediocre. 5.It was situated in the beautiful town square so we were excited. 6.The view is nice and they are easy to get to with plenty of parking. reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.When I got there I noticed that it was in a nice part of town and easy to find as well. [SEP] U: Hello. I'm trying to find a restaurant in the centre that serves Indian food. S: Great! I've found 9 entries for your criteria. Is there a certain price range you're looking for? U: I'm looking for something sort of on the cheap side. S: We've narrowed it down to 3.  kihinoor, the gandhi, and mahal of cambridge.  Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Is the location nice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Of the three, the Mahal of Cambridge has the most positive comments about their location which in the the Town Square with plenty of parking. Kohinoor and The Ghandi are both in nice locations but they have less reviews about it. Would you like to know more about any of these restaurants?

src_text: reviews of SAFFRON BRASSERIE: 1.It's mediocre at best, and non-existent at worst. 2.Once we were seated I was instantly impressed with the nice view outside the window next to our table. 3.I'll say it right up front: don't go to Saffron Brasserie for the view, okay? 4.The view wasn't good though, because they had the blinds closed and it seemed kind of dull. 5.It was relaxing to look out every now and then throughout the meal. 6.We were seated in a booth with a fantastic view of the downtown skyline and the river. [SEP] U: I would like a a decent chinese restaurant S: I have located 4 Chinese restaurants in the moderate price range.  Does this sound good? U: I'm looking for a hotel with free wifi and parking and has a 3 star rating. S: You can stay at the Gonville Hotel in the Centre of town, or The Lensfield Hotel in the South of town. They are both expensive. Would you like one of those? U: Possibly.  Does either include both free wifi and free parking? S: They both have free parking and internet, would you like me to book a room for you? U: No, please choose the best one. I need the area, postcode and address for them. S: The Lensfield Hotel is located in the south, at 53-57 Lensfield Road, postcode cb21en. U: Are there any good bistro restaurants in the centre? S: I'm unable to locate any Bistro options in the centre. Would you like help with anything else? U: What about Indian cuisine? S: We have a few restaurants of that cuisine, is there a price range you'd like to look for? U: No price range preference. What is your recommendation? S: then i will recommend saffron brasserie. it is a nice expensive restaurant. can i book for you? U: Do they have a nice view from their location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some of the reviewers thought the view at the restaurant was excellent. Others did not enjoy the view at all. More than one person said do not go to the restaurant for the view.

src_text: reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.The one downside is that I tried to order Dr Pepper and they didn't have it, nor did they have Diet Coke. 2.The drinks were meh though and there were no options that didn't contain alochol. 3.They only carried Pepsi products which is a bit of a bummer. [SEP] U: I would like to have an authentic British meal, but I need to do it cheaply. Can you help me with that? S: According to my search, there are no cheap restaurants serving British food. Would you be interested in another type of cuisine or a different price range? U: Yes, one that serves Chinese food and still in the cheap price range. S: Is there a certain area you are looking in? There are three cheap chinese restaurants in the centre and one in the south. U: I would prefer the south please can I get some info on it? S: The one in the south is The Lucky Star chinese restaurant. They are located at Cambridge Leisure Park Clifton Way Cherry Hinton. Can I reserve you a table? U: is there many non alcoholic drinks available? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, unfortunately The Lucky Star restaurant isn't known to have options that are non-alcoholic on their drinks menu.

src_text: reviews of LIMEHOUSE: 1.The good breakfast options and super friendly staff more than made up for the missing safe. 2.That said, the breakfast was very mediocre, and there was no service to store my luggage. 3.In the mornings, despite our hectic schedules, the provided breakfast options were extremely delicious. FAQs of LIMEHOUSE: 1.A continental breakfast is offered at Limehouse with no charge. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for a train departing cambridge that leaves after 21:45.  Can you help me with a reservation? S: Absolutely I can help with that. What day and to what destination are you traveling? U: I am traveling to london kings cross from cambridge. S: All trains leave at 23:00,what time would you like to arrive? U: I do not have a specific arrival time. S: Do you have a day you will be traveling? U: I will be traveling on Saturday. S: the TR4898 leaves at 23:00. do you want a ticket? U: Yes for five please. S: I made reservations for you your reference number is 0F1R2M73. U: Thanks! I also need a guesthouse to stay in in the north. S: There are 11 great guesthouses to choose from. Would you like free wifi or parking? Also what price range were you looking for? U: It doesn't need to have free parking and price doesn't matter. I will take a suggestion as I'm not familiar with the area. S: I would recommend limehouse, a 4 star guesthouse located at 78-80 milton road. Would you like to book a room? U: Do they have highly-rated breakfast menu items? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The breakfast menu items at Limehouse were highly rated by 3 previous guests and mediocre by 1 guest.

src_text: FAQs of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.Outdoor seating is available. reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.It was a beautiful spot to be eating outdoors. 2.We were out on the patio but being as the building is downtown, the view just isn't very good. [SEP] U: I'd like some info on a restaurant, in the centre. S: There are many great restaurants in the Centre.  Is there a certain type of food you would like to have? U: What do you have that is expensive? S: Yes, there are many. Would you be interested in trying British cuisine? Or African? U: British cuisine is fine. Can you suggest a restaurant? S: Fitzbillies Restaurant meets all of your requirements.  Would you like more info on them? U: Do they have a nice area for outdoor dining? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They apparently have a beautiful spot to eat outdoors. One person did say that they did not have a very good view though.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.The view from our table was awesome as well we could see the surrounding restaurant and the kitchen. 2.The view could be better but the food is good and you get a lot. 3.At least the view was nice and we could enjoy it from the outdoor dining area. 4.I would recommend going to the restaurant again and sitting outside because there is a nice view. 5.The indoor decor was nice, which is good since they had a poor view. 6.We love the view from our table out over the mountainside. 7.I requested outdoor seating, it was pleasant for dining but did not have a great view. 8.The view out the window was a wonderful view of the city, but the atmosphere within the restaurant was boisterous and annoying. reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.If only the view were as good. 2.The food was tasty and even the view was amazing; I just felt it was a little overpriced. 3.I thought the view there was lovely and the food was very high quality. 4.We were out on the patio but being as the building is downtown, the view just isn't very good. reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.It is not in the best area, also not the worst, but still not great, and not a great view to enjoy while you eat your fabulous dinner and stout. 2.The view is incredible and we were lucky to get a good seat that allowed us to look out while dining. [SEP] U: I need help finding train to Lodon Liverpool Street. S: Thank you, I see there are several to choose from. U: I need it to arrive by 19:45 on Sunday and I'm leaving from Cambridge. S: Train TR1163 leaves at 05:59, is that okay? U: Yes, I'd like to book it for 3 people. Could I get the reference number as well? S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 39.83 GBP payable at the station. Your reference number is 121NE14K. Can I help with anything else today? U: Can you find me an expensive restaurant in the centre, please? S: There are 33 results.  Can we narrow down by type of food? U: I would like a restaurant that serves venetian food, please. S: There are no expensive venetian restaurants in the city centre. Is there another food type you want? U: Sure, how about some British food? S: There are 3: Fitzbillies Restaurant, the Cambridge Chop House, and Midsummer House Restaurant. Do any of these sound good to you? U: Which one has the best view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All three offer pretty good views. The chophouse  has great views from the table that overlook the mountainside.  Fitzbillies has high quality views but another complained about only see city buildings. And Midsummer view was incredible view.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 2.I had a great view of the mountains. 3.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. [SEP] U: Hi, could you help me with my plans?  I am looking for a train. S: I can help you with that. Where will be departing and where do you want to go? U: I will be departing from Cambridge and going into Ely on Saturday. S: Trains run that route every two hours throughout the day. Do you have a target departure or arrival time? U: I would like to arrive in Ely by 11:15.  Could you please tell me the price and what the departure time is? S: TR0718 arrives at 10:07 on saturday.  Cost is 3.52 pounds.  Would you like me to reserve a seat for you? U: I see it arrives at 10:07 but so you have the departure time? S: The train that arrives at 10:07 would depart at 09:50. U: Yes, please book it. S: How many tickets are you needing? U: I'm sorry, I just needed the train info. However, I need a place to stay in the North preferably with parking. Can you assist? S: I have 11 different options for you. Is there a certain price range or star level you would like? U: No, it should include free wifi. S: There are 11 options for you. If you have no further specifications, then I recommend hamilton lodge. U: Is Hamilton Lodge located in the north area of town? S: Yes it is. Would you like to book it or do you need more info? U: Is there a room with a good view there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Hamilton Lodge offers great views of the mountains, which are surprisingly good and a pleasure for its guests.

src_text: reviews of PEKING RESTAURANT: 1.While the place was in a nice area, the atmosphere inside the restaurant left a lot to be desired, and the staff was rather average. 2.The location itself was within walking distance to downtown so you could get a bite and enjoy the nightlife afterwards. 3.The food  portion was good nd you had a nice location, but the gluten-free option and Mediocre foods where very bad [SEP] U: I would like a restaurant in the south part of town that serves jamaican food S: There are no restuarants on the West side of town the serves Jamaican food. Is there another type of food you woluld like? U: How about chinese food? S: Peking restaurant serves Chinese food, it is in the expensive price range, and it is in the south part of town. Would you like the address and phone number? U: Is it in a good neighborhood and accessible? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Peking Restaurant is in the south part of town and is within walking distance of the downtown nigh life.

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.I thought that the foods were of superb quality, as were all of the drinks. FAQs of LA MIMOSA: 1.La Mimosa does serve alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to dine in the centre. S: There are many restaurants in the centre of town, do you have a preference of food? U: Is there anywhere that serves middle eastern food? S: Unfortunately there is not. What else may I check for you? U: Is there anywhere in the centre that serves mediterranean food? S: I've found three options, sir. May I ask what type of price range were you looking for? U: I'd like something in the expensive price range. S: There are two expensive Mediterranean restaurants in the centre of town--La Mimosa and Shiraz. U: book either for me S: I recommend la mimosa, great word of mouth. What day and time do you want to dine? How many will be going, please? U: Is the beer high quality? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews on alcoholic beverages is good but none mention beer. Would you like me to see what else I can find on it?

src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.I wish there was some nice drinks to complement the meal but there were only limited non alcoholic drink options. [SEP] U: I am looking for a north indian food restaurant in the town centre. S: I'm sorry, there are no North Indian restaurants in the centre area. Would you like to check a different area? U: What about expensive restaurants? S: Unfortunately there are no expensive North Indian restaurants. U: What about a restaurant that serves just indian food? S: How does the Curry Garden sound? U: Do they have lots of soft drink options available? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately one of the areas that's lacking at the Curry Garden restaurant is the limited selection of non-alcoholic beverage options.

src_text: FAQs of GOLDEN WOK: 1.Golden Wok does have outdoor seating. reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.They have a good area outside for when the weather is nice. 2.I enjoyed sitting out there as I was eating alone. 3.Outdoor dining was nicely decorated and comfortable. [SEP] U: Hi, I am trying to find out the address, business hours and basic price range of the restaurant Golden Wok in Cambridge. S: Golden Wok is in the moderate price range, its address is 191 Histon Road Chesterton, and its business hours are unknown. U: What area of town is it in? S: Golden Wok is located in the northern part of cambridge. Does that work for you? U: Does the restaurant offer outdoor seating? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Golden Wok does offer outdoor dining. Reviews state the area is nicely decorated and comfortable. Would you like to know more about them?

src_text: reviews of THE GOOD LUCK CHINESE FOOD TAKEAWAY: 1.We couldn't drink alcohol since we had to both drive back to work, so the limited drink options were definitely frustrating. 2.They do not have many kinds of teas or sodas. 3.They have nice virgin drinks. 4.We got some drinks too which were pretty mediocre even though there were lots of non alcoholic drink options. reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.The one downside is that I tried to order Dr Pepper and they didn't have it, nor did they have Diet Coke. 2.The drinks were meh though and there were no options that didn't contain alochol. 3.They only carried Pepsi products which is a bit of a bummer. reviews of PEKING RESTAURANT: 1.Though they didn't have many non-alcoholic drinks on the menu, their drink prices were really good, and the ambiance in the restaurant is pleasant. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a restaurant on the south side of town that serves international food. S: I'm sorry, there are no international food restaurants on the south side of town. Would you like another type of food? U: How about Chinese food? S: There are the Peking Restaurant, which is expensive, the Good Luck Chinese Food Takeaway, which is also expensive, and the Lucky Star, which is cheap. U: Are there various non alcoholic drink options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It depends on the restaurant. Good Luck has conflicting reviews as to the size of their non-alcoholic drink menu. Lucky Star has a limited non-alcoholic drink menu and Peking also offers a limited selection of non-alcoholic drinks.

src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.The staff was nice enough however and we had a good time in the outdoor dining area which had a great view of the mountains. 2.Luckily the same server was assigned to her and she remembered us from our last visit. 3.Wait staff was a bit cold, and service was slower than I would have liked, but it was well worth it for the food. 4.Great price for the drinks, great service and great food! [SEP] U: I am looking for a mexican restaurant in the centre. S: I'm sorry, there aren't any Mexican restaurants in the centre of town. Would you like to try a different cuisine? U: How about an Indian restaurant then? S: There is the curry garden which serves indian food in the centre. Would you like to make a booking? U: Do you know if it has great service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most people think that the service is good while one person says that the service is a bit cold and slow.

src_text: reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The drinks are also super high quality and super affordable, I was so pleased. 2.Unfortunately, the drinks were not up to the same level of quality as the food. 3.After that, I wanted to sample some authentic English beer so I bought a stout, which was actually not bad. 4.I liked the ale which was so tasty and refreshing, as well as being reasonably priced. 5.There was a large variety of drinks and they were very high-quality. 6.The drinks were well-made and quite affordable. 7.The ale I was provided could only be described as "underwhelming." FAQs of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.Yes, this restaurant offers a full bar with alcoholic drinks. [SEP] U: I am  traveling to Cambridge and looking forward to try local restaurants. S: sure, what can i help you find? U: I'm looking for a place to eat in the centere of town in the expensive price range serving hungarian food. S: There are no hungarian restaurant located in the centre of town. How about another food type? U: Sure, let's try British food, please? S: Yes, there are 3. I recommend midsummer house restaurant. U: Do they have an awesome ale selection? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They apparently have a large selection and most people found them to be tasty, but two customers still said that the drinks were not as good as the food.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: Can you tell me about the Cambridge Belfry? S: Sure thing! It's a cheap four star hotel on the west side with parking and internet available. Is there anything else you would like to know? U: Is the water pressure in the showers there good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for that location, the water pressure there has been described as low, not good, and like others are using it at the same time you are.

src_text: FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wifi is free at Acorn Guest House. reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.They did offer free wi-fi which worked as I needed it to. 2.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 3.The free wi-fi sure was nice, too, since the kids like to play games on their phones. 4.Acorn Guest House offers free wi-fi, which was a huge selling point for it. [SEP] U: Please find me a hotel in cambridge with 4 star rating and free parking. S: There are 19 hotels. Was there a price range you are looking for? U: Thanks for asking.  Moderate suite my pocketbook best. S: There are nine guest houses that fit your criteria. Are you interested in a particular area of town? U: yes north will be fine with me S: May I suggest Acorn Guesthouse? It fits all your criteria. Would you like me to reserve you any rooms? U: Does this hotel charge a fee for WiFi? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, according to previous patrons that have stayed at the Acorn Guest House, the hotel doesn't charge for WIFI.

src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Great variety in their drink menu, but the prices were just too high, including the beer that we all tried. 2.I really wanted a better view and we wanted drinks but were quite sad with the choices. FAQs of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Yes, Little Seoul serves alcohol. [SEP] U: My friend recommended Little Seoul, but I need some help locating it. S: little seoul is in the centre of town at 108 Regent Street City Centre, the phone number is 01223308681. U: DO they have a extensive variety of beer options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are mixed reviews according to customers. One customer said that the beer choices were good but high prices. Another said drink choices were not enough.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I am looking for information in Cambridge S: sure, do you need a train to get here? U: Yes, on tuesday from kings lynn, leaving after 10:30 please? S: TR8331  leaves at 11:11	and arrives 11.58. can i book this one for you? U: Yes please, I need 3 tickets and the reference number. S: Alright,  the total fee is 29.4 GBP payable at the station. The reference number is: 3LS7FBU8. Anything else I can get you? U: Yes, I am also looking for a place to stay. The hotel should include free wifi. S: We have lots of hotels!  Any part of town you'd prefer? U: I do not have a preference on area. S: Are you on a budget? U: No. I would prefer something expensive and with free wifi. S: Okay, how about the University Arms Hotel? U: is that a guest house? S: no, it's listed as a hotel. do you need a guesthouse? U: Yes please. S: I don't have any guesthouses available that meet your criteria. Would you be willing to stay in a hotel? Or can we search using different criteria? U: No, I really want a guesthouse. What about something in the moderate price range? S: in what area do you prefer? U: i dont care about the area S: There are 14 guesthouses in the city that meet your criteria. Let's see if we can narrow it down a little. Do you need internet or parking? U: The hotel should include free wifi. S: What area of town would you like to stay in? U: i don't care, i already told you that. S: And do you have a preference on the number of stars the establishment should have? I see both 3 and 4 star options. U: I would prefer a four star can you send me some info on that? S: Sure thing, I would suggest the acorn guest house. U: Give me their area and address S: The Acorn Guest House is located in the north part of the city and their address is 154 chesterton road. Anything else for you today? U: Do the showers have strong water pressure at The Acorn Guest House? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Acorn Guest House has some problems with their water pressure being low, do you want to look at other options?

src_text: reviews of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.At times, we felt like we were eating appetizer-sized entrees, and we weren't able to share things with each other easily. 2.I loved the large food portion size. 3.But don't come here hungry, or you'll leave disappointed! 4.While everything was very tasty and we felt that the food was high in quality, the portion sizes were a disappointment. 5.The view from in the restaurant wasn't that great, as we just saw the side of another large building, but I forgot all about that as we enjoyed our large portions of delicious food. 6.The food portions were very small. [SEP] U: I need to find a certain restaurant called the slug and lettuce. S: The slug and lettuce is a gastropub in the centre of town. Would you like to book a table? U: No. I just needed the area. Thank you! S: You are very welcome. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: i book for good place and portion for foods? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most of the people say the portions there are small.  Only two people said that their portions were big.  Would you like to look at some other options?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I need a guesthouse, free parking included. S: ok, the acorn guesthouse is a great place. Located in the north and is moderately priced. They offer free parking and internet. U: Is there any other guesthouses that don't have internet included? S: No, unfortunately there are no guest houses that offer free parking but do not offer free internet. U: Okay, what about one that does have internet? S: I think your best bet is Acorn Guest House.  They fulfill your need for free parking and are in the north. U: How many stars does the Acorn Guest House have? S: The Acorn Guest House is rated 4 stars. U: What is the address of the Acorn? S: Acorn Guest House is located at 154 Chesterton Road. U: I am also looking for a train that leaves after 14:15. S: TR2420 train leaves at 15:00, may I book this for you? U: Could you please book that train for 5 people and give me the reference number. S: Sure thing, Reference number is : A4C2KF23. Anything else I can help you with? U: Does it have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviews of the Acorn Guest House have noted that the water pressure is low. Is there any more information I can find for you?

src_text: reviews of TANG CHINESE: 1.The only complaint we had all night was the lack luster drink options and the fact that they didn't have many non-alcoholic drinks besides that, I would visit again with my friends. 2.They had plenty of drink options including tea, soda and alcholic beverages. reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.However, the food tasted mediocre and the restaurant only served limited non-alcoholic drinks. reviews of HK FUSION: 1.I don't drink alcohol and had to have water with my meal which was really unfortunate. 2.The only thing I really disliked was the limited options for non-alcoholic beverages. reviews of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.Since this was a restaurant bar we figured the drinks with no alcohol wouldn't be very good, but we were glad to see they were good since the kids and designated driver needed something to drink. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm trying to take a train on Wednesday that leaves from Broxbourne. Can you help me book a ticket? S: Sure I can help you with that. I have train TR0788 leaving at 05:32 and will arrive to cambridge at 06:32. U: I really need one that leaves after 11:00. S: I have 13, is there a time youd like to arrive by? U: It doesn't matter, as long as I can book it for 6 people. I will need the reference number please. S: Success! TR5953 departs at 11:32 and arrives 12:32. Your reference number is EQCLFB3Q. U: Thanks, I'm also looking for an expensive restaurant. S: Sure, which part of town are you interested in eating at? U: I'd like to eat in the city centre, if possible. Got any reco on Chinese places? S: We have four: HK Fusion, Sesame Restaurant and Bar, Ugly Duckling, and Tang Chinese. U: Which has a good variety of non-alcoholic drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Tang Chinese customers say they have plenty of drink options including tea and soda and the Sesame also had great drinks for the kids and designated drivers. The others had some negative reviews on the drink options. Is there anything else you'd like to know about any of the places?

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The shower was a sad dribble of water. 2.It was challenging to rinse the shampoo efficiently. 3.The only negative was the low water pressure. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train leaving tuesday going to cambridge? S: I can help you get set up, where will you be coming from? U: I am leaving from Peterborough  after 12:30. S: There are 23 results. Would you like to arrive by a certain time? U: depart from peterborough and should leave after 12:30, can you book it and I need travel time and price S: There is a train that leaves at 12:48 and arrives at 13:38 and costs 16.50 pounds.  Would you like me to book that? U: No need for a booking. I do need a total travel time, however. S: Sure the travel will take 50 minutes. U: Great, I also need an idea of hotels that are moderately priced in the west. S: Hobsons House is a 3 star guesthouse and offers free internet and parking. Would you like a reservation? U: How is the water pressure there?  I want to make sure that I can take a good shower. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Hobsons house will not have good water pressure. The water dribbles and makes it hard to wash out shampoo from hair.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Because I had a late arrival, the very comfy bed was a really nice perk as well. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap place to stay. Can you help? S: I have a number of cheap hotels available; do you want to stay in a particular area of town? U: I don't care which area the hotel is in. S: Ok, would you prefer a guesthouse or a hotel? U: any so long as it is a 2star and has wifi S: I'm sorry I don't have any matches. Do you want me to check a different price range? U: Yes, please try expensive. S: I'm sorry, there's not guesthouse fitting THAT description either.  Do you want to try a different hotel type or something? U: Try either a hotel or guesthouse. S: The express by holiday inn cambridge is a 2 star hotel in the east area that is expensive. It has wifi and parking. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Are the beds there comfortable? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The beds at the hotel are known to be comfortable. Is there any other information you need to know about the hotel?

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Because I had a late arrival, the very comfy bed was a really nice perk as well. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a restaurant called graffiti please? S: Sure, it's an expensive british restaurant in the west, located at Hotel Felix Whitehouse Lane Huntingdon Road cb30lx. Would you like to book a table? U: Yes, can you book me a table for 5 people for Thursday at 17:30. S: Unfortunately that time slot in unavailable.   Is there another time you would like me to try? U: Sure, how about 16:30?  If it is available at that time please give me a reference number. S: I was able to book that, reference number is P0OB1R52. U: Find a hotel in the east and in the expensive price range? S: Express by holiday inn cambridge is available. U: I would also like it to include free wifi and have a star rating of 2. S: The Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge fits all of your needs. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Are the beds cozy? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One of the customers were very comfy. They said it was a perk to have a relaxing bed. Great night sleep.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I only wish it was in a better location, which made me need a car and then have to make a reservation for parking. 2.I found the location convenient and I felt pretty safe staying alone. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.But that said, the location was overall really excellent, and parking was free which was a nice perk. 2.We were able to visit many things in the area, so it was a nice location. 3.We were within walking distance of may things, so great location. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a hotel in the north that is moderately priced? S: I have two hotels, would you like me to book one? U: Do either of them have free wifi and parking?  It is critical that I have internet and a parking spot. S: Yes, both the Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge have free wifi and parking. U: Which one of those is centrally-placed and accessible? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviews of the Ashley Hotel suggest it's a great and convenient location. Would you like me to check on availability for you?

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.I thought that the foods were of superb quality, as were all of the drinks. [SEP] U: Finches Bed and Breakfast was recommended to me highly. Could you help me find it? S: Yes I have found it, it is in the west of town,and cheap. U: Great! Can you book a room there for 5 nights? There will be 8 of us, and we'll arrive on Friday. S: Booking was successful. Your reference number is PZ9SHTWA. U: I would also like to eat some Austrian food. S: I am sorry, there are no Austrian restaurants. Can I try a different cuisine? U: Okay, then how about an expensive mediterranean food restaurant in the centre? S: You have a choice of two restaurants: la mimosa or shiraz restaurant. U: Does either one have high quality beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure about the beer specifically, but the review I read raved about the drinks overall at La Mimosa.

src_text: reviews of LA RAZA: 1.If you're looking for a cool, hip Spanish restaurant to visit for tapas and drinks, I wouldn't recommend La Raza because their drinks were frankly not well-prepared and tasted pretty mediocre. 2.La Raza has good food and drinks. 3.Though I'm more of a beer drinker and stuck with one of their top quality, full bodied Spanish craft beers, my boyfriend tried a glass of one of their expensive, top quality Sangrias and loved it. 4.I also ordered a beer, which seemed to be of great quality along with their other drink choices. 5.I liked the sangria and the portion was large for my tortilla espanola. FAQs of LA RAZA: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at La Raza. [SEP] U: I have a hotel in mind that I need some help to book. S: Okay, can you provide the name of the hotel please? U: I would like to book the Aylesbray Lodge guest house, for 1 person, 3 nights, starting Friday S: I have you booked for 3 nights starting on Friday.  The reference number is  8FLXFYYW.  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Yes, I'm looking for a  want restaurant called la raza and book a table for 1 at 16:45 and I need a reference number S: What day do you want to reserve for? U: I would like it for the same day. S: You are all set, the reference number is DK9Z8HY4, can I help with anything else? U: Can you tell me if La Raza has high quality Sangria on the menu? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, they do offer a good sangria according to one guest review. Another guest review said that the drinks were not well made though, do you want any other information?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant called nandos. Are you aware of it? S: I am.  It is a great portuguese place.  They have two locations in town.  One in the South and on in the city centre. U: Are you sure that they have two locations? Can you tell me their address(es)? S: Nandos in the south is at Cambridge Leisure Park Clifton Way. Nandos City Centre is at 33-34 Saint Andrews Street. Do you need additional information? U: Yes, I'm also looking for a hotel - the cambridge belfry? S: The cambridge belfry 4 star hotel is a hotel in the west part of town in the cheap price range. Would you like any more information? U: How are the showers there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure is not very powerful. Will that be okay or should I search for something else for you?

src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The restaurant is in a really nice part of town with plenty of parking available, it's incredibly picturesque so you can enjoy an after meal walk. 2.It's in a nice, convenient location near town, and the foods were good. 3.The restaurant was in a very nice location, but despite that the view was very mediocre and the atmosphere was average at best. 4.Their location is lovely, right in the heart of the city. 5.They are in a great accessible location with easy parking. 6.The inside is not very modern but the location is easy to get to. [SEP] U: I'd like to find a restaurant that serves swiss food. S: Im sorry there are no restaurants offering Swiss food in your area. U: Is there any restaurants that serve Vietnamese food? S: Thanh Binh serves Vietnamese food.  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Is the restaurant in a nice location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Thanh Binh is in a great location. It's close to the heart of the city and it is easy to get to. Would you care to make a reservation?
