trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Past guests of The Ashley Hotel have commented that the hotel has nice views even from the 7th floor.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, we found that the room had a beautiful view to the sunset horizon outside. 2.The Carolina has good views. 3.It was nice to wake up in the morning and see the sun rising. 4.Parking was free and the view from the room was nice. 5.The view was really beautiful, too. [SEP] U: I was hoping to relax and visit a park while in cambridge. S: I found 5 great parks to visit. S: The Cambridge University Botanic Gardens are in the centre of town, located on Bateman Street, with an entrance fee of 4 pounds. The other four parks have free entry. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Everyone says that the views from the room were excellent. Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, while the bathrooms at the Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge may be spotless, the water pressure is abysmal.

src_text: reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.My only grip is the place where we sat was too close to the kitchen and out in the open. 2.The only downside is the pretty mediocre atmosphere of the restaurant, so don't go expecting to see great views or ambiance. 3.The place was clean and not as loud as I was expecting based on the vehicles outside and the line to get in. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.Overall I would recommend this place if you want good food, but don't really care for the ambiance. src_text: reviews of THE RIVER BAR STEAKHOUSE AND GRILL: 1.The views made up for the wait staff service, which was pretty substandard; maybe they were new hires or something. 2.I loved the quick service and extremely high quality food. 3.To top it off, the service was great. 4.For one, the service was very attentive and welcoming. 5.The service was prompt and quick as well. src_text: reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.Truly, the only things that they have going for them are a fantastic location, which affords them a lot of foot traffic, and the wonderful views from their window seats. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.The location was pleasant, not far from other amenities in the city and with good parking. 2.The only issues we had was that it was in a bad part of town, there wasn't any good parking nearby, and there wasn't any view to look at. 3.I hadn't had Chinese food in ages, so I looked on Yelp and found the Charlie Chan Chinese restaurant, which is nestled in the heart of the downtown business district. 4.Despite that, the restaurant was in a poor location in a bad spot in the city. reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.I liked the location and the view. 2.I also didn't like the part of town it was located in. 3.The only downside of the experience was the mediocre location and service, as the food took forever to finish. 4.When we were sat at our table we remarked at the great location of the restaurant in a sought after spot in the city. 5.It seemed kind of sketchy. 6.It wasn't too far of a drive from our house. [SEP] U: I am looking for a cheap place to dine in the centre of Cambridge. S: If you are interested in Chinese food, there is Rice House located at 88 Mill Road City Centre in the cheap price range. U: I prefer Russian food actually. S: I can't find any cheap Russian restaurants.  Are you open to moderate price? U: No. It really does need to be cheap. What about chinese in the centre? S: There are 3 restaurants matching that, Charlie Chan, Rice House, and Golden House. U: Are the locations there nice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Charlie Chan is located in the heart of the downtown business district which is both a positive and a negative to some. The Rice house has mixed reviews with some not liking the location and others finding it very nice. The Golden House is said to be in a fantastic location. Would you like more information on any of these restaurants?

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. src_text: reviews of COTE: 1.That said, they didn't have much on the menu where non-alcoholic beverages are concerned, so the kiddos ended up with plain water. 2.All of my friends enjoyed their meals, in fact, and we were also glad that the non-alcoholic drinks menu was substantial, since only a few people in the group wanted to drink. src_text:
FAQs of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.The Cambridge Chop House serves a full range of alcohol drinks. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.I like the drinks and the food is top notch quality. 2.I ordered some excellent British Cuisine, including stout and a full English breakfast. 3.I ordered the beef wellington which was delicious the beer on the other hand was just okay. 4.First we ordered some tea along with Cornish pasty and we very much enjoyed that. 5.Too bad the drinks sucked though. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a specific restaurant. I'll give you the name when you're ready. S: Provide the name please. U: I'd like to book a table at the Cambridge Chop House. 5 people at 16:15 on Wednesday, please. S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.

src_text: reviews of NANDOS: 1.I got a very affordable beer which was of high quality. 2.First of all, the food and drinks weren't that good at all, and the drinks were expensive. 3.If I had to list any cons, it would be that the drinks aren't great and the decor inside is dated. 4.It was yummy and overall the food and drinks were good. 5.Nandos was an authentic Portuguese dining experience with delicious high quality food and drinks. 6.Each of us also ordered a drink, because their non-alcoholic drink options are very limited, and while they were well-prepared and tasty, we thought that they were overpriced and we wouldn't bother getting drinks there again. FAQs of NANDOS: 1.Nando's has alcohol drinks. [SEP] U: I am looking for a portuguese place to dine in the south. S: I'd recommend nandos. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Is this in the cheap price range? S: Yes, Nando's is a cheaper restaurant. Would you like me to reserve a table for you? U: Do you know if they offer a good selection of high quality beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Nando's offers alcoholic drinks. They do have beer that is affordable and high quality. Some people complained about price and quality, though.

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT TWO TWO: 1.The restaurant had an eclectic feel and it was located centrally in the city near bars and entertainment. 2.I will say that the location was stunning and right in the heart of the city. 3.It is located in such a nice area and the indoor decor is welcoming. 4.It had a nice location in the heart of town which helped with the vibe in the restaurant. 5.With an incredibly convenient location, I'm sure I'll be back many more times to sample the rest of their extensive menu! reviews of COTE: 1.My friends had to drag me to Cote, because the location is really inconvenient to my home and required a 30 minute drive, but I'm so glad they did! src_text: reviews of HOME FROM HOME: 1.I stayed here on my business trip, and after a hard day of business meetings, it was nice to retire to a large comfortable room. 2.I wished it was a bit bigger. 3.The only negative was the size of the room. [SEP] U: I would like to find a place to stay next weekend S: Sure, what day would you like to begin your stay and how long will you be staying? U: I just am looking for a place to stay in the north that includes free parking and should be a guesthouse. S: I have cheap and moderately priced guesthouses in the centre.  What would you like, cheap or moderate? U: Price doesn't matter. I need it for 3 people for 2 nights, starting thursday. Can I get the reference number? S: Alright, I have booked you at Home from Home for two nights, reference number OASAAHHB. U: Can I get a big room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I've seen varied reviews about the room sizes. Some say the rooms were just too small while another said it was nice to retire to a large, comfortable room. We could check and see if a larger room is available, if you'd like?

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay. A 0-star hotel is fine with me as long as it fits my moderate budget S: I have 2 0-star guesthouses as well as Cityroomz, a 0-star hotel. Cityroomz is in the moderate price range. Would you like a room there? U: Does it have showers with intense water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, the comments were not positive about the water pressure with guests feeling that it was low and slow. Do you have any other questions?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I need a hotel with free wifi. S: Do you have any other criteria? U: It needs to be four star, but on the cheaper range, and free parking doesn't need to be included. S: We have several good guesthouses that meet your criteria. Or do you prefer a hotel? U: Either is fine. Which one is your favorite? S: I suggest the Alexander Bed and Breakfast. U: Is it located around many attractions and easy to get to? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: While there are some people who found the location good, many others felt it was mediocre, and not close to too many things.

src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The restaurant is in a really nice part of town with plenty of parking available, it's incredibly picturesque so you can enjoy an after meal walk. 2.It's in a nice, convenient location near town, and the foods were good. 3.The restaurant was in a very nice location, but despite that the view was very mediocre and the atmosphere was average at best. 4.Their location is lovely, right in the heart of the city. 5.They are in a great accessible location with easy parking. 6.The inside is not very modern but the location is easy to get to. src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I only wish it was in a better location, which made me need a car and then have to make a reservation for parking. 2.I found the location convenient and I felt pretty safe staying alone. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.But that said, the location was overall really excellent, and parking was free which was a nice perk. 2.We were able to visit many things in the area, so it was a nice location. 3.We were within walking distance of may things, so great location. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a moderate price range hotel with 2 star rating. S: There are 2 moderate 2 star hotels in the North, the Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge. Do you want to book? U: Is it in a safe location and close to fun things to do? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Lovell Lodge you would need to have a rental car to reach area attractions but the Ashley Hotel has great things to do within walking distance.

src_text: reviews of ARBURY LODGE GUESTHOUSE: 1.The rooms were well-maintained and cozy but my favorite part was the immaculate bathroom which was very clean which you don't always get with a price this good. 2.The place was clean and of note the bathroom was sparkling clean. 3.It has a few pieces of hair that had not been cleaned out of the tub. 4.When I came to inspect my room, the bathroom was absolutely spotless I could eat off the seat. 5.The only issue that we had with the room, was the bathroom was not as clean as I would have liked it. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel that gives me free parking and free wifi. S: We have many with those features. Do you have any other preferences to narrow it down, such as price range or location? src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. [SEP] U: I need information about trains leaving from Cambridge and going to Bishops Stortford. S: Okay! I can help you with that. What day are you wanting to travel? U: I will be traveling on sunday. S: I have 10 trains leaving from Cambridge to Bishops Stortford on Sunday. The earliest leaves at 05:29 and the latest leaves at 23:29. Would you like to book a seat? U: I need one that leaves after 17:15 S: The first one out after that time is TR6742, departing at 17:29. Would you like to book a ticket on that train? U: Yes, I need two seats please. Can you give me the reference number after they are booked? S: Two seats are booked for TR6742. Your reference number is ESM407G4. Is there anything else I can do for you? U: I need to find a hotel too. S: What are your preferences regarding area, price range and star rating? Or do you have other needs? U: it should include free parking. The hotel should have a star of 2. S: So, I have three hotels in town that have 2 stars and parking. Do you have a preference on cost? I have two moderate and one expensive. U: I'm not picky, it just needs to have 2 stars. S: I need to know what price range please. U: I don't have a preference just 2 stars please. S: The Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge are both moderately priced and in the north, while Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge is expensive and in the east. Would you like to book? U: The Ashley Hotel sounds good. I need to make a reservation for the same amount of people, for 5 nights, starting Tuesday. S: So you'd like me to book the guesthouse Tues thru Sat is that correct? U: No I'd like you to book the Ashley Hotel for 5 nights starting on Tuesday. S: How many people will be staying? U: Do the rooms at the Ashley Hotel have great views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Ashley Hotel has a beautiful view according to previous patrons. Should we book the room now or do you need more information?

src_text: reviews of MEGHNA: 1.I went with a glass of iced tea, which was alright. FAQs of MEGHNA: 1.Yes, Meghna has a selection of wines, beers and liquors. [SEP] U: I'm looking for some places that serve crossover food. S: There is "international" cuisine. Can you elaborate on what you mean by Crossover? There are places that serve what we call "Modern European" food. U: Are these places in the moderate price range? S: I have The Varsity or Bloomsbury restaurants that both serve international food, are located in the city center and are in the moderate price range. U: Well I really need something on the west side. What about moderately priced Indian food? S: There is one Indian restaurant on the west side that is moderately priced. It is the Meghna. Would you like to book a table there? U: Does this restaurant serve high quality beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, according to previous guests that have experience at Meghna restaurant, the location does have a selection of wines, beers, and liquors.

src_text: reviews of CHIQUITO RESTAURANT BAR: 1.The view is awesome overlooking the city center. 2.Anyway, their tacos are top notch and so is all their food. 3.I loved the quaint, downtown location away from all the tourist attractions, although the interior was plain and the windows offered a boring view. 4.The portions were also generous. 5.The drinks are expensive but they have a lot of choices that she likes. 6.And I was surprised at how small the portion was. 7.The view is not great but the food is great. 8.I tried the elote and it was just ok. My partner and I both got a different burrito. 9.I feel it was overpriced for what we got. 10.The two of us had difficulty finishing it all and had some left to take home with us. 11.Me and my lady friend went to Chiquito's Bar last night and the Mexican food was authentic and delicious. 12.It's in a nice location and the foods were yummy. 13.The drinks were all top shelf but they didn't have any non-alcoholic drinks and I was on my lunch  hour so I had just had the once drink. 14.The drinks options are a bit lacking though, mostly alcoholic, if that's your thing. 15.All the food was incredible, and if you're a vegetarian, this restaurant has a lot to offer you. 16.I liked the drink options at Chiquito Restaurant and Bar when I went there with my girlfriend. 17.The only thing that wasn't ideal was the pricing of the drinks. 18.We had enchiladas and tamales with margaritas and it was all good. 19.I really liked all the food I got which were tamales, enchiladas, burritos and guacamole. 20.I like their location and it is easy to get to. 21.I must say I was surprised at the quality of all the ingredients and how much food there was. 22.I think the sauce may have even been from a can. 23.For such a nice location though, I was hoping for food in larger portions and less mediocre over all. 24.One of my friends is gluten free so I was surprised to see that they have gluten free options! 25.The prices don't break the bank and everything is cheap. 26.I had the Guacamole and it was very good. 27.I loved the tacos and they use the good lean beef in them. 28.In search of an authentic, Mexican food experience, I recently visited the Chiquito Restaurant Bar, where I enjoyed burritos, mole, tacos, and guacamole. 29.My waiter, Diego, was quite pleasant and offered friendly, world-class service. 30.The food is authentic and fresh but not large enough portions to share. 31.My daughter is vegetarian so I was glad to find all of the vegetarian options on the menu. 32.They were decent enough to eat, but nothing special. 33.They have large portions in case you want to share. 34.Some people may find that they do have extensive options for vegetarians and the service was actually really good, so it wasn't all bad. 35.I enjoyed by burritos and guacamole. 36.I had the Chilaquiles, she had the mole and we both agreed it was the some of the best Mexican food ever not to mention it was all very reasonably priced with superb service to go along with it. [SEP] U: I am looking for an expensive restaurant in the south part of town. S: There are five restaurants in the expensive category in that area. Would you prefer Mexican, Italian, Chinese, or Indian? U: I would prefer Mexican S: Chiquito Restaurant Bar serves expensive Mexican food in the south part of town.  Would you like more info? U: Are the portions good there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I see a few mixed reviews on the portions. Some people loved the generous servings while others were wishing they had more. Would you like to check into another place?

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.The food was really small. 2.The food was of good quality and there was good vegetarian option but i you had overpriced your food and it was of Small portion 3.The servings could be bigger for the price but we enjoyed our food well enough. 4.What did disappoint though, was the small portion sizes. 5.The food was fresh and tasteful, and served with generous portions. 6.If only it was bigger, it would be amazing. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests disagree on the portion sizes provided at the La Mimosa as some were pleased with the generous plates and other, small offerings.

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. [SEP] U: Is there a cheap restaurant in the north part of town? S: I have found two. They are Da Vinci pizzeria and Royal Spice. U: Are the portions at Da Vinci big? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Portion size seems to vary quite a lot, but the food is very good either way. Would you like to me to reserve a table for you?

src_text: reviews of TANG CHINESE: 1.The only complaint we had all night was the lack luster drink options and the fact that they didn't have many non-alcoholic drinks besides that, I would visit again with my friends. 2.They had plenty of drink options including tea, soda and alcholic beverages. reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.However, the food tasted mediocre and the restaurant only served limited non-alcoholic drinks. reviews of HK FUSION: 1.I don't drink alcohol and had to have water with my meal which was really unfortunate. 2.The only thing I really disliked was the limited options for non-alcoholic beverages. reviews of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.Since this was a restaurant bar we figured the drinks with no alcohol wouldn't be very good, but we were glad to see they were good since the kids and designated driver needed something to drink. How about El Shaddai?  It's located at 41 Warkworth Street cb11eg.  The phone number is 01223327978. U: That sounds great. U: You know, I'm feeling like chinese. What do you have? S: I have 4 listings. Ugly Duckling, Tang Chinese, HK Fusion, and Sesame Restaurant and Bar. Do any of those sound appealing? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The non alcoholic drinks at the Ugly Duckling and the HK Fusion are a bit limited for choices. The Tang Chinese and Sesame Restaurant and Bar have more but still some limitations.

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The bathroom was very clean, as well as the room itself. 2.Where the room is concerned, I found it to be impeccably clean when I first checked in, and the bathroom was also very clean. 3.I also found that the bathroom was very clean and well appointed. 4.Both the room and the bathroom were very clean, so I didn't feel the need to scrub anything down as soon as I arrived. reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.We also weren't satisfied with the cleanliness level of the bathroom. [SEP] U: Hello- I would like some information about visiting Corpus Christi please S: Corpus christi is a college located in the centre of town. The phone number is 01223338000 and is located at king's parade. U: Can I have the post code please? S: The postcode is cb21rh. U: Is there an entrance fee? S: the admission is 2 pounds. U: Can you also find me a place to stay in the centre? S: There are several places that are located in the same area, can you give me some more preferences? U: I'd like a moderately priced hotel with free wifi and parking. S: I have 4 available hotels in the centre. Two of them have a cheap price range, and two have an expensive range. Would one of these do? U: I'm looking for a moderate priced hotel for 6 people and 5 nights from Sunday. S: I'm sorry, I'm not pulling up any matches. U: Okay, how about a moderately-priced hotel in the south area instead that has free wifi and free parking? S: I have two guesthouses that match your request; the Aylesbray Lodge and Bridge Guesthouse. Aylesbray has 4 stars and Bridge Guesthouse has 3. Which would you prefer? U: Which one has the best ratings for clean bathrooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that stayed at the Aylesbray Lodge Guest House weren't satisfied with the cleanliness of their bathrooms, while those that stayed at the Bridge Guest House found it to be impeccably clean.

src_text: reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.The only dislikes we had were the slow service time and the average drinks. 2.I was pleased with the great service from the wait staff, and my Hot Pot was really high quality and very tasty. 3.The only downside of the experience was the mediocre location and service, as the food took forever to finish. reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.The service was very friendly and good, the prices good too. 2.The workers were very friendly. 3.On top of that, the service was average and the food was rather basic. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for a cheap restaurant in the town centre? S: Yes there are many in my search for you,can I get what type of food you are looking to eat at the restaurant? U: Italian Food , Cheap and in the East part of town S: There are several cheap Italian restaurants in the centre but none in the east. U: Actually a chinese restaurant in the centre would better suit our needs, what is available at a cheap price? S: In the centre we have Charlie Chan, Rice House, and Golden House that are all quite inexpensive. Would you like me to book a table at one of them? U: Is the waitstaff considered exceptional and kindly? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests have had no issues with the superb staff at Charlie Chan or Golden House, however that at the Rice House were mediocre and slow.

src_text: FAQs of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.Yes, there are outdoor seats available. reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.So, we decided to eat outside. 2.That was a little better as it wasn't as crowded as the interior. [SEP] U: Hi! I'm looking for a restaurant called Stazione Restaurant and Coffee Bar. S: Sure, it's in the centre of town. Do you want to book a table there? U: Is there outside seating for 4 people? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I am not sure if they have seating for 4 people, but I do know that they do indeed have outdoor seating for guests. My guess is that they can accommodate 4 people but you never know.

src_text: reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.View is just ok, nothing great. 2.First of all the view was wonderful, lots of windows going to the downtown area. 3.It was located in a nice area and had a nice view. 4.The place is in a nice location also, looking over the Steinhatchee river. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant serving barbeque in the centre of town. S: Sorry, there are no barbeque restaurants in the centre. Can I help you find something else? U: Can you find a restaurant that has asian or oriental food? S: Yippee noodle bar serves asian oriental food. U: Are there nice views to enjoy while dining at Yippee Noodle Bar? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Yippee Noodle Bar overlooks the Steinhatchee River or the downtown area, so if you enjoy either of those things, you will enjoy the view at the bar.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant that serves venetian food. S: Regretfully, I don't have a listing for Venetian cuisine. Do you have a second choice? U: Anything in the centre would be fine, whatever you recommend. S: There are over a hundred restaurants to chose from do you have a price range? U: Definitely something moderately priced. If you can't find Venetian, how about British? S: There are 4 results. restaurant one seven, the oak bistro, the copper kettle, and cotto. Would you like more information on any of those? U: Yes, please. Find out which of the four restaurants have vegan options, please? S: Sadly, I don't have access to that information.  The Oak Bistro might be a good choice. Their phone number is 01223323361 if you'd like to call them U: Okay, well, let's go ahead and book a table for one at 11:30 on Tuesday. S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number is : 0IJIWWQ9.  What else can I help you with? U: I also need a place to stay.  Can you help with that? S: Yes I can. What type of place to stay would you like? What area of town? U: I'm looking for a place that has 3 stars and free parking. S: We have five hotels that meet that criteria, are you looking for a specific part of town? U: I am not looking for a specific area, but I would like for it to be in the moderate price range, please. S: How about the hamilton lodge it's located in the north. U: What size is the room there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Many of the guests have given the rooms a thumbs-up for space. They mentioned the rooms were large, comfortable, and spacious. However, there were a few guests who were disappointed in the smallish rooms. We could ask for a larger room, if you'd like.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.However, I was frustrated about the low water pressure which made my shower not enjoyable. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for a cheap place to stay in the east.  Can you help me? S: There are 3 guesthouses in the cheap price range in the east part of town. Would you like to book one? U: Do any of those include free parking? S: Yes, all of them do. U: I would need a hotel for 6 people, starting from Thursday and lasting 4 nights. Is there anything available? S: Allenbell is available and fits all of your requirements. I have made a reservation for you. Your reference number is DQOL6QE5. U: There won't be any issues with the water pressure being too weak, will there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Allenbell has frustratingly low water pressure that is not very enjoyable. Would you like to know anything else?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 2.I had a great view of the mountains. 3.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a 3 star hotel. S: There are 6 hotels listed at 3 star. There are 2 in the north, 1 south, 1 west and 1 centre. Would you like more information? U: I don't care where the hotel is located, but I'm looking for something in the moderate price range. S: I have 4 options for you. Do you need free wifi and parking? I have 3 that offer these and 1 that does not. U: Yes please. Can you recommend me of them? S: The hamilton lodge is nice and in the north area. Would you like a booking today? U: Does it have a good view from one's room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, Hamilton Lodge is known for having exceptional views of the nearby mountains from the rooms at their hotel.

src_text: reviews of PIZZA HUT FEN DITTON: 1.We enjoyed the view and the service was polite and fast. 2.I loved the excellent service and the exquisite drinks. 3.Very fast service. 4.Our waiter was super awesome too, always had a smile on his face which matched the very upbeat and sports-bar like mood of the restaurant. [SEP] U: Can you give me the price for a large pizza and what type of pizzas they offer at Pizza Express fen ditton please S: Would you like to book a reservation at Pizza Express? U: What is the price range of Pizza Express? S: Pizza Express Fen Ditton is in the moderate price range. U: What is the food type at Pizza Express? S: It is italian food. U: Okay, thank you. S: Would you like me to book it for you? U: Do they have a nice, responsive staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The restaurant offers very fast services due to its high qualified waitstaff who are very committed in their duties.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay. The hotel doesn't need to have free parking and should be in the moderate price range S: Alright. what area do you want to stay in? U: I would like to stay in the east. S: There are three locations which fit your needs, sir. The Warkworth House is an excellent choice. U: Is this hotel in a calm and quiet part of town? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, the opinions are mixed.  Some thought the location extremely silent, quiet and secure, while others found it a bit noisy and thought light sleepers might struggle in the rooms by the main road.

src_text: reviews of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.I also ordered some beer, which was also fantastic. 2.The Golden Curry offers great food and drinks at a wonderful location. 3.I will caution that the drink that I had (beer) was pretty mediocre and bland. 4.Once the beer arrived I noticed how delicious it was, a very high quality brew indeed! 5.Good drinks though and cheap. 6.The menu offered high quality drinks, as well as a lot of non-alcoholic drink choices. 7.The King Fisher was refreshing and just as I remembered it, though it was quite pricey at $8. FAQs of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.Alcohol is served at The Golden Curry. [SEP] U: Would you be so kind as to help me find a place to dine later? S: I sure can.  What type of restaurant are you looking for? U: I'm looking for Cuban food. S: There are no Cuban restaurants unfortunately. U: That's okay.  How about Indian? S: Yes what area are you looking to dine in? U: In the Centre as well please. S: I have 9 restaurants available.  What price range would you prefer? U: The range does not matter. Just the Indian place you think best. S: I would recommend the The Golden Curry. Would you like to make a reservation? U: I only want to go their if they have good beers on tap. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Many people said that the beer tasted really good, but one person did say that the beer was mediocre. Do you want a reservation?

src_text: reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.I was glad that they have a pretty extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options, because I did try one cocktail and found it to be pretty mediocre. 2.Speaking of drinks, this isn't a place I would recommend if you have kids who want a lot of soda options, because their non-alcoholic menu is pretty limited. 3.Their non-alcoholic drink menu is actually pretty impressive, too, which is something that rarely stands out at restaurants. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant called lan hong house. Can you get me more information about it please? S: Sure lan hong house has some of the best moderately priced chinese food and is in centre area. Would you like a reservation? U: Would you be able to check what their selection of non-alcoholic drinks are? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests have stated in their reviews that the non-alcoholic menu was actually pretty impressive, but others have stated that there was not many non-alcoholic drink options.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.We could not enjoy the shower as the pressure was low. 2.The room was a bit small, so I felt a tiny cramped in there, and the water pressure could have been a lot better. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel called kirkwood house S: Good day! The kirkwood house is a guesthouse type hotel in the northern area located at 172 Chesterton Road and can be reached at the telephone number 01223306283. U: Is there strong shower pressure at the kirkwood house? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Kirkwood House provides guests with shower water pressure that is too low to be enjoyable and could be a lot better.

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.Accessible parking was easily available, which was really convenient, and they even offered some excellent breakfast options. 2.We also enjoyed the delicious breakfast options we got to select from. reviews of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.Very nicely done and yummy! 2.The options were plentiful and very well done. 3.When waking up in the morning, I was treated to a whole host of delicious food to eat. 4.The breakfasts were awesome. 5.I liked the central view of the city and its geographical location but I did not like the meals served especially breakfast FAQs of WORTH HOUSE: 1.Worth house offers breakfast at additional charge. 2.There are full English breakfast options available at Worth House. FAQs of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.City Centre North B and B does offer free English breakfast. [SEP] U: I need a train to stansted airport from cambridge please. S: Ok, what day will you be traveling? U: Thursday. I need to arrive by 12:45. S: The closest to thing I can find is a train leaving at 5:40 on Thursday. It arrives at Stansted Airport at 6:08. Is this okay? U: Yes, that works.  Can I get the train id number and the price please? S: the train Number is TR7966, it will cost you 10.10 pounds. U: I need to find me a room as well. S: What part of town would you prefer?  And, do you need internet? U: Looking for something in the North, cheap price range please. Don't care much about internet. S: There are two guesthouses that meet your criteria. The City Centre North B and B, and the Worth House. Would you like me to book one of those for you? U: Which has better breakfasts? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All of the reviews for Worth House indicate that past guests were happy with the breakfast, and most guests of City Centre North B and B were happy as well.

src_text: FAQs of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.Alimentum serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I would like to stay at Rosa's bed and breakfast in cambridge. can you give tell me their contact information and location? S: Rosa's Bed and Breakfast is a charming guesthouse located at 543 Roseford Road. Their phone number is 01 223 512 596. Shall I get a reservation set up for you? U: No, I just need information today thanks.  So, it is a bed and breakfast right?  I don't want a hotel.  Any parking or internet available? S: Yes it is a bed and breakfast, they do offer internet and parking.  Is there any other information that you need? U: looking for a place to dine in moderate price and in the south S: I have to places. Is there a specific type of food you would like? U: Yes chinese please. S: would you prefer another type of cuisine? i do not have a chinese restaurant that meets your criteria. U: How about checking Modern European food? S: I recommend Restaurant Alimentum at 152-154 Hills Road.  Great food. U: Okay, do they also serve beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure if they serve beer, but they do serve alcohol for a certain. Do you want to make a reservation now?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The breakfast options were plentiful, too. 2.In the morning, we were offered great breakfast choices, which we enjoyed. 3.In the morning I had breakfast and they had lots of things to choose from. 4.We have very different tastes in food, and we were both satisfied with what was available. FAQs of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The Hamilton Lodge offers a full English breakfast. 2.The Hamilton Lodge does not offer a free breakfast. You need to pay 10 GBP per person. [SEP] U: I'm looking for places to go, can you guide me? S: I would love to assist you today.  I can guide you to attractions, restaurants, and hotels.  What would you like to do? U: I'd like to visit an attraction in the west. Suggest something for me please. S: What about the Cafe Jello Gallery? It' a free museum. U: That sounds great. What is their phone number and postcode? S: Their postcode is cb30af, phone number 01223312112. Is there anything else you need? U: Yes, I am looking for information on the Hamilton Lodge. S: The hamilton lodge is a moderately priced guesthouse in the north area. Would you care for more information? U: Does the Hamilton Lodge have good choices for breakfast? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests who have stayed at the Hamilton Lodge have found that breakfast has delicious good options such as a full English breakfast.  Is there anyting else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.It didn't really represent the high quality of food and wasn't anything special. 2.The food was really high quality and delicious. 3.Our food and beverages were amazing. reviews of THE HOTPOT: 1.I only tried their spring rolls, but they were absolutely delicious and I felt like they were really authentic and high quality. 2.The food was also very on point, as it tasted highly fresh and authentic. 3.I'll be honest that their decor is nothing impressive and seems pretty outdated, but if you're interested in food over ambiance, you can't miss with The Hotpot! [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in the north area S: I have moderate and expensive priced restaurants. City stop restaurant serves european and is on the expensive side. Or may I suggest saigon city, they have asian? U: Do any of them specialize in chinese? S: Yes, both Hakka and The Hotpot serve Chinese.  Can I book either for you? U: Which one has the best spring rolls? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Hakka did not have any reviews for the spring rolls, but the Hot Pot did, and the customer said that they were really authentic and high-quality.

src_text: reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.The food aside, the restaurant has a great view of the city, and it makes for a really nice date spot. 2.To add to that though their foods and drinks are awesome and the view of the place is very relaxing and professional. 3.I just expected a more pleasant view. 4.I disliked mediocre food and views however, given that the location was good. 5.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 6.It's surprising the place was so affordable for a place that had such a nice view. 7.What I didn't like so much was that although the restaurant is in the nice part of town, the views are mediocre at best. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for places in west Cambridge that feature architecture. S: I am sorry, I am unable to locate an attraction in your desired location? U: How about a college then? S: There are 5 college's in the west area. There is Churchill, Clare, Clare Hall, Magdalene and Queens. Would you like me to book one today? U: Can you give me the phone number for Churchill? S: Certainly, churchill college the phone number is 01223336233. What else can I do for you today? U: I am also looking for information about a restaurant called ugly duckling. S: Of course! Ugly Duckling is an expensive Chinese restaurant in town center. Would you like a booking there? U: Is there a great view from the ugly duckling? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, patrons that have previously dined at the Ugly Duckling restaurant for the most part, regard the views as being great.

src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.If you are really hungry I recommend trying the full English breakfast as well as it is a great way to sample it all. 2.The portions were big which would be a plus except that I didn't want to take them home, they were so bad. 3.The food was very high quality and the portions were generous. [SEP] U: I am looking for a 3-star guesthouse. Can you please help me? S: I've found several guesthouse options, do you have a specific area of the city in mind? U: Do any of those have free parking? I really need it to include that. S: Three guesthouses rated 3 stars have free parking available. May I start a reservation for you? U: Yes, at whichever one you think is nicer.   I need a room for 2 nights on Saturday.  There are 6 of us. S: I have made a reservation for your party of six for two nights starting Saturday at Bridge Guest House. Your reference number is ZZ1ECCCS. Do you need anything else? U: I am also looking for a place to dine in the moderate price range with British food. S: Are you looking for a restaurant in a particular area? U: It should be in the centre. S: i recommend cotto, phone-01223302010 U: Do they have a reputation for serving hearty portions of food? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The food portion at Cotto restaurant are generous, high quality and tasty. Can I help you with anything else?

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The shower was a sad dribble of water. 2.It was challenging to rinse the shampoo efficiently. 3.The only negative was the low water pressure. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip in Cambridge S: Great - how can I help you? U: I am looking for a moderately price place to stay while i'm there. S: Do you have an area you prefer? U: I would like to be in the west. S: hobsons house meets your needs. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Does the shower have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure in the showers at Hobson's house has been criticized, customers have said it made it difficult to rinse the shampoo out of their hair.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: I want a hotel that doesn't include internet, but it needs to be a place to stay in the east. S: I don't have any options specific to the east. May I consider any other areas of town? U: Is that because there are no options without internet?  I can stay in a place with internet if there are no other options, but I do need free parking. S: Ok what about the allenbell? It's priced cheap. U: Sure. What is the hotel type and address please? S: The Allenbell is a guesthouse and it's located at 517a coldham lane. Would you like me to book you a room there? U: Do the rooms have nice views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Allenbell has really nice views according to the people who have stayed there in the past. Want to book it?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Also, breakfast is delicious, they offer a good variety which surprised me. 2.We thought the room was super clean, and we very much enjoyed the breakfast options. src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Hobsons House did not disappoint in that aspect. 2.The location is exceptional and the breakfast options were fantastic. src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The view outside of my window was exquisite and beautiful. 2.I really liked the sunrise view at breakfast. 3.I enjoyed spending time here with my girl, as we took in the great view. 4.Talk about a place with a fantastic view, truly amazing. 5.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One aspect in which all previous guests agree upon when staying at the Avalon is that the views are fabulous and an unexpected plus.

src_text: reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.I like the beer selection. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a hotel in the North part of Cambridge? S: I have two moderately priced hotels in the north for you.  The Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge. Would you like me to book one? U: Does it have internet? S: They do both have internet. U: I would like to book the Ashley Hotel. S: Great I can take care of that.  How many people?  How long will you be there and when will your stay start? U: There will be 7 of us arriving Sunday.  We will be staying 3 nights. S: I was able to book the room for you the reference number is HQKA3TBW. Can I help you with anything else? src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.The location itself was in the heart of the town so I was able to go walk around after eating here. 2.Parking was a nightmare, I did not like coming in. 3.The location is good - it's out near a mall with a lot of parking spaces, so parking was a breeze, and it's conveniently right off the highway. 4.However, the location isn't great (not a lot of parking) and the food left a little something to be desired. 5.The location is really great. 6.With a location by the riverside, you can almost close your eyes and imagine you're taking afternoon tea in the idyllic English countryside when you're at Cotto's! [SEP] U: Hello.  I'm trying to find a restaurant that serves Swiss food.  Can you recommend anything to me? S: Unfortunately there are no restaurants that serve Swiss food in this area. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most of the comments about the location are very positive but there are a few customers who did not like the location stating the lack of parking.

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.The only real negative I can think of is that the food is pretty pricey. 2.My partner and I were gobsmacked at how affordable the menu is here, and were were super impressed with the quality of our Cornish pasty and roast dinners. 3.The price and quality of food were off the charts, and service was great as well. 4.Initially I was put off by the high prices on the menu but the great service made up for it. reviews of SAINT JOHNS CHOP HOUSE: 1.I really wanted to like Saint Johns Chop House, and I think their food is pretty excellent, but I was shocked when I received my bill, because they prices seemed unusually high. 2.It was surprisingly affordable for such high quality foods. 3.When we sat down to look at the menu I noticed that their prices were sky high! 4.Not only was the place affordable, but there was a beautiful view. 5.I think the restaurant upcharges because they have really nice indoor decor and exceptional service, so they're positioning themselves as an upscale British dining experience, but I don't think that the prices are warranted. [SEP] U: I need to find a British restaurant in West Cambridge. S: There are multiple options for you. To narrow them down what price range do you have in mind? U: No, can you recommend a favorite? S: I would recommend Graffiti.  It is a bit expensive, so if you want something moderately price there is also Saint Johns Chop House. U: Do you get a lot for what you pay for here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The food at both the Graffiti restaurant and Saint Johns Chop House have varied reviews between affordable and quite pricey.

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.Everything was expertly prepared and really delicious. 2.This place has a spectacular view which makes one appreciate the delicious food even more. 3.My partner and I were gobsmacked at how affordable the menu is here, and were were super impressed with the quality of our Cornish pasty and roast dinners. 4.The price and quality of food were off the charts, and service was great as well. 5.If you're looking for authentic British cuisine, I cannot recommend Graffiti more highly. reviews of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.The food was a bit mediocre as well but the beverages and dessert make it worthwhile if you just want something light. 2.It fell flat and was very tough tasting with very bland vegetables with it. 3.The food was to die for, and the portions were rather hefty, in a good way. 4.The Cornish Pasty and Roast Dinners had generous portions and were made from high-quality ingredients. 5.The drinks and food were also quite average. [SEP] U: I want to dine in a place in the west. S: There are many restaurant options available to you. What type of food would you like to eat and what is your price range? U: I would like a restaurant that serves eritrean food and in the expensive price range. S: Would you like European food? U: No.  I said eritrean food.  Do yo have something? S: I don't have anything that meets those requirements. U: How about British food? S: Yes I have three. When would you like the table reserved for and for how many? U: Is one of those expensive? If so, book me a table there for Thursday for 8 people at 13:30 please. S: There's actually two expensive places, graffiti and travellers rest. Which would you prefer? U: Does either of them offer top notch roast dinners? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Graffiti features delicious and authentic food which is expertly prepared while Travellers Rest is predominantly seen as mediocre.

src_text: reviews of LOCH FYNE: 1.Loch Fyne was a marvelous, upscale dining experience for me and my family, and we cannot wait to return. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant called loch fyne S: That is a nice seafood restaurant located on Trumpington Street.  Can I reserve a table for you? U: Does it have a good atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, dining at Loch Fyne can be described as a true experience. It is an upscale place to have a meal.

src_text:
reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It was really good value for money (the total cost) and I enjoyed my stay. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train going to cambridge that arrives by 18:30? S: Okay, I think I can help you. Where will be coming from? U: I will be departing kings lynn. S: The TR3677 arrives at 17:58. Would you like to book it? U: Yes for 2 people on a Tuesday please. And I would like the reference number. S: I'm going with TR5793 since you are travelling on Tuesday arriving at the same time. The total fee is 19.6 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : 4NLGW7WM. U: Thanks so much. Can you also help me look for the Carolina Bed and Breakfast? S: Carolina Bed and Breakfast is in the East, it is a guesthouse in the moderate price range. Would you like to book a room? U: So it's not overpriced and offers great value? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Carolina Bed and Breakfast offers very good value for the money according to one person who stayed there.

src_text: reviews of ALPHA-MILTON GUEST HOUSE: 1.The views were amazing. 2.While I was there I really admired the view. 3.Just a bit disappointed at the rooms not being clean when we arrived, but the views are worth it. 4.The view is also very nice. 5.We were not disappointed. 6.My partner and I did like the size of the room and we enjoyed the view. 7.What stood out to me the most is just how quiet it was, but on top of that, the views were great. [SEP] U: I need the schedule of the the Train going to Ely on Tuesday. S: What time do you need to leave? U: My leave time is flexible. I just need to arrive by 14:30. S: Where will you be departing from? U: I will be departing from Cambridge. S: Train TR3420 leaves at 13:50 and gets to Ely at 14:07, 17 minute trip.  Do you need tickets? U: Yes, I do need tickets. S: How many tickets do you need? U: Well, I can do the booking myself. Can you help me find a hotel instead? S: Absolutely! What area would you like to stay in and what is your price range? U: It doesn't matter as long as it is 3 stars. It doesn't need to include internet. S: alpha-milton guest house is 3 stars and does not have internet. U: Could I please book it for 5 people for 3 nights starting from Saturday? S: Your booking was successful and your reference number is WKLNVDKN U: Does the room have a good view of the surrounding area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to past guests, the views were great and they could be admired. There were no complaints about the views.

src_text: reviews of ERAINA: 1.Great view from the downtown location though, so all-in-all it made for a great date night. 2.On the other hand, it's in a great spot in my favorite part of town and the service was fast and friendly. 3.The location of the restaurant could be better, because it's kind of in the middle of nowhere, but that's a small gripe. 4.The restaurant is in a really nice location, which makes it wonderful for a date night out on the town. reviews of MICHAELHOUSE CAFE: 1.That said, it's right on a busy street, so there's not really any view to speak of. 2.The only big complaints were the mediocre service and locations. 3.They were a bit unattentive and the location wasn't in a prime area. 4.The location is right in the best part of town too. 5.I really enjoyed the tasty food, well priced drinks, and the beautiful location of the restaurant. 6.The location and view were amazing. reviews of DARRYS COOKHOUSE AND WINE SHOP: 1.We dined outdoors because the location was nice and the weather was great. 2.The only downsides were the poor location in the city of the restaurant, as well as the outdated indoor decor. 3.Darry's gives you generous portions and the location is a block down from me. 4.It took us 30 minutes to get to the place from our home, which felt like way too long to drive for a simple brunch, and the service was pretty lackluster and slow. [SEP] U: I'm looking for something to go to in Cambridge. S: What area of town were you looking to visit? U: It doesn't matter. I'm looking for a nice museum. S: Broughton house gallery is a nice museum. Would you like the address? U: Yes, please. May I also have the postcode and the area of town? S: They're in the center of town. The postcode is cb11ln. U: Thank you, I'm also looking for an expensive restaurant that serves European food. S: I have 5 different restaurants available. Do you prefer to dine in a certain area of town? U: NO preference but lets try one in the center area since the museum is there. S: There are three choices, erania, michaelhouse cafe, and darrys cookhouse and wine shop.  Any preferences? U: Which restaurants are in a nice location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Each Eraina, Michaelhouse Cafe, and Darry's Cookhouse and Wine Shop have positives and negatives concerning their locations - mainly dependent on ease of access to each specific customer.

src_text: FAQs of BANGKOK CITY: 1.Bangkok City serves alcohol. reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.The food is good and affordable as are the drinks. 2.We both had Thai beers with our meal, and those weren't as pleasing; the same could be said for the view, which is of a dismal parking lot. 3.The Yellow Curry was some of the best I've ever had and the beer was top shelf and ice cold. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a restaurant. The restaurant should be in the centre and should serve modern eclectic food. S: There are no restaurants in that are would you like to try a different area? U: Are there any other expensive restaurants in that area that may be nice to visit? S: There are 33 entries for expensive restaurants in the centre. Would you like to hear some options? U: Are any of them modern eclectic food? S: No, there doesn't seem to be any modern eclectic places at all. Would you like a different type of cuisine? U: Dang...How about some Thai food instead S: As far as thai food goes, I happen to have one place. Good thing is they are very highly recommended. It is called Bangkok City. Would you like a reservation? U: Do they have high quality beer options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most past customers of Bangkok City say that the drinks there are good while one past customer said that they were not satisfied with their Thai beer.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: Hey there! Can you find me lodging, please? I'd like to stay at a guesthouse on the east end, if possible. S: Sure. What is the price range and how many rooms do you need to book? U: I need a guesthouse with a four star rating located in the east. S: There are 6 choices. May I recommend the moderately priced Carolina Bed and Breakfast? U: That sounds great. Please get me a room for one for three nights on Wednesday. S: My apologies. That booking was not available. Would you like to try another day or a shorter stay? U: Let's try just one night. S: It also isn't available for that. Is there another place I could recommend? U: Yes, one of the 5 other options. Same criteria. S: I was able to book Allenbell for you for 1 night on Wednesday. The reference number is  CS4G5QZO. U: Could you also confirm for me that the Allenbell offers good views from the rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to reviews from past guests, the Allenbell has excellent views from its rooms. Is there any other info I can find for you?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap hotel. S: alexander bed and breakfast is a guesthouse east of Cambridge center that is cheap, would you like more information? U: Does it have a star of 4. I don't care if it has free parking. S: Alexander bed and breakfast does have a 4 star rating, would you like help to book a room? U: Actually, you mentioned its in the east. I really prefer something in the centre of town thats cheap and 4-star rated. It can be a guesthouse or hotel. S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast is a cheap 4 star guesthouse in the centre of town. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Does it have strong water pressure in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast is really low and limited. Would you like me to book it for you?

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure was very low here so a shower takes a very long time. 2.I was glad I was travelling alone or showers would have taken forever. [SEP] U: Could you help me find a train that leaves on a wednesday after 8:45? S: Can you tell me where you are leaving from and where you are headed to? U: Certainly.  I need to travel from Leicester to Cambridge. S: The first train after 08:45 is the TR1672, which leaves at 09:09. U: I need it for four people please. S: Of course. Your reference number is TE5QEU4H. The total is 151.19 payable at the station. U: Great thank you I also need to find a guesthouse in a moderate price range. S: There are several guesthouses in the moderate price rance. I can recommend the Archway House. They're in the north, have 4 stars, and offer both free wifi and parking. U: Can you find one in the south, actually? S: I have the aylesbray lodge guest house or the bridge guest house. Would you like me to book one for you today? U: Can you try booking at the Aylesbray lodge for 2 nights, and may I have the postal code? S: How many guest will be staying with you at the lodge? Will the booking be for 4 guests also? U: Can you tell me if there's a good, strong shower available there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One downside to staying at the Aylesbray Lodge Guest House is the universally poor water pressure in the showers.

src_text: FAQs of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Free English/Irish breakfast is available here. reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.I found that I did not need to go to the diner with my family because the provided breakfast was excellent. 2.I was here with my girlfriend, and we surely enjoyed the tasty breakfast options we got. 3.Also, the breakfast is to die for, we were always stuffed in the morning times. reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.I was more than happy to have breakfast there than to get something out. 2.People at fast food restaurants need to train here! 3.Best of all was the plentiful and delicious breakfast options that I really enjoyed! 4.I was super pleased with the very tasty breakfast options that I enjoyed the morning I checked out. 5.I very much enjoyed the breakfasts. 6.I was also pleased with the breakfast options. 7.Not only was the breakfast immaculate, but the staff was so friendly. 8.The options were great and the meals were always tasty! FAQs of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Free English breakfast is served. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel, but not a guesthouse. All it needs is free parking. Can you recommend one? S: I am sorry are not hotels that match your criteria. Can I try to find a hotel in the south? U: Yes, I'm trying to find a hotel in the south with a 4 star rating, with free parking. S: Unfortunately there are no hotels that match those specifics, can you alter your location? U: Ok, let's try the same other criteria but how about a guesthouse? S: There are 2 guesthouses in the south that have 4 stars: Aylesbray Lodge Guest House (moderate prices), and Rosa's Bed and Breakfast (cheap). Would you like to book at one? U: Which one has the most creative breakfast spread? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Rosa's Bed and Breakfast provides a wider variety of breakfast choices then the Aylesbury Lodge Guest House but both are very good.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The bathrooms were spotless, and modern. 2.I had to ask them to clean the bathroom again. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The bathroom was also exceptionally clean when we first checked in to the room. 2.Furthermore, I noticed that the bathrooms were not recently cleaned and it appeared that somebody had used them prior to my partner and I. 3.And lastly, I found that the bathrooms and other restroom facilities were pristine and clean. 4.I hate to say anything negative but if I had to nitpick something it was that the bathroom wasn't as clean as I would have liked and the water pressure was low. reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Even the bathroom was clean to my standards and by the time I looked in the bathroom, I was determined to find at least a water spot or stray hair in the drain or something. 2.Nothing. 3.I also found that the bathroom was not at all clean enough when I checked in. 4.Nope. 5.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. [SEP] U: I need information about trains leaving from Cambridge and going to Bishops Stortford. S: Okay! I can help you with that. What day are you wanting to travel? U: I will be traveling on sunday. S: I have 10 trains leaving from Cambridge to Bishops Stortford on Sunday. The earliest leaves at 05:29 and the latest leaves at 23:29. Would you like to book a seat? U: I need one that leaves after 17:15 S: The first one out after that time is TR6742, departing at 17:29. Would you like to book a ticket on that train? U: Yes, I need two seats please. Can you give me the reference number after they are booked? S: Two seats are booked for TR6742. Your reference number is ESM407G4. Is there anything else I can do for you? U: I need to find a hotel too. S: What are your preferences regarding area, price range and star rating? Or do you have other needs? U: it should include free parking. The hotel should have a star of 2. S: So, I have three hotels in town that have 2 stars and parking. Do you have a preference on cost? I have two moderate and one expensive. U: I'm not picky, it just needs to have 2 stars. S: I need to know what price range please. U: I don't have a preference just 2 stars please. S: The Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge are both moderately priced and in the north, while Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge is expensive and in the east. Would you like to book? U: Which one has cleaner bathrooms? I want them spotless. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the Lovell Lodge and the express by Holiday Inn Cambridge have great reviews for their bathroom cleanliness. Would you like to make a reservation at either of these establishments?

src_text: reviews of DON PASQUALE PIZZERIA: 1.She was thrilled with the place, because they actually have gluten-free options which aren't so easy to find these days, and she was happy that they offered outdoor dining. 2.We both agree that the location is great, only 10 minutes from our home, but in my opinion the place doesn't have great views at all, so dining outside is a lackluster experience. reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.The restaurant does have a great view, so that helped provide some romantic ambiance, and the outdoor dining option was great because it gave us some privacy away from the crowd. [SEP] U: I would like to try an expensive, italian place while visiting cambridge. S: I have 5 of them. 4 in the centre area and one in the south. Would you like more information? U: Staying in the centre would be more convenient. What are my choices? S: How about cafe uno or don pasquale pizzeria? U: Which one has a great view with an outdoor eating area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Caffe Uno seems to have a better view. They both have outdoor dining options, but the view seems to be better at Caffe Uno.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.We could not enjoy the shower as the pressure was low. 2.The room was a bit small, so I felt a tiny cramped in there, and the water pressure could have been a lot better. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel called Kirkwood House please. S: I've located Kirkwood House. It's a guesthouse in the north. Would you like to book a room? U: May I please have the phone number for the hotel? S: Absolutely. That number is 01223306283. U: Does it have strong water pressure in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The viewers of the hotel say that the water pressure was weak. Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of BLOOMSBURY RESTAURANT: 1.I liked that the restaurant offered various non-alcoholic drinks. 2.I really liked that there were lots of non alcoholic bevereages for me to choose from. [SEP] U: I need a moderately priced restaurant in the centre. S: Certainly! What type of cuisine would you like? U: I would like sometthing International. S: Okay, I recommend Bloomsbury restaurant. Would you like me to book a table? U: Is there a good variety of nonalcoholic drinks at Bloomsbury Restaurant? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that have previously dined at the Bloomsbury Restaurant all appreciated the number of various non-alcoholic drinks.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.However, I was frustrated about the low water pressure which made my shower not enjoyable. [SEP] U: Hello could you give me some information on some entertainment places in the centre of Cambridge to go visit please? S: I'm sorry, there are no entertainment attractions listed in the centre of Cambridge. Would you like to search for something different? U: Are there any colleges? S: There are many colleges! Downing College on Regent Street is a great place to visit. It's free to get in! U: soundss good. what is the address and postcode? S: Downing College is on Regent Street, postcode cb21dq. Can I help you with anything else? U: Thank you. What is the entrance fee for Downing College? S: No, there is no entrance fee, it's free to enter. U: Great! Can you also help me with a place to stay, the one I'm looking for is called allenbell. S: Yes, the allenbell is a 4 star guesthouse in the cheap price range on the east side of town.  Would you like me to book this for you? U: Does it have strong shower pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, the water pressure at the guesthouse is quite low! Do you want to look for another place?

src_text: FAQs of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.Alimentum serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I need a moderately priced restaurant in the south of Cambridge S: I have two restaurants in the south. They serve italian or modern european.  Would you like information on either of those? U: No, I was hoping to eat some South African food. S: Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Sorry, not sure I follow.  Can you recommend a south african food restaurant?  Thanks. S: Unfortunately there are no restaurants that serve South African food but I can look for other types of cuisines if you want. U: Modern European will be fine.  Can you reserve a table at one please? S: Yes, I will book you a table now. U: Thank you. I need it for 4 people at 12:15 on Saturday S: I was able to book a table for two at restaurant alimentum located in the south your reference number is 70K7T35N. Is there anything else I can help with? U: Actually, do they happen to serve any beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: While I do not know if they serve beer, Restaurant Alimentum does have alcoholic beverages on their menu.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.They need to get better water pressure for sure. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.The water pressure, however, sucked. reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I want a restaurant in the city centre that serves Italian food. S: There are nine listings available. What price range were you interested in? U: I am interested in a restaurant that is in the expensive price range. S: Clowns Cafe is a restaurant in the city centre with that price range. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Sure! How close is the Cafe from my current location? S: The Clowns Cafe is in the centre area. Would you like me to book you a reservation? U: Yes, please. I'd like a table for 6 at 18:45 on Friday. S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number is : F29AMXP7. U: I also need to HOTEL to stay at in the centre. S: There are 3 hotels in that area. Would you prefer a moderately priced or expensive hotel? U: No price range, it doesn't have to have internet though. S: cityroomz is moderate with 0 stars, gonville hotel has 3 stars and is expensive, university arms is also expensive and has 4 stars?  Will any of these do? U: Are they all hotels or guesthouses? S: They are all hotels. Is this acceptable? U: Yes, as long as they have strong water pressure for the shower. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, the water pressure at Cityroomz is low. There have been complaints that it is too low to shower satisfactorily.

src_text: reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.My beer wasn't great, and everyone else agreed the drinks were average at best. 2.My colleagues and I enjoyed our food and drinks. 3.The Nirala has good food and drinks if you are looking for Indian food. FAQs of THE NIRALA: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at this restaurant. [SEP] U: Please find a place to eat in the moderate price range in the north. S: There are two great restaurants to choose from. One is a chinese restaurant and on is a indian resaurant. Do you have a preference? U: Let's go with Indian. Can you book me a table for Thursday at 14:00 for 8 people? S: Your table at The Nirala will be reserved for 15 minutes. The reference number is AM8RPHXF. Can I help you with anything else? U: Does this restaurant have a good beer menu? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Nirala does serve alcohol at the restaurant. One guest said they did not enjoy the beer but other guests enjoyed their drinks just fine.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: I am looking for a certain hotel.  I think that it is called something like Allenball S: Would you like me to make a reservation there for you? U: Do you know if they offer free parking? S: Yes, Allenbell has both free parking and internet and is in the cheap price range. Would you like to reserve a room? U: How clean are the rooms there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: A recent review of Allenbell complimented the clean and spotless rooms, and they were impressed with the fresh scent in the room.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.Also, the Wi-Fi was extremely slow. 2.This is very frustrating when you are trying to work and the delay is huge. 3.Also, the fast wi-fi was a huge plus for work I had to work to do on my laptop. FAQs of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.Wifi is free at Ashley Hotel. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for a place to stay and it has to have at least a two star rating and free WiFi. S: Okay, I found some options to fit your needs on the North side of town and on the east side. Do you have a preference for which area? U: No, I'm going to have my car with me so I can get to any part of town. But now that I think of it, I'd like to have free parking. S: I have three hotels meeting those requirements, two moderately priced and one expensive. U: Is there a swimming pool on the premises? S: Ashley Hotel does not have an onsite pool. Is there anything else you're looking for? U: Is my cat allowed to stay with me at Ashley Hotel? S: You are not allowed to stay with pets at the Ashley Hotel right now. What do you want to do next? U: Do they charge extra to use the wifi there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, when choosing to stay at a room in the Ashley Hotel guests aren't charged an additional fee for the internet, which can be both extremely slow and fast.

src_text: reviews of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.The only negative is that the location is just a 10 minute walk from my house; it's so yummy, I wish I lived right next door! 2.It was located in a mall so it was quite convenient but the view was of the parking lot so it was pretty bad. 3.The location wasn‚Äôt in the best part of town and it took a while to get there. How about Italian? S: Yes I have two in the south. do you have a preference in price range? U: Either one is fine, Ill go with what you recommend, please book me for 8 people at 18:45 on thursday. S: i have booked frankie and bennys	and Reference number is : JMGIG52I. U: is the location nice there? S: <extra_id_0>
