src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. src_text: FAQs of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Little Seoul does offer outdoor seating. reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.It was also a nice place to eat since there was an outdoor dining area. I am looking for a restaurant called the Little Seoul.  Also, could you give me the phone numbers, address, and entrance fees for both those places? S: Sure!  Let me get the pool information first. src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.But still, I appreciated the great view from my window, overlooking the nearby lake, and the room itself was very clean with a seriously comfortable bed. 2.Looking out of the balcony was the most beautiful view I've ever seen. [SEP] U: Hi, I need to find out if there's a train going to leicester that leaves on Monday. S: There are many. From where are you departing? U: I will be departing from Cambridge. S: The TR6715 leaves at 10:21 and you'll arrive by 12:06. Would you like me to book that for you? U: I just need the travel time please. S: The travel time is 105 minutes. Will that be all? U: I also need an expensive  hotel with free parking. S: Great I have 5 different options for you! U: I specifically am looking for a guesthouse in the east if that helps narrow things down. S: Unfortunately, once I add those specifications I don't have anything that fits. Did you want to try a different price range or area? U: Please look for something moderately priced, then. S: There are 2 choices. The Carolina Bed and Breakfast is the first. The other is the Warkworth House. Which would you prefer? U: Let's go with the Warkworth. Please make me a booking for Friday for 5 people, 3 nights. S: I have made that reservation and your reference number is VSHQKDBQ. U: Does my room overlook, the local landscape? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, past guests at Warkworth House have raved about the scenic natural views from their rooms. Do you have any other questions about your upcoming stay?

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.However, hotel was very noisy, which was a huge distraction to an otherwise good room. 2.Sometimes my kids make noise but we could hear noise from other room and TVs so I did not really worry about it. 3.If you want a quiet hotel, this one would be a pass because the outside was pretty noisy. [SEP] U: Can I please book a train to bishops stortford on saturday? S: Where would you like to depart from? U: I'd like to leave Cambridge and arrive by 17:30. S: I have the TR0121 train available. It departs from Cambridge at 15:29 and arrives at Bishops Stortford at 16:07. Would you like to book a ticket? U: Yes. Please book for 2 people. S: Your passage has been booked. 16.16 GPB will be payable at the station and your reference number is ZVFTQ0X3. Will that be all? U: Thank you. I also need help finding a place to stay. I'd prefer a guesthouse with free wifi S: May I ask a price range that you would like? U: I don't care about price. It needs to be in the north, however. S: We have many guesthouses located in the north, many of which are 4 stars. May I recommend the Kirkwood House located in the north for a moderate price with 4 stars? src_text: reviews of SHIRAZ RESTAURANT: 1.I was impressed with the quality but a little disappointed with the small portion and the service was not the best. 2.I wish portions were bigger though. 3.Its Mediterranean food was very tasty and the portions are perfect. 4.The Mediterranean food I ordered (Falafel, Greek Gyros, Hummus, and a Salad) were all very good potions, as well as high quality. 5.The food was good quality and you had affordable prices on drinks the food portion was good but there was no gluten-free option 6.Overall, its a decent place with a great view but dont expect to feast. 7.I loved the high quality food options there, as well as the large food portion sizes. reviews of THE GARDENIA: 1.The salad was good though but it was very small and left me wanting. 2.good portion of food, the only complaint was limited options for non-alcoholic drinks. 3.It was a fair price and the portions were huge! 4.The portions aren't as big as their competition but the ingredients are of a definite higher quality and it comes through in the final dishes. reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.The food was of good quality and there was good vegetarian option but i you had overpriced your food and it was of Small portion 2.The food was really small. 3.The servings could be bigger for the price but we enjoyed our food well enough. 4.What did disappoint though, was the small portion sizes. 5.The food was fresh and tasteful, and served with generous portions. 6.If only it was bigger, it would be amazing. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an attraction in the centre of town. S: There are 44 attractions that fit your criteria. Are you looking to visit a specific type of attraction? U: I'd love to visit a park, especially a botanical garden if one is in that area! S: Cambridge University Botanic Gardens is located in town centre. Would you like more information? U: Yes, may I have their phone number please? I'd also love to eat at a Malaysian place near the park. Any ideas? S: Unfortunately there are no restaurants that match that description. Could you like to try other food types? U: No, thanks for helping. Goodbye! S: Okay well please call back if you change your mind. U: Hi, I would love to try a Mediterranean restaurant. Do you have any suggestions? S: There are three options, the gardenia which is cheap in price range, along with la mimosa and shiraz restaurant which is expensive.  Ant preference? U: Which one of them offers good portion sizes? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The portions at the Gardenia aren't as large as their competition, at La Mimosa are disappointingly small, and at Shiraz Restaurant are perfect.

src_text: reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.I was glad that they have a pretty extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options, because I did try one cocktail and found it to be pretty mediocre. 2.Speaking of drinks, this isn't a place I would recommend if you have kids who want a lot of soda options, because their non-alcoholic menu is pretty limited. 3.Their non-alcoholic drink menu is actually pretty impressive, too, which is something that rarely stands out at restaurants. [SEP] U: Hello, is lan hong house still in operation? S: I'm sorry, can you tell me what type of business that is? U: Oops, sorry. Ian Hong is a restaurant. S: Yes I see that lan hong house is still in operation. Would you like more information? U: Can you tell me what kind of non-alcoholic drinks are served there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Lan Hong House features a fairly extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options which is highly recommended and impressive.

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The roons at the Bridge Guest House have lots of space and are newly refurbished, but may be smaller than you'd expect with little storage.

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was clean and comfortable and not expensive. 2.It could ruin your stay if you mind that kind of thing. 3.Sadly though, I found that the bed in the room wasn't very comfortable at all. 4.I do have to say, though, the bed is extremely uncomfortable. 5.and the interior of the room was very good and bed was also very much comfortable. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Sadly, the uncomfortable bed meant I didn't sleep much, which sort of crosses out the great breakfast benefit. 2.We were in agreement, that the beds were extremely comfortable and felt that they were very high-quality. 3.I was impressed with the friendliness of the staff, and the comfort of the beds in the room. 4.Good points were the comfortable bed, and I was glad that there was a designated place for smokers so I didn't have to walk through tons of cigarette smoke when leaving the hotel. reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.We both slept extremely well every night we were there. 2.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. 3.The bed really needed a new mattress, too. src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.My partner and I split a quiche and tapas, which came out to less than $30 for both of us - very reasonable price, especially considering the quality. 2.We were a little disappointed in the price of the drinks, but I guess considering how reasonable the food prices are, they had to raise costs somewhere. U: I'd like to leave Thursday after 8:30 please. S: I have train TR6009 that leaves at 08:34 and will arrive in Peterborough at 09:24. Would that work for you? U: What is the travel time? S: The travel time is 50 minutes. U: Do they offer any ticket discounts for children? S: Children under 5 are free. Children from 5 to 16 years old have a 50% discount. U: Yes please book me a room for 4 people for 2 nights starting from Tuesday. S: Booking was successful at ashley hotel	.

src_text: reviews of LIMEHOUSE: 1.The view was breathtaking, too. 2.I had to be up early for meetings every morning, so starting the day with my coffee and a great view was really nice. src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.The bathroom, which is super important to my family and me, was super clean when we checked in. 2.The bathroom was spotless, too. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The negatives is that the bathroom wasn't that clean when we first arrived and that the beds could've been more comfortable. 2.The place had everything we needed, a large big room that never felt cramp, a nice clean bathroom, and a very kid-friendly atmosphere. 3.When we went to use the facilities at this hotel, we both noticed how the bathrooms had been cleaned and they were pristine in quality. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a Mexican restaurant with expensive food. S: Chiquito Restaurant Bar is very good.  Would you like a table? U: Is that in the south area of town? S: Yes. Shall I book it? U: Yes, could you please book me a table for 5 at 14:30 on Friday? S: I've made those reservations and your reference number are  OZZGLCVB. U: Thank you. That's all I need today! S: Okay I am glad I could be of help. Thank you for calling. U: Hey, wait,  just a second! I just remembered, I need a place to stay with 4 stars, preferably a hotel. S: There are 3 places available. Do you have an area in mind? U: No, I don't have a preference. I'd just like it to be expensive, please? S: i have 2 places. the huntingdon marriott hotel and the university arms hotel. which would you like? U: Which one has the most hygienic restroom facilities? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The bathrooms at the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel are excellent when it comes to cleanliness. The University Arms Hotel has clean bathrooms but you have to wait until your room is ready.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. 2.However, the room itself was very open and provided a lot of room in order to relax. [SEP] U: Hi, I am planning a trip and could use some advice on a place to stay. S: Sure. What is your price range and what side of town will you be interested in? U: I would like a moderate price hotel in Cambridge. S: I have some moderate priced hotels in the north and center.  Do you have a location preference? U: I'm not concerned about the area but it doesn't need to include internet. S: There are two 2 star hotels in the north part of town. Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge. Both include free internet and parking. Do you have a preference? U: I prefer a bigger room. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge receive conflicting reviews as to the roominess of their guest rooms. Some thought the rooms were spacious, while other past guest felt cramped and confined.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.I was overall quite pleased with the value for the money. 2.Great value. 3.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 4.I was at Ashley hotel with my wife, and we were pleasantly surprised at the good quality, considering the price. 5.The room provided a pretty decent value for the price spent and there was a nice variety of breakfast options, including lots of fresh fruit and smoothies. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I thought the price was attractive and feel it was definitely worth the money spent. 2.I didn't pay too much, so I think it is great value. 3.The clean room was very welcoming and I thought it was good value, considering what I had paid for it. [SEP] U: Find me a moderately cheap restaurant in Cambridge that serves russian food S: There are no listings with those criteria. Do you want to change some criteria? U: How about British food instead? S: There are 5 restaurants which match your requirements. Are you looking for a restaurant in a particular part of town? U: No any part of town will work. S: Would you like me to book you at The Oak Bistro at 6 Lensfield Road? U: Can I just get the area, phone number, and postcode of it? S: The Oak Bistro is in the area of centre, the phone number is 0122332361, and the postcode is cb21ab. U: Thanks. Also I am looking for a guesthouse hotel with 2 stars in the north. S: I'm very sorry but there are no results matching your criteria. Would you like to change the star rating, or try a different area? U: Can you see if there is just a normal hotel in the north? It still needs to be a 2 star. S: Yes, I have 2 hotels in that area and with that rating. The Ashley hotel or Lovell Lodge. Would you like me to book one of them? U: Which one would give me a better value? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Ashley and Lovell both have good ratings for value. Is there something particular you're looking for?

src_text: reviews of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.The only negative is that the location is just a 10 minute walk from my house; it's so yummy, I wish I lived right next door! 2.It was located in a mall so it was quite convenient but the view was of the parking lot so it was pretty bad. 3.The location wasn‚Äôt in the best part of town and it took a while to get there. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Location is in a great part of town. Very conveniently located in the mall. Only downside was view overlooks parking lot.

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.Restaurant Alimentum is a good place for European dishes at a good price. 2.We were a little disappointed in the price of the drinks, but I guess considering how reasonable the food prices are, they had to raise costs somewhere. 3.The goulash was so good that I wanted more after I was done, even though I was full, and the price was cheap as dirt. 4.My partner and I split a quiche and tapas, which came out to less than $30 for both of us - very reasonable price, especially considering the quality. 5.All and all it was a great experience with friendly waiters and food wasn't too expensive and a truly European experience. [SEP] U: Hi, I need a really expensive restaurant. S: Well there are quite a few. I see african, asian, and british cuisine. What area will you be in so that I can narrow down the search U: Actually, I was confused. I'm really looking for some lodging accommodations. I'd like a 4 star location with free wifi. Something that's expensive, please. Doesn't matter if it has free parking. S: Wonderful how about the huntingdon marriott. Rave 4 star accommodations and free wifi & parking U: That sounds wonderful, could you please make a reservation. S: For how many and for how long? U: I don't need a reservation at this time, but I do need the address, postcode, and area for the Huntingdon Marriott, please. S: It is located in the west on kingfisher way, hinchinbrook business park. Post code pe296fl. U: Great! Can you also help me find a modern european restaurant in the south? S: Restaurant Alimentum looks wonderful! It is located at 152 - 154 Hills Road U: Can you tell me if they are well known for their value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, diners consistently note that prices and the food quality are both good. Would you like me to book a table?

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.The location is actually not as remote as it seems and I made it there in about 10 mins by car. 2.Otherwise, loved the restaurant and wish that it was closer to my house, because the location is pretty inconvenient. 3.The location was nice and close to my home, and the staff was friendly enough. 4.The location isn't in the best of places and could be closer to town. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Further, they made me feel like they were happy to serve me whenever I needed anything or called. 2.The Allenbell is a very friendly place to be, as I and my family were welcomed with warm smiles. 3.They were very friendly. 4.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 5.While the staff was incredibly friendly, I was disappointed that housekeeping was not offered on a daily basis. 6.They were unfriendly and unprofessional, which was really disappointing. 7.First, I'd like to say that the staff was wonderful. 8.Unfortunately, the staff really ruined our stay. src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. src_text: reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.The only dislikes we had were the slow service time and the average drinks. 2.I was pleased with the great service from the wait staff, and my Hot Pot was really high quality and very tasty. 3.The only downside of the experience was the mediocre location and service, as the food took forever to finish. reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.The service was very friendly and good, the prices good too. 2.The workers were very friendly. 3.On top of that, the service was average and the food was rather basic. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The food was delicious but the drinks tasted flat. 2.The drinks were reasonably priced and the food was absolutely amazing, it both looked and tasted amazing, especially the spring rolls, possibly the best spring rolls I've ever tasted.. 3.The food and drinks were exceptional We had the Banh Cuon and Com Tam. 4.My beverage was so-so at best, but at least the drinks were cheap and there were lots of non-alcoholic options . 5.I thought the food and drinks were affordable. 6.The drink selection was expansive but pricey, and what I ordered did not stand out in any way. 7.They have good prices on drinks and good portions on meals. 8.After dinner I decided to order a drink, but was quite disappointed. 9.I found it to be a bit expensive for what was provided, especially compared to the delicious food. 10.Unfortunately the same can't be said for the drinks. 11.Thanh Binh also has a pretty great menu of specialty drinks with really reasonable and affordable prices, which is great because their non-alcoholic menu leaves a lot to be desired. FAQs of THANH BINH: 1.Thanh Binh does serve alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm looking for vietnamese food. I would like the restaurant name and address. src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.The food all tasted great, but we realized why the food was cheaper than usual and it was because the portion sizes were kind of small. 2.It should have been more than enough food for all of us but the portions were tiny. 3.They did serve huge portions and the drinks were really awesome! 4.The food was of good quality , you had a nice view but i didn't like the food portion 5.At least the food tasted great which made up for the portion size a little bit. 6.All of the food came in great portion sizes and were great in taste. reviews of KYMMOY: 1.The food also had very small portion sizes and should have been larger servings. 2.It was cheap, but that's because the amount of side dishes given was really small. 3.Everything was well-prepared and arrived to our table piping hot, with really good portion sizes that were great for sharing. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a high end Asian restaurant S: There are two high end Asian restaurants, Saigon City and Kymmoy. Would you like more information? src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a 4 star hotel, and it doesn't need to have free parking. S: I have three hotels that meet your criteria. Are you looking for a specific part of town? U: No, but price is important- anything moderately priced on your list? S: I have a cheap 4 star in west, and two expensive ones - one in west and one centre. Which one are you interested in? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that have previously stayed at the Allenbell were impressed by the fresh scent and cleanliness of its spotless rooms.

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.The bed was comfy so I slept well. 3.The only issue that I had is that the bed was not as soft as would have liked. src_text: reviews of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.At times, we felt like we were eating appetizer-sized entrees, and we weren't able to share things with each other easily. 2.The level of drink and food quality is sublime. 3.I loved the large food portion size. 4.But don't come here hungry, or you'll leave disappointed! 5.While everything was very tasty and we felt that the food was high in quality, the portion sizes were a disappointment. 6.They have crostini, boudin blanc and crispy grits too. 7.It's a gastropub with a pretty varied menu, and we ended up with the crispy grits, the boudin blanc, the beer-braised chicken stew, and a sticky toffee pudding for dessert. reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.Delicious! 2.The cooks weren't afraid to be generous with their portions, too. 3.It was awesome, and a great introduction to these kinds of foods as they tasted home cooked and locally sourced. 4.We ordered some dishes to share, and I would have to say that they were all tasty. [SEP] U: I need to book a train S: I can help you with that. Where are you headed? U: I am going to Cambridge. S: Great, can you tell me where you will be departing from and which day you want to travel and at what time? U: I will be leaving from London Liverpool Street going to Cambridge on Sunday. S: There is a train that leaves at 5:39 would you like me to book it for you ? U: Yes please, just for one person. S: Your booking was successful. Your reference number is DWZMV9KS. U: Thanks! Now can you help me find an expensive gastropub restaurant in the centre please? S: There are two that meet your criteria. The Backstreet Bistro, and The Slug and Lettuce. Would you like me to book one of those for you? U: Which one serves crispy grits? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Crispy grits are only mentioned for the slug and lettuce. No comments were provided as to the quality of this dish.

src_text: reviews of DE LUCA CUCINA AND BAR: 1.However, the portions could definitely be a bit bigger and while the location itself was nice, the view was pretty bland. 2.The bar location is pretty good and quite. 3.I don't want to get mugged after having the best drinks in town. 4.First, what I liked:  there were many options for me (i'm a vegetarian), there were tons of different drink options, a pleasant location, and overall the quality of the food was quite high. 5.We had a really enjoyable meal here, the only bad thing is that it's not a great part of town, it's kind of sad looking on the outside, you wouldn't expect it to be much of anything, but the food is so good it more than makes up for it. 6.De Luca's  is in a rather seedy spot though, and I wish they'd move to a better part of town. 7.De Luca's new spot on the waterfront is perfect. reviews of RIVERSIDE BRASSERIE: 1.Riverside Brasserie serves good portions in a nice location with a good view. 2.If you can forgive Riverside Brasserie for its mediocre location, in the middle of a nondescript strip mall, you'll be delighted by their modern European cuisine, which includes a wide range of options such as goulash, tapas, quiche, and freshly-baked pretzels. 3.They have an outdoor area which was nice, and overall it was in a nice location. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for a place to eat - moderately priced in the centre area. S: There are many, can you tell me what type of food you are looking for? U: I would love to try modern european. Do you have that type? S: I have two available. Both are moderately priced. I have the De Luca Cucina and Bar. The other is the Riverside Brasserie. Do you prefer one of these? U: Which restaurant is in a more desirable, energetic location, the De Luca Cucina and Bar or the Riverside Brasserie? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both places received mixed reviews on the desirability of their locations. Overall though, past guests seemed to slightly prefer Riverside Brasserie's view and overall location.

trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Bedouin does serve alcoholic drinks. The quality is high although one reviewer of the beer thought it was just okay and overpriced.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The breakfast options were plentiful, too. 2.In the morning, we were offered great breakfast choices, which we enjoyed. 3.In the morning I had breakfast and they had lots of things to choose from. 4.We have very different tastes in food, and we were both satisfied with what was available. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Sadly, the uncomfortable bed meant I didn't sleep much, which sort of crosses out the great breakfast benefit. 2.There were only pancakes, eggs, and frosted flakes so it was pretty mediocre. 3.Starting the day with a great breakfast when you're away from home goes a long way in performance in the business world. 4.The only complaint was the lack of options for breakfast. 5.While I was not pleased with the slow wi-fi and small room, I was content with their awesome breakfast options, friendly and engaging staff members and the best part! 6.The location is exceptional and the breakfast options were fantastic. 7.We enjoyed the options they had for breakfast and the cost of the hotel was very cheap. reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Also, I found that the provided morning food options were abundant and delicious. 2.The location is convenient and the breakfast was good which was given as I arrived at morning. 3.In the morning, the breakfast also had pretty good options. FAQs of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Breakfast is available to buy at the property for 6 GBP per person FAQs of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at the Hobsons House. FAQs of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The Hamilton Lodge does not offer a free breakfast. You need to pay 10 GBP per person. [SEP] U: I need a hotel, parking doesn't matter to me though. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. src_text: reviews of BLOOMSBURY RESTAURANT: 1.That said, their food menu is incredibly affordable, and the quality of their International-inspired cuisine is top notch. 2.The drinks and the food prices were very affordable. 3.They had a lot to offer and the food was very delicious, but it was way too expensive. 4.The foods were really affordable and they tasted so good. 5.Tasty, and well-prepared, but just too expensive. 6.However, the food was a bit overpriced as well as mediocre, and there were no vegetarian options. 7.Bloomsbury is one of the most affordable places I've ever eaten at with a large group. 8.And the best part was how affordable it was. reviews of THE VARSITY RESTAURANT: 1.The prices were surprisingly affordable and the food was on time and great quality and of course tasted excellent! 2.But because the prices were cheap overall, we only got small amounts of them which was disappointing. 3.The portions were generous, but they weren't too expensive. 4.My coworkers couldn't decide on one cuisine to get, so in the end we went to The Varsity Restaurant which served International food so everyone will probably find something they like at a non-wallet hurting price. 5.We did not spend as much as we thought we would, so it speaks to how affordable its prices are, especially for such high-quality foods. 6.The Varsity Restaurant is the place to be for affordable, high-quality food options with great service and a prime, downtown location. reviews of THE MISSING SOCK: 1.The food was of good quality and affordable prices and had a various vegetarian option, i really like the atmosphere 2.The bill was high and both the food and drinks were costly. 3.The food was expensive, but definitely high quality as were the drinks. 4.One of my coworkers commented how there was a good selection of vegetarian options on the menu, but I noticed how expensive everything was! [SEP] U: I need to find a place to stay while in Cambridge, I do not need it to have internet but I do need it to have free parking. S: There are currently no hotels in the Cambridge area that have parking, is there another area close by that would work for you? U: maybe you can suggest a place close to the area of south, I would appreciate that, thank you S: There is nothing in the south. Do you really need parking? U: Yeah, I do.  What about to the west? S: What are the preferences you have for the hotel? I cannot seem to find one fitting the criteria you have listed. U: I need the hotel to at least have free wifi. Can you accommodate? S: There are 4 hotels in the south with free wifi and parking. What star rating would you like? U: I don't really care about the star rating. I just would like free wifi and would need to book for 3 nights for 6 people. S: what price range are you looking for? U: I don't have a preference. S: Ok. How about the Bridge Guest House. I'm happy to book that for you. I just need to know what day you'll be arriving. U: I will be arriving Sunday. S: All booked! The reference number is O59MRSHK. U: I am also looking for a restaurant in the same area.  Preferably vegetarian food in the moderate price range. S: there are no vegetarian food restaurants. U: Okay. Is there one that serves International food? S: There are three locations that serve international cuisine. The Missing Sock, The Varsity Restaurant, and the Bloomsbury Restaurant. Are you interested in any of these? U: Which is a good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Varsity gets the most positive reviews on the prices and portions. The Missing Sock and Bloomsbury get mixed reviews. Would you like to know more about any of them?

src_text: reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.The quality of food was good and the drinks were affordable. 2.The food and drink prices were affordable. 3.It's a nice location and they a terrific variety of drink options. 4.The only thing that I didn't like is that they didn't have a lot of drinks for us to choose from. 5.They knew this, as they imported very special wines and beers to enjoy this view. 6.In addition, the quality of drinks and food were good. 7.The small portions and the slightly watered-down drinks were about the only downsides. 8.Lots of drinks to choose from, but it's out of the way from most places so you kind of just...have to drive there, if that makes sense. FAQs of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.Backstreet Bistro does serve wines and beers. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a gastropub restaurant. S: The Backstreet Bistro serves gastropub food. U: Do they serve alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Bistro serves a variety of alcohol that includes special wines and beers. Drinks are affordable and decent quality. Some however think the drinks are water downed.

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was no more than a few noises I heard during my entire stay, I was able to keep my head clear. 2.I stayed here with my family, and we were able to get a good night's rest, as it was very quiet. 3.I mean they are like home comfortable, and also it's very quiet so we didn't have to worry about any loud noises. 4.This place definitely delivered in that regard. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 2.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.To top it off, they weren't even that good! 2.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 3.The Scrambled Eggs with Tomatoes had incredibly fresh and delicious ingredients and was cooked perfectly. reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.I also liked the high quality of the foods and how it really mixed in well with everything. 2.They serve excellent Chinese Cuisine there. 3.I really enjoyed how large the portion sizes were and how excellent the food tasted. reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.They all tasted really good and to top it off they were affordable. 2.Not only did the food taste great, but it was very affordable. 3.Between us we ordered scrambled eggs with tomatoes, dumplings, ma po tofu, and chow mein, all of which were superbly great. Is there a particular destination, or even an arrival or departure time you need? U: Going to norwich. Arrive by 17:00. S: TR4969 will get you to Norwich by 10:55.  Would you like me to book it for you? U: I need the price, travel time, and train ID. S: Certainly.  The price is 14.08 pounds and the travel time is 79 minutes	. U: Thanks. src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train departing peterborough arriving by 14:30? S: I am getting the information up now, what day this week will you need that? U: On Sunday please S: Train TR3782 	fits your needs. For how many people ? U: 7 people, please. S: Yes your booking was successful and your reference number is 5WS52ANO. U: Perfect.  Can you also help me find a hotel while we're there? It should also have free parking. S: Wow, there are 29 hotels that meet your criteria. Do you know which area of town you'd prefer to stay, or if a guesthouse is preferred over a hotel, or even how many stars or a price range of a possible location? There are so many to choose from! U: I would like to find a hotel on the east side. I need parking but wifi is not necessary. S: express by holiday in cambridge is the only hotel in the east it is expensively priced, do you want to go with that or include guestouses in a search? U: Can you make sure the rooms have good shower pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water at the express by Holiday Inn in Cambridge is low in pressure rating according to guest reviews. Would you like to look elsewhere?

src_text: reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.It was not as flavorful as I'd have liked and the consistency was just runny, but the servers were awesome and I enjoyed the view from the patio. 2.We enjoyed a nice view from inside of the restaurant. reviews of THE OAK BISTRO: 1.It was a gorgeous view. 2.The first thing that stood out is that from my seat I could see a lake as I was on the second floor. 3.it is pleasantly decorated and the view is enjoyable. reviews of COTE: 1.The view was my favorite part about Cote. [SEP] U: I'm looking for hotels in the center. S: The Alexdander Bed and Breakfast is a good recommendation. It has four stars and affordable pricing. The Gonville Hotal is also a good choice. Would you like the address to either? U: I would like for the hotel to have a 4 star rating and include free wifi. S: There are two, one in the expensive price range, one in the cheap price range. Which do you prefer? U: I don't have a preference. S: The University Arms hotel fits all of your criteria, would you like me to book a room? U: Yes, please book a room for 3 people and 5 nights. S: What day would you like to start your reservation? U: Please start the reservation on Monday. What is the reference number? I also need a restaurant that serves australasian food at a moderate price in the same area as the hotel S: I am sorry but there are no restaurants in that area which meet your criteria.  Would you like me to search for another type of cuisine? U: Could you see if there is a restaurant that serves British food in the same area as the hotel? S: Certainly, we have either restaurant one seven, the oak bistro, the copper kettle, cotto. Can I book a table at one, if so how many will be dining? U: Which one has the better view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The view at all three places the Oak Bistro, The Copper Kettle, and the Cote are all very pleasing to the eye for dining experience.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: I need a list of cheap places to stay that include free parking. S: Alexander bed and breakfast is in the cheap price range in the centre of town. U: How's the water pressure at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast, strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the water pressure at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast cannot be classified as strong, as theirs is limited and rather low.

src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: I've heard of your Museum of Classical Archaeology, and I'd like to know more about it. S: The Museum of Classical Archaeology is in the west part of town. Would you like the address or phone number? U: The west part of town? Sure, give me more info about it? S: It's address is at sidgwick avenue and it is free to enter. Would you like their phone number as well? U: No, but I need a cheap chinese restaurant nearby as well. S: There aren't any cheap Chinese restaurants nearby but there are 4 in town. Would you be interested in any of those? U: Yes, please.  I need it for 8 people at 14:00 Thursday and a reference number. S: I have that booked for you at Charlie Chan's in the centre of town. Reference number E41S2AFE U: Is the staff known to be friendly? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the staff is known for being very friendly at Charlie Chan's. Can I help you with anything else today?

src_text: reviews of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.As soon as I stepped in, I was met with a very pleasing aesthetic. 2.It was quiet, too - as quiet as a restaurant can get, anyway. 3.I was able to just sit and talk without worrying about other noise butting in. [SEP] U: Where can I find the Express by Holiday Inn in Cambridge? S: it is found  in the east , 15-17 norman way coldhams business park. you can call them on 01223866800 U: Okay. Can I book 4 nights at the Express please? S: Sure! How many people will staying? U: 6 people, 4 nights starting on friday. S: I will book it for you now. U: Could I please get the reference number after you book it. S: Booking is complete. Your reference number is UQG3WI8I. Do you need anything else? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Golden Curry offers a quiet environment where you can dine with your party in peace. Would you like to make a reservation?

src_text:
reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Carolina Bed and Breakfast had a pretty mediocre location, it seemed too far away from the places I came to town to visit. S: The TR3677 arrives at 17:58. Would you like to book it? U: Yes for 2 people on a Tuesday please. And I would like the reference number. S: I'm going with TR5793 since you are travelling on Tuesday arriving at the same time. The total fee is 19.6 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : 4NLGW7WM. U: Thanks so much. Can you also help me look for the Carolina Bed and Breakfast? S: Carolina Bed and Breakfast is in the East, it is a guesthouse in the moderate price range. Would you like to book a room? U: Yes please. Two nights from Tuesday for two people. src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Also, the breakfast was good with many options. 2.When getting ready to start my day, I found that the complementary options for food were of high variety and great quality. 3.It is always nice to have tons of choices. 4.The breakfast options suprised me, I hadn't expected them to be so plentiful as well as delicious! U: Me and 6 of my friends want to leave sometime after 8:30. S: Please tell me what place you want to depart from? U: I'll be leaving cambridge on Tuesday and need a booking. It will cost 70.7 GBP at the station, and your reference number is UXGLG4VF. Can I help you with anything else? U: If I need more WiFi on the train, can I buy more? S: No, unfortunately additional data is not available on the train. Do you need assistance with anything else? U: Can I get an expensive place to stay?  A hotel more specifcally, 2 stars please. S: There is only one in that price range. It is express by holiday inn cambridge. U: Can you tell me if they allow smoking in the rooms or somewhere on the property? S: Yes, there is a designated smoking area. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Can you book a room for me? S: Of course! What day, how many people, and how many nights? U: I'm looking just for the phone number, address, and area of the hotel. S: Would you like express by holiday inn? U: Do they offer an Italian breakfast? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I am not sure if they offer an Italian breakfast, but I do know that they have a continental breakfast with good options.

[SEP] U: I would like to visit a college while in cambridge. S: We have 18 colleges in Cambridge! Is there a certain area you had in mind? If not, I recommend Churchill College in the west. U: I was really hoping for something in the centre of town. S: There are 13 colleges in the centre. Would you like me to recommend one? U: Yes that would be great! S: Their postcode is cb23bu. Can I help you find anything else today? U: Yes, I also need to book the aylesbray lodge guest house. Starting Saturday. 3 nights, 5 people. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, according to two past guests of Aylesbray Lodge Guest House, the water pressure was quite weak.

src_text: reviews of NANDOS CITY CENTRE: 1.While the service level was a bit lacking, the view from the restaurant overlooking the town is really enjoyable, and the location is fantastic. 2.The staff is friendly. 3.Honestly, the service really ruined this place for me. 4.The service was delightful here, every employee was very cheerful. 5.The service was amazing, I was instantly seated and had drinks brought to me. 6.The food came out fast to me and was some of the best food I have had at a restaurant. 7.The service was fast and prompt and the price was descent. 8.I ordered the Caldo Verde, and it wasn't horrible, but it wasn't good enough to make up for the poor service to go there again. 9.It did take a little longer for the food to arrive at the table and our plates took a while to clear from the wait staff. 10.I tried a recommended beer by a very unenthusiastic server. 11.Once we arrived I was happy that all the employees were very friendly. reviews of NANDOS: 1.The only downside was the waitress had a bit of an attitude but that didn't spoil an otherwise fantastic evening. 2.All of the food was average at best, and the service we found to be quite slow. 3.Food is always fantastic, as is the service, and it's located right in the best part of town, walking distance from all the major attractions. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train to go to cambridge on tuesday. S: I am happy to help with that. Can you tell me where you would be leaving from? U: From London Kings Cross and I need it to leave after 18:15. S: I have 3 trains available. They leave at 19:17, 21:17 and 23:17. Would you prefer one of those? U: I'd like to book the 19:17 train for 8 please and need the reference number. S: I was successfully able to book the 19:17 train for 8 people.  The total fee is 188.8 GBP payable at the station.  Your reference number is L0TQ4FD6. U: I will also need a place to dine. I'm thinking something cheap, after that. Maybe Portuguese food? S: There are two cheap Portuguese restaurants located in the city, the Nandos and Nandos City Centre. Would you like to book a table with either of these? U: Is the service great? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The service at Nandos ranges from average to fantastic while that at Nandos City Centre is either lacking and unenthusiastic to delightful.

src_text: reviews of LOCH FYNE: 1.I thought the Riesling was excellent. 2.Wash it all down with a bottle of their house Sauvignon Blanc, and thank me later! 3.We also ordered Cabernet Sauvignon, which was absolutely delicious. 4.The Chardonnay was perfect for our meal. 5.Drinks were really good, as was the food. FAQs of LOCH FYNE: 1.Loch Fyne serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a seafood restaurant in the centre. S: Sure thing! There is the Loch Fyne restaurant in that area that you may enjoy. Their phone number is 01223362433, if you would like to call for a reservation. U: Is there any other restaurant that you could try for me before I call myself? S: Is there a different cuisine you would be willing to try? Asian or Italian maybe? U: As long as the seafood restaurant is in the centre I am fine with 18:00 and I need the reference number. src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.We could not enjoy the shower as the pressure was low. 2.The room was a bit small, so I felt a tiny cramped in there, and the water pressure could have been a lot better. [SEP] U: Can I please book a train to bishops stortford on saturday? S: Where would you like to depart from? U: I'd like to leave Cambridge and arrive by 17:30. S: I have the TR0121 train available. It departs from Cambridge at 15:29 and arrives at Bishops Stortford at 16:07. Would you like to book a ticket? U: Yes. Please book for 2 people. S: Your passage has been booked. 16.16 GPB will be payable at the station and your reference number is ZVFTQ0X3. Will that be all? U: Thank you. I also need help finding a place to stay. I'd prefer a guesthouse with free wifi S: May I ask a price range that you would like? U: I don't care about price. It needs to be in the north, however. S: We have many guesthouses located in the north, many of which are 4 stars. May I recommend the Kirkwood House located in the north for a moderate price with 4 stars? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If a strong shower is a must during your stay, one should avoid the Kirkwood House as their pressure is rather low.

src_text: reviews of TANG CHINESE: 1.Also, we could've had a better view. 2.We all loved the view of the city while we dined. 3.Those reviews were correct, everything was phenomenal there from how cheap the food was to being able to see the moon perfectly out the balcony. 4.If I had any complaints I would say that the view and location are less than I would normally desire but the food made up for it. reviews of KYMMOY: 1.The view was very nice. 2.Sure, the place doesn't have a great view or amazing decor, but go for the food and you won't be disappointed! 3.The restaurant didn't have any open windows which was a bummer, couldn't see anything because it was all curtained up. 4.The restaurant had authentic, Oriental decorations inside, and the windows offered a breathtaking view of the nearby lake. 5.However, the view from the restaurant is just okay. 6.The restaurant was in a great location in town, but from our seat we had a below average view of the outdoors. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place called tang chinese S: I have located tang chinese, it is in the centre of town.  Would you like me to book you? U: Yes.  Please book a table for 4 people at 17:00 on Friday. S: I am sorry this time is not available. Another restaurant perhaps? U: Are there any other restaurants for the same price range in the same area? S: Kymmoy is also in the centre. It is an expensive Asian restaurant. Would you like me to book this one for you? U: Is the view as good at Kymmoy as Tang Chinese? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the Kymmoy and Tang Chinese are described having anywhere from an average view to a breathtaking view. So they measure up in the view area very well.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: We are planning to be in cambridge. We would like to go to a swimmingpool in the east. Are there any available in the east? S: Yes! src_text: reviews of HOME FROM HOME: 1.I stayed here on my business trip, and after a hard day of business meetings, it was nice to retire to a large comfortable room. 2.I wished it was a bit bigger. 3.The only negative was the size of the room. [SEP] U: i'm looking for a train leaving on thursday and arriving by 11:45 S: There is a train leaving Thursday from Kings Lynn at 10:11, arriving at Cambridge at 10:58. Would you like me to pull up other listings? U: Can you look up trains departing from Broxbourne instead? S: I would recommend TR0393 which leaves Broxbourne at 5:32 and arrives in Cambridge at 6:32. U: Great!  Can you book 2 seats for me on that one? S: Your train has been booked. Your total cost is 35.79, payable at the station. Your reference number is SQUCLNLA.  Can I help with anything else? U: I need to book a room in a guesthouse that has free parking. S: There are 21 guesthouses in town with free parking. Do you prefer a specific area of town or do you have a price range? U: Not really but I do need a 4 star rating. S: Do you have a price range in mind? And will you need wifi? U: WiFi is not necessary, but I would like free parking. I'm looking for mid range pricing. S: There are nine moderately priced guesthouses available. I suggest Home From Home, a 4-star guesthouse that comes with internet and parking. Would you like to book a room? U: Sounds great! I'll need to book a room for 2 people, for 2 nights starting Thursday. S: Excellent. You are all set, and your reference number is : 2GHO31DA.  Anything else I can assist you with today? U: Wait, is that a large room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, the opinions are mixed.  One third felt the rooms were comfortable and large, while two thirds thought the only negative was the room size and wished it were a bit bigger.

src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.Between us we ordered Korma, Naan, Vindaloo and Chicken Tikka Masala, all of which were very affordable and well made. 2.I also thought that the dishes were authentic and quality. 3.While the portion sizes for food are generous the food is nothing special and the service not very enthusiastic. reviews of RAJMAHAL: 1.The quality of the food more than made up for it however. 2.Everything was delicious and my wife was happy that there were many gluten-free choices available. 3.The portions were generous and the foods were high quality to boot. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Rajmahal gets high ratings for their food quality but no mention of Vindaloo. The Curry Prince has reviews that say the Vindaloo is well-made and affordable. Is there anything else you like to know about them?.

src_text: reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.The food was incredibly good, some of the best Indian cuisine I've ever had! 2.I got the korma, tandoori chicken, biryani and samosas, and they were all superb. 3.My boyfriend had the tandoori chicken and it was piping hot and so good. reviews of THE GANDHI: 1.But if you just want good food, you might want to give it a try. 2.The food itself was very good. 3.High quality ingredients, and great prices. 4.Between us we ordered Chicken Tikka Masala and Tandoori Chicken, both of which were superb. reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.Everything was fresh and good. 2.The food was very high quality and gluten-free! trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Well all of the restaurants had good reviews for their food, the Kohinoor and the Gandhi in particular had good reviews for their tandoori chicken.

src_text:
reviews of J RESTAURANT: 1.Both meals were very high quality so it definitely made up for the view. 2.Everything we got tasted amazing and we were very happy to take the leftovers home for lunch another day. 3.However, the food was pretty good so it was worth it. 4.While the food itself was lacking, the place almost made up for it between the lovely atmosphere and beautiful view from our table. 5.Food was alright. 6.We tried tofu, spring rolls, scrambled eggs, and the hot pot and it was all very good. reviews of DOJO NOODLE BAR: 1.The food is made from good stuff but it won't break the bank. 2.The portion of food was great and tha food was high quality. 3.Their Ma Po Tofu is to die for and the Dumplings are tender and juicy and mouthwatering. 4.I was shocked with how high quality everything was. 5.If you like Asian cuisine you'll love Dojo noodle bar. src_text: reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.It was not as flavorful as I'd have liked and the consistency was just runny, but the servers were awesome and I enjoyed the view from the patio. 2.We enjoyed a nice view from inside of the restaurant. reviews of THE OAK BISTRO: 1.It was a gorgeous view. 2.The first thing that stood out is that from my seat I could see a lake as I was on the second floor. 3.it is pleasantly decorated and the view is enjoyable. reviews of RESTAURANT ONE SEVEN: 1.However, the only downside here is that the windows are kind of pointless. 2.The food was of good quality, affordable for drinks price, Various gluten-free options and a nice indoor d√©cor but i didn't like the Mediocre service and  view 3.I couldn't see anything out of them since other buildings near it just obstructed the way. 4.The only downside was the view from our table was facing a wall. 5.The view here is nice and you can see lots of attractions outside, but I hated that I had to wait a while for my food and the service seemed, how to put it... lacking.... reviews of COTTO: 1.Too bad, because the view is really great. 2.It has a nice view and I found out after eating the fish and chips that the food was high quality. src_text: reviews of CAMBRIDGE LODGE RESTAURANT: 1.The restaurant was located in a nice area and our party got a table outside to eat and it was really well decorated; I liked the ambiance. 2.I thought the restaurant was in a lovely location. reviews of ERAINA: 1.Great view from the downtown location though, so all-in-all it made for a great date night. 2.On the other hand, it's in a great spot in my favorite part of town and the service was fast and friendly. 3.The location of the restaurant could be better, because it's kind of in the middle of nowhere, but that's a small gripe. 4.The restaurant is in a really nice location, which makes it wonderful for a date night out on the town. reviews of MICHAELHOUSE CAFE: 1.That said, it's right on a busy street, so there's not really any view to speak of. 2.The only big complaints were the mediocre service and locations. 3.They were a bit unattentive and the location wasn't in a prime area. 4.The location is right in the best part of town too. 5.I really enjoyed the tasty food, well priced drinks, and the beautiful location of the restaurant. 6.The location and view were amazing. reviews of DARRYS COOKHOUSE AND WINE SHOP: 1.We dined outdoors because the location was nice and the weather was great. 2.The only downsides were the poor location in the city of the restaurant, as well as the outdated indoor decor. 3.Darry's gives you generous portions and the location is a block down from me. 4.It took us 30 minutes to get to the place from our home, which felt like way too long to drive for a simple brunch, and the service was pretty lackluster and slow. [SEP] U: I want to find an expensive restaurant serving christmas food. S: is there any area you prefer! U: No specific area. S: I have found no restaurants serving Christmas food in the expensive price range. Would you like a different type of food? U: Are there European types of restaurants? S: Yes, there are four: cambridge lodge restaurant, eraina, and michaelhouse cafe serve european food, with darrys cookhouse and wine shop serving modern european food U: Which one is in a nice location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Each Cambridge Lodge Restaurant and Eraina have favorable locations while those of Michaelhouse Cafe and Darrys Cookhouse and Wine Shop are seen as having an equal mix of positive and negative aspects.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. [SEP] U: I am looking for a mexican restaurant in south cambridge S: There is a restaurant called Chiquito Restaurant Bar that is in the expensive price range. Do you want the address? U: Yes. S: Their address is 2G Cambridge Leisure Park Cherry Hinton Road Cherry Hinton U: I am needing a place to stay with a star of 3 and free wifi please. S: I am unable to book either of those options. Is there anything else I can do for you? U: Darn. Why don't we try booking it for tuesday instead then? S: I think the system is down, I am unable to make any bookings. U: Is the system back up now? S: I can try to book it again. U: That would be great, thank you. S: I booked you at the gonville, your reference number is J782KUH9, anything else today? U: The hotel has strong water pressure in the showers I take it? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Gonville Hotel has problems with their water pressure needing to satisfy their guests when it comes to showers.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: Hello. src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, we found that the room had a beautiful view to the sunset horizon outside. 2.The Carolina has good views. 3.It was nice to wake up in the morning and see the sun rising. 4.Parking was free and the view from the room was nice. 5.The view was really beautiful, too. reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.But still, I appreciated the great view from my window, overlooking the nearby lake, and the room itself was very clean with a seriously comfortable bed. 2.Looking out of the balcony was the most beautiful view I've ever seen. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a moderately priced 4 star hotel. S: We have no hotels with that criteria, but I can search for a 3-5 star hotel if you'd like. U: The hotel should include free parking and should be in the east S: Ok we have two guesthouses with that criteria, the Carolina Bed and Breakfast, and the Warkworth House. U: Can I get a room with a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests appreciate the beautiful views from the balconies of Warkworth House, while those at Carolina Bed and Breakfast also experience great views during their stay.

trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Missing Sock has a good vibe with good music, and the atmosphere is enjoyable according to customer reviews.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It was really good value for money (the total cost) and I enjoyed my stay. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for a train arriving in Cambridge by 21:15. S: Can you tell me where you will be departing from and what day you would like to travel? U: Sure, I'll be leaving from Norwich.  Oh, and I'd like to travel on Friday please. S: I would recommend TR9589 which leaves Norwich at 19:16 and arrives in Cambridge at 20:35. U: Okay great. Can you help me make a booking for 6 people please? S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 105.6 GBP payable at the station. Reference number is : 2CUTCPH6. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: I need a play to stay in the east in the moderate price range S: I will look that up for you,do you want a hotel ? U: Yes, with a star of 4 please. S: I do not have any 4 star hotels in the east.  Would you like to try another area or maybe go with a price range in the East? U: Oh my. Are there any moderate-price guesthouses in the east with 4 stars? S: Yes, I found three. I would recommend Carolina Bed and Breakfast it is moderately priced and located in the East. Would you like a reservation? U: Does this place have good value for their money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Carolina Bed and Breakfast has really great value for what you pay, according to the only review I found.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.We could not enjoy the shower as the pressure was low. 2.The room was a bit small, so I felt a tiny cramped in there, and the water pressure could have been a lot better. src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. It offers free parking and WiFi to guests. Do you need more info? U: Can you confirm for me that the Bridge Guest House has spacious rooms? S: <extra_id_0>

[SEP] U: I'm looking for an entertainment venue to visit in the Cambridge centre. S: will you mind to elaborate  more? maybe on price? U: I'm looking in the expensive price range. src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was no more than a few noises I heard during my entire stay, I was able to keep my head clear. 2.I stayed here with my family, and we were able to get a good night's rest, as it was very quiet. 3.I mean they are like home comfortable, and also it's very quiet so we didn't have to worry about any loud noises. 4.This place definitely delivered in that regard. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 2.We could have used more space in the room and there was noise from nearby rooms. [SEP] U: Good evening. I'm kind of in a situation. The hotel I had planned to stay was overbooked and I need to find me a room pretty quickly. Can you help? S: There are many hotels available, do you have any preferences to price or area? U: Not really. But it should be in the North. S: There are two hotels on the north end, the Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge. Which would you like? U: I would prefer a guesthouse thats 4 star rated. Do either of those fit the bill? S: No, I'm afraid they're both two stars.  Would you like to try one of them anyway? U: Do they have free wifi at either of them? S: Yes both have free internet. Which one do you prefer? U: Which place would be quieter? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Ashley Hotel contains very home comfortable rooms and also its very quite hence no disturbances.

src_text: reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.View is just ok, nothing great. 2.First of all the view was wonderful, lots of windows going to the downtown area. 3.It was located in a nice area and had a nice view. 4.The place is in a nice location also, looking over the Steinhatchee river. src_text:
reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. Would you like me to book you? U: Yes, please! That would be great. Thank you! S: How many tickets do you need? U: I only need one ticket. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I cannot find any information about how often they clean, but the Allenbell is rated and reviewed very highly for having clean rooms with a fresh scent.

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. [SEP] U: I'm taking a tour of colleges and I've heard that Cambridge is the place to go. Can you tell me about some you have there? S: We have many nice ones.  What area of town are you interested in? U: It doesn't matter. I'm interested in a college type attraction. I also need the entrance fee, address, and area info. Thanks. S: christ's college is in the centre on saint andrew's street and its free U: Thanks!  If it isn't too much trouble, could you also find me information on a restaurant called da vinci pizzeria? S: Of course! They are a great italian restaurant in the north part of town. They are usually very cheap. It's located on 20 Milton Road Chesterton. U: Is the food portion a good size? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People's opinions are split on whether the portion sizes are large enough. Some feel that they are, but others feel they are too small, particularly for Italian food.

src_text: reviews of ARBURY LODGE GUESTHOUSE: 1.I was thoroughly surprised because this guest house is in a very seedy part of town and I was a little nervous navigating over here. 2.The room had a great view and was in a good location. 3.While the location is a little far away from the city/attractions, the rooms are great for the price. [SEP] U: I need a place in the north with free wifi, please. S: I can help with that. What is your price range? U: I don't care about the price, but it should be 4 stars. S: You have eight options for lodging. Do you need parking? U: No that does not matter.  Please make a suggestion and book it for 1 people and 4 nights starting from sunday. S: how about arbury lodge guesthouse? U: Does it have a good location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location at arbury lodge guesthouse is a bit far from the city and other attractions, and is in a bit of a seedy part of town, however others feel the location is surprisingly good.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.It was a nice clean room with good wifi, which was great. 2.Room cleanliness is a gamble so if that's an issue for you, I'd avoid this place. 3.They also don't seem to always have housekeeping available. 4.I was surprised and happy that there was a laundry facility available, and the room was very clean and well appointed when I checked in. 5.The room was nice and big and I was able to do my laundry at there facility but the room was a bit dirty. 6.Our room was clean and there is a nice view of the mountains. reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.I found that the room had been cleaned by housekeeping to an exceptional degree. [SEP] U: I need a train from Cambridge on Tuesday S: There are plenty of those! Where are you headed, and at what time? U: I'm heading to Norwich and need to leave after 11:15 from Cambridge S: There are 13 trains. The one that leaves closest to your requested time is the TR5949, which leaves at 11:36. Does that interest you? U: Yes, that would be great!  I need 7 tickets, please.  Oh, and the reference number. S: I have booked the TR5949 for 7, departing from Cambridge at 11:36 and arriving in Norwich at 12:55. Reference number: UR9DKTIK. Anything else I can help you with? U: Yes, as a matter of fact, I also need a place to stay. S: There are many different hotels in Cambridge, do you have an area or price range in mind? U: Is there anything in the south with a star of 4? It doesn't have to have free parking. S: Sure, we have two hotels for you aylesbray lodge guest house, and rosa's bed and breakfast. can I book one of these for you today? U: Are the rooms there clean? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Rooms are found to be cleaned to an exceptional degree at Rosa's Bed and Breakfast while those at Aylesbray Lodge Guest House are more of a gamble, with some rooms being clean, and others not.

src_text: reviews of SHANGHAI FAMILY RESTAURANT: 1.You get plenty to eat for the money that's for sure! 2.I did like the affordable Price for the drinks and the foods. 3.This is always a good place if you are looking for an affordable meal at a very good price. 4.The price for the food was amazing considering how good it was, and it was close to my home which was a plus. 5.It was kind of expensive though so I'm not sure if I would return. 6.It was all good and at a great price. reviews of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.It was pretty overpriced but the food was high-quality. 2.In the end, it was definitely worth the price and I recommend it. 3.Overall the food was very inexpensive, and it was all delicious, hot, and fresh. 4.Not only that but the food as well as the drinks was priced well within our budget. 5.The only kind thing that I can say about Jinling Noodle Bar is that their prices are amazingly affordable, but I have a theory: their prices are so low because everything else about the place is totally mediocre! reviews of LAN HONG HOUSE: 1.Their food always tastes so authentic and wonderfully-prepared, and the best part is how amazingly affordable their entire menu is. 2.I forgot to mention that the price is affordable - except some drinks were a little overpriced though. 3.We will be back soon as a family-- and did I mention it's affordable? 4.I ordered the dumplings, which were very well prices. 5.On top of the high quality and excellent value of their food, the atmosphere at Lan Hong House is just wonderful - lively yet welcoming, and never too loud to have an intimate conversation with your dining partners. 6.Overall a nice place with a manageable budget. [SEP] U: Can you find me a Chinese restaurant with moderate prices? S: You have your choice of the Jinling Noodle Bar, Lan Hong House, Shanghai Family Restaurant, or the Golden Wok. U: Which one of these restaurants is in the centre of town? S: Jinling noodle bar, Lan Hong House, and Shanghai Family Restaurant are all in the centre of town. U: Is the value good for my money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The majority of guests thought the food at Jinling Noodle Bar was worth the price, while at Lan Hong House and Shanghai Family Restaurant, the costs are also reasonable.

src_text: reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.It was all tied up nicely together with outdoor seating that overlooks a beautiful lake. 2.Also, the view was just okay. 3.The only downside of Backstreet bistro was the poor view from our table of an alleyway in the city. 4.They knew this, as they imported very special wines and beers to enjoy this view. 5.We wished it had a better view. reviews of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.I greatly enjoyed the gorgeous view from our window, as well as the best priced food I have seen lately. 2.Some things that I was really disappointed was the lackluster view and service that was less than spectacular. 3.The view from in the restaurant wasn't that great, as we just saw the side of another large building, but I forgot all about that as we enjoyed our large portions of delicious food. 4.At first my friend complained about the view from the table, and then that there were no gluten-free options on the menu. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant that serves gastropub. S: There are four gastropubs in Cambridge. Is there a price range you prefer? U: Expensive. And in the centre, if you can. S: I have the Backstreet Bistro or The Slug and Lettuce. Would you like me to book a reservation at one for you? U: Does it have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both restaurants seem to be lacking when it comes to the view. While some people seem to enjoy the views, most feel that the views are not spectacular.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a 4 star hotel with free wifi. S: Okay, there are a lot of places that might work for you. Do you have a certain area in mind? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Previous guests have been impressed with the amazing, scenic views at the Allenbell, as they even surpassed the pictures.

src_text: reviews of DE LUCA CUCINA AND BAR: 1.I had a latte with my waffle and it was so delicious too. 2.I don't want to get mugged after having the best drinks in town. 3.The wine was excellent, very high quality and delicious, and we found that the service was impeccable. 4.It has the perfect textures and flavors, and the bar-staff mix it perfectly each time. 5.I would be happy to return for drinks, but I would not spend my money here again for a full meal. FAQs of DE LUCA CUCINA AND BAR: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at this bar. [SEP] U: I need to find a train leaving after 21:30 from Cambridge. S: I can look that up for you! What day will you be traveling on and where is your destination point? U: I am leaving on Saturday and going to Birmingham New Street. S: The first train after 21:30 on Saturday is the TR5413, leaving Cambridge at 22:01. Would you like to reserve a seat on this train? U: That'll work. How much does that cost and how long does it take to get into Birmingham new street? S: It takes about 163 minutes and it costs 60.08 pounds. I can help you book a seat on the train whenever you're ready U: No, I will just buy my ticket at the station.  Thanks.  Can you help me find a restaurant? S: There are a lot to choose from. Would you like me check for a different type of food? U: Yeah, how about modern european? S: There are 4 restaurants to choose from that serve modern european food. What price range would you rather: expensive, moderate or cheap? U: Moderate would be fine, but any of them will do, as long as I can get in today, at 17:45.
