src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.In the morning, I was treated to a lovely variety of delicious foods for breakfast. 2.My work called me up and needed me to go on a business trip, so I went here, and oh boy I must say they have really good breakfast options and the WiFi was super fast. FAQs of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.Yes, Warkworth House provides free breakfast. [SEP] U: Hello, are you familiar with Warkworth House? S: Yes. They are located in the east on warkworth terrace. Is there any other information you need? U: Does this place offer free breakfast? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, Warkworth House provides breakfast, and that breakfast is included in the cost of your stay. You do not have to pay anything additional.

src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The restaurant is in a really nice part of town with plenty of parking available, it's incredibly picturesque so you can enjoy an after meal walk. 2.It's in a nice, convenient location near town, and the foods were good. 3.The restaurant was in a very nice location, but despite that the view was very mediocre and the atmosphere was average at best. 4.Their location is lovely, right in the heart of the city. 5.They are in a great accessible location with easy parking. 6.The inside is not very modern but the location is easy to get to. [SEP] U: Hello.  I'm trying to find an inexpensive restaurant that serves Moroccan food.  Can you help me? S: There are no restaurants that match your request. Would you like to search for another food type or price range? U: How about vietnamese food? S: Thanh binh is in the cheap price range and serves Vietnamese food. U: Is it in a nice location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Thanh Binh is in a nice location which is easy to reach and conveniently placed right in the heart of the city.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The only two good points during my stay were the good location, which was near the home of a friend whom I was in town to visit, and the onsite restaurant. 2.When we arrived, we both noticed how the location of this hotel was very accommodating to our hectic schedule. 3.I stayed at the University Arms alone and I liked the location because it was easy to find nearby eateries. 4.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. [SEP] U: Hello, we are looking for information about lodgings in Cambridge.  Price is no option and we would like a very nice hotel. S: There are 33 hotels available, do you have any other criteria to narrow it down? U: As long as its insanely expensive and has free parking. Centre located please. S: I would recommend the university arms hotel. It is in the centre, expensive, and has free parking. Can I help with anything else? U: Is this hotel's location somewhere appealing? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes the hotel's location is very accommodating and very close to nearby restaurants according to guests that have stayed there.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay in the north that includes free wifi. S: I have 12 potential places. Would you like a guesthouse or a hotel? U: A guesthouse please. S: That narrows it down to 10 possibilities. Any other preferences you'd like to share? U: I would like free parking and to book it for 2 people, 4 nights starting thursday. Just the best place possible. S: Unfortunately, all the guesthouses I have found don't have availability for this long of a stay, would you like me to try for a shorter stay? U: Yes, let's try for 2 nights instead. I will also need a reference number. S: I have booked you a room at acorn guest house. The reference number is 7X4T9188. U: Can you make certain I get a room where the showers come out strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, both of the reviews that I have about Acorn Guest house, the water pressure was too low to shower well.

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. [SEP] U: Please recommend me a cheap restaurant in the north . S: Da Vinci pizzeria is in the north part of town and in the cheap price range.  Would you like their location? U: Do they serve large portions, because I am hungry? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviews were mixed with some finding the servings plentiful and others disappointed with the small servings. Do you have any other questions?

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should have a star of 4 and should include free parking S: The Cambridge Belfry fits your request.  Would you like to book a room? U: Sorry. I prefer a guesthouse. Does the Cambridge Belfry meet that requirement? S: I apologize, it does not. Do you have a specific price range in mind? U: Yes, it should be in the cheap price range. S: How about allenbell? It looks lovely. U: Sounds interesting! What area is it in? S: The allenbell is in the east area. Would you like a reservation? U: Do they have internet? S: Yes, the allenbell meets all your needs. Shall I book the guesthouse for you? U: Wait, first let me know: do they have internet access? S: Yes, the Allenbell has internet service. Would you like me to book this location for you? U: I don't need a booking yet. I do need the postcode, though. S: The postcode for the Allenbell is cb13js. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Could you also please tell me the area that is in? S: Sure, the Allenbell Guesthouse is located in the east. Can I help with anything else? U: How good is the view from my hotel room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Allenbell has amazing views that are even better than the pictures. The balconies overlook scenic views.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.I will say though, the bed wasn't really comfortable at all. 2.It made my back hurt like crazy when I woke up. 3.However, I felt that my bed was of extremely poor quality and was not comfortable. 4.The staff welcomed us with big smiles, and we slept like babies in the comfy beds. S: Alright, the table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Your reference number is: AO0MS4Q3. U: thank you for helping S: You're most welcome. Can I help you with anything else today? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for this location, the opinions are mostly negative.  Only one quarter found the beds comfortable, while three quarters found them poor quality, uncomfortable, and a cause of back pain.

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.Taking a shower was also a problem and it was very difficult to get myself clean as a result of limited water pressure. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm planning a trip and am finding the trains to be a bit confusing.  Can you help me find one? S: Yes I would be happy to help you.  Where will you be departing from and what is your destination? U: I will be departing from Stevenage and going into Cambridge on Sunday. S: There are multiple trains on sunday. Do you have a time you want to depart or arrive by? U: I want to depart anytime after 15:30, so the soonest available train after that would be nice. S: I have TR1577 leaving at 15:54, would you like me to book a ticket? U: No, thank you, but could you tell me the arrival time? S: Yes, the train arrives in Cambridge at 16:43. U: Thanks! Which would you prefer? U: El Shaddai, please. I need their phone number, address, and postcode. S: Okay, their phone number is 01223327978. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure at El Shaddai seems to be fairly low. Former guests feel that they were not able to clean properly in the shower because the water pressure was too low.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The staff was nice and helpful. 2.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 3.While at this location, I noticed that the staff was extremely kind and respectful to both of us. 4.The staff was friendly which made me feel comfortable and welcomed. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The staff was friendly with my requests. 2.It was actually my first time traveling alone, so I was super nervous, but the staff was so welcoming that I instantly felt at ease upon arrival. U: What about a cheap one? S: I have 2 hotels in the cheap range, one in the north and one in the centre. The star rating on both is 0 however. Would either of these work? U: Are the staff at each hotel friendly? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both Ashley and Lovell are known for having friendly and capable staff members. Are there any other questions about the hotels?

src_text: reviews of THE MISSING SOCK: 1.The hostess seated us immediately. 2.The people were friendly but the decor was unkempt and the view from where we sat looked out over a construction site. 3.We immediately noticed it was in a great location and we were greeted by very friendly employees. 4.The drinks were quite affordable and tasty, the service was prompt, and the outdoor space was perfect for dining out. 5.The food quality was good, the porting was very  great, you had a nice service and view, but the Mediocre location was not good 6.The service was great and the food was great, so, worth the trip there, once you get over the location. reviews of THE VARSITY RESTAURANT: 1.The service was slow, and not many of the windows in the restaurant face anything worth looking out for. 2.The service was great and the food was of high quality. 3.The things we wish were better were the service and the view. 4.The Varsity Restaurant is the place to be for affordable, high-quality food options with great service and a prime, downtown location. 5.Everything was fresh, steaming hot off the grill and the wait staff were attentive to our needs. reviews of BLOOMSBURY RESTAURANT: 1.However, the food and the service were mediocre. 2.While the service and wait staff were pretty mediocre, I have to cut them some slack on that because there were ten of us to deal with all at once, which was probably overwhelming. [SEP] U: I need to find a place to stay while in Cambridge, I do not need it to have internet but I do need it to have free parking. S: There are currently no hotels in the Cambridge area that have parking, is there another area close by that would work for you? U: maybe you can suggest a place close to the area of south, I would appreciate that, thank you S: There is nothing in the south. Do you really need parking? U: Yeah, I do.  What about to the west? S: What are the preferences you have for the hotel? I cannot seem to find one fitting the criteria you have listed. U: I need the hotel to at least have free wifi. Can you accommodate? S: There are 4 hotels in the south with free wifi and parking. What star rating would you like? U: I don't really care about the star rating. I just would like free wifi and would need to book for 3 nights for 6 people. S: what price range are you looking for? U: I don't have a preference. S: Ok. How about the Bridge Guest House. I'm happy to book that for you. I just need to know what day you'll be arriving. U: I will be arriving Sunday. S: All booked! The reference number is O59MRSHK. U: I am also looking for a restaurant in the same area.  Preferably vegetarian food in the moderate price range. S: there are no vegetarian food restaurants. U: Okay. Is there one that serves International food? S: There are three locations that serve international cuisine. The Missing Sock, The Varsity Restaurant, and the Bloomsbury Restaurant. Are you interested in any of these? U: Which one has the most exceptional waitstaff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The staff at Bloomsbury was described as mediocre. The staff at The Varsity Restaurant had mixed reviews ranging from slow to attentive. Staff reviews at The Missing Sock were unanimously positive with customers finding them to be friendly and prompt. Do you have any other questions?

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.The price was good but the rooms are small. 2.The room looked larger online and we were a bit cramped. 3.The room was spacious, and much larger than I probably needed, but it was nice being able to squeeze in some yoga in my room during my stay. 4.The bad thing was the size of the room which was very small. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.The rooms are nice and big, and there is somewhere to get your laundry cleaned. src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.But the value for the money just wasn't there. 2.I do have to say though, I thought that the room was overpriced for what it was, and I was disappointed that there was no elevator service. 3.I was happy with the clean bathroom, and overall I think I got a good value for my money. 4.I kept telling my family that I felt like we didn't pay enough for the services we were getting. 5.However, I found that the price per night for this room was too much and I wouldn't stay here of my own volition if I had to pay for it. 6.Honestly, Avalon is pretty overpriced for what you get. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel called Avalon, can you help? S: Certainly! The Avalon is a 4 star guesthouse in the northend. It offers free wifi. Would you like the phone number or address? U: Is The Avalon a good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately guests agreed in unison that the price per night at the Avalon was too high and not worth their money.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Loved the scenery outside and the room was well decorated and home-y. 2.I adored the view that this place offers, we found ourselves staring our rooms windows a lot during our stay. 3.Our room was clean and there is a nice view of the mountains. U: Try either one of the cheap ones, I need one that can hold my group of 7 for 5 nights on tuesday. S: the cambridge belfry was the best match for a large group so I booked you there, the reference number is X33MYBK5 , may I assist with anything else? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, it doesn't look like there is good water pressure at The Cambridge Belfry. Past guests have said the water pressure is low and slow.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I need help finding a place to dine in the expensive price range and serves british food, can you help me? S: I have 6 restaurants that are serve british food and are expensive. Is there a certain area you would like? U: Any of them you recommend would be fine. I do need a booking for saturday. S: Sure thing, what time and party size would you like to book on saturday? U: There are seven of us, we'd like a bit of an early dinner at 15:45. S: OK, I booked a table for you at Graffiti for 7 on Saturday. Ref# FR21TCNN. Can I help you with anything else today? U: Yes, I'd also like to find some lodging accommodations for the same group of people, on the same day. S: Certainly. What are you looking for in the way of lodgings? U: I am looking for the hotel cityroomz to be exact. S: I can book that for you as well, how many days are you staying? U: Wait, can you first find out if their showers have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Cityroomz Hotel has really low water pressure that pretty much every review stated. Would you like to look somewhere else?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I had a great view of the mountains. 2.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 3.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. reviews of ALPHA-MILTON GUEST HOUSE: 1.The views were amazing. 2.While I was there I really admired the view. 3.Just a bit disappointed at the rooms not being clean when we arrived, but the views are worth it. 4.The view is also very nice. 5.We were not disappointed. 6.My partner and I did like the size of the room and we enjoyed the view. 7.What stood out to me the most is just how quiet it was, but on top of that, the views were great. [SEP] U: I'm viviting Cambridge and would really love to do something while I am here on a boat. Are there any attractions like that? S: There are four boat attractions to choose from. I recommend the Riverboat Georgina in the north. Would you like more information about it? U: I would love more information, thanks! S: Well, the phone number is 01223902091 and the postcode is cb43ax. U: Thanks. I'll also need a place to stay on my visit. Could you find me a 3 star hotel nearby? S: Do you have a price range in mind? U: No, I do not have a price range. Any price range will do. S: There are two hotels fitting your requirements. Do you have a regional preference? U: Yes, I do. North, please., and I would like a guest house. S: Okay, the alpha-milton guest house and hamilton lodge are both in the north, and both have a moderate price. Do you have a preference? U: Do either of these places have a great view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: You will not be disappointed with the view at neither the Alpha Milton Guest House or the Hamilton Lodge. Both provide great views during your stay.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay that has free wifi and parking. S: There are numerous hotels that match this criteria available. Do you have a specific area you'd like to stay, or a price range in mind? U: No particular area but I need it to be cheap. S: I found cheap guesthouses, is guesthouse what you are looking for? U: I'd prefer a hotel, rather than a guesthouse. S: There's one.  The Cambridge Belgry in the west.  It has a four star rating.  Should I book it for you? U: Do they have high pressure showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, all guests that have previously stayed at the Cambridge Belfry have regarded the shower's water pressure to be poor and a mere trickle.

src_text: reviews of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.At times, we felt like we were eating appetizer-sized entrees, and we weren't able to share things with each other easily. 2.I loved the large food portion size. 3.But don't come here hungry, or you'll leave disappointed! 4.While everything was very tasty and we felt that the food was high in quality, the portion sizes were a disappointment. 5.The view from in the restaurant wasn't that great, as we just saw the side of another large building, but I forgot all about that as we enjoyed our large portions of delicious food. 6.The food portions were very small. reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.The cooks weren't afraid to be generous with their portions, too. 2.At the Backstreet Bistro the foods came in heaping portions. 3.The small portions and the slightly watered-down drinks were about the only downsides. [SEP] U: I need help finding an expensive restaurant in the centre, can you help me please? S: I'd love to help. We have 33 expensive restaurants. Do you have a cuisine you'd prefer? U: Yes, I'm looking for gastropub food. S: I have found the backstreet bistro and the slug and lettuce, which one would you like more information on? U: Do anything of them serve gastropub food? S: Yes both are in the expensive price range U: Do they give large portion sizes for the food? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: For the most part, the portions at Backstreet Bistro are large, while those at the Slug and Lettuce are appetizer-size and a bit of a disappointment.

src_text: reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.The merlot is good. 2.I love almost everything about this place: the food tastes authentic and well-prepared; the wine was delicious; the prices are really affordable; and the location of the restaurant is so close to home that I can get there in less than ten minutes time. FAQs of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at this place. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an italian restaurant that is moderately priced. src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.It was great. 2.I didn't have to get grossed out by little dirty areas any where. 3.The things i liked about the hotel were the cleaniness of the room for one. 4.I really appreciated how clean the room and bathroom were. 5.Very neat not dust at all. src_text: reviews of DARRYS COOKHOUSE AND WINE SHOP: 1.I greatly enjoyed the excellent drinks and the wonderful atmosphere. 2.We also enjoyed our mimosas, and thought that their drinks menu seemed substantial with some high quality options, which makes sense at a "wine shop", after all. 3.They were mediocre at best. 4.The foods were excellent, as was the Merlot that we ordered. 5.We are pretty happy with our experience other than the drinks. 6.What I didn't like were the drinks we had. 7.The quality of food and drink were very good. 8.They were also affordable but mediocre. 9.The Cabernet Sauvignon was amazing while we enjoyed the view and atmosphere of the restaurant. 10.It's a great combination. FAQs of DARRYS COOKHOUSE AND WINE SHOP: 1.Yes, various wines are available. [SEP] U: Tell me a good nightclub. S: Sure, there are 6 fantastic nightclubs in Cambridge. They're located in the centre or south. Would you like more information? U: Yes, please may I have the postcode for the first one listed? S: Sure. Ballare is in the centre, postcode cb23na. Anything else I can do? U: Yes. I would like an expensive restaurant in the same area. S: There are 33 expensive restaurants in the centre of cambridge - are you looking for a particular type of cuisine? U: Yes. I would like a French restaurant please. S: There is a delicious french restaurant called Cote.  Would you like a reservation? U: I actually need a place serving modern european food, please. S: There is one expensive restaurant in the centre of town that serves modern european food. Would you like me to book you a table at Darrys Cookhouse and Wine Shop? U: I need it to have a high quality Merlot selection. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews for split, while the ones I found for Merlot say that it was excellent, a lot of people said that they thought the drinks were mediocre.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.I did not find the staff very responsive or helpful. 2.Another added merit was that the hotel staff was very friendly and polite. 3.When attempting to troubleshoot my issue with staff, they were disrespectful and rude. Would you like me to book you a room? U: Is the staff there friendly, polite and responsive? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some guests have stated that the staff at the University arms hotel was polite and helpful, but others have stated that they were rude.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. 2.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 3.Everything was top notch and the beds were really comfortable. 4.I mean they are like home comfortable, and also it's very quiet so we didn't have to worry about any loud noises. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place in Cambridge. It doesn't need to include internet and should be a hotel. S: I was not able to find a hotel type with no internet, but there are hotels with internet. U: Okay, that would be fine, as long as it has free parking. S: Okay, do you have any preference on price range? U: No. How many are available? S: There are 8 different hotels around the city with free parking. Do you have a preference for city area or star rating? U: It doesn't matter to me which part of the city it's in or it's rating. In your opinion, which one would be best for a short  3 day stay? S: It's hard to say. How about the ashley hotel in the norht part of town? U: Is there room for 4 people on Monday? S: Unfortunately I cannot book that day and time. Would you like to change the day or try a different hotel? U: Can i try a different hotel? S: How about the Express by Holiday Inn and Cambridge, a 2 star, or Huntingdon Marriott Hotel, a 4 star? U: Do either of those include free parking? S: Yes, they both have free parking, and internet as well. The Marriott is in the west, and Holiday Inn in the east. Does area of the city matter to you? U: No, that does not matter, as long as I can book a 3 night stay for 4 people on Monday. S: I was not able to book at either location, can I try something else? U: What else is available? S: ashley hotel	is available, can i provide you more information on it? U: Do they have good beds so I can get a good night's sleep? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests at the Ashley hotel have said that their beds were comfortable, and that they were actually top notch.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. Instead of that reservation, I would be ok with British food.  Is there a British place in the centre? S: I cancelled the previous booking for Bangkok city. src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.The bed was comfy so I slept well. 3.The only issue that I had is that the bed was not as soft as would have liked. S: Six trains match your criteria. The first train leaves at 05:09 and arrives by 06:54. Do you want to book a seat on this train or another? U: I need to arrive by 12:30 not 6:54. Try again please S: I'm sorry about that.  The TR3404 arrives at 11:54.  Would you like me to book it for you? U: The train should arrive by 12:30 and should leave on wednesday. S: the earliest train I can get for you arrives at 11:54 the tr3404 how many tickets please? U: I need a booking for 4 people. S: I booked your train ride. It is going to cost 151.19 GBP and your reference number is NIGO21EH. U: I am looking for a hotel called worth house. S: Great guesthouse located at 152 Chesterton Road. U: Are the beds comfortable there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most People said that the beds were comfortable enough, but one person said that it was not soft enough for them. Is there anything else that I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 2.I had a great view of the mountains. 3.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train going to Cambridge. S: There are over 1000 trains coming to Cambridge. Is there a particular day, time, or point of departure that you're interested in? U: I want to leave from london liverpool street on tuesday. S: What time would you like to arrive in Cambridge? U: I would like to arrive by 9:30. S: Sure, the train the arrives closest to that time is TR2715, arrives at 09:07. Shall I book it, if so how many riders are there? U: Just one. What is the price to book the train? S: The price of the train is 16.60 pounds. U: Alright, Thanks. I'm also looking for a particular hotel, it's name is Hamilton Lodge. S: I have found the place you are looking for. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for this location, the view has been described as enjoyable, scenic, great and very nice, especially of the mountains!

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for some places to go in Cambridge. S: sure. do you know what you would like to do ? U: What is the phone number for Abbey Pool and Astroturf Pitch? S: The phone number is 01223902088. Can I help with anything else? U: Could you also tell me Abbey Pool's address? S: The address is Pool Way, Whitehill Road, off Newmarket Road. Can I help you any further? U: I would also like help finding a guesthouse. S: what type of guest house are yo looking for? U: I'd like to find a cheap 4 star place in the cheap price range please. S: Which area would you like to stay in? U: The area does not matter. Just whatever you think is best in that criteria. S: In that case, I would recommend the alexander bed and breakfast in the centre. U: Can you tell me whether the Alexander Bed and Breakfast is in a good location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most past customers say that it is a location where you cannot reach points of interest easily while a couple of customers were happy with the location.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Also, the breakfast was good with many options. 2.When getting ready to start my day, I found that the complementary options for food were of high variety and great quality. 3.It is always nice to have tons of choices. 4.The breakfast options suprised me, I hadn't expected them to be so plentiful as well as delicious! src_text: reviews of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.I also highly recommend their list of wines, which is extensive and full of high quality options. 2.I liked the quality of drinks and food at the restaurant. 3.They said that the food was very tasty, and my wife and I did enjoy our alcoholic beverages. 4.I enjoyed my food but it was disappointing that there were so many drink options but they were pretty mediocre. 5.The drinks were at least very good so that made up for how long it took for them. 6.On the plus side, they had affordable prices, great quality foods, great drinks, and the service was great. FAQs of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.Yes, alcohol is available in the menu. [SEP] U: I am looking for an expensive Italian restaurant. S: There is an expensive Italian restaurant named Frankie and Bennys at Cambridge Leisure Park Clifton Way Cherry Hinton. Would you like to go there or choose another? U: Do they serve drinks of good quality? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Frankie and Bennys does make alcoholic drinks available on their menu. There is a wide variety of drink options that most people found to be high quality.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.This hotel has really nice breakfast choices and is great value for the cost you pay. 2.It's cheap, so don't expect big bells and whistles. 3.The price was good but the rooms are small. 4.Overall, the hotel was a great value for the money! [SEP] U: Hello there! Could you help me find a hotel? I am looking for one that has free parking and is expensive. S: Here is a list of hotels with free parking and are expensive. U: I did not receive any list of hotels. Can you just pick one for me, a hotel with free parking and wifi that is upscale please. S: We have the university arms hotel. It is located in centre and has wifi and parking. Would you like me to book that for you? U: Yes, as long as it is expensive.  I would like to arrive on Tuesday and stay for 3 nights.  There will be 8 of us. S: I'm sorry, but the hotel isn't available for you request. Would you like to try another day or shorter stay? U: Can you try for 2 nights instead? S: I would recommend the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel , which has what you need. Your booking reference number is FTTNX1M7. Your two night stay will begin Tuesday. Thank you! U: Is that the best value for the price? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Huntingdon Marriott Hotel has a good price for what you get but don't expect big bells and whistles.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Hobsons House did not disappoint in that aspect. 2.The location is exceptional and the breakfast options were fantastic. Would you like more information? U: Does this hotel have a good location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Hobsons hotel has a really good location according to one guest. I couldn't find out anything else.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: Hello I'll be coming to Cambridge and need a room to stay in. Can you recommend a guesthouse that has free parking? S: I have 21 guesthouses in cambridge. U: No I don't care which area it is in, just so it is a guesthouse with free parking and 4 stars. S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast is a popular choice. It's inexpensive, but rated 4 stars, and offers both free parking and free wifi. U: Would you happen to know if the showers have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast has really low and limited water pressure. Is there anything else you would like to know?

src_text:
reviews of TANDOORI PALACE: 1.After visiting Tandoori Palace, what impressed me most was the great food quality, while still maintaining large portions. 2.We got samosas and vindaloo to eat and l loved every single bite. 3.TANDOORI PALACE has awesome Indian food at affordable prices. 4.My Vindaloo felt very under seasoned. 5.I thought that the price for the food was quite reasonable and even of a high quality. 6.The food was affordable and high quality, I'm still drooling thinking of it now. 7.But that's where the bad points end, because Tandoori Palace has exceptional menu prices for their entrees, the portion sizes are really generous, and the quality of the food is unmatched. 8.Everything was delicious and expertly prepared with the right amount spices. 9.The drinks and food were fantastic as always. 10.The Good:
- High-quality, delicious food
- Affordably priced drinks
- Generous food portions
The Bad:
- Mediocre drinks
- Slow service 11.It was super tasty. 12.We were surely stuffed, but it was a matter of quantity over quality. [SEP] U: Get me a list of expensive restaurants that serve Danish food please S: There are no restaurants that serve Danish food. Is there another food type you might be interested in? U: How about an Indian restaurant? S: yes we have a variety U: How about an expensive one? S: We have 14 expensive Indian restaurants. Do you have an area you prefer? U: Which one do you recommend? S: I'd recommend Tandoori Palace in the west, would you like to make a reservation? U: Is there quality seafood there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Seafood is not mentioned for this restaurant though most people think that the food there is high quality.

src_text: reviews of ALPHA-MILTON GUEST HOUSE: 1.The rooms, however, weren't as clean as we would have expected. 2.Just a bit disappointed at the rooms not being clean when we arrived, but the views are worth it. src_text: reviews of BEDOUIN: 1.The quality of food and drinks were good and the service was great. 2.The quality was also high and looked sophisitcated. 3.My beer was just okay and seemed to be priced higher that similar restaurants. S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The view outside of my window was exquisite and beautiful. 2.I really liked the sunrise view at breakfast. 3.I enjoyed spending time here with my girl, as we took in the great view. 4.Talk about a place with a fantastic view, truly amazing. 5.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. [SEP] U: I sure hope so. I'd like to find a place to stay, with four stars, in the north. S: I have about 8 options for you. They are all guesthouses. Do you have a preferred price range? U: Price is not of any concern, just so it has a 4 star rating. S: What dates would you like to stay? U: Oh, I think I forgot to mention that it needs to be a 4 star guesthouse. I want to book Saturday for 7 people 2 nights. S: All the 8 hotels are 4 star hotels. I recommend the Avalon or the Archway House. Should I book one of those for you and your party? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, at the Avalon, there are rooms where you can watch the sun rise, and many guests have raved about the view they get there.

src_text: reviews of PIZZA EXPRESS FEN DITTON: 1.I really enjoyed the food, and along with the decently priced drinks. 2.We ate like kings! 3.The food was very high quality and the view was stellar. Would you like more information? U: Yes, do they serve fiorentina steak there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There's nothing in the reviews about fiorentina steak. Would you like me to contact them and find out?

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. [SEP] U: What museums are there in the north area of town? S: I'm sorry. There are none. U: How about a swimming pool then? S: Kings Hedges Learner Pool is located at Jedburgh Court, Kings Hedges. U: Thank you. I just need the phone number and I'm wondering how much the entrance fee is? S: Yes of course their telephone number is 01223353248 and I do not unfortunately have information on their entrance cost at this time. U: Thanks, that sounds great.  Can you suggest a cheap restaurant near the pool? S: There are 2 cheap options in the North by the pool. Royal Spice serves Indian and Da Vinci Pizzeria serves Italian. Do you have a preference? U: I am actually looking for a restaurant that serves scottish food. S: I am sorry there are not any restaurants that serve Scottish food in the north area. Would you like to broaden your area? U: How about Italian food? S: Yes, da vinci pizzeria is in the north and serves italian food and is in the cheap price range. Can I reserve a table for you? U: Are the food portions a good value? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People have mixed opinions on whether the portions are of a good value. Some feel they are, but some feel they aren't particularly for an Italian restaurant.

src_text: reviews of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.I would visit again but I hope the service is better next time. 2.We did have to wait a long time to get seated and then have someone come take our order though which wasn't great. 3.The service was excellent. 4.I enjoyed the outdoor seating and my server was very attentive. 5.The service was really awesome too, and our server tried her best to help one of my friends find something gluten-free that he could eat, but unfortunately they don't have any gluten-free options on their menu. reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.The servers are attentive. 2.We enjoyed the food and the service. reviews of TANG CHINESE: 1.The only downside is the wait staff is poorly trained and there's a lot of turnover. 2.The service itself was great and every waiter was friendly and ready to serve. 3.Both were the high points of the evening. 4.They all came out quickly and the service was excellent. 5.The staff was excellent, as was the food. reviews of HK FUSION: 1.We thought some drinks might lighten the mood, and our server was very courteous and helpful with giving us options, but the drinks were way overpriced for the sizes that we were served, and it just ended up feeling like a waste of an evening. 2.They weren't just terrible servers, but they also weren't great. 3.Not only that, the service there was really sub-par. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in the Centre. S: There are 33 expensive restaurants in the centre of town. Do you have a food preference? U: I would really love to find an expensive Polish restaurant. S: I'm sorry but there are no expensive Polish restaurants in the centre. Would you like a different type of cuisine or price range? U: How about Chinese food? S: We have Ugly Duckling, Tang Chinese, HK Fusion, and Sesame Restaurant and Bar. Would you like to book one of those? U: Which one has the best service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Ugly Duckling received the most positive reviews with Tang Chinese and Sesame Restaurant and Bar receiving mixed reviews. HK Fusion has poor reviews on service.

src_text: FAQs of BANGKOK CITY: 1.Bangkok City serves alcohol. reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.The food is good and affordable as are the drinks. 2.We both had Thai beers with our meal, and those weren't as pleasing; the same could be said for the view, which is of a dismal parking lot. 3.The Yellow Curry was some of the best I've ever had and the beer was top shelf and ice cold. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train going to cambridge, departing from norwich. S: what day are you looking to leave? U: I'm looking to leave on Thursday please. S: I have several trains leaving on Thursday.  What is your preferred departure and arrival time? U: I need to leave after 09:15. S: i have one that ;eaves at 09:16, is that suitable for you? U: What is the total travel time for that one? S: 79 minutes, it'll arrive by 10:35 U: Please also find me an Australian restaurant in the centre. S: We don't have any Australian restaurants in the center. Did you have any other type of food in mind? U: can i find one that serves thai food? S: Bangkok city serves Thai food in the centre in the expensive price range. Do you want me to book it for you? U: Does it serve the finest beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Bangkok City provides alcohol, which includes beer. Since it is a Thai restaurant, it also serves Thai beer. The beer is said to be top shelf and served cold.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.Also, the Wi-Fi was extremely slow. 2.This is very frustrating when you are trying to work and the delay is huge. 3.Also, the fast wi-fi was a huge plus for work I had to work to do on my laptop. U: I'm not looking to book just now, but are any of those a bit more moderately priced? I'm on a budget. S: Ashley Hotel is in the moderate price range. S: No, Ashley Hotel does not offer a concierge service. Anything else I can do for you? U: Yes, sorry, I'm getting more information from my group just now. If the Ashley has wifi, can you please book a stay for 7 for 2 nights, starting Friday? S: Yes, there is WI-fi, however, that hotel is not available for these days.  Can I book a different day or a shorter stay? U: Does the hotel charge a fee to use the wifi? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Wifi is free at Ashley Hotel. One past guest said that the wifi was too slow while another was satisfied with it.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The view outside of my window was exquisite and beautiful. 2.I really liked the sunrise view at breakfast. 3.I enjoyed spending time here with my girl, as we took in the great view. 4.Talk about a place with a fantastic view, truly amazing. 5.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.I was overall quite pleased with the value for the money. 2.Great value. 3.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 4.I was at Ashley hotel with my wife, and we were pleasantly surprised at the good quality, considering the price. 5.The room provided a pretty decent value for the price spent and there was a nice variety of breakfast options, including lots of fresh fruit and smoothies. reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I thought the price was attractive and feel it was definitely worth the money spent. 2.I didn't pay too much, so I think it is great value. 3.The clean room was very welcoming and I thought it was good value, considering what I had paid for it. [SEP] U: Hello. I need to book a train ride from Ely going to Cambridge, can you help me with that? S: Absolutely, you have plenty of options. On what day will you be travelling? U: I'll be leaving on Saturday after 12:00. S: I have 6 trains leaving after 12:00 on Saturday. Do you have a preferred time of arrival to Cambridge? U: No, I do not. I would, however, like to know the travel time. S: The travel time is 17 minutes. Would you like the departure times? U: Could you please confirm that train ID number with the travel time for me? S: TR4698 leaves at 13:35 and it will take 17 minutes to travel before arriving at 13:52 U: Thank you. I'd also like to find a hotel. S: I have about 9 different hotels to choose from. Is there a price range that would work better for you so we can narrow it down? U: I would like a hotel in the north area in the moderate price range. S: The Ashley Hotel or the Lovell Lodge should suit your needs. U: How does it compare in terms of value for money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The majority of patrons at the Ashley Hotel were satisfied that the rooms were decent value for the money, while those at the Lovell Lodge unanimously though the price paid was worthwhile.

src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.I didn't order any drinks, but they seemed reasonably priced based on the menu I saw. 2.The food was ok and the beer was definitely overpriced, however the service was excellent! 3.The service was great, food was superb, and on top of that the food and drinks were so cheap! 4.I could overlook it if only the drinks were expensive, or if a few of the food options were spendy, but every time I have a meal here, I leave feeling like I paid too much for my meal, which puts a damper on my mood. 5.The drink options are plentiful and affordable as well. If you'll tell me how many people and when you'll be dining, I'll be happy to book it for you. U: I'd like a place with reasonably priced beer. Does Hakka have that? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The drinks are also super high quality and super affordable, I was so pleased. 2.Unfortunately, the drinks were not up to the same level of quality as the food. 3.After that, I wanted to sample some authentic English beer so I bought a stout, which was actually not bad. 4.I liked the ale which was so tasty and refreshing, as well as being reasonably priced. 5.There was a large variety of drinks and they were very high-quality. 6.The drinks were well-made and quite affordable. 7.The ale I was provided could only be described as "underwhelming." src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.The drinks were affordable. 2.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 3.The drinks were also very expensive for what they were. 4.My Riesling was a good price and was delicious so it was not all bad. 5.I ended up getting a Fiorentina steak and it was the best I have ever had by far and made up for the expensive drinks. 6.Just for the heck of it, I checked out their drink menu and was surprised at how affordable everything seemed, and it was nice that they had a substantial non-alcoholic drink menu for the kiddos. 7.We ordered some cabernet sauvignon and I was happy that the place doesn't try to overcharge for drinks. src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The food was delicious but the drinks tasted flat. 2.The drinks were reasonably priced and the food was absolutely amazing, it both looked and tasted amazing, especially the spring rolls, possibly the best spring rolls I've ever tasted.. 3.The food and drinks were exceptional We had the Banh Cuon and Com Tam. 4.My beverage was so-so at best, but at least the drinks were cheap and there were lots of non-alcoholic options . 5.I thought the food and drinks were affordable. 6.The drink selection was expansive but pricey, and what I ordered did not stand out in any way. 7.They have good prices on drinks and good portions on meals. 8.After dinner I decided to order a drink, but was quite disappointed. 9.I found it to be a bit expensive for what was provided, especially compared to the delicious food. 10.Unfortunately the same can't be said for the drinks. 11.Thanh Binh also has a pretty great menu of specialty drinks with really reasonable and affordable prices, which is great because their non-alcoholic menu leaves a lot to be desired. src_text: FAQs of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.An Full English/Irish breakfast is available at the HOBSONS HOUSE 2.No,  breakfast is not free at the Hobsons House. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Sadly, the uncomfortable bed meant I didn't sleep much, which sort of crosses out the great breakfast benefit. 2.There were only pancakes, eggs, and frosted flakes so it was pretty mediocre. 3.Starting the day with a great breakfast when you're away from home goes a long way in performance in the business world. 4.The only complaint was the lack of options for breakfast. 5.While I was not pleased with the slow wi-fi and small room, I was content with their awesome breakfast options, friendly and engaging staff members and the best part! 6.The location is exceptional and the breakfast options were fantastic. 7.We enjoyed the options they had for breakfast and the cost of the hotel was very cheap. src_text:
reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to eat tonight. S: There are some great choices.  What type of place are you looking for? U: Greek sounds good, and price is no issue for me- I want the very best. S: Do you want a certain area? U: I would like the north please. S: I don't have anything in the north. Can I try a different area? U: No, I would like to dine in the north, but can you search for european food instead? S: The city stop restaurant is in that area. U: That sounds great would you be able to book that for me? S: How many people will be dining and about what time would your prefer? U: Please book a table for 7 people, for 19:45, this sunday. S: All set, the reference number is 9HQQULFL, any further questions? U: I am also looking for a particular hotel called carolina bed and breakfast. S: Yes, carolina bed and breakfast is a guesthouse located in the east.  Their address is138 perne road.  Is there anything else you would like to know? U: What is the postcode? S: The postcode is CB13NX. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Thank you. I will also need a taxi to commute between the two locations. S: Booking completed!
Booked car type	:	red tesla
Contact number	:	07567121444 U: Does this place have good breakfast options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Carolina Bed and Breakfast offers a full English/Irish breakfast for 8 GBP a person. Most people were impressed by this but some preferred to eat out instead.

src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.If you are really hungry I recommend trying the full English breakfast as well as it is a great way to sample it all. 2.The portions were big which would be a plus except that I didn't want to take them home, they were so bad. 3.The food was very high quality and the portions were generous. src_text: reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.We split the Chicken Tikka Masala and Vindaloo of a recommendation from a friend, and they did not disappoint. 2.The food was just as sad as their atmosphere. 3.Everything was fresh and good. 4.The food itself was exceptional, the plate sizes were quite large so I certainly recommend bringing your appetite! 5.To call this Indian food would cause shame to the Indian culture. 6.I was eating like a King! 7.The food was very high quality and gluten-free! 8.The food definitely complimented it as it was super fresh and the cooks were very generous with their portions. reviews of THE GANDHI: 1.Between us we ordered Chaat, Naan, Samosas, and Windaloo, all of which were in large portion sizes and were very tasty. 2.It was really good, and not only that, but it was also affordable. reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.I will say the food and drinks made up for the lackluster service we've received. 2.The food was amazing! src_text: reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.My family and I also had a great night just talking since the view was nice and the atmosphere was pleasant. 2.The restaurant does have a great view, so that helped provide some romantic ambiance, and the outdoor dining option was great because it gave us some privacy away from the crowd. S: We have many Italian restaurants! If price is no issue, I recommend Caffe Uno. U: Does it have a nice atmosphere? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the atmosphere is pleasant and the view gives it a romantic ambiance. The outdoor dining in particular provides privacy away from crowds.

src_text: reviews of WAGAMAMA: 1.The quality of the drinks was good and the service was good. 2.The foods were all spectacular and tantalizing, and the beer was fresh, crisp, and quite affordable. 3.Same has to be said about the drinks options they offer and their quality - only top notch brews and bottles, very very nice. U: Not interested in the price, but I would like it to be a 4-star hotel. S: We have two. I recommend the alexander bed and breakfast guesthouse. U: I'm sorry. I needed a hotel, not a guesthouse. S: The University Arms Hotel meets your criteria. Would you like to make a booking or more information? U: Yes please. I need it to be for 1 person for 2 nights starting on Friday. S: Your reservation at university arms hotel this friday for 3 days 2 nights for 1 person was successful. Your Reference number is : ZUWP7UJK. U: Great, can you also find me a Japanese food restaurant in the expensive price range? S: Wagamana is good fit. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Need an place with nice beer options S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: Okay I'm looking for a restaurant today. S: Sure, what are you in the mood for? U: I just want something cheap. S: What area are you looking to dine in? U: I'd like something in the west please. S: There is an italian or vietnamese restaurant that meets your criteria, do you have a preference? U: What is the Italian place? S: The italian restaurant is called La Margherita. They are located at 15 Magdalene Street City Centre. Can I reserve a table for you? U: Yes I will have four guests total. S: And on what day and time would you like the reservation? U: I would like to check in on the same day. S: And what time would you like to dine? U: 18:30 on Sunday please. S: your set, reference # is 6MMV9XTU, anything else for you today? U: I also need a taxi. It should arrive at the restaurant by 18:30. S: what is your destination? U: As I just said, at the restaurant by 18:30.   Can I please get the car type and reference number? S: I will get that information for you. U: Thank you, I'll wait on your response. S: Great, where should I send the car? U: Sorry, before a taxi I need a place to stay.  I need it to include free parking & be in same area as the restaurant. S: What price range would you like? U: The price doesn't matter. I need a place that included free wifi as well. S: alexander bed and breakfast meets your criteria, shall I make a reservation? U: Is the water pressure good? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One of the Alexander Bed an Breakfast's negative features is in its limited water pressure which is found to be rather lackluster.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I only wish it was in a better location, which made me need a car and then have to make a reservation for parking. 2.I found the location convenient and I felt pretty safe staying alone. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.But that said, the location was overall really excellent, and parking was free which was a nice perk. 2.We were able to visit many things in the area, so it was a nice location. 3.We were within walking distance of may things, so great location. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for a place to stay in the north side. Can you recommend anything with at least 2 stars? S: The Ashley and the Lovell Lodge are both 2-star hotels on the north side. Both are in the moderate price range. Would you like more information on one of those? U: Is is in close proximity to things to do right? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location of the Ashley hotel is better than the lovell Lodge according to reviews. Would you like to make a reservation there?

src_text: reviews of COTE: 1.That said, they didn't have much on the menu where non-alcoholic beverages are concerned, so the kiddos ended up with plain water. 2.All of my friends enjoyed their meals, in fact, and we were also glad that the non-alcoholic drinks menu was substantial, since only a few people in the group wanted to drink. [SEP] U: Hello any restaurants suggestions ? I am also looking for nice 4 star hotels with wifi. S: Two hotels in the West, Huntingdon Marriott and The Cambridge Belfry, and one in the Centre, University Arms Hotel, meet your specified needs. U: Could I please have more information about the West? Is it an actual hotel or a guesthouse? S: I have two hotels the huntingdon marriott and the cambridge belfry. U: Okay may I get the price range for those hotels with the postcode also? S: The Huntingdon Marriott is an expensive offering at postcode pe296fl.  The Cambridge Belfry is a cheap offering at postcode cb236bw. U: Thank you. I'm also looking for for a place to dine, I'd prefer an expensive place please. S: Do you have a particular cuisine in mind? U: Italian food please in the cheap price range S: What area would you like to dine in? U: In the centre please.  And make it Portuguese.  I don't care about price.  I have no idea where I got the idea of cheap Italian from, smh. S: I have a cheap Portuguese restaurant in the Centre by the name of Nandos City Centre, would you like me to book you a table? U: i apologize. my husband wants something expensive. do you have any portuguese places that are expensive? S: There doesn't seem to be any. Do you have any other different criteria? U: in that case what about french? S: You have two options , one in  the north and one in the center. Which one do you prefer? U: I'd rather the one in the center. What is it called? S: I have the cote located in the centre it is a expensive french restaurant. U: Does Cote have various nonalcoholic drink options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some guests were disappointed by the lack of non-alcoholic beverages at Cote, but some were pleased with the offerings.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: please find me a good cinema to go S: what about vue cinema? It's located in the centre. U: Can I have the postcode and phone number? S: Sure. The postcode is CB11PS and the phone number is 08712240240. U: I'm also looking for a place to stay in. Can you find me a 4 star place? S: We have 21 hotels and guesthouses ranked 4 stars. Do you have a particular area of the city you'd like to stay in? U: I would like something in the west. It doesn't need to have internet. S: There are 3 hotels in the west. Two are cheap and one is expensive. Do you have a price preference? U: Let's go with the cheap one. S: There are 2. Would you like to stay in a guesthouse, or in a hotel? U: A hotel would be perfect! S: Ok.  So that is the cambridge belfry.  Should I make a reservation for you? U: Is the water pressure strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Recent customer reviews have indicated that the showerheads provide low water pressure, which they were unhappy about.

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.The food was really small. 2.The food was of good quality and there was good vegetarian option but i you had overpriced your food and it was of Small portion 3.The servings could be bigger for the price but we enjoyed our food well enough. 4.What did disappoint though, was the small portion sizes. 5.The food was fresh and tasteful, and served with generous portions. 6.If only it was bigger, it would be amazing. [SEP] U: I want a moroccan restaurant. S: What price range would you like? U: Any price range will be fine. S: I am sorry, I can't find any moroccan restaurant. Do you prefer any other type of food? U: Yes. can you find any mediterranean restaurant please S: La Mimosa is a restaurant serving mediterranean food in the centre of town, and is in the expensive price range. U: Do you know if it has a good portion of foods? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The serving sizes at the La Mimosa restaurant are a bit disappointing and could be bigger for the price according to the majority of customers.

src_text:

S: There are 10 Chinese restaurants in the centre of town. Would you like a moderately priced one or an expensive one? We have a few cheap. U: I'd like an expensive one please. src_text: FAQs of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.Wifi is free. 2.Yes, WiFi is available. reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The free wi-fi was fast and served us well. 2.The room was clean, quiet, and the WiFi was quick. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.While I was not pleased with the slow wi-fi and small room, I was content with their awesome breakfast options, friendly and engaging staff members and the best part! FAQs of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Free WiFi is available at the Hobsons House. 2.Wifi at Hobsons House is free but available in public areas. FAQs of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Free WiFi is available at the Bridge Guest House. 2.Wifi is free at Bridge Guest House. reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Furthermore, I found that the provided Internet was extremely swift and more than enough for my needs. [SEP] U: I'd like to find a guesthouse to stay. S: No problem. We have 24 to choose from. Any specifics? U: I'm looking for one with free parking and wifi and which has a 3-star rating. S: Okay, there are three: Bridge Guest House in the south, Hamilton Lodge in the north, and Hobsons House in the west. Would one of these work for you? U: Which one has the most dependable Internet service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Bridge Guest House has extremely fast internet, as does the Hamilton Lodge, however the Hobsons House's has unsatisfactory speed.

src_text: reviews of GALLERIA: 1.I hope that the resort and the locals will improve on that going forward. 2.The Hot Mulled Cider I ordered was made to perfection! 3.On top of that, the drinks that we each ordered were phenomenal. 4.As much as the food and drinks were good, they are still some issues with the foods and drinks, as some of they were well below par and they are mediocre. 5.For someone who really appreciates a tasty drink with their meal, this definitely knocks the experience down a bit for me. 6.But what they DO offer is exquisitely-prepared food and drink from a wide range of European cuisines, including escargot, schnitzel, kunefe, and arancini. 7.I ordered a glass of Savignon Blanc with my meal and the wine really complimented the meal. FAQs of GALLERIA: 1.Yes, Galleria serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant in the centre area in the moderate price range. S: There are 21 places to dine at with moderate pricing, do you have a preference for cuisine type? U: Yes I would like european food. S: There are 2 to choose from.  They are both good, but I like the Galleria personally.  There are also a few that serve modern european food. U: Is the Chardonnay of superior quality? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I didn't see any past guests mention Chardonnay. In terms of wine and drink quality in general, the reviews are mixed. Some guests loved them and others didn't care for them at all.

src_text: reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.It was a bit loud and the drinks could be bigger. 2.The location is good and the drinks are a good price. 3.Oh man, their drinks were affordable and their food was really good quality. Do they have cheaper options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If you love beer are and searching for a location with cheap prices, the Yippee Noodle Bar does have drinks for affordable rates.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.It was like sleeping on the floor. 2.I slept extremely well and wished I could have the bed at home! 3.The bed was awful though. 4.The first thing I noticed was how comfortable the bed was to sleep and it felt like a brand-new bed. 5.During this trip, I noticed that the bed at this location was not exactly comfortable. 6.We slept like babies! 7.The bed was really comfortable, too. 8.I didn't get a good night sleep once. 9.The beds themselves were nice and comfy, and my partner really liked the feel. 10.The bed was way more comfortable than my bed at home and I instantly fell in love with the view. [SEP] U: I need a hotel at the center of town to stay in S: The Cityroomz hotel is in the center of town. Would you like to book it? U: Do they have comfortable beds there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Cityroomz has split reviews, a lot of customers say the bed was uncomfortable but some said the bed felt great. Do you want to book it?

src_text: reviews of ROYAL SPICE: 1.I made the 20 mile round trip to the Royal Spice yesterday and it was worth the drive. 2.It was really high-quality cuisine and the location was really nice! 3.The location is convinient and the staff is friendly. 4.The restaurant is in a nice part of town and they give you plenty of food. [SEP] U: Hi, I'll be traveling to Cambridge soon and would like to find a restaurant that serves Indian food. S: There are 22 results for Indian restaurants, do you have a particular price range in mind, or area you'd like to dine in? U: How about a cheap indian restaurant located in the north please. S: Sure, I'd recommend the Royal Spice restaurant. Would you like to book a table? U: Is this location in a good, accessible neighborhood? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Royal Spice is located in a pleasant, accessible neighborhood that's well worth the drive to attend.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a guesthouse in the east. S: Can I get a price range you are looking for? U: I need it to be cheap, and it should have free parking. The Allenbell is located at 517a coldham lane. U: Does it have a beautiful view from the room? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.One of the best things about the hotel is the view of the mountains from the balcony. 2.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. reviews of FINCHES BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.While on business, I stayed at this place, and really loved the view from the window. reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. U: The hotel should be in the West side of town. S: There are 3 four star locations to choose from: Finches Bed and Breakfast, the Huntingdon Marriot, and the Cambridge Belfry. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All three get good reviews for the views from their rooms, but The Cambridge Belfry seems to have the best views. Would you like to book a room?

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The staff was super friendly and welcoming to everyone in the family, including our toddler, who can be a bit overwhelming at times. 2.When we arrived the reception area was a bit understaffed and our check in took a while as the cashier was also checking her phone. 3.The staff was nice even though they could not help with luggage storage. reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.While the location was kind of mediocre and not the best, the very friendly staff made up for it. 2.Immediately upon my arrival, I was treated disrespectfully by the staff. 3.There isn't any concierge service or anything, and the staff was quite unprofessional when it came down to talking with them, but overall we had a good experience here. 4.Still though, the staff was pretty darn friendly and I liked that it had free Wi-Fi so it wasn't too bad. [SEP] U: I'm looking for some entertainment for later. S: There are five entertainment attractions in town, two in the east, two in the south, and one in the west. Is there a particular area of town that you prefer? U: Yes, I'd like to stay in the south part of town please. S: There are two options: Nushua and Tenpin. Both are located at Cambridge Leisure Park on Clifton Way. Would you like the phone number for either of them? U: Yes. Please tell me the one you like best and then how much that place costs to get in. S: I would recommend the nusha. I do not know what the entrance fee is. You may call 01223902158 to check. Do you need anything else? U: I also need a hotel in the Centre in the moderate price range with free parking. S: I don't have any that match your criteria, I'm sorry. U: Can you try looking in the south then? S: There are two results, they are both gueshouses.There's aylesbray lodge guest house, 4 stars, and bridge guest house, 3 stars. Can I book one for you? U: Which one of these has the friendliest staff? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.The staff were very courteous and entertaining and we didn‚Äôt want for anything. 2.It was not as flavorful as I'd have liked and the consistency was just runny, but the servers were awesome and I enjoyed the view from the patio. 3.The bartender was awesome and made some great drinks. 4.Despite the great food and drink, the service was average at best, and was quite slow. 5.So they have a nice outdoor area for dining, some vegetarian options and the service was really good. src_text: reviews of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.The wait staff is courteous. 2.By the time they did, the Biryani that I ordered along with it wasn't necessarily cold, but it definitely lost some of its steam. 3.The service was also nothing to write home about. 4.It did, however, take a little for the Samosas to arrive. 5.When I got there I noticed how friendly all the staff were and I was seated almost immediately. 6.I always love to see a menu with extensive vegetarian options, and combined with the quality of the food and the stellar service, I think almost everyone would find something to enjoy here. 7.Service is kind of slow and not very friendly, or lively, and it's in a bit of a bad location. 8.When we were seated I noticed how friendly the hostess was along with our server. [SEP] U: I was looking for a specific restaurant, please. S: I can help you with that.  Do you know the name of it? U: Yes, it;s called The Golden Curry. S: The Golden Curry is an expensive restaurant in the Centre of town, at Mill Road City Centre, CB12AZ. Their number is 01223329432. Would you like to book a reservation? U: Does it have great staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People seem to differ in their views of the staff. Some people find them friendly and courteous, but they have also been described as nothing to write home about.

src_text: reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.The only dislikes we had were the slow service time and the average drinks. 2.I was pleased with the great service from the wait staff, and my Hot Pot was really high quality and very tasty. 3.The only downside of the experience was the mediocre location and service, as the food took forever to finish. reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.The service was very friendly and good, the prices good too. 2.The workers were very friendly. 3.On top of that, the service was average and the food was rather basic. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: Could you find me a cheap restaurant in the centre please S: I have 15 in the centre. Did you have a food type preference? U: Is there one that serves chinese food? S: There are three Chinese restaurants. They are charlie chan, rice house, and golden house. Does one appeal to you? U: Can you tell me if any of the three are known for having plesant service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Charlie Chan has better reviews for their services compared to Rice House and Golden House.

src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.The location is actually not as remote as it seems and I made it there in about 10 mins by car. 2.Otherwise, loved the restaurant and wish that it was closer to my house, because the location is pretty inconvenient. 3.The location was nice and close to my home, and the staff was friendly enough. 4.The location isn't in the best of places and could be closer to town.
