src_text: reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.Between us we ordered scrambled eggs with tomatoes, dumplings, ma po tofu, and chow mein, all of which were superbly great. 2.They all tasted really good and to top it off they were affordable. 3.Not only did the food taste great, but it was very affordable. 4.On top of that, the service was average and the food was rather basic. 5.Overall, we rather liked the various drink and gluten-free options, but the food left a lot to be desired. reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.The food was great. 2.I was surprised at how high quality the food was for such a good price. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I disliked the Mediocre view and the food variety was a huge letdown. [SEP] U: Could you find me a cheap restaurant in the centre please S: I have 15 in the centre. Did you have a food type preference? U: Is there one that serves chinese food? S: There are three Chinese restaurants. They are charlie chan, rice house, and golden house. Does one appeal to you? U: Do you know which of those three has the most highly rated Ma Po Tofu? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Of the three choices, the only reference to Ma Po Tofu was from a customer at Golden House and they loved the dish. Do you have any other questions I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap Italian restaurant. S: How about Pizza Hut City Centre?  I hear it is very good. U: I s it located in the north? S: No, that one was in the Centre.  But, da vinci pizzeria is in the north U: What are the portion sizes like at Da Vinci? How large are the entrees? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Da Vinci Pizzeria has mixed reviews about their entree sizes. Some say they're small, some say they're big.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. [SEP] U: I need to find a Hamilton Lodge in Cambridge. S: I have one for you, phone is 01223365664. Enjoy U: I need to know how many stars it has and the hotel type? S: It is a guesthouse and is valued at 3 stars. U: What is the hotel type and what area is it located? S: The hotel type is guesthouse and the area is north. U: Do they offer large rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms at the Hamilton Lodge are spacious and comfortable, although a couple guests were disappointed with the small accommodations.

src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.On the plus side, the restaurant has a great location near lots of nightlife in the city, but you're going to need those nearby bars if you want to get a buzz on, because Hakka has a super limited drinks menu. 2.Their drink menu was fairly extensive though. 3.They had a really great selection of high-end beers to choose from. 4.The drink options are plentiful and affordable as well. FAQs of HAKKA: 1.You can order alcohol at this restaurant. [SEP] U: I'd like to go to the theatre, can you tell me about what's available in Cambridge, please? S: There are 5 theaters in the whole of Cambridge, do you have a specific area in mind? U: I prefer the center of town S: There are four theaters showing up in the centre part of town.  It looks like one of them is a arts theater.  Do you want info? U: Yes please! What's the postcode, fee, and number? S: The Cambridge Arts Theatre is located in 6 Saint Edward's Passage Postcode cb23pj, phone 01223503333. There isn't information about entrance fee. U: I would also like a restaurant that is in the North area that serve Northern European food. S: Unfortunately, we don't seem to have any listings that match your criteria. Would you like to look for a different type of cuisine or a different area of the city? U: How about a Chinese food restaurant? S: I would recommend Hakka.  It is in the north area and I've heard it's great. U: Do they serve a variety of beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most of the past customers say that they have a good beer and alcoholic drink selection while one said that it was limited.

src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.The restaurant had a beautiful view from the window of a nice part of town. 2.The view from our table was pretty disappointing, we couldn't see anything except all the other diners. 3.The food was of good quality , you had a nice view but i didn't like the food portion 4.We got seated extremely quickly and were given an amazing view of the cities skyline while we ordered and ate. src_text: reviews of NANDOS CITY CENTRE: 1.I had the Porco Preto, which was excellent, along with a glass of Port wine. 2.The drinks were even bad, like they left them sitting in ice too long. 3.The food was definitely the highlight, as the atmosphere is a bit drab and the drinks were nothing to write home about. 4.There is a great selection available of really high quality drinks. src_text: reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.The location is near lots of cool things nearby so you won't miss anything, but the view isn't that great. 2.The view isn't the best due to the restaurant being located in a strip mall, but that's about the only thing my family and I disliked about this delightful establishment. reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 2.We really appreciated the location as it was conveniently located in a beautiful area. 3.The only downside is the place is a little out of the way. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train to depart Cambridge leaving on Wednesday, can you help me? S: There are over 200 trains departing Cambridge on Wednesday. What will be your destination? U: I will be leaving from Cambridge.  I need to go to Peterborough. S: There are 38 trains leaving from cambridge to peterborough. What time you would like to leave? U: I would like to leave after 14:00 and make a booking. S: I can book you on the TR 3587 leaving at 14:06 and arriving by 14:56. Would that be good? U: Yes,and the reference number as well, please. S: I will be glad to book this for you and get a reference number. Do you only need one ticket for yourself? U: I would like to book for 5 people. S: Your tickets have been reserved. The total will be 82.5 GBP, payable at the station, and your reference number is FSS5PPSG. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Can you recommend a good Turkish restaurant, moderately priced, in the centre of town? S: Yes. Either Anatolia or Efes Restaurant would be a good choice. Would you like me to book you a table at one of them? U: Can you describe the the location of the Efes Restaurant? I want to ensure the restaurant is nice. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location is very conveniently located in a strip mall, so it is near a lot of things. This doesn't give it a very good view, though.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.Warkworth House was a great place to stay for my recent business trip, despite it's very mediocre location. 2.Furthermore, this location was extremely nearby to everything else that I needed on this trip. 3.I chose it for seeming like a good value for my money and for the location. 4.The location is nice and nearby shops are easy to find. 5.Warkworth is a lovely village and there are plenty of walks and places to visit in the area. 6.Upon my arrival, I noticed that I was extremely disappointed with the location because it was extremely out of the way. [SEP] U: Hi there. I have heard lots of family members rave over the Warkworth House hotel. Can you tell me anything about it? S: The Warkworth House is a moderately priced 4 star hotel in the east with WiFi and parking. What else do you want to know? U: Is it located in a desirable part of the city? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most customers were more than pleased with the location express some dissatisfaction. Do you want to make a reservation?

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for a train that's going to stevenage and leaves on tuesday. S: Sure, trains travel to Cambridge every 2 hours, beginning at 06:43.  Can I book one for you? U: I am looking for a train that departs from Cambridge.  I am traveling to Stevenage and I need to arrive by 13:30. S: TR4546 departs at 09:21 and arrives at 10:10. Can I book that train for you? U: How good is the water pressure in their showers? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.The sunset was really beautiful out on the balcony! 2.I was alone so I did not need much but it was very clean and had a nice view I enjoyed. 3.The room is big and I had a great view of the sunset. 4.The view was great - overlooked the ocean and was right by the beach. U: Does it offer a great view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The view from the rooms is very beautiful and attracts a lot. The sunset view especially is the most loved and cherished.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I hate to say anything negative but if I had to nitpick something it was that the bathroom wasn't as clean as I would have liked and the water pressure was low. src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The bed I had on this business trip put me to sleep fast, after a hard day of meetings. 2.It was so comfortable. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 2.The negatives is that the bathroom wasn't that clean when we first arrived and that the beds could've been more comfortable. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place that offers free parking to it's guests. Got any hotels that offer that? S: Almost every hotel and guesthouse in Cambridge has free parking! What area and/or price range are you looking for? U: I want to be in the centre. S: Here are the two choices of hotels in the Centre area that meet your criteria: Gonville Hotel and University Arms Hotel. Do either of these interest you? U: Which hotel offers the most comfortable bed? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Gonville hotel has more reviews that are positive about their beds than the university Arms Hotel. Want to make a reservation there?

src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.The spa was not worth the price though, and the room could have been a lot bigger. 2.The big negative was how small the room was. 3.We were pretty cramped during our stay. 4.It did not seem so tiny online. 5.The room was a little small for my tastes, and I did feel a little cramped even though I was by myself. reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.The price was good but the rooms are small. 2.The room looked larger online and we were a bit cramped. 3.The room was spacious, and much larger than I probably needed, but it was nice being able to squeeze in some yoga in my room during my stay. 4.The bad thing was the size of the room which was very small. reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The Gonville Hotel was one of those places that I've been t hat had bigger rooms than average. 2.I stayed in a regular room but it was big and had a lot of space, the decoration in the room was catching to the eye, and the color that was used on the wall was fantastic. 3.I really enjoyed the big, spacious rooms. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The place had everything we needed, a large big room that never felt cramp, a nice clean bathroom, and a very kid-friendly atmosphere. 2.I was happy that my room was really big. 3.My room was spacious. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive 2 star hotel. S: I have the express by holiday inn cambridge with internet and parking. Would you like me to book that for you? U: Is it located in the east? Would you like to look for a different place? U: Yes, I would. How about a different hotel in the same price range? S: I"m sorry but in that price range and star rating there is only the holiday express. Could we try another star rating? U: Yes, the star does not matter, just try the same price range, please. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I would recommend the gonville hotel or the University of Arms Hotel, as they have excellent reviews about the sizes of their rooms.

src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.It was hidden in the edge of a quiet suburb and it was so peaceful we all loved it. 2.The room is big and nice and quiet. 3.It's a quiet area, but it's walking distance to the shops downtown and public transportation is super close. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I don't know how good the selection is, but one customer that ordered Cabernet Sauvignon said it was not very good tasting. Do you want to change your reservation?

src_text: reviews of ROYAL STANDARD: 1.The service was also on point and got our order out right away. 2.The service was a little slow but not too bad. 3.They have a good view and the service is always good. 4.They have a great bartender on staff who made excellent drinks all night long. [SEP] U: Can you tell me about any expensive places to dine in the east side? S: There are several.  Is there a certain type of food you would like to have? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Although the staff can be a little slow at the Royal Standard, for the most part the service is good.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. S: There are no hotels that fit your criteria. However, there are 7 guesthouses available. Would you like me to book one of those for you? U: Are there any guesthouses with free wifi? S: Yes, all 7 guesthouses have internet available. What price range are you looking for? U: Oh, cool.  It really doesn't matter.  Which would you recommend? S: How about Acorn Guest House? U: Do you know how strong the water pressure is at this hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Based on comments by past guests, the water pressure at Acorn Guest House seems to be pretty low. One past guest said it was nothing to write home about.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay with free wifi. S: I've found plenty of places with free wi-fi. Is there a certain area you're looking for? Or a certain price range? U: It should have a star of 3 and include free parking. S: I found 5 hotels with free wifi and free parking. Is there a particular area or price range you prefer? U: I'm looking for a hotel in the west with a moderate price range. S: I have found no places in the west in the moderate price range with 3 stars. Do you have a different area or price range you would like? U: It doesn't have to be in the moderate price range as long as it is a 3 star hotel with free parking. Please suggest one for me. S: The gonville hotel is an 3 star, expensive hotel in the centre of town that has free internet and free parking. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Yes, I'd like to book there for 3 people for 4 nights starting Thursday and I would like a reference number. S: There is no availability at the Gonville Hotel for those dates. Would you like me to find another hotel? U: Do their showers have high pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, according to three past guests of Gonville, the water pressure there is low and should be improved.

src_text: FAQs of MAHARAJAH TANDOORI RESTAURANT: 1.Maharajah Tandoori Restaurant has a full bar with alcoholic drinks. reviews of MAHARAJAH TANDOORI RESTAURANT: 1.The price was a bit high, but worth it for the expertly-made traditional Indian drinks. 2.The drinks were just okay. 3.But, the food and drinks we had was amazing. 4.They had really good drinks with quality ingredients and the food was excellent. 5.The drinks are really good and worth coming for. [SEP] U: can i request a taxi from my hotel to the city center Chinese restaurant? S: What is the name of the hotel you are staying at ? U: Erm, nevermind, I need a nightclub in the centre of town. I need the address and postcode of the one you recommend. S: Club Salsa is definately the place to be.  It is located at 1 station road, postcode: cb12jb.  Is there anything else I can help with? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I don't see anything on beer options though the comments on alcoholic beverages in general are mixed. Though most people did praise the drinks. Is there anything else you'd like to know about them?

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The free Internet provided at this location was extremely fast and the connection quality was superb. 2.I also really appreciated the free parking and fast, reliable, free Wi-Fi. reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.Their Wi-Fi was super speedy, even faster than the one I have at home! 2.The Wi-fi is slow but I made do. FAQs of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.Autumn house has free WiFi. 2.There is free wifi available. reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.The provided Internet was extremely fast and more than enough for our needs. 2.The wifi was any slower though, it won't work at all. FAQs of ALLENBELL: 1.Free WiFi is available at Allenbell. 2.There is free Wifi at Allenbell. FAQs of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.WiFi is free at the Leverton House. 2.There is free wifi at Leverton House. [SEP] U: Hi. I will be attending a conference in the eastern part of town and wondered if you could help me find an available room. S: There are several guesthouses and 1 hotel in the east part of town. What price range are you looking for? U: I prefer a guesthouse. Do you have any expensive ones? S: I do not have anything in the east that matches your request.  Would you like to change the area or the type of accomodations? U: How about a hotel in the cheap price range? S: I have 3 guesthouses that match your criteria. everton house, autumn house, and allenbell. Does any of these interest you? U: Do any of them mention a strong or reliable Internet connection? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All three places have free Wi-Fi available for guests. All three places also have varying reviews about the quality of the Wi-Fi.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I need  a nice place to stay, do you have those? S: We have many nice places that would suit your needs.  Is there a particular area you are wanting to stay in? U: I would like to stay in the centre of town. S: Sure, I have five options for you. What price range? U: I would like the moderate price range. S: I have found the cityroomz located in the centre for a moderate price.  It has 0 stars and free internet.  Can I make the reservation for you? U: I need a place with good showers - do they have strong water pressure there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The water pressure at Cityroomz seems to be really low. I couldn't find any good reviews about it at all.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.During my recent stay at LEVERTON HOUSE with your family, I was very happy with the clean room especially the bathroom. 2.It was very clean, as well. 3.But while the size of the room was quite good, it was definitely not freshly cleaned when we checked in, and because there was no concierge service, we couldn't find a more suitable hotel to book an alternate stay at. reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.I was alone so I did not need much but it was very clean and had a nice view I enjoyed. [SEP] U: I am looking for a train that departs from bishops stortford and arrives by 12:15. S: I can book you for an arrival time by 12:07 on Friday, is that a good time? U: Does that train leave from Cambridge?  I need something on sunday. S: Train TR1478 departs from Bishops Stortford and arrives in Cambridge by 12:07, would you like me to book this train for you? U: Yes, I would need a booking for 3 people. S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 24.24 GBP payable at the station. Reference number is : G32O0XHA. U: Thank you! I'm also looking for a cheap hotel. It does not need to have free parking. S: Certainly, there are ten hotels. Do you have a preference of type, or area? U: Yes I would like to stay on the East side of town. S: We have 3 for you to choose from. Do you have any further preferences? U: Yes, is there one that has free parking? S: I have 3 of them that offer free wifi in the East. I have the Autumn House, Leverton House and Allenbell. Would you like more info on one of those? U: Which one does have clean rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests have been most enthusiastic about the clean rooms at Allenbell. Would you like me to book you a room there?

src_text: FAQs of ALLENBELL: 1.Breakfast options at the Allenbell include fruit juices, toast and choice of preserves, choice of breakfast cereals, Continental, or Full English. reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Breakfast was always delicious, visually appealing and fresh. 2.However, I was disappointed at the breakfast which was not special at all and small in quantity. 3.We did enjoy the variety at breakfast. 4.Breakfast was excellent with a lot of good options. 5.Each morning, we got a free breakfast with our room. [SEP] U: I need to find places to go.  Can you aid me? S: How about visiting one of our many architecturally important churches? May I offer you a list? U: I should very much like to explore the East, what is located there? S: There are 10 different entries for that area. Are you looking for something specific? U: What attractions are in the East ? S: There are a couple museums, some entertainment venues, and a boat.  Do any of these interest you? U: How about a museum S: There are 4 museums there. The cambridge artworks, gallery at twelve a high street, and saint barnabas press gallery are all free. The cambridge museum of technology is 5 pounds. U: The Cambridge Artworks sounds good. Can I get the address and phone number please? S: The cambridge artworks is at 5 greens road, cb13ef. The number there is 01223902168. U: Thanks, i'm also looking for a place to stay with free parking. S: What area of town would you like to stay in? U: I had no preference going into this, but lets try east since the museum is there. S: There are about 6 places you can choose. Are you wanting a specific price range? U: No but quality matters, are any of them 4 stars? S: Yes there are five hotels in the area that are 4 star hotels. Would you like me to list them for you? U: I'd like a guesthouse, 4 stars.  Area doesn't really matter.  Can you recommend anything? S: there are 16 available. the one that is a beautiful place and is really inexpensive is the limehouse guesthouse. do you need a room? U: I need a hotel or guesthouse with 4 stars that has free wifi, can you make a recommendation based on that? S: I recommend the allenbell. It's a cheap guesthouse that is located in the east like your attraction is. It has free parking and wifi. Shall I book for you? U: No booking, just get me the phone number. S: I'd like you to book the allenbell. Before I do can you tell me how far is it from the theater? U: I wouldn't know this. S: I can book that for you but need to know how many people, when and how many nights. U: Sorry, actually, can you please just send me their phone number? S: No problem at all. The phone number for Allenbell is 01223210353. U: Do they provide any kind of workout area for guests of the hotel? S: Unfortunately there is no onsite gym. Is there anything I can help you out with today? U: Are their Vegetarian breakfast options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Past guests do not mention vegetarian breakfast, so you will have to follow up with the hotel. Past guests mention fruit, toast, cereal, and Continental or full English.

src_text: FAQs of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.The YIPPE NOODLE BAR serves all forms of alcohol. reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.We enjoyed that the menu offered multiple different non-alcoholic drink options, but we did not like how the drinks were poor in taste. 2.The restaurant offered high-quality food and various drink options. 3.While the service was quite slow, the drinks and foods were very high quality, and the restaurant was in a wonderful location. 4.It was a bit loud and the drinks could be bigger. 5.Oh man, their drinks were affordable and their food was really good quality. 6.The location is good and the drinks are a good price. 7.Washed it all down with a nice cold beer. 8.The beer was decent. 9.After, I hung around for drinks and they have a lot to choose from. [SEP] U: Please help me find somewhere to eat in the centre S: You could try the yippee noodle bar, which is asian oriental, and priced moderately. It is located at 40428 King Street City Centre. U: Does it offer vegetarian menu options? S: This is not a vegetarian friendly place. Do you have any other questions or can I reserve a table for you? U: Does the restaurant serve alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, according to past guests, Yippee Noodle Bar does serve alcohol, and there is a review that says they serve all forms of alcohol.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.However, the low water pressure was a bit annoying. [SEP] U: I'm trying to find someplace to visit in town. S: I can help you with that! Do you have a specific type of attraction in mind, or perhaps a certain area? U: Yes, I need an attraction in the weat S: There are a lot of colleges and museums in the west, do either of those work? U: Yes. Can you recommend one place and provide their phone number and postcode? S: Certainly. Churchill College: postcode cb30ds, phone number 01223332360. U: Im also looking for a 4 star hotel. src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The staff was nice and helpful. 2.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 3.While at this location, I noticed that the staff was extremely kind and respectful to both of us. 4.The staff was friendly which made me feel comfortable and welcomed. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The staff was friendly with my requests. 2.It was actually my first time traveling alone, so I was super nervous, but the staff was so welcoming that I instantly felt at ease upon arrival. [SEP] U: Find me a place to stay. I need a hotel in the moderate price range with a star of 4. S: What area of town interests you most ? U: Any area is fine, as long as the place has free wifi. S: Will you need free parking as well? U: Yes, I will also need free parking. S: There are no hotels in the moderate price range with a 4 star rating.  Is there another price range or star rating that you would like me to check? U: Just check moderate price range then please! S: We have the Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge that fit what you want, would you like me to book one for you? U: Which has the most friendly front desk staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The staff at the Ashley Hotel is seen as being friendly and welcoming to guests and the service at the Lovell Lodge is equally kind and respectful.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, unfortunately all of the guests that stayed at the Cambridge Belfry mentioned experiencing lackluster water pressure.

src_text: reviews of PIZZA HUT FEN DITTON: 1.We enjoyed the view and the service was polite and fast. 2.I loved the excellent service and the exquisite drinks. 3.Very fast service. 4.Our waiter was super awesome too, always had a smile on his face which matched the very upbeat and sports-bar like mood of the restaurant. [SEP] U: I'm looking for this restaurant called pizza hut fen ditton S: it is a moderately priced restaurant in the east that serves italian food. can i five you the address? U: Does it have good service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, they do have good service at Pizza Hut Fen Ditton. Past guests describe it as polite, fast, and excellent.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. [SEP] U: i am looking for a train for birmngham new street from cambridge S: I can help you with that. First, a few more details. Do you have a particular day and time frame you wish to travel? U: I would like to leave monday after 08:30. S: There is a train leaving at 09:01 for Birmingham New Street on Monday, would you like me to book that for you? U: Yep thats great whats the arrival time on that train? S: That would be train TR1162 and the arrival time to Birmingham New Street is 11:44. Would you be needing any tickets? U: Yes, that would be great. I am also looking for a place to stay, could you help me with that? S: We have plenty of option. Any place in particular? U: It needs to be two stars and a type of hotel. Expensive price range and free parking. S: There is one hotel that meets your requirements. It is the Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge in the eat part of town. It does have free internet and parking. U: Do you know if they have strong shower heads? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, unfortunately, the water pressure isn't strong at this location. Are you still interested in booking a room?

src_text: reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.The one downside is that I tried to order Dr Pepper and they didn't have it, nor did they have Diet Coke. 2.The drinks were meh though and there were no options that didn't contain alochol. 3.They only carried Pepsi products which is a bit of a bummer. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in the south. S: I have two that fit that description, would you prefer Chinese or Portuguese? U: Either one. I just need it to be open on Sunday. S: Okay, lets do the Lucky Star. Would you like a reservation? U: Does it offer non alcoholic drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Lucky Star has a limited selection of non-alcoholic drinks. They only carry pepsi products apparently.

src_text: FAQs of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Yes, the restaurant does serve alcohol. reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Lots of foods and drinks to choose from here. 2.I had the cabernet sauvignon but it tasted a little flat and I would rate it average at best. 3.They have lots of drinks to choose from so it was easy for my daughter to decide what she wanted to drink. 4.I do have to praise their high quality drinks and food, because everything tastes amazing and is expertly-prepared. [SEP] U: I need a zero star hotel in Cambridge with wifi. S: There is one hotel with your criteria. cityroomz in the centre. It is moderately priced. Would you like me to book it for you? U: No, I actually need it in the north part of town. S: I have no hotels that match what you want in the north area U: I guess the Cityroomz in the centre would be fine then.  Does it include free wifi? S: Yes, it includes wifi U: Can we book it for 8 people starting saturday? S: How many days will you be staying? U: I'll be there for 5 nights. S: Booking was sucessful! Your reference number is U87HN6I5. U: Is concierge services for guests included as well? S: No, there is no concierge service there. What else can I do for you? U: Yes please. For the same amount of people on the same day at 14:30. S: You're all set for saturday at da vinci pizzeria at 14:30 for 8 people.  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Does this restaurant serve alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, they serve alcohol and looking at reviews, the majority of customer were very happy with the quality and price. There were some customers who found the drinks to be lacking. Would you like to know anything else?

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: I would like to find some info on the warkworth house hotel. S: Warkworth house is a guesthouse hotel located in the east.  It is a moderately priced 4 star hotel. The Warkworth house provides internet and parking. U: What about the noise level there -- I really hope to get some peace and rest? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviewers were divided, some mentioned that the rooms were very quiet. Others suggested that the closer to the front of the hotel, the more noisy it became.

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.They were extremely friendly and helpful, and even took the time to tell me some must visit attractions in the area. 2.That being said, the staff here is unbelievably friendly and helpful. 3.But I needed to point out that the staff was very unprofessional. 4.I was pretty nervous and anxious, but the staff made me feel so welcome upon arrival that I instantly felt at ease. src_text:
reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. FAQs of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.No,  breakfast is not free at Carolina Bed and Breakfast. It will cost 8 GBP per person. 2.Full English/Irish breakfast is available. [SEP] U: I am looking for information and would appreciate the help.  Can you help with a train? S: I can give you all kinds of information as well as book a ticket.  Where are you going and when? U: I want to go to Cambridge on Wednesday. S: Where will you leave from? U: I will be leaving from ely. S: Would you like to specify a departure or arrival time? U: I need to arrive by 08:45 S: How many tickets please U: I would need 2 tickets. S: Train TR9741 arrives at 07:52 and I have booked you for 2,here is your information:Booking was successful, the total fee is 8.8 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : U44P6DQP. U: Can you also look up the hotel Carolina Bed and breakfast? S: Sure thing, what kind of information do you need? U: Do they have gourmet breakfast options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I don't know if they have a gourmet breakfast, but they do have a full English breakfast available. Some people said they liked it and some people said they did not.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The staff was nice and helpful. 2.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 3.While at this location, I noticed that the staff was extremely kind and respectful to both of us. 4.The staff was friendly which made me feel comfortable and welcomed. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The staff was friendly with my requests. 2.It was actually my first time traveling alone, so I was super nervous, but the staff was so welcoming that I instantly felt at ease upon arrival. [SEP] U: I'm looking for train tickets, can you help with that? S: Yes, Where will you be arrive from and going to?  I also need a date and time. U: I want to go to peterborough and depart from cambridge. S: There are many trains going to peterborough from cambridge. What day and time do you want to leave? U: I'd like to leave Thursday after 8:30 please. S: I have train TR6009 that leaves at 08:34 and will arrive in Peterborough at 09:24. Would that work for you? U: What is the travel time? S: The travel time is 50 minutes. U: Are there any 2-star hotels (not guesthouses) in the south that have free parking? S: No, I'm sorry there aren't any hotels that meet that criteria. Would you like to try a different area? U: Is there anything in the north? S: In the north, I have 2 places. The first is the Ashley Hotel and the other is the Lovell Lodge. Did you need me to book you a room? U: Can you tell me which one has more friendly staff? I want by stay to be drama free. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both places have high regards as far as friendly staff. They are both very responsive, polite, and very welcoming to our stay at hotels.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in the centre S: sure, i have 33 options for you U: Great.  Is there one that serves mediterranean food? S: I happen to have 2 great ones. La Mimosa is available, as well as the newer one called Shiraz Restaurant. Would you like more info on one of these? U: Let's go with Shiraz. I need a booking for 5 at 16:30 on saturday. S: Your table has been booked for 16:30 and will be reserved for 15 minutes. The reference number is VORP2NWK. What else can I do for you today? U: I am also looking for a four star hotel. S: There are three options to choose from. The Huntington Marriott Hotel, The Cambridge Belfry, and the University Arms Hotel. Which would you like? U: I want it to be a 4 star guesthouse with free parking and internet S: Which part of time would you like to stay in? U: Starting Saturday for 4 people for 5 nights. S: There are actually 16 guesthouses to choose from. Is there an area of the city that you prefer? U: Maybe the centre near my restaurant. S: How about alexander bed and breakfast? U: Do you know if it is in a good location in town? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are mixed reviews about the location. Some thought it was good and others thought it was a bad location.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a 4 star hotel with a moderate price. S: I apologize, I don't have a hotel listing. We could try a guest house or a more expensive hotel? U: How about a guesthouse in the moderate price range then. S: Sure, there a few of those.  What area would you like to stay in? U: Actually, I don't have a preference on area. Can you suggest a place? I need to book a room for Saturday. S: Sure, the acorn guest house is a nice place and it includes both free internet and parking. How many nights would you need? U: Do their showers have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, it doesn't appear that the showers have strong water pressure. Past guests have said it was low.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: I'd really like to get some Middle Eastern food. Can you find a cheap place for me to grab some dinner? S: I see that there are none, maybe I should reconsider the cuisine. Thank you U: Okay, thank  you. goodbye S: There is no middle east food in that area, another place or type perhaps? U: Are there any that serve Italian food? S: There are 5 Italian restaurant options available.  Is there a particular area of town you prefer? U: In the centre of town. S: There are 3 available. Which do you prefer: Pizza Hut City Centre, Ask, or Zizzi Cambridge? U: Book one for 8 people at 18:45 on wednesday. S: I have booked the Pizza Hut City Centre. The rederence number is XDDR16EJ. Is there anything else you need today? U: We will also need lodging, preferably a 4 star guesthouse S: There are 18 guesthouses with 4 stars. What part of town do you prefer? Or do you have a price range? U: It should be in the same price range as the restaurant, please. S: How about the Alexander bed and breakfast?  It is in the same part of town and price range as the restaurant. U: Do they have rooms available for the same day as dinner? S: I'm sure they do, would it be for the same amount of people? And how many days are you staying? U: Yes, it would be for the same group of people, and we will be staying 4 nights. S: What day will you be staying? U: Starting on Wednesday please. S: Booking was successful. Your reference number is USCL95YH. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Can you make sure the water pressure is strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests at Alexander's bed and breakfast said that the water pressure at the Alexander bed and breakfast is low, others have said that it is limited

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.However, I was frustrated about the low water pressure which made my shower not enjoyable. [SEP] U: I am trying to find when the train is leaving Sunday Cambridge can you help me? S: Ok, and where are you heading to? U: I am heading to Ely. S: What time do you want to arrive by? U: Oh, not Ely, sorry.  I need to leave after 16:00 going to London Liverpool Street. S: The earlest I have leaving is train TR7713 at 19:27,will this be okay for you? U: That is good, I also need a place to stay with a cheap price and free parking. S: I have several hotels in your price range with free parking, what area would you like? U: A guesthouse in the east, please S: There are nine I recommend allenbell it's a 4 star guesthouse. Would you like the address and phone number or me to book it for you? U: Does Allenbell have a high pressure shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, unfortunately guests report that the water pressure is quite low. Shall I look into one of the other guest houses instead?

src_text: FAQs of GOLDEN WOK: 1.Golden Wok does have outdoor seating. reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.They have a good area outside for when the weather is nice. 2.I enjoyed sitting out there as I was eating alone. 3.Outdoor dining was nicely decorated and comfortable. [SEP] U: I want something that's moderately priced. Any type of food. S: What area would you like? U: I would like the north part of town, please. S: Golden Wok serves Chinese food. Would you like their address and phone number? U: yes I would like their address and phone number S: The golden wok is located at 191 Histon Road Chesterton and their phone number is 01223 350688. May I help you with anything else? U: Can i get outdoor seating here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If the weather is agreeable, customers that choose to eat at the Golden Wok restaurant are able to eat outdoors.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The room was spotless, too, and I tend to be very picky about cleanliness. 2.In my recent stay at ALLENBELL for a business trip, I was totally impressed by the clean room with a fresh scent. [SEP] U: I am looking to stay at a guesthouse with free wfii S: Allenbell matches those requirements, would you like to stay there? U: Can you make sure the rooms are very clean first? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the rooms at the Allenbell are very clean. They have even been described not only as clean, but as spotless.

src_text:
reviews of TANDOORI PALACE: 1.The only thing is the drinks were overpriced so we weren't able to have more than one. 2.Another highlight were the different beverages that were offered such as lassis and juices, which did not contain alcohol and were very affordable. 3.We were able to wash it all down with really tasty mango lassi though, as if they picked the mangoes at their peak ripeness. 4.The drinks and food were fantastic as always. 5.The drinks were tasty and cheap too! 6.The Good:
- High-quality, delicious food
- Affordably priced drinks
- Generous food portions
The Bad:
- Mediocre drinks
- Slow service 7.So I'll get the negatives out of the way first: their drink menu is way overpriced, and the inside of the place has really bland decor for an Indian restaurant; you won't find interesting signs of cultural heritage here. FAQs of TANDOORI PALACE: 1.Tandoori Palace serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I would like to find a restaurant named Tandoori Palace. Do you know of that restaurant? S: I do. It's a very nice Indian restaurant on the West side. U: Do they serve alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Tandoori Palace, located on the West Side, does serve alcohol. The prices are on the higher end, depending on your budget.

src_text: reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.They have a nice drink menu and the food is good but some of it was expensive. 2.It's a nice place with lots of Italian foods and drinks to choose from. FAQs of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at this place. [SEP] U: I could really go for some Italian food - is there a good place in the city centre? S: Yes we have 9 Italian restaurants in that area. Do yo have a price range you'd like to stick to? U: No price range but can you check in the centre of town? S: If you want to splurge, I recommend Stazione. Would you like to book a table there? U: How big is there selection of Merlot? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They're a good reviews about the alcohol selection at the restaurant. However I don't have specific reviews about the Merlot

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.It was a nice clean room with good wifi, which was great. 2.Room cleanliness is a gamble so if that's an issue for you, I'd avoid this place. 3.They also don't seem to always have housekeeping available. 4.I was surprised and happy that there was a laundry facility available, and the room was very clean and well appointed when I checked in. 5.The room was nice and big and I was able to do my laundry at there facility but the room was a bit dirty. 6.Our room was clean and there is a nice view of the mountains. reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.I found that the room had been cleaned by housekeeping to an exceptional degree. [SEP] U: I need to find a 4 star hotel with free wifi S: There are 21 hotels that meet your needs. Would you like to narrow it down by area or price range? U: I'll definitely need something on the cheap side. S: I have at least two properties matching your requirements and both are considered 4 star hotels. Would you like me to book one of them? U: Are either of them located on the south side of the city? S: Yes, two of them are. Aylesbray lodge guest house and rose's bed and breakfast U: Which one has the best reputation for cleanliness? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms at the Rosa's Bed and Breakfast are cleaned to an exceptional degree, while those at Aylesbray Lodge Guest House can be a gamble.

src_text:
reviews of DOJO NOODLE BAR: 1.Overall the food and drinks at Dojo Noodle Bar were really top-notch, but I wouldn't recommend it if you have a big appetite or a small budget. 2.The portion of food was great and tha food was high quality. 3.The food was really good and the portions were generous. 4.I got a lot of rolls for a very affordable price, and there was a lot of drink options, especially beer. 5.The food was fairly expensive, though, and the portions weren't very substantial. 6.The food came out with generous portions. 7.The portions are a bit on  the small side so I always order seconds so I have leftovers. reviews of J RESTAURANT: 1.The food is expensive for the serving sizes but it is good if you like Asian Oriental dishes. 2.However, the food was served in small portions and I found drinks to be overpriced. 3.The portion size of the food was less than what we are used to, but the food did taste amazing compared to the usual. [SEP] U: Do you have any trains leaving after 15:00 on Thursday? S: Yes, there are many.  What is your destination? U: My destination is Norwich departing from Cambridge. S: TR8604 leaves at 15:36, would this one work for you? U: Yes, that would be find. I'll need to book tickets for 7 people. Can I have the reference number please? S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 123.2 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : KSHHCWCE. U: Thank you! Can you help me find somewhere to eat now? S: Sure, I can help you with that. Do you have a preference in food type or price range? U: Yes, do you have a place that serves corsican food? I also need it to be on the cheap side. S: No, unfortunately, I do not have any cheap Corsica restaurants. Would you like to look for another restaurant? U: Bummer! I guess I'll try some asian oriental food then S: I have two that fit your criteria!  Dojo Noodle Bar, and J Restaurant are both in the city centre area.  Do you have a preference? U: Which of these two serve larger portions of food? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most guests consider the portion sizes at J Restaurant to be small, whereas those at the Dojo Noodle Bar are between generous and not substantial.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.When I went to go take a shower, I found that the very limited water pressure made it very difficult to get clean. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for a nice moderately priced hotel located in the east. S: I have 3 great guesthouses in the east. I recommend Warkworth House. Would you like to book a room? U: Do they have great water pressure in the showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, the water pressure there is very limited.  Sorry to disappoint!

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: I would like a guesthouse with free wifi please. S: We have 23 different options available. Is there an area you would prefer? U: I'm looking for something expensive in the north. S: There are no expensive guesthouses in the north with free wifi. U: OK, how about a moderately priced one? S: There are 8 moderately priced guesthouses in the north. May I suggest the 4 star Acorn Guest house? U: Are there any expensive hotels in the north?   I plan on staying with 4 other people for 4 nights, starting wednesday. S: Do you have a parking preference? U: No parking preference. Can you please recommend one. S: I'm sorry.  I am not finding any hotels in the expensive price range in the North.  Would you like to change your search? U: Can you check for moderate price range instead? S: The Acorn Guest House is moderately-priced, in the north.  They offer free wifi as well.  Would you like me to book you a room? U: Is the shower pressure strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It is said that the water pressure is pretty low and hard to get use to.  It has also been said that it is nothing to write home about.

src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.I wish there was some nice drinks to complement the meal but there were only limited non alcoholic drink options. [SEP] U: Do you have information about the Warkworth House? S: Yes I do! The Warkworth House is a 4 star guesthouse that is located in the east section of town. Would you like for me to book you a room? U: No, but can you give me that phone number please? S: Most definitely. The Warkworth House's phone number is 01223363682. Can I help you with anything else? U: Yes I need to find an expensive place to eat serving Indian food. S: There are over a dozen expensive Indian restaurants in the city. Do you have an area of town in mind? U: Actually, can you suggest one of them. I'm willing to try something new. I want to reserve a table at the one you recommend. S: How about the Curry Garden? How many people for your reservation? U: Do they have a quality selection of non-alcoholic drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for that location, the variety of non-alcoholic drinks has been described as limited.  Sorry!

src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.The restaurant had a beautiful view from the window of a nice part of town. 2.The view from our table was pretty disappointing, we couldn't see anything except all the other diners. 3.The food was of good quality , you had a nice view but i didn't like the food portion 4.We got seated extremely quickly and were given an amazing view of the cities skyline while we ordered and ate. [SEP] U: I need to find an expensive restaurant on the north side. S: I have about 5 different ones to offer you. I have european food, french, chinese and asian oriental. Do you prefer a certain cuisine? U: Can you give me some additional information on the Asian Oriental one? S: Sure, it's called Saigon City, and it's located at 169 High Street Chesterton Chesterton, cb41nl. Their phone number is 01223356555. Can I be of further assistance today? U: Does it have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most of the comments on the view are very positive with customers say it was really nice and beautiful. There were some who said they could only see the other customers. Would you like to know more about them or should I check out some other places?

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. [SEP] U: please fid me a place to go in the centre S: Okay! What type of place would you like to visit? U: I would like to visit a nightclub in the centre. Can you provide me with entrance fee info and postcode? S: Okay, I recommend Club Salsa. It's 5 pounds to get in. The post code is cb12jb. U: Perfect, thank you. I'm also looking for information on hotels in the centre that have free wifi. Could you recommend one? S: There are 5! What price range would you like? Cheap, moderate, or expensive? U: Any will do. Whichever one you recommend. S: the fez club is my favourite. it is in 8 market passage. can i give you their phone number? U: As long as this is a hotel, it sounds great.  Can you give me the address? S: I'm sorry, I misunderstood.  Fez is a nightclub.  Did you want a hotel? U: Yes. If you read the conversation above, you'll notice my second request was for a hotel. I'd like one in the same area of the nightclub. S: I would suggest the University Arms Hotel. It is in the centre of town in the same area as Club Salsa. Would you like information or to book a room? U: Could you tell me if they offer any rooms with a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One of the positives about staying at the University Arms Hotels is that the views from the rooms are especially picturesque.

src_text: reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.The one downside is that I tried to order Dr Pepper and they didn't have it, nor did they have Diet Coke. 2.The drinks were meh though and there were no options that didn't contain alochol. 3.They only carried Pepsi products which is a bit of a bummer. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant. I would like something cheap that has Chinese food. S: I've heard good things about the lucky star. Need a reservation? U: How's the selection of non-alcoholic beverages at the Lucky Star? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They don't have a very wide selection of non-alcoholic beverages there. Should I search for something else for you?

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. [SEP] U: I need a particular hotel called the Leverton House. S: I have located the Leverton House. Would you like me to book it for you? U: yes, please I would like it booked for 4 people. I would need this for 3 nights starting with monday. S: I'm sorry. I couldn't book the Leverton House for that day.  Would you like me to try another hotel? U: Yes, in the same price range, please. S: Okay. I was able to book you into the Allenbell and your reference number is MLL5WTH5. U: Does the Allenbell have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, according to guests that have previously stayed at the property, the Allenbell has impressed with the great, scenic views available.

src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. [SEP] U: Hi, I need a train to Cambridge on Sunday. S: I have 202 trains traveling to cambridge on Sunday. Where will you be departing from, and what time would you like to arrive? U: I'm leaving from London Liverpool Street after 14:45. S: There is a train at 15:39 and several others every two hours after that.  Can I book a seat for you? U: please book me on the 15:39 train. S: Will you needing more than one ticket?  The cost per seat is 13.28 pounds. U: No, just one ticket please. S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 13.28 GBP payable at the station . Your Reference number is 33Z0FMIQ. U: Great. Can you also help me find out about a restaurant called charlie chan? S: Charlie Chan's address is Regent Street City Centre and the number is 01223361763. U: Is the service there really very good for your dining experience? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The service is prompt and friendly at Charlie Chan. Can I answer anything else for you about the restraurant?

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. [SEP] U: Hi, could you help me with my plans?  I am looking for a train. S: I can help you with that. Where will be departing and where do you want to go? U: I will be departing from Cambridge and going into Ely on Saturday. S: Trains run that route every two hours throughout the day. Do you have a target departure or arrival time? U: I would like to arrive in Ely by 11:15.  Could you please tell me the price and what the departure time is? S: TR0718 arrives at 10:07 on saturday.  Cost is 3.52 pounds.  Would you like me to reserve a seat for you? U: I see it arrives at 10:07 but so you have the departure time? S: The train that arrives at 10:07 would depart at 09:50. U: Yes, please book it. S: How many tickets are you needing? U: I'm sorry, I just needed the train info. However, I need a place to stay in the North preferably with parking. Can you assist? S: I have 11 different options for you. Is there a certain price range or star level you would like? U: No, it should include free wifi. S: There are 11 options for you. If you have no further specifications, then I recommend hamilton lodge. U: Is Hamilton Lodge located in the north area of town? S: Yes it is. Would you like to book it or do you need more info? U: Do they give you a spacious room to stay in? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are two reviews that say the rooms are big, and two reviews that say they with the rooms were bigger. Are you interested in booking it?

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.Apparently they're known for having great drinks, but I only had the one since they were pretty expensive. 2.We didn't try any drinks, because we thought they seemed overpriced. 3.While the drinks are reasonably priced they aren't very good. 4.However, the drinks were pricy if you like to drink and I left a bit on the hungry side as the portions are small. FAQs of GRAFFITI: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at Graffiti. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to dine. The restaurant should be in the expensive price range and should serve british food. S: How about graffiti? I've heard great things. U: That sounds interesting. What area is the restaurant in? S: It is in the west area. U: Thanks. What is the postcode, address, and area? S: Graffiti is in the west area, address is Hotel Felix Whitehouse Lane Huntingdon Road, postcode cb30lx. Do you want reservations? U: Is the wine a good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, most customers complained that the drinks, while cheap, were too expensive for their quality. Do you want to look elsewhere?

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine. [SEP] U: i need a moderately priced hotel in south cambridge. S: There are no moderately priced hotels in the south. Would you be interested in a moderately priced guesthouse? U: I'm actually looking for the warkworth house hotel. S: The warkworth house is a guesthouse in the east area of town. Would you like me to book the guesthouse for you? U: Is this place a quiet hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The opinions are divided on the quietness of the hotel. Some customers say it was quiet while others say it was noisy.

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.However, the low water pressure was a bit annoying. [SEP] U: Hi, I need a hotel with wifi, please. S: Huntingdon marriott hotel has a high rating and wifi U: How about the water pressure available at the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Huntingdon Marriott Hotel has low water pressure that is a bit annoying. Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: I want a place to stay. Find me a hotel that includes free parking. S: There are eight accomodations of the hotel type with free parking. What part of town do you prefer? U: The west, please. And can I get free wifi? S: The Cambridge Belfry is an inexpensive, 4 star option on the west side with free wifi and free parking. U: What are the reviews saying about the water pressure in the showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Recent reviews show the water pressure isn't good, unfortunately. Would you like to try another location instead?

src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The restaurant is in a really nice part of town with plenty of parking available, it's incredibly picturesque so you can enjoy an after meal walk. 2.It's in a nice, convenient location near town, and the foods were good. 3.The restaurant was in a very nice location, but despite that the view was very mediocre and the atmosphere was average at best. 4.Their location is lovely, right in the heart of the city. 5.They are in a great accessible location with easy parking. 6.The inside is not very modern but the location is easy to get to. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant that serves Malaysian food and is in the cheap price range. S: No matches found for cheap Malaysian food. Would you like something else? U: How about vietnamese food, please? S: Thanh binh is a nice restaurant that serves Vietnamese food and is in the cheap price range. U: Is it close to things to do? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Thanh Binh restaurant is generally regarded as being in a picturesque location in the heart of the city.

src_text: reviews of RIVERSIDE BRASSERIE: 1.They had lots of mocktails and non-alcohol drinks to choose from. reviews of DE LUCA CUCINA AND BAR: 1.One thing that stood out to me is that they had a ton of nonalcoholic drink options. 2.That really worked out for me because typically I'm not a drinker I was pretty happy to have a variety of options. [SEP] U: I need help finding a restaurant in Cambridge. S: What type of food do you want? I have asian and african cuisine U: I would actually like to find something that's serving modern European food, preferably in the centre. S: I have four options. Do you want cheap, moderate, or expensively priced? U: moderate please. S: We have two options - de luca cucina and bar or riverside brasserie.  Would you like me to book a reservation at either one? U: Which one has sodas, teas and other non alcohol drink choices? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests to both noted the wide variety of non-alcoholic beverages. Can I answer any other questions about the restaurants?

src_text: FAQs of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.Little Seoul does offer outdoor seating. reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.It was also a nice place to eat since there was an outdoor dining area. [SEP] U: Can you help me find the funky fun house? S: The Funky Fun House is located at 8 Mercers Row, Mercers Row industrial estate. Would you like the phone number? U: Please give me their postcode, and the area of town they are located in. S: It's on the East side and the postcode is cb58hy. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: I would like a place to eat in the centre and should serve korean food. S: I would recommend Little Seoul. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Does the restaurant offer free wifi? S: No, little soul does not have Wi-Fi. Would you like to proceed with the reservation? U: Yes, can you please do that for me. S: What day should the reservation be on? U: Monday, at 20:00 for one person please. S: Your reference number is W98YEY49, is there anything else you need? U: Do you know whether high chairs are available for babies at Little Seoul? S: No they do not have high chairs at Little Seoul. Do you need anything else? U: Does this place offer outdoor seating? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Little Seoul does have an outdoor seating area which previous reviewers have enjoyed and described as "nice".

src_text: FAQs of LA TASCA: 1.Yes, La Tasca does have provision for outdoor seating. reviews of LA TASCA: 1.Right when we were seated I noticed how nice the outdoor dining area was. [SEP] U: What's a good mid price restaurant? S: Is there a specific part of town or type of food you're interested in? U: I would like Catalan food. S: I'm sorry, there are no restaurants serving catalan food in your price range. Would you like to try something else? U: How about Spanish food? S: La tasca serves Spanish food and is in the moderate price range. U: Do they have a nice eating area outside? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Because I had a late arrival, the very comfy bed was a really nice perk as well. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay, I would prefer a hotel in the expensive price range. S: We have lots of those. Did you have something a little more specific in mind? U: Whatever you'd recommend. I would prefer free parking and wifi, though. S: I like the Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge.  Can I get you some more information on that one? U: no, let's just book it. S: Sounds like a plan.  May please get the number of guests, the day of arrival, and how many nights you will be staying? U: How many bedrooms are there. S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: FAQs of THE GANDHI: 1.Yes, The Gandhi does have outdoor seating. reviews of THE GANDHI: 1.You can sit outside. [SEP] U: Find me a cheap indian place to dine at please. S: sure, i have 4 options for you U: Okay can you tell me which one is in the centre? S: There's three in the centre, Kohinoor, The Gandhi, and Mahal of Cambridge. Do you need more information on any of these? U: Can I have a booking for The Gandhi? I'd like to book it on Sunday at 11:45. There will only be one person. S: Your table is reserved, reference #BXPQUZAN. Can I help you with anything else today? U: Yes, do they have any outdoor seating? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, past guests have said in their reviews that there is outdoor seating available for customers at The Gandhi.

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip to Cambridge S: Sure, what can I help you with? U: I need a train to peterborough from cambridge on friday and would like to arrive by 20:00. S: TR5124 arrives at 19:56, would that work for you? U: What is the price of the ticket? S: Tickets are 16.50 pounds. U: What is the travel time? S: The travel time is 50 minutes. U: Thanks! I'm also looking for a place to eat. What's the best Italian joint on the north side? S: There is one Italian restaurant in the north. It is da vinci pizzeria. Do you want me to book a reservation for you? U: Does it have large portions? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Portion size offered at the Da Vinci Pizzeria is subject to the opinion of the customer as some have stated they offer small plates, and others plentiful.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.Also, the Wi-Fi was extremely slow. 2.This is very frustrating when you are trying to work and the delay is huge. 3.Also, the fast wi-fi was a huge plus for work I had to work to do on my laptop. FAQs of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.Wifi is free at Ashley Hotel. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel. I want it to have free wifi, but parking doesn't need to be free. S: There are many lodgings with free wifi; would you prefer any particular area of town? U: No but I would like it to be a 2 star place. S: There are 3 hotels: The Ashely Hotel, Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge, and Lovell Lodge. They all have free wifi and parking. Do any of these sound good? U: Does the hotel charge a fee for WiFi? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the Ashley Hotel does not charge an additional fee for Wi-Fi. Internet access is free there. Speeds may be variable.

src_text: reviews of WORTH HOUSE: 1.It was quiet which was nice being on a business trip, and the bed was comfortable. 2.The bed was comfy so I slept well. 3.The only issue that I had is that the bed was not as soft as would have liked. [SEP] U: I would like to go and visit Leicester. Do you think you can help me find a train to get me there? S: Sure! There are plenty of trains going to Leicester. What city will you be departing from? U: I will be leaving from cambridge. S: Perfect. What day would you like to travel on? Do you need to depart or arrive by a certain time? U: I will be traveling on Sunday and would like to arrive by 08:30 please. S: The first train leaves at 06:21 and arrives at 08:06. How many tickets would you like please? U: I need it for eight people, please. S: Great! You're booked on TR9187 with reference number MJJ7J6CV. Is there anything else I can help with? U: Yes! I also need to find an expensive guesthouse in the north. It should have plenty of free parking for my fancy car. S: I am sorry, there are no expensive guest houses in the north with free parking.  Would you like to try another area? U: Then how about one that is in the cheap price range? S: There are 2 options. City Centre north has a rating of 0 stars and Worth House has a rating of 4 stars. Would you like me to book either of them? U: Can you find out if Worth House has comfortable beds? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: From the reviews, I see most people feel their beds were really comfy while some others said it was not so comfortable at all. Would you like me to find a place with better ratings?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.However, my wife noted that the ability to take a shower was diminished as a result of limited water pressure. 2.However, when we tried to take showers the following morning, we found that the water pressure was really low. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay in the center of town that has free wifi. S: I have five matches for your requirements. Do you have preferences for price range or quality ratings? For example, the Alexander B&B is inexpensive, but rated 4 stars. U: doe the place have strong water pressure in shower S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If you're looking for strong water pressure, the Alexander Bed and Breakfast will be a disappointment with it's limited offering.

src_text: reviews of LOCH FYNE: 1.The only negatives were the lack of gluten-free options and the mediocre view at best. 2.My only critique is that from our window the view was very poor, and it showed us a gross alley. 3.And if you want a romantic date night, it doesn't get any better than Loch Fyne's oceanside views. [SEP] U: Please help me locate a restaurant in the centre that serves South Indian food. Thanks. S: I'm sorry but there are no South Indian restaurants in the center. Can I interest you in something else? U: Is there one that serves seafood? S: The loch fyne serves seafood.  Would you like for me to make you a reservation? U: Does it have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Loch Fyne has oceanside views, but some seating locations do not offer a nice view. Would you like to make a reservation?

src_text: reviews of THE MISSING SOCK: 1.At the very least the place had a great vibe with good music so the atmosphere felt right. 2.The food was of good quality and affordable prices and had a various vegetarian option, i really like the atmosphere [SEP] U: I'd like to find information for the restaurant called The Missing Sock.
