trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One past customer of The Missing Sock said that the atmosphere was very nice and another said the atmosphere felt right.

src_text: reviews of HOME FROM HOME: 1.I stayed here on my business trip, and after a hard day of business meetings, it was nice to retire to a large comfortable room. 2.I wished it was a bit bigger. 3.The only negative was the size of the room. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel by the name of home from home. S: Home from Home is a moderately priced, 4 star guesthouse located in the north. Would you like me to check availability for you? U: Yes and I need a suite or an extra large room S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, opinions are mixed.  66% thought the rooms were too small, while 33% thought they were comfortably large.

src_text: reviews of BEDOUIN: 1.It was a great atmosphere as there was nice outdoor dining with a pleasant view to contemplate as I ate. FAQs of BEDOUIN: 1.Yes, Bedouin has outdoor seats. [SEP] U: Hey there, I need a train from stevenage that leaves after 09:45. Can you help? S: I would be happy to help with your request, what is your destination and what day will you be leaving? U: We are going to cambridge and would like to leave on monday after 09:45.  Thanks for your help. S: Would a train departing at 09:54 work for you? U: That sounds great!  Could you give me the arrival time, travel time, and train ID as well? S: Sure. It's train TR8265, arrives at 10:43 in Cambridge and has a duration of 49 minutes. Can I book you seat? U: Maybe later. I am also looking for an expensive restaurant. S: There are many expensive restaurants in the city. Do you have an area or type of cuisine that you'd prefer? U: No, I'll take your recommendation. I do need postcode, address and phone number, please. S: I would recommend bedouin,address is 100 Mill Road City Centre,phone is 01223367660 and post code is cb12bd. U: Do they have an option for outdoor dining? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Bedouin offers a lovely outdoor dining area, previous customers mentioned that it has a plesant view from the outdoor seating. Would you like to know more?

src_text: FAQs of BANGKOK CITY: 1.Bangkok City serves alcohol. reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.I think they are charging a bit too much, but I will say they did have many drink options to choose from as well as a decent sized menu. 2.The food was great, and while the drinks were splendid and of wide variety, the prices were too high for both. [SEP] U: I am traveling to Cambridge and looking forward to try local restaurants. S: Great! We have lots of great restaurants. Let's narrow down your search. What kind of cuisine would you like? S: Bangkok City will fit your preferences perfectly.  Would you like me to reserve a table for you? U: Does Bangkok City serve a variety of beer options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I don't see any information specifically about the beer, but all the reviews I read praised the wide variety of available drinks offered at Bangkok City.

src_text: reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.The food was really high quality and so were the drinks. 2.The drinks we started off with were very good though. 3.The bartender was awesome and made some great drinks. 4.As we were enjoying our drinks we noticed the food was priced very reasonably. 5.I liked the drink and will get it again. 6.We also ordered Ale to drink, which was fantastic. FAQs of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.Yes, alcohol is available there. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for a specific restaurant in Cambridge. It's called The Copper Kettle. Could you give me any information on it? S: The Copper Kettle is a British style restaurant in the centre area with a moderate price range. Would you like more information? U: Do they serve high quality ale? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, people who ordered the ale say that it was really good. Do you need any other information from me?

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Carolina Bed and Breakfast had a pretty mediocre location, it seemed too far away from the places I came to town to visit. [SEP] U: I need some information on the Carolina Bed and Breakfast.  Can you help me with that? S: I can definitely help with that. It is a guesthouse located in the east. It is moderately priced and has a 4-star rating. They also offer free parking and free internet. U: Is this in a good and safe area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It is far away from many centeral places in the city, but there is no mention of how safe the location is.

src_text: reviews of SAIGON CITY: 1.The restaurant had a beautiful view from the window of a nice part of town. 2.The view from our table was pretty disappointing, we couldn't see anything except all the other diners. 3.The food was of good quality , you had a nice view but i didn't like the food portion 4.We got seated extremely quickly and were given an amazing view of the cities skyline while we ordered and ate. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If you're seated near the windows of Saigon City you're privy to beautiful views of the city skyline, if not, the sights are far less impressive.

src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.To drink you can't go wrong with the lager. 2.The drinks were okay but they were overpriced. 3.The only disappointing thing was the drinks as they didn't seem fresh. src_text: reviews of LOCH FYNE: 1.I thought the Riesling was excellent. 2.Wash it all down with a bottle of their house Sauvignon Blanc, and thank me later! 3.We also ordered Cabernet Sauvignon, which was absolutely delicious. 4.The Chardonnay was perfect for our meal. 5.Drinks were really good, as was the food. FAQs of LOCH FYNE: 1.Loch Fyne serves alcohol. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a 4 star hotel to stay at? S: Sure, do you prefer the west or the centre part of Cambridge? I need four nights starting Sunday, for two people. S: Done! Your reference number is CU4LPL6C. Do you need help with anything else? U: I'm also looking for a place to eat in the city centre. maybe bistro food? S: Sorry there are no restaurants in the centre of town serving bistro food. U: Okay. src_text: reviews of HOME FROM HOME: 1.I stayed here on my business trip, and after a hard day of business meetings, it was nice to retire to a large comfortable room. 2.I wished it was a bit bigger. 3.The only negative was the size of the room. [SEP] U: Yes, hopefully you can help with some information on a particular hotel? S: What hotel are you interested in? U: It is called home from home. I was wondering what type of hotel it is and the star of the hotel. S: Home from Home is a 4 star, guesthouse type hotel. U: Are the rooms spacious? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, at the end of the day, one cannot expect to find large, spacious rooms at the Home From Home as theirs are a bit small.

src_text: FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wifi is free at Acorn Guest House. reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.They did offer free wi-fi which worked as I needed it to. 2.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 3.The free wi-fi sure was nice, too, since the kids like to play games on their phones. 4.Acorn Guest House offers free wi-fi, which was a huge selling point for it. [SEP] U: Can you please find me a train that leaves to bishops shortford? Can it also arrive before 10:45 too? Thankyou for your time. S: I have the TR2061 that arrives at 06:07.  Will that work? U: Does it leave on Sunday? S: No, that one leaves on Friday. TR9219 leaves Sunday at 5:29 and arrives in Cambridge by 6:07. Would you like to book a seat? U: First, let me know if my season pass would work with this train reservation? S: yes it will work but you will have to pick a physical ticket at the station should i go ahead and book a seat? U: Yes please book a seat and send me a reference number. S: I have booked you a seat and the reference number is : 6IJ7W2BN. U: Thanks so much. Can you also find me a place to stay? S: Definitely - we have 33 great places to stay in town. If you can give me some specific requirements, I can narrow it down to the perfect place for you. U: I would like a 4 star moderately priced guesthouse in the north. S: I'd recommend the acorn guest house. It has free wifi and parking. Would you like to book a room? U: No that's ok. Can I just get the phone number and postcode? S: 01223353888 is the number, the post code is cb41da. Can I help with anything else today? U: How old do you need to be to check into this hotel? S: There is no age restriction to get in to this place. Does that complete your assistance from me? U: Is the internet free there or costs money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those selecting to stay at the Acorn Guest House will be provided free WIFI service at no extra cost.

src_text: FAQs of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.Outdoor seating is available. reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.It was a beautiful spot to be eating outdoors. 2.We were out on the patio but being as the building is downtown, the view just isn't very good. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, customers that choose to dine at the Fitzbillies Restaurant appreciate the outdoor seating on the patio.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. U: Does this hotel have a strong shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the guests all agree that the water pressure at Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge is poor and more sprinkler-like than hose.

S: The Worth House is in postcode cb41da. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Yes, please book it for me. S: I can, what are your arrival details? U: I do not need to book it. I need a train to depart from leicester. S: What day will you be traveling? U: I'll be traveling on Thursday. S: Ok, there are many trains leaving leicester on thursday. S: I have the 14:09 train leaving from Leicester. Would you like me to book that for you? U: Before you book it, I need the price and I need the approximate travel time. S: Sure.  The trip itself is approximately 105 minutes.  It costs 37.80 pounds.  Would you like to book a train? U: Yes book 2 seats please and I'll need the train ID. Also book the Worth House guesthouse for 3 people and 4 nights. And give me the reference number please. S: Okay. I have booked you 2 tickets on the TR2361. The total fee of 75.59 is payable at the station. The reference number is 5VFA0ZBS. U: Do the rooms have comfortable beds in them? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms for the Worth house are reviewed as having very comfortable beds. Do you need to know anything else?

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. src_text: reviews of COTE: 1.Who ever made the drinks didn't put really any alcohol in them. 2.My colleagues and I shared a nice cabernet sauvignon with our dinners. 3.The drinks are very well chosen and very well presented. 4.They were lackluster. 5.I'd give it another try though, because the prices (and wine) are irresistible! 6.The food was amazing, but I wish I could say that about our overpriced drinks. 7.We tried a variety of dishes, and my wife and I raved over the quality of their house Sauvignon Blanc. 8.But the drinks were good so I may go back just for those. FAQs of COTE: 1.Cote serves beer, cider, wine, etc. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a North African restaurant. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Cote serves beer, cider, wine, etc., and the wine includes sauvignon blanc. The drinks were good according to most reviewers.

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.The hotel was within walking distance to many spots so it was a very good location. 2.I would expect to pay a lot more considering where the hotel is located. 3.This location offered the best possible location on my budget. 4.With a strategic location, we were able to walk to many places. 5.Given the location of the hotel, the value of money was good, too. 6.I liked where they're situated, in a cozy suburb at the east end of town. reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.It's not in the worst part of town, but it's not great either. 2.The location is great being in the middle of everything! 3.The location isn't great either. 4.The hotel is in the middle of everything, which was fantastic. 5.I understand the location is fabulous but the price was still very high. 6.The location is excellent. src_text: reviews of NANDOS: 1.I got a very affordable beer which was of high quality. 2.First of all, the food and drinks weren't that good at all, and the drinks were expensive. 3.If I had to list any cons, it would be that the drinks aren't great and the decor inside is dated. 4.It was yummy and overall the food and drinks were good. 5.Nandos was an authentic Portuguese dining experience with delicious high quality food and drinks. 6.Each of us also ordered a drink, because their non-alcoholic drink options are very limited, and while they were well-prepared and tasty, we thought that they were overpriced and we wouldn't bother getting drinks there again. src_text: reviews of HOME FROM HOME: 1.I stayed here on my business trip, and after a hard day of business meetings, it was nice to retire to a large comfortable room. 2.I wished it was a bit bigger. 3.The only negative was the size of the room. [SEP] U: i'm looking for a hotel called home from home. S: Yes, Home From Home is located in the north and is a guest house. It's in the moderate price range and is 4 stars. Would you like the address? U: No thanks, I would like to book for 5 people for 2 nights starting on tuesday. S: Ok, I was able to successfully book your party of 5 for two nights starting Tuesday.  Your reference number is JUWRBB8L.  Anything else I can do? U: Do the rooms have a lot of space? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, unfortunately the rooms offered at Home From Home are seen as a negative as they could stand on being slightly larger.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 3.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. 4.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. [SEP] U: I'm looking for information on a hotel called hamilton lodge. S: Sure thing, here is the address 156 chesterton road U: I'd like to get a larger room there. Does this hotel have one? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are some mixed reviews on the room sizes. There were some positive comments with one saying the room was spacious and another saying their room was extremely large and comfortable. Other guests said the room was on the small side and it would have been nice if the room was a bit larger. Would you like me to check on the availability of a larger room right now?

src_text: reviews of KIRKWOOD HOUSE: 1.The bathroom was super clean, too, which is always a plus. 2.Besides, the room was neat and clean especially the bathroom. 3.I appreciated how clean the room and bathroom were. [SEP] U: Hi, can you find the hotel Kirkwood House? S: Yes. Kirkwood House is a 4-star, moderately-priced, guesthouse in the north. It includes free parking and internet. Would you like me to book this for you? U: Could I please have the phone number and address of this hotel? S: Sure, kirkwood house is located at 172 chesterton road, phone 01223306283.  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Do they have clean restrooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most people have applauded how clean that the bathrooms are in the rooms at this particular location.

src_text: reviews of CAMBRIDGE LODGE RESTAURANT: 1.The first thing I noticed is that the view is breathtaking! 2.A beautiful, serene view of the forest viewed through a window that goes from floor to ceiling. [SEP] U: I am  traveling to Cambridge and looking forward to try local restaurants. S: Great! Cambridge has many restaurants! Is there a certain type of food you'd like or a certain price range? U: Maybe I should figure out my train first.  I am departing from Ely on Friday and want to get to Cambridge by 9:30. S: The TR8510 leaves at 07:35 and arrives by 07:52. Would you like me to book tickets? U: Yes, please. I will need 5 tickets. S: Okay, your booking was successful. Your reference number is EVDO33LE. 22 GBP is your total and it's payable at the station. U: I am also looking for a restaurant in the West and really want to have Brazilian food. S: that type of food is not served in the west. can we change location? U: let's change location and the restaurant should be in the expensive price range. S: It looks like there aren't any expensive Brazilian places in the city.  Would you like me to check a different price range? U: Can you see if there are any expensive european food? S: Cambridge Lodge Restaurant will fit your needs. Would you like for me to book a table? U: Do their tables have nice views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, guests unanimously rate the views at the Cambridge Lodge Restaurant to be breathtaking and serene.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.We found it convenient to get around, as the location is great. 2.My favorite part was the great location of the hotel! 3.The Aylesbray is located near some nice dining options. reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.I found it easy to find nearby shops. 2.The B&B had a super convenient location, and my room had a wonderful view. 3.The location of the B&B was extremely close to other things that I wanted to do. [SEP] U: I need to find a 4 star hotel with free wifi S: There are 21 hotels that meet your needs. Would you like to narrow it down by area or price range? U: I'll definitely need something on the cheap side. S: I have at least two properties matching your requirements and both are considered 4 star hotels. Would you like me to book one of them? U: Are either of them located on the south side of the city? S: Yes, two of them are. Aylesbray lodge guest house and rose's bed and breakfast U: Okay, please book 4 nights for 4 starting tuesday S: Which hotel would you prefer me to book? U: Which hotel is located in the best location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Aylesbray is located near some nice dining options and is in a convenient location. Rosa's is near shops and is also in a convenient location, should you wish to sightsee.

src_text: reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.The food aside, the restaurant has a great view of the city, and it makes for a really nice date spot. 2.To add to that though their foods and drinks are awesome and the view of the place is very relaxing and professional. 3.I just expected a more pleasant view. 4.I disliked mediocre food and views however, given that the location was good. 5.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 6.It's surprising the place was so affordable for a place that had such a nice view. 7.What I didn't like so much was that although the restaurant is in the nice part of town, the views are mediocre at best. [SEP] U: I want to find a place in town to visit called Jesus Green Outdoor Pool. S: Hello. Jesus Green Outdoor Pool is in the north area between Victoria Rd. and the River. Call 01223302579 to find more about costs. U: Sounds good! Do you happen to know what attraction type it is? S: It is a swimmingpool U: now I need a chinese place to eat S: There are a wide variety of Chinese restaurants in the city. Do you have a preference on where it is or the price range? U: I would like an expensive restaurant. S: I have 9 options for you, any particular area of town you want to dine in? U: Yes it needs to be in the centre. Can you book me a table for 6 people at 17:45 on Friday? S: How does Ugly Duckling sound? U: Does this restaurant have a good city view for the diners? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are many customers that rave about the views. Relaxing, professional and pleasant sights to take in.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: Hello, any interesting colleges in town? S: I am showing 18 colleges. Is there a certain area of town you would like? U: Not really.  Which do you think would be the most interesting to visit? S: I would suggest Christ's college in the city centre or Corpus Christi college in the west.  Christ's college is free and Corpus Christi costs 2 pounds? Which do you want? U: What is the postcode of Corpus Christi? S: Their postcode is cb21rh. Can I assist you with anything else? U: I am looking for a guesthouse to stay in. S: I have 24 guesthouses.  Let's narrow it down a bit.  Do you have a price range? U: I need something with free parking and a 4 star rating. S: That cuts it down to 16. I can recommend the Acorn guest house, or do you have a pricerange or area of town you want to stay in? U: Does the shower have good pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Acorn water pressure was not good at all. Some said it was just okay while another said it takes time to acclimate.

src_text: reviews of ALPHA-MILTON GUEST HOUSE: 1.The rooms, however, weren't as clean as we would have expected. 2.Just a bit disappointed at the rooms not being clean when we arrived, but the views are worth it. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a Belgian food restaurant in the centre. Can you help me? S: There are no Belgian places in Centre at this time. Would you like to try a different cuisine or area? U: Yes. Please try European food in the Centre. S: we dont have a place that matches those qualities. can you try something else? U: What restaurants are located in the centre? S: There are many can I get a price range you are looking for? U: I am not concerned with price. S: Can I interest you in a moderately priced restaurant called Yippee Noodle Bar, an Asian Oriental restaurant in the city centre? U: Yes that would be fine. Please make reservations for 8 people at 11:15 on wednesday. S: I have booked you for 8 people at 11:15 on Wednesday at Yippee Noodle Bar. Your reference number is: TCLMEX5I U: I'm also wanting to stay at the Alpha-Milton Guest House.  Can you help with that? S: Sure thing would you like a reservation? U: Will the room be spotless there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It doesn't look like the rooms at the Alpha-Milton Guest House will be spotless. Past guests have said they weren't as clean as they would have expected.

src_text:
reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.Taking a shower was also a problem and it was very difficult to get myself clean as a result of limited water pressure. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should be in the expensive price range and should have a star of 0 S: Unfortunately I am not finding any hotels matching your criteria, would you like me to look for three star hotels? U: how about a star of 0? S: Sorry, still zero matches. Perhaps some other criteria? U: Ok how about a cheap priced hotel, free wifi would be a plus. S: El shaddai is a cheap guesthouse with free wifi and parking. Does this suit your needs? U: Yeah. Can you help me book it please? It'll be for 8 people S: How many days will you be staying, and what day will you be arriving? U: 2 nights for 8 people starting on sunday. S: Booking was successful.
Reference number is : E69CNU30.
Is there anything else I can help you with? U: One more question. I have thick hair. Is the water pressure in the shower strong enough? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One previous guest did report that the limited water pressure at El Shaddai made showering difficult. Do you want to keep the booking or should I search other options?

src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.The location was to die for, the drink options were aplenty, and the baklava was of the highest quality. [SEP] U: I'd like information on trains departing from Cambridge and arriving at London Kings Cross. S: We have trains departing for Kings Cross every 2 hours.  What day would you like to travel? U: I would like to leave Sunday and arrive by 14:30. S: TR7447 leaves at 13:00and costs 18.88 pounds. can we book? U: Ok.  Thanks.  That's what I wanted. S: Does this mean you would like me to book the train for you? U: Yes, Can you please? S: Here is the reference number VHNBPCYY U: thanks so much for all of your help S: Is there anything else I can do for you today? U: I need to find an expensive Mediterranean restaurant. S: There are 2 expensive Mediterranean restaurant in the centre. Would you like a reservation for one of them? U: Yes whatever one you recommend. I'll need seating for 7 people at 11:00 on Sunday please. S: I would highly recommend the La Mimosa, I have you booked for Sunday at 11. The reference number is MZ1VEJL0. U: Is that in a nice location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location of La Mimosa, which is located in the city centre, is "to die for", according to one very satisfied customer.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a particualr hotel called cityroomz? S: Yes, cityroomz is available. Would you like me to book a room for you? U: What is the star rating and price range of Cityroomz? S: 0 stars. moderate price range. U: Does the hotel have strong water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All the reviewers said that the hotel does have a problem with low water pressure. Is there any other information you need?

src_text: reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.The one downside is that I tried to order Dr Pepper and they didn't have it, nor did they have Diet Coke. 2.The drinks were meh though and there were no options that didn't contain alochol. 3.They only carried Pepsi products which is a bit of a bummer. [SEP] U: Hello, could you help me with finding a restaurant called The Lucky Star? S: The Lucky Star is located at Leisure Park Clifton Way Cherry Hinton. Would you like to book there? U: Does the Lucky Star serve many choices for nonalcoholic drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews left by the previous guests they only carry pepsi products which is quite a bummer and makes the choices of non-alcoholic drinks rather small.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Because I had a late arrival, the very comfy bed was a really nice perk as well. [SEP] U: I need a train out of cambridge on Monday. S: There are over 200 possibilities. Where will you be traveling to from Cambridge? U: Let's change the date to leaving on Tuesday after 20:00 and it should be departing Cambridge and to the Birmingham New Street. S: I would recommend TR6319 which leaves Cambridge at 20:01 and arrives at Birmingham New Street at 22:44. U: Perfect.  Can you book 3 seats for me? S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 225.3 GBP payable at the station. Your reference number is VMZ1Y1EA. Can I do anything else for you today? U: Yes, please. I also need a hotel with free wifi. And, thank you for the train reservation. S: You're welcome! What part of town would you like to stay in? U: The area is flexible. I am more concerned with finding something with 2 stars and with free wifi. S: Okay. There are 3 hotels matching your description. Two moderately priced hotels in the north, and one expensive hotel in the east. Do you want me to recommend one? U: What's the name of the expensive hotel? S: express by holiday inn cambridge is the expensive hotel. U: Do they have comfortable beds at the Express? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Express By Holiday Inn Cambridge has very comfy beds. Would you like me to make a reservation for you?

src_text: reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.I liked that it was located in a location that was easy to get to, pretty central to all of our houses. 2.The location was not good though, we weren't near anything downtown or our house. 3.The atmosphere was enjoyable and the restaurant was located in a nice area. 4.It took us awhile to get to the bar due to the fact that it is a little off the beaten path. [SEP] U: Howdy, I'm looking for a British restaurant for breakfast. S: There are several British restaurants available. Would you prefer a moderate or expensive price range? U: Moderate price range please. S: Five restaurants match your criteria. Four are in Centre area and one is in the West. Which area would you prefer? U: I would like the Center of town please. S: How about The Copper Kettle? U: Is it in a nice location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: To some The Copper Kettle is located in a nice area, central to a lot of houses, while to others, it may be a little far of a drive.

src_text: FAQs of TANDOORI PALACE: 1.Outdoor seating is not available at Tandoori Palace. [SEP] U: Where is the restaurant called Tandoori Palace? S: You can find tandoori palace in he west.  Need a reservation? U: Can you tell me if they have a nice area for outdoor dining? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, unfortunately the Tandoori Palace doesn't provide guests with the option of dining outdoors at their establishment.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Loved the scenery outside and the room was well decorated and home-y. 2.I adored the view that this place offers, we found ourselves staring our rooms windows a lot during our stay. 3.Our room was clean and there is a nice view of the mountains. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay with free parking. S: There are several that offer free parking what is your price range? U: My price range is mid to high range. S: There are several hotels that fits that description what area would you like? U: I would like a hotel in the south with a star rating of 4. S: I have one listing for aylesbray lodge guest house. U: Do you know if Aylesbray Lodge Guest House offers great views from its rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Aylesbray Lodge Guest House offers beautiful views of the mountains. Do you want to book a reservation?

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.I only wish it was in a better location, which made me need a car and then have to make a reservation for parking. 2.I found the location convenient and I felt pretty safe staying alone. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.But that said, the location was overall really excellent, and parking was free which was a nice perk. 2.We were able to visit many things in the area, so it was a nice location. 3.We were within walking distance of may things, so great location. [SEP] U: I'd like a train leaving on Monday and arriving by 11:45, please. S: I can help you with that!  First, can you tell me the desired departure and destination locations? U: London Kings Cross to Cambridge please. S: How about a train that leaves at 05:17? U: That works,will yhou book it for 5 people and I need the train number S: Ok.  You should be set.  The booking was successful.  The train number is TR0378.  Would you like the reference number too? U: Yes, I do need the reference number. S: It is FE03L94U. U: I am also looking for a 2 star hotel that's moderately priced. Can you help with that? S: I have two options for you, both in the north side. Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge, all moderately priced, with free wifi and parking. U: Are they both 2 star rated? S: Yes, both are 2 star rated, moderately priced and located in the north. Both of them also offer free parking and free internet. Would you prefer one of them? U: Which one comes with a good location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some wish that the Lovell Lodge was in a better location, but overall it's convenient whereas the Ashley Hotel is within walking distance to many things and in an excellent spot.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The slow Wi-Fi and noisy room made work a bit difficult. 2.Furthermore, the room itself was silent and allowed me to get the work that I needed to do completed. [SEP] U: I want a train going to cambridge. S: You're in luck, I have quite a few trains coming into Cambridge! Where will you be departing from? U: Stansted Airport, please. S: OK, and what day and time are you traveling? U: I need to leave on sunday and I need to arrive by 12:15. S: TR9445 departs at 11:24 and arrives by 11:52. Would you like a ticket? U: Yes, please. I need a booking for 7 people. S: Okay, the booking was successful and the total fee is 56.56 GBP payable at the station. The reference number is D2K69PNC. U: Thanks so much for the train booking. I also need lodging with free wifi. I don't need free parking, though. S: I have a few places available, in which area would you like to stay? U: Do have anything expensive? I don't care what area. S: Would you like a hotel or a guesthouse? U: Either one is fine. If you can recommend for me, that would be great. Oh and if there's one you like that's moderately priced, that would be fine too. S: I have three, is there a star range you prefer? U: Oh, I don't really care about that. Which place would you recommend? S: I would suggest Avalon. U: Is it a quiet hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I believe it depends on your room, some rooms according to past guests were quiet, others have stated that it was very noisy and distracting.

src_text:
reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm trying to find a restaurant called sala thong. S: Sala Thong is a great Thai restaurant in the West. Would you like me to book a table for you? U: Sure.  I need a table for Friday at 14:15 for 5 people. S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is : V6LXVBDJ. U: rad, thanks for your help. S: Can I help with anything else today? U: I am also looking for a place to stay that has free wifi. S: Do you want to stay in a particular area of town? U: Yes, I want to stay on the north side of town. S: How about kirkwood house?? U: Is that in the expensive price range and do they have free internet and parking? S: They do have free internet and parking but the price is in the moderate range. U: I definitely want to stay in the expensive range, so how about we change the area to the centre of town. What do you have there with wifi and parking? S: We have Gonville Hotel with 3 stars and University Arms Hotel with 4 stars. Which would you like more information on? U: The University Arms Hotel, please. What places does it overlook? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I am not sure, but according to the reviews left by previous guests the views from the rooms are absolutely wonderful.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.It was a bit of a pain getting to my meetings, as the place is not strategically located. 2.First of all, the 24 hour front desk was super convenient for my late arrival, and the location was really good, right off the highway exit. [SEP] U: Can you book a hotel for me? I would like a 3 star hotel or greater in downtown Cambridge for tonight for 2 people. S: There is one called the Gonville Hotel, but it's expensive. Is this alright? U: Is the hotel conveniently located by lots of attractions? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The hotel is located right off of a highway exit however one reviewer still did not find it to be strategically located for their plans. Would you like a reservation at Gonville Hotel?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Not a good thing. 2.And the water pressure was low like at home when someone is using one or two other water taps and it lessens the pressure on your shower. 3.I took a shower and it was really bad, with low pressure water, and it just trickled out slowly. [SEP] U: I am looking to eat at an expensively priced mexican place.  Can you help me? S: There is one mexican restaurant in the expensive range, chiquito restaurant bar.  Would you like more information or a booking? U: That sounds great!  I need to book for 3 people on Friday at 19:30.  I will need a reference number. S: The booking was successful. Reference number is : GOJIRRQ4. U: OK, thank you so much! S: Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Yes, I need a place to stay. It needs to be a hotel and doesn't not need to have free parking. S: We have several hotels, including one in the South, the same area as the restaurant.  It is expensive, but we have others in other areas as well. U: I need it to be cheap with free wifi. S: The cambridge belfry is a chear foru star hotel, would you like me to book you? U: Does the place have strong water pressure in the shower? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, previous guests have complained that the water pressure in the shower is very low. Would you like to book a room at The Cambridge Belfry or should I explore other options for you?

src_text: reviews of ARCHWAY HOUSE: 1.The room had a nice view, you would love. 2.The room itself was clean and pleasant with a fantastic view of downtown. 3.The view from the hotel was gorgeous and I was able to enjoy it at my leisure. 4.We had a nice view that was relaxing. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train that departs out of town on Monday. I'm in Cambridge now. S: There are many trains that match this search. Where would you like your destination to be? U: What trains do you see listed leaving Monday? S: Well, there are 202 total, where would you want to go? U: I'd like to go to London Liverpool Street. S: We have ten trains leaving from Cambridge to London - Liverpool Street. Did you need to arrive by a particular time? U: Yes, I need leave before 1:00 PM. S: Alright. TR7276 Leaves Cambridge at 11:59 and arrives at London Liverpool St at 13:27. Does that work? U: No, I need to arrive by 12:00. S: The TR3085 leaves cambridge on monday at 0959 and arrives at london liverpool street at 11:27. Does that work? U: Yes thanks but I need the price for the train. S: The cost for the train is 16.60 pounds. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Not at this time. Could you also help me find a moderately priced lodging? S: there are 3 available hotels, do you need free parking? U: Yes. I also would like it to be a guesthouse and have a 4 star rating. S: The archway house fits your criteria. Would you like to book there? U: Does the Archway House have internet? S: Yes, I believe it does. U: Do the Archway House rooms offer a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes it does. The room which is clean and has been very well arranged has an incredibly beautiful  view of the downtown.

src_text: reviews of DARRYS COOKHOUSE AND WINE SHOP: 1.The only downsides were the poor location in the city of the restaurant, as well as the outdated indoor decor. 2.The restaurant itself is very pretty to look at as well, and we never got tired of taking in the decor. reviews of MICHAELHOUSE CAFE: 1.The only thing I didn't like was that there was mediocre indoor decor. 2.They had bulletin boards with random stuff on walls and really cheapened the feel of the place. [SEP] U: I'm looking for something to go to in Cambridge. S: What area of town were you looking to visit? U: It doesn't matter. I'm looking for a nice museum. S: Broughton house gallery is a nice museum. Would you like the address? U: Yes, please. May I also have the postcode and the area of town? S: They're in the center of town. The postcode is cb11ln. U: Thank you, I'm also looking for an expensive restaurant that serves European food. S: I have 5 different restaurants available. Do you prefer to dine in a certain area of town? U: NO preference but lets try one in the center area since the museum is there. S: There are three choices, erania, michaelhouse cafe, and darrys cookhouse and wine shop.  Any preferences? U: Which one has beautiful decorations? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Darry's Cookhouse and Wine Shop has decorations that are pretty to look at. The Michaelhouse Cafe has less then beautiful decor, and Eraina does not have that information available.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: i need a place to go which is the type of a college. S: Is there a certain area you're interested in? If that doesn't matter, I recommend Clare College in the west. U: Sure, can you give me the address for that?  You said it is in the west, right? S: That's right Clare College in the west part of town. The address is just trinity lane. Anything else I can do for you? U: Yes, I need to book accommodation. can you recommend a guesthouse  in the northern area of town? S: Is there a price range you prefer? U: I would like it to be expensive please S: There are no hotels that match that criteria. Are you interested in a different price range. U: Are there any in the moderate price range? S: I have several that match that criteria, do you care about parking or wifi? U: I'd prefer it to have wifi, parking it doesn't really matter. S: How does the Acorn Guesthouse sound.  It is moderately priced and has free wifi. U: Great!  I like a nice high pressure shower.  How's the water pressure there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests have been disappointed by the low water pressure. Do you have any other questions about Acorn Guesthouse?

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I liked the view from my room. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant that serves canapes food. Expensive range should do it. S: Unfortunately there are no canapes restaurants. U: hmmm. Can you check again? it should be in the centre. S: I am sorry but there are no restaurants that fit that criteria in the centre. U: Could you try a restaurant that serves british food instead? S: Yes, we have three British restaurants in the central area.  Might I recommend fitzbillies restaurant? U: That sounds fine, can you reserve a table for 3 people at 13:00 on Tuesday? S: Your table is booked, ref #HHFEEGNF. Can I help you with anything else? U: I do need  4 star hotel as well. S: great, i have 21 options for you! U: I would like it to be in the expensive range too. S: Okay we have the huntingdon marriott hotel and the university arms hotel that match your specifications. U: Does this hotel have a great view of the neighborhood? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Huntingdon Marriott Hotel has a nice view from their rooms according to one person that stayed there.

Do you have a price range and do you know what area you want to stay in? U: yes, I am looking for a hotel in a moderate price range with 2 stars and I will need to book 5 people for 4 nights. Thank you. S: I have 2 options for you. Both are hotels in the north. They are both 2 stars and offer free parking and wifi. They are the Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge. U: Do they have nice, welcoming staff? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I had a great view of the mountains. 2.The view was surprisingly good and the room and bathroom were pretty clean. 3.I enjoyed working no my speech while looking at the views. 4.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. reviews of ALPHA-MILTON GUEST HOUSE: 1.The views were amazing. 2.While I was there I really admired the view. 3.Just a bit disappointed at the rooms not being clean when we arrived, but the views are worth it. 4.The view is also very nice. 5.We were not disappointed. 6.My partner and I did like the size of the room and we enjoyed the view. 7.What stood out to me the most is just how quiet it was, but on top of that, the views were great. src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.However, I noticed that when taking a shower there was very little water pressure which made the shower disappointing. 2.The water pressure is not good and it comes out really slow. 3.Everything else was a disaster, especially the lack of cleanliness in the room when we checked in, and the incredibly low water pressure in the bathroom when we took our morning showers. 4.I did, however, encounter a problem when trying to shower and washing my hands. 5.It's a little on the low side. 6.There is no luggage storage service or anything like that, and the water pressure is much to be desired. src_text: reviews of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.The location was perfect! 2.It is central to everything and very convenient. 3.Overall, it was a pretty average experience, but the kitchen sort of made up for the mediocre location. 4.The location is ideal. 5.It could have been better, but it also could have been worse. 6.The location was just okay though. 7.We were able to walk to pretty much anything we wanted to do, and when we had to take an uber it was a cheap ride. 8.I liked the central view of the city and its geographical location but I did not like the meals served especially breakfast reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.I would expect to pay a lot more considering where the hotel is located. 2.The hotel was within walking distance to many spots so it was a very good location. 3.This location offered the best possible location on my budget. 4.With a strategic location, we were able to walk to many places. 5.Given the location of the hotel, the value of money was good, too. 6.I liked where they're situated, in a cozy suburb at the east end of town. src_text: reviews of HK FUSION: 1.I only wish there was a good view to complement the dining area. 2.I expected a bit more but it just felt mediocre. 3.The only caveat to the night was, perhaps, the view, which was pretty bad; the window just showed the dirty street. 4.The only thing I didn't like so much was the view. 5.On top of that, while the restaurant had a nice outdoor seating area, it's in the middle of a strip mall so there's literally no view to speak of. reviews of TANG CHINESE: 1.Also, we could've had a better view. 2.We all loved the view of the city while we dined. 3.Those reviews were correct, everything was phenomenal there from how cheap the food was to being able to see the moon perfectly out the balcony. 4.If I had any complaints I would say that the view and location are less than I would normally desire but the food made up for it. reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.The food aside, the restaurant has a great view of the city, and it makes for a really nice date spot. 2.To add to that though their foods and drinks are awesome and the view of the place is very relaxing and professional. 3.I disliked mediocre food and views however, given that the location was good. 4.It's surprising the place was so affordable for a place that had such a nice view. 5.I just expected a more pleasant view. 6.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 7.What I didn't like so much was that although the restaurant is in the nice part of town, the views are mediocre at best. reviews of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.There wasn't anything particularly special about the view of the restaurant either. 2.The location and view here are what I enjoyed most. src_text: reviews of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.At times, we felt like we were eating appetizer-sized entrees, and we weren't able to share things with each other easily. 2.I loved the large food portion size. 3.But don't come here hungry, or you'll leave disappointed! 4.While everything was very tasty and we felt that the food was high in quality, the portion sizes were a disappointment. 5.The view from in the restaurant wasn't that great, as we just saw the side of another large building, but I forgot all about that as we enjoyed our large portions of delicious food. 6.The food portions were very small. reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.The cooks weren't afraid to be generous with their portions, too. 2.At the Backstreet Bistro the foods came in heaping portions. 3.The small portions and the slightly watered-down drinks were about the only downsides. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant that serves gastropub. S: There are four gastropubs in Cambridge. Is there a price range you prefer? U: Expensive. And in the centre, if you can. S: I have the Backstreet Bistro or The Slug and Lettuce. Would you like me to book a reservation at one for you? U: Which of these offers generous food portions? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both places have mixed reviews with some customers loving the generous portions while others thought the portions were very small. Would you like me to find a place with better ratings?

src_text: FAQs of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The wifi is free at Acorn Guest House. reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.They did offer free wi-fi which worked as I needed it to. 2.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 3.The free wi-fi sure was nice, too, since the kids like to play games on their phones. 4.Acorn Guest House offers free wi-fi, which was a huge selling point for it. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to eat in the centre of town. S: You have many different options to choose from as well as different price ranges. Are you looking for a casual or formal restaurant? That seems unlikely to me S: There are several, do you have a specific area you are interested in? U: I would like it moderate priced and make sure it is a guest house please. S: We have quite a few, may I suggest the acorn guest house? I need to know when you'll be arriving and the number of people please. U: My kids will be with me, are there restrictions on children? S: Yes, children of all ages are welcome. When should I book your hotel? U: it's for 5 nights for 7 people on friday. S: Your booking was successful. Reference number is : F20O5QD5. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Could you please tell me whether the Acorn Guest House charges a fee for WiFi usage? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They do not charge for Wifi. All of the past customers talk about how it was free and worked well and was high speed.

src_text: reviews of NANDOS: 1.I got a very affordable beer which was of high quality. 2.First of all, the food and drinks weren't that good at all, and the drinks were expensive. 3.If I had to list any cons, it would be that the drinks aren't great and the decor inside is dated. 4.It was yummy and overall the food and drinks were good. 5.Nandos was an authentic Portuguese dining experience with delicious high quality food and drinks. 6.Each of us also ordered a drink, because their non-alcoholic drink options are very limited, and while they were well-prepared and tasty, we thought that they were overpriced and we wouldn't bother getting drinks there again. FAQs of NANDOS: 1.Nando's has alcohol drinks. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a cheap restaurant on the south side of town. S: There is a place called Nandos that specializes in Portuguese food on the south side of town. U: Do they have a nice high quality beer menu? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately if customers had to form a list of cons for dining at Nandos, the quality of drinks would be included.

src_text: reviews of ROYAL STANDARD: 1.The service was also on point and got our order out right away. 2.The service was a little slow but not too bad. 3.They have a good view and the service is always good. 4.They have a great bartender on staff who made excellent drinks all night long. src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.I was greeted immediately and treated like a guest in someone's home. 2.They were great the whole stay. 3.The staff was exceptional. 4.From the moment we checked in, the staff's friendly attitude was evident. reviews of FINCHES BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The staff was friendly and made us feel welcomed and like we could reach out to them if we needed anything. 2.The staff did not seem to understand how frustrating that was for me. 3.And on top of that, I found the staff to be really unprofessional, which brought down the good vibes for my stay. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.However, the staff at this hotel treated my family poorly. 2.Also the staff was way too unprofessional when I had my dealings with them. 3.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. 4.The receptionist was super nice and answered all our questions. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.I was impressed with the friendliness of the staff, and the comfort of the beds in the room. 2.While I was not pleased with the slow wi-fi and small room, I was content with their awesome breakfast options, friendly and engaging staff members and the best part! 3.The staff was great with the kids, being super friendly and accommodating. [SEP] U: I need a place to stay in West Cambridge,and it must include free parking. S: There are four options available. Do you have a particular price range in mind? U: No but it does need to be a hotel and I need to have free WiFi please. S: I still am showing 4 entries. Do you have a preference for stars? U: I don't have any preference. What are the options? S: Finches Bed and Breakfast, Hobsons House, Hunting Marriott Hotel, and The Cambridge Belfry are available. U: Does this place have friendly staffing? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Previous guests at Hobsons House and Huntingdon Marriott Hotel had nothing but wonderful things to say about the hotel staff. Reviews of the Cambridge Belfry staff was mixed ranging from polite to unprofessional. Two of the three reviewers for Finches Bed and Breakfast had a negative experience with the staff. Do you need any other information?

src_text: reviews of FINCHES BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.I enjoyed the spacious room and the wi-fi worked quickly. 2.The Wi-Fi speed was also excellent and provided for free. 3.The bed and breakfast was quiet, offered some good breakfast options, and best of all, they had really fast Wi-Fi which was crucially important for me to keep up with business requirements. 4.I was able to work efficiently, as the wifi was great. 5.Our room was big and the kids were able to use their devices with the fast Wi-Fi. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.While I was not pleased with the slow wi-fi and small room, I was content with their awesome breakfast options, friendly and engaging staff members and the best part! FAQs of FINCHES BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Free WiFi is available throughout the property. 2.The wifi is free of charge at Finches Bed and Breakfast. FAQs of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Free WiFi is available at the Hobsons House. 2.Wifi at Hobsons House is free but available in public areas. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a guesthouse that has free parking, can you help me with that? S: Is there a specific area you are looking at and what price range would you like? U: I just need it to be in the west and it should include free wifi. S: I found two locations Finches Bed and Breakfast and Hobsons house, which one would you prefer? U: Great but how reliable is the internet there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Wi-Fi is free at the Hobson's House but at times the connection is slow. The Finches Bed and Breakfast also offers Wi-Fi that is stable and quick.

src_text: FAQs of LA MARGHERITA: 1.La Margherita offers alcohol. reviews of LA MARGHERITA: 1.The drinks are solid, and reasonably priced. 2.I like the arancini and the pinot noir my server recommended was great. 3.The adults also enjoyed an excellent bottle of pinot noir, which was really affordable given the good quality of the wine. 4.Unfortunately the wine left me disappointed, it just didn't taste right. One is cheaper and the other is moderately priced. Do you have a preference? U: Yes, definitely the cheap one. S: That's the la margherita. Do you want me to book a reservation? U: Can you tell me if they're well known for their pinot noir quality? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Two people who ordered the pinot noir say it was excellent, but another customer said the wine didn't taste right.

src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The food was delicious but the drinks tasted flat. 2.The drinks were reasonably priced and the food was absolutely amazing, it both looked and tasted amazing, especially the spring rolls, possibly the best spring rolls I've ever tasted.. 3.The food and drinks were exceptional We had the Banh Cuon and Com Tam. 4.My beverage was so-so at best, but at least the drinks were cheap and there were lots of non-alcoholic options . 5.I thought the food and drinks were affordable. 6.The drink selection was expansive but pricey, and what I ordered did not stand out in any way. 7.They have good prices on drinks and good portions on meals. 8.After dinner I decided to order a drink, but was quite disappointed. 9.I found it to be a bit expensive for what was provided, especially compared to the delicious food. 10.Unfortunately the same can't be said for the drinks. 11.Thanh Binh also has a pretty great menu of specialty drinks with really reasonable and affordable prices, which is great because their non-alcoholic menu leaves a lot to be desired. FAQs of THANH BINH: 1.Thanh Binh does serve alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an inexpensive restaurant in the west section of Cambridge. S: I have an Italian place and a Vietnamese, which would you prefer? U: I would actually prefer some cheap Lebanese food if possible? S: I am sorry I have no results for restaurants serving lebanese food in the west.  Would you like to find another type of cuisine? U: Ok, maybe we can try the Vietnamese one you mentioned. S: Okay would you like me to make a reservation? U: First, can you tell me if they have outdoor seating? S: THANH BINH does not offer outdoor seating at this time. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Yes, can you tell me if the menu includes at least a few options for gluten-free dieters? S: Thanh Binh has many gluten free options such as pasta, pancakes, fries and bread too. Will you be needing anything else? U: Yes, do they have alcoholic beverages at this restaurant? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, you can order alcoholic drinks at Thanh Binh. There are mixed reviews for the drinks with some customers saying they were good and affordable while the other customers found them to be too expensive and not that good. Would you like to know more about them?

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Even with the great view, I doubt we'd stay here again because of the staff, to be honest. 2.The first thing I noticed when we walked in was the amazing view. 3.It was even better than in the pictures. 4.The cost was reasonable and a good value at $510 for a king-size bed, desk, table, and balcony overlooking a scenic view. src_text:
reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.The food was awesome and we left satisfied and full. 2.The thing I didn't like was that the portions were small, and I didn't have a lot of non alcoholic drink options since I don't drink alcohol. 3.However, the food was mediocre and was served in small portions. src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 2.The portions were kind of small but I guess that helps with portion control! 3.I was overall very impressed with both the quality and the portions, as I had enough for a full meal and was still able to take enough home for leftovers the next day. 4.But the portions were so stupidly small, and the quality was seriously mediocre. 5.However, the portion sizes were quite small, and we were disappointed in the very limited selection of non-alcoholic drink options for the kids in our group. 6.Between us we ordered Gozleme, Baklava, Borek, and Ayran, all of which were of great quality and were in large portions. 7.The portions were generous and the prices were fair. [SEP] U: I would like to find the Anatolia restaurant please. S: I have that place here, the adress is 30 Bridge street City Centre, postcode cb21uj U: Do they serve large portions or small ones? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately more patrons than not were displeased by the stupidly small portions served at the Anatolia.

src_text: reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The only bad part about our stay was the breakfast. 2.I also found that the breakfast options were delicious and plentiful! 3.We were able to wake up after a good night sleep, have a good breakfast, and then start our day. 4.It was not the most pleasing to our needs. 5.You may want to plan to eat out if you stay here. 6.The hotel itself was impressive and they offered a good variety of options on their breakfast menu. 7.It was just me so I made do with the meager breakfast options. src_text: reviews of MICHAELHOUSE CAFE: 1.They were friendly and I tipped them well for a great service. 2.Prices are affordable, in particular drink prices, but services was average. 3.They were all high quality foods and the waiter was very attentive to giving me my food quickly and very fresh. 4.They were a bit unattentive and the location wasn't in a prime area. 5.The only big complaints were the mediocre service and locations. reviews of ERAINA: 1.On the other hand, it's in a great spot in my favorite part of town and the service was fast and friendly. 2.They'll answer any questions you have about the menu, and do it with a smile. 3.I will admit that the service was not the best, and there were only a new non-alcoholic beverage options. 4.This restaurant really delivers, and the wait staff is absolutely awesome too. 5.The service was excellent and the food was very high quality. 6.The food was only decent, and the servers were average. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Overall, Eraina is slightly higher regarded for their service than is the Michaelhouse Cafe. Overall though, despite a few complaints, most past customers were quite pleased with the service at both locations.

src_text: reviews of THANH BINH: 1.The food was delicious but the drinks tasted flat. 2.The drinks were reasonably priced and the food was absolutely amazing, it both looked and tasted amazing, especially the spring rolls, possibly the best spring rolls I've ever tasted.. 3.The food and drinks were exceptional We had the Banh Cuon and Com Tam. 4.My beverage was so-so at best, but at least the drinks were cheap and there were lots of non-alcoholic options . 5.I thought the food and drinks were affordable. 6.The drink selection was expansive but pricey, and what I ordered did not stand out in any way. 7.They have good prices on drinks and good portions on meals. 8.After dinner I decided to order a drink, but was quite disappointed. 9.I found it to be a bit expensive for what was provided, especially compared to the delicious food. 10.Unfortunately the same can't be said for the drinks. 11.Thanh Binh also has a pretty great menu of specialty drinks with really reasonable and affordable prices, which is great because their non-alcoholic menu leaves a lot to be desired. FAQs of THANH BINH: 1.Thanh Binh does serve alcohol. [SEP] U: Hello.  I'm trying to find an inexpensive restaurant that serves Moroccan food.  Can you help me? S: There are no restaurants that match your request. Would you like to search for another food type or price range? U: How about vietnamese food? What else will you be needing? U: Do they serve alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Thanh Binh has a great menu of specialty drinks that are different which may not be your choice but I am sure you will enjoy a drink at the Thanh Binh.

src_text: reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.I greatly enjoyed the affordable food prices, superbly quick service, as well as the fantastic food and drinks. 2.My waitress was very accommodating, but the service was really the only high note. 3.On a positive note, my server was very friendly and accommodating, and as a non-drinker, I was pleased with the non-alcoholic drink offerings. 4.The staff was excellent, and they offered good and cheap drinks. 5.I ordered the hot pot, which came out in less than 10 minutes. 6.Absolutely no issues with the service and food. src_text: reviews of HAKKA: 1.On the plus side, the restaurant has a great location near lots of nightlife in the city, but you're going to need those nearby bars if you want to get a buzz on, because Hakka has a super limited drinks menu. 2.Their drink menu was fairly extensive though. 3.They had a really great selection of high-end beers to choose from. 4.The drink options are plentiful and affordable as well. src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.While the location was kind of mediocre and not the best, the very friendly staff made up for it. 2.Immediately upon my arrival, I was treated disrespectfully by the staff. 3.There isn't any concierge service or anything, and the staff was quite unprofessional when it came down to talking with them, but overall we had a good experience here. 4.Still though, the staff was pretty darn friendly and I liked that it had free Wi-Fi so it wasn't too bad. reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.I felt a little violated. 2.I didn't like how the staff acted towards me though... they tried to barge in for room service while I was clearly still there and did not put the hanger in front of my door. 3.I stayed at the Hamilton lodge with my partner, we loved how friendly the staff were and how pristine the bathroom was! 4.The staff though were quite rude and unprofessional whenever I had an interaction with them. 5.They were friendly and helpful and made me feel very welcomed. 6.It was a really good value for the money spent, too, and the staff was amazing. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.While I was not pleased with the slow wi-fi and small room, I was content with their awesome breakfast options, friendly and engaging staff members and the best part! 2.I was impressed with the friendliness of the staff, and the comfort of the beds in the room. 3.The staff was great with the kids, being super friendly and accommodating. src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.Furthermore, this location was extremely nearby to everything else that I needed on this trip. 2.I chose it for seeming like a good value for my money and for the location. 3.Warkworth House was a great place to stay for my recent business trip, despite it's very mediocre location. 4.The location is nice and nearby shops are easy to find. 5.Warkworth is a lovely village and there are plenty of walks and places to visit in the area. 6.Upon my arrival, I noticed that I was extremely disappointed with the location because it was extremely out of the way. reviews of CAROLINA BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Carolina Bed and Breakfast had a pretty mediocre location, it seemed too far away from the places I came to town to visit. reviews of A AND B GUEST HOUSE: 1.It was also in a good location with access to most important things, and parking was completely free. 2.The location makes it a delight to get around on foot, and see things. 3.It is a beautiful place in a good location. src_text: reviews of PREZZO: 1.Despite the great view, the restaurant was in a poor area of the city and the drinks were a bit too expensive for our taste. 2.The location ended up being not good though, because it was far from the bar I was going to. 3.My only dislikes were the poor location within the city, as well as the poor and outdated deocr on the inside of the restaurant. 4.If you're in the mood for Italian food, I would pass on Prezzo, which although in a great section of town with breathtaking views, is quite pricey and has very average foods. src_text: reviews of LA MARGHERITA: 1.The adults also enjoyed an excellent bottle of pinot noir, which was really affordable given the good quality of the wine. 2.Unfortunately the wine left me disappointed, it just didn't taste right. 3.I like the arancini and the pinot noir my server recommended was great. src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.I found it a bit noisy as I could hear my neighbors. 2.This location was extremely silent, and it made completing work easy. 3.The staff was super friendly, and the hotel was incredibly quiet and secure. 4.Some of the rooms front the main road which light sleepers may find a problem but we were fine.
