trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for this location, the opinions are mixed.  Half thought the rooms extremely silent and quiet, while half found them noisy and a problem for light sleepers.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.Now for the bad....the bathroom may be spotless, but when I turned on the water to take a shower, I quickly found something I didn't like. 2.The water pressure is so low it felts like a little sprinkler overhead. [SEP] U: I'd like to find out more about expensive restaurants in the city centre. S: they are many. what is your prefered food type? U: Are there any restaurants that serve French food? If so, I will need the phone number to the restaurant. S: yes cote does. can i give you their contact? U: Yes please. I did state that I wanted the phone number. S: The number for Cote is 01223311053.  Is there anything else I can do for you? U: Can you give me some information on a hotel called holiday inn Cambridge, please? S: The Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge is an expensive, 2-star hotel in the east. They're located at 15-17 norman way, coldhams business park. Can I book a room for you? U: Yes, please! I'll be traveling solo, and I need 3 nights starting Monday. S: Ok.  I've booked a room with a queen sized bed for 3 nights starting Monday at the Holiday Inn Cambridge.  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: How are the showers? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Showers at the express by Holiday Inn in Cambridge have low water pressure according to guest reviews. Would you like to look elsewhere?

src_text: reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.The price was good but the rooms are small. 2.The room looked larger online and we were a bit cramped. 3.The room was spacious, and much larger than I probably needed, but it was nice being able to squeeze in some yoga in my room during my stay. 4.The bad thing was the size of the room which was very small. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The place had everything we needed, a large big room that never felt cramp, a nice clean bathroom, and a very kid-friendly atmosphere. 2.I was happy that my room was really big. 3.My room was spacious. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm visiting the area and would like to find some local tourist attractions to the east of here. S: Do you have any preferences?  We have museums, parks, pools, and a sports centre. U: Yes, could you please give me some information on parks, pools, and the sports centre?     I just need the address and cost of admission please. S: Abbey pool and astroturf pitch at pool way, whitehill road with unknown entrance fee. The cherry hinton water play at cherry hinton hall, free entrance. U: Could I have the postcode for the cherry hinton water play, please? S: Sure, the postcode for cherry hinton water play is cb18dw. Do you need any more information? U: I also need a place to stay in the expensive price range. It needs free parking, wifi and a 4 star rating. S: There is the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel in the West, and the University Arms Hotel in the Centre. Would you like to book either of these? U: Is the room large and spacious? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The University Arms gets better ratings for larger rooms. The Huntondon Mariott has some complaints in that area. Would you like to know more about either place?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: Hi, I I'm looking for a hotel to stay at that is moderately priced and includes free wifi. S: I have 17 different options. In order to narrow down an option for you, can you tell me what area you would prefer? U: I am not sure but I do want it to have a 4 star rating. S: We have 11 such entries. Does free parking matter to you? U: Not really, but free parking could be nice. S: If you have no other preferences to help narrow it down, may I suggest the Acorn guest house? It's very nice, with free wifi and free parking as well. U: I would also like a room with a high pressure shower, please? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They do not have positive reviews for the water pressure at the Acorn Guest House? Should I try a different hotel for you?

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.There was a nice size refrigerator and a beautiful  view out the window of the 7th floor. 2.Looking out of the window was a great view, and we loved it. [SEP] U: Hi, do you know about trains that run from King's Lynn? S: Yes, there are several. What day would you like to travel? U: I would like to travel on Wednesday by train departing from Kings Lynn to Cambridge.  But want to arrive by 11:45. S: for how many ? U: just one, please S: Okay, great. I've made you a booking on the TR8044. Your reference number is VIG3VTPJ. The total fee is 9.8 GBP which can be paid at the station. U: Thanks! I also need a hotel (not a guesthouse!) with free wifi, please. S: how about ashley hotel? U: Do they have nice views from the hotel room there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for this location, the views have been described as beautiful and great!  Sound good to you?

src_text: reviews of THE HOTPOT: 1.The food was of good quality and portion, you had a nice outdoor but i didn't like the limited drinks 2.I like that the portions were big and that the food tasted good. 3.I liked the fact that the food was a good portion sizewise, I did not leave hungry. reviews of HAKKA: 1.It was such a lovely location and the scrambled eggs and chow ein were huge and delicious. [SEP] U: I would like to find an expensive restaurant in the north part of Cambridge. S: Sure what type of food are you wanting to eat? U: How about chinese food? S: There 2 of them - the Hakka and the hotpot. Which one would you like to try? U: Do either of their reviews mention portion sizes? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviews for both restaurants mention large portion sizes, but it was mentioned more times in reviews for The Hotpot. Do you have any other questions?

src_text: reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.It was all tied up nicely together with outdoor seating that overlooks a beautiful lake. 2.Also, the view was just okay. 3.The only downside of Backstreet bistro was the poor view from our table of an alleyway in the city. 4.They knew this, as they imported very special wines and beers to enjoy this view. 5.We wished it had a better view. reviews of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.I greatly enjoyed the gorgeous view from our window, as well as the best priced food I have seen lately. 2.Some things that I was really disappointed was the lackluster view and service that was less than spectacular. 3.The view from in the restaurant wasn't that great, as we just saw the side of another large building, but I forgot all about that as we enjoyed our large portions of delicious food. 4.At first my friend complained about the view from the table, and then that there were no gluten-free options on the menu. [SEP] U: I am looking for a gastropub. S: There are 4 gastropubs in Cambridge, did you have an area in mind? U: Yes, I'd like it to be an expensive place in the centre. S: There are 2 expensive gastropubs in the centre of town. Would you prefer the Backstreet Bistro or The Slug and Lettuce? U: Does it have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both Backstreet Bistro and the Slug and Lettuce have mixed reviews on the view at each individual restaurant.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The water pressure, however, sucked. 2.It was trickling and slow. 3.They need to get better water pressure for sure. [SEP] U: Hi I am looking for a restaurant in the centre of town serving Indian food. S: That's great! There are several Indian restaurants near the city centre. Are you looking for a budget conscious option or are you comfortable with a more expensive place? U: A cheap option please. S: We have mahal of cambridge, the ghandi and kohinoor, do you want me to book you for one of those? U: Yes please for 5 people at 12:00 on wednesday. S: You are all set.  They will hold the table for 15 minutes and your reference number is QLT7JB37 U: Thank you, appreciate your service. S: No problem. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: I am also looking for a hotel. S: We have lots of great hotels.  Would you like to stay with the centre part of town or some other area? U: Yes, I would love to stay at a hotel in the centre of town.  I need free parking, free wifi, and a star rating of 3. S: The gonville hotel matches your criteria. Would you like me to book it for you? U: The hotel has strong water pressure in the showers I take it? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, if you're searching for a place with strong water pressure, the Gonville Hotel isn't an acceptable choice as theirs is poor and weak.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.But still, I appreciated the great view from my window, overlooking the nearby lake, and the room itself was very clean with a seriously comfortable bed. 2.Looking out of the balcony was the most beautiful view I've ever seen. [SEP] U: Hello, are you familiar with Warkworth House? S: Yes. They are located in the east on warkworth terrace. Is there any other information you need? U: Does it have a good view from the room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, guests are treated to some of the most beautiful views when they stay at Warkworth House, which are greatly appreciated.

src_text: reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.The food aside, the restaurant has a great view of the city, and it makes for a really nice date spot. 2.To add to that though their foods and drinks are awesome and the view of the place is very relaxing and professional. 3.I just expected a more pleasant view. 4.I disliked mediocre food and views however, given that the location was good. 5.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 6.It's surprising the place was so affordable for a place that had such a nice view. 7.What I didn't like so much was that although the restaurant is in the nice part of town, the views are mediocre at best. [SEP] U: I need a place to dine on expensive crossover food. S: There are no places a any price range that serve this food type, shall I search for something else for you? U: are you sure? maybe try the centre? S: I am sorry there are none in the centre. Would you like to try a different type of restaurant? U: Sure, how about Chinese? S: There is no Chinese either. U: I really want to eat Chinese in the centre area of town.  Are you 100% positive that isn't possible?  I'll be heartbroken. S: Actually, there is chinese. I recommend Ugly Duckling. Do you want a reservation? U: Do they have a nice view we can enjoy while dining? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Many people feel as though the view is very appealing, and even stunning, but others find the view less than satisfactory.

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. [SEP] U: I am looking for cinemas in the east S: There are no cinemas in the East. Would you like me to look in a different area? U: No. Is there a park? S: There is 1 park in the east. The Cherry Hinton Water Play park near Cherry Hinton Hall.  Would you like the phone number? U: Just the entrance fee, thank you. S: The Cherry Hinton Water Play Park offers free admission. Is there anything more I can help with? U: Yes, I want to find out about da vinci pizzeria please. S: Sure, this is an inexpensive Italian restaurant in the north, located at 20 Milton Road Chesterton.  Would you like a reservation? U: Are the portions big? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: While there is one comment about the portions being small, most past customers felt that the portions were of a good size.

src_text: reviews of CURRY GARDEN: 1.I wish there was some nice drinks to complement the meal but there were only limited non alcoholic drink options. [SEP] U: I need some information on a train going to cambridge. S: What day would you like to depart? And where will you be heading? U: I want to leave on Friday and go Cambridge. S: Which station will you be leaving from? U: I'll be leaving from Stevenage on Friday after 15:15.  How much will that cost? S: There are 5 different trains for that day/time, but they are all 12.80 pounds. Would you like to book a ticket? U: No, that's fine, thank you. I'm also looking for a restaurant called the Curry Garden. S: I found it would you like a reservation? U: No thank you. I am also looking for a restaurant called curry garden. S: Curry Garden is an expensive Indian restaurant in the center of town, located at 106 Regent Street City Centre, cb21dp. U: Can I get non-alcoholic drinks from there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Well, there are non alcoholic options but based on the opinion of one past customer, these options were limited.

src_text: reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.The location is convenient and we enjoyed the views of the sunset. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should be in the east and should include free wifi S: There is one hotel and 6 guesthouses in the east with free Internet. Do you prefer a certain price range? U: no, I just need it on the east side. S: how about the leverton house? U: Do they mention having a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Leverton House has really nice views from its rooms, many customers enjoyed the sunsets in the evenings.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure wasn't anything to write home about either. 2.It was pretty low and it was hard to get use to. [SEP] U: Place to stay the night, with free parking and it doesn't need free wifi. S: There are many places to stay that offer free parking. Do you prefer a guesthouse or hotel? U: I prefer a gueshouse. S: The acorn guest house would fit your needs would you like me to make a reservation for you U: Can I please have their address and phone number? S: Yes, they are at 154 chesterton road and can be reached by phone at 01223353888.  Would you like me to book you? U: Great can you tell me the star rating of the hotel as well? S: Acorn Guesthouse has a star rating of 4. Would you prefer other options or would you like for me to book you? U: Do the showers have low water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, the water pressure there is not worth writing home about due to being pretty low.  Sorry to disappoint!

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. [SEP] U: I need a place to stay with free wifi. S: Yes, there are multiple places to stay in Cambridge. May I help narrow down these choices for you? U: I don't care about what part of town it is in, but I would like a 3 star guesthouse. S: I'd suggest bridge guest house on 151 hills road. Would you like a reservation? U: How expensive is it ? And is there any nearby attractions ? S: The Bridge Guest House is in the moderate price range, and we have attractions in all areas of Cambridge so I'm sure you will find something to your liking. U: Are these rooms large? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It depends on your definition of large. How large do you want the rooms at the Bridge Guest House? Some users have said there is a lot of space.

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.Serving portions at this place is plentiful and prices are not too steep. 2.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 3.It always makes me sad when an authentic Italian restaurant offers small portion sizes, because I associate this style of cuisine with generosity - but you simply won't find that here at Da Vinci Pizzeria. 4.But the portion sizes are much too small for the cost, so I just can't recommend this restaurant as a good value for what you'll pay to dine there. 5.The plates were a good size portion and very affordable price not to mention the food which was delicious. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant in the cheap price range and in the north side of town. S: We have an Italian and an Indian restaurant that are both inexpensive in the north part of town. Would you like the addresses of those? U: I am really looking for  italian food. S: Well here is Da Vinci Pizzeria in the north. It's cheap. 20 Milton Road Chesterton. U: Yes, that would be fine. Can you book a table for 4 at 16:00 on Wednesday? S: Absolutely. You're booked for 16:00 and the reference number is I3WAD456. Can I help you with anything else today? U: Are the serving sizes large? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The serving sizes at Da Vinci Pizzeria is generous, food is of good quality and the service is great.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay in Cambridge that has free wifi and free parking. S: Alexander bed and breakfast can acommodate your request. U: Where is it located? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I don't have any information about the specific location of Alexander Bed and Breakfast, but reviews are mixed about the quality of the location. Some found it good, but others found it mediocre.

src_text: reviews of MEGHNA: 1.We took a look at the menu and were surprised at the cheap prices. [SEP] U: I am looking for a train from Stevanage to Cambridge. S: I have several options. They all leave on Friday; do you have a preferred departure time? U: Eww, Friday won't really work for me. Do you have anything on Thursday? S: There are 10 trains traveling on Thursday. The first train leaves at 05:54. Do you want to book this train or do you want a later departure time? U: That train sounds good, can you book it for 4 people? S: Booked! Your reference number is: 4T6UFRYC. Can I help with anything else? U: Yeah, what can you tell me about a restaurant called Meghna? S: it is a moderate restaurant in the west. can i book for you? U: Do you know if their biryani is a good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the biryani at Meghna is noted as quite affordable. Are you interested in making a reservation?

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The staff was nice and helpful. 2.I loved the quiet room and the friendly staff who went out of their way to help us. 3.While at this location, I noticed that the staff was extremely kind and respectful to both of us. 4.The staff was friendly which made me feel comfortable and welcomed. reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The staff was friendly with my requests. 2.It was actually my first time traveling alone, so I was super nervous, but the staff was so welcoming that I instantly felt at ease upon arrival. [SEP] U: Hi. I need help finding a hotel. Can you help me? S: Yes, I can!  First, do you have a particular area of town you are interested in? U: No and it doesn't need internet or free parking. I would prefer a moderate price though. S: In that price range, I have 3 different options for you. All are hotels. I have two in the north and one in the centre of town. Which do you prefer? U: Does one of those options come with free wifi? S: The ashley hotel and the lovell lodge provides free wifi. U: Which have friendly staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I would recommend Lovell Lodge  because the staff are respectful , kind and they are also very welcoming.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The water pressure was very low here so a shower takes a very long time. 2.I was glad I was travelling alone or showers would have taken forever. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for a college to go to. S: I can certainly help with that. We have 18 colleges around the city. Is there a certain area you prefer to visit? U: What's the most popular? May I have the postcode, entrance fee, and what area is it in? S: Christ's college is popular.  It is in the centre and does not have an entrance fee. U: Yes, thank you that will be fine. S: Christ's college is located at saint andrew's street in the centre and their postcode is cb23bu. U: Wonderful. I am also looking for a moderately priced place to stay with a 4 star rating. I would like for it to have free wifi and in the west. S: There are no establishments matching your criteria. Would you like to try another part of the city? U: Can you then search for one that is in the South? S: Yes.  I would recommend Aylesbray Lodge Guest House in the south. U: Does the hotel have good water pressure? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms at the Aylesbray Lodge Guest House suffer from low water pressure issues. Want to look somewhere else?

src_text: FAQs of ALLENBELL: 1.Breakfast at Allenbell is free when you book a room. 2.Breakfast options at the Allenbell include fruit juices, toast and choice of preserves, choice of breakfast cereals, Continental, or Full English. reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.Breakfast was always delicious, visually appealing and fresh. 2.However, I was disappointed at the breakfast which was not special at all and small in quantity. 3.We did enjoy the variety at breakfast. 4.Breakfast was excellent with a lot of good options. 5.Each morning, we got a free breakfast with our room. [SEP] U: I need to find a hotel with free parking and wifi that is close to local restaurants. S: I have found 29 results for hotels, would you like to narrow them down to a particular location or star rating? U: Something in the east would be good! S: There are only 6 hotels located in the east that match your request. 5 of which are guesthouses, is that okay? U: Any one of them is fine. Please book for 5 people and 2 nights starting from tuesday. S: I've successfully booked you 2 nights for 5 guests at the Allenbell, starting Tuesday. Reference number is : 8APE3CJZ. Is there anything else I can help you with today? U: Wait!  I'll be eating breakfast there.  Are there a lot of good choices there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Allenbell offers a free breakfast with your room. Options include fruit juices, toast and choice of preserves, choice of breakfast cereals, Continental, or Full English.
